T11TD4221.1E:17a-9: gzhan pas gzhan du ci ltar de //
T11TD4221.1E:17a-10: rtogs 'gyur de lta yin na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:17a-12: gal te kha dog dang dbyibs gzhan du rtogs na /
T11TD4221.1E:17a-13: de 'khrul pa nyid yin pas ci ltar spyi mngon sum yin /
T11TD4221.1E:17a-14: 'on te der yan lag can snang ba yin gyi spyi ma yin la kha dog dang dbyibs kyang ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:17a-15: kha dog dbyibs kyi rang bzhin las //
T11TD4221.1E:17a-16: tha dad rdzas ni snang yin pa //
T11TD4221.1E:17a-17: de dag la ni gzhan pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:17a-18: so sor snang ba yod dam ci //
T11TD4221.1E:17a-19: sngon po la sogs pa kha dog gi rang bzhin nyid snang ba yin gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:17a-20: de la rdzas gzhan snang ba ni med de /
T11TD4221.1E:17a-21: de las tha dad pa'i rdzas gzhan so sor snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:17a-22: de nyid rdzas yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:17a-23: ma yin te kha dog dang dbyibs ni yon tan yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:17a-24: 'on te kha dog dbyibs dang ldan pa'i rdzas yin na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:17a-25: de las tha dad pa rnam pa gzhan du snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:17a-26: gsal ba dang mi gsal ba'i kha dog dbyibs las tha dad pa'i rdzas gzhan ni dmigs pa med de /
T11TD4221.1E:17a-27: mi gsal ba'i kha dog dang dbyibs kyang de las gzhan pa'i tshogs pa las byung ba'i shes pas gnod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:17a-28: gsal bar snang ba'i shes pa skyes na 'di ni 'di lta bu ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:17a-29: de las bzlog pa'i rang bzhin dmigs pa nyid gnod par byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:17a-30: 'di ma yin no snyam pa'i shes pa ma skyes pa'i phyir de lta ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:17a-31: 'di ma yin no snyam pa'i shes pa de yang skyes pa nyid ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:17a-32: 'di ltar dbyibs 'di ni kha dog de ma yin no zhes bya ba de dang tha mi dad pa'i dbyibs la gnod pa'i shes pa skye ba nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:17a-33: gal te tha dad pa la gnod par byed pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:17a-34: gang gi phyir tha mi dad pa'i dbyibs la /
T11TD4221.1E:17a-35: gnod par byed pa de nyid kyi phyir dbyibs tha dad pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:17b-0: gal te ci ltar @17b sngon rtogs pa //
T11TD4221.1E:17b-1: de 'dra ba la gnod byed cing //
T11TD4221.1E:17b-2: gal te gzhan du rtogs med na //
T11TD4221.1E:17b-3: lus par 'gyur ba gzhan ci yod //
T11TD4221.1E:17b-5: rdzas kha dog dang tha dad pa med par rtogs pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba gnod pa yin na gzhan lus pa ci yod /
T11TD4221.1E:17b-6: gang gis de nyid la gcig la gnod par byed la gzhan la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i rnam par gzhan pa tha dad par byed pa'i sbyor ba'i rnam par bye ba ni yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:17b-8: kha dog de ni thob pa min //
T11TD4221.1E:17b-9: de ni dbyibs dang rdzas dag yin //
T11TD4221.1E:17b-10: des na thob phyir rdzas gzhan yin //
T11TD4221.1E:17b-11: des ni sngar yang rigs pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:17b-12: gang zhig snga ma dang phyi ma'i dngos por rig pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:17b-13: de lta ma yin pa gang yin pa de gnyis ni 'gal ba'i chos gnas pas tha mi dad par mi rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:17b-14: tha dad pa dag ni de lta bu nyid du bsgrub par bya ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:17b-15: tha dad pa'i sgrub par byed pa ni gzhan med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar sems na /
T11TD4221.1E:17b-17: de nyid du na gal te de //
T11TD4221.1E:17b-18: gzhan na sngon nam phyi ma yi //
T11TD4221.1E:17b-19: mngon sum la ci snang min gnyis //
T11TD4221.1E:17b-20: mthong ba gang tshe sring bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:17b-21: gal te don dam par kha dog dang dbyibs de rdzas las tha dad pa'am /
T11TD4221.1E:17b-22: dbyibs kyang kha dog las tha dad pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:17b-23: ci ltar sngon dang phyi ma'i mngon sum la mi snang /
T11TD4221.1E:17b-24: so sor mi snang na de las tha dad pa'i tshogs pa med pa'i phyir der snang ngo zhes bya ba ni rmongs pa chen po'i mthu yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:17b-25: gnyis tshogs pa yang med pa'i phyir tshogs pa yin par ga las 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:17b-26: rjes su sbyor ba ni mngon sum las ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:17b-27: de med pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa yang med pas gang las tha dad par rtogs /
T11TD4221.1E:17b-28: de'i phyir thun mong ba zhes bya ba ni 'ga' yang med de /
T11TD4221.1E:17b-29: thams cad rang gi bdag nyid la rnam par gnas pa'i phyir khyad par nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:17b-30: de bas na byed pa zhes bya ba'i bya ba ni mchod sbyin byed pa la sogs pa bya ba'i khyad par gyi spyi ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:17b-31: de'i phyir sgom pa ni byed pa po'i bya ba'i rang bzhin ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:17b-32: de las tha dad par rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:17b-33: khams kyi don yang rdzas las tha dad par yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:18a-0: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pas snga ma dang phyi mar gyur pa'i rdzas yong su rtogs pa'i tha dad pa'i rang gi ngo bo @18a * //
T11TD4221.1E:18a-1: nyid las tha dad pa med kyang tha dad pa dang ldan par brtags nas bya ba las tha dad par dang /
T11TD4221.1E:18a-2: bya ba yang de las tha dad do zhes 'di ni tha snyad tsam du zad kyi 'di dngos po'i de kho na rnam par gnas pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:18a-3: rang gi bya ba dang khams kyi don yang nges par sbyor ba'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur bar rtogs pa des na ci ltar de la dmigs pa'i shes pa sngon gyi bag chags las skye ba dmigs pa med do zhes bya ba mi brjod /
T11TD4221.1E:18a-4: 'on te yang mngon sum ni da ltar ba'i yul can yin pa'i phyir byung ba dang 'byung ba'i yul can yin na dmigs pa med pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:18a-5: sgra ni de'i yul can yin yang der 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:18a-6: de skad du yang bskul ba ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa yin no snyam na /
T11TD4221.1E:18a-8: mthong ba med pa'i don de ni yod ces nges pa de ci ltar /
T11TD4221.1E:18a-9: rjes dpag la ni 'brel ba'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:18a-10: der ni de ltar gnas pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:18a-11: lkog tu gyur pa'i yul rtogs pa thams cad ni don dang 'brel pa nyid las mi slu ba dang ldan pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:18a-12: dper na rjes su dpag pa'i shas pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:18a-13: gang zhig gang dang ma 'brel pa de yod na de yod par ni nges pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:18a-14: dmigs pa med pa nyid ni de'i rang bzhin med pa nyid las te /
T11TD4221.1E:18a-15: med pa ni rang gi ngo bor 'dzin pa ma yin no zhes bshad zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:18a-16: 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang lhan cig 'brel bar nges pa yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:18a-17: rjes su dpag pa las ni rgyu las 'bras bu rtogs pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:18a-18: de ltar gzhan du mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:18a-19: me'i sbyin sreg la sogs pa la ni 'bras bu'i rgyu nyid dmigs pa ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:18a-20: de ma byas na phung bar nges pa yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:18a-21: 'on te bdag gi nus pa rtogs pa mchod sbyin la sogs pa'i rgyu nyid dang /
T11TD4221.1E:18a-22: bdag nyid la rtogs pas 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:18a-23: gal te de ni mtho ris kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:18a-24: rgyu yin par ni ma rtogs na//
T11TD4221.1E:18a-25: nges par sbyor ba bskul yang de //
T11TD4221.1E:18a-26: de la ci phyir 'jug pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:18a-27: de nyid kyi phyir bsgom pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:18a-29: khams kyi don rnams phan tshun 'brel pa'am /
T11TD4221.1E:18a-30: 'bras bu dang mngon par 'brel pa bsgrub pa yang ngag gi don yin no zhes bya bar mi rigs te /
T11TD4221.1E:18b-0: thams cad 'byung @18b bar 'gyur ba yin pas shes pas mi 'dzin pa'i phyir blo dmigs pa med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:18b-1: des na snang ba dang rnam par brtags pa gcig tu byas nas 'jug pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:18b-2: de nyid kyang gzhan sel ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:18b-3: rig byed las ni rtog pa sngon du byed pa can su yang mi 'jug ste /
T11TD4221.1E:18b-4: shin tu spros pas chog go //
T11TD4221.1E:18b-6: 'chad pa po yi byed pa'i yul //
T11TD4221.1E:18b-7: lhag par sgro btags pa yi phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:18b-8: don gang blo la rab gsal ba //
T11TD4221.1E:18b-9: de la sgra ni tshad ma nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:18b-10: don gyi de ni rgyu can min //
T11TD4221.1E:18b-11: sgro btags pa ni bden pa'i don gyi yul can du 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di gnas so //
T11TD4221.1E:18b-12: tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi rgyan las /
T11TD4221.1E:18b-13: bsgrub pa dang bsgoms pa la sogs pa rnam par 'grel pa ste dang po'o /
T11TD4221.1E:18b-15: // / gal te don byed par gnas pa mi slu ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:18b-16: 'o na ngo shes pa la sogs pa'i shes pa las kyang de nyid 'di yin no zhes bya ba la sogs par shes nas 'jug pa na /
T11TD4221.1E:18b-17: mi slo ba bsten pa'i phyir tshad mar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:18b-18: de la sngon med don shes pa //
T11TD4221.1E:18b-19: nges par gnod pa dang bral zhing //
T11TD4221.1E:18b-20: skyon med rgyu las byung ba ni //
T11TD4221.1E:18b-22: yan lag can la sogs pa'i yul can yang mi slu bar byed pa'i phyir tshad mar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:18b-23: 'on te blta ba'i shes pa'i stobs las skyes pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa 'di tshang ma ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:18b-24: yan lag can yang yan lag gi shes pa'i stobs las byung ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:18b-25: de lta na blta ba'i shes pa de yang mig dang 'brel pa la sogs pa'i stobs las skyes pa'i phyir tshad mar mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:18b-26: de la gal te rgyu gzhan dang gzhan tshol na mig la sogs pa rnams yin par thal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:18b-27: 'on te de ma thag pa yin na rnam par rtog pa nyid ni tshad mar thal lo zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:18b-29: gzung ba 'dzin phyir kun rdzob ni //
T11TD4221.1E:18b-30: mi 'dod blo ni tshad ma nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:18b-31: blang dang dor ba'i dngos po yi //
T11TD4221.1E:18b-33: de nyid 'di yin no snyam pa'i shes pa skye ba ni gcig nyid la tshad ma ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:18b-34: sngon med pa'i gcig nyid mi 'dzin pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:19a-0: des ni mthong ba nyid rtogs @19a * //
T11TD4221.1E:19a-2: gang snga ma dang lhan cig gcig tu bzung ba'i gcig nyid ni rtsod pa'i yul gyi gcig nyid bdag gir byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:19a-3: da lta ba tsam gcig yin na ni grub pa la sgrub pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:19a-4: de yang shes pa snga mas bzung ba la gzhan ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:19a-5: shes pa snga mas ni de'i 'jig pa'i gnas skabs nyid snga na med par 'dzin to //
T11TD4221.1E:19a-6: des na phyis rjes su sbyor bar byed pa ni ci ltar bzung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu nyid mtshams sbyor bar bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:19a-7: gzung ba nyid du 'dzin pa na yang de dran pa nyid yin pas gzung ba 'dzin pa'i phyir dran pa gzhan bzhin du tshad ma ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:19a-8: mi slu ba ni don bya ba byed pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:19a-9: don bya ba ni gcig nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:19a-10: dngos po'i nus pa tsam las skye ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:19a-11: de'i phyir de nyid 'di yin no snyam pa 'di ni shes pa nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:19a-12: 'on te snga ma dang lhan cig gcig tu rtogs so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:19a-14: mngon sum las sngon rig med na //
T11TD4221.1E:19a-15: de dang gcig la tshad yod min //
T11TD4221.1E:19a-16: ma rtogs pa dang gcig nyid du //
T11TD4221.1E:19a-17: rtogs zhes bya ba bab col yin //
T11TD4221.1E:19a-18: des na snga ma snga ma yi //
T11TD4221.1E:19a-19: rtogs las kun rdzob pa gcig nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:19a-20: kun rdzob pa yi rtogs 'di la //
T11TD4221.1E:19a-21: tshad ma yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:19a-22: bum sogs yul can shes pa gang //
T11TD4221.1E:19a-23: de yang ro sogs dag la yin //
T11TD4221.1E:19a-24: shes de dag gi bzung don las //
T11TD4221.1E:19a-25: tshogs pa rnam par rtog phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:19a-26: tshogs las gzhan pa'i gcig po ni //
T11TD4221.1E:19a-27: 'gas kyang rtogs pa yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:19a-28: thog med bag chags brten pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:19a-29: gzhan ni kun du 'dzin pas nyams //
T11TD4221.1E:19a-30: gal te snga ma de phyi ma la sogs pa gcig tu rtogs pa med na /
T11TD4221.1E:19a-31: 'o na ci ltar blo tshad ma yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:19a-33: blang ba dang dor bar bya ba'i yul la 'jug pa ni tshad ma zhes brjod la /
T11TD4221.1E:19a-34: 'jug pa de la yang blo nyid gtso bo yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:19a-35: gal te yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don ma rtogs snyam na de lta na yang de 'jug par byed pa'i phyir tshad ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:19a-36: dper na rjes su dpag pa mi 'dzin pa yang tshad ma yin pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:19b-0: rjes su dpag pas ni dngos po'i rang gi ngo bor bdag gir byed pa ma yin no zhes @19b 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:19b-1: mig la sogs pa las ni shes pa med par mi 'jug go //
T11TD4221.1E:19b-2: rnam par rtog pa med kyang goms pa las 'jug pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:19b-3: des na blang ba dang dor bar bya ba'i yul la sngar gyi blo nyid 'jug par byed pa yin pa'i phyir tshad ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:19b-4: rnam par rtog pa la sogs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:19b-5: goms pa med pa gang yin pa der ni ngo shes pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes su dpag pa nyid yin pa des na ha cang thal ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:19b-6: de ltar na re zhig 'bras bu don du gnyer ba rnams kyi tha snyad kyi rgyu nyid kyis tshad mar bshad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:19b-7: da ni rtogs pa'i 'bras bu'i yul rnam par 'byed pa'i rgyu yin par ston to //
T11TD4221.1E:19b-8: gzhan yang blo nyid tshad ma yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:19b-10: yul gyi rnam pa tha dad pas tshad ma'i 'bras bu /
T11TD4221.1E:19b-11: blo yi rtogs pa tha dad phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:19b-12: 'jug par byed pas ni tshad ma ma yin gyi 'on kyang rtogs par byed pa'i phyir te //
T11TD4221.1E:19b-13: rtogs par 'gyur na 'jug gam mi 'jug kyang rung ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:19b-14: de ltar na yang don gyi de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir tshad ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:19b-15: rnam pa gzhag pa'i don la gal te mi 'jug na 'di tshad ma'i nyes pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:19b-16: tshad ma ni thob par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:19b-17: tshad ma ni thob par rung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:19b-18: de nyid thob pa med na ji ltar shes //
T11TD4221.1E:19b-19: rang bzhin gyi khyad par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:19b-20: mi 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin ci ltar yongs su bcad /
T11TD4221.1E:19b-21: 'o na phyi rol gyi tha snyad zad par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:19b-22: mi 'khrul pa nyid ma shes na rang gi ngo bor rig pa tsam nyid gsal bar 'gyur la /
T11TD4221.1E:19b-23: de lta na yang phyi'i don dang rgyu gzhan la sogs pa rtogs pa ga la yod ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:19b-25: 'di'i yul gyi rnam pa lta bu'i rnam pa ni yul gyi rnam pa ste shes pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:19b-26: de tha dad pa ni yul gyi rnam pa tha dad pa'am /
T11TD4221.1E:19b-27: yul lta bu'i rnam pa tha dad pa ni yul gyi rnam pa tha dad pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:19b-28: mtshungs pa ni rnam pa ste /
T11TD4221.1E:19b-29: snang ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T11TD4221.1E:19b-30: yul dang 'dra ba'am yul ma mngon du phyogs pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:19b-31: sngon po'am de'i rnam par rig pa zhes de tha dad pas blo'i rtogs pa tha dad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:20a-2: rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:20a-3: de skad du yang gzhal bya rtogs pa ni tshad ma la rag las pa yin no zhes bshad do //
T11TD4221.1E:20a-4: yul gyi rnam pa de yang shes pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:20a-5: des na shes pa nyid tshad ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:20a-6: gal te ci ltar de rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba yin pa de bzhin du rtogs pa yang yin pa des na shes pa nyid 'bras bu'i yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:20a-8: tshad ma 'bras bu gzhan min zhing //
T11TD4221.1E:20a-9: tshad ma 'bras bu las gzhan min //
T11TD4221.1E:20a-10: bya dang byed pa'i rnam gzhag ni //
T11TD4221.1E:20a-11: thams cad de ltar 'gyur ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:20a-13: gal te ci ltar mig la sogs pa tshad ma ma yin pa de bzhin du rnam pa yang mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:20a-14: ji ltar myong ba'i byed pa po yin yang mig la sogs pa tshad ma ma yin pa de bzhin du rnam pa yang yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:20a-16: de yod na ni 'di yod phyir ;
T11TD4221.1E:20a-17: / rnam pa yod na rtogs pa'i 'bras bu 'di yod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:20a-18: mig la sogs pa yod na 'bras bu 'di yod pa nyid ni ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:20a-19: tha mi dad pa'i phyir rnam pa yod na ni yod pa nyid yin pa de'i phyir na sgrub par byed pa dam pa nyid yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:20a-20: sgrub par byed pa dam pa nyid kyang byed pa po yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:20a-21: sgrub par byed pa dam pa nyid ni chod pa med na yin no zhes ston par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:20a-22: 'o na ji ltar mig gis gzugs mthong ba zhes bya zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:20a-23: rgyu la 'bras bu btags pas de skad brjod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:20a-24: dper na rkun pos grong bsregs so zhes bya ba bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:20a-25: de'i phyir shes pa nyid tshad ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:20a-26: gal te shes pa 'di thob par byed pa yin no zhes ji ltar shes par bya /
T11TD4221.1E:20a-27: re zhig mngon sum las ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:20a-28: rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyis ni tshad ma dang tshad ma ma yin pa'i rnam par dbye ba ston par byed pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:20a-29: shes pa thams cad la rang rig pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:20a-30: de skyes pa'i dus nyid na mi slu ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:20a-31: cig shos kyi shes pa'i rnam par dbye ba shes nas /
T11TD4221.1E:20a-32: 'jug na 'ga' yang bslus par mi 'gyur la /
T11TD4221.1E:20a-33: the tshom du yang mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:20a-34: 'on te gnod pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi tshad mar rang nyid las rab tu grub pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:20b-0: shes @20b pa lkog tu gyur par smra ba rnams kyi don go bas bsgrub pa de ci ltar rang las 'grub /
T11TD4221.1E:20b-1: 'on te don gyi go bas ni shes pa yod par 'grub la /
T11TD4221.1E:20b-2: don gyi go bas shes pa de'i tshad ma ni gzhan gyi shes pa ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:20b-3: rang nyid las tshad ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-4: tshad ma ma yin pa ni gnod par byed pa'i shes pa las yin la gnod par byed pa'i shes pa yang rang nyid las tshad ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-5: gzhan yang rnam par shes pa ni rgyu las skye ba yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:20b-6: de'i tshad ma ni rang nyid las yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-7: gnod par byed pa'i mtshan nyid de yang sel bar byed pa gnod byed kyi shes pas 'gog pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:20b-9: gal te rang las tshad yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-10: rang gi rgyu yi dngos po las //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-11: de ltar skyes te gnod byed ni //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-12: gzhan gyis gzhan du byed ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-13: ci ste bdag ces rang bzhin phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-14: rang las tshad mar brjod na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-15: gnod par byed pa stong yod kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-16: de gzhan 'gyur ba yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-17: gal te skyon can rgyu yod pas //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-18: tshad ma min par 'gyur zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-19: yon tan ldan rgyu dang 'brel phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-20: ci phyir tshad mar 'dod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-21: gal te nyes pa med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-22: de ni tshad ma yin 'dod na //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-23: yon tan med phyir tshad min par //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-24: de ni ci phyir rtogs ma yis //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-25: gang gis de yi tshad ma dang //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-26: tshad min gzhan las yin 'gyur pa //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-27: tshad ma dang ni cig shos las //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-28: gzhan pa'i bdag ni rtogs pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-29: gal te de rtogs bdag 'dod na //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-30: rtogs med gnyid log sogs skabs su //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-31: de yi rang rig dngos po ni //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-32: nam yang med par 'gyur ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-33: de tshe cung zad rig med na //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-34: bdag yod ces ni ci ltar 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-35: rtogs dang cig shos rnam gzhag ni //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-36: ring ba bas kyang ches ring song //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-37: de phyir tshad ma shes pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-38: skye yin cig shos de bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-39: de nyid rgyu nyid las byung ste //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-40: de yi tshad nyid rang las min //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-41: rnam pa mtshungs pa srid pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-42: de nyid du ni nges ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-43: dang po thams cad gnod med pa //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-44: des na tshad ma nyid ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-45: phyis gnod med par the tshom za //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-46: de nges de ni mngon sum mam //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-47: rjes dpag gzhan pa las yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:20b-48: tshad ma gzhan ni yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-3: de yis ci ltar sngar 'das kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-4: tshad ma nyid ni rtogs par byed //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-5: sgrub par byed pa'i shes pa yang //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-6: yul la the tshom za ba'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-7: ci ltar de sgrub byed yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-8: tshad ma rtogs pa med phyir ro ;
T11TD4221.1E:21a-9: / gal te rtogs pa'i bdag nyid phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-10: tshad yin thams cad tshad mar thal //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-11: gnod pa med pa'i don rtogs pa'ang //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-12: dang po rab tu 'grub ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-13: de don don byed pa nyid ni //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-14: shes nas tshad ma nyid du rig / tshad ma sngar grub med pa gang //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-15: de ni ci ltar de las rig /
T11TD4221.1E:21a-16: gal te tshad ma sngar grub na //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-17: de ni byed dang ldan rig 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-18: don byed pa las shes de ni //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-19: tshad ma zhes byar 'dzin pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-20: 'on te gang la don byed pa //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-21: der de tshad ma yin 'dod na //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-22: don byed pa la sogs de ni //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-23: tshad min pas rtogs las kyang mthong //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-24: de las don byed de min na //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-25: gzhan las kyang ni ci ltar 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-26: de las res 'ga' mi thob phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-27: de ni gzhan du'ang mthong ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-28: gang las thob par the tshom med //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-29: gal te de ni tshad yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-30: 'o na rnam pa mtshungs pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-31: gang las the tshom ldog par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-32: goms las rnam pa mi mthun pa //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-33: de ni phyi nas rtogs 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-34: des na thob la 'khrul med na //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-35: de ni phan tshun brten pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-36: de mthong nyid na mthong rnams la //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-37: myong ba'i mthu las byung ba yi //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-38: dran las tha snyad yin zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-39: de ltar rjes dpag las yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-40: rjes dpag de yang mngon sum las //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-41: mngon sum rjes dpag las yin pas //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-42: phan tshun brten pa nyid kyi phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-43: gcig kyang gnas pa yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-44: rang dngos rang dmigs rnam pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-45: gcod par byed pa'i mngon sum gyis //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-46: rtsa tsam 'gugs par byed pa yang //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-47: nus pa nyid ni yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-48: de ni snga ma phyi ma yi //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-50: yul dang dus gzhan khyad par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-51: 'brel pa ldan pa yin par brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-52: gang du yul dang dus gzhan du //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-53: khyab pa mngon sum gyis 'dzin par //
T11TD4221.1E:21a-54: nus pa de ltar yin na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-0: thams @21b cad don kun mthong bar thal //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-1: khyab min lhan cig 'gyur gang yin //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-2: de las rjes dpog skye min te //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-3: de ni res 'ga' ba yin pas //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-4: yang na kun tu rjes dpag 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-6: yod do zhes ni mngon sum las //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-7: rigs 'gyur de las yul la sogs //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-8: gzhan gnas pa ni 'dzin ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-9: yul sogs gzung ba med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-11: des ma bzung ba rjes dpog na //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-12: 'di ni shin tu gzu lums yin //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-13: rjes su dpag pa gzhan 'phen pas //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-15: rnal ma rtogs pa med 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-16: de dang de la ltos phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-17: de phyir rang las tshad ma nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-18: spyir btang bar ni rnam par gnas //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-19: gnod dang rgyu nyes ldan pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-20: shes pa dag gis de dmigs sel //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-21: tshad ma slu ba med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-22: gal te gnod byed med na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-23: de ni tshad ma nyid du rigs //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-24: gnod byed las ni de gzhan 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-26: gnod byed med pa tsam gyis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-27: tshad ma nyid du nges ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-28: thob pa'i dus su'ang gnod pa gang //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-29: de med ces ni sngon rol du //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-30: tshad ma gang las shes pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-31: thob yin don byed gnas pa thob //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-32: de yang rang dngos rig pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-33: shes las phyi nas shes pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-34: sngar ni de las 'byung ba yi //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-35: dngos la rjes dpag 'jug pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-36: des na thug med de nyid du //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-37: 'gyur bas tshad ma gang las rtogs //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-38: mngon sum rjes su dpag pa las //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-39: gzhan pa'i tshad ma yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-41: rang las rang gi ngo bo rtogs //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-42: tha snyad las ni tshad ma nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-43: rang las ni rang gi ngo bo nyid rtogs kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:21b-44: gzhan gyi ngo bo ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-45: mngon sum ni mngon du rtogs pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-46: mngon du rtogs pa yang rang gi ngo bo las yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:21b-47: gzhan gyi ngo bo thob pa'i dus kyi khyad par can ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-48: tshad ma nyid kyang thob par bya ba'i don la mi 'khrul pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-49: thob par bya ba'i don ma bzung bar ni de dang 'brel par 'dzin pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:21b-50: de ltar nges pa ma yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:21b-51: tshad ma ma yin pas na nges pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:22a-1: rang bzhin dang 'brel pa ni shes pa thams cad la khyab par med pas des ni 'byung ba'i rang bzhin dang 'brel pa 'dzin pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:22a-3: shes pa snga ma'i rang bzhin dang 'brel pa 'dzin pa yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:22a-4: des na rang gi ngo bo rig pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:22a-5: so sor 'brel pa 'dzin pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:22a-6: tshogs pa yang srid pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:22a-7: bsgrub pa dang don byed pa'i shes pa dag rim gyis 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:22a-8: de'i 'og tu 'byung ba'i dran pa ci ltar myong ba bzhin du 'jug pa ni 'brel pa med pa nyid kyis gnyis rtogs par byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:22a-9: ci ltar myong ba spangs ba'i phyir ni de bslad pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:22a-10: de las 'brel pa rtogs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:22a-11: des na de dang 'brel pa ma bzung ba'i phyir phyis kyang rjes su dpag pas mthong ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:22a-12: chos mthun pa las ji ltar rtogs /
T11TD4221.1E:22a-13: des na tshad ma rtogs pa'i thabs med pa'i phyir rang las rang gi ngo bo nyid rtogs kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:22a-14: tshad ma ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:22a-15: ci ste tshad ma ni rang gi ngo bo nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:22a-16: dngos po'i rkyen gyis brjod par bya ba ni de las tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:22a-18: thob bya'i rang bzhin dang 'brel ba'i //
T11TD4221.1E:22a-19: shes pa'i ngo bo tshad ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:22a-20: rang gi ngo bo tsam zhig ni //
T11TD4221.1E:22a-21: gzung bas de bzung min par brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:22a-22: shes pa'i rang bzhin nyid ni tshad ma ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:22a-23: de nyid ni thob par bya ba'i rang bzhin dang 'brel bas rnam par gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:22a-24: de yang bzung ba ma yin no zhes bstan zin pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:22a-25: des na 'jug pa dang ldog pa med pa can rang gi rang bzhin rig pa tsam nyid yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:22a-26: tha dad par brjod pa'i skabs ni yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:22a-27: de'i phyir rtogs pa dang ldan pa dag gis 'ga' zhig tu 'jug par bya ba ma yin la 'ga' las ldog par bya ba yang ma yin no//
T11TD4221.1E:22a-28: 'o na ci ltar tshad ma dang tshad ma ma yin pa'i dbye ba rnam par gzhag ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:22a-29: tha snyad las ni tshad ma nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:22a-30: 'di ni tha snyad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:22a-32: tha snyad kyang rnam par dpyad na 'jig pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:22b-0: de las gal te 'di tsam gyis yongs su tshim na de'i tshe bya ba cung zad kyang med pa'i phyir 'khor ba las @22b thar pa nyid da /
T11TD4221.1E:22b-1: de ni rten med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:22b-2: 'on te tha snyad du 'khor ba grub na /
T11TD4221.1E:22b-3: de lta yin na tshad ma dang cig shos kyi rnam par dbye ba yang yod pa'i phyir tshad ma nyid bsgrub pa'i phyir 'bad pa mi bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:22b-4: gzhan yang tha snyad pa'i tshad ma rtogs par byed pas don dam par ni rang gi rig pa'i mngon sum gcig nyid do zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:22b-5: 'di ltar gal te tshad ma nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:22b-6: mngon sum dang ni rjes dpag las //
T11TD4221.1E:22b-7: the tshom med par grub 'dod na //
T11TD4221.1E:22b-8: tha snyad tshig ni don med 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:22b-9: gal te mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa las gsal bar tshad ma nyid du grub na /
T11TD4221.1E:22b-10: tha snyad las ni zhes ci'i phyir brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:22b-11: de'i phyir tha snyad tsam du rab tu grub pa'i rjes su dpag pa la brten nas /
T11TD4221.1E:22b-12: grub pa'i 'brel pa la brten nas don byed pa sgrub pa de ni 'di yin no zhes mthong bas /
T11TD4221.1E:22b-13: reg pa la sogs pa'i sgrub pa rtogs pa las 'jug pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:22b-14: phyis ni goms pa las rjes su dpag pa med kyang snang ba tsam las 'jug pa'i phyir mngon sum yang 'jug par byed pa yin pas /
T11TD4221.1E:22b-15: tshad ma nyid du brjod do //
T11TD4221.1E:22b-16: des na tha snyad las ni tshad ma nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:22b-18: gal te mthong bas ni gzugs nyid dmigs pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:22b-19: reg pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:22b-20: de bzhin du da ltar ba nyid yin gyi 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i thob par bya ba ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:22b-21: de bzhin du rang gis blta bar bya ba nyid yin gyi gzhan gyis blta bar bya ba yin pa de ni ma yin pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:22b-22: de ci ltar gzhan mthong ba na gzhan thob pas tshad ma nyid yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:22b-23: 'di la rang las rang gi ngo bo zhes bshad zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:22b-25: tha snyad du ni gcig pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:22b-26: tshad ma nyid ni rnam par gnas //
T11TD4221.1E:22b-27: yul sogs tha dad med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:22b-28: rdzas gcig nyid du tha snyad 'dogs //
T11TD4221.1E:22b-29: 'di ni tha snyad las ni tshad ma nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:22b-30: ces bshad zin pa nyid do ;
T11TD4221.1E:22b-31: / des na tha snyad grub pa'i yan lag tsam gcig la brten nas mthong ba gang yin pa de nyid thob bo snyam du zhen pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:22b-32: tshad ma nyid kyi tha snyad yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:22b-33: gcig tu zhen pa de yang yul dang dus la sogs pa tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:23a-0: de tha mi dad pa yang der nus pa'i @23a * //
T11TD4221.1E:23a-1: skyed par bya ba'i tshogs pa las so //
T11TD4221.1E:23a-2: de bzhin du 'byung ba dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang gcig gi rgyud du rtogs pa nyid kyi don byed pa mtshungs pa yin la de las kyang gcig tu mngon par rlob pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:23a-3: gal te don byed pa thob par byed pa nyid kyis tshad ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:23a-4: ci tshad ma don byed pa'i shes par byed pa yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:23a-6: re zhig byed pa po nyid kyis ni tshad ma ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:23a-7: de'i tshe ni rgyu nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:23a-8: 'on te shes par byed pa nyid kyis tshad ma nyid du 'dod na de yang mi 'thad de /
T11TD4221.1E:23a-9: don bya ba la the tshom ni //
T11TD4221.1E:23a-10: yod phyir de ni shes byed min //
T11TD4221.1E:23a-11: don byar res 'ga' ba yin phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:23a-12: de yi shes byed ga las yin //
T11TD4221.1E:23a-13: sgrub par byed pa'i shes pa med kyang don byed pa dmigs te /
T11TD4221.1E:23a-14: des na de'i ji ltar don byed pa'i rgyu yin /
T11TD4221.1E:23a-15: de med kyang mi 'byung bas na de ni 'bras bu'i rgyu ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:23a-16: shes par byed pa yang ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:23a-17: don mthong ba la yang res 'ga' don byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:23a-18: shes pa de ni tshad ma ma yin pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:23a-19: don gyis mi stong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:23a-20: des na byed pa po nyid dang shes par byed pa nyid med pas ci ltar tshad ma don gyis thob par byed pa yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:23a-22: 'bras la the tshom yod ces te //
T11TD4221.1E:23a-23: de tsam gyis de tshad min yin //
T11TD4221.1E:23a-24: 'di nyid nges phyir de tsam gyis //
T11TD4221.1E:23a-25: de ni ji ltar tshad ma min //
T11TD4221.1E:23a-26: thabs las byung ba la the tshom za ba ni spong bar 'dod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:23a-27: thams cad du thabs nges pa tsam gyis 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:23a-28: des na thabs nges na zhing pa la sogs pa bzhin tshad ma can 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:23a-31: skyes bu 'jug dang ldog byed kun //
T11TD4221.1E:23a-32: thabs byung don du gnyer bas yin //
T11TD4221.1E:23a-33: gal te de la the tshom ni //
T11TD4221.1E:23a-34: za na ci ltar tshad ma nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:23a-35: gal te gang gi don du tshad ma 'dod pa'i thabs las byung ba de la the tshom za ba'i phyir tshad ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tshig gi tshul 'di ci yin /
T11TD4221.1E:23a-36: gal te tshad mas ni don shes par bya ba yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:23a-37: don byed par bya ba ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:23b-0: don byed pa ni tshogs pa'i khyad par 'ga' zhig las phyis 'byung ba'i phyir ci @23b ltar shes par nus pa yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:23b-2: gang gi don du 'di rtsom pa //
T11TD4221.1E:23b-3: gal te de ma grub ce na //
T11TD4221.1E:23b-4: bsgrub dang 'brel pa ma grub pas //
T11TD4221.1E:23b-5: ci ltar sgrub par byed par brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:23b-6: tshad ma 'di las mngon par 'dod pas don sgrub par 'gyur ro zhes rtogs pa dang ldan pas tshad ma tshol bar rtsom pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:23b-7: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:23b-8: de lta ma yin na ni zhe na pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:23b-9: gal te gsal bar byas pa'i don //
T11TD4221.1E:23b-10: don byed pa ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:23b-11: de rab rib can gyis dmigs pa'i skra shad la sogs pa don med pa las khyad par yod pa gal 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:23b-12: 'on te de la res 'ga' don byed par 'gyur la /
T11TD4221.1E:23b-13: skra shad la sogs pa ni ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:23b-14: de lta na 'o na ni ji ltar de don du gnyer ba 'jug par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:23b-15: the tshom las 'jug pa ni tshad ma las zhugs par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:23b-16: tshad ma ni nges par byed pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:23b-17: the tshom byed pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:23b-18: gal te don bya ba byed pa nges so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:23b-19: don bya ba ma nges na ji ltar der nges /
T11TD4221.1E:23b-20: 'on te tshad ma des don sgrub pa'i dngos po bstan pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:23b-21: don bya ba ni gal te ma tshang ba 'ga' zhig las ma yin mod /
T11TD4221.1E:23b-22: 'di ni tshad ma'i nyes pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:23b-24: gal te shes byed ma yin pa //
T11TD4221.1E:23b-25: tshad ma'i nyes pa mi brjod na //
T11TD4221.1E:23b-26: de la skyon gzhan med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:23b-27: thams cad tshad ma ma yin par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:23b-28: gang gis 'jal bar byed cing 'dod pa'i don yongs su gcod pa de tshad ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:23b-29: shes par byed pa ma yin pa la ni yongs su gcod pa'i nus pa med pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:23b-30: de'i phyir gzhan du bstan par bya ste /
T11TD4221.1E:23b-31: de bdag de las 'byung ba yi //
T11TD4221.1E:23b-32: mthu yis nges pa'i don bya ba'i //
T11TD4221.1E:23b-33: rang bzhin rtogs par byed pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:23b-34: shes pa tshad ma nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:23b-35: don byed pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de ni don byed pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir don byed pa rtogs par byed de ;
T11TD4221.1E:23b-36: de'i don byed pa la ni de nyid sgrub par byed pa'i shes pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:23b-37: sngar gyi sgrub par byed pa'i shes pa ni gal te don de brtan pa nyid du rtogs pa de'i tshe yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:23b-38: snga ma'i rang bzhin ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba thob pa'i dus su gdon mi za bar shes par byed pa'i phyir de thob pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:24a-1: su na phyi ma'i rang bzhin ni snga ma'i rang gi ngo bo nyid yin pa des na der yang de'i bdag nyid kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:24a-2: yang na gdon mi za bar 'byung ba'i 'bras bu de rgyu nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:24a-3: des rgyu la khyab pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:24a-4: tha dad pa'i khyab par byed pa gang yin pa de ni rgyu nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:24a-5: de med par de mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:24a-6: ma skyes pa ci ltar rgyu yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:24a-7: skyes pa yang ji ltar yin zhes nyes pa mtshungs so //
T11TD4221.1E:24a-11: 'di ni 'dis byed do zhes 'jig rten pa rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po rtogs pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:24a-12: 'byung ba ni yod pa ma yin /
T11TD4221.1E:24a-13: skyes pa yang ma yin byed pa yang ma yin /
T11TD4221.1E:24a-14: des byed pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:24a-15: de'i tshe med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:24a-17: yod dang skyes gnyis dngos po yi //
T11TD4221.1E:24a-18: rang gi ngo bo las gzhan min //
T11TD4221.1E:24a-20: don gzhan srid pa yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:24a-21: skyes pa dang yod pa ni rang gi ngo bo nyid las gzhan ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:24a-22: gal te rgyu yi de ma thag //
T11TD4221.1E:24a-23: yod pa skyes pa yin zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:24a-24: ci de ma thag tu byung ba'i yod pa nyid kho na skyes pa yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:24a-25: de lta yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:24a-26: yun ring du gnyid log pa las sad pa'i rnam par rtog pa gang yin pa de dag sngon goms pa las skyes par mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:24a-27: de ma thag tu byung ba nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:24a-28: lus la sogs pa la yang rgyu ma yin no zhes bstan par bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:24a-29: byed pa ni rang gi ngo bo las gzhan ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:24a-30: des na rang gi ngo bo las rang gi ngo bo nyid do zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:24a-31: 'bras bu'i dus su ni sngar gyi rgyu'i rang gi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:24a-32: med na mi 'byung ba tsam ni 'bras bu gdon mi za bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu'i 'byung bar 'gyur ba la yang yod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:24a-33: des na 'byung ba yang rgyu yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:24a-34: 'on te mthong ba gang yin pa de khyab par byed pa yin na rgyu yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:24a-35: de lta na yang sngar byung ba gang yin pa de nyid rgyu yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:24a-36: 'byung ba ni ma yin no zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:24a-37: mthong ba rang gi ngo bo yis //
T11TD4221.1E:24a-38: khyab byed nyid du rtogs ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:24a-39: sgro btags pa yi rang bzhin gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:24a-40: 'byung ba yang ni de yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:24b-0: mthong ba ni de tsam gyis @24b khyab par byed pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:24b-1: de'i tshe khyab par bya ba ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:24b-2: gang gi tshe khyab bya rtogs pa de'i tshe ni de byung ba dang 'byung ba'i rang bzhin gyis khyab par byed pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:24b-3: gzhan du 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ma bzung na khyab pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:24b-4: 'on te rang bzhin gang gis de sngon du byung ba nyid du mthong ba de'i rang bzhin de nyid kyis khyab byed nyid du rtogs par byed kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:24b-5: 'byung ba'i rang bzhin gyis ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:24b-7: 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ma rtogs na //
T11TD4221.1E:24b-8: khyab byed nyid du rtogs ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:24b-9: nyi tshe ba ni khyab min te //
T11TD4221.1E:24b-10: de lta na de khyab med 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:24b-11: byung ba dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dus khyab pa nyid du rtogs pa rgyu yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:24b-12: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:24b-13: khyab pa de ni sngar mthong ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:24b-14: mthong bar 'gyur ba la yang mtshungs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:24b-15: mthong bar 'gyur ba ci ltar rgyu yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:24b-16: de'i tshe med pa'i phyir mthong ba yang ci ltar yin zhes dri ba'i skabs med dam /
T11TD4221.1E:24b-17: yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:24b-18: mthong bar 'gyur ba la yang de nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:24b-19: de'i tshe ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni gnyi gar yang mtshungs so //
T11TD4221.1E:24b-20: snga ma nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:24b-21: snga ma dang phyi ma dag gi rang gi ngo bo la khyad par ci zhig yod do //
T11TD4221.1E:24b-22: de gnyi ga yang sgro btags pa'i rnam par 'dzin pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:24b-23: gzhan gyis ni ma yin pas khyad par med do //
T11TD4221.1E:24b-24: 'on te gcig ni sngon gyi rang bzhin du mthong bar sgro btags pa yin la gzhan ni mthong bar 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin dang phyi ma'i rang bzhin du yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:24b-25: des na gnyi ga la yang rgyu nyid yod pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:24b-26: phan tshun med na mi 'byung bar //
T11TD4221.1E:24b-27: de dag gnyi ga mtshungs ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:24b-28: nang gi rnam par dbye ba ni //
T11TD4221.1E:24b-29: nged la 'gar yang dgos pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:24b-30: gang med na gang mi 'byung ba de ni tha dad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:24b-33: rgyu snga ma med na 'bras bu phyi ma mi 'byung ba de bzhin du 'bras bu gdon mi za bar 'byung ba'i rgyu 'bras bu phyi ma med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rgyu mtshan mtshungs pas na gnyi ga yang phan tshun rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:24b-34: khyab pa dang ni tha dad nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:24b-35: rgyu mtshan mtshungs phyir gnyi ga yang //
T11TD4221.1E:25a-3: khyab pa nyid dang tha dad pa ma gtogs par rgyu mtshan gzhan ni 'gro ba 'dir ma dmigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:25a-4: des na gang rgyu dang 'bras bu gdon mi za bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu gnyi ga yang phan tshun rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yin no zhes rigs par mthong ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:25a-5: de phyir shes de don skyed pa //
T11TD4221.1E:25a-6: rgyu'am yang na rang bzhin nam //
T11TD4221.1E:25a-7: 'bras bu'ang rung ste thams cad du //
T11TD4221.1E:25a-8: de yis don byed 'byung bar shes //
T11TD4221.1E:25a-9: gal te sgrub pa'i shes pa de don byed pa'i rgyu'am /
T11TD4221.1E:25a-11: gal te 'bras bu yang rung ste /
T11TD4221.1E:25a-12: thams cad du 'brel pa srid pa'i phyir des shes pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:25a-13: khyab pa ni de'i bdag nyid dang /
T11TD4221.1E:25a-14: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po 'di yang tha snyad du grub pa yin pa'i phyir tha snyad las tshad ma nyid du shes pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:25a-15: gal te ci srid 'brel pa sgrub pa'i mngon sum med pa de srid rjes su dpag pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:25a-16: mngon sum gyis 'brel pa bzung na rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma'i sgrub par byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:25a-17: mngon sum 'brel pa 'dzin par nus pa tshad ma ma yin na yin pa'i phyir phan tshun brten pa'i skyon ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:25a-18: 'on te rjes su dpag pas ni tshad mar bsgrub pa ni ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:25a-19: 'on kyang don byed pa myong ba las yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:25a-20: de yang rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyis grub pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:25a-21: de la don byed pa'i shes pa ni mngon sum yin pas snga ma'i tshad ma nyid 'dzin pa ma yin la 'bras bu'i rtags su 'gyur ba ma yin pas rjes su dpag pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:25a-22: mngon sum gyis tshad ma 'dzin pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:25a-23: gsal ba de 'das pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:25a-24: gsal ba med par spyi tshad ma nyid du rtogs par ni mi nus te /
T11TD4221.1E:25a-26: des na tshad mar the tshom za ba tsam yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:25a-27: de yang don byed pa dang 'brel bar the tshom za ba yin pas de la don byed par snang bas the tshom bzlog pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:25a-30: the tshom tsam zhig bzlog pas ni //
T11TD4221.1E:25a-32: don du gnyer ba'i 'jug pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:25a-33: nges pa'am mngon sum las mthong ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-0: gal te don byar snang de @25b nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-1: mngon sum yin zhes 'dod na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-2: tshad ma mngon sum nyid las ni //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-3: rtogs pa zhes byar 'dod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-4: mngon sum mam ni rjes dpag las //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-5: the tshom za ba ldog pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-6: 'gal ba'i rang bzhin dmigs pa las //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-7: bzlog pa gzhan ni yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-8: gal te de ni mngon sum gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-9: dngos yin de tshe the tshom ni //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-10: ldog byed de med de tshe nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-11: ci ltar gzhan gyi tsho na min //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-12: 'dir ni the tshom de bzlog pas //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-13: dgos pa yod pa'ang ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-15: 'jug pa de yang grub pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-16: shes pa kun gyi don dang ni //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-17: 'brel pa'ang mngon sum blos rtogs min //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-18: rjes su dpag pa spyi yis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-19: 'brel pa nges par byed pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-20: tshad ma gzhan yang med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-21: the tshom chad par ga la 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-22: des na tha snyad las ni tshad ma nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-24: gal te tha snyad las tshad ma ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:25b-25: 'o na tshad ma'i mtshan nyid kyi bstan bcos la don ci yod /
T11TD4221.1E:25b-26: bstan bcos bstan kyang tshig tsam las ni de ltar mi 'gyur gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:25b-27: 'on kyang tha snyad kyi mi slu ba nyid las yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-28: de yod na ni bstan bcos don med do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:25b-30: bstan bcos rmongs pa zlog byed yin //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-31: gal te tha snyad las tshad ma'i rang bzhin rtogs pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:25b-32: ci'i phyir mtshan nyid kyi bstan bcos dag phan tshun 'gal bar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:25b-33: des na tha snyad pa dag ni tha snyad la yang log par rtogs pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-35: tha snyad las ni thams cad kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-36: tshad ma rtogs par 'gyur ma yin//
T11TD4221.1E:25b-37: des na tshad ma'i mtshan nyid ni //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-38: phan tshun du ni 'gal bar ldan //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-39: mngon sum la sogs tshad ma yis //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-40: 'jig rten pha rol rtogs ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-41: lung las yin zhes gzhan 'dzer ba //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-42: des na tha snyad las ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-44: tha snyad nges pa rtogs pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-45: bstan bcos rmongs pa zlog byed yin//
T11TD4221.1E:25b-46: snga ma phyi ma mi dran pa //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-47: bstan bcos 'di yis zlog par byed //
T11TD4221.1E:25b-48: de nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa'i bstan bcos kyi rmongs pa zlog par byed kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:25b-49: gzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes /
T11TD4221.1E:25b-50: rnam pa 'dis thams cad mkhyen pa'i bka' nyid tshad ma yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:26a-2: gzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:26a-3: gzhan ni tshad ma ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:26a-4: shes bya khyab pa med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:26a-5: ma khyab pas ni 'bras bu sogs //
T11TD4221.1E:26a-7: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i dus dang yul khyab par lhan cig spyod pa'i rang bzhin ni thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pa'i yul ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:26a-8: mngon sum da ltar nye ba tsam yin pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:26a-9: rjes su dpag pa yang der mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:26a-10: gal te bstan bcos de byed pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ci ltar shes she na /
T11TD4221.1E:26a-12: ma shes don gyi gsal byed kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:26a-13: yang na 'di tshad ma'i mtshan nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:26a-14: 'di gsal bar byed pas na gsal byed de /
T11TD4221.1E:26a-15: ma shes pa'i don gsal bar byed pa'i shes pa tshad ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:26a-16: kun rdzob pa'i shes pa ni ma shes pa'i don gsal bar byed pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:26a-17: des ni ma shes pa'i don 'ga' yang gsal ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:26a-18: so sor bzung ba'i gzugs la sogs pa nyid rnam par rtog pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:26a-19: rtogs pa nges par ma bzung ba'i phyir na de gcig ces tha snyad du byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:26a-20: gal te mi slu ba med par ma shes pa gsal bar byed pa tshad ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:26a-21: zla ba gnyis la sogs pa'i rnam pa yang tshad ma nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:26a-23: de ni don ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:26a-24: gal te don nyid du mi slu ba nyid las shes pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:26a-25: des na mi slu ba'i shes pa zhes bya ba de nyid mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ci ltar mtshan nyid gzhan yin zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:26a-26: don gyis 'phangs pa ni mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:26a-27: brjod pa'i shugs kyis rtogs pa gang //
T11TD4221.1E:26a-28: de ni mtshan nyid ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:26a-29: de lta na ni dngos po sogs //
T11TD4221.1E:26a-30: gzhan yang mtshan nyid don du 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:26a-31: mtshan nyid de ni dngos su bzung ba gang yin pa de yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:26a-32: gang gis mtshan nyid bsgrub pa de yang srid pa tsam gyis mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:26a-34: dngos po nyid la sogs pa yang yin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:26b-0: 'on te @26b dngos po nyid ni de la dngos sam gzhan du mkho ba ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:26b-1: mi slu ba nyid ni don nyid shes pa la mkho ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:26b-2: de ni bden mod kyi de lta na yang ma shes pa'i don smos pa ni gzung ba 'dzin pa'i shes pa spong bar nus kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:26b-3: mi slu ba smos pas ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:26b-4: de la yang mi slu ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:26b-5: mi slu ba don rtogs pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:26b-6: mi slu ba yin yang kun rdzob tu yod pa don du ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:26b-7: 'o na ci ltar don nyid rtogs she na /
T11TD4221.1E:26b-8: nges par brtags pa las so zhes rtogs par bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:26b-9: yang na 'dir don gyi sgras ni don dam pa brjod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:26b-10: ma shes don gyi gsal byed ces bya ba ni don dam bar gsal bar byed ces bya ba'i don to //
T11TD4221.1E:26b-11: don dam pa yang gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pas de gsal bar byed pa nyid tshad ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:26b-12: de ltar yang rang las rang gi ngo bo rtogs zhes bstan pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:26b-13: tha snyad las ni tshad ma nyid ces bya ba bshad de /
T11TD4221.1E:26b-14: de las 'di ni don dam pa'i tshad ma'i mtshan nyid yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:26b-15: snga ma ni tha snyad pa'i yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:26b-16: gal te ma shes pa'i don gsal bar byed pa tshad ma yin na spyi'i don yang dang po 'byung ba rang gi mtshan nyid kyi shes pas ma shes pa de'i 'og tu byung bas gsal ba yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:26b-17: de bzhin du 'brel pa la sogs pa yang yin pa'i phyir de yang tshad mar thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:26b-18: 'di gzung ba 'dzin pa'i phyir dran pa nyid du 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:26b-19: ma bzung ba la yang dran pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:26b-20: rang gi mtshan nyid rnam shes ni //
T11TD4221.1E:26b-22: ma bzung ba ni 'dzin pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:26b-23: spyi rig tshad ma yin par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:26b-25: rang gi ngo bo rtogs 'og tu //
T11TD4221.1E:26b-26: spyi yi rnam par shes pa thob //
T11TD4221.1E:26b-28: rang rig pas spyi'i shes pa'i bdag nyid rtogs so zhes bya ba 'di la ni rtsod pa med pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:26b-29: des na gal te spyi shes pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba'am /
T11TD4221.1E:26b-30: 'on te bdag nyid du 'gyur ba yin yang rung ste /
T11TD4221.1E:26b-31: thams cad du de'i shes pa tshad mar 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:26b-32: 'di la bshad pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:26b-33: rang gi mtshan nyid ma shes pa //
T11TD4221.1E:27a-2: rang gi mtshan nyid dpyad phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:27a-3: spyi'i shes pa ma bzung ba 'dzin pa yin yang tshad ma ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:27a-5: rang gi mtshan nyid ma shes pa shes pa gang yin pa de nyid tshad mar 'dod kyi spyi ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:27a-6: spyi ma shes pa shes pa ni tshad ma ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:27a-7: 'on kyang ma shes pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid shes pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:27a-9: rang gi mtshan nyid dpyad phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:27a-10: yod pa'am med pa nyid rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir rtogs pa dang ldan pa tshad ma la ltos pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:27a-11: yod pa 'am med par dpyod pa de yang rang gi mtshan nyid kho na la yin gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:27a-12: spyi la ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:27a-13: de la skyes bu rnams gus pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:27a-14: gang rnam par dpyad pa de la dus phyis de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir tshad ma 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:27a-15: spyi la ni tshad ma mi 'jug pa'i phyir de la tshad ma ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:27a-16: 'on te spyi ma rtogs na de nyid 'di yin no zhes ji ltar 'jug ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:27a-18: spyi ma rtogs kyang shin tu goms pa las 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:27a-19: 'on te der yang spyi nyid 'jug par byed pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:27a-21: ma shes pa la 'jug par byed pa nyid shes pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:27a-22: de shes kyang gal te rang gi mtshan nyid ma shes na mi 'jug la /
T11TD4221.1E:27a-23: rang gi mtshan nyid shes na ni spyi ma dpyad kyang goms pa las 'jug pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:27a-24: des na de la 'jug par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:27a-25: de la mngon du phyogs pa med pa'i phyir spyi shes pa ni tshad ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:27a-26: 'jug par byed pa yin du chug pa de lta na yang de la phyogs pa med pa'i phyir de tshad ma ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:27a-27: rang rig pas bzung na ni de rang gi mtshan nyid kho na yin pas rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul nyid la tshad ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:27a-28: gang gi tshe gnyis su med pa de'i tshe na spyi ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:27a-29: rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs pa'i 'og tu gzhan zhes bya bar bstan pa yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:27a-30: rang gi mtshan nyid shes pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:27a-31: shes gang rig med phyir bsams pas //
T11TD4221.1E:27a-33: rig med ni 'di la rig pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:27a-35: shes pa gang zhig / rang gi mtshan nyid shes pa la ste de'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:27b-0: gang gis 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid @27b shes pa'i 'og rol du yin no zhe'am /
T11TD4221.1E:27b-1: mi 'dra ba nyid du rtogs par 'gyur ba snga ma dang phyi ma'i ngo bo la ni tshad ma yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:27b-2: 'dir ni shes pa thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs par byed kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:27b-3: tha dad pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:27b-4: 'o na ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i dbye ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:27b-5: phyi rol dang rnam par shes pa'i dbye ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:27b-6: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:27b-7: rnam par byang ba'i dbye ba bstan zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:27b-10: gdul ba'i skye bo'i bsams pas te /
T11TD4221.1E:27b-12: rang rig pa'i mngon sum gcig nyid tshad ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:27b-14: spros pa ni gdul bya'i dbang gis te /
T11TD4221.1E:27b-15: ci lta ci ltar gdul bya rnams de kho na'i lam du 'jug par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bcom ldan 'das ston pa yin pa'i phyir mi 'gal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:27b-17: rang gi mtshan nyid dpyad phyir ro ;
T11TD4221.1E:27b-18: / rnam par dpyad na ni thams cad mi gnas pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:27b-19: gnyis su med pa las de kho na nyid gzhan ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:27b-20: de nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis rim gyis rnam par dpyad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:27b-21: cig car ni dpyad par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:27b-22: 'on te phyi rol du phyogs pa ci ltar rang rig pa nyid yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:27b-24: yul dang dus sogs la ltos nas //
T11TD4221.1E:27b-25: phyi dang nang zhes shes pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:27b-26: yul dus rang gi ngo bo las //
T11TD4221.1E:27b-27: tha dad pa ni 'thad ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:27b-29: 'o na ci ltar bcom ldan 'das tshad ma yin /
T11TD4221.1E:27b-30: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag ni tha snyad tsam du tshad ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:27b-31: bcom ldan 'das ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:27b-32: de ni tshad ma dam pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:27b-34: de ldan bcom ldan tshad ma nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:27b-35: de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das ni de dang ldan pas so //
T11TD4221.1E:27b-36: bcom ldan 'das ni mngon sum gyi rang bzhin gyis tshad ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:27b-40: yang dag min pa bzlog don du //
T11TD4221.1E:27b-41: 'khrul pa bzlog pa'i don du bcom ldan 'das des yang dag nyid gsungs /
T11TD4221.1E:28a-0: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir de nyid thams cad mkhyen pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma @28a * //
T11TD4221.1E:28a-2: de lta na yang tshad ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:28a-4: sgrub byed la ltos tshad yin rigs //
T11TD4221.1E:28a-7: rig byed ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:28a-8: rig byed ni 'ga' yang don dang 'brel pa med pas tshad ma ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:28a-9: 'di ni tshad ma'i yul la bden par gsung ba nyid kyis tshad ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:28a-10: gzhan la ni bshad par bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:28a-11: yang na don dam pa de ldan te /
T11TD4221.1E:28a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyang gnyis su med par rtogs pa nyid kyis tshad ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:28a-13: don thams cad yongs su shes pas ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:28a-14: don thams cad yongs su shes pa ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad yin pas kun rdzob pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:28a-16: gnyis med theg pa dam pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:28a-18: tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi rgyan las /
T11TD4221.1E:28a-19: tshad ma grub pa'i rnam 'grel gnyis pa'o /
T11TD4221.1E:28a-21: // / gal te mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad ma ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:28a-22: de'i tshe dbang phyug la sogs pa shes pa po rtag pa nyid dam /
T11TD4221.1E:28a-23: rig byed rtag pa tshad ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:28a-24: des na gzhan btsal bas ci bya zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:28a-25: tshad ma rtag pa nyid yod min //
T11TD4221.1E:28a-26: dngos yod rtog pa tshad phyir dang //
T11TD4221.1E:28a-27: shes bya mi rtag pa nyid kyis //
T11TD4221.1E:28a-28: des ni mi brten nyid phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:28a-29: rim bzhin skye ba can dag ni //
T11TD4221.1E:28a-30: rtags las skye ba mi 'thad phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:28a-31: ltos pa mi rung pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:28a-32: rtag pa gtan du gnas pa'i tshad ma ni yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:28a-33: tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:28a-34: gzhan yang dngos po yod pa'i rtogs pa tshad ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:28a-35: gang yang rung ba ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:28a-36: gang gis rtogs pa gtan du yod par 'gyur ba dngos po ni gtan du gnas pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:28a-37: des na shes bya mi rtag pa nyid kyis de yang mi brtan pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:28a-38: gal te shes bya mi rtag pas na shes pa mi rtag pa nyid do zhes bya ba 'di dag ga las she na /
T11TD4221.1E:28a-39: shes bya'i rang bzhin la bya ba byed pa'am /
T11TD4221.1E:28a-40: shes bya'i rang bzhin las skyes pa'am /
T11TD4221.1E:28a-41: de'i rang bzhin nyid tshad ma yin grang ste /
T11TD4221.1E:28a-42: phyogs gzhan ni mi srid do //
T11TD4221.1E:28a-43: de la gal te byed ba dang mi byed pa khyad par med na ci ltar byed pa dang cig shos rnam par 'byed /
T11TD4221.1E:28b-0: @28b 'on te de ni me long gi gnas lta bu yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:28b-1: don gang dang gang nye ba de dang de nyid snang ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:28b-2: 'o na ni rang gi tshogs pa las don nyid de ltar 'gyur ba yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:28b-3: shes pa po'i byed pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:28b-4: 'on te mig mi g-yo bar phye bas nye bar bstan pa'i don rim gyis mthong yang byed pa gzhan dang gzhan mi 'dra ba gzhan ni 'ga' yang rtogs pa ma yin pa de bzhin du 'di yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:28b-6: rjes su 'gro dang ldog pa las //
T11TD4221.1E:28b-7: der yang mig ni byed pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:28b-8: dbang phyug rtag par gnas pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:28b-9: rjes 'gro ldog pa yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:28b-10: de'i phyir de ltar 'gyur ba de ni don de nyid yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:28b-11: 'di la 'dzin pa'i byed pa ni 'ga' yang med pa'i phyir ci ltar tshad ma yin /
T11TD4221.1E:28b-12: 'on te de tshad ma'i don yin mod /
T11TD4221.1E:28b-13: de ni de dang 'brel pa'i phyir des shes par brjod do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:28b-16: ldog pa yis ni 'grub pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:28b-17: rtag pa ldog pa med pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:28b-18: 'brel pa srid pa ga la yin //
T11TD4221.1E:28b-19: rtag pa ldog pa med pa ni 'gar yang nye bar sbyor bar shes nus pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:28b-20: 'on te des mthong ba'i phyir nye bar sbyor pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:28b-21: ci ltar na des mthong zhes de nyid de ltar brgal zhing brtag pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:28b-22: de ltar de yod na 'byung phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:28b-23: des zhes bya bar brjod na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:28b-24: nam mkha' sogs la de yod phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:28b-25: ci ltar de nyid lta po yin //
T11TD4221.1E:28b-26: mkha' la don byed bstan med phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:28b-27: de nyid lta po nam mkha' min //
T11TD4221.1E:28b-28: bstan pa tshig yin de yi phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:28b-29: de nyid gang las 'dod pa yin ;
T11TD4221.1E:28b-30: / rnam pa kun du ldog med la //
T11TD4221.1E:28b-31: rgyu nyid du ni rtogs ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:28b-33: de ni ci ltar snang ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:28b-34: 'das pa shes pa yin pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:28b-36: 'das pa la sogs ci ltar yang //
T11TD4221.1E:28b-37: me long du ni 'pho ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:28b-38: de lta bu yi snang ba ni //
T11TD4221.1E:28b-39: me long yod na 'byung ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:28b-40: snang ba brtags pa'i 'bras bu ni //
T11TD4221.1E:28b-41: ma yin zhes ni sngar brjod do //
T11TD4221.1E:28b-42: nam mkha' la sogs pa dag kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:28b-44: gal te don de'i de ma thag /'byung ba'i nges pa yod min na //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-2: tshig don gang zhig yin par brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-3: don kun mthong ba las byung ba'i //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-4: sgra ni thams cad rjod byed yin //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-5: brjod 'dod nges pa zhes bya ni //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-6: rtag pa 'thad pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-7: brjod 'dod de dag tha dad cing //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-8: de bzhin mthong ba tha dad na //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-9: gang gis lta po gcig yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-10: khyod kyis tshad de ci ltar yin //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-11: gal te brjod 'dod blta bya yi //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-12: 'dzin byed de nyid yin zha na //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-13: brjod par 'dod dang gzhan pa'i de //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-14: ci ltar gcig gis 'dzin pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-15: de lta yin na mngon sum dang //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-16: rjes dpag gcig tu cis mi brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-17: gal te de yang yang dag tu //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-18: gcig pa nyid du 'dod na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-19: de dag la yang rim gyis sam //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-20: cig car tha dad yod min nam //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-21: rang bzhin gcig nyid rim gyis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-22: tshad ma yis ni rtogs ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-23: rtogs po de'am gzhan du ni //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-24: shes byed gcig gi gzhal bya ba //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-25: de gcig ces bya bden nam ci //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-26: bden pa min na tshig don med //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-27: ci ste bdag nyid rang nyid ni //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-28: rnam kun byed pos shes byed na //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-29: de ni da ltar yin no zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-30: cis rtogs de ni tshig tsam yin //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-31: rang rig nyid las gzhan pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-32: med ces sngar ni brjod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-33: des na de ni don dam par dbang phyug ma yin la kun rdzob tu yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-34: ci ste yang gal te shes bya mi rtag pa nyid kyis shes pa mi rtag pa yin yang shes par byed pa po gang yin pa de ni rtag pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-35: gzhan mi rtag pas gzhan yang mi rtag go zhes ni mi 'thad do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:29a-36: bshad pa shes bya mi rtag pas na shes pa /
T11TD4221.1E:29a-37: rim bzhin skye ba can dag ni //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-38: rtag las skye ba mi 'thad phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-39: de rtag pa las skye ba mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-40: nam mkha' ltar rtag pa khyab ba ni /
T11TD4221.1E:29a-41: 'ga' yang rgyu ma yin no zhes bshad zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-42: gal te rang bzhin de nyid kyis skyed par byed na ni khyad par med pa'i phyir thams cad kyi tshe skyed par 'gyur ba'am /
T11TD4221.1E:29a-43: khyad par yod na yang mi rtag par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:29a-44: 'on te khyad par med kyang lhan cig byed pa yod pa dang med pa dag las 'bras bu'i rim pa can yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:29a-45: ma yin te ltos pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:29b-0: gal te lhan cig byed pa @29b dag nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:29b-1: de dag nyid rgyu yin gyi de ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:29b-2: de la ltos nas de yang rgyu yin no zhes mi rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:29b-3: ltos pa de dang cig shos kyi gnas skabs dag tu khyad par med par rang ngam gzhan gyi ltos pa nyid du mi rtogs pa'i phyir 'di ni tshig tsam gtso bor gyur pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:29b-4: de nyid kyi phyir ltos pa mi rung ba'i phyir zhes bshad do //
T11TD4221.1E:29b-5: rtag pa thams cad kyi tshe rang bzhin gcig pa ni ltos par bya ba phan gdags par nus pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:29b-6: de la phan 'dogs pa med par ni des ltos par bya ba ma yin no ;
T11TD4221.1E:29b-7: / de lta na ni 'o na mi rtag pa tshad ma yin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:29b-8: sbyin pa la sogs pa sgrub par byed pa la ltos pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:29b-9: chags pa dang bral ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:29b-10: dbang phyug dang ldan pa ni rigs mthun pa'i rgyu snga ma las skyes pa'i phyir de nam yang gzhan du 'gyur ba las gzhan du skye bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:29b-12: rnam 'gas phan gdags bya min phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:29b-13: mi rtag na yang tshad med nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:29b-14: dbang phyug mi rtag pa la yang tshad ma yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:29b-15: de tshad ma ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:29b-17: rnam 'gas phan gdags bya min phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:29b-18: gang zhig rnam pa ci zhig ltar 'ga' zhig phan gdags pa 'am gnod par byed pa de ni /
T11TD4221.1E:29b-19: 'dod chags la sogs pa myong ba dang //
T11TD4221.1E:29b-20: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i gnyan po rtogs pa la sogs pa srid pas de ston pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:29b-21: sems can la byams pa dang snying brtse bas ston pa srid pa'i phyir de ni 'jig rten gyis tshad mar 'gyur gyi rang gi ngo bo yod pa tsam gyis ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:29b-22: de las ni 'di 'dra ba'i bya ba yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:29b-23: sdug goms med par mkhas par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:29b-24: 'on te de ni thams cad yongs su shes pa nyid ni rang bzhin nyid kyis grub pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:29b-26: 'dod chags la sogs pa nyams su ma myang na 'khor ba'i rtsa ba'i spros pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs par ci ltar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:29b-28: 'di 'khor ba pa nyid yin pas de ci ltar tshad ma yin /
T11TD4221.1E:30a-1: rtogs pa nyid kyis 'dod chags la sogs pa'i spros pa'i gnyen po ston pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:30a-2: 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid thams cad shes pa dang ma nyams pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:30a-3: gzhal du med pa'i nus pa dang ldan pas de nyid tshad ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:30a-5: gal te 'dod chags la sogs dang //
T11TD4221.1E:30a-6: ldan yang dbang phyug nyams med na //
T11TD4221.1E:30a-7: 'dod chags la sogs gnyen po ni //
T11TD4221.1E:30a-8: bstan pa don med kho nar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:30a-9: 'on te 'di ni dngos po'i gnas lugs yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:30a-10: 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ldan pa la /
T11TD4221.1E:30a-11: dbang phyug srid pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:30a-12: des na de'i gnyen po ston to zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:30a-13: gal te de ltar chags bral sogs //
T11TD4221.1E:30a-14: bsgoms pa med phyir mi srid na //
T11TD4221.1E:30a-15: de yi dbang phyug la sogs pa //
T11TD4221.1E:30a-16: grub de glo bur gang las 'ong //
T11TD4221.1E:30a-17: 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa gnyen po la sogs pa goms pa las 'byung ngo zhes shes pa gang yin pa de nyid las gzhan du yang 'byung ngo zhes pa ni mi rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:30a-19: gang gis dbang phyug sgrub pa dang //
T11TD4221.1E:30a-20: bral ba'i don du gnyer ba la //
T11TD4221.1E:30a-21: mchog sbyin pa yi nus pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:30a-22: de 'dra de la yod pa min //
T11TD4221.1E:30a-23: 'on te de la nus pa de //
T11TD4221.1E:30a-24: med na gzhan yang ci ltar yod //
T11TD4221.1E:30a-25: rjes su 'dzin pa'i nus pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:30a-26: de la tshad ma med par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:30a-28: mi rtag na yang tshad min nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:30a-29: 'di la tshad ma yod pa ma yin pas tshad med do //
T11TD4221.1E:30a-30: de'i ngo bo ni tshad med nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:30a-31: de la tshad ma yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T11TD4221.1E:30a-32: 'on te mnyes par byas pa la sogs pa rim gyis chags pa la sogs pa nye bar zhi ba'i rnam pas chos ston pas 'di rjes su 'dzin par byed pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:30a-34: rjes su 'dzin par mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:30a-37: des bshad rjes su sgrub pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:30a-39: des bshad lung tsam las she na //
T11TD4221.1E:30a-40: de lta phan tshun rten par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:30a-41: des bshad phyir de lung yin la //
T11TD4221.1E:30a-42: lung yin phyir yang de bshad nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:30a-43: phan tshun brten pa yin phyir der //
T11TD4221.1E:30a-44: gcig kyang gnas par ci ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:30b-1: rgyu gang las ni 'ongs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:30b-2: 'di ni de yi rang bzhin zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:30b-3: de ni gang las rtogs par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:30b-4: de thams cad mthong ba dang rjes su 'dzin par byed pa'i rang bzhin gyi nus pa de 'dra ba de rgyu gang las byung /
T11TD4221.1E:30b-5: gal te 'dir de lta bur byung ba'i dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid lan 'debs so //
T11TD4221.1E:30b-8: de ni su la 'dri bar bya //
T11TD4221.1E:30b-9: sreg byed me yis nam mkha' min //
T11TD4221.1E:30b-10: 'di la ci zhig brgal zhing brtag /'di ni shin tu mi rigs te //
T11TD4221.1E:30b-11: gal te rang bzhin mngon sum du //
T11TD4221.1E:30b-12: grub la rgol zhing rtog byed na ;
T11TD4221.1E:30b-14: mthong ba nyid ni mi 'thad min //
T11TD4221.1E:30b-15: 'di ni mthong ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:30b-17: 'dir dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid lan 'debs so zhes bya ba'i don 'di ci yin //
T11TD4221.1E:30b-18: 'di ni mngon sum la sogs pa'i tshad mas grub pa yin pas /
T11TD4221.1E:30b-19: 'di ci ltar zhes brgal zhing brtag pa'i yul ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:30b-20: ci ltar mngon sum du me bsreg bya sreg par dmigs pa la ci lta bar byed pa yin zhes brgal zhing brtag par byed pa bzhin no zhes bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:30b-21: gal te 'byung ba nyid kyis yin na nam mkha' yang sreg par byed par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:30b-22: 'on te rang bzhin gyis so sor nges pas de lta yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:30b-23: de'i tshe dbang phyug kyang yon tan gyi rgyu thams cad dang bral ba yang yon tan dang ldan pas mtshungs so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:30b-24: mi mtshungs te me ni mthong ba'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:30b-25: gzhan ni bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:30b-26: des na 'di lan ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:30b-28: bdag nyid mngon 'dod 'ga' zhig bsgrub byas pa //
T11TD4221.1E:30b-29: de la gzhan gyis lan med byas pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:30b-30: dngos po'i rang bzhin zhes de'i lan brjod pas //
T11TD4221.1E:30b-31: de ltas thams cad rgyal bar 'gyur ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:30b-32: de'i phyir mi rtag na yang ste //
T11TD4221.1E:30b-33: yang gi sgras rtag pa yang tshad mar med pa nyid do zhes legs pa brjod do //
T11TD4221.1E:30b-34: gal te tshad ma yod yin //
T11TD4221.1E:30b-35: sdod 'jug dbyibs kyi khyad par dang //
T11TD4221.1E:30b-36: don byed pa la sogs pa dang /'bras bu'i bdag nyid 'bras bu las //
T11TD4221.1E:30b-37: ji ltar rgyu ni grub mi 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:30b-38: de lta min na rgyu gzhan la'ang //
T11TD4221.1E:30b-39: rjes su dpag pa'ang med par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:31a-1: po 'ga' zhig mngon par 'dod pa sgrub pa'i phyir bsdad cing bsdad cing 'jug pa de ni blo dang ldan pa'i rgyus byin gyis brlabs pa las yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:31a-3: dbyibs su bya ba la sogs pa ste ste'u la sogs pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:31a-4: ste'u la sogs pa ni rang nyid 'jug pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:31a-5: 'jug pa yin na yang gtan du 'jug par 'gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:31a-6: bsdad nas 'jug pa yang yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:31a-7: des na rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa po 'ga' zhig yod dgos so //
T11TD4221.1E:31a-8: de bzhin du gang zhig zlum po la sogs pa la dbyibs kyi khyad par dang ldan pa de ni sems pa dang ldan pa skyed pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:31a-9: dper na bum pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:31a-10: de bzhin du gang zhig don bya ba byed pa de ni sems pa dang ldan pa'i dngos pos bskul ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:31a-11: dper na bum pa la sogs pa bzhin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:31a-13: sdod 'jug dbyibs kyi khyad par dang //
T11TD4221.1E:31a-14: don byed pa la sogs pa dag /'dod sgrub pa'am dpe ma grub //
T11TD4221.1E:31a-15: yang na the tshom za ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:31a-16: 'bras bu nyid du mngon par 'dod pa bsdad nas 'jug pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag ni yang dag pa'i gtan tshigs ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:31a-17: gang gi phyir de dag yod kyang 'dod pa nyid sgrub pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:31a-18: grub pa sgrub pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:31a-19: grub pa ni phyogs ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:31a-20: ma grub pa phyogs yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:31a-21: gang la rtsod pa yod pa de sgrub pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa nye bar dgod par rigs pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:31a-22: thams cad las kyi mtshan nyid kyi sems pas byin gyis rlob par 'dod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:31a-24: las las 'jig rten sna tshogs skyes //
T11TD4221.1E:31a-25: de ni sems pa dang des byas //
T11TD4221.1E:31a-27: gal te las las skyes pa nyid do zhes ni sgrub pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:31a-28: las las gzhan pa'i sems pa dbang phyug gis byin gyis brlab par sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:31a-30: de ni dbang phyug gis bskul bas mngon par gsal ba'i las las yin no zhes bshad do //
T11TD4221.1E:31a-31: dbang phyug gi sems pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i las sngon du 'gro ba can nyid bsgrub pa na grub pa la sgrub pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:31a-33: gal te sems pa'i rang bzhin gyis rang las yod na /
T11TD4221.1E:31b-0: de'i tshe @31b sems pa gzhan sgrub pa ni don med do //
T11TD4221.1E:31b-1: sems pa med pa de ni 'jug par nus pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:31b-2: 'di ni de'o zhes nges par brtags nas 'jug pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:31b-3: des na rang nyid nges par brtags nas 'jug par bya ba'am /
T11TD4221.1E:31b-4: nges par rtogs pas bskul nas yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:31b-5: rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:31b-6: de la sems pa med pa rnams la rang nyid nges par rtogs pa med pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:31b-7: gal te nges par rtogs pa gzhan yang med na ni mi 'jug pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:31b-8: des na sems pa dang ldan pa'i skul ba po 'ga' zhig yod dgos so zhes bya ba bsam pa yin no zhes zer te /
T11TD4221.1E:31b-10: las kyi rang bzhin sems pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:31b-11: gal te 'jug pa'i rgyu yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:31b-12: nges rtogs la yang de yi ni //
T11TD4221.1E:31b-13: nges rtogs gzhan ni 'dod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:31b-14: de lta na yang dpe ma grub //
T11TD4221.1E:31b-15: bum sogs sems pa dang ldan pas //
T11TD4221.1E:31b-16: byas kyang dbang phyug gis byas min ;
T11TD4221.1E:31b-17: / dgos pa med phyir gzhan du na //
T11TD4221.1E:31b-18: de yang rang gi don byas la //
T11TD4221.1E:31b-19: 'jug pa dbang phyug dang ldan pa //
T11TD4221.1E:31b-20: yin phyir thug pa med par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:31b-21: 'on te rdza mkhan sogs de yang //
T11TD4221.1E:31b-22: mi shes phyir na bcug nas 'jug / de shes pa yi dbang phyug de //
T11TD4221.1E:31b-23: gzhan gyis 'jug par bya ba min ;
T11TD4221.1E:31b-25: skye ba po ni shes pa yod min pas //
T11TD4221.1E:31b-26: bdag gi sdug bsngal bdag la rang dbang med //
T11TD4221.1E:31b-27: dbang phyug gis kyang yang na mtho ris sam //
T11TD4221.1E:31b-28: g-yang sa dag tu 'gro ba kho nar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:31b-29: mi shes sems dang ldan pa yang //
T11TD4221.1E:31b-30: nges par rtogs ni mi nus so //
T11TD4221.1E:31b-31: nges par rtogs mi nus pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:31b-32: bum pa la sogs pa ltar gzhan gyis bskul ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:31b-33: dbang phyug ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:31b-34: de ni nges par rtogs nus pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:31b-35: des na thug pa med pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:31b-37: byed po grub na kun shes nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:31b-39: byed po'ang de las yin pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:31b-40: de ni phan tshun rten chen 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:31b-41: gal te dbang phyug dam pa 'di thams cad kyi byed pa po yin no zhes grub na /
T11TD4221.1E:31b-42: de'i tshe 'di thams cad shes pa nyid du 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:31b-43: thams cad shes pa nyid yin yang skul bar byed pa yin par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:32a-1: ltar ma yin na de'i skul bar byed pa gzhan yin pa'i phyir thug pa med pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:32a-2: gzhan yang gal te de thams cad shes pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:32a-3: ci ste skyes bu mi shes pa dam pa ma yin pa'i tha snyad la 'jug par byed /
T11TD4221.1E:32a-4: dpyod pa dang ldan pa ni dam pa'i nye bar bstan pa byed par mthong na /
T11TD4221.1E:32a-5: de'i log par 'jug pa'i skye bo yang skyed par byed pas de ci ltar tshad ma yin /
T11TD4221.1E:32a-6: 'on te de ni dam pa nyid kyi nye bar bstan pa nyid byed pa des na tshad ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:32a-7: chos ma yin pa'i byed pa ni dam pa ma yin pa'i 'bras bu myong bar byed pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:32a-8: des na tshad ma'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed pa ni dpyod pa dang ldan pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:32a-11: 'di ni chos ma yin pa la'ang //
T11TD4221.1E:32a-12: skye bo 'jug par byed nyid na //
T11TD4221.1E:32a-13: mi rigs pa ni byas nas de //
T11TD4221.1E:32a-14: ci ltar rigs pa la 'jug byed //
T11TD4221.1E:32a-15: re zhig dang po ni rigs pa nyid la 'jug par byed la /
T11TD4221.1E:32a-16: de nas ni de zlog pa'i phyir chos la yin pa'i phyir dbang phyug 'di ci ltar rtog pa sngon du byed pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:32a-17: de phyir bkus la dor ro zhes bya ba de byung ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:32a-18: 'on te 'di sdig la 'jug par byed pa ni de'i las kyis byin gyis brlabs pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:32a-19: de lta yin na rtogs par byed pa nyams so //
T11TD4221.1E:32a-20: las de yang ci'i phyir byed du 'jug ces thal ba mtshungs pas so //
T11TD4221.1E:32a-21: 'on te 'di chos ma yin pa byed du 'jug pa ni ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:32a-22: chos ma yin pa byed pa de'i 'bras bu myong du 'jug pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:32a-23: de las gzhan pa'i dbang phyug bzhin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:32a-24: de yang snying po med de /
T11TD4221.1E:32a-25: dbang phyug gzhan ni nus med pas //
T11TD4221.1E:32a-26: sdig pa 'gog par byed pa min //
T11TD4221.1E:32a-27: de ni nus med pa dag las //
T11TD4221.1E:32a-28: shin tu ldog par 'dod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:32a-29: 'on te 'di nus pa med pa nyid yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:32a-31: sdig bzhin thams cad dbang phyug gis //
T11TD4221.1E:32a-32: byas pa min zhes gzengs bstod la //
T11TD4221.1E:32a-33: brjod bya rang legs byed pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:32a-34: chos sogs kyang de las sam ci //
T11TD4221.1E:32a-36: 'jig rten dbang phyug med par yang //
T11TD4221.1E:32a-37: chos min 'bras bu spyod dam ci //
T11TD4221.1E:32a-38: med par yang ni ci ltar de //
T11TD4221.1E:32a-39: byed po nyid du rtogs par byed //
T11TD4221.1E:32a-41: chos min 'bras bu mi spyod na //
T11TD4221.1E:32a-42: rtogs pa dang ldan ci lta na //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-0: don dang @32b mi ldan 'di la zhugs //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-1: rtsed mo don du de zhugs na //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-2: rtogs pa sngon byed ga la yin //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-3: gcig cig skad cig tsam 'brangs pas //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-4: gzhan pa dag ni srog dang bral //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-6: gal te bstan bcos gzhan pa kun //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-7: dbang phyug rtogs pa las yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-8: bden dang mi bden nyer ston pa //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-9: byed phyir ci ltar tshad ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-10: bstan bcos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid phan tshun 'gal bas gnod pa bden pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:32b-11: bden pa ma yin pa nye bar ston par byed pa'i phyir 'di tshad ma ma yin pas na shin tu ya mtshan che ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:32b-12: tshad ma can ma yin pa yang yin no ;
T11TD4221.1E:32b-13: /'on te bstan bcos mtha' dag byed pa ma yin na /
