T11TD4221.1E:32b-14: de'i tshe bstan bcos gzhan bzhin du thams cad dbang phyug gis byas pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-15: 'on te 'di chos dang chos ma yin pas bskul ba nyid thams cad byed pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:32b-16: de lta ma yin na don mi srid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:32b-17: de lta na skye bo tha mal pa thams cad bdag nyid chos la sogs pas bskul nas byed pa'i phyir dbang phyug rtogs pa don med do //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-18: gal te bdag kun thams cad kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-19: byed po min zhes bya ba ni //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-20: brtags na de ni thams cad kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-21: byed po gang du dgos par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-22: thams cad kyi ni bdag rnams kyi ;
T11TD4221.1E:32b-23: / thams cad byed na ci zhig nyams //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-24: de bzhin mang pos gcig dang ni //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-25: mang po rnams kyang gcig gis byed //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-26: 'on te gzhan du kun shes nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-27: mi 'gyur phyir na thams cad kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-28: byed pa po ni gcig 'dod de //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-29: gzhan ni byed po nyid ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-30: byed pa 'di ni gtso bo ste //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-31: de las don gnyer mchog thob 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-32: kun shes tsam gyis nus med pa //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-33: gzhan gyis bstan par bya ba min //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-35: don ni don med byed nus pa //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-36: bu ram mngar ba byed pa po //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-37: kun mkhyen yin yang dgos med phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-38: bsten par bya ba min par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-39: kun shes nyid du grub par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-40: nus na thams cad byed por nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-41: thams cad byed po yin na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-42: de yi thams cad shes nyid 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-43: thams cad shes min byed pa po //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-44: mthong ba kun rig ci ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:32b-46: de lta zhe na myug ma nyams //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-1: gi bya la rdza mkhan sogs //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-2: shes nyid dbang phyug don med yin //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-3: las nus grub par 'gyur ba na //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-4: mkho med ci ltar byed po yin //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-5: gal te shes kyang rdza mkhan sogs //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-6: bskul bya yin par 'dod na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-7: khyad par med phyir dbang phyug kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-8: de las gzhan gyis bskul bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-9: 'on te bdag nyid kun shes par //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-10: grub pa mngon par brjod pa 'di //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-11: kun gyi skul byed 'gyur zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-12: de ni de ltar gang gis shes //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-14: bdag nyid brtags nas byed pa gang //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-15: der ni dbang phyug byed po min //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-16: kun gyi blo nyid dbang phyug las ;
T11TD4221.1E:33a-17: / zhes bya tshad ma dang ldan min //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-18: rgyu ni gdams ngag la sogs pas //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-19: de las gzhan pa'i gdams ngag las //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-20: ston byed yin phyir thog med pas //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-21: 'dod pa thams cad rdzogs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-22: des na 'jug pa thams cad ni //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-23: dbang phyug gis bskul ba ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-24: de phyir gtso bo skyes bu la //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-25: sogs pa'i byed po nges mi 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-26: dbyibs kyi khyad par dang ldan phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-27: zhes bya ba 'di gtan tshigs ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:33a-28: dbyibs thams cad skyes bu sngon du 'gro ba can du ma mthong ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-29: sa bon la sogs pa rgyu'i khyad par tsam las kyang de mthong ba'i phyir shing la sogs pa'i dbyibs bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-31: shing sogs dbyibs ni sems pa yang //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-32: rgyu dang rjes su 'brel pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-33: de bzhin gtso bo zhes bya bas //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-34: bcug pa'i bum sogs de ldan 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-35: de ltar shing las shing gi ni //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-36: rgyu yi sa bon skyes 'gyur ba //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-37: de bzhin bum pa'ang bum pa yis ;
T11TD4221.1E:33a-38: / bcug pa'i 'jim gong las yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-39: rdza mkhan dag las sogs pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-40: rtag tu de yi dbang por 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-41: mdog dang lus dang zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:33a-43: 'jim gong yang de 'dra ba nyid yin pa'i ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-44: shing gi sa bon rigs mi mthun pa'i dbyibs su skyed par ni legs par bslabs pa'i sems can gyis kyang nus pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-45: gal te 'jim gong rdza mkhan gyis dbyibs su byed par dmigs pa ma yin nam zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:33a-47: 'jim gong yang de 'dra ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:33a-48: 'jim gong ni mdog dang dbyibs de 'dra ba'i rang bzhin nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:33b-0: dper na khva @33b ta'i sa bon shing khva ta'i mdog dang /
T11TD4221.1E:33b-1: dbyibs dang ldan pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:33b-2: de yang ci ltar zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:33b-4: gal te mdog dbyibs rang bzhin nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:33b-5: nus par sa bon la med na //
T11TD4221.1E:33b-6: rgyu yi sa bon med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:33b-8: de byed dbang phyug yin zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:33b-9: sa bon las ci gzhan las min //
T11TD4221.1E:33b-10: de ltar sngar ni bsal zin te //
T11TD4221.1E:33b-11: de rgyu dbang phyug ci ltar yin //
T11TD4221.1E:33b-12: sa bon gyi rgyu'i shing ni sa bon gyi 'bras bu'i dus na med pa des na de ni dbyibs kyi rgyu ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:33b-13: dbang phyug kyang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:33b-14: rigs mi mthun pa'i shing gi rgyu'i sa bon las mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:33b-15: dbang phyug de'i rgyu yin na ni shing gi dbyibs de rigs mi mthun pa'i sa bon las kyang ci ltar mi 'byung /
T11TD4221.1E:33b-16: des na nus pa'i rang bzhin du shing gi sa bon la yod pa'i shing gi dbyibs nyid mngon par gsal ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:33b-17: dper na mun khung na gnas pa'i khye'u dang bu mo'i sgron ma las yin pa de bzhin du rdza mkhan gyis kyang 'jim gong las dbyibs gsal ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:33b-18: rdza mkhan yang bum pa la sogs pa'i sgrub pa na /
T11TD4221.1E:33b-19: dbyibs ni nus pa'i rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dbyibs nyid las yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:33b-20: des na rda mkhan la sogs pa'i skyes bu longs spyod pa po ni dbang po nyid yin gyi ;
T11TD4221.1E:33b-21: de la byed pa po ni 'ga' yang med do //
T11TD4221.1E:33b-22: de longs spyod par 'dod pas de lta de ltar nus pa'i rang bzhin gtso bo 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:33b-24: skyes bu'i nye bar spyod pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:33b-25: grub phyir gtso bo rab 'jug ste //
T11TD4221.1E:33b-26: ltad mo pa don grub pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:33b-27: gar gyi lta mo byed pa bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:33b-28: des na blo dang ldan pa'i rgyu can las bzlog pa grub bo //
T11TD4221.1E:33b-29: 'on te skyes bu'i so so'i bdag nyid tha dad pa'i phyir gzhan 'dod chags la sogs pa dang bral ba'i bdag nyid thams cad kyi dbang phyug gcig yod dgos te /
T11TD4221.1E:33b-31: gang la nye bar spyod 'dod pa na /
T11TD4221.1E:33b-32: gtso bo ro 'jug par 'gyur ba 'khor ba pa'i skyes bu rnams la dbyibs dang mdog la sogs pa so sor nges pa sus bstan zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:34a-0: ci ltar ltad mo pa rnams thog ma med pa can gyi nye bar bstan pa mthong ba las lta 'dod pa tshim pa'i phyir gar byed pa gar la rab tu sbyor ba de bzhin du 'khor @34a * //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-1: ba pa'i skyes bu rnams kyang yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-2: mi shes phyir na 'o ma ni //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-3: ji ltar be'u skyed phyir 'jug / de bzhin gtso bo 'jug 'di yang //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-4: ci yi phyir na 'dod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-5: de'i phyir mtha' bde ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin mthong bas /
T11TD4221.1E:34a-6: bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin thams cad kyi rgyur 'gyur ba yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:34a-7: de tsam gyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir dbang phyug mi 'grub bo //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-8: 'di ni rigs pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:34a-9: don rnams rtogs pa sngon 'gro can //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-10: ma yin par ni dmigs pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-11: de rgyu sems pa can min zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-12: rigs pa shes pa'i tshul yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-13: don rnams rgyu ni rtogs pa dang //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-14: mi ldan pa ni mi rigs med //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-15: ra sogs ril ma la sogs kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-16: zlum po sogs la min nam ci //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-17: de lta gtso bo nyid rgyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-18: zhes bya ba ni grangs can gyi'o //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-20: dngos po nyid phyir bde sogs dang //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-21: sems pa yin phyir skyes bu rnams //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-22: gal te rjes 'gro de yi phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-23: de nyid rgyur ni cis mi 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-24: yang dag par na gtso bo la //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-25: dbyibs dang mdog sogs yod min na //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-26: ji ltar gtso bo'i kha dog las //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-28: ci ste nus pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-29: thams cad der ni 'dus pa ste //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-30: nus kun rang bzhin can gyis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-31: dngos po gtso bo yin brjod na //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-32: gzhan bzhin mthong med de la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-33: de 'dra'i rgyu nyid rjes su dpog /'bras bu 'bras bu gzhan las te //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-35: rgyu med pa'i rgyur ni ma dmigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-36: des na dmigs pa'i rang bzhin gyis rjes su 'brang ba nyid kyis rgyu nyid rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-37: 'on te tha dad pa rnams rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:34a-38: rjes su 'gro ba can gyis rang bzhin gyi rgyu 'ga' zhig dang ldan par 'gyur gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:34a-39: rgyu ni 'ga' dang yang rjes su 'gro ba ma yin pa'i phyir ji ltar de la rgyu gzhan yod par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:34a-41: kham phor la sogs pa tha dad pa la ni sa'i rang bzhin rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir 'jim gong rnams la yang rgyu gzhan yod par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:34a-42: 'o na rgyu gzhan gzhan sngon du 'gro ba can ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:34a-43: 'jim gong ni gcig yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:34b-0: 'jim gong dang @34b dbyi gu la sogs pa rnams kyang /
T11TD4221.1E:34b-1: ci srid gcig nyid kyi mthar thug par gzhan gcig sngon du 'gro ba can yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:34b-3: snying stobs la sogs pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:34b-4: skyes bu rnams la yang rgyu gzhan yod par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:34b-5: 'o na rgyu gzhan gcig nyid 'ga' zhig yod mod ce na ;
T11TD4221.1E:34b-7: yon tan gsum sogs rang bzhin du //
T11TD4221.1E:34b-9: dngos po nyid kyis rjes su 'gro phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:34b-11: dngos po dngos po zhes rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid 'bras bu rnams kyi rgyu yin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:34b-12: gal te 'jim pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin las dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid gzhan ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:34b-13: des na 'jim pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rgyu yin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:34b-14: de ltar yin na gtso bo thams cad kyi bdag nyid can yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:34b-16: ngo bo nyid kyis rnam kun du //
T11TD4221.1E:34b-18: me sogs gzhan du gyur pa las //
T11TD4221.1E:34b-19: du ba la sogs gzhan du mthong //
T11TD4221.1E:34b-20: gang zhig gang gi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa de'i rgyu de yin gyi de'i rang bzhin ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:34b-23: sprin la sogs pa las chu la sogs pa yin pas de la 'dra ba med pa'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:34b-24: 'on te der yang de lta bur gyur ba'i 'bras bu nyid las 'dra ba'i rgyu 'ga' zhig yod par rjes su dpog go zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:34b-25: gal te 'dra ba dang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por 'brel ba yod na rjes su dpogs shig / yod pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:34b-26: khyab pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:34b-27: gang gi 'khrul pa de yang phyogs su byed do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:34b-28: de lta na ni 'o na 'ga' yang ma nges pa zhes bya bar mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:34b-29: gang dang gang gis 'khrul pa de nyid phyogs su byed pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:34b-30: des na thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir de ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:34b-32: 'di ni las kyi yongs gyur ces //
T11TD4221.1E:34b-33: bya ba de ni ga las grub //
T11TD4221.1E:34b-34: rjes su 'gro dang ldog pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:34b-35: las la'ang mthong ba med pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-0: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyang 'gro ba sna tshogs 'di'i rgyu yin no zhes shes pa med do @35a * //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-4: 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ldan yang nus pa mtha' dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-5: des na rtsad mo'i don du 'gro ba sna tshogs byed pa yin no zhes gang brjod pa de la bshad pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:35a-6: mi shes chags pa dang ldan rnams //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-7: rtse brod dag pa'i bdag nyid min //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-8: cung zad tsam zhig dag pas kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-9: 'phags pa rtsed mo la mi 'jug / ya rabs gzhan ni dmyal la sogs kyis //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-10: 'jigs phyir rtsed mo la mi 'jug / de la 'jigs pa de med pas //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-11: ci phyir de las ldog pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-12: gal te 'dod chags la sogs kyis //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-13: dmyal sogs sdug bsngal 'jug byed na //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-14: de la de med pa 'di ni //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-15: khyod la mdza' bshes su yis brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-16: bsgom pa'i stobs las yang dag 'byung //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-18: dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal gyis //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-19: gnod pa ma yin zhes byar gnas //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-20: de ni de lta nyid 'gyur ba //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-21: yin zhes khyed la de mi rigs //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-22: 'di de'i rang bzhin nyid yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-24: 'di ni de gcig nyid yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-25: 'di ni rgyal po spyod par gsal //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-27: dbang phyug dbang phyug las 'gyur zhing //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-28: de yi'ang gzhan las de las ni //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-29: gzhan gyi de yang gzhan las de //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-30: dbang phyug ngo bo nyid kyis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-31: brgya byin tshangs pa nyid srid pas //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-32: yon tan khyad 'byung srid na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-33: dbang phyug nyid kyang thob bya ste //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-34: dbang phyug rtag tu gnas pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-35: 'on te de yang med nyid ni //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-38: des ni gzhan du'ang bzod dam ci //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-39: gang zhig skye bo dam pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-40: 'du ba grong du bcom pa de //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-41: skyob pa dag dang bral pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-42: dgon pa ru ni ga la bzod //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-43: de ltar gong nas gong du 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin la de'i rjes su 'brangs nas rab tu 'gyur ba ston pa gang yin pa de rjes su 'gro ba med pa nyid kyi dngos po mi spong ngo zhes bya ba de la yid ches pa ci yod /
T11TD4221.1E:35a-45: dngos po dbyibs dang 'brel ba'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-46: byed pos byas par grub na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:35a-47: rgyu med yon tan ldan par go //
T11TD4221.1E:35b-1: yon tan khyad par la khyad par du mthong ba'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:35b-2: sngar nus pa med pa rnams kyang mngon par brtson pa'i khyad par las phyis nus par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:35b-3: shin tu mtshan nyid mi mthun pa nus pa'i bdag nyid ngo bo nyid kyis grub pa rjes su 'gro ba dang bral ba la ni sgrub par byed pa mi srid pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:35b-5: dbyibs zhes bya 'di dngos po yi //
T11TD4221.1E:35b-6: gnas par grub pa yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:35b-7: 'khrul pa tsam du yod pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:35b-8: de ni rdul phran nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:35b-9: rdul phra rab bdag las tha dad pa'i rdzas la brten pa'i dbyibs ni yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:35b-10: rdul phra rab dga' zhig tu zad do //
T11TD4221.1E:35b-11: des na rdul phra rab dag bzhin no zhes chos mi mthun par ji ltar brjod /
T11TD4221.1E:35b-12: 'on te de ni 'jig rten gyi grags pa tsam du rnam par gnas pa nye bar bkod pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:35b-14: rtogs pas bkod pa tsam ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:35b-15: 'on te rdul phra rab dag nyid rang bzhin des brjod pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:35b-16: de lta yin na rdul phra rab dag kyang 'bras bu nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:35b-17: des na 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di nyid gtan tshigs su dgod par 'os so //
T11TD4221.1E:35b-18: 'on te de lta bur 'khrul pa skyed par byed pa'i rdul phra rab de ltar brjod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:35b-20: gal te rdul phran dngos su na //
T11TD4221.1E:35b-21: ngo bo nyid kyis snang na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:35b-22: dbang phyug la ni nga yi dbyibs //
T11TD4221.1E:35b-23: byed pa'i blo ni ci ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:35b-24: gal te nges par brtags nas ni //
T11TD4221.1E:35b-25: byed pa de la yod min na //
T11TD4221.1E:35b-26: brtags nas byed pa min na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:35b-27: de ni ci ltar kun shes yin ;
T11TD4221.1E:35b-28: /'on te dbyibs ni gzhan dag gis //
T11TD4221.1E:35b-29: khas blangs par ni rtog gce na //
T11TD4221.1E:35b-30: rang gi rtogs pa ma yin pa //
T11TD4221.1E:35b-31: gzhan gyis khas blangs ga la yin //
T11TD4221.1E:35b-32: 'on te yan lag can yod pas //
T11TD4221.1E:35b-33: de ni lan du rjod byed na //
T11TD4221.1E:35b-34: 'di ni phyis nas brtag bya ste //
T11TD4221.1E:35b-35: shin tu 'thad par dka' ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:35b-36: yang na dpe la the tshom za ba yin te dbang phyug nyid kyi the tshom za ba ste ma nges pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:35b-37: dbyibs ma grub pa'i phyir don bya ba byed pa'i rang bzhin nyid gtan tshigs su bkod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:35b-38: de lta bu'i rang bzhin de ni dbang phyug kyang yin pa'i phyir de nyid kyis ma nges so //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-0: dbang phyug de ni bsdad cing @36a * //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-1: bsdad cing 'jug pa dang don bya ba byed pa yin yang /
T11TD4221.1E:36a-2: gzhan gyis bskul ba ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-3: 'on te 'di ni rang nyid nus pa yin pa des na gzhan gyis bskul ba ma yin no /
T11TD4221.1E:36a-4: rdza mkhan la sogs pa yang gang du nus pa der gzhan gyis bskul lo zhes mi rigs pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-5: de dag gi nus pa med pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:36a-6: nus pa nyid du mthong pa ji ltar mi nus pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:36a-7: 'on te de yang rjes su dpag pas mthong ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-8: rjes su dpag pas gzhan rjes su dpog na nus pa yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-9: rdza mkhan 'ba' zhig la nus pa med do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:36a-10: dbang phyug la yang dbang phyug gzhan dpog pas thug pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-12: rdul phran dag la dbyibs med ces //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-14: de nyid phyir na de nyid du //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-15: rtogs pa 'di ni ga las yin //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-16: gang gis dbyibs med par 'gyur ba //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-17: rdul phran rnams kyi rdul phra rab nyid rnam pa de ltar rtogs pa ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-19: rags pa gang yin pa de ni cha shas bsags pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:36a-20: dper na rgya mtsho'i thigs pa du ma bsags pa'i rang bzhin yod pa de la ni rang bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-21: rdul gnyis po can gyi mthar thug pa'i rags pa yin no//
T11TD4221.1E:36a-22: des du ma tshogs pa'i rang bzhin yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:36a-23: de'i phyir rdul phra rab grub bo zhes brjod na /
T11TD4221.1E:36a-25: rdul brgyad pa las pha rol gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-26: rang bzhin yod ces gang las rtogs //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-27: gal te rjes dpag las yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-28: de las gzhan yang ga las rtogs //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-29: 'di rdul brgyad pa'i rang bzhin nam //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-30: gzhan du zhes bya'i tshad ma gang //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-31: rdul phran mthong pa yin na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-32: de yi grangs ni grub par nges //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-33: 'on te shin tu de rags des //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-34: rdul phran gnyis can yin zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-35: gang tshe rdul gnyis can sogs pa //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-36: mi mthong 'di rags gang la ltos //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-37: rjes su dpag pa la ltos na //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-38: thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-39: rjes su dpag la ltos bcas pas //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-40: thams cad rags pa nyid du 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-41: 'on te mthong ba'i dngos gang de //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-42: tha mar rdul phran yin 'dod na //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-43: zlum po la sogs pa yi dbyibs //
T11TD4221.1E:36a-44: ci yi phyir na dmigs ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-0: gal te rdul @36b phran grub min na //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-1: yan lag can ni ga la srid //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-2: rdul phran rnams ni grub ce na //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-3: yan lag can ni ga la srid //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-4: phyogs gcig gis ni reg na de //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-5: ji ltar rdul phran yin par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-6: thams cad phyogs ni gcig nyid kyis //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-7: 'byar ba nyid du dmigs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-8: des na 'byar ba yod pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-9: rags pa'i don bzhin rdul phran min //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-10: 'on te yang rdul phra rab gnyis kyis ni ldan pa don gzhan skyed par byed kyi bdag nyid thams cad dam phyogs gcig gis reg pa ni ma yin no snyam na de yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:36b-11: gal te ma rig par yang ni //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-12: ldan par skyes na de de nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-13: ji ltar soms shig rnam pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-14: rdul phran rnams la rig par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-15: 'on te yan lag can gcig der //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-16: de la rnam gcig blo yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-17: rdul phran rab dang bcas pa rnams //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-18: rtag pa'i phyir na mthong bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-19: gal te kho bo cag sogs kyis //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-20: rdul phran mthong ba ma yin yang //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-21: dbang phyug dbang pos blta bya ba //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-22: de dag la ni med ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-23: 'on te de dag gnyi ga ni //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-24: mthong ba phrod [*'phrod?] du ji ltar yin //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-25: de lta yin na gzhan du ni //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-27: rags pa cha shas ldan pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las yin gal te 'jim gong la sogs pa la /
T11TD4221.1E:36b-29: myu gu la sogs pa ni ma dmigs pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-31: wa ta'i sa bon shin tu chung //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-32: de yi 'bras bu shin tu rtsom //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-33: de la yan lag ldan pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-34: sngon yod min na ji ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-35: yan lag yod pa rnams nyid ldan pa yin no zhes bya ba ni gzhung yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-36: rags pa'i rang bzhin 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i yan lag rnams ni de'i sngon rol du ma dmigs pa des na ji ltar ldan pa yin zhing yan lag can yang ga la yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:36b-37: de bas na thams cad mun khung gi gar yin no ;
T11TD4221.1E:36b-38: ;'on te nam mkha'i phyogs khyab pa'i rdul phra rab rnams nyid ma mthong ba lhan cig pas rtsom par byed do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:36b-41: gnas pa bsags par byed dam ci //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-42: rgyu de las ni sngon med pa //
T11TD4221.1E:36b-43: skye zhes de la kho bo cag / the tshom zab thams cad nyid//
T11TD4221.1E:37a-0: @37a * // 'on te ma mthong dpe las ni //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-1: yod do zhes ni rtogs 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-2: sgron ma dpe yi stobs kyis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-3: grangs can lta ba 'ongs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-4: de phyir dbang phyug byed po zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-6: sgron ma la sogs gsal byed dag / sems pa dang ni ldan ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-7: sems pa med pas gsal ba'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-8: ji ltar dbang phyug sgrub byed yin //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-9: de yang sems pa byin brlabs na //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-10: 'di la lan ni sngar btab bo //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-11: des na gang gang gang gang las //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-12: de de de dang de las yin //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-13: la la sems pa can las dang //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-14: la la gzhan las zhes byar nges //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-15: de lta min na dngos nyid phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-16: ser po dkar 'gyur dkar gzhan bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-17: mngon sum gnod pa min zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-18: de 'dir med ces ga las rtogs //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-19: nga la med phyir de min na //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-20: khyod kyis ma mthong tshad ma min //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-21: khyod kyis ma mthong tshad ce na //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-22: dbang phyug med ces rtogs par gyis //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-23: khyod kyis ma mthong de tshad ma //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-24: min na dbang phyug med shes kyis //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-25: gzhan yang 'bras bu zhes bya ba tsam mam /
T11TD4221.1E:37a-26: dbyibs zhes bya ba tsam mam /
T11TD4221.1E:37a-27: dngos po zhes bya ba tsam gyis ni /
T11TD4221.1E:37a-28: mngon par 'dod pa'i rgyu'i rjes su dpog par byed pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-29: skyes bu'i 'dod bas ni gtan tshigs bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i phyir 'jug pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:37a-30: de lta ma yin na dbang phyug la bzlog par yang 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:37a-31: de yang grub pa thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-32: des na 'ga'i yang 'ga' yang mi 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-33: 'on te ji 'dra ba las ci lta bu dmigs pa de 'dra ba nyid rjes su dpag par byed do zhes bshad pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:37a-34: dbyibs sogs ci 'dra byin rlob bo //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-35: yod med rjes 'jug can grub pa //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-36: de las rjes su dpog gang yin //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-37: de ni rigs pa nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-38: dbyibs la sogs pa ci 'dra ba zhig / byin gyis rlob par byed pa po yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su 'jug par byed par mthong ba'am /
T11TD4221.1E:37a-39: ci 'dra ba'i byin gyis rlob par byed pa po yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su 'jug par dmigs pa /
T11TD4221.1E:37a-40: gang yin pa de 'dra ba las de nyid du rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba ni rigs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:37a-41: dbyibs sam dngos po nyid dam /
T11TD4221.1E:37b-0: sdod nas 'jug pa ci 'dra ba zhig / ci 'dra @37b ba las dmigs pa de 'dra ba las de 'dra ba'i byin gyis rlob pa po rjes su dpog par rigs kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:37b-1: gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:37b-2: tha dad dngos la rab grub pa //
T11TD4221.1E:37b-3: sgra mtshungs pas tha dad med phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:37b-4: rjes dpog rigs pa ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:37b-5: skya bo'i rdzas la me bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:37b-6: gal te dbyibs kyi khyad par dang //
T11TD4221.1E:37b-7: byed pa po'i khyad par gyi rjes su 'gro ba btang nas //
T11TD4221.1E:37b-8: dbyibs kyi sgra tsam gyis brjod par bya ba'am /
T11TD4221.1E:37b-9: dngos po tsam gtan tshigs su len na ni de'i tshe rjes su dpag pa mi rigs par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:37b-10: skya bo'i rdzas las me bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:37b-11: de las skya bo'i khyad par du bar rtogs pa gang yin pa nges par bzung ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:37b-12: 'o na du ba nyid la rjes su dpog pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:37b-13: skya bo nyid kyis ci bya zhe na 'dir smras pa /
T11TD4221.1E:37b-14: khyad par can gyi skya bo nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:37b-15: du ba zhes ni brjod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:37b-16: du ba tha dad pa nyid ni //
T11TD4221.1E:37b-17: skya bo nyid kyi khyad par min //
T11TD4221.1E:37b-18: du bar rtogs pa'i skya bo las //
T11TD4221.1E:37b-19: zhes bya ba'i don ci yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:37b-20: me'i rjes su 'gro ba ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa'i skya bo las so zhes bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:37b-21: gal te de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa nyid ji ltar rtogs par bya zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:37b-22: 'di la yang du ba nyid me med na mi 'byung ba yin no zhes rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ma bzung ba na /
T11TD4221.1E:37b-23: rjes su dpag par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:37b-24: de lta yin dang shin tu cher //
T11TD4221.1E:37b-25: dbang phyug mi 'grub par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:37b-26: skyed 'dod pas dngos kyang nyams so //
T11TD4221.1E:37b-27: de'i phyir dbyibs kyi khyad par can bum pa la sogs pa'i dpe tha dad pa'i dngos po la mthong ba'i khyad par skyes bus byin gyis brlabs pa'i bye brag gang yin pa de /
T11TD4221.1E:37b-28: sgra mtshungs pas tha dad pa'i phyir rjes su dpag par ni rigs pa ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:37b-29: de bzhin du dbang phyug kyang ngo zhes bya ba 'di ni gcig tu nges pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:37b-30: 'on te yang khyad par dang bral ba'i skya bo nyid las rjes su dpag par 'jug pa des na mngon sum gyis gnod par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:37b-31: thams cad du skya bo nyid yod par me dang ldan pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:37b-32: mngon sum gyis bzlog par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:37b-33: dbang phyug rjes su dpog pa la ni gnod pa med pa'i phyir de rjes su dpag go zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:38a-2: gnod pa med pa tsam gyis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:38a-3: rjes su dpag pa 'jug ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:38a-4: de ni 'brel pa mthong ba las //
T11TD4221.1E:38a-5: 'jug pa yin zhes brjod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:38a-6: de lta min na rdza mkhan gyis //
T11TD4221.1E:38a-7: bum pa la sogs 'jim pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:38a-9: grog mkhar yang des byas grub 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:38a-10: grog mkhar rdza mkhan gyis byas pa las ni gnod par byed pa yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:38a-11: gal te ma mthong ba nyid gnod par byed pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:38a-12: ga lte byed pa po rdza mkhan yin na ni dmigs pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:38a-13: ci dbang phyug kyang dmigs sam /
T11TD4221.1E:38a-14: gal te de ltar na ma mthong ba'i las kyang brtag par mi bya'o zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:38a-15: de ci da ni bu ga yin pa tsam gyis pus mos btsang ngam /
T11TD4221.1E:38a-16: 'on te las brtags nas kyang dbang phyug gzhan rtogs na /
T11TD4221.1E:38a-17: des na de las kyang gzhan yin pa'i phyir thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:38a-19: 'bras bu de las ma mthong ba'i //
T11TD4221.1E:38a-20: rdza mkhan yang ni brtags par gyis //
T11TD4221.1E:38a-21: brtags pa nyid du dka' ba ste //
T11TD4221.1E:38a-22: dbang phyug la yang med dam ci //
T11TD4221.1E:38a-23: 'on te grog mkhar la dbyug gu dang /
T11TD4221.1E:38a-25: lag pa'i bya ba'i rjes su 'gro ba ma dmigs so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:38a-26: gal te 'o na ni khyed kyi 'di cher zhib tu rtogs pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:38a-27: de'i tshe ri la sogs pa dbyibs nges pa med pa rnams la yang rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa ma dmigs pas 'di yang byas pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:38a-29: 'on te ri la sogs pa ni sa 'dzin pa tsam byed pa la nye bar mkho bas /
T11TD4221.1E:38a-30: ri la sogs pa de yang dbyibs legs par bsgrub pas ci bya zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:38a-32: sa 'dzin nyer mkho med pas dbyibs //
T11TD4221.1E:38a-33: rnam pa gzhan du byed dam ci //
T11TD4221.1E:38a-34: 'on te de la skyes bu rgyu //
T11TD4221.1E:38a-35: min pa des na mi mdzes nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:38a-36: ci skyes bu byed pa po yin yang nye bar mkho ba med pas na /
T11TD4221.1E:38a-37: dbyibs shin tu legs pa mi skyed pa yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:38a-38: 'on te skyes bu byed pa po ma yin zhes the tshom za ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:38a-39: gal te skyon 'di 'bras bu dang mtshungs pa ma yin nam //
T11TD4221.1E:38a-40: 'di ltar rtsol ba'i 'bras bu du ma'i phyir na 'bras bu mtshungs so //
T11TD4221.1E:38b-0: btsal ma thag pa yin pa'i phyir na sgra ni 'bras bu @38b yin no zhes bya ba la bcal ma thag tu gsal ba yang mthong ba'i phyir sgra 'bras bu ma yin no zhes bya ba ste /
T11TD4221.1E:38b-1: de bzhin du 'dir yang dbyibs gzhan gyi 'bras bu yang ma mthong ngo zhes bya ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:38b-3: spyis kyang sgrub par byed pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:38b-4: 'brel pa can ni tha dad byer //
T11TD4221.1E:38b-6: bsgrub par bya ba 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa'i spyis kyang sgrub par byed pa la ste /
T11TD4221.1E:38b-7: sgrub par byed pa'i yul la brjod pa'i skyon gang yin pa de 'bras bu mtshungs pa 'dod do //
T11TD4221.1E:38b-8: 'bras bu mtshungs kyi ltag chod kyi rang bzhin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:38b-10: tha dad brjod pa skyon no //
T11TD4221.1E:38b-11: tha dad pa brjod pa ni nye bar bkod pa ste /
T11TD4221.1E:38b-12: ci 'bras bu nyid mngon par gsal bar 'gyur ba gzung ngam /
T11TD4221.1E:38b-13: ci ste skye bar 'gyur ba gzung zhes 'brel pa can tha dad pa las tha dad par brjod pa'i skyon gang yin pa de ni 'bras mtshungs so //
T11TD4221.1E:38b-14: de la yang gal te ma nges pa rjod par byed pa rtsol bas bsgribs pa bsal ba'i phyir zhes de ltar yang mi 'gal na ltag chod ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:38b-15: 'on kyang spyis kyang sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:38b-16: gang gi phyir rtag pa la ni mngon par gsal ba yang 'gal ba nyid de des na ltag chod yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:38b-17: de lta ma yin na ni ma nges par brjod pa'i bden pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:38b-19: 'bras bu gzhan nyid yin na rtsol ba rgyu nyid ma yin pa ni mi dmigs pa'i rgyu 'thad pa las yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:38b-20: 'bras bu gzhan nyid yin na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:38b-21: sgra la brtsal ba rgyu ma yin par 'gyur ba ni bar chad la sogs pa mi dmigs pa'i rgyu 'thad pa las yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:38b-22: sgra la ni bar chad la sogs pa'i rgyu 'thad pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:38b-23: des na de ni brtsal ma thag tu mngon par gsal ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:38b-24: gang zhig brtsal ma thag tu mngon par gsal ba de la mi dmigs pa'i rgyur bar chad 'thad pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:38b-25: bar chad bsal ba la don dmigs pa ni brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:38b-26: des na dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid mngon par gsal bar 'gyur ba yin no zhe'o //
T11TD4221.1E:38b-28: gal te mngon par gsal ba dad //
T11TD4221.1E:38b-30: sgra la'ang de ni yod min zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:38b-31: 'di ni gang las ci ltar shes //
T11TD4221.1E:39a-2: bar chod la sogs pa ye sgra //
T11TD4221.1E:39a-3: gsal bar rtogs pa yid min pa //
T11TD4221.1E:39a-4: rtsol ba las skyes de ma mthong //
T11TD4221.1E:39a-5: snyam na de yang mi bden te //
T11TD4221.1E:39a-6: sgra la bar chod la sogs pa //
T11TD4221.1E:39a-7: yod do zhes ni brtag par gyis //
T11TD4221.1E:39a-8: ngo shes pa ni yin pa'i phyir ;
T11TD4221.1E:39a-9: / sgra ni 'jigs pa ma yin nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:39a-10: bum pa la sogs pa yang sngar dmigs pa bar du chod pa'i gnas skabs na ma zhig go zhes /
T11TD4221.1E:39a-11: bar chad dang bral ba na ngo shes pa nyid las rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:39a-12: sgra yang ngo shes pa'i phyir de bzhin du rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:39a-13: 'on te gzhan gyis dmigs pa'i phyir de ltar rtogs pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:39a-14: ngo shes pa ni ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:39a-15: gzhan gyis dmigs pa las brgyud nas de ltar rtogs kyi rang nyid ngo shes pa las dngos su ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni de kho na mthong ba chen po yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:39a-17: gzhan gyis kyang ni ngo shes las //
T11TD4221.1E:39a-18: gzhan ba las ni shes min na ;
T11TD4221.1E:39a-19: / gzhan las kyang ni ji ltar de //
T11TD4221.1E:39a-20: rtag pa nyid du 'gyur ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:39a-22: spyis kyang sgrub par byed pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:39a-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar brjod pa nyid lan yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:39a-25: 'bras nyid gzhan gyi cha yis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:39a-26: bsgrub bya grub par ston pa gang //
T11TD4221.1E:39a-27: de ni 'bras mtshungs smra ba po'i //
T11TD4221.1E:39a-28: bsam pa las de'i rnam gsum mo //
T11TD4221.1E:39a-29: zhes slob dpon gyis bstan pa'i 'bras mtshungs kyi mtshan nyid las bstan nas de skad bshad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:39a-30: rkang mig gi mtshan nyid ni mi 'thad do zhes bstan zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:39a-32: gal te byas pa'i phyir sgra mi rtag ste bum pa bzhin no zhes byas pa na 'bras bu gzhan gyis bum pas mi rtag pa yin pas /
T11TD4221.1E:39a-33: 'dir sgra la cir 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'bras mtshungs yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:39a-34: 'di ni smra ba po'i bsam pa las rnam pa gsum ste /
T11TD4221.1E:39a-35: gal te smra ba po bum pa'i 'bras bu nyid sgra la med do zhes rtsod par byed na ni ma grub pa lta bu /
T11TD4221.1E:39a-36: 'on te sgra'i 'bras bu nyid bum pa la sogs pa mi rtag pa dag la med do zhes bya ba yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:39a-37: de las 'gal ba ltar snang ba'o //
T11TD4221.1E:39a-38: 'on te de rtag pa dag la yang med do zhes bya ba yin na ni thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o //
T11TD4221.1E:39b-0: rnam par rtog pa dang mtshungs pa ni chos @39b mthun na yang khyad par brjod pa rtog pa dang mtshungs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:39b-1: dper na snga ma bzhin du bum pa dang chos mthun pas mi rtag par byas na /
T11TD4221.1E:39b-2: chos mthun pa de yod kyang chos par bya ba nyid dang /
T11TD4221.1E:39b-3: mig gis gzung ba nyid la sogs pas bum pa nyid mi rtag pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:39b-4: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes brjod pa lta bu'o //
T11TD4221.1E:39b-5: gal te 'dir yang dbyibs nyid la sogs pa'i 'bras bu spyis sgrub par byed pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:39b-6: ri dang bum pa la sogs pa'i dbyibs yongs su brtags pas /
T11TD4221.1E:39b-7: 'brel pa can gyi sgo nas khyad par yongs su rtog na ni 'bras mtshungs brjod pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:39b-9: dbyibs la sogs pa dag gi spyi //
T11TD4221.1E:39b-10: blo sngon byed pa las byung min //
T11TD4221.1E:39b-11: de ni shing sogs gzhan la yang //
T11TD4221.1E:39b-12: mthong ba'i phyir zhes brjod zin te //
T11TD4221.1E:39b-13: 'brel pa yi ni khyad par dag / spangs nas 'gar ni sgrub byed gang //
T11TD4221.1E:39b-14: de ni shin tu 'brel med de //
T11TD4221.1E:39b-15: mi rtag bya rog nag pos bzhin ;
T11TD4221.1E:39b-17: gal te slo sngon du byed pa rjes su 'gro bar ma mthong bas dbyibs la sogs pa de nyid sgrub byed du mi 'gyur mod /
T11TD4221.1E:39b-18: dbyibs dbyibs zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgras brjod par bya ba ni rjes su 'gro ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:39b-19: des na des mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir gcig gi 'bras bur grub po zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:39b-22: rtog pa tsam gyis bkod pa'i chos //
T11TD4221.1E:39b-23: don nye ba dang bral ba las //
T11TD4221.1E:39b-24: don de yod par gyur na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:39b-26: rigs gzhan las ni rab grub pa //
T11TD4221.1E:39b-27: sgra yi spyi ni mthong ba las //
T11TD4221.1E:39b-28: sgrub byed mi rigs dag la sogs //
T11TD4221.1E:39b-29: go yin phyir rva can bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:39b-30: dag la sogs pa dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa rigs gzhan la rab tu grub pa'i rva dang 'brel pa de /
T11TD4221.1E:39b-31: ci go zhes tshig tha mi dad pa tsam gyis rjes su dpag par bya ba'am /
T11TD4221.1E:39b-32: don gcig na yang skya bo las //
T11TD4221.1E:39b-33: rjes su dpog pa min zhes brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:39b-34: gang la don kyang yod min na //
T11TD4221.1E:39b-35: sgra tsam mtshungs par smos ci dgos //
T11TD4221.1E:39b-36: re zhig don ni mngon par 'dod pa'i bsgrub bya dang 'brel pa srid pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:40a-0: de la yang rtogs pa zhib mo dang ldan pa dag gis sgrub par byed pa ma yin par brjod na gang la bsgrub bya dang 'brel pa 'di tsam yang ring du @40a * //
T11TD4221.1E:40a-1: byas pas sgra mtshungs pa lta ci smos /
T11TD4221.1E:40a-3: brjod par 'dod pa'i gzhan dbang phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:40a-4: sgra rnams gang la'ang phyir mi rtag pa thams cad 'grub //
T11TD4221.1E:40a-5: sgra 'di dag ni 'ga' la yang te /
T11TD4221.1E:40a-7: brjod par 'dod pa thams cad la bkag pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:40a-8: gal te de las don grub na ni 'ga' yang don grub pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:40a-9: des na gzhan gyis khas blangs pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:40a-10: 'dis ni ser skya la sogs kyis //
T11TD4221.1E:40a-11: mi rtag sogs phyir sems med la //
T11TD4221.1E:40a-12: srog dang shun pa bshus na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:40a-13: ci phyir sems ldan dpyad pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:40a-14: ser skya ba la sogs pa'i sems pa med pa can nam gzhan dag gang las thub pa'i khang bzangs kyi rtser 'dzeg par 'gyur bde ni don gyi de kho na nyid du med pa'i phyir sgra tsam mtshungs pa nye bar bkod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:40a-16: mi rtag pa nyid grangs can la //
T11TD4221.1E:40a-17: dngos por grub pa yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:40a-18: de ni don rnams mi gsal ba //
T11TD4221.1E:40a-20: mngon par mi gsal ba'i mi rtag pa de nyid ni sangs rgyas pa la ma grub bo //
T11TD4221.1E:40a-22: rjes su 'gro ba med par 'jig pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:40a-23: gal te zhig pa dang mngon par mi gsal ba dag bskal bar mtshungs pa ma yin nam zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:40a-24: bskal pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ci zhig / mi mngon pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:40a-25: 'o na ri bong gi rva la sogs pa dang gtso bo la sogs pa yang mi rtag par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:40a-26: yod pa mi mngon pa'i bdag nyid yin na yang gtso bo la sogs pa yang 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:40a-27: snang ba mi mngon par 'gyur ba yin no zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:40a-28: snang ba zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig gal te don gyi ngo bo nyid yin na ci ltar snang ba mi snang bar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:40a-29: de spangs na dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:40a-30: 'on te snang ba'i bdag nyid dngos po las gzhan yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:40a-31: 'o na de med pa nyid ji ltar rjes su 'gro ba med par zhig pa ma yin /
T11TD4221.1E:40a-32: gzhan med na gzhan bskal bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:40a-33: de yang thams cad kyi tshe gtso bo dang mtshungs pa'i phyir mi rtag pa nyid ma yin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:40a-34: de'i phyir sgras brtags pa tsam nyid sgrub byed du khas blangs pa yin no//
T11TD4221.1E:40b-0: @40b shun pa bshus na 'chi ba'i phyir zhes bya ba yang de bzhin te /
T11TD4221.1E:40b-1: shun pa thams cad bshus na 'chi ba'i sgra 'jug pa tshad ma nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:40b-2: rnam shes la sogs 'gags pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:40b-3: 'chi bar sangs rgyas pas rtogs phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:40b-4: gang la shing la rnam shes ni //
T11TD4221.1E:40b-5: ma grub de yang 'chi de bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:40b-6: sangs rgyas pa gang shing dag la rnam par shes pa yod par the tshom za ba ste /
T11TD4221.1E:40b-7: de sngon du song ba 'gags pa'i rang bzhin 'chi ba la the tshom mi za'o zhes yid ches pa ci yod /
T11TD4221.1E:40b-8: rnam par shes pa 'gags pa ni rnam par shes pa med pa las yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:40b-10: tshe ni srog yin drod dang ni //
T11TD4221.1E:40b-11: rnam shes rten gang yin pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:40b-13: 'chi ba khas len na ji ltar sems pa can du khas mi len /
T11TD4221.1E:40b-14: des na 'di shing dag la bskams ba 'chi bar brjod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:40b-15: de yang rnam par shes pa'i sgrub par byed pa ma nges pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:40b-16: 'dam la sogs pa la yang mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:40b-17: 'chi ba'i sgra 'jug pa'i phyir de la yang grub pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:40b-18: 'di la brjod par 'dod pa'i gzhan dbang phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:40b-20: 'on te don mthong bas der brjod par 'dod pa yin pa des na skyon 'di med do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:40b-21: 'chi ba grub na de yi sgra //
T11TD4221.1E:40b-23: sgra ni 'brel ba yin pas na //
T11TD4221.1E:40b-24: de las 'chi ba grub pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:40b-25: de lta bu'i 'chi ba mthong ba las byung ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:40b-26: sgra las rnam par shes pa la sogs pa 'gags pa'i mtshan nyid 'chi bar 'grub la de lta bu'i 'chi ba mthong ba las byung ba yang 'chi ba grub na yin pa'i phyir phan tshun rten pa'i skyon yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:40b-27: 'on te sgra don gyi 'brel pa rtag pa nyid yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:40b-28: de lta na dag la sogs pa yang rva can nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:40b-29: 'on te ngag la sogs pa la yod pa'i go'i sgra'i gzhan nyid yin pas de ni rva can la 'brel par mi 'gyur ro zhe na ;
T11TD4221.1E:40b-30: 'o na 'chi ba'i sgra yang gzhan ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di la khyed la tshad ma ci yod /
T11TD4221.1E:40b-31: des na mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i sgrub par byed pa ni sgrub par byed pa nyid ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:40b-32: de bzhin du yod pa nyid dang dbyibs la sogs pa yang yin pas bsgrub bya mi 'grub bo //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-1: khyad par yongs su brtags pas dbyibs la sogs pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa sgrub par byed pa nyid ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:41a-2: 'o na byas pa nyid la sogs pa gzhan yang sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-3: rgol ba gzhan la ltos pas sam //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-4: rnam par brtags pas ni thams cad ma grub pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-6: nam mkha'i yon tan sgra yi chos //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-7: gzhan la rab tu sgrub ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-8: bsgrub bya dpe yi chos dag ni //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-9: phan tshun du ni ma grub nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-10: ce na de ni ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-11: lung gi nam mkha'i chos nyid ni //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-12: 'ga' la yang ni gnod pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-13: khyad par rtogs par byed na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:41a-14: gtan tshigs nyid ni nyams par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-16: dngos po'i ngo bor ma grub la //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-17: tshul 'di grub na ma grub kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-18: khyad par gnod byed ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-19: sgra ni nam mkha' la brten bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-20: lung las grags pa'i nam mkha'i yon tan nyid /
T11TD4221.1E:41a-22: sgra'i rang gi ngo bo ni chos can du 'grub pa nyid pas chos can ma grub pa nyid ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-23: de bzhin du khyad par yongs su rtogs pa la yang gtan tshigs chos can dang 'brel pa ma grub pa'am /
T11TD4221.1E:41a-24: thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyis ma nges pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-25: chos can nyid ni tshad mas grub pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-26: khyad par ma grub na ma grub par 'gyur ba ma yin la khyad par yongs su rtogs pa yang 'gar yang nye bar mkho ba ma yin pas /
T11TD4221.1E:41a-27: de la gdon mi za bar khyad par yongs su gzung ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-29: mi rtag pa dang 'bras nyid kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-30: spyi ni nye bar mkho ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-31: khyad par rab tu grub par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-33: rgyu yi de ma thag byung dang //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-34: de yi mod la 'jig nyid ni //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-35: bum pa dang ni sgra dag la //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-36: khyad par du ni rjes 'brel min //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-37: snga ma dang phyi ma'i rang bzhin gyis /
T11TD4221.1E:41a-38: dben pa nyid ni 'gar yang khyad par yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-39: phyogs de ni de khyad par du byed pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:41a-40: de ni gcig tu 'dzin pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-41: des na 'di la rnam par rtog pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-42: dbyibs la sogs pa la ni de dang 'brel ba ma grub pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-43: lhag ma ni sngar bshad pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:41a-44: dbyibs kyi sgra tsam ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:41b-1: sgra ma grub kyang dngos po ni //
T11TD4221.1E:41b-3: 'ug pa pa la sangs rgyas pas //
T11TD4221.1E:41b-4: lus sogs sgrub byed bshad pa bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:41b-5: rdul phran dag ni mi rtag pa yin te lus can yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bye brag pa la sangs rgyas pas sgrub par byed pa brjod do //
T11TD4221.1E:41b-6: de la sgra ni phan tshun mngon par 'dod pa'i yul la grub pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:41b-7: rdzas thams cad du song ba ma yin pa'i tshad ni de'i lus can gyi sgras brjod par bya ba yin pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:41b-8: bde bar gshegs pa pa rnams la ni rig pa dang ldan pa lus can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:41b-9: gal te sgra de nyid phan tshun du mngon par 'dod pa'i yul la ma grub pa de lta na yang des mngon par 'dod pa'i don ni gnyi ga la grub pa'i phyir sgra ma grub kyang sangs rgyas pa'i mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po gnyi ga la grub pas mngon par 'dod pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i don 'grub po //
T11TD4221.1E:41b-10: gal te ci ltar dngos po mi 'khrul pa'am /
T11TD4221.1E:41b-12: bsgrub bya 'grub pa de bzhin du sgra la yang de lta bu nyid ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:41b-13: 'di gnyis la khyad par ci yod ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:41b-15: de nyid 'khrul la sogs yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:41b-16: sgra ni 'khrul pa med na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:41b-17: sgrub byed skyon ldan shes bya ste //
T11TD4221.1E:41b-18: dngos las dngos ni 'grub phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:41b-19: ci ltar sgra ma grub kyang dngos po'i dbang gis bsgrub bya 'grub pa de bzhin du dngos po ma grub kyang sgra'i dbang gis bsgrub bya 'grub pa ni ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:41b-20: 'on kyang sgra 'khrul pa med kyang dngos po'i de nyid 'khrul pa dang ma grub pa dang 'gal ba yin na sgrub par byed pa skyon dang ldan pa shes par bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:41b-21: sgra 'khrul pa med na yang ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:41b-22: re zhig dngos po 'khrul pa la sogs par gyur na sgra ma 'khrul ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:41b-23: khas blangs nas kyang bshad pa ni sgra 'khrul pa med du chug mod /
T11TD4221.1E:41b-24: de lta na yang sgrub byed skyon dang ldan pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:41b-26: dngos po las dngos po 'grub kyi sgra las ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:41b-27: gal te sgra mi 'khrul ba bsgrub bya la ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:41b-28: de lta yin na sgra las bsgrub bya 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:41b-29: 'on te de las bsgrub bya mi 'grub na /
T11TD4221.1E:41b-30: ci lta sgra mi 'khrul pa yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:41b-31: 'dis ni 'di skad du ston pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:42a-1: ni dngos po sgrub par byed pa'i sgo nas bsgrub bya 'grub pa'am /
T11TD4221.1E:42a-2: nye bar sbyor ba yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:42a-3: dngos su ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:42a-4: des na sgra mi 'khrul bar 'dod kyang don spangs nas ni bsgrub bya bsgrub par nus pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:42a-5: des na don la brten pa'i dpyad pa nyid nye bar mkho ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:42a-6: dngos po 'khrul ba dang cig shos nges par brtag pa ni phyis bshad par bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:42a-7: de'i phyir gang las dbang phyug 'grub par 'gyur ba don gyi rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs ni yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:42a-8: des na mi rtag na yang tshad med nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:42a-10: de bzhin du rtag pa yang ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:42a-11: rtag pa nyid kyis ni nam mkha' la sogs pa dang dbang phyug la rgyu dang rgyu ma yin pa nyid kyi rnam par dbye ba ni yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:42a-13: ji ltar dngos de rgyu yin pa //
T11TD4221.1E:42a-14: de ltar nyid de gang gi tshe //
T11TD4221.1E:42a-15: rgyu min gang gis de ni rgyu //
T11TD4221.1E:42a-17: ji ltar dbang phyug khyab pa dang rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos can yin pa de bzhin du nam mkha' la sogs pa'i yang yin pa des na mtshungs pa nyid yin yang dbang phyug ni rgyu yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:42a-18: nam mkha' la sogs pa ni rgyu ma yin no zhes bya ba'i rnam par dbye ba ga las yin /
T11TD4221.1E:42a-19: 'on te de na byed par 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi shes pa dang 'brel pas te de skad brjod do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:42a-20: de yang ma yin te de yang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:42a-21: gzhan yang byed par 'dod pa tsam gyis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:42a-22: rgyu zhes bya bar rtogs ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:42a-24: de bzhin 'on te rgyu yin ci //
T11TD4221.1E:42a-25: gal te la sogs bsal nas ni //
T11TD4221.1E:42a-26: byed pa yin na rgyu nyid yin //
T11TD4221.1E:42a-27: de lta min na kun gyi rgyu //
T11TD4221.1E:42a-28: thams cad yin par cis mi 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:42a-29: yang na ji ltar skyed pa las sngar de rgyu ma yin pa de bzhin du /
T11TD4221.1E:42a-30: bskyed pa'i gnas skabs na yang khyad par med pa'i phyir rgyu ma yin pa nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:42a-31: 'dod chags la sogs pa thams cad las nges par grol ba ni bya ba med par 'dug pa nyid rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:42a-32: 'jig rten gyi las bdag por gyur pas bya ba med par 'dug pa'i dbang med do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:42a-34: pha rol las kyi gzhan dbang gyur pas 'di //
T11TD4221.1E:42a-35: ji ltar dbang phyug dbang phyug min pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-0: @42b 'on te de la brtse tshul khyad yin nam //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-1: dmyal sogs bsgrub phyir brtse ba med pa cis //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-2: 'jig rten las nyid de 'dra phyir de la //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-3: de byed nus med na 'di dam pa min //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-4: dam pa gal te legs byed nus med kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-5: legs min bya la de ni 'jug gam ci //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-6: dam pa min pa'i bya ba ni //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-7: dam pas yal bar dor ba'i rigs //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-8: rma la rgya tsha 'debs pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-9: dam pa dam pa'i spyod pa min //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-10: 'o na te tshul 'di ni 'di lta bu nyid yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:42b-11: 'di ni de nyid gsal bar byed pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:42b-12: de bya ba'i phyir spyod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-13: nga'i rang bzhin 'di lta bu yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:42b-14: ngas bzlog par ni mi nus so //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-15: de la 'jig rten gyis ci rigs par spang bar bya ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:42b-16: 'di bdag nyid la yang dbang med pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:42b-17: 'di gsal bar dbang phyug yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-18: rang las 'tsham pa'i spyod pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-19: 'jig rten dbang phyug cis ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-20: gal te de yang dbang phyug gis //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-21: bskul na phan tshun rten de nyid ;
T11TD4221.1E:42b-22: / de lta yin na gcig kyang ni //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-23: srid par 'thad pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-24: gal te dbang phyug la ni nus med na //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-25: legs te 'gro ba las kyis bsgrub par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-26: gal te 'jig rten rang dbang skyes na 'dir //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-27: las smra ba nyid dge bar brjod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-28: ci ste yang gal te bdag cag lta bu de kho na nyid ma mthong bdag gis ma shes na yang de dbang phyug gis kyang brgya zhig la rgyu nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:42b-30: de 'grub bya phyir de nyid mthong ba nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-31: shes bya de yis shes par byed pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-32: gzhan yin thug pa med par 'gyur ba'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-33: dbang phyug du ma dag tu 'gyur ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-34: bdag cag la sogs pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:42b-35: mtshon dang sman sogs dang 'brel bas //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-36: nag pa'i rma dang 'drubs yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-37: 'brel med sdong du ma ci yi phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-38: rgyu nyid du ni rtogs mi byed /
T11TD4221.1E:42b-39: 'on te 'brel pa med pa'i phyir de ni sdod dum gyi byed pa med pas rgyu nyid ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:42b-40: sdod dum gyi byed pa yang brgya zhig la yod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:42b-41: de ni de kho na nyid ma mthong ba bdag cag lta bu ma dmigs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-42: 'o na mi dmigs pa nyid kyis sdong dum gyi byed pa med pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:42b-44: rang bzhin khyad par med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-45: byed pa yang ni mi rung ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:42b-46: rtag la ldog pa med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:43a-2: rgyun gyis sam rnam pa gzhan du rtag pa'i dbang rgyug rtag pa la ni rang bzhin gyi khyad par med par 'bras bu'i byed pa yang nye bar mtshon par mi 'thad do //
T11TD4221.1E:43a-3: dbang phyug la yang zhes yang gi sgra rim pa gzhan du bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:43a-4: ci ltar rdza mkhan la sogs pas byas pa'i khyad par yod pa de bzhin du /
T11TD4221.1E:43a-5: gal te dbang phyug gis byas pa yang 'gyur na ni nus par rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:43a-6: rtag la ldog pa med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:43a-7: nus pa yang ni rtogs par dka' //
T11TD4221.1E:43a-8: rtag tu gnas dang khyab pas na //
T11TD4221.1E:43a-9: ldog pa nyid ni med phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:43a-10: gang dag yod na gang 'gyur nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:43a-11: de dag las gzhan de yi rgyur //
T11TD4221.1E:43a-12: rtogs pa yin na thams cad la //
T11TD4221.1E:43a-13: rgyu rnams thug pa med par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:43a-14: mthong ba'i rdza mkhan la sogs pa rnams dang /
T11TD4221.1E:43a-15: las yod na mngon par 'dod pa 'byung ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:43a-16: de lta na yang gzhan rtogs pa yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:43a-17: 'bras bu thams cad la rgyu rnams thug pa med par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:43a-19: rjes su 'jug pa med pa'i rtog pa 'jug pa'i rjes su 'gro na de las gzhan la gegs yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:43a-20: yang na gsar pa ma yin pa gna' ma de nyid gnas pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:43a-21: rgyu rnams kyi rgyu yang de nyid yin pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:43a-22: las gzhan ni don med pa nyid do zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:43a-23: 'o na ji ltar rtag tu gnas pa'i sa myu gu la sogs pa'i rgyu yin pa de bzhin du dbang phyug kyang yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:43a-24: sa la sogs pa la ni thog ma dmigs pa med do zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:43a-26: myu gu skyed la sa la sogs //
T11TD4221.1E:43a-27: rang bzhin yongs su 'gyur nas ni //
T11TD4221.1E:43a-28: rgyu yin de legs byas pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:43a-29: de yi khyad par mthong phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:43a-30: nas kyi myu gu la sogs pa ni gshol gyi byed pa la sogs pa rnam par 'gyur ba'i khyad par gyi rjes su 'gro ba dang 'brel pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:43a-31: sa la sogs pa rgyu nyid du rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:43a-32: yang rtsod pa dang lan btab pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:43a-33: gal te ji ltar yul dbang po //
T11TD4221.1E:43a-34: tshogs pa khyad med blo rgyu yin //
T11TD4221.1E:43a-35: de ltar 'di yin zhe na min //
T11TD4221.1E:43a-36: de la'ang khyad par yod phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:43a-37: rgyun gyi khyad par med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:43a-38: so so so sor nus med rnams //
T11TD4221.1E:43b-0: tshogs kyang @43b nus pa med 'gyur ba //
T11TD4221.1E:43b-1: de phyir khyad par grub ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:43b-2: mig la sogs pa rnams la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:43b-3: 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par nyid las rgyu nyid du nges par byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:43b-4: 'bras bu rnam par shes pa ni gzugs so sor nges pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:43b-5: gzugs kyi rnam pa can dang /
T11TD4221.1E:43b-6: rtogs pa'i rang bzhin can yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:43b-7: de'i phyir 'di dag phan tshun spangs pas nye bar sbyar ba las khyad par yod pa'i phyir mig la sogs pa 'bras bu rnam par shes pa'i rgyu yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:43b-8: gang gi phyir 'di dag ni so so so sor rnam par shes pa'i tshigs la nus pa med pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:43b-9: mig las ni rtogs pa'i rang bzhin ma yin /
T11TD4221.1E:43b-10: gzungs las ni gzugs 'dzin par so sor nges pa ma yin /
T11TD4221.1E:43b-11: yid la byed pa las ni gzhan ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:43b-12: re re las mthong ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:43b-13: 'on te mig phye ba na gzugs gzhan dang gzhan nya bar gnas par 'gyur ba na gzugs gzhan dang gzhan mthong na de'i tshe mig la khyad par yod pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:43b-14: de bzhin du gzugs gnas pa nyid la mig gi rnam par shes pa gzhan dang gzhan 'byung ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:43b-16: dbang phyug kyang rtag tu mtshungs pa nyid kyis rnam par gnas pa ni srid pa gzhan dang gzhan skye ba'i phyir rgyu'i dngos po ma yin ba ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:43b-17: 'di la nam mkha' la sogs pa rnams kyang rgyu'i dngos por thal bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:43b-18: mig dang gzugs kyi khyad par las //
T11TD4221.1E:43b-19: rnam par shes pa khyad par can //
T11TD4221.1E:43b-20: yod par 'gyur ba de yi phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:43b-21: gzugs la sogs pa rgyu nyid yin //
T11TD4221.1E:43b-22: yongs su gsal ba dang mi gsal ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid gzugs kyi khyad par las /
T11TD4221.1E:43b-23: rnam par shes pa yid bde ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa skye la /
T11TD4221.1E:43b-24: de bzhin du phyed btsums pa la sogs pa'i mig gi khyad par las mi gsal ba nyid la sogs pa'i khyad par du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:43b-25: de ni de dang 'brel pas rgyu de'i 'bras bur rtogs par byed kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:43b-26: de bzhin du dbang phyug rgyur rtogs pa'i rgyu ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:43b-28: rgyun gyi khyad par med na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:43b-29: zhes bya ba rgyun gyi khyad par yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:43b-30: so so so sor nus med rnams //
T11TD4221.1E:44a-3: rgyu las bzlog pa'i rang bzhin de nyid ci ltar rgyur 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di la lan ci yod /
T11TD4221.1E:44a-4: gzugs la sogs pa rgyu nyid du rtogs pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:44a-5: rgyu brjod pa'i phyir skyon med do //
T11TD4221.1E:44a-6: de'i phyir so sor gang nus med //
T11TD4221.1E:44a-7: tshogs na yon tan srid 'gyur ba //
T11TD4221.1E:44a-8: de dag rgyu yin dbang phyug sogs //
T11TD4221.1E:44a-9: ma yin khyad par med phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:44a-10: dbang phyug dgag pa'i rnam 'grel lo //
T11TD4221.1E:44a-11: gal te dbang phyug yongs su shes pa la sogs pa'i rgyu shes par byed pa'am /
T11TD4221.1E:44a-12: skyed par byed pa med na 'o na ni de gzhan la yang mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:44a-14: tshad ma lkog gyur don shes yin //
T11TD4221.1E:44a-15: de grub byed kyang med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:44a-16: nan tan byed pa yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:44a-17: zhes ni kha cig rab tu brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:44a-18: re zhig thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pa nyid thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ba gang yin de'i lkog tu gyur pa'i don shes pa la rgyu ci yod /
T11TD4221.1E:44a-19: gang rjes su bsgrubs pas thams cad rig par 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i rgyu ni 'ga' yang rtogs pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:44a-20: sngags dang rgyud la sogs pa ni phal cher gzhung thams cad la yod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:44a-21: de nges pa'i rgyu yang yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:44a-22: phyogs gcig mi slu ba ni tshig thams cad kyang yin pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:44a-23: lkog tu gyur pa'i don thams cad mngon du byed pa srid pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:44a-24: dbang po'i shes pa ni nye bar gnas pa'i yul can nyid du mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:44a-25: don dang dbang po khyad med kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:44a-27: dbang don khyad par med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:44a-28: thams cad thams cad shes par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:44a-29: mi gtsang la sogs ro myang dang //
T11TD4221.1E:44a-30: 'brel pa bzlog par dka' ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:44a-31: dbang po phrad nas 'dzin pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:44a-32: thams cad rig pa ci ltar brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:44a-33: de yi yid kyi rnam shes kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:44a-34: dbang po'i rjes su mi 'jug min //
T11TD4221.1E:44a-35: yid kyi shes pa rang dbang ni//
T11TD4221.1E:44a-36: 'gas kyang mthong ba yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:44a-37: goms pas gsal yin de yis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:44a-38: yul du thams cad 'gyur ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:44a-39: lung la brten pa yin na 'di //
T11TD4221.1E:44a-41: dngos po thams cad rjes dpag gis //
T11TD4221.1E:44a-42: grub par rtogs pa yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-0: des na yul kun sgom @44b med pas //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-1: ji ltar thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-2: bstan bcos la sogs goms pa las //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-3: bstan bcos sogs nyid rtogs la rag / de yi thams cad rig pa go //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-5: de yi shes bya shes med par //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-6: kun shes zhes bya'i rnam shes ni //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-7: gang las de yi shes bya ba //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-8: shes na'ang de nyid kun rig 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-9: gang zhig chags sogs dang bral zhing //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-10: de bzhin rnam rtog dang bral des //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-11: bstan par byas zhes bya ba de //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-12: de ni g-yar po'i rgyan dang 'dra //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-14: thog mtha' med par rim gyis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-15: so so re rer rtogs par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-16: bskal pa'i bar du'ang nus ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-17: phyogs gcig yongs su shes pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-18: su la med ces bya ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-19: skyes bu mang du rtog pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-20: bden don can cig med ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-21: khyad par dang ldan mthong ba gang //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-22: de ni de tsam nyid gnas pas //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-23: khyad par cung zad shes 'gyur gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-24: shin tu dbang 'das don rig min //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-25: phyogs gcig de nyid shes pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-26: thams cad mkhyen par 'thad min te //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-28: bya rog ta la'i tshul du 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-29: cig car thams cad rnam shes na //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-30: ji ltar 'khor ba thog med nyid//
T11TD4221.1E:44b-31: shes pa gang du yongs rdzogs pa //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-32: de nyid 'dir ni thog mar brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-33: 'di la brjod pa thams cad rig pa zhes bya ba tshad ma gzhan ni 'dod pa ma yin gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-34: 'on kyang slu bar byed pa ma yin pa mngon par 'dod pa bsgrub pa nus par gyur pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-36: mi shes ston par byed pa la ;
T11TD4221.1E:44b-37: /'khrul par dogs pa can rnams kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-38: de bshad nan tan bya ba'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-39: shes ldan 'ga' zhig tshol bar byed //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-40: gzhan rjes su sgrub par 'dod pas gzhan shes pa'i nye bar ston pa po tshol bar mi byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-41: de nges kyang mngon par 'dod pa la slu ba srid pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-42: 'on te der yang de'i shes pa yod pa nyid do zhes nges pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:44b-44: thams cad du shes pa la shes pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-45: de'i phyir de nyid des shes par bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:44b-46: gal te des shes so zhes shes na ni de'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:45a-0: mi shes pa nye bar ston par byed pa la slu bar dogs pa @45a * //
T11TD4221.1E:45a-1: can gyi mi shes bdag gis /
T11TD4221.1E:45a-2: de'i yul can gyi shes pa shes pas na 'di tshad ma nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:45a-3: gzhan la yang de'i ye shes srid par bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:45a-4: skyes bu'i don gyi gtso bo shes pa dang tshad mas yongs su dag pa'i thams cad kyi de kho na shes pa gang yin pa de nyid tshad ma yin pas 'di de tsam gyis nye bar bstan par bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:45a-5: lhag ma thams cad ni nye bar bstan par bya ba thams cad la mtshungs pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:45a-6: de yang gang la sred ce na //
T11TD4221.1E:45a-7: gang gis nye bar bstan pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:45a-8: gang zhig tshad mas mthong ba'i skyes bu'i don gyi gtso bo mi skyes bu'i don gyi gtso bo mi smra ba'i gzhan nyid smra ba smra ba'i gzhan nyid smra ba gang yin pa de dag ni tshad ma ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:45a-9: de la yang mi shes pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:45a-10: ji ltar nye bar ston ce rna /
T11TD4221.1E:45a-11: gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thog ma med pa las te //
T11TD4221.1E:45a-12: med pa pa'i nye bar bstan pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:45a-13: 'o na thams cad yongs su mi shes na//
T11TD4221.1E:45a-14: thams cad la dogs pa skye ba'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:45a-15: gzhan yang yongs su mi shes so zhes dogs par bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:45a-16: des na thams cad shes pa med na ji ltar 'di la yang yongs su shes pa yod par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:45a-17: nye bar bstan pa ni nye bar bstan pa brgyud pa las yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:45a-19: tshad ma med pa'i dngos po la //
T11TD4221.1E:45a-20: nye bar bstan pa brgyud par gsal //
T11TD4221.1E:45a-21: nye bar bstan pa brgyad pa de //
T11TD4221.1E:45a-22: tshad ma can la yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:45a-23: tshad ma med pa rtag pa nyid la sogs pa la nye bar bstan pa bstan pa brgyad pa las rten gzhan yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:45a-24: tshad mas dngos po yongs su bcad pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:45a-25: ci ltar de la ma shes pa yin par dogs //
T11TD4221.1E:45a-26: dogs su chud pa de lta na yang de la gdon me za bar 'jug par 'gyur ba yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:45a-27: tshad mas nges pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:45a-28: 'on te tshad mas mthong ba yin yang /
T11TD4221.1E:45a-29: mngon du byed par ma nges so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:45a-31: gang gis tshad mthong ston pa yang //
T11TD4221.1E:45a-33: skyes na mu stegs dag la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:45a-34: brjod pa nyid kyang ci zhig yod //
T11TD4221.1E:45a-35: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshad mas mthong ba gsung ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:45b-0: de la yang dogs pa gang yin pa de gang dag la yongs @45b su shes pa rjes su 'jug pa med pa'i mu stegs pa dag la rtsir yang ci yod /
T11TD4221.1E:45b-1: de'i phyir tshad mas mthong pa'i don gsung ba'i phyir na /
T11TD4221.1E:45b-2: bcom ldan 'das ni tshad ma nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:45b-3: mtho ris dang ni byang grol lam //
T11TD4221.1E:45b-4: rig byed mi yi tshad ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:45b-5: yongs su shes med gzhan la yang//
T11TD4221.1E:45b-6: de yi de ni srid pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:45b-7: de phyir de yi ye shes ni //
T11TD4221.1E:45b-8: nan tan bya rtogs rnam dpyad bya'i //
T11TD4221.1E:45b-9: de yi srin bu'i grangs mkhyen pa //
T11TD4221.1E:45b-10: ded la 'gar yang nyer mkho med //
T11TD4221.1E:45b-13: 'ba' zhig dgag par bya ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:45b-14: pha rol bos bkag gzhan kun ni //
T11TD4221.1E:45b-15: gang gis zlog par byed pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:45b-16: gal te phyogs gcig mkhyen pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:45b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rig pa yin no zhes brtag par bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:45b-18: me ni kha ba'i gnyen po yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa mi slu ba las gzhan yang 'gyur ba'i phyir thug pa med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:45b-19: de ltar gyur pa yang ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:45b-20: phan tshun 'gal bas rjes su sgrub par mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:45b-22: blang dang dor bya'i de nyid ni //
T11TD4221.1E:45b-23: thabs dang bcas par rig mdzad pa //
T11TD4221.1E:45b-24: gang tshe tshad ma nyid 'dod kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:45b-25: thams cad rig mdzad ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:45b-26: gang gi phyir skyes bu'i don ni mtshan nyid phyogs gcig rig par byed pa yin zhes te /
T11TD4221.1E:45b-27: de tsam gyis ni de thams cad thams cad rig par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:45b-28: skyes bu'i don gyi cha rig pa ni 'ga' la mang mi srid pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:45b-29: de la blang bya dang dor bya'i de nyid sdug bsngal dang /
T11TD4221.1E:45b-31: thams kyi de nyid ni sdug bsngal dang 'gog pa'i bden pa de dag nyid kyi rgyu gun 'byung dang lam gyi bden pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:45b-32: des na 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i mtshan nyid de kho na nyid rig par mdzad pa dang //
T11TD4221.1E:45b-33: tshad mas grub pa rig par mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni tshad ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T11TD4221.1E:45b-35: yang tshad mas gcod par srid pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:45b-36: bud med dang dmangs rigs ngo mtshar skyed pa gzhan yang bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung la med pa ma yin no /
T11TD4221.1E:45b-37: de'i phyir skyes bu'i don gyi gtso bo rig par mdzad pa nyid tshad ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:46a-3: ring po mthong ngam min yang rung //
T11TD4221.1E:46a-4: 'dod pa'i de nyid mthong ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:46a-5: gal te ring mthong tshad yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:46a-6: tshur shog bya rgod bstan par gyis //
T11TD4221.1E:46a-7: ring por mthong ba yod do zhes bya ba tsam gyis ni thams cad rig par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:46a-8: gal te de lta yin na ni bya rgod la sogs pa yang de yin pas na tshur shog bya rgod dang ring por thos pa'i phag bsten pa bdag gir gyis shig / de lta na rigs pa'i lam thams cad dor ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:46a-9: 'on te 'di'i skyes bu'i don gyi mkhyen pa btsal bar bya ba ci don mtha' dag mkhyen pa mi srid pa'am /
T11TD4221.1E:46a-10: gcig tu don med pa nyid yin nam zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:46a-11: de ni yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:46a-12: thams cad rig par mdzad pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:46a-13: thams cad mkhyen pa 'gog pa min //
T11TD4221.1E:46a-14: nged kyis shes par mi nus pas //
T11TD4221.1E:46a-15: chog shes par ni 'dod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:46a-16: thams cad shes pa ma yin bas ni thams cad mkhyen pa shes pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:46a-19: thams cad shes so zhes bya 'di //
T11TD4221.1E:46a-20: de yi shes bya'i shes las 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:46a-21: de yi phyogs gcig rnam shes pa //
T11TD4221.1E:46a-22: de shes nyid las 'grub pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:46a-23: bud med dang dmangs rigs dang thun mong ba shing la sogs pa shes pa yang gzhan gyis shes pa'am ma yin zhes de shes pa nyid las 'dod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:46a-24: rang nyid kyis ma shes na ni de 'dis shes so zhes bya ba'i thabs yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:46a-25: gzigs pa ring du song ba'i chen po gang yin pa de dag ni /
T11TD4221.1E:46a-26: mtha' dag mkhyen pa srid pa ni phyogs gcig yongs su shes pa sngon du 'gro ba can nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:46a-27: de dag gi de nyid srid pa de yang de las gzhan gyis yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:46a-28: 'on te gnyi ga'i mtshan nyid kyi tshad ma la yang sgrub pa gang las yin zhing rgyu yang gang yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:46a-30: sgrub byed thugs rje goms las te //
T11TD4221.1E:46a-31: blo lus la ni brten pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:46a-32: tshad ma de'i sgrub byed gang las yin zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:46a-33: thugs rje goms pa las yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:46a-34: thugs rje de yang blo'i lus la brten pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:46a-35: thugs rje de ni goms pa'i yan lag dang bcas par blo'i lus gang yin pa de la bsten pa'i phyir rtogs par rab kyi mthar sgrub par byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:46b-0: gal @46b te thugs rje yod du chug pa de lta na yang de las tshad ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las srid pa yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:46b-1: srid pa yod pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:46b-3: pha rol sdug bsngal de bzhin du //
T11TD4221.1E:46b-4: sdug bsngal rgyu dang bral 'dod gang //
T11TD4221.1E:46b-5: de brtse des na des ldan pa //
T11TD4221.1E:46b-6: de yi thabs ni sgrub par 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:46b-7: gzhan yang sdug bsngal dang bral bar 'dod pa ni gdon mi za bar de'i thabs tshol ba yin no zhes phyis ston par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:46b-8: yang na sgrub byed thugs rje /
T11TD4221.1E:46b-9: thugs rje dang ldan pa ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:46b-10: des na gzhan gyi don ston pas tshad ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:46b-11: thugs brtse ba dang ldan pa ni thabs la 'jug pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:46b-12: thabs de yang rang nyid tshad mar sgrub pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:46b-13: thams ca skyob par 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid kyis thugs rje de nyid gang las 'byung ba yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:46b-16: snying rje ni bdag gi ba rnams la sdug bsngal mthong bas bag chags sang pa las skye la /
T11TD4221.1E:46b-17: goms pa las ni tha mal pa dang dgra bo'i phyogs dag la 'jug pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:46b-18: des na thams cad shes pa ma yin na thams cad skyob pa mi srid pa'i phyir de'i thabs goms pa sgrub par byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:46b-19: gal te blo dang ldan pa'i blo ni lus la brten pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:46b-20: thugs rje yang blo nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:46b-21: des na de yang lus la brten pa nyid de //
T11TD4221.1E:46b-22: de'i phyir lus thal bar gyur pa la sogs pa na goms pa mi 'grub bo //
T11TD4221.1E:46b-23: gal te skye ba gzhan yod na ni de'i tshe skye ba du mar goms pa bsags pa las mngon par 'dod pa 'grub pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:46b-25: blo ni lus kyi bdag nyid dang //
T11TD4221.1E:46b-26: lus 'bras lus kyi yon tan yin //
T11TD4221.1E:46b-27: 'dir ni lugs gsum la brten te //
T11TD4221.1E:46b-28: goms pa srid pa yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:46b-30: blo ni lus la brten pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:46b-31: goms pa grub pa med ce na //
T11TD4221.1E:46b-32: ma yin rten ni bkag phyir ro//
T11TD4221.1E:46b-33: snga ma'i rjes su 'gro ba'i bral ba'i blo dang bral ba'i lus 'ba' zhig blo'i rten yin pa bkag pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:46b-34: 'bras bu nyid dam yon tan nyid dam gzhan du yin yang rung ste /
T11TD4221.1E:46b-35: lus 'ba' zhig ni rten du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:47a-0: gal te pha ma'i lus la brten pa mthong ba'i phyir blo lus la brten pa @47a * //
T11TD4221.1E:47a-1: dang lus kyi 'bras bur dmigs pa yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:47a-2: 'di ltar bskyed par bya ba'i lus kyi 'byung ba chen po la brten pa /
T11TD4221.1E:47a-3: de'i rang bzhin gyi kun tu spyod pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:47a-4: sems gsal ba la sogs pa pha ma'i rjes su 'gro ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:47a-5: ri mo la sogs pa bzhin no /
T11TD4221.1E:47a-6: ri mo byed pa'i gzugs shes pa la sogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba can rtsig pa la brten pa dang ri mo ni ri mo byed pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:47a-7: des na ri mo ni rtsig pa med par mi gnas la /
T11TD4221.1E:47a-8: rtsig pa gzhan du yang mi 'pho /
T11TD4221.1E:47a-9: rtsig pa gzhan las 'ongs pa yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:47a-10: yang na aa mra'i 'bras bu la sogs pa smin pa las byung ba'i gzugs bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:47a-11: 'bras bu yang du ba me gzhan las ma 'ongs me gzhan du 'gro ba yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:47a-12: chang la brten pa'i myos pa'i nus pa ni bska ba la sogs pa'i ro dang 'brel pa las snga na med pa 'byung ba yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:47a-13: 'jig pa na yang chang gzhan la brten pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:47a-14: de bzhin du dbang po dang sems pa'i khyad par yang yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:47a-15: de skad du bshad pa yang /
T11TD4221.1E:47a-16: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung //
T11TD4221.1E:47a-17: zhes bya ba ni de nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:47a-18: sa la sogs pa nyid de nyid yin pa dang sa la sogs pa ni de nyid yin pa dang sa la sogs pa ni de nyid yin pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:47a-19: nam mkha' la sogs pa ni ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:47a-20: skad cig nyid la sogs pa yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:47a-21: de bzhin du de nyid yin gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:47a-22: rnam par shes pa tsam ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:47a-23: thams cad stong pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:47a-24: thams cad la tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro zhes so //
T11TD4221.1E:47a-25: de'i tshogs la lus dang dbang po dang yul gyi ming du 'dogs so //
T11TD4221.1E:47a-26: tshad med pa yongs su 'gyur ba'i khyad par 'byung ba chen po nyid kyi tshogs ni lus la sogs pa'i tha snyad kyi yul yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:47a-27: lus dang dbang po dang blo de dag las ni sems pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:47a-28: dper na phabs la sogs pa las myos pa'i nus pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:47a-29: des na rnam par shes pa ni myos pa'i nus pa bzhin te /
T11TD4221.1E:47a-30: 'jig rten pha rol nas 'ongs nas mtshams sbyor ba ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:47a-31: myos pa'i nus pa bzhin no zhes bya ba yang nye bar mtshon pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:47a-32: ri mo bzhin dang du ba bzhin no zhes bya ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:47a-33: de dag ni 'pho bar mthong ba med do zhe na de ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:47b-0: @47b gzugs sogs las ni tha dad par //
T11TD4221.1E:47b-1: 'byung ba dmigs par ga la yod //
T11TD4221.1E:47b-2: de dag kyang lnga de yi phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:47b-3: grangs nges gzung ba rigs ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:47b-4: gzugs dang ro dang dri dang sgra dang reg pa ste /
T11TD4221.1E:47b-5: 'byung ba chen po ni lnga yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:47b-6: sa la sogs pa'i ming ni de'i tshogs la yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:47b-7: sa la sogs pa gzhan du dmigs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:47b-8: 'on te ro ni reg pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:47b-9: yongs su gyur pa bzhin yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:47b-10: de lta na yang sa la sogs pa zhes mi 'thad de /
T11TD4221.1E:47b-11: gzugs la sogs pa zhes brjod par bya bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:47b-12: skad cig ma nyid la sogs pa'i sgrub pa ni phyis 'byung bar 'gyur bas de mi dgod do //
T11TD4221.1E:47b-14: thams cad blta bya ba blta bya zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:47b-15: gcig nyid du ni thal bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:47b-16: rnam pa dag gis dbye bas ni //
T11TD4221.1E:47b-17: mtha' yas par ni thal ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:47b-18: de phyir rten lnga'i gzung ba ni //
T11TD4221.1E:47b-19: rnam pa lngar ni bsnyad par bya //
T11TD4221.1E:47b-20: de yi nang gi bye brag ni //
T11TD4221.1E:47b-21: lnga la gnod pa med pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:47b-22: thams cad stong la gang brjod pa //
T11TD4221.1E:47b-23: tshad ma yod na stong nyid min //
T11TD4221.1E:47b-24: gal te stong nyid chad pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:47b-26: thams cad stong nyid ci 'dra dang //
T11TD4221.1E:47b-27: de la tshad ma'i ci 'dra ba'ang //
T11TD4221.1E:47b-28: phyi nas bstan par bya ba ste //
T11TD4221.1E:47b-29: myur ba nyid ni gang du dgos //
T11TD4221.1E:47b-30: gal te dbang po la sogs pa ni pha ma'i lus kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa yin la lus ni 'byung ba chen po'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir de la brten pa nyid ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:47b-31: gzhan du 'jig rten pha rol nas 'ongs pa nyid du dmigs pa ni ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:47b-32: de ji ltar 'jig rten pha rol yod par smra ba la sogs pa yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:47b-34: skye ba yongs su len pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:47b-35: 'byung rngub dbang po blo dag ni //
T11TD4221.1E:47b-36: rang gi rigs la ltos med can //
T11TD4221.1E:47b-37: lus med 'ba' zhig las skyes min //
T11TD4221.1E:47b-39: 'byung rngub la sogs pa ni g-yo ba la sogs pas byas pa'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par las rang gi rigs la ltos pa med par mi 'thad do //
T11TD4221.1E:47b-40: g-yo ba la sogs pa yang bdag nyid kyi goms pa'i rjes su 'gro ba can yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:47b-41: pha ma'i goms pa'i rjes su 'gro ba ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:48a-0: de lta ma yin na dam pa ma yin dang 'brel pa la @48a * //
T11TD4221.1E:48a-1: sogs pas pha ma'i rang bzhin med par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:48a-2: de'i phyir rang gi rigs la ltos pa med par pha ma'i lus tsam las 'byung ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:48a-3: gal te 'dod pa la sogs pa pha ma'i rang bzhin sngar yod pa de'i tshe pha ma'i lus la sogs pa yang rgyu yin no zhes mi 'thad do//
T11TD4221.1E:48a-4: 'on te 'jig rten gzhan la ltos pa med pa kho nar skye ba 'dzin par khas len na de'i tshe skye ba yongs su 'dzin par khas len pa la ha cang thal bar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:48a-5: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po thams cad 'jig pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:48a-6: de yang tshad mas yongs su bcad pas nges par gzung ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:48a-7: gal te 'byung rngub la sogs pa //
T11TD4221.1E:48a-8: thams cad goms pa sngon 'gro na //
T11TD4221.1E:48a-9: rang gi goms pa dang bral bar //
T11TD4221.1E:48a-10: rten med par ni ci ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:48a-12: rgyu spangs nas gzhan du 'byung ba ma yin pa gang yin pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:48a-14: de de'i bskyed bya ma yin te /
