T11TD4221.1E:80a-29: 'on te reg pa de ni rlung gis brdabs pa'i rma nyid des dmigs pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:80b-0: rma @80b las reg pa gzhan la yang 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:80b-1: reg bzhin pa'i rang bzhin ni gzhan gyis mi dmigs so zhes mi 'thad de /
T11TD4221.1E:80b-3: reg pa yi ni rang bzhin gang //
T11TD4221.1E:80b-4: de ni reg pas reg min na //
T11TD4221.1E:80b-5: des gzhan rang bzhin rig pa las //
T11TD4221.1E:80b-6: de rig ces par ci ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:80b-7: de'i rang bzhin ni dbang po nyams pa med pas mi rig pa rig pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:80b-8: de lta yin na ni rang rig pa nyid de rang rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni de yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:80b-9: bde ba 'am sdug bsngal dang 'dod chags la sogs pa ni rang rig pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir rnam par shes pa 'byung ba chen po las gzhan yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:80b-10: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa lus dang lhan cig rten dang brten pa'i dngos por yang mi 'thad do //
T11TD4221.1E:80b-11: 'o na ji ltar nga'i lag par tshor ro //
T11TD4221.1E:80b-12: rkang par tshor ro zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:80b-13: lag pa rnam par 'gyur ba'i dus na de 'gyur ba'i phyir de ltar 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no /
T11TD4221.1E:80b-14: lag pa la sogs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba dang lhan cig rgyu ba'i phyir de ltar tha snyad byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:80b-16: rang rig rang bzhin tsam nyid las //
T11TD4221.1E:80b-17: rten dang brten pa gnas pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:80b-18: rang bzhin tsam la gnas pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:80b-19: rten dang brten la sogs rtogs min //
T11TD4221.1E:80b-20: rang bzhin tsam rig pa la ji ltar rten dang brten pa rtogs pa srid /
T11TD4221.1E:80b-21: gnyis rtogs na ni de ltar 'gyur ba yin gyi der yang de ltar 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:80b-22: bag chags tsam gyis byas pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:80b-23: rnam par rtog pa tsam gyi yin //
T11TD4221.1E:80b-24: 'byung ba chen po nyid ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:80b-25: de'i phyir blo ni lus dang tha mi dad pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:80b-26: des pha ma las skyes pa ma yin gyi rang gi rgyud snga ma las 'byung ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:80b-27: 'o na gal te 'byung ba chen po tsam las byung ba ma yin gyi srog chags rnams skye ba gzhan las mang la la sogs pa'i gnas su 'ongs pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:80b-28: de'i phyir mi gtsang ba'i yul du 'ong ba mi rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:80b-29: rtog pa dang ldan pa ni de ltar 'gyur bar rig pa ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:80b-30: dbang phyug gis bskul ba yang mi 'dod do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:80b-32: bdag la chags pa dang ldan pa //
T11TD4221.1E:80b-33: sems can gzhan gyis bkri min par //
T11TD4221.1E:80b-34: bde sdug ngor thob 'dod pas na //
T11TD4221.1E:80b-35: dman pa'i gnas ni yongs su len //
T11TD4221.1E:80b-36: sdug bsngal phyin ci log blo dang//
T11TD4221.1E:81a-0: @81a * // srid pa kun nas 'ching ba ni //
T11TD4221.1E:81a-1: skye dgu gang la de med pa //
T11TD4221.1E:81a-2: de ni skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:81a-4: gal te rtog pa dang ldan pa yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:81a-5: rang las rang gi ngo bo rtogs kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:81a-6: thob par bya ba ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:81a-7: des na 'gas kyang grong la sogs pa 'gar yang 'jug par bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:81a-8: des na gdod ma nas zhi ba'i phyir 'khor ba nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:81a-9: 'on te grong la sogs par 'gro ba rtogs pa dang mi ldan pas /
T11TD4221.1E:81a-10: rnam pa ji zhig ltar 'gyur ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:81a-11: de lta yin na mngal la sogs pa'i yul du ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:81a-12: bdag la chags pas bskul ba ni dman pa yang phyin ci log pas blang byar 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:81a-13: de 'dra ba de ni las kyi nus pa nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:81a-14: gang gi rang dbang du 'gyur ba sems can gzhan gyis bkris bar bya ba ma yin pa de ltar 'gro ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:81a-15: bde ba dang sdug bsngal thob pa dang 'dor bar 'dod pas ni dman pa'i gnas kyang yongs su len pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:81a-16: thos pa po smad 'tshong ma'i khang par 'jug pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:81a-17: 'on te 'di dbang phyug gis bskul ba nyid de ma yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:81a-18: rang nyid 'khrul pas srid pa'i phyir dbang phyug rtogs pa ni legs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:81a-19: dbang phyug gis bskul ba ni dmigs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:81a-20: dbang phyug ji ltar rtogs pa ma yin pa de ltar yang bstan zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:81a-21: bdag la chags pa nyid dbang phyug yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:81a-22: de ni skul bar byed pa nyid du dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:81a-23: 'on te ji ltar bran la sogs pa gzhan gyis bskul ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gzhan du yang yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:81a-25: nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:81a-26: bdag la sred pa dang ldan pa nyid bskul ba yin gyi thams cad ni ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:81a-27: de yang sred pa dang ldan pa gzhan gyis bskul ba yin gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pas ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:81a-28: de la bsnyen pa byas pas 'gro ba thob par byas pa'i phyir du skul byed yin no zhe na ;
T11TD4221.1E:81a-29: mu stegs byed thams cad dbang phyug thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:81a-30: de'i phyir blo phyin ci log tu gyur pa nyid sdug bsngal ba la yang bde bar 'du shes pas mngal gyi gnas sam /
T11TD4221.1E:81b-0: des na phyin ci log gi blo dang sred pa dag las skye ba yin pas gang la de med @81b pa de ni skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:81b-1: de la ni dbang phyug gis skye ba sbyin par mi nus so //
T11TD4221.1E:81b-3: de ltar khas mi len te /
T11TD4221.1E:81b-4: gal te gang la nad med pa'i sgrub par byed pa'i las med pa de la ni sman pas ci yang byar med do //
T11TD4221.1E:81b-5: gang la nad med pa'i sgrub pa'i las nyams pa med pa de la yang don med pa nyid pas mi nus pa dang mi dgos pas sman pa med do zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:81b-7: sman ni don med pa nyid dang //
T11TD4221.1E:81b-8: 'gar yang nus med de bzhin ci //
T11TD4221.1E:81b-9: de nyid dbang phyug la 'dod dam //
T11TD4221.1E:81b-10: de ltar na de dbang phyug min //
T11TD4221.1E:81b-11: dbang phyug gis 'ga' zhig ni 'khor bar bskul la /
T11TD4221.1E:81b-12: 'ga' zhig ni ma yin no zhes dbang phyug smra bas /
T11TD4221.1E:81b-13: khas blangs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:81b-14: 'on te bsnyen pa yang 'gro ba thob pa nye bar mkho ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:81b-15: de ltar yin na sbyin pa po bsnyen pas yang yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:81b-16: de ni mu stegs byed thams cad yin pa'i phyir dbang phyug dang dbang phyug ma yin pa dag la rnam par dbye ba ci zhig yod /
T11TD4221.1E:81b-17: de'i phyir ma rig pa dang sred pa nyid skye ba la nus pa nyid yod pa yin gyi dbang phyug ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:81b-18: gal te 'o na skye ba gzhan la ltos nas 'gro ba dang 'ong ba yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:81b-19: de'i phyir de dag dmigs par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:81b-20: de ltar ni dmigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:81b-21: de dag ni med pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:81b-24: dbang po mi gsal phyir mi mthong //
T11TD4221.1E:81b-25: dper na mig mi gsal ba yis //
T11TD4221.1E:81b-26: du ba chung du mi mthong bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:81b-27: gal te 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dag ma mthong ba de lta na yang de dag med pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:81b-28: dbang po rnams mi gsal ba las kyang mi mthong ste /
T11TD4221.1E:81b-29: med pa 'ba' zhig las ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:81b-30: med pa nyid mi mthong ba ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:81b-31: mig mi gsal bas du ba phra ba rtogs pa'i yul du 'gyur ba ma yin mod kyi de lta na yod pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:81b-32: srid pa bar ma do yi lus //
T11TD4221.1E:81b-33: shin tu dang phyir dmigs ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:81b-35: ma mthong ba las med pa'ang min //
T11TD4221.1E:81b-36: srid pa bar mdo'i lus ni las kyi nus pa las shin tu dang ba nyid du skyes pas rnal 'byor tsam gyis rtogs par bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:81b-37: rmi lam gyi lus gzhan du dmigs pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:81b-38: de tsam gyis de med pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:82a-1: lam gyi lus ni phyin ci log yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:82a-2: ma yin te don bya ba byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan zin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:82a-4: lus can yin yang pra ba'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:82a-5: 'ga' zhig la lar thogs med de //
T11TD4221.1E:82a-6: chu bzhin gser la dngul chu bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:82a-7: ma yin ma mthong phyir med pa //
T11TD4221.1E:82a-8: lus can ma yin pa'i phyir rmi lam gyi lus bzhin du thogs pa med pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:82a-9: lus can nyid yin yang 'ga' zhig la lar thogs pa med pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:82a-10: bum pa la sogs par chu bzhin dang /
T11TD4221.1E:82a-11: shel la sogs pa la 'od bzhin dang /
T11TD4221.1E:82a-12: gser dang dngul chu bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:82a-13: yang na chu bzhin dang gser la dngul chu bzhin du yod pa nyid ma mthong ba ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:82a-14: 'on kyang mthong ba'i phyir srid pa bar ma do'i lus ni med pa nyid kyang yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:82a-16: 'bru yi rgyun dang chos mthun phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:82a-18: bar du yongs su brtags pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:82a-20: bar du 'byung ba gang yin pa //
T11TD4221.1E:82a-21: de ltar 'dir ni ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:82a-22: yul dang dus dag gi chod pa'i skye ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:82a-23: 'di ltar 'ga' zhig ni grong du 'gro ba la sogs pas rgyun ma chad par ka n+ya kub dza la sogs par 'gro bar dmigs pa la 'ga' zhig ni 'di na 'dug pa nyid dus gcig gi tshe kho nar bdag nyid yul gzhan na gnas par rmi lam du dmigs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:82a-24: de bzhin du 'gro ba'i yul du yang yin pas khyad par med do //
T11TD4221.1E:82a-25: rmi lam mi bden zhes te bsgrub par bya ba gzhan yang mi bden par ni mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:82a-26: thams cad kyis mtshungs pa'i dpe ni ma mthong ngo//
T11TD4221.1E:82a-27: skye ba gzhan ni bag chags brtan pa'i phyir bden par 'gyur gyi rmi lam ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:82a-29: gal te snang ba gzhan thob pas //
T11TD4221.1E:82a-30: rmi lam mi bden nyid yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:82a-31: des na skye ba gzhan pa yang //
T11TD4221.1E:82a-32: bden min zhes min zhes ni mi 'dod dam //
T11TD4221.1E:82a-33: gal te sad pa'i shes pa'i mtshan nyid snang ba gzhan 'byung ba'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:82a-34: rmi lam gyi rtogs pa mi bden pa nyid yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:82a-35: sad pa'i rtogs pa mi bden pa nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:82a-36: bzlog pa'i rmi lam gyi shes pa snang ba gzhan gyi mtshan nyid skye ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:82a-37: bzlog pa nyid du ni khyad par yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:82a-38: 'on te rmi lam gyi bum pa la sogs pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:82b-0: de'i @82b phyir rgyu med par glo bur nyid du dmigs pa yin pa des na khyad par yod do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:82b-1: sad pa'i bum pa la sogs kyang /
T11TD4221.1E:82b-2: glo bur nyid du dmigs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:82b-3: rmi lam du yang shing rta sogs //
T11TD4221.1E:82b-4: tshogs pa las ni 'byung bar mthong //
T11TD4221.1E:82b-5: sad pa'i gnas skabs su yang rnal 'byor pas sprul pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:82b-6: ri la sogs pa'i rgyu ba dag ni glo bur du dmigs pa'i spyod yul du 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:82b-7: de dag ni sngar yod pa nyid dmigs pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:82b-8: de la rgyu ba'i khyad par ni tshogs pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:82b-10: rmi lam la yang sngar yod nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:82b-11: gang gi zlog par byed pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:82b-12: gzhan gyis mi dmigs phyir zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:82b-13: ri la sogs la'ang de mtshungs so //
T11TD4221.1E:82b-14: gal te ri la sogs pa sngar yod pa nyid sad pas 'ga' zhig tu dmigs pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:82b-15: rmi lam du gnas pas kyang de ltar yin par ji ste khas mi len sad pa gzhan gyis de dag ma dmigs pa'i phyir med pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:82b-16: sad par dmigs pa rnams kyang rmi lam gyi rtogs pas mi dmigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:82b-17: ji ltar rgyu ba'i tshogs pa las de dag dmigs pa de bzhin du rmi lam gyi gnas skabs gzhan yod pas bum pa la sogs pa glo bur yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:82b-18: sad pa'i gnas skabs zhes bya ba yang ci ltar 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:82b-19: sad par rtogs pa skye ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:82b-20: rmi lam du yang sad pa'i blo //
T11TD4221.1E:82b-21: 'ga' la yod pa min nam ci //
T11TD4221.1E:82b-22: mig 'byed la sogs bya ba kun //
T11TD4221.1E:82b-23: de yang yod phyir mtshungs pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:82b-25: nga ni gnyid ma log go snyam pa'i rtogs pa dang 'gro ba la sogs pa ni rmi lam ngan yang yod pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:82b-26: des na de yang ji ltar gnyid log pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:82b-27: mi bden pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:82b-28: sad par 'dod pa'i gnas skabs su yang de ltar thal bar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:82b-29: phan tshun dmigs pa ma yin par ni gnyi ga la yang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:82b-30: 'on te 'di ni mi bden no zhes rtogs pa'i phyir rmi lam mi bden pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:82b-31: sad pa'i rtogs pa la yang de mtshungs pa'i phyir mi bden par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:82b-32: de ltar rtogs pa nyid kyis de nyid bden pa ni ma yin te de'i mtshan nyid kyis kyang de nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:82b-33: gzhan yang mi bden no snyam pa'i rtogs pa yang ci la dmigs pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:82b-34: bden las gzhan nam ci ste na //
T11TD4221.1E:83a-2: de yi rang bzhin dmigs pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:83a-3: gnyi ga shin tu 'thad pa dka' //
T11TD4221.1E:83a-4: de'i rang bzhin du dmigs pa nyid ni /
T11TD4221.1E:83a-5: de las gzhan no zhes 'thad pa ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:83a-6: de ma yin pa zhes bya bar yang mi 'thad de /
T11TD4221.1E:83a-8: de las gzhan pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:83a-9: de lta ma yin na de yang de las gzhan du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:83a-10: dmigs bzhin pa nyid ni med pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:83a-11: thams cad de ltar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:83a-12: 'on te rtogs pa 'di ni skyes pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:83a-13: skyes mod kyi 'di la dmigs pa med pa'i phyir ro don med pa nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:83a-14: 'di las don rnam par gnas pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:83a-15: gal te rmi lam du dmigs pa bum pa la sogs pa med pa nyid do snyam pa'i rtogs pa 'di ni brten pa dang mi slu ba can ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:83a-16: de ji ltar 'di dogs pa med pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:83a-18: bkrus ma thag tu gnyid sad pa //
T11TD4221.1E:83a-19: mod la 'khrus ma byas par snang //
T11TD4221.1E:83a-20: des na de ltar nyid du ni //
T11TD4221.1E:83a-21: mi slu ba na slu med 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:83a-24: rmi lam mthong ba chags pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:83a-25: gnas skabs mod la ldog pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:83a-26: de la slu med rmi lam dang //
T11TD4221.1E:83a-27: slar yang de ni mthong phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:83a-28: rmi lam cig shos rnam gzhag 'di //
T11TD4221.1E:83a-29: der yang grub pa yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:83a-30: bsgrub bya yin phyir bslu ba las //
T11TD4221.1E:83a-31: grub na phan tshun brten pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:83a-33: 'di ni med ces shes pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:83a-34: gzhan gyis rtogs par 'gyur ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:83a-35: 'di ni thun mong ma yin pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:83a-36: mtshan nyid rtogs pa tsam du zad /
T11TD4221.1E:83a-37: rtogs pa 'di dag ni de lta bur gyur pa thog ma med pa'i bag chags las byung ba'i phyir tha snyad pa rnams la skye ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:83a-38: khyad par gang gis she na /
T11TD4221.1E:83a-39: de la sems gtad pas sad pa'i bdag nyid du mngon par rlom pa can gyi dmigs pa'i ngo bor sad par mngon par rlom pa yang /
T11TD4221.1E:83a-40: bag chags kyi stobs nyid las nyal ba'i lus 'dor ba las so //
T11TD4221.1E:83a-41: 'di yang tha dad pa 'ba' zhig tu zad de /
T11TD4221.1E:83a-42: don dam par ni sad pa zhes bya ba yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:83a-43: rmi lam du yang de ltar rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:83a-44: 'on te rmi lam gyi shes pas sad pa dmigs pa dag la med do zhes rtog pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:83b-0: 'di ni ma @83b nges pa nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:83b-1: rjes su grub par de dag rnams //
T11TD4221.1E:83b-2: de yin med par rtogs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:83b-3: de dag 'gro ba la sogs kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:83b-4: gegs min de la grub pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:83b-5: 'gro ba la sogs pa gegs med par grub pa nyid kyis bya ba'i sgo nas /
T11TD4221.1E:83b-6: gtso bo'i med pa nyid rtogs pas rnam par rtog pas bsgrub par bya ba gzhan gyis ci zhig bya /
T11TD4221.1E:83b-7: rnam par rtog pa ni bden pa la yang mi bden pa nyid du rtogs par byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:83b-8: de lta ma yin na phan tshun 'gal ba rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:83b-9: de'i phyir mod la 'jig pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:83b-10: sad pa'i gnas skabs na rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir rmi lam du mthong ba dag pa la mi bden par mngon pa'i rlom pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:83b-11: de tsam gyis de bden par 'gyur ba yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:83b-12: de'i phyir rmi lam gyi yul la 'gro ba dang 'ong ba gzhan gyis ma mthong ba de lta na yang de dag yod pa nyid pas de ma mthong ba ni ma nges pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:83b-13: des na 'gro 'ong med par nges par mi nus so //
T11TD4221.1E:83b-14: yang na ni med pa nyid ces bstan pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:83b-16: rig pa lus las tha mi dad pa dang lus kyang rdul phra rab 'dus pa tsam yin na de'i tshe rdul phra rab ba mtha' dag so sor rig par thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:83b-18: yan lag can rags pa gcig nyid de ltar dmigs pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:83b-19: de lta na yang de rdul phra rab dag la gnas pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:83b-20: rdul phra rab la reg pas rdul phra rab dmigs par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:83b-21: 'on te de dag las reg pa skye ba yin gyi de dag la gnas pa ni ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:83b-22: de lta yin na de dag las zhes gang las rtogs /
T11TD4221.1E:83b-23: rang rig pa ni gzhan rig pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:83b-24: 'on te gzhan rig pa nyid yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:83b-25: rang rig pa ni ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:83b-26: 'o na ji ltar bde ba reg / gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid de ltar rig pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:83b-28: gzhan du 'gyur ba rig na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:83b-29: rig pa gzhan gang yin par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:83b-30: gang la rig pa zhes gnas pa //
T11TD4221.1E:83b-31: de nyid rig pa nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:83b-33: bde ba la sogs pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:83b-34: sngon po la sogs pa nyid rig pa yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:83b-35: gzhan ci zhig yod na gang zhig rig par byed pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:83b-38: bde dang sngo sogs ma gtogs pa //
T11TD4221.1E:83b-39: lus kyang gang zhig yin par 'dod//
T11TD4221.1E:84a-0: @84a * // de ni dmigs bya nyid yin pas //
T11TD4221.1E:84a-1: gang phyir dmigs byed nyid ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:84a-2: mig sogs de lta nyid yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:84a-3: bong rva cis na de lta min //
T11TD4221.1E:84a-4: de nus dngos na ma rtogs par //
T11TD4221.1E:84a-5: de ni ci lta de ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:84a-6: mig la sogs pa bong bu'i rva bzhin dmigs pa med pa ni dmigs pa yod pa'i dmigs par byed pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:84a-7: mig la sogs pa ni nus pa'i rang bzhin yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:84a-8: des na med pa'i rva bzhin ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:84a-9: nus pa yang ma dmigs par yod do zhes gang las yin /
T11TD4221.1E:84a-10: 'bras bu'i sgo nas de dmigs pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:84a-11: de dag gi 'bras bu gang yin ;
T11TD4221.1E:84a-12: bde ba la sogs pa dang gzugs la sogs pa dmigs pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:84a-13: de yang nus pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ma dmigs pa nyid ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:84a-14: lhag mar 'gyur ba gzugs la sogs pa de dag nyid yin par 'gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:84a-15: de dag ni rnam par shes pa'i nus pa'i 'bras bu ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:84a-16: mig la sogs pa 'bras bu nyid yin na ni sngar med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:84a-17: dmigs pa'i gnas skabs 'bras bu yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:84a-18: rdul phra rab so sor dmigs par thal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:84a-19: khyad par med par ni gnas skabs tha dad par yang mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:84a-20: khyad par yod na ni rang nyid rig par thal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:84a-21: nus pa dang lhan cig skyes pa nyid khyad par yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:84a-24: lhan cig nyid na nus dpog cing //
T11TD4221.1E:84a-25: rjes dpag las kyang der 'dod pas //
T11TD4221.1E:84a-26: phan tshun brten pa'i nyes pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:84a-27: ci ltar spong bar 'gyur ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:84a-28: dmigs pa nyid ni gzugs la sogs pa dag gi khyad par yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:84a-29: gal te dmigs pa de nus pa dang lhan cig pa nyid yin na ci ltar nus pa ma grub par lhan cig pa nyid grub /
T11TD4221.1E:84a-30: de ma grub na ci ltar nus pa rjes su dpag / de'i phyir rnam par shes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa dang bde ba la sogs pa tsam rang rig pa nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:84a-31: rnam par shes pa bde ba la sogs pa zhes gzhi mthun par rtogs pa skye ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:84a-32: gzhi mthun pa ni gtso bo dang /
T11TD4221.1E:84a-33: brtags pa'i dbye ba las gzhan med //
T11TD4221.1E:84a-34: skyes bu dbyug pa de bzhin du //
T11TD4221.1E:84a-35: skyes bu sems pa zhes bya bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:84a-36: gal te gtso bo ma yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:84b-0: skyes bu dbyig pa'o zhes @84b bya ba de ltar 'gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:84b-1: de ni 'dir rab tu ma grub pa nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:84b-2: gzugs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin las tha dad pa'i rnam par shes pa dmigs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:84b-3: dpe 'di nyid kyis rjes su dpog go zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:84b-4: ma yin te rjes su dpag pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:84b-5: grangs can pa rnams sems pa skyes bu zhes gtso bo'i gzhi mthun pa khas len pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:84b-6: de'i phyir gang ji ltar rig pa de de lta bu nyid du khas blang bar bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:84b-7: goms las de lta bur 'gyur ba'i //
T11TD4221.1E:84b-8: gzugs sogs la gnas rig pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:84b-9: gzugs sogs gzhan dang gzhan dag tu //
T11TD4221.1E:84b-11: / rnam par shes pa dmigs pa ma gtogs pa gzhan dang 'dre ba ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:84b-12: des na bde ba dang 'dres par byas pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:84b-13: gzugs la sogs pa dang 'dres par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:84b-14: gzugs la sogs pa dang 'dres par 'gyur ba ni goms pa las rtags kyi rnam pa thams cad bzung bas de'i rnam pa mtha' dag rtogs na gzhan gyi bde ba la sogs pa dang 'dre bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:84b-15: 'o na ji ltar gzugs la sogs pa dang gzhan gyi bde ba la sogs pa dag logs shig tu gnas pa dag tu dmigs sha na /
T11TD4221.1E:84b-17: rang gi ngo bor rig pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:84b-18: logs gnas mi gnas yod min te //
T11TD4221.1E:84b-19: 'di ni rten la ltos pa'i tha snyad 'ba' zhig yin par zad /
T11TD4221.1E:84b-20: rang gi ngo bo rig pa las ma gtogs pa bde ba la sogs pa dang gzugs la sogs pa'i rig pa rnam pa gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:84b-21: des na 'dis ni logs shig na gnas pa 'am gzhan yin no zhes bya ba'i rnam par dbye ba 'di ga la yod de /
T11TD4221.1E:84b-22: lus kyi rten la ltos nas 'di ni logs shig pa'am gzhan yin no zhes tha snyad pa'i rnam par dbye ba 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
T11TD4221.1E:84b-23: gal te ltos pa med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:84b-24: de yi rang bzhin rig min no //
T11TD4221.1E:84b-25: de yi rang bzhin rig pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:84b-26: ltos pa gzhan ni yod min na //
T11TD4221.1E:84b-27: de brten de phyir don dam du //
T11TD4221.1E:84b-28: rnam par dbye ba yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:84b-29: dbye ni kun rdzob 'ba' zhig ste //
T11TD4221.1E:84b-30: kun rdzob dpyad bzod nyid ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:84b-31: 'di nyid ni kun rdzob ces brjod de //
T11TD4221.1E:84b-32: rnam par dpyad na mi gnas pa gang yin pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:84b-35: 'di nyid ni kun rdzob ces brjod de //
T11TD4221.1E:84b-36: rnam par dpyad na mi gnas pa gang yin pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:84b-37: de lta ma yin na don dam pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:84b-38: de'i phyir ji ltar gzugs la sogs pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:85a-1: nus pa la sogs pa rnam par shes pa de'i bdag nyid kyis 'pho ba de bzhin du gzhan gyi khu khrag gis lus la yang yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:85a-3: gang la rnam par shes pa'i rten bya ba dang bcas par 'gyur ba zhes bya bar nus pa zhes bya ba rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gzhan ni yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:85a-4: 'on kyang de lta bur gyur pa de nyid rang rig pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:85a-5: rnam par shes pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:85a-6: 'o na ji ltar de'i bdag nyid kyis 'phongs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:85a-7: ka ba la sogs pa mi g-yo /
T11TD4221.1E:85a-8: rang gi lus bzhin du de yang g-yo bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:85a-10: de bdag skyes pa tsam gyis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:85a-11: g-yo bar 'gyur ba ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:85a-12: reg pa'i rnam shes khyad par can //
T11TD4221.1E:85a-13: rang bzhin skyes na de 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:85a-14: gang gi tshe reg pa'i rnam par shes pa rtsol ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin skyes na de'i tshe lus la sogs pa g-yo bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:85a-15: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa ni bzhugs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:85a-16: des na rdul phra rab so sor rig par thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:85a-17: khyed la yang ci'i phyir de ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:85a-18: de'i rnam pa can gyi rnam par shes pa gzhan skye ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:85a-19: kho bo cag gi yan lag can rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:85a-20: rdul phra rab dag ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:85a-22: rdul phra rab dag kyang de'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:85a-23: rdul phra rab dag ni tha dad par 'gyur ba nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:85a-24: 'o na ni med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:85a-26: phra rab rdul rnams lus kyi ni //
T11TD4221.1E:85a-27: ngo bo nyid du rnam par gnas //
T11TD4221.1E:85a-28: lus ni phra rab rdul rnams kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:85a-29: ngo bo nyid du rnam par gnas //
T11TD4221.1E:85a-30: 'on te lus kyi rdul phra rab dag rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:85a-32: rdul phra rab dag ni lus kyi ngo bo nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:85a-33: rig par bya ba nyid ma yin pas yul gyi ngo bo yang ma yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:85a-34: rdul phra rab dag ni med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:85a-35: de'i phyir yan lag can 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:85a-37: lag sogs g-yon thams cad dag / g-yo bar 'gyur phyir 'ga' ba can //
T11TD4221.1E:85a-38: las ni gcig la mi rung phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:85a-39: gzhan du tha dad grub par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:85b-0: @85b gcig bsgribs na ni thams cad dag / bsgribs par 'gyur ba'am ma bsgribs na //
T11TD4221.1E:85b-1: mthong 'gyur gcig tshon gyis bsgyur na //
T11TD4221.1E:85b-2: bsgyur ba 'am ma bsgyur rtogs par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:85b-3: yan lag can gyi rang bzhin gyi rdzas zhes bya ba ni bya ba can yon tan can ldan pa la sogs pa'i rgyu yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:85b-4: de la gal te bya ba yod na de'i tshe de'i du ba can gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir thams cad g-yo ba can nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:85b-5: yan lag can ni g-yo ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:85b-6: mi g-yo ba sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:85b-7: lha sbyin dang mchod sbyin la sogs pa'i gzugs g-yo ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yan lag can gcig yin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:85b-8: 'on te gcig nyid dang g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba nyid du mthong ba'i phyir 'gal ba ci yod ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:85b-9: gcig ces bya ba 'di ci yin /
T11TD4221.1E:85b-10: gal te snang ba tha dad pa ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:85b-12: 'on te 'phras bu gcig pa nyid yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:85b-13: gal te 'bras bu gcig nyid yin mod /
T11TD4221.1E:85b-14: rgyu yang gcig yin no zhes bya ba ga las /
T11TD4221.1E:85b-15: yan lag can bsgribs na thams cad bsgribs par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:85b-16: ldan pa khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:85b-17: yan lag bsgribs pa yin na yan lag can bsgribs pa ma yin pas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:85b-18: yan lag gi sgo nas bsgribs na /
T11TD4221.1E:85b-19: cung zad mi mtho 'ba' ma ril bar mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:85b-20: gcig yin yang ril ba lta bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:85b-21: mthong ba dang ma mthong ba dag ci ltar gcig nyid yin /
T11TD4221.1E:85b-22: tshon gyis bsgyur ba la yang thal ba 'di nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:85b-23: de'i phyir tshogs pa gcig yod min //
T11TD4221.1E:85b-24: du ma nyid na snga ma bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:85b-25: khyad med phyir dang phra rab phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:85b-26: rtogs min zhe na khyad med par //
T11TD4221.1E:85b-27: ma grub khyad par can rnams ni //
T11TD4221.1E:85b-28: dbang yul de phyir phra rab min //
T11TD4221.1E:85b-29: gal te lus du ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:85b-30: du ma nyid yin na yang snga ma bzhin du skyon yod de /
T11TD4221.1E:85b-31: rdul phra rab so sor rang rig par thal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:85b-32: khyad par med pa'i phyir mi rtogs so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:85b-34: khyad par med pa nyid du ma grub bo //
T11TD4221.1E:85b-35: rig pa ni gnas skabs na dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:85b-36: des na khyad par med pa mi dmigs pa nyid ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:86a-0: de nyid kyi phyir rang nyid rig pa'i @86a * //
T11TD4221.1E:86a-1: gnas skabs na phra rab nyid kyang gegs byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir yod kyang med pa dang khyad par med pas rdul phran ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:86a-2: khyed cag gi yang ji ltar yul dmigs she na /
T11TD4221.1E:86a-3: rang rig pa'i rang bzhin gyis yul dmigs pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang de rnam pa can gyi rnam par shes pa dmigs pa nyid yul dmigs pa nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:86a-4: ji ltar rdul phra rab kyi rnam pa med ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:86a-6: gal te rdul phra rab tsam yin na ji ltar bsgribs pa dang thogs pa la sogs pa yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:86a-7: 'dis ni sgrib byed la sogs pa //
T11TD4221.1E:86a-8: med pa dag kyang bsal ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:86a-9: dngul chu gser sogs dang 'dres pa'am //
T11TD4221.1E:86a-10: rdo tshan la sogs ji ltar snang //
T11TD4221.1E:86a-11: dbang sogs so sor nus med kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:86a-12: rtogs pa dag ni ji ltar yin //
T11TD4221.1E:86a-13: ldan las she na 'dir thal mtshungs //
T11TD4221.1E:86a-14: gal te gser dang dngul chu yi //
T11TD4221.1E:86a-15: ldan pa snang ba yin zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:86a-16: rten mthong med par ga la rtogs //
T11TD4221.1E:86a-17: ro gzugs la sogs ldan par 'gal //
T11TD4221.1E:86a-18: gal te nye bar brtags pa las //
T11TD4221.1E:86a-20: ji ltar phreng ring zhes byar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:86a-21: de ldan rang gi ngo bo dang //
T11TD4221.1E:86a-22: brjod pa dag las tha dad pa //
T11TD4221.1E:86a-23: grangs ldan las la sogs pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:86a-24: ngo bo'ang blo la mi snang ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:86a-25: rdul phra rab rnams 'byar ba med pa'i phyir ji ltar sgrib par byed pa yin zhes bya ba ni 'thad pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:86a-26: gang gis de med pas rdul phra rab rnams la de mi 'gyur ba yan lag can dang 'brel ba'i sgrib pa ni gar yang dmigs pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:86a-27: de bzhin du thogs pa la sogs pa yang ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:86a-29: gser dang bcas phyir rdul phran ni //
T11TD4221.1E:86a-30: tshogs pa snam bu la sogs pa'am //
T11TD4221.1E:86a-31: chu dang nyi ma la sogs pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:86a-32: skabs su de ni ji ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:86a-33: phan tshun nang du 'jug pa la gegs med pa'i rdul phra rab rnams nyid 'ba' zhig yan lag ldan pa med par ji ltar sgrib par byed pa la brten zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:86a-34: 'dir bshad pa reg pa med par ji ltar yan lag can skyed par byed /
T11TD4221.1E:86a-35: reg pa yang phyogs gcig gi ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:86a-37: bdag nyid thams cad kyis kyang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:86a-38: gong du rdul phra rab tsam du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:86b-0: ldan pa'i @86b don gzhan skyed pas so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:86b-2: ldan pa de nyid bar dang bcas pa dag gis ci ltar skyed par byed ces thal ba mtshungs so //
T11TD4221.1E:86b-3: reg na gong bu rdul phra rab tsam du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:86b-4: gal te reg pa yin na ldan pa gzhan nam de bzhin du yan lag can gyis ci zhig bya /
T11TD4221.1E:86b-5: 'on te bar dang bcas pa nyid ldan pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:86b-6: yan lag can skyed par byed na /
T11TD4221.1E:86b-7: de lta yin na sgrib pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu yang ci ste skyed par mi byed /
T11TD4221.1E:86b-8: gang la brdegs kyang so sor ni //
T11TD4221.1E:86b-10: reg pa med kyang phra rab kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:86b-11: rdul rnams tshogs pa 'ba' zhig yin//
T11TD4221.1E:86b-12: skra dang sbrang ma sha la sogs pa yul bar dang bcas par gnas pa yin yang lings po gcig gi rnam pa can gyi shes pa skyed par byed pa de bzhin du /
T11TD4221.1E:86b-13: 'bras bu gzhan yang ci ste skyed par mi byed /
T11TD4221.1E:86b-14: der gnod par byed pa mthong ba'i phyir de lta ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:86b-15: 'di yang gal te rnal 'byor pa yod na dbang po las 'das pa'i don mthong ba rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa gnod par byed pa yod par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:86b-16: dper na bu ga dang bcas pa'i snod steng bkag na chu mi 'dzag pa bzhin du rdul phra rab 'dus pa yang yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:86b-18: dngul chu gser dang ldan pa 'am //
T11TD4221.1E:86b-19: rdo tshan la sogs pa dag / yan lag can med par sgrib pa dang thogs pa la sogs pa 'am /
T11TD4221.1E:86b-20: so sor gyes pa la sogs pa 'bras bu gzhan byed par ji ltar nus /
T11TD4221.1E:86b-21: de ni khyad par can gyi 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rgyu khyad par can las skyes pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:86b-22: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
T11TD4221.1E:86b-23: 'di ltar gzugs la sogs pa so sor rnam par shes pa skyed par mi nus pa de lta na yang /
T11TD4221.1E:86b-24: tshogs pa'i gnas skabs na skyed par byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:86b-25: ldan pa las yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:86b-26: ldan pa yang 'bras bu nyid ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:86b-27: de nyid ji ltar skyed par byed /
T11TD4221.1E:86b-28: ldan pa ni snang ba yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:86b-29: rten ma mthong bar rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:86b-30: rten mthong ba med par yang rtogs na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:86b-31: dbang po dang don phrad pa las mngon sum du skye'o zhes bya ba ni gzhung lugs yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:86b-32: phrad pa yang ldan pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:86b-33: de'i tshe ldan pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:87a-0: ldan pa dang rnam par dbye ba'i rgyu ma yin pa ni yon tan yin no zhes bya ba @87a * //
T11TD4221.1E:87a-1: yon tan gyi mtshan nyid nyams par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:87a-2: 'on te 'byor ba dang 'phrod pas 'dus pa'i phyir rtogs par bya ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:87a-3: de lta na ni 'o na rdul phra rab la ldan pa yod par rdul phra rab rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:87a-4: yan lag can brtags pa don med do //
T11TD4221.1E:87a-5: ldan pa thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:87a-6: des na rgyang ring po nas mi 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:87a-7: der ni dbang po'i ldan pa nyid med do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:87a-8: rags pa rnams kyang mi rtogs par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:87a-9: 'on te ldan pa las skyes pa'i ldan pa yang 'dod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:87a-10: ldan pa dang rnam par dbye ba'i rgyu ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni 'du ba can gyi rgyu bkag pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:87a-12: 'du ba ni 'di la'o snyam pa'i blo'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:87a-13: ldan pa yang gal te brtags na gor ma chag par 'di la'o snyam pa'i blo skyed par byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:87a-14: des na phrad pa 'du ba can gyi rgyu yang 'thob bo //
T11TD4221.1E:87a-18: rdul phran rnams la ldan yod pas //
T11TD4221.1E:87a-20: gal te 'byor pa dang 'du ba yang 'dzin pa'i rgyu yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:87a-21: de'i tshe 'bras bu'i rdzas kyi ldan pa don med do //
T11TD4221.1E:87a-22: rdul phra rab kyi ldan pa nyid kyis 'bras bu'i rdzas mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:87a-24: rdul phra rab kyi ldan pa brtag par bya ba ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:87a-25: rdul phra rab kyi ldan pa nyid las bum pa la sogs pa mthong bas yan lag can rtog pa don med pa'i phyir nyes pa de nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:87a-26: 'on te yan lag can yod na rdul phra rab kyi ldan pa rtog gi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:87a-27: 'di ni bzlog pa la yang mtshungs so //
T11TD4221.1E:87a-28: yan lag can ldan na rdul phra rab ldan pa ma yin na ni ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:87a-29: yul dang dus mtshungs pa nyid kyis rnam par dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:87a-30: yang na rtogs pa'i yan lag can la yang ldan pa yin pas mthong ba'i ldan pa la yang ldan pa yod par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:87a-31: gzhan yang 'byor pa dang 'phrod pas 'du ba las mthong ba'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:87a-32: gzugs dang ro la sogs pa yang dag par ldan par /
T11TD4221.1E:87a-33: btung ba la sogs pa mthong bar mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:87a-34: yon tan la yon tan med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:87b-0: de la gzugs sam @87b ro de yan lag rnams ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:87b-1: nye bar brtags pa las de ltar bsnyad pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:87b-2: blo tha dad par thal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:87b-3: zho la sogs pa yan lag rnams kyi gzugs sam ro gang yin pa de nyid don gcig la 'du ba las nye bar brtags pa yin gyi gzugs dang ro gzhan dmigs par mi 'gyur ro ;
T11TD4221.1E:87b-4: / ldan pa can rnams kyi gzugs gang yin pa de nyid lta ba'i yang yin par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:87b-5: nye bar brtags pa las der gzugs dang ro gzhan du ga la 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:87b-6: 'on te gzugs dang ro de dag nyid /
T11TD4221.1E:87b-7: phrad pa las de ltar snang ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:87b-8: de dag shin tu 'dres pa la ni gcig tu rtogs pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:87b-9: ro dang gzugs gzhan du mngon pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:87b-10: de lta na ni 'o na yan lag can gzhan gyis ci yang byar med de /
T11TD4221.1E:87b-11: rdul phra rab snang ba nyid la de ltar rags pa la sogs pa'i tha snyad dang ldan pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:87b-12: gzhan yang gal te rdul phra rab nyid rags pa la sogs pa'i rtogs pa ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:87b-13: de'i phreng ring ngo zhes bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:87b-14: phreng zhes bya ba ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:87b-16: ldan pa med phyir ldan pa min //
T11TD4221.1E:87b-17: de nyid phyir de rdzas ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:87b-18: rigs sogs la ni ring nyid med //
T11TD4221.1E:87b-19: de ni rigs sogs 'dod pa 'ang min //
T11TD4221.1E:87b-20: bkod pa yin ni khyad par gyis //
T11TD4221.1E:87b-21: ji ltar ring sogs blor 'gyur ba //
T11TD4221.1E:87b-22: des na de bzhin blo des ni //
T11TD4221.1E:87b-23: rdul phran rnams la yin par rigs //
T11TD4221.1E:87b-24: dper na phreng ba la sogs pa'i ring po la sogs pa'i bkod pa nyid yin pa de bzhin du rtsod pa'i gnas yan lag can gyi yul du mngon par 'dod pa yang yin pa'i phyir yan lag can med do //
T11TD4221.1E:87b-25: gang yang dbang po la sogs pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:87b-26: ldan pa las yan lag can nam gzhan la blo skyed par byed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod pa de la smras pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:87b-27: ldan pa la sogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo ni dmigs pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:87b-28: gzugs la sogs pa dang ldan pa can 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
T11TD4221.1E:87b-29: de la ldan pa gzhan dmigs pa'i spyod yul du 'gyur ba med do //
T11TD4221.1E:87b-30: 'byor pa yin no zhes blos bzung ba'i ji ltar de bzhin du ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:87b-31: 'byor pa zhes bya ba ni ldan pa can nyid kyi rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:87b-32: 'byor pa'i sgra la 'dir dmigs pa gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:87b-33: der ni nye bar skyes gyur pa //
T11TD4221.1E:88a-2: 'byor pa rtogs pa'i yul yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:88a-3: de las 'byor gzhan yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:88a-4: ji ltar don de mdun gnas pa //
T11TD4221.1E:88a-5: ldan pa de bzhin gnas sam ci //
T11TD4221.1E:88a-6: rjes 'gro ldog pa dag las ni //
T11TD4221.1E:88a-7: ldan pa la sogs rtogs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:88a-8: ldan pa can las tha dad pa'i ldan pa gzhan ni snang ba med de /
T11TD4221.1E:88a-9: 'ba' zhig pa ma 'byor pa dag la ni gnas skabs de ma dmigs la /
T11TD4221.1E:88a-10: de la ni dmigs pa des na 'di ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las brtags pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do zhes bya bar yid ches so //
T11TD4221.1E:88a-11: mngon sum gyis de lta bur gyur pa 'di 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhes rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:88a-12: des na gnas skabs de nyid ldan pa zhes logs shig tu rnam par 'jog pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:88a-14: sgra shes dngos po tha dad pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:88a-15: rjes 'brang rnam rtog btags don can //
T11TD4221.1E:88a-16: dper na yon tan la sogs pa'am //
T11TD4221.1E:88a-17: zhig dang ma skyes dag la bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:88a-18: sgra'i shes pa mi mthun pa tsam gyis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:88a-19: don tha dad pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:88a-20: 'on kyang mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid kyi shes pa tha dad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:88a-21: rnam par rtog pa tsam gyi blo ni thog ma med pa'i bag chags kyi stobs las skye ba na /
T11TD4221.1E:88a-22: de lta de ltar bslad par 'gyur ba yin pas de las don gyi de nyid gnas par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:88a-23: de la ldan pa la sogs pa'i blo ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pas brtags pa'i tha dad pa la brten nas 'gyur ba yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:88a-24: des na brtags pa nyid tha dad pa yin gyi don gyi de kho na nyid ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:88a-25: rnam par brtags pa'i don tha dad pa ni mu stegs byed gzhan gyi lta ba las kyang skye'o //
T11TD4221.1E:88a-26: de las kyang don gyi de nyid rnam par gnas na thug pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:88a-27: de ltar khas len na ni phan tshun rtsod par yang mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:88a-28: de'i phyir sgra dang shes pa tha dad pa ni bag chags kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pas rnam par rtog pas brtags pa'i don la 'jug pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:88a-29: rnam par brtags pa de ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:88a-30: dngos po tha dad rjes 'brang ba can te dngos po rnams kyi tha dad pa ni de lta bum yin pa dag las ldog pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:88a-31: ldog pa yang ldog pa can las gzhan ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:88a-32: de'i phyir de nyid rgyun la ltos te nang gi dbye ba tha dad par snang ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:88b-0: ci ste dngos @88b po tha dad pa med par rtogs pa tha dad pa ma mthong ngo zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:88b-3: dper na yon tan dag la yon tan gcig go //
T11TD4221.1E:88b-4: 'du ba gcig go yon tan nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
T11TD4221.1E:88b-5: de la grangs ni med de /
T11TD4221.1E:88b-6: grangs ni rdzas la brten pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:88b-7: rten ni grangs nye bar brtags pa la ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:88b-8: rten tha dad kyang spyi la sogs pa gcig nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:88b-9: zhig pa dang ma skyes pa dag la yang ji ltar gcig la sogs pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:88b-11: rgyu mtshan gang gis de 'dod pa //
T11TD4221.1E:88b-12: de nyid dngos po thams cad la de dag gi rgyur cis mi 'dod /
T11TD4221.1E:88b-13: gal te zhig pa dang ma skyes pa dag la gcig nyid la sogs pa nye bar brtags pa las de ltar brjod pa dang rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:88b-14: nye bar brtags pa de nyid thams cad du 'di dag gi rgyu mtshan du ci ste mi 'dod /
T11TD4221.1E:88b-15: thog ma med pa'i rtogs pas sgro btags pa nyid rgyu mtshan yin par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:88b-16: dngos po brtags pa'i skabs yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:88b-17: gal te kun la nyer brtags min //
T11TD4221.1E:88b-18: tha dad khyad par gtso bo zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:88b-19: bya nyid ga las tha dad pa //
T11TD4221.1E:88b-20: med pa tha dad don med na //
T11TD4221.1E:88b-21: don gzhan rgyu mtshan tsam min yang //
T11TD4221.1E:88b-22: dkar la sogs la grangs sogs dang //
T11TD4221.1E:88b-23: ldan pa'i sgra ni rnam grangs min //
T11TD4221.1E:88b-24: gal te der yang don gzhan na //
T11TD4221.1E:88b-25: yon tan rdzas ni khyad med 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:88b-26: don gzhan min yang ldog pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:88b-27: dbye bas tha dad pa yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:88b-28: las rdzas min pa'i sgra bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:88b-29: gal te nye bar brtags pa zhes bya bar gtso bo'i rgyu mtshan can ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:88b-30: de ji ltar gtso bo med par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:88b-31: gtso bo yang khyad par tha dad pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:88b-32: dbyug pa can la sogs pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:88b-33: khyad par tha dad pa med pa na ni phal par grags pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:88b-34: khyed la ni snga ma snga ma'i rtogs pas byas pa'i khyad par dang ldan pas khyad par med par med pa'i phyir gang yang dngos med pas nye bar brtags pa mi srid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:88b-36: tha dad pa'i khyad par gtso bo yin no zhes bya ba nyid ga las yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:88b-37: khyad par tha dad pa med kyang rtogs pas byas pa'i khyad par tha dad pa shin tu goms pas bstan par chags par 'gyur ba ni gtso bo nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-2: de las gzhan ni phal pa yin pas ma chog pa ci yod gzhan yang /
T11TD4221.1E:89a-3: gal te khyad par tha dad ba ni dngos yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:89a-4: gzhan du brtags par 'gyur na rnam pa 'di lta bu mtha' dag dngos ma yin par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:89a-5: tha dad pa'i khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-6: gang zhig pa dang ma skyes pa la ni khyad par can yang btags pa yin no zhes bya ba ni khyad par yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-7: gal te khyad par gzhan med na 'o na ni thams cad du khyad par can nyid brjod par bya ba yin pas don tha dad pa med pa'i phyir rnam grangs pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-8: gzhi mthun pa yang med par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:89a-9: de ni 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan tha dad pa nyid yin na 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:89a-10: de yang brjod par mi bya ba nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:89a-12: 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan tha dad na //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-13: de yi ngo bor snang bas na //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-14: ci ltar don dang sgra dag ni //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-15: gzhi mthun par ni 'gyur ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-16: gzhi mthun pa 'di don dag gam sgra dag gi yin grang na /
T11TD4221.1E:89a-17: re zhig sgra dag gzhi ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:89a-18: so sor nges pa'i don brjod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-19: mtshon zin pas mtshon pas gzhi mthun pa yin no zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-20: gcig nyid dang ni 'brel bas na //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-21: de ni thams cad mtshon pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-22: sgra gnyis pa yi sbyor ba ni //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-23: med pa'i phyir na de med do //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-24: don rnams gzhi mthun pa nyid kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-25: 'di nyid kyis ni bsal ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-26: 'brel pa yod pa yin na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-27: gang las ji ltar 'jal ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-28: gal te 'du ba'i stobs kyi don //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-29: tha mi dad par 'jal byed na //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-30: gcig nyid kyis ni de rtogs phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:89a-31: sgra gzhan dag ni don med 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-32: gal te gzhan gyis don de nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-33: shes pa yin par 'dod na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-34: ci ltar khyed kyis 'dod pas kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-35: rnam grangs pa de nyid mi 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-37: sgra gcig las ni rtogs she na //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-38: 'du ba can ni rtogs pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-39: ma rtogs pa ni gzhan yod min //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-40: ci ltar sngon po mngon sum gyis //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-42: de bzhin sgras kyang rtogs na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-43: de bzhin sgra gzhan don med do //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-44: sgra ni nges pa nyid kyi don //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-45: yin phyir gzhan dag rtogs min na //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-46: khyad par can dang bral ba'i don //
T11TD4221.1E:89a-47: 'ga' med brjod pa don med do //
T11TD4221.1E:89b-0: mthon mthing autpala la sogs @89b dag / sngo nyid 'ba' zhig nyid min te //
T11TD4221.1E:89b-1: de ltar mngon sum gyis bzung min //
T11TD4221.1E:89b-2: sgra 'jug gzhan du ji ltar yin //
T11TD4221.1E:89b-3: gal te sngo nyid autpala yin //
T11TD4221.1E:89b-5: gal te sngo nyid gzhan du na //
T11TD4221.1E:89b-6: de bzhin autpala tshig don med //
T11TD4221.1E:89b-7: de phyir rang gi bag chags kyi dbang gis skyes pa'i blo nyid kyis gzhi mthun pa la sogs pa'i tha snyad tha dad pa tha dad pa ma yin pa nye bar 'jog pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:89b-8: rnam grangs la sogs par thal ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:89b-9: 'di ltar don gzhan med kyang dkar po la sogs pa dag la rnam grangs pa ma yin no zhes bshad zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:89b-10: der yang don gzhan yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:89b-11: de lta yin na yon tan dang rdzas dag khyad par med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:89b-12: 'di ltar bya ba dang ldan pa yin tan dang ldan pa /
T11TD4221.1E:89b-13: 'phro pa 'du ba can gyi rgyu ni rdzas yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:89b-14: 'phro pa 'du ba can gyi rgyu nyid ni yon tan dang ldan 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:89b-15: lci ba nyid yod pas na ltung ba la sogs pa 'og tu ltung ba'i phyir bya ba dang ldan pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:89b-16: des na yon tan la yang ldan pa yod pas rdzas kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ni rdzas su 'gyur bas /
T11TD4221.1E:89b-17: yon tan dang rdzas khyad med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:89b-18: de'i phyir ldog pa'i khyad par gyis kun brtags pa brjod par bya ba tha dad pas tha dad pa ste /
T11TD4221.1E:89b-19: sgra dang rtogs pa tha dad pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:89b-20: dper na las rdzas ma yin pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:89b-21: rdzas las ma yin pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:89b-22: 'dir don gzhan ni don ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:89b-23: de lta na yang rdzas las ma yin pa la sogs pa'i sgra rnams rnam grangs pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:89b-24: der ni log pa'i khyad par nyid rgyu mtshan yin gyi 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan tha dad pa gzhan ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:89b-25: 'o na ji ltar ba lang dkar po la ba lang gi dkar po nyid ces gzhi mthun pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:89b-26: gzhi tha dad pa'i dbye bar 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:89b-27: dngos po brjod pa'i sgra rnams kyis //
T11TD4221.1E:89b-28: grangs sogs de dang ldan pa las //
T11TD4221.1E:89b-29: tha dad bzhin du bstan gang de'ang //
T11TD4221.1E:89b-30: chos bzhin khyad par byed pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:89b-31: de tsam shes par 'dod pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:89b-32: gzhan kun 'phangs pa med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:89b-33: la lar sor mo'i ldan pa zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:89b-34: tha dad chos bzhin sgra rjod byed //
T11TD4221.1E:89b-35: don gcig brjod kyang thams cad ni //
T11TD4221.1E:89b-37: chos can brjod par grags yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:90a-2: ji ltar brtags pa'i brjod bya tha dad pas rnam grangs pa ma yin par bstan pa de bzhin du /
T11TD4221.1E:90a-3: brjod par bya ba'i don tha mi dang kyang thad dad pa'i rnam par dbye ba ni brtags pa'i tha dad pa yod pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:90a-4: dper na mchi gu'i lus dang /
T11TD4221.1E:90a-5: sgra gcan gyi mgo zhes bya ba de bzhin du ba lang gi dkar po zhes bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:90a-6: ba lang zhes bya bas ni rnam pa gcig tu 'dzin pa can gyi don de ril brjod pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:90a-7: dkar po zhes bya bas ni de'i phyogs gcig 'dzin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'i yod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:90a-8: tha dad pa ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gis nges par byas pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:90a-9: des na de'i yon tan dkar po de ni ba lang gi yon tan yin no zhes tha dad pa'i rnam par dbye bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:90a-10: gang gi tshe ba lang gi rnam par gzung ba med par 'brel pa can gyi khyad par dang bral ba'i dkar po nyid 'ba' zhig dmigs pa de'i tshe /
T11TD4221.1E:90a-11: dkar po nyid 'di gang gi yin zhes 'dri ba de'i tshe ni /
T11TD4221.1E:90a-12: ba lang dag gi zhes sngar mthong ba las nges pa'i ba lang gi rang bzhin nyid ston te /
T11TD4221.1E:90a-13: 'di de'i bdag nyid kyi 'brel pa nyid brjod par 'dod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:90a-14: tha dad pa ni sngar 'ba' zhig nges pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:90a-15: gang gi tshe gal te mthong ba dman pa rnams khyad par mtshon pa la mi gsal ba nyid yin pa'i de lta na ni yang 'di 'ba' zhig tu gyur pa ni mi srid de /
T11TD4221.1E:90a-16: ba lang dkar po'am gzhan du 'gyur ba yin snyam pas dkar po 'di'i gang yin ba lang ngam 'on te gzhan zhes 'dri ba de'i tshe ni lan du gzhi mthun pa nyid kyis ba lang ngo zhes so //
T11TD4221.1E:90a-17: de nang du bsdus pa nyid kyis 'dri ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:90a-18: lan yang de dang rjes su mthun pa kho nar rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:90a-19: de kho na'i don 'di yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:90a-20: rjes su 'gro dang ldog pa las //
T11TD4221.1E:90a-21: tha dad par ni rnam nges shing //
T11TD4221.1E:90a-22: rgyu 'ga' zhig las khyad par nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:90a-23: mtshon pa yang ni med pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:90a-24: mkhas pa yon tan dkar po 'di //
T11TD4221.1E:90a-25: rta yi yin zhes lan 'debs te //
T11TD4221.1E:90a-26: tha dad ldan pa 'dri ba'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:90a-27: 'dir ni de lta nyid du nges //
T11TD4221.1E:90a-28: gang tshe tshad ma'i 'jug pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:90a-29: ltos te tha dang med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:90a-30: khyad par nang du bsdus gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:90a-32: de tshe de dngos rig pa de //
T11TD4221.1E:90b-0: @90b gzhung lugs gzhan gyi go skabs ni //
T11TD4221.1E:90b-1: de la srid pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:90b-2: mngon sum nyid dam de gzhi can //
T11TD4221.1E:90b-3: rjes dpag 'jug pa la ltos nas //
T11TD4221.1E:90b-4: tha dad ma nges yod min la //
T11TD4221.1E:90b-5: des na tha dad srid ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:90b-6: gang tshe rjes 'gro ldog pa dag / thog ma med par rnam gnas pa //
T11TD4221.1E:90b-7: de tshe tha dad srid pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:90b-8: tha snyad de ni de lta nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:90b-10: 'di ni thog med tha snyad yin //
T11TD4221.1E:90b-11: dngos po sems pa 'jig rten la //
T11TD4221.1E:90b-12: med phyir tha dad gnod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:90b-13: de'i phyir yan lag nyid las yan lag can ni med do zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:90b-14: gal te yan lag can ni med kyi 'on kyang ro la sogs pa nyid yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:90b-15: 'on te de'i tshe bum pa'i gzugs la sogs pa zhes bya bar mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:90b-16: gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi gzugs so //
T11TD4221.1E:90b-17: bum pa'i bum pa'o zhes bya bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin no zhes gzhan gyi rgol ba'i dogs pa bsu nas /
T11TD4221.1E:90b-19: gzugs sogs nus pa'i khyad par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:90b-20: spong bas de 'bras mtshungs pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:90b-21: rgyu min pa ni rnam gcod la //
T11TD4221.1E:90b-23: des na bum pa'i gzugs so zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:90b-24: gzhi gcig pa can sgra ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:90b-25: des na 'di ni rigs dang ni //
T11TD4221.1E:90b-26: tshogs pa brjod pa'i khyad par yin //
T11TD4221.1E:90b-27: de spyi yan lag tu byas te //
T11TD4221.1E:90b-28: bum pa yin ni gzugs sogs zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:90b-29: de nus khyad par ston par byed //
T11TD4221.1E:90b-30: phyogs 'dis gzhan la'ang brjod par bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:90b-31: gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi nus pa'i khyad par so sor nges pa ma 'phags par /
T11TD4221.1E:90b-32: thun mong gi chu 'dzin pa'i nus pa 'phen pa'i sgo nas de dag la bum pa'i sgra 'jug pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:90b-33: des na bum pa la sogs pa'o zhes gzhi mthun pa nyid ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:90b-34: de nyid kyi phyir tshogs pa'i sgra 'di ni tshogs pa brjod par 'dod pa na yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:90b-35: rigs kyi sgra ni so sor 'bras bu gcig pa nyid la yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:90b-36: dper na nags zhes bya ba bzhin dang /
T11TD4221.1E:90b-37: dper na shing zhes bya ba bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:90b-38: 'on ji ltar bum ba'i gzugs la sogs pa zhes tha snyad ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:90b-39: so sor gzugs la sogs pa'i shes pa skyed par nus pa dag ni chu 'dzin pa'i 'bras bu thun mong ba nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T11TD4221.1E:90b-40: 'on te ji ltar shing rnams kyi nags she 'am /
T11TD4221.1E:91a-0: nags rnams ni shing ngo zhes @91a * //
T11TD4221.1E:91a-2: gzugs la sogs pa'i bum pa zhe'am /
T11TD4221.1E:91a-3: bum pa la sogs pa dag ni gzugs so zhes ci'i phyir mi 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:91a-4: gal te bstan bcos gzhan gyi 'du byed pa med na 'gyur ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:91a-5: 'jig rten ni phal cher de'i 'du byed pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:91a-6: des na mi 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:91a-7: dngos po yang dag par rtogs pa dang ldan pa ni yid ches par 'gyur ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:91a-8: gzugs la sogs pa nyid 'ga' zhig bum pa'i 'bras bu'i khyad par nus pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:91a-9: 'bras bu'i khyad par yang chu 'dzin pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:91a-10: yang na dbyibs kyi khyad par gyis rnam par gnas pa ste /
T11TD4221.1E:91a-11: dbyibs kyi khyad par gang las chu 'dzin pa'i khyad par gyi gzugs la gzugs kyi bum pa zhes brjod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:91a-12: des na yan lag dang yan lag can gyi khyad par la ni gzhi mthun par mi 'gyur ba nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:91a-13: phan tshun khyab pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:91a-14: gal te shing dang sha pa dag la yang phan tshun khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i dngos po med pa'i phyir ji ltar gzhi mthun pa yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:91a-16: shing blo bsal ba gcig la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:91a-17: so sor rjes su 'jug pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:91a-18: bum pa'i blo ni gzugs sogs la //
T11TD4221.1E:91a-19: so sor rjes su 'jug pa yin//
T11TD4221.1E:91a-20: bum pa'i blo ni shing sha pa la sogs pa la shing blo ltar gzugs la sogs pa re re la rjes su 'jug pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:91a-21: bum pa'i sgras nus pa'i khyad par 'phen pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:91a-22: sngon gyi tha snyad zhen pas nus pa nges pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:91a-23: shing gi sgras ni khyad par can gyi nus pa dang ldan pa yang 'phen pa yin pa'i phyir skyon med do //
T11TD4221.1E:91a-25: nus pa'i bye brag rgyu yin pas //
T11TD4221.1E:91a-26: thams cad legs par gnas so //
T11TD4221.1E:91a-27: gal te ba lang dag ni nyi shu'o zhes bya ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:91a-28: nyi shu dag gi ba lang zhes bya ba 'di la nus pa'i khyad par 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:91a-29: 'dir nyi shu'i sgra nus pa gzhan brjod pa ni ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:91a-30: 'on kyang 'dir bzho ba dang dgal ba la sogs pa'i nus pa nyid rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:91a-31: der ni mang po nyid kyis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:91a-32: bstan pa'i 'dus pa gsal bar yod //
T11TD4221.1E:91a-33: de brjod phyogs 'dir gzhan dag la'ang //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-0: nye bar bstan par brjod @91b par bya //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-1: 'dir ni bcu po gnyis kyi rang bzhin 'dus pa brjod par 'dod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-2: des ni bzho ba dang dgal ba'i nus pa 'phen pa ma yin la des kyang 'dus pa'i khyad par 'phen pa ma yin pa'i phyir thams cad legs par gnas so //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-4: thog ma med pa'i tha snyad kyis //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-5: 'dus byas bag chags bdag can gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-6: sgra las byung ba'i rtogs pa 'di //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-7: thog ma med pa'i tha snyad yin //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-8: des na gang la'ang mi brtsad de //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-9: gang gis kyang ni brtsad bya min //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-10: gal te sgra don de lta bu //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-11: yin yang chad pa 'ga' med na //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-12: gang gis de la rtsod byed 'dir //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-13: de ltar mi rigs ji zhig yod //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-14: tha mal sgra yi 'dus byas la //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-15: ma 'chol ba ni mthong ba med //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-16: der ni rtags dang tshig gi don //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-17: tha dad pa ni gsal bar rtogs //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-18: de la mi rigs yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-19: legs par sbyar la de 'gyur na //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-20: mtshan nyid de ni legs bsgrubs pa //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-21: tha mal legs par sbyar bar 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-22: legs par sbyar dang legs sbyar min //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-23: tshad mas rtogs pa yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-24: 'dis ni byis rtsed don phyir na //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-25: rnam par gzhag pa tsam du zad //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-26: ji ltar don yod ma yin yang //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-27: byis pa tha snyad pa dag gis //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-28: ci zhig ltar 'di bstan bcos su //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-29: byas pa de ltar byis gzhan nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-31: ci zhig brjod pa mi shes so //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-32: ma mthong ba yi don brjod ni //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-33: gar gyi bstan bcos dag la'ang mthong //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-34: de la yid ches yod min te //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-35: 'dis ni dmus long brgyud pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-36: gal te lus kyi 'byung ba chen po las skyes pa yin na ;
T11TD4221.1E:91b-37: de'i tshe cha shas mtha' dag rnam par shes pa skyed pa'i rgyu yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:91b-38: dper na myu gu la sa sogs lta bu'am /
T11TD4221.1E:91b-39: yang na so sor de dper na me la bsreg par bya ba rtsva la sogs pa lta bu zhig yin grang na /
T11TD4221.1E:91b-40: de la ma lus rgyu nyid yin na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-41: yan lag gcig dang bral na'ang min //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-42: re re nus ba nyid yin na'ang //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-44: du ma nyid du mtshungs pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-45: 'byung rngub dag ni nges byed min //
T11TD4221.1E:91b-46: 'bras bu gang la mang po dag phan tshun lhan cig byed pas /
T11TD4221.1E:91b-47: bya ba byed pa der ni gcig med kyang 'bras bu srid pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:92a-0: de med kyang 'bras bu yod pa @92a * //
T11TD4221.1E:92a-2: de rgyu nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:92a-3: 'on te yan lag rnams phan tshun ltos pa med pa kho nar skyed par byed pa yin pa des na /
T11TD4221.1E:92a-4: rna ba dang sna chad kyang de dag nyid la yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'byung ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:92a-5: de lta na ni 'o na so sor nus pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:92a-6: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:92a-7: so sor nus pa'i sa bon du ma yod na /
T11TD4221.1E:92a-8: myu gu du ma mi skye ba ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:92a-9: de skyed par byed pa ni dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa dag yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:92a-10: cha shas gcig 'ba' zhig gang yin pa de ni lhan cig byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:92a-11: lhan cig byed pa tha dad pas ni 'bras bu tha dad par mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:92a-12: thag bzangs gzhan dang gzhan yod kyang snam bu tha dad pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:92a-13: 'dir brjod pa dbugs 'byung rngub dag kyang du ma yin pa'i phyir thal ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:92a-14: yan lag gcig ma tshang yang mi 'gyur ba'am du ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:92a-15: lus bzhin du 'byung ba dang rngub pa dag kyang gcig nyid du mi 'grub bo //
T11TD4221.1E:92a-17: de la yang brjod pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:92a-18: gcig nyid yin na'ang mang gsal 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:92a-19: de rgyu rtag tu nye phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:92a-20: gal te du ma rgyu min na //
T11TD4221.1E:92a-21: rim gyis kyang min khyad med phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:92a-22: dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pa rnams gcig nyid yin yang /
T11TD4221.1E:92a-23: du ma gsal ba nyid de des na 'dod chags la sogs pa'i yid du mar thal bar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:92a-24: de'i rgyu rtag tu nye ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:92a-25: rgyu nye ba yang mi 'byung na de de'i rgyu can zhes bya bar mi 'thad do //
T11TD4221.1E:92a-26: 'on te du ma'i rgyur ni mi 'gyur ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:92a-27: rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid ni so sor nges pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:92a-28: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i nges pa la ni brgal zhing brtags par 'os pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:92a-29: me ni du ba gcig nyid skyed par byed pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:92a-31: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:92a-32: me las ni rang bzhin de nyid las du ba gzhan dang gzhan dmigs pa ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:92a-33: 'dir ni dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin de nyid sad par byed pa'i rkyen gzhan dang /
T11TD4221.1E:92a-34: gzhan gyi rjes su 'gro ba las /
T11TD4221.1E:92a-35: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i sems gzhan dang gzhan 'byung ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:92a-36: sad par byed pa'i rkyen kyang nges pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:92b-0: sngon gyi 'du byed pa stobs dang ldan @92b pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:92b-1: mi ldan pa nyid rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:92b-2: des na gal te dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pa 'di sems kyi rgyu ma yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:92b-3: phyis kyang de dang khyad par med pas mi 'byung ba'i phyir rim gyis kyang du ma'i rgyu ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:92b-4: sngon gyi 'du byed pa nyid rgyur thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:92b-5: dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pa gcig nyid du khas blangs nas kyang brjod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:92b-8: dbugs gcig la yang don du ma //
T11TD4221.1E:92b-9: 'dzin phyir de las nges ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:92b-10: du ma blo gcig gis shes na //
T11TD4221.1E:92b-11: de ni cig car nyid 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:92b-12: 'gal ba med phyir rim gyis kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:92b-13: mi 'gyur khyad par med phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:92b-14: ring du phyir 'byung ba la sogs pa dbugs 'byung ba gcig la yang blo du ma 'byung ba'i phyir dbugs la sogs pa ni nges par byed pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:92b-15: 'o na ga las nges pa yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:92b-17: 'dzin pa snga ma snga ma nyid sems phyi ma phyi ma nges pa'i rgyu yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:92b-18: 'on te yid kyi rnam par shes pa gcig nyid rim gyis don du ma 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin yin pa des na blo du ma ma yin no zhes brjod na /
T11TD4221.1E:92b-20: gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam pa las tha dad pa'i yid gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:92b-21: gal te yid ni me long shin tu gsal ba lta bu khyab par byed pa gcig nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:92b-22: de ni don gyi gzugs brnyan dang 'brel pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:92b-24: gal te rnam par shes pa bya ba med pa nyid la thob par bya ba'i don gyi gzugs brnyan skye ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:92b-25: don rnams la nye ba'i rim pa khyad par can med pa'i phyir don cig car 'dzin par thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:92b-26: 'on te goms pa'i khyad par gyi rim pa las de lta ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:92b-27: 'o na de nyid don gyi rnam pa'i rgyu yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:92b-28: dbugs dbyung ba la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:92b-29: me long bzhin du rnam par gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa ni cig car don 'dzin par 'gyur te 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:92b-30: 'on te de'i tshe nus pa med na rim gyis kyang don de 'dzin par mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:92b-31: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:92b-32: 'on te 'di snyam du de la yang skad cig gi dbye ba yod pa nyid do /
T11TD4221.1E:92b-33: des na skad cig gi dbye bas rim gyis don du ma 'dzin pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:93a-3: rang rigs min pa'i dus can gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:93a-4: dbugs kyi skad cig mang po dag / gal te de 'dra'i sems nyid kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:93a-5: rgyu yin par ni rtog byed na //
T11TD4221.1E:93a-6: go rims ldan pa'i rgyu med par //
T11TD4221.1E:93a-7: de dag rim ldan ci ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:93a-8: rang rigs snga ma rgyu nyid na //
T11TD4221.1E:93a-11: de rgyu de 'dra yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:93a-12: dbugs 'byung tha dad yul can phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:93a-13: yod kyang du ma nyid de des //
T11TD4221.1E:93a-14: de phyir blo ni cig car skye //
T11TD4221.1E:93a-15: dbugs skad cig ma zhes nged la ni grub pa nyid yin mod kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:93a-16: khyed la ni de grub pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:93a-17: 'on te tshad mas mthong ba'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:93a-18: de ni grub pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:93a-19: rim gyis 'byung ba na don gcig tu rigs pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:93a-20: des na rgyu rim can yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:93a-21: 'bras bu yang rim pa dang ldan pa yin pas rnam par shes pa rim pa dang ldan pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:93a-22: dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pa de nyid go rims dang ldan pa'i rgyu med par ji ltar rim pa dang ldan pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:93a-23: snga ma snga ma'i dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pa'i rgyu'i go rims las so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:93a-25: rang gi rigs snga ma rgyu nyid yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:93a-26: dang po'i dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pa mi srid par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:93a-27: de 'dra ba dang po med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:93a-28: 'jig rten pha rol khas len na ni skye ba snga ma'i dbugs rgyu yin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:93a-29: pha ma'i dbugs rgyu yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:93a-30: de lta bu'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba thams cad kyi tshe 'byung bar thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:93a-31: de lta yin na ni blo yang pha mas bskyed pa yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:93a-32: thal ba snga ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:93a-34: dbugs rnams ni du ma nyid de yul tha dad pa dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:93a-35: yul du ma dang 'brel ba 'gal ba'i chos gnas pa can ni /
T11TD4221.1E:93a-36: du ma'i sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:93a-37: dbugs du ma yin pa'i phyir ming rnam par shes pa du ma skye bar thal bar 'gyur la /
T11TD4221.1E:93a-38: rigs mthun pa'i yid ni rim gyis 'byung ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:93a-39: skad cig tha dad pa nyid kyis 'bras bu tha dad par ni ma zad de /
T11TD4221.1E:93a-40: ji ltar rigs mthun pa'i rgyu du ma yin pa de bzhin du /
T11TD4221.1E:93a-42: gal te tshogs pa las skye ba can du ma las gcig nyid skye ba ma yin nam zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:93b-0: gal te du ma'ang @93b gcig dus can //
T11TD4221.1E:93b-1: sems gcig gi ni rgyu yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:93b-2: dbugs rgyu zhen pa la sogs su //
T11TD4221.1E:93b-4: ci ste ji ltar yod rgyu yin //
T11TD4221.1E:93b-5: shes pa la yang khyad yod 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:93b-6: gang phyir gang gi tha dad las //
T11TD4221.1E:93b-7: tha dad min te de 'bras min //
T11TD4221.1E:93b-8: du mas gcig skyed na rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:93b-9: tshogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis sam /
T11TD4221.1E:93b-11: tshogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis yin na dbugs zhan pa dang dbugs mi rgyu ba la sogs pa la 'byung bar mi 'gyur te tshogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:93b-12: tshogs pa las skye ba'i 'bras bu'i chos ni 'di yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:93b-13: tshogs pa nyams pa dang ma tshang ba dag tu mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:93b-14: de med par 'byung na ni de'i 'bras bu nyid ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:93b-15: 'on te ji ltar nye bar gnas pa nyid rgyu yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:93b-16: tshogs pa nyid ni ma yin no snyam na /
T11TD4221.1E:93b-17: de lta na 'o na nye bar gnas pa nyid rgyu ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:93b-18: nye bar gnas pa ma yin pa yang yin no zhes brjod par bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:93b-19: de ltar ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:93b-20: rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i ngo bo can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:93b-21: de'i phyir tshogs pa las ni 'bras bu tshogs pa nyid yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:93b-22: nyams pa las ni med pa gzhan du 'gyur ba las ni gzhan du gyur pa nyid do zhes nges pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:93b-23: gang gi khyad par las khyad par du mi 'gyur ba de ni de'i 'bras bu ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:93b-24: de yod na yod pa nyid rgyu mtshan yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:93b-26: de yod na yod pa nyid ni de 'gyur na 'gyur ba nyid las rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:93b-27: de yod na ni yod tsam gyis //
T11TD4221.1E:93b-28: gal te rgyu 'bras nyid yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:93b-30: de ltar thams cad rgyu med 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:93b-31: gal te de yod na de yod pa tsam 'ba' zhig rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid kyi rgyu mtshan du khas len na rnam par 'gyur ba rgyu med pa can nyid du thal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:93b-32: 'on te rnam par 'gyur ba de yang de tsam nyid las yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:93b-33: dang po nyid ci'i phyir ma skyes //
T11TD4221.1E:93b-34: de 'gyur ba med pa nyid na skye ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:93b-36: gang khyad par med par khyad par du 'gyur ba de de'i 'bras bu ma yin no zhes bshad zin te /
T11TD4221.1E:93b-37: des na ci ltar rnam par 'gyur ba'i khyad par rgyu med pa de bzhin du /
T11TD4221.1E:93b-38: dngos po de yang yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:94a-1: na yod pa nyid kyang ji ltar rtogs pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:94a-2: 'dis ni yongs su 'gyur ba yang bsal ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:94a-3: rim gyis 'gyur ba yongs su 'gyur ba'i phyir khyad par la ltos pa'i lus nyid las rnam par shes pa skye ba yin no zhes brjod pa de ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:94a-4: yongs su 'gyur ba'i rim pa de //
T11TD4221.1E:94a-5: lus nyid las ni 'byung min te //
T11TD4221.1E:94a-6: lus khyad med phyir de yi yang //
T11TD4221.1E:94a-7: khyad par gang nas 'byung ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:94a-8: ji ltar yongs su 'gyur ba khyad par med pa las rnam par shes pa khyad par med par 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
T11TD4221.1E:94a-9: lus khyad par med pa las yongs su 'gyur ba yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:94a-10: gal te 'o ma la sogs pa'i yongs su 'gyur ba'i khyad par de khyad par med par yang dus kyi mthar thug pa tsam las mthong ba ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:94a-11: de bzhin du lus kyang yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:94a-14: 'o ma mtshungs pa las byung ba ;
T11TD4221.1E:94a-15: / zho la sogs kyi rnam 'gyur ni //
T11TD4221.1E:94a-16: mtshungs nyid lus kyi rnam 'gyur ni //
T11TD4221.1E:94a-17: khyad par can du 'gyur ba nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:94a-18: 'o ma mtshungs pa nye bar gnas shing drod mtshungs pa nyid yin na ni zho la sogs pa'i yongs su 'gyur ba mtshungs pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:94a-19: lus ni mtshungs pa dang mi mtshungs pa dag la rjes su mthun pa goms pa'i bag chags rnam par rtog pa la sogs pa'i shes pa tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa dag gi rgyu yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:94a-20: des na yid rnam par shes pa dag ni rim pa dang ldan pa'i lus yongs su gyur pa las ma yin no zhes rtogs so //
T11TD4221.1E:94a-21: de'i phyir tshogs pa rgyu nyid yin na khyad par srid par 'gyur la /
T11TD4221.1E:94a-22: de lta ma yin na du ma nyid do zhes bya ba ni 'di gnas pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:94a-23: de ltar ni mthong ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:94a-24: gang gi rnam par shes pa nyid las rnam par shes pa yin pa de yang ji ltar rnam par shes pa du ma skye bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:94a-26: rnam shes nus pa nges pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:94a-27: gcig ni gcig gi rgyu yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:94a-28: rnam shes don gzhan chags pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:94a-29: nus med don gzhan mi 'dzin phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:94a-30: mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyi rang bzhin gyi rnam par shes pa gcig gi rgyu yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:94b-0: nus pa nges pa ni rjes su mthun pa'i 'du byed kyi bag chags @94b sam /
T11TD4221.1E:94b-2: bag chags brten pa'i rnam par shes pa ni bar du chod kyang mtshungs ba de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyi nus pa'i khyad par bsgrub pas rnam par shes pa 'ga' zhig nyid skyed par byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:94b-4: yang na mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen /
T11TD4221.1E:94b-5: rjes su mthun pa sad par byed pa la ste /
T11TD4221.1E:94b-7: bag chags brtan pa la brten nas //
T11TD4221.1E:94b-8: mtshungs pa de ma thag med par //
T11TD4221.1E:94b-9: rnam shes snga ma nyid las ni //
T11TD4221.1E:94b-10: rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:94b-11: rnam par rtog pa 'ga' zhig ni //
T11TD4221.1E:94b-12: mtshungs pa de ma thag rkyen las //
T11TD4221.1E:94b-13: nye ba nyid du skye ba mthong //
T11TD4221.1E:94b-14: gzhan ni bar du gcad phyir min //
T11TD4221.1E:94b-15: rnam par shes pa'i bag chags bar du chod pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams ni nus pa'i yul gyi khyad par skabs su bar du zhugs pa gzhan gyis bskyed par ma mthong ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:94b-16: de bas na rnam par shes pa las rnam par shes pa gcig gam /
T11TD4221.1E:94b-17: du ma yin no zhes rnam par gzhag pa 'thad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:94b-18: gal te lus nyid las rnam par shes pa du ma skye ba yin yang rnam par shes pa de nyid las nges par 'gyur ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:94b-19: dper na dbang po'i rnam par shes pa du ma skye ba yin yang /
T11TD4221.1E:94b-20: res 'ga' chags pa'i yul la chags pa'i khyad par de nyid las rnam par shes pa gcig nyid yin pa bzhin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:94b-22: gal te lus las cig car blo //
T11TD4221.1E:94b-23: skyes shing phyis ni rang rigs las //
T11TD4221.1E:94b-24: des na lus kyi nus pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:94b-25: ci yi phyir na ldog pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:94b-26: gal te lus las rnam par shes pa skye na /
T11TD4221.1E:94b-27: de las phyis kyang de srid nyid 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:94b-28: lus kyi nus pa de lta bu nyid du yod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:94b-29: gal te rnam par shes pa rang gi nus pa nges pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa yin mod /
T11TD4221.1E:94b-30: lus ni de bzhin nyid du gnas pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa gzhan dang gzhan skyed par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:94b-32: rnam par shes pa des lus kyi rnam par shes pa gzhan skyed pa'i nus pa bcom pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:94b-33: lus las rnam par shes pa gzhan skye ba ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:94b-36: spyod yul du ni byas ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:94b-37: rnam shes nyid las rnam shes ni //
T11TD4221.1E:95a-1: bar tshad mas nges phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:95a-2: rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'i lus nyid las rnam par shes pa du ma skye zhing /
T11TD4221.1E:95a-3: phyis ni rnam par shes pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa du ma skyed pa'i nus pa 'joms pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:95a-5: lus las skye ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:95a-6: rnam par shes pas rnam par shes pa gcig dang gcig nyid skye bar byed pa yin yang lus kyi nus pa ma nyams pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa gzhan dang gzhan du ma skyed par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:95a-7: gang gis da ni rnam par shes pa nyid las rnam par shes pa skye ba'i phyir ngas rnam par shes pa gzhan mi skyed do zhes lus skyed par byed pa ma yin par 'gyur ba /
T11TD4221.1E:95a-8: rgyu rnams rtog pa dang ldan pa ni 'ga' yang med do //
T11TD4221.1E:95a-10: brgya la 'di ltar yang 'gyur ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:95a-12: 'bras bu nyid kyis rgyu'i rang gi 'bras bu bskyed pa'i nus pa 'joms pa'o zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:95a-13: lus las rnam shes du ma ni //
T11TD4221.1E:95a-14: 'byung zhing de yi rjes thogs la //
T11TD4221.1E:95a-15: shes pas 'joms pa mthong nas ni //
T11TD4221.1E:95a-16: la lar shes pas mthong nas ni //
T11TD4221.1E:95a-18: la lar dogs par 'gyur ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:95a-19: don 'di la ni dogs pa'i rgyu cung zad kyang ma dmigs la /
T11TD4221.1E:95a-20: rgyu mtshan med par dogs pa yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:95a-21: de yi phyogs su lhung ba yi //
T11TD4221.1E:95a-22: nus pa goms pa las 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:95a-23: rnam par shes pa'i nges byed nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:95a-24: goms pa las ni skyes pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:95a-25: de'i rigs can gyi rnam par shes pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:95a-26: de'i rigs can nyid las yin pa'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por grub pa na rnam par shes pa nyid las rnam par shes pa yin pas 'di lus la skye ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:95a-27: gal te dbang po'i rnam par shes pa du ma 'byung ba las rnam par shes pa gcig po de las rnam par shes pa gcig yin no zhes brjod pa ma yin nam zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:95a-29: brjod pa tsam gyis ni lan thebs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:95a-30: 'on kyang rigs pas brjod pas so //
T11TD4221.1E:95a-31: de'i rigs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:95a-32: chags pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i rnam par shes pa ni de las gzhan pa'i rnam par shes pa mi skyed pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:95a-33: byed pa 'jug pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:95a-34: sngon goms pa med par ni chags par yang mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:95b-0: des na rang bzhin gang la rnam par shes pa @95b sngon goms pa de 'dra ba nyid la phyis chags par 'gyur ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:95b-1: des na sngon goms pa nyid las rnam par shes pa gzhan mi skye ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:95b-2: gang la 'jig rten gzhan med pa //
T11TD4221.1E:95b-3: de la sngon goms srid ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:95b-4: sngon goms pa ni yod min na //
T11TD4221.1E:95b-5: rnam shes gzhan dag bzlog mi 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:95b-6: des na lus de yin pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:95b-7: lus las byung ba'i rnam shes kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:95b-8: tshogs ni yang dang yang 'byung bar //
T11TD4221.1E:95b-9: 'gyur ba de ni mthong ba med //
T11TD4221.1E:95b-10: 'on te lus de'i skad cig ma //
T11TD4221.1E:95b-11: dang po nyid ni rigs pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:95b-12: skyed byed phyi mar 'gyur ba ni //
T11TD4221.1E:95b-13: mi mthun phyir na rgyu nyid min //
T11TD4221.1E:95b-14: nur nur po la phyi mar gyur pa de dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa ni rnam par shes pa rnams kyi skyed byed ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:95b-16: mi mthun pa'i yang skyed par byed pa ni mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:95b-18: gal te rig pa dang po nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:95b-19: lus kyi mtshan nyid las 'byung na //
T11TD4221.1E:95b-20: de nas lus ni rten min pas //
T11TD4221.1E:95b-21: rig pa 'ba' zhig kho nar gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:95b-22: phan gdags par bya ba dang phan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin pa dag ni //
T11TD4221.1E:95b-23: rten dang brten pa'i dngos po ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:95b-24: de lta yin na rnam par shes pa 'ba' zhig pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:95b-25: 'on kyang lus lhan cig byed ba can gyi rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa des na 'ba' zhig gnas pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:95b-26: de lta na rnam par shes pa nyid las /
T11TD4221.1E:95b-27: rnam par shes pa yin la lus ni lhan cig byed pa yin pas nged kyi gzhung nyid btsugs par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:95b-28: 'on te dang po lus nye bar len pa'i rgyu yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:95b-29: dper na autpala la lci ba'i rdzas bzhin te /
T11TD4221.1E:95b-30: phyi nas ni autpala nyid las autpala skye ba bzhin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:95b-31: de lta na ni 'o na ba lang gi lci ba med kyang phyis kyang autpala las kyang autpala 'byung ba de bzhin du /
T11TD4221.1E:95b-32: rnam par shes pa nyid las rnam par shes pa yin pa'i phyir 'ba' zhig gnas par thal lo //
