T11TD4221.1E:95b-33: 'on te lus kyang rgyu nyid du dmigs so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:95b-35: nye bar len pa'i rgyu nyid ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:95b-36: 'on kyang lhan cig byed pa nyid du'o zhes bshad zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:95b-37: 'on te sngar nye bar len pa'i yin la phyis lhan cig byed pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:95b-38: nye bar len pa ni phyis lhan cig byed par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:95b-39: gal te lus ni nye bar len na /
T11TD4221.1E:96a-2: de lta nyid du mthong phyir na //
T11TD4221.1E:96a-3: 'dir ni mthong bar rtogs pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:96a-4: ba lang gi lci ba dang autpala las kyang de lta bur 'gyur ba nyid 'byung ba ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:96a-5: de gnyis la ni khyad bar chen po yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:96a-6: gsal pa la sogs skyes pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:96a-7: shes las la la mthong gang yin //
T11TD4221.1E:96a-8: de nyid dang por mthong bas na //
T11TD4221.1E:96a-9: rnam shes gzhan gyi sgrub byed yin //
T11TD4221.1E:96a-10: de'i phyir lus las rnam par shes pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:96a-11: 'on te khyod kyi ltar na yang gal te /
T11TD4221.1E:96a-12: lus rnam par shes pa'i rten ma yin na de'i tshe lus log kyang rnam par shes pa 'ba' zhig gnas par thal bar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:96a-13: rgyu mtshan med par lhan cig gnas pa nges pa ni ma yin no zhes 'dir gzhan dag gi dogs pa bsu nas lan 'debs pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:96a-14: gal te lus ni log pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:96a-15: rten min phyir na sems 'ba' zhig //
T11TD4221.1E:96a-16: gnas gyur zhe na gal te de'i //
T11TD4221.1E:96a-17: rgyu 'jug thob phyir sems kyi rgyun //
T11TD4221.1E:96a-18: gnas rgyu yan lag mi 'gyur na //
T11TD4221.1E:96a-19: de'i tshe 'ba' zhig gnas par 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T11TD4221.1E:96a-21: tshe 'di nyid kyi skye mched snga //
T11TD4221.1E:96a-22: lus gzhan bskyed pa'i rgyu nyid yin //
T11TD4221.1E:96a-23: de'i tshe ni 'ga' zhig gnas pa gal yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:96a-24: 'di ltar sems kyi rgyun gnas pa'i rgyus /
T11TD4221.1E:96a-26: lus kyi rgyu mer mer po la sogs pa'i ming can de'i 'jug pa ni lus bskyed pa la mngon du phyogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:96a-27: de thob pa ni lus kyi rgyu 'ba' zhig la yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:96a-28: 'on kyang sems kyi rgyun gnas pa'i rgyun sngar gyi sems las kyi ming can de gang gi tshe yan lag lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu nyid yin na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:96a-29: de'i yan lag nyid ni lus kyi sred pa dang bcas pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:96a-30: gal te de yan lag tu mi 'gyur na ni de'i tshe 'ba' zhig gnas par 'dod pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:96a-32: tshe 'di'i skye mched lnga yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:96a-33: gzugs med pa'i khams nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi lus skyes pa la yang /
T11TD4221.1E:96a-34: de nyid 'du byed pa po nyid kyis rgyu yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:96a-35: gal te shi ba'i 'og tu lus skye bam mthong ba'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:96a-36: de yan lag gi dngos por ma dmigs pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:96b-0: gzugs med @96b pa'i khams su ni shin tu yang mthong ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:96b-2: de yi yan lag dngos po dang //
T11TD4221.1E:96b-3: rgyu nyid 'gog la mi dmigs pa //
T11TD4221.1E:96b-4: nges byed min par rab tu bshad //
T11TD4221.1E:96b-5: dbang sogs kyang ni lhag ldan yin //
T11TD4221.1E:96b-6: gal te yang tshe 'di'i skye mched lnga skye ba gzhan gyi lus skyed pa la yan lag gi gi dngos po ma dmigs pa de lta na yang sems kyi rgyun gyi las kyi ming can de ltar med do zhes ma dmigs pa tsam gyis de med par nges pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:96b-7: ma dmigs pa nges par byed pa ma yin no zhes sngar bstan zin pa'i phyir 'di log par rtogs pa ci yod /
T11TD4221.1E:96b-9: 'dir mi dmigs pa tsam zhig brjod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:96b-10: 'on kyang khyab pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi rjes su dpag pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:96b-11: 'di ltar ste dbang po gang yin pa de ni dbang po gzhan dang mtshams sbyor bar byed pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:96b-12: dper na lha sbyin gyi mig la sogs pa ldan pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:96b-13: mchod sbyin gyi mig la sogs pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:96b-14: skye ba 'di'i lus dang 'brel pa yang dbang po yin no zhes bya ba ni /
T11TD4221.1E:96b-15: 'gal bas khyab pa dmigs pa'o zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:96b-17: 'di ni lhag ma dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:96b-18: 'di ni lhag ma dang ldan pa las ni don ci lta ba bzhin rtogs pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa yin no//
T11TD4221.1E:96b-19: skye ba gzhan gyi dbang po dang mtshams mi sbyor ba ni /
T11TD4221.1E:96b-20: ma dmigs pa tsam gyis go bar bya ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:96b-21: ma mthong ba tsam gyis ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs la ldog pa grub pa yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:96b-22: 'on te tshe 'di pa'i lus su 'gyur pa'i dbang po dang mtshams sbyor ba dmigs pa'i phyir gzhan du yang de dang mtshams sbyor ba rjes su dpog na /
T11TD4221.1E:96b-23: de la yang grub pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:96b-24: de yang de'i tshe na tshe 'di pa yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:96b-25: tshu rol dang pha rol bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:96b-26: 'on kyang khu khrag gzhan gyis bskyed pa'i dbang po zhes khyad par du byed pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:96b-28: de yang mi dmigs pa tsam med par mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med par rtogs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:96b-29: khu khrag gzhan nyid kyis khyad par du byas pa ni yul gyi khyad par bzhin dang /
T11TD4221.1E:96b-30: bum pa dang sgra'i khyad par bzhin skyob par byed pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:96b-32: dbang po snga ma rang rigs la //
T11TD4221.1E:97a-2: 'gyur ba mthong phyir gzhan dang gzhan //
T11TD4221.1E:97a-3: skye ba dag kyang grub pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:97a-4: gsal ba'i khyad bar la ltos pa nyid la 'brel pa rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:97a-5: de lta ma yin na ni 'gas kyang 'gar yang tha snyad mi bya ba nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:97a-6: tha snyad ni nus pa nges pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:97a-7: tha snyan ni spyi'i yul can yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:97a-8: des na 'brel pa ni gsal ba tsam la brten pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:97a-10: g-yo bag la sogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba can gyi mig la sogs pa goms pa'i khyad par las de ltar skyes pa na /
T11TD4221.1E:97a-11: de lta bur gyur pa mthong ba las gzhan du de lta bur 'gyur ba nyid rjes su dpog par byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:97a-12: skye ba dang por ni de 'dra ba'i rgyu dbang po ma dmigs te /
T11TD4221.1E:97a-13: des na skye ba gzhan gyi dbang po las skyes pa yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:97a-14: tshe 'di ba nyid dam gzhan gyi khyad par ni rigs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:97a-15: 'on te dbang po de ni gcig nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:97a-16: des na dbang po phyi ma phyi ma snga ma snga mas bskyed par ma grub po zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:97a-17: gal te de lta yin du chug pa de lta na yang /
T11TD4221.1E:97a-18: g-yo ba la sogs pa la goms pa sngon du 'gro ba can nyid mthong ba'i phyir na /
T11TD4221.1E:97a-19: goms pa sngon 'gro can nyid ni //
T11TD4221.1E:97a-20: g-yo sogs rnams la mthong ba'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:97a-21: de lta bur gyur pa rjes su dpog pa grub pa'i phyir gzhan ni don byed med do //
T11TD4221.1E:97a-22: de gcig gam mi gcig ces bya ba 'di ni dgos pa med de /
T11TD4221.1E:97a-23: thams cad du de'i rigs can gyi 'bras bu mthong bu mthong ba las rgyu de lta bu nyid yin no zhes su dpog pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:97a-24: goms pa las skyes pa'i yon tan rmi lam du lus gzhan la mthong ba yin no zhes bstan zin pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:97a-25: gzhan yang 'gyur ba gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba'i phyir gzhan dang gzhan skye ba nyid grub pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:97a-26: des na dbus kyi gnas skabs su dbang po gzhan gyis dbang po gzhan skyed pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:97a-27: de ltar skye ba gzhan gyi dbang po mi skyed /
T11TD4221.1E:97a-28: rang gi ngo bor 'gyur ba'i rnam par 'gyur ba tha dad na ni gcig nyid ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:97a-29: sa la sogs pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:97a-31: 'dir ni rgyud gcig tu rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir shin tu tha dad pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:97b-0: de ni skye ba gzhan la yang mtshungs te skye ba gzhan yang gnyid log pa dang sad pa @97b bzhin du rgyud gcig gi khongs su gtogs pa nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:97b-1: dran pa bar chod pas na de thag ring po bzhin du rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:97b-2: gal te dbang po rnams dbang po nyid las skye ba ni ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:97b-3: 'on kyang dang po ni lus nyid las skyed la phyis ni dbang po nyid las yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:97b-4: nus pa nges pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:97b-6: gal te lus las de skye na //
T11TD4221.1E:97b-7: snga ma bzhin du thal bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:97b-8: sems las she na lus gzhan yang //
T11TD4221.1E:97b-9: de nyid las ni skye bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:97b-10: gal te dngos po lus las skye ba de'i tshe dbang po dang bcas pa las sam /
T11TD4221.1E:97b-12: dbang po dang bcas pa las skye na /
T11TD4221.1E:97b-13: dbang po nyid las skye ba'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:97b-14: dang po yang dbang po las skye bas 'jig rten gzhan rab tu 'grub po //
T11TD4221.1E:97b-15: dbang po med pa las skye na skra dang sen mo'i rtse mo dang /
T11TD4221.1E:97b-16: shi ba'i lus las kyang skye bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:97b-17: du ma nyid yin na dbang po du ma 'byung bar yang thal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:97b-20: de bzhin du lus kyi nus pa yang ci'i phyir na ldog par 'gyur ba yin /
T11TD4221.1E:97b-21: 'on te dbang po dag lus kyi rnam par 'gyur ba'i khyad par nyid yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:97b-22: de'i tshe yang 'jig pa med par thal ba nyid du 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:97b-23: dbang rnams lus las 'byung yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:97b-24: zhes bya ba la sogs par thal ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:97b-25: 'on te sems med pa'i phyir shi ba'i lus la dbang po mi 'byung na /
T11TD4221.1E:97b-26: gal te 'o na ni sems las skye ba yin pas /
T11TD4221.1E:97b-27: sems de nyid las lus gzhan dang /
T11TD4221.1E:97b-28: skye ba gzhan du 'byung ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:97b-29: sngar gyi dbang po'i rgyu nyid du rtog pa'i zhen pas ci bya /
T11TD4221.1E:97b-30: des na lus gzhan ni rnam par shes pa'i rgyu ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:97b-31: des na rgyu ma yin pa'i lus ma tshang bas skye ba gzhan med pa ma yin pa'i phyir mtshams sbyor ba med pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:97b-32: des na rgyu dang bral ba'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:97b-33: tha ma yi ni sems rnams kun //
T11TD4221.1E:97b-34: mtshams sbyor med min de yi phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:97b-36: ces bya ba ni mjug bsdu ba'o //
T11TD4221.1E:97b-37: skye ba gzhan dang 'brel ba'i rgyu ni sred pa dang bcas pa'i las kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa'i sems yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:97b-38: de ni ma tshang ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:98a-1: rgyu yin na ni des na de ma tshang na rgyu dang bral bas mtshams sbyor ba med par 'gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:98a-2: de ltar ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:98a-3: des na bral ba ma yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:98a-5: 'chi ba'i sems yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba nyid lus pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:98a-6: de yang lhag ma dang ldan pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:98a-7: ma mthong ba tsam gyis ldog pa nye bar bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:98a-8: gang yang tshe 'di'i sems ni sems gzhan dang mtshams sbyor ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:98a-9: lus tha dad pa la gnas pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:98a-10: lha sbyin gyi sems bzhin no zhes brjod pa de yang mi rung ste /
T11TD4221.1E:98a-11: rten bkag pa yis gnas pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:98a-12: dgag pa sngar ni bshad zin phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:98a-13: rnam shes dmigs pa nyid yin pas //
T11TD4221.1E:98a-14: skad cig gis ni gzhan dmigs 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:98a-15: gal te de la gnas pa yin na gzhan la gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba tshad ma'i don yin la rten dang brten pa'i dngos po de ni dgag pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:98a-16: rnam par shes pa ni yul na gnas pa yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:98a-17: dmigs par bya ba'i lus ni rnam par shes pa'i rten ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:98a-18: nang gi reg pa'i khyad par gyis /
T11TD4221.1E:98a-19: bde ba la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa'i yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:98a-20: dmigs pa ni rang gi lus la dmigs pas /
T11TD4221.1E:98a-21: gzhan gyi lus la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa bskyed pa yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:98a-22: des na ma nges pa nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:98a-23: lus gzhan pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:98a-24: rgyud gcig tu rtogs pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:98a-26: don dam par ni byis pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par gyis /
T11TD4221.1E:98a-27: skye ba gcig gi lus kyang tha dad pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:98a-28: de'i phyir yid kyi rgyun la lus phan 'dogs pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:98a-29: skye ba ni sems nyid ma yin ste /
T11TD4221.1E:98a-31: des na sems kyi rgyun thog ma med par 'gyur ba yin pas /
T11TD4221.1E:98a-32: skye ba dang 'chi ba'i rgyun rjes su 'brel pa grub pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:98a-33: goms pa grub pas goms pa las byung ba'i yon tan mtha' dag gi skabs yod par byas pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam /
T11TD4221.1E:98a-34: gzhan ba'i yon tan srid pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:98b-0: tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi rgyan las 'jig rten pha rol bsgrub pa rnam par 'grel @98b pa'o /
T11TD4221.1E:98b-2: // / gal te goms pa yod mod /
T11TD4221.1E:98b-3: de rab kyi mthar phyin par go ji ltar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:98b-4: khyad par cung zad tsam dang ldan pa nyid du mthong ba'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:98b-5: mchongs pa bzhin dang chu bskol ba bzhin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:98b-7: goms pas khyad par 'gyur na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:98b-8: mchongs dang chu yi drod bzhin du //
T11TD4221.1E:98b-9: rang bzhin las 'da' min zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:98b-10: byas te gal te slar yang ni //
T11TD4221.1E:98b-12: rten mi brten pa nyid 'gyur na //
T11TD4221.1E:98b-13: khyad par dag ni mi 'phel zhing //
T11TD4221.1E:98b-14: rang bzhin de 'dra'ang ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:98b-16: de la phan 'dogs nus pa rnams //
T11TD4221.1E:98b-17: khyad par phyir ma dag la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:98b-18: bsgrub pa'i nus pa med phyir dang //
T11TD4221.1E:98b-19: rtag tu rten gnas ma yin phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:98b-20: khyad par yin no cog ni bogs 'byung ba rnam par gnas pa la brten par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:98b-21: mchongs pa dang chu bskol ba'i khyad par ni rang gi rgyud 'gyur ba tsam gyis de ltar 'gyur ba ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:98b-22: 'on kyang byas zin pa'i mchongs pa yang /
T11TD4221.1E:98b-23: yang rtsol ba la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:98b-24: mchongs pa ni sngar gyi rtsol ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:98b-25: mchongs pa dag las gzhan pa'i rtsol ba la ltos pa med pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:98b-26: 'on kyang sngar gyi yul nyid du yang rtsol ba la ltos pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:98b-27: chu bskol ba'i rten brten pa ma yin pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:98b-28: yang rtsol ba la ltos pa dang bcas pa yang yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:98b-29: me dang 'brel pa log kyang de yod pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:98b-30: de'i phyir 'phel pa mthar thug pa mi 'gyur ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:98b-31: gang gi phyir 'phel ba mthar thug pa ma yin pa nyid ni /
T11TD4221.1E:98b-32: yang rtsol ba la ltos ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:98b-33: rten mi brten pa nyid kyi khyab pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:98b-35: bzlog pa srid pa'i phyir snying rje la sogs pa yid kyi yon tan rnams ni bogs 'byung ba gnas pa med pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:98b-36: yang rtsol ba la ltos pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin du 'gyur ba nyid ma yin pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:98b-37: gtan tshigs 'di ni khyad par dang bcas pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:98b-38: gang zhig rten brtan pa dang ngo bo nyid du 'gyur ba de ni bogs 'byung ba ba la gnas pa can nyid ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:98b-39: dper na bram ze dang thod pa can gyi yid log pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:98b-40: gang zhig yang rtsol ba la ltos pa dang ldan pa de ni /
T11TD4221.1E:99a-2: min phyir gang tshe byas 'gyur ba //
T11TD4221.1E:99a-3: yang rtsol la ltos mi 'gyur na //
T11TD4221.1E:99a-4: rtsol gzhan khyad par byed par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:99a-5: yang rtsol ba la ltos pa gang yin pa de ni /
T11TD4221.1E:99a-6: gal te mngon par 'phel ba thob pa de ltar na yang de'i ngo bo nyid ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:99a-7: rgyu nye ba la ltos pa ni ngo bo nyid yin par mi 'thad de /
T11TD4221.1E:99a-8: rang gi dang gis 'jug pa la de skad brjod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:99a-9: de na 'di 'phel yang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:99a-10: mchongs pa dang chu bskol ba bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:99a-11: brtse ba la sogs pa yid kyi yon tan rnams dang /
T11TD4221.1E:99a-12: rang gi dang gis 'jug pa'i phyi rol gyi yon tan 'ga' zhig ni de lta ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:99a-13: sems la brtse sems goms skyes pa /
T11TD4221.1E:99a-15: me la sogs nas shing dag dang //
T11TD4221.1E:99a-16: dngul chu dang ni gser sogs bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:99a-17: shing la mes byas pa khyad par bsregs pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid de ni yang rtsol ba la mi ltos pa'i phyir rang gi ngang gis 'jug pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:99a-18: dngul chu la dul ba dang thim pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T11TD4221.1E:99a-19: gser ba rtsom la sogs par byas pa yang ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:99a-20: de bzhin du sems la brtse ba la sogs pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:99a-21: yang nas yang du de goms pas byas pa'i khyad par ni ldog pa la brten pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:99a-22: de bzhin du gang gi tshe snying rje la sogs pa'i khyad par byas zin pa yang rtsol ba la ltos pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
T11TD4221.1E:99a-23: snga ma la mi ltos pa'i nus pa can gyi rtsol ba gzhan ni khyad par phyi ma dang //
T11TD4221.1E:99a-24: phyi ma nyid byed pa'i phyir 'phel ba rab kyi mthar phyin par 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:99a-25: gal te mchongs pa yang rtsol ba la ltos pa la brtse pa la brten ba la sogs pa yang ltos pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:99a-26: des na gcig ni rang gi ngang gis 'jug la /
T11TD4221.1E:99a-27: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ga las she na 'di la bshad zin te mchongs pa dang chu bskol ba la sogs pa la yang rtsol ba la ltos pas rang gi ngang gis 'jug pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:99a-28: brtse ba la sogs pa ni shing la mes byas pa'i khyad par bzhin du rang gi ngang gis 'jug pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:99a-29: de'i phyir de dag las skyes te //
T11TD4221.1E:99a-30: ngo bo nyid skyes yon tan yin //
T11TD4221.1E:99b-0: des na rtsol ba @99b phyi ma dang //
T11TD4221.1E:99b-1: phyi ma khyad par byed pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:99b-2: gang phyir rigs mthun snga ma yi //
T11TD4221.1E:99b-4: brtse ba la sogs blo de dag / goms par 'gyur na ga la gnas //
T11TD4221.1E:99b-5: brtse ba la sogs pa ni brtse ba la sogs pa'i blo rigs mthun pa snga ma las byung ba nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:99b-6: yul nye ba la sogs pa la ltos pa dang bcas pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:99b-8: brtse ba la sogs dran pa dang //
T11TD4221.1E:99b-10: brtse sogs lan du phan 'dogs la //
T11TD4221.1E:99b-11: sogs pa dag la ltos ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:99b-12: rgyud de'i zhing du byas pa dag ni bdun na gtan du gnod par byed par gnas pa dag la yang brtse ba la sogs pa chung bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:99b-13: des na de dag goms pa dang 'brel ba'i dga' ston chen po'i dus na rgyas par mi 'gyur ba'am /
T11TD4221.1E:99b-15: ci ste mngon par 'phel ba mthar thug pa med pa'i rgyu goms pa de ni mchongs pa la yang yod pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:99b-16: des na de yang de'i chos 'thob par 'gyur na de lta na yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:99b-17: des na bzlog pa yin no zhes bya bar sems na bshad pa /
T11TD4221.1E:99b-18: de ltar mchongs nyid las mchongs min //
T11TD4221.1E:99b-19: de rgyu stobs dang 'bad rtsol dag / nus pa nges pa nyid kyi phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:99b-20: mchongs pa nges pa'i bdag nyid yin //
T11TD4221.1E:99b-21: brtse ba la sogs pa rigs mthun pa nyid las brtse ba la sogs pa yin pa bzhin du mchongs pa ni mchongs pa nyid las ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:99b-22: 'on kyang stobs dang rtsol ba dag las yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:99b-23: rang gi mchongs pa goms par byas pa la yang stobs dang rtsol ba dang bral ba na mchongs nus pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:99b-24: stobs dang rtsol bar rnam par gnas pa'i bdag nyid nyid ni /
T11TD4221.1E:99b-25: rang gi rgyu'i nus pa las yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:99b-26: des na mchongs pa yang gnas pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:99b-28: ci ste yang mchongs pa la yul can gyi goms pa nyid las mchongs pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:99b-30: stobs ni sngon yang yod pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:99b-32: sngar ni stobs nyid yod pa nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:99b-33: de ni goms pa nyid las 'phel ba'i phyir ro snyam na /
T11TD4221.1E:99b-35: rigs mthun pa'i mchongs pa las skyes pa yin yang mthar thug pa med pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:100a-0: @100a * // brtse ba la sogs pa yang de nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:100a-2: de ni dang po phyi bzhin du //
T11TD4221.1E:100a-3: mchongs min lus mi mthun pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:100a-4: rtsol ba rim gyis mi mthun pa //
T11TD4221.1E:100a-5: gsal na rang stobs nyid du gnas //
T11TD4221.1E:100a-6: goms pa las ni stobs ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:100a-7: 'on kyang stobs yod pa nyid bad kan la sogs pas mchongs par mi nus pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:100a-8: des na mchongs pa goms pas mi mthun pa sel ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:100a-9: de'i phyir zas dang gnas la sogs pas 'di'i sngar gyi stobs de rang nyid du gnas pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:100a-10: des na phyis mthongs kyi snga ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:100a-11: ci ste bcud kyis len dang 'brel pa las stobs skye na /
T11TD4221.1E:100a-12: de yang bcud kyis len gyi nus pa nges pa'i phyir gnas pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:100a-13: mi dang nam mkha' lding gi phru gu dag mchongs pa goms pa mtshungs pa yin yang mchongs pa ni mtshungs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:100a-15: bya khyud dang ni spre'u dag /
T11TD4221.1E:100a-16: mchongs pa goms pa dang 'brel par //
T11TD4221.1E:100a-17: mtshungs pa yin yang mchongs pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:100a-18: mtshungs pa yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:100a-19: de'i phyir goms pa yod kyang skye gnas dang rigs dang stobs la ltos pa nyid kyis mchongs pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:100a-20: mchongs pa tsam la ltos pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:100a-21: brtse ba la sogs ba dag ni gzhan la mi ltos pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:100a-22: gal te goms la las stobs yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:100a-23: stobs las ni mchongs pa yin pa'i phyir brtse ba la sogs pa ltar goms pa sngon du song ba can de nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:100a-25: shin tu goms par byas pa las stobs nyams pa yang 'gyur ba'i phyir skyon med do //
T11TD4221.1E:100a-26: gal te brtse ba la sogs pa rigs mthun pa'i sa bon tsam la ltos pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:100a-27: 'o na ni de'i tshe thog ma med pa can yin pa'i phyir shin tu de'i bdag nyid du 'gyur na yod pa yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:100a-28: des na sa bon las byung ba ma yin no zhes rtogs so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:100a-30: brtse dang sa bon las byung ba //
T11TD4221.1E:100a-31: gal te sa bon rang byung can //
T11TD4221.1E:100a-32: mi mthun phyogs kyi gnod med na //
T11TD4221.1E:100a-33: sems la de bdag nyid du 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:100a-34: gal te yang brtse ba rang gi sa bon las byung ba dang thog ma med pa can yin pa de lta na yang de'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:100b-0: zhe @100b sdang la sogs pa nang gis bon las byung ba can dag gis gnod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:100b-1: gal te rten brtan pa yang yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:100b-2: 'di dag bar ma chad pa nyid du yang 'gyur na de'i tshe de'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:100b-3: de la 'bad pa chen pos zhe sdang la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs bsal na brtse ba'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:100b-4: 'di gdon mi za bar khas blangs pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:100b-5: 'di ltar goms pa snga ma dang //
T11TD4221.1E:100b-6: snga mas sems chos brtse ba dang //
T11TD4221.1E:100b-7: chags bral rtogs sogs phyi ma dag / gsal ba yi ni rtsa ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:100b-8: brtse ba la sogs pa'i goms pa snga ma snga ma ni sems kyi chos phyi ma phyi ma gsal ba'i rgyu yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:100b-9: skye ba yin na ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:100b-10: skye ba sngar gyi rgyu las yin pas goms pas ni gsal ba 'ga' zhig bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:100b-11: skye ba ni yod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:100b-13: rang gi don la brtson med par //
T11TD4221.1E:100b-14: gzhan don la dga' bdag nyid can //
T11TD4221.1E:100b-15: goms las brtse ba'i bdag nyid de //
T11TD4221.1E:100b-16: chags bral chags dang yid log bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:100b-17: las gzhan med par goms par byas pas ni brtse ba bdag nyid du sgrub par byed pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:100b-18: dper na yid log pa dang chags pa dang chags pa med pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:100b-19: ji ltar mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis gnod pa med pa'i yid byung ba ni /
T11TD4221.1E:100b-20: gang yod pas 'ga' blang bar bya ba nyid ma yin par snang bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:100b-21: de bzhin du chags pa dang chags pa dang bral pa nyid la yang blta bar bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:100b-22: de lta na ni snying rje dang ldan pa /
T11TD4221.1E:100b-23: gzhan gyi sdug bsngal bsal bar 'dod pas rang dang gzhan gyi sdug bsngal gzhom pa'i phyir thams la mngon par sbyor ba 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:100b-24: thugs rje phul byung grub 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:100b-25: gzhan sdug mi bzod pas bskul ba'i //
T11TD4221.1E:100b-26: brtse ldan sdug bsngal gzhom pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:100b-27: thabs rnams la ni mngon sbyor mdzad //
T11TD4221.1E:100b-28: brtse ba dang ldan pa ni rang dang gzhan gyi sdug bsngal gzhom pa'i phyir rtsol ba'i phyir skyed pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:100b-29: rang gi sdug bsngal ma bsal bar gzhan gyi sdug bsngal bsal mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:100b-30: des na rang nyid sdug bsngal dang bral ba sngon du bya ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:101a-1: dag mngon du byed pa la mngon par sbyor ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:101a-3: thabs 'byung de rgyu lkog gyur pa //
T11TD4221.1E:101a-4: de 'chad pa ni dka' ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:101a-5: mtho ris dang byang grol gyi rgyu dang /
T11TD4221.1E:101a-6: 'bras bu mngon du byas pa med pa gang yin pa des ni gzhan dag la bstan par dka' ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:101a-7: de la ni des nus pa yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:101a-8: gal te bden pa rnams rjes su dpag pas /
T11TD4221.1E:101a-10: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ston par srid pa de lta na yang /
T11TD4221.1E:101a-11: thams cad kyi tshe ni ma yin /
T11TD4221.1E:101a-12: rang gi don 'dod pa dang dmyal ba la sogs par skyes pa'i dus na med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:101a-13: 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can la sogs par spyod pa las dang 'bras bu so sor nges pa ston pa yang mi srid pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:101a-14: de bas na thams cad mngon du bya ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:101a-15: de la mngon du byed pa na rgyu rtogs pa yin pas de nyid bshad pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:101a-16: lung dang rigs pas rnam dpyod pa //
T11TD4221.1E:101a-17: sdug bsngal nyid kyi khyad par gyis //
T11TD4221.1E:101a-18: sdug bsngal rgyu dang de mi rtag / la sogs rang bzhin rtogs par mdzad //
T11TD4221.1E:101a-19: rigs pa ni rjes su dpag pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:101a-20: rjes su dpag pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa la ni /
T11TD4221.1E:101a-21: dbang po las 'das pa'i don shes pa'i rgyu lung yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:101a-22: yang na dang po ni lung rtogs par byed pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:101a-23: de nas ni don nges pa'i 'bras bu can rigs pa la 'jug pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:101a-24: lung tsam las ni don nges pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:101a-25: brjod par 'dod pa tsam gyis 'jug pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:101a-26: don dang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:101a-27: 'di thams cad kyang dpyod pa la mngon du phyogs pa yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:101a-28: des na je dang po nyid ni dpyod pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:101a-29: de'i 'og tu ni gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa'i rang bzhin can gyi lung du don de lta ste /
T11TD4221.1E:101a-30: bka' lung tsam la ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:101a-31: rtogs pa dang ldan pa ma rmongs pa ni tshad ma dang ldan pa'i don la bka' lung tsam bsgoms pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:101a-32: des na don de rigs pas brtan par byas nas sgom par byed pa mngon du byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rim pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:101a-33: de la re zhig sdug bsngal gyi rgyu nyid dang por rtogs te /
T11TD4221.1E:101a-34: rgyu bzlog pa'i sgo nas 'bras bu bzlog par byas pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:101b-0: sdug bsngal gyi rgyu brtag pa yang @101b de'i mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rtogs te /
T11TD4221.1E:101b-1: de brtags pas bzlog par rung ba nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:101b-2: bzlog par rung ba nyid du ma rtogs par ni bzlog pa'i phyir brtson pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:101b-3: rgyu med pa nyid dam rgyu rtag pa nyid yin na ni bzlog par bya ba nus pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:101b-5: rgyu med rtag tu yod pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:101b-6: rtag pa'i rgyu can ga la ldog / rgyu dang 'bral ba med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:101b-7: dngos po ldog par ji ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:101b-8: rgyu yis byas pa'i dngos gang yin //
T11TD4221.1E:101b-9: de ni de med na med 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:101b-10: gal te de med kyang yod na //
T11TD4221.1E:101b-12: mi rtag rgyu can dngos po ni //
T11TD4221.1E:101b-13: rgyu med pas ni ldog par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:101b-14: rtag rgyu can la rgyu med par //
T11TD4221.1E:101b-15: med pas ldog pa yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:101b-16: de'i phyir mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i khyad par nyid kyi sdug bsngal dang de'i rgyu mi rtag pa nyid du rtag par mdzad de /
T11TD4221.1E:101b-17: gang phyir de ltar rgyu gnas na //
T11TD4221.1E:101b-18: 'bras ldog gzigs pa med phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:101b-19: de'i rgyu gzhom phyir de yi ni //
T11TD4221.1E:101b-20: mi mthun phyogs la brtag pa mdzad //
T11TD4221.1E:101b-21: gal te dbang phyug la sogs pa rtag pa 'ga' zhig sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yin na de'i phyir de med par mi 'gyur pas sdug bsngal bzlog par mi 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:101b-22: des na 'bras bu ldog pa'i phyir 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:101b-23: nus pa med pa la ni su yang mi 'jug la /
T11TD4221.1E:101b-24: zhugs na yang bslus par mi 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:101b-25: 'bras bu'i rgyu gang yin pa de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs la brtag pa mdzad de rgyu spang ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:101b-26: byung ba ni gnyen po dang 'brel pa med par mi ldog ste /
T11TD4221.1E:101b-27: gnyen po med par ni rgyu med par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:101b-28: gal te rgyu med pa nyid las ldog ste /
T11TD4221.1E:101b-29: las zad pa nyid las ldog pa yin no zhes gzhan dag 'dod do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:101b-31: ma rig pa las las gzhan dang gzhan 'gyur ba'i phyir zad pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:101b-32: las dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu ni ma rig pa yin par ston par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:101b-34: gal te sdug bsngal gyi rgyu'i rang bzhin nges pa med pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:101b-35: sdug pa dang bral ba la sogs pa du ma pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:101b-36: des na bzlog par mi nus so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:102a-2: 'dus byas spyod yul can chags ni //
T11TD4221.1E:102a-3: rgyu yin de yi gnod byed ni //
T11TD4221.1E:102a-4: bdag med mthong ba 'gal ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:102a-5: sdug bsngal gyi rgyu ni bdag dang bdag gir mngon par zhen pas byas pa'i chags pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:102a-6: chags pa ldog na ni bdag gi ba nyams pa la yid sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:102a-7: gal te chags pa dang bral na bdag gi ba nyams pa la yid sdug bsngal ba ma yin mod /
T11TD4221.1E:102a-8: bdag nyid la lus las byung ba'i sdug bsngal bar ji ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:102a-10: gzhan sdug bsngal bas sdug bsngal gang //
T11TD4221.1E:102a-11: de la bdag bde sogs yod min //
T11TD4221.1E:102a-12: bdag gi ba la mngon zhen pas //
T11TD4221.1E:102a-13: bdag la chags pa ldog par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:102a-14: bu la chags pas bdag la chags pa dang bral ba dag ni /
T11TD4221.1E:102a-15: mtshon la sogs pa dang 'brel pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi sdug bsngal yang dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:102a-16: bdag dang bdag gi ba la chags pa yang 'jig tshogs su lta ba las yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:102a-17: des na sdug bsngal gyi rgyu ni 'jig tshogs su lta ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:102a-18: de'i phyir bdag med pa mthong ba gnod par byed pa yin te 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:102a-19: de dang rnam par 'gal ba'i chos ni de'i gnod par byed pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:102a-20: rlung la dro ba dang snum pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:102a-21: des na bdag med pa de'i bdag tu 'gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:102a-22: de las bzlog pa'i rnam pa can 'jig tshogs pa lta ba mi rtag pa yin pas na ldog pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:102a-23: des na bdag gir 'dzin pa ldog pas lus dang yid kyi sdug bsngal mtha' dag ldog go //
T11TD4221.1E:102a-24: gal te lus bcad pa dang bsregs pa la sogs pas 'chi ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal du ci ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:102a-26: lus de dang ni bral ba las //
T11TD4221.1E:102a-27: 'chi ba gzhan yod ma yin la //
T11TD4221.1E:102a-28: lus gzhan grub pa skye ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:102a-29: de la sdug bsngal ci zhig yod //
T11TD4221.1E:102a-30: gang gi tshe lus gcig dang bral zhing /
T11TD4221.1E:102a-31: lus gzhan dang ldan pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:102a-32: snga ma phyi ma'i gnas skabs dag / goms pa las skyes pa'i dran pa gsal bas dran pa de'i tshe phyis pa dang rgan po'i gnas skabs 'dor zhing len pa ltar ram /
T11TD4221.1E:102b-0: @102b gos len pa dang 'dor ba lta bu yin pas /
T11TD4221.1E:102b-1: de la gnod pa ci zhig yod /
T11TD4221.1E:102b-2: mtshams sbyor ba 'dzin pa med par ni gdung bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:102b-3: gang la goms pa de nyid mngon par dga' ba'i rgyu yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:102b-4: tha mal par goms par byas pas ni /
T11TD4221.1E:102b-5: bde ba dang sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:102b-6: shin tu btang snyoms goms pa la ni lus dang longs spyod la gnod pa byas kyang gdung bar mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:102b-7: sems can du lta ba ldog pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:102b-9: rnam pa du mar thabs mang po //
T11TD4221.1E:102b-10: yun ring dus su goms pa las //
T11TD4221.1E:102b-11: de la skyon dang yon tan dag / rab tu gsal ba nyid du 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:102b-12: bdag med pa mthong bas 'dod chags la sogs pa yongs su 'khrug pa'i rgyu mtha' dag dang bral zhing rtogs pa rgyas te /
T11TD4221.1E:102b-13: thabs rnam pa mang po gzhan dang gzhan goms pa na skyon dang yon tan rnams gsal bar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:102b-14: bstan bcos goms na bstan bcos kyi skyon yon rnam pa du ma gsal ba bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:102b-15: yon tan dang skyon gsal ba ni blo gsal ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:102b-16: des na thugs kyang gsal ba'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:102b-17: rgyu yi bag chags spangs pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:102b-18: thub chen gzhan don 'jug can gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:102b-19: bse ru la sogs khyad 'di yin /
T11TD4221.1E:102b-20: gang gi tshe skyon dang yon tan bye brag tu phye bas rtogs pa bsal bar gyur pa de'i tshe /
T11TD4221.1E:102b-21: nyes pa phra mo dang rags pa'i nang na gnas pa'i nyes pa'i rigs skad cig ma tsam yang thams cad shes par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:102b-22: des na ngag ma byang ba la sogs pa yang bzlog pa'i phyir 'bad par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:102b-23: de'i phyir bag chags spong ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:102b-24: 'di nyid ni 'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang mu stegs pa yang dag las bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa'i khyad par yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:102b-25: yang na gal te sdug bsngal ba spangs ba yin mod /
T11TD4221.1E:102b-26: de lta na yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni srid pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:102b-27: de lta ma yin na 'dod chags dang bral ba mtha' dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:102b-29: rnam pa du mar thabs mang po //
T11TD4221.1E:102b-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:102b-32: rnam pa mang po yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:103a-0: dus yun ring por goms pas ni 'khor ba'i skyon yon mtha' dag @103a * //
T11TD4221.1E:103a-2: gang tshe dran pa gsal 'gyur bas //
T11TD4221.1E:103a-3: sngon gyi skye ba dran gyur pa //
T11TD4221.1E:103a-4: de la de yi rjes 'brangs pas //
T11TD4221.1E:103a-5: de dag thams cad rtogs par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:103a-6: ji ltar grong gzhan nas 'ongs pa //
T11TD4221.1E:103a-8: de rig pa yis shes 'gyur ba ;
T11TD4221.1E:103a-9: / de bzhin skye gzhan nas 'ongs pa //
T11TD4221.1E:103a-10: dper na grong gzhan nas 'ongs pa la de dang brten pas skyes pa'i khyad par mthong ba na /
T11TD4221.1E:103a-11: de rig pas de nas 'ongs par shes pa des na grong gzhan yang de'i khyad par nyid du shes pa de bzhin du /
T11TD4221.1E:103a-12: skye ba gzhan yang nges pa skyed pa'i 'du byed kyi rgyu yin pa nyid kyis rjes su dpog pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:103a-13: lkog tu 'gyur ba'i don skye ba gzhan yod par sbyin pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa 'dis ci ste rjes su mi dpog / des na rgyu dang 'bras bu dag nges par rig pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:103a-14: 'di ni sngon las 'di dang yul 'di dang 'brel par 'gyur ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:103a-15: 'di lta bu'i ngo bo'i rnam pa dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:103a-16: so sor nges pa'i yul la sogs pa dang 'brel pa /
T11TD4221.1E:103a-17: de'i 'bras bu dang rang bzhin gyi bye brag gi rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa ni rgyu'i rang bzhin dang de'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyi bye brag dang 'brel pa mtha' dag rig pa'i phyir so sor nges pa'i rang bzhin thams cad rig pas na /
T11TD4221.1E:103a-18: las dang 'bras bu la sogs pa'i 'brel pa thams cad yongs su shes pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:103a-19: mtho ris dang ni byang grol lam //
T11TD4221.1E:103a-20: ji bzhin du ni mkhyen pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:103a-21: skyes bu'i don mkhyen tsam gyis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:103a-22: ston pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:103a-23: 'gro ba mtha' dag kyang phan tshun rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po las 'das par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:103a-24: des na rgyu 'bras kyi dngos po rnam pa du ma bsgoms pa dang rjes su 'brel pas 'gro ba mtha' dag rig par 'gyur ba ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin pa des na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:103a-25: 'on te rjes su dpag pas rig na 'di ji ltar dngos su gzigs pa can yin /
T11TD4221.1E:103a-26: bcom ldan 'das ni mngon du gzigs pa por 'dod pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:103a-27: de yang gyi na nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:103a-28: rnam kun rjes dpog gang yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:103a-29: mngon sum las ni dbyer yod min //
T11TD4221.1E:103a-30: dbang po dang ni 'brel pas kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:103b-0: de las khyad @103b par lhag byed min //
T11TD4221.1E:103b-1: don gyi rang bzhin rnam pa thams cad du rig pa gang yin pa de nyid mngon sum yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:103b-2: mngon sum gyi don ni mngon du byed pa'i don yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:103b-3: gal te dbang po la brten pa'i don mngon sum gyi don yin nam zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:103b-4: 'di ni mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:103b-5: 'on kyang yang dag pa'i mngon sum rig pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:103b-6: dbang po nye bar mtshon pa tsam du zad do //
T11TD4221.1E:103b-7: gzhan yang gang zhig dbang po dang 'brel pa yin yang /
T11TD4221.1E:103b-8: mngon du mthong ba med pa de /
T11TD4221.1E:103b-10: de ni dbang po nyid ma yin te nyams pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:103b-12: mngon du byed rgyu min phyir te //
T11TD4221.1E:103b-13: gal te mngon sum min 'dod na //
T11TD4221.1E:103b-14: mngon du byed pa'i rgyu yin phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:103b-15: dbang po zhes ni nges par gzung //
T11TD4221.1E:103b-16: dbyibs la sogs pa tsam gyis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:103b-17: dbang por 'thad pa ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:103b-18: nyams pa yang de nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:103b-19: mngon du byed pa'i rgyu nyid dbang po yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:103b-20: yid kyang de lta nyid du 'gal ba med do //
T11TD4221.1E:103b-22: yid ni gsal ba nyid las ni //
T11TD4221.1E:103b-23: rnam pa gsal por mthong ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:103b-24: yid ni rnam par 'khrug pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:103b-25: dbang shes gsal ba ga la yod //
T11TD4221.1E:103b-26: mngon du phyogs pa dang 'brel pa'i yid las dbang po'i shes pa yang mngon du byed par 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:103b-27: des na dbang pos bskyed pa nyid ni rgyu ma yin pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:103b-28: de'i rnam pa thams cad mngon du byed pas 'jug pa'i rjes su dpag pa yang mngon sum nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:103b-29: gal te 'das pa la sogs pa lkog tu gyur pa'i don la 'jug pa ji ltar mngon sum yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:103b-30: de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:103b-31: mngon du byed pa yod pas na //
T11TD4221.1E:103b-32: 'di ni ji ltar lkog gyur nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:103b-33: mngon du byas pa lkog nyid na //
T11TD4221.1E:103b-35: 'on te dbang po'i byed pa las lkog tu gyur ba ma yin pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:103b-36: dbang po'i byed pa de nyid mngon du byed pa med par ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur ba yin /
T11TD4221.1E:103b-37: mngon du byed pas rtogs na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:103b-38: rnam pa thams cad rjes su dpog pa la yang dbang po'i byed pa yod par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:103b-39: rjes su dpag pa 'jug pa ni thams cad la yod pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:104a-0: mig la sogs pa'i byed pa yang rjes su dpog pa @104a * //
T11TD4221.1E:104a-1: nyid las rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:104a-3: gang tshe sngon gyi rnam pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:104a-4: thams cad rjes su dpog 'gyur ba //
T11TD4221.1E:104a-5: de tshe bdag gi mig sogs kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:104a-6: byed pa yang ni rtogs par byed //
T11TD4221.1E:104a-8: dbang po'i byed de rjes dpag gis //
T11TD4221.1E:104a-9: rtogs 'gyur de phyir dbang po yi //
T11TD4221.1E:104a-10: byed de de la ci phyir med //
T11TD4221.1E:104a-11: gang gi tshe de nyid skyes ba 'am 'byung bar 'gyur ba rjes su dpog par byed pa de'i tshe de la 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dbang po'i byed pa rjes su dpag pas rtogs so //
T11TD4221.1E:104a-12: gang gi tshe 'byung bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid do//
T11TD4221.1E:104a-13: de ni rnam pa thams cad du rjes su dpog pas rtogs pa la yod pa yin pa'i phyir ji ltar dbang po'i byed pa med pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:104a-14: gal te byung ba dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang ji ltar yod pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:104a-16: mngon du bya nyid dngos po de'i //
T11TD4221.1E:104a-17: yod pa nyid du brjod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:104a-18: thams cad du ni dngos po yi //
T11TD4221.1E:104a-19: yod nyid don byed pa la rtogs //
T11TD4221.1E:104a-20: da ltar ba mngon par 'dod pa'i bya ba la sogs pa'i don gyi bdag nyid la yang mngon du byed pa nyid las de yod par rtogs pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:104a-21: gzhan las ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:104a-22: gal te me la sogs pa mngon du byas pa la yang rjes su dpag pas yod par rtogs pa ma yin na ma zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:104a-24: de yang de lta bu nyid rjes su dpog go //
T11TD4221.1E:104a-26: byed pa'am byed par 'gyur ba rjes su dpog pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:104a-27: gzhan du na rjes su dpag pa mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:104a-28: mthong ba'i rjes su 'brang ba na mthong bar bya ba nyid rjes su dpog par byed de /
T11TD4221.1E:104a-29: de lta bu ma yin na mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:104a-30: gal te 'gas kyang ma mthong mi mthong mthong bar mi 'gyur ba ni /
T11TD4221.1E:104a-31: de'i tshe ri bong gi rva dang mtshungs par med pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:104a-32: nus pa nye bar brjod pa thams cad dang bral ba ni nye bar brjod pa med pa nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:104a-33: gal te da ltar ba'i dus dang 'brel pas yod pa nyid yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:104a-34: mngon du byed pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:104a-35: de lta yin dang rnal 'byor pa rnams 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa mngon sum du byed pa nyid du khyed 'dod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:104a-36: da ltar byung ba tsam mthong ba yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:104b-0: 'di 'das @104b pa la sogs pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:104b-1: des na skye bo thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid pas 'di lta bu mngon du byed pa nyid dam rnal 'byor pa nyid yin zhes gzhan dag 'dzer to //
T11TD4221.1E:104b-3: dus ni tshad ma gang gis kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:104b-4: rtogs pa yod pa ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:104b-5: mngon sum gyis ni gzugs sogs tsam //
T11TD4221.1E:104b-6: rtogs 'gyur rjes su dpag pa yang //
T11TD4221.1E:104b-8: 'jug pa yang ni dmigs ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:104b-9: mngon sum gyi ni gzugs sogs pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:104b-10: rang bzhin nyid 'ba' zhig dmigs kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:104b-11: dus la sogs pa dang 'brel pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:104b-12: mngon sum ni de'i rnam pa tsam dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:104b-13: mdun na gnas pa'i rnam pa 'dzin pa las gzhan du ni mngon sum rtogs pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:104b-14: de lta ma yin na thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:104b-15: dus ni ka ba la sogs pa ltar mdun na gnas pa'i rnam pa nyid du dmigs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:104b-16: rjes su dpag pa yang mngon sum med par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:104b-17: 'on te 'byung ba dang yun ring ba la sogs par ni gzung bar bya ba'am /
T11TD4221.1E:104b-18: rjes su dpag par bya ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:104b-19: de yang yang dag pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:104b-20: dus ni yun ring mnyam sogs pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:104b-21: blo yi mdun na gnas pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:104b-22: de lta'i rnam pa dang bral na //
T11TD4221.1E:104b-23: blo ni mngon sum yin mi 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:104b-24: yun ring por byas so zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bum pa la sogs pa nyid snang ba yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:104b-25: des na dus gzhan ni snang ba med do //
T11TD4221.1E:104b-26: 'on te yang bum pa la sogs pa nyid kyi 'bras bu rten pa snang ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:104b-27: 'o na yun ring po la sogs pa'i don ci yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:104b-29: rgyu rnams nye bar mi gnas phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:104b-30: dus med na yang bum sogs kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:104b-31: cha sogs dal bus rim gyis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:104b-32: rdzogs pa yun ring don yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:104b-33: bum pa la sogs pa cha shas dal bus rim gyis yongs su rdzogs par grub pa gang yin pa de nyid yun ring po'i sgra'i don to //
T11TD4221.1E:104b-34: gal te dus med na dal bus dang rim pa de nyid mi 'thad do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:104b-36: sgrub par byed pa nye bar mi gnas pa tsam gyis de 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:104b-37: sgrub par byed pa nye bar mi gnas pa yang nye bar gnas pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro//
T11TD4221.1E:105a-0: @105a * // nye ba'i rgyu med pa yang de'i rgyu med pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:105a-1: de ltar na rgyu'i rtsom pa 'di ni thog ma med pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:105a-2: de'i phyir dus zhes bya ba 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:105a-4: myur ba dus kyi stobs kyis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:105a-5: 'jug na de la rgyu yis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:105a-6: ci zhig byas par gyur pa soms //
T11TD4221.1E:105a-7: 'bras bu rnams kyis 'jug par byed pa dus yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:105a-8: de la rgyu rnams kyi byed pa'i 'bras bu gang yin /
T11TD4221.1E:105a-9: rgyu med par dus kyis mi nus so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:105a-10: 'o na ni rgyu yod pa dang med pa nyid las 'bras bu skyes pa yin gyi dus ni nus pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:105a-11: gal te dus med par rgyu rnams kyis mi nus pa yin na dus rgyu'i dngos por rigs pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:105a-12: dus ni med pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:105a-13: khyab pa dang rtag pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:105a-14: 'on te dus gzhan dang gzhan nye bar gnas pa la ltos pa'i rgyu las skye ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:105a-15: dus gzhan dang gzhan nye bar gnas pa de nyid ga las /
T11TD4221.1E:105a-16: rgyu gzhan las so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:105a-17: de nyid las 'bras bu'i rim pa yin la rag mod /
T11TD4221.1E:105a-19: rim pa nyid dus yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:105a-21: rim pa ni 'di lhan cig pa dang lhan cig pa ma yin pa'i dngos po yin pa'i phyir la /
T11TD4221.1E:105a-22: de yang dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid yin pas dus gzhan med do //
T11TD4221.1E:105a-23: ji ste nyi ma la sogs pa'i rgyu ba nyid dus yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:105a-25: nyi ma la sogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo las tha dad pa'i rgyu ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:105a-26: de'i rang gi ngo bo yang mngon sum gyis rtogs par bya ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:105a-28: mthong bzhin pa ni da ltar ba //
T11TD4221.1E:105a-30: de ltar dus ni rnam pa gnas //
T11TD4221.1E:105a-31: 'o na ci ltar dngos po 'di'i dus ni 'di yin no zhes tha dad par rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:105a-32: 'di ni mchi gu'i lus yin zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:105a-33: ldog par rtogs pa ci lta ba //
T11TD4221.1E:105a-34: de bzhin dus ni tha dad du //
T11TD4221.1E:105a-36: de bzhin du yang 'jig rten dag brjod de /
T11TD4221.1E:105a-37: khyod kyi skyes pa'i dus gang yin //
T11TD4221.1E:105a-38: khyod ci bde sogs gnas sam zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:105a-39: de yi rang bzhin khyad par nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:105b-0: des na da ltar mi mthong ba ni 'das @105b pa dang ma 'ongs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don gyi de kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:105b-1: gal te de lta na rnal 'byor ba rnams la 'das pa la sogs pa mthong ngo zhes bya ba mi mthong ba yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:105b-2: de la gal te rang gis mi mthong ba mthong ba yin no zhes brjod na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:105b-3: de'i tshe ma yin la mo gsham yang yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:105b-4: de'i phyir 'das pa la sogs pa mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i don ci yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:105b-5: gzhan gyis mthong bar bya ba ma yin pa mthong ba ste /
T11TD4221.1E:105b-6: des mthong ba nyid kyis na de tsam du ni de da ltar ba nyid yin pas skyon med do //
T11TD4221.1E:105b-7: gzhan la ltos nas ni de 'das pa nyid la sogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:105b-8: de'i phyir mngon du byas pa gang yin pa de nyid yod pa yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:105b-9: 'das pa la sogs pa la dbang po'i byed pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:105b-10: mngon du byas pa de yod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:105b-11: gzhan yang dus de dang 'brel par //
T11TD4221.1E:105b-12: gang tshe de mngon byas 'gyur ba //
T11TD4221.1E:105b-13: de tshe da ltar yod min yang //
T11TD4221.1E:105b-14: de yi yod nyid 'thad mi dka' //
T11TD4221.1E:105b-15: gal te da ltar ba'i dus dang 'brel pa med kyang /
T11TD4221.1E:105b-16: de'i tshe dus dang 'brel pa de ltar byung ba'i dngos po mngon du byas pa ni yod pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:105b-17: des na da ltar byung ba'i don 'dzin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:105b-18: 'das pa la sogs pa'i shes pa la rnam pa thams cad yongs su gcod pa dang ldan pa'i mngon sum yod pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:105b-19: 'o na de ji ltar 'das pa nyid yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:105b-20: lta ba po'i da ltar byung ba'i dus dang 'brel par mi 'dzin pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:105b-21: gzhan gyis ni de'i dus dang 'brel pa yang mi 'dzin pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:105b-22: rnal 'byor pas kyang mnyam par bzhag pa las langs nas /
T11TD4221.1E:105b-23: 'das pa nyid du tha snyad byed pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:105b-24: de nyid rnal 'byor pas da ltar mthong ba ji ltar 'das pa yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:105b-26: 'di ltar da ltar ba'i dus nyid ni /
T11TD4221.1E:105b-27: lta po nyid kyis yin zhes rtogs //
T11TD4221.1E:105b-28: gzhan gyi dus ni ji ltar gzhan //
T11TD4221.1E:105b-30: byed pa po'i dus gang yin pa de ji ltar gzhal par bya ba'i don gyi yin par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:105b-31: rta'i ngang pa nyid ni ba lang gi yin par mi rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:105b-32: 'on te de'i tshe rtogs pa ji ltar gzhan dus yin zhe na gzhan gyi dus rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:106a-2: gang zhig gang gi ngo bor rig / dngos po de yi ngo bo nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:106a-3: byed po'i dus ni de yi min //
T11TD4221.1E:106a-4: dus ni byed pa po'i yin gyi don gyi ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:106a-5: dus gzhan gyi khyad par can nyid du rtogs pa ji ltar byed pa po'i dus gzhan gyi rjes su 'jug /
T11TD4221.1E:106a-6: byed pa po ni phyis dus gzhan nyid rtogs par byed de /
T11TD4221.1E:106a-7: bdag nyid rtogs pa na dus gzhan dang 'brel par rtogs pas de ji ltar gzhan du rnam par 'jog / gzhan yang de'i tshe ni byed pa po yang de'i dus nyid du rtogs par byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:106a-8: gzhan gyis sam phyis ni byed pa po de dus gzhan nyid du rtogs pa yin no zhes bshad zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:106a-9: de'i phyir de ni de'i dus nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir de ltar yod pa nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:106a-10: de ngas der rtogs so zhes bya ba ni dran pa'i tha snyad tsam du zad kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:106a-11: don dam pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:106a-12: de la mngon sum mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:106a-13: des na rnam pa thams cad du rtogs pa ni mngon sum du 'gyur ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:106a-14: 'on te yang gal te mngon sum yin na ji ltar gzhan gyis mi rtogs /
T11TD4221.1E:106a-15: gang la des nyams su myong ba nyid du mthong ba'i bu 'byung ba des ma rtogs pa ji ltar 'khrul pa ma yin /
T11TD4221.1E:106a-16: rnal 'byor pas ni da ltar rtogs la /
T11TD4221.1E:106a-17: de dang ldan pas ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:106a-19: ci ltar de ni ston sogs dus ldan par //
T11TD4221.1E:106a-20: mthong ba de ltar de la gnod pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:106a-21: dus der ldan ni de yang mthong med pas //
T11TD4221.1E:106a-22: de ltar ma rtogs na yang skyon yod min //
T11TD4221.1E:106a-23: des ni de'i bu de ston la rtogs par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dus dang 'brel par mthong bas de ni de ltar ma rtogs kyang gnod pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:106a-24: gal te de'i tshe yang ma rtogs na ni des na gnod par 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:106a-25: 'on te ji ltar des de mthong ba bzhin du rnal 'byor pa las tha dad pa gzhan gyis kyang de'i phyir ma mthong ste /
T11TD4221.1E:106a-26: de'i phyir de ma mthong bas gnod pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:106a-27: de la yang snying po med de /
T11TD4221.1E:106a-28: ji ltar gzhan gyis ring mthong ba //
T11TD4221.1E:106a-29: de bzhin gzhan yang mthong ngam ci //
T11TD4221.1E:106a-30: phra mo la sogs yod na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:106a-31: thams cad kyis ni mthong ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:106a-32: gang la gcig gi nus yod pa //
T11TD4221.1E:106a-33: de la kun gyi de yod min //
T11TD4221.1E:106a-34: rnal 'byor min pas mi mthong phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:106b-0: ma 'ongs @106b pa zhes bya bar ngas //
T11TD4221.1E:106b-2: gal te gzhan gyis mi mthong ba de lta na yang /
T11TD4221.1E:106b-3: de'i tshe de rang gi ngo bos rtogs pa yin na ji ltar ma 'ongs pa nyid yin //
T11TD4221.1E:106b-4: gang phyir dmigs pa yod pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:106b-5: med nyid mi dmigs pa las min //
T11TD4221.1E:106b-6: dmigs kyang yod pa ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:106b-8: dmigs bzhin pa ni med pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:106b-9: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:106b-10: ci ste de dus gang du dmigs pa de nyid kyi tshe na de yod pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:106b-12: dngos po las ni tha dad pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:106b-13: dus ni 'ga' yang mthong ba med /
T11TD4221.1E:106b-14: ston la sogs pa'i dngos po ni //
T11TD4221.1E:106b-16: yul gyi khyad par las tha dad pa'i dus ni 'ga' yang dmigs pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:106b-17: grang ba la sogs pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:106b-18: nyi ma rgyu ba la sogs pa'i khyad par rnams ni ston la sogs pa'i dus yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:106b-19: de dag ni dmigs pa nyid yin na da ltar byung ba nyid yin pas ji ltar 'das pa dang 'byung ba yin /
T11TD4221.1E:106b-20: ston sogs la ni 'das sogs kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:106b-21: rnam dbye ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:106b-22: gal te gzhan gyis dmigs med na //
T11TD4221.1E:106b-23: gnyis po rnam dbye med par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:106b-24: gal te yang de'i tshe ma dmigs pa de'i tshe yang da ltar 'byung ba ma yin par 'gyur mod /
T11TD4221.1E:106b-25: da ltar byung ba ma yin pa de ci 'das pa yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:106b-26: 'on te ma 'ongs pa yin zhes rnam par dbye ba go gang las yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:106b-28: ji ltar rjes su dpag pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:106b-29: 'jug pa de bzhin du zhes zung //
T11TD4221.1E:106b-30: mngon sum yang ni dngos po de //
T11TD4221.1E:106b-31: de bzhin nyid du rtogs par byed //
T11TD4221.1E:106b-32: ji ltar rjes su dpag pas de 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa la sogs pa nyid du rtogs pa de bzhin rjes su dpag pa des skyed pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i mngon sum yang yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:106b-33: rjes su dpag pa des bskyed pa'i mngon sum nyid gzhan du ni rtogs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:106b-34: des na gang ji ltar rtogs pa de ni de bzhin du yod do zhes rtogs par bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:106b-35: gal te mngon sum rjes su dpag pa las bskyed pa nyid yin na rim gyis rtogs par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:107a-0: de lta na yang thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i dngos po'i tshogs kyis rtogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa med pa'i phyir ji ltar thams cad mkhyen pa @107a * //
T11TD4221.1E:107a-3: de ni shin tu goms pa las //
T11TD4221.1E:107a-4: don de yud la rig 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:107a-5: glo bur ba yi du ba las //
T11TD4221.1E:107a-6: lus can me ni rtogs pa bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:107a-7: rgyud goms pa dang 'brel pa rnams du ba las me rtogs pa ni rim pa la ltos pa dang ldan pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:107a-8: des na rim pa ma yin par rtogs pas skyon med do //
T11TD4221.1E:107a-9: gal te thog ma med pa'i dngos po'i rtogs pa yongs su rdzogs par ji ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:107a-10: yongs su rdzogs nas yang ji ltar thog ma med pa yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:107a-12: thog med gal te rig byed kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:107a-13: yin na de las ci ltar rtogs //
T11TD4221.1E:107a-14: thog ma med par rtogs pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:107a-15: yongs su rdzogs pa yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:107a-16: gal te rig byed thog ma dang tha ma med pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:107a-17: ci ltar de las rtogs pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:107a-18: thog ma dang tha ma med pa nyid du'o zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:107a-19: yongs su rdzogs pa med pa'i phyir ci yang byar med do //
T11TD4221.1E:107a-20: gal te rig byed las gzhan gyis rtogs par mi 'gyur ram /
T11TD4221.1E:107a-21: mi 'gyur na ni rig byed tshad ma ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:107a-22: gal te da ltar ni re zhig rtogs pa yod pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:107a-23: bdag ni rig byed 'dis nges par sbyar ro snyam du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:107a-24: gzhan gyi tshe ni yod dam med kyang bla ste /
T11TD4221.1E:107a-25: de lta na yang 'di 'jug par byed pa'i phyir tshad ma nyid de //
T11TD4221.1E:107a-26: 'jug par byed pa brjod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:107a-28: gal te 'di gzhan gyi tshe 'di'i don ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:107a-30: gal te gzhan gyi tshe rig byed don 'di dang ldan pa mchog yin no zhes dogs na da lta na yang tshad mar mi 'gyur te sngon bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:107a-31: gal te sngon yang de lta bu yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:107a-32: de'i pha rol dang de'i yang pha rol zhes yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:107a-33: des na gcig la the tshom za na gzhan la yang yid brtan du med pas tshad ma ma yin pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:107a-34: ci ste snga ma spyir gcig nyid rtogs so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:107a-35: de lta yin na 'di rjes su dpag par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:107a-36: des na rnam pa thams cad rjes su dpog pa na mngon sum nyid kyis nyams pa med pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:107a-37: des na mngon sum gyis kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa nyid mi rig pa ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:107a-39: rang rgyud yongs su bcad pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:107a-41: de dang 'brel par rtogs na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:107b-0: @107b gzhan dag bas kyang rtogs pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:107b-1: de lta yin na mtha' med pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:107b-2: dngos po rig pa 'thad mi dka' //
T11TD4221.1E:107b-3: de'i phyir tshad las shin tu 'das pa'i rgyu 'bras kyi dngos po'i bye brag goms na /
T11TD4221.1E:107b-4: 'bras bu'i bye brag thams cad snang ba yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:107b-5: de'i mthu las kyang rgyu'i dbye ba yang yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:107b-7: thabs yongs su gcod pa'i thabs yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:107b-8: de'i phyir brtse ba dang ldan pa'i gdon mi za bar thabs mngon par sbyor ro //
T11TD4221.1E:107b-9: rig byed ni yongs su shes zin kyang /
T11TD4221.1E:107b-10: mtho ris dang byang grol gyi lam rig pa'i thabs ma yin no zhes sngar bstan pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:107b-11: gal te thabs goms pa las de 'dod pa thams cad rig pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:107b-13: de lta na yang bag chags kyi gnas ngan len gyis mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i gnas skabs su gzhan du yang nye bar ston par 'gyur la /
T11TD4221.1E:107b-14: bkres pa la sogs pa dang ldan pas kyang gzhan gyi don nyams par byed pa'i phyir rig byed las 'di khyad par med do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:107b-16: rig byed la ni gzhi med phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:107b-17: don dam du na tshad ma min //
T11TD4221.1E:107b-18: don dang 'brel pa med pas de'i //
T11TD4221.1E:107b-19: tha snyad kyang ni gzhi med nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:107b-20: rig byed thog ma med pa nyid yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:107b-21: dang po don dang 'brel pa 'dzin pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:107b-22: mchong sbyin byed pa rnams kyi tha snyad kyang gzhi med pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:107b-23: des na dmus long ba brgyud pa kho nar zad do //
T11TD4221.1E:107b-24: rnam par rtog pa'i don brda'i stobs kyis snang ba yin yang /
T11TD4221.1E:107b-25: de tsam gyis ni don thob pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:107b-26: gzhan la yang mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:107b-27: 'di la ni gzhi rjes su dpag pa nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:107b-28: des na bag chags yod kyang skyon med do //
T11TD4221.1E:107b-30: des na thugs kyang gsal ba'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:107b-31: rgyu yi bag chags spangs pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:107b-32: thub chen gzhan don 'jug can gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:107b-33: bse ru la sogs khyad 'di yin //
T11TD4221.1E:107b-34: rtogs pa gsal ba la ni skyon yon gyi rigs phra mo mtha' dag kyang snang ba yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:107b-35: sems can gyi don la dga' ba la ni nyes pa cung zad tsam yang gnod pa byed pa yin pa de'i phyir de goms pas sel par byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:107b-36: zas la sogs pa yang phyin ci log goms par byed pa nyid la 'byung gi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:107b-38: lan gsum za ba goms pa las //
T11TD4221.1E:108a-0: @108a * // gnyis za de yi bdag tu 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:108a-1: gnyis za lan cig nyid 'gyur ba //
T11TD4221.1E:108a-2: des na bkres pa gtan med 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:108a-3: gal te 'di dngos po la yod pa yin pa na ni goms pas bsgrub par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:108a-5: lus can rnams kyi skyon yon ni //
T11TD4221.1E:108a-6: thams cad goms pa'i rtsa ba can //
T11TD4221.1E:108a-7: goms te bdag la rag las pas //
T11TD4221.1E:108a-8: yon tan nyid la byas pa mchog / goms pa gsal ba dang 'brel pa de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag las khyad par du 'phags pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:108a-9: gzhan yang gang tshe skye ba dran pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:108a-10: sngon gyi ston pa dang 'brel pa //
T11TD4221.1E:108a-11: de tshe lha sogs ngo bo yi //
T11TD4221.1E:108a-12: bkres pa la sogs yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:108a-13: gal te slob dpon gyis ston pa sdug bsngal rab tu zhi ba'i thabs nyid du bstan pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:108a-14: de skad du yang sbyor ba ni 'gro ba la ston pa'i phyir ston pa nyid do zhes gsungs so //
T11TD4221.1E:108a-15: de ci ltar na thabs goms pa yin par 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:108a-17: 'on kyang thabs goms pa nyid ston pa yin gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:108a-18: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba bshad pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:108a-19: de don phyir na thabs goms pa //
T11TD4221.1E:108a-20: de nyid ston pa yin par 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:108a-21: grub las dang po 'byung ba'i phyir ;
T11TD4221.1E:108a-22: / gnyis po 'di ni rgyu ru bshad //
T11TD4221.1E:108a-23: der ston pa nyid dngos su 'dod pa ni ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:108a-24: 'on kyang thabs goms pa nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:108a-26: de don phyir de'i don la ni de'i sgras 'gyur ba nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:108a-27: dbang po'i don gyi mchod sdong la dbang po'i sgras brjod pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:108a-28: de'i don nyid ga las she na /
T11TD4221.1E:108a-31: blo gsal ba dag las ston pa grub pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:108a-34: gnyis po 'di yi rgyu ru bshad //
T11TD4221.1E:108a-35: de la rgyu ni bsam pa dang //
T11TD4221.1E:108a-36: sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:108a-37: bsam pa ni 'gro ba la phan par bzhed pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:108a-38: sbyor ba ni 'gro ba la ston pa nyid do zhes so //
T11TD4221.1E:108a-39: 'di rgyur bshad do zhes bya ba yang ga las she na /
T11TD4221.1E:108a-40: dang po brjod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:108a-41: dngos kyi ston pa nyid ni bde bar gshegs pa nyid kyi rgyu ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:108b-0: de'i phyir thabs goms pa nyid ston pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma @108b yin no zhes rtogs par bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:108b-1: de ltar na bcom ldan 'das ni thabs goms pa las bde bar gshegs pa nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:108b-2: bde bar gshegs pa nyid de gang yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:108b-4: rgyu spangs yon tan gsum bde gshegs //
T11TD4221.1E:108b-5: nyid yin sdug bsngal rten min phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:108b-6: legs yin de ni bdag med pa //
T11TD4221.1E:108b-7: mthong ba'am sbyor ba las yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:108b-8: bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pas byas pa 'dus byas kyi spyod yul can gyi chags pa ni rgyu yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:108b-9: rgyu de spangs pa'i yon tan gsum ste /
T11TD4221.1E:108b-11: phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:108b-12: ma lus par spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:108b-13: spangs pa'i ni bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa la sogs pa med pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:108b-14: de med pas ni sdug bsngal gyi rten med pa'i phyir legs pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:108b-15: bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:108b-16: mu stegs pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal spangs pa rgyu las sdug bsngal dang 'brel par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:108b-17: bdag gi bar 'dzin pa la ni /
T11TD4221.1E:108b-18: bral ba'i sdug bsngal ba yod do //
T11TD4221.1E:108b-19: spangs pa de nyid ga las she na /
T11TD4221.1E:108b-20: bdag med pa mthong ba nyid las so //
T11TD4221.1E:108b-21: mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa ni mthong ba nyid las spong ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:108b-22: sbyor ba las kyang yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:108b-23: sbyor ba ni goms pa ste /
T11TD4221.1E:108b-24: bsgom pas spang par bya ba'i nyon mongs pa 'jig pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:108b-25: yang na sbyor ba ni ldan pa ste /
T11TD4221.1E:108b-27: gnyis su med pa nyid dam /
T11TD4221.1E:108b-28: gnyis su med pa mthong ba'o //
T11TD4221.1E:108b-29: gang gi tshe gang zag bdag med pa las sam /
T11TD4221.1E:108b-30: 'on te chos bdag med pa las kyang rung ste /
T11TD4221.1E:108b-31: rnam pa thams cad bdag med pa /
T11TD4221.1E:108b-32: mthong ba las sdug bsngal gyi rten ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:108b-33: de ltar re zhig legs pa nyid kyi yon tan gcig yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:108b-34: yon tan gnyis pa ni phyir mi ldog pa gang zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:108b-36: skye dang skyon ni kun 'byung dag / slar yang ldog ces bshad pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:108b-37: bdag lta'i sa bon spangs pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:108b-38: slar mi gshegs pa nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:108b-39: skye ba dang skyon kun tu 'byung ba ni /
T11TD4221.1E:108b-41: 'dod chags la sogs pa med pa'i phyir skyon med pa'i gnas skabs dang /
T11TD4221.1E:108b-42: yang skye ba med pa'i phyir skye ba med pa ni thar pa'i grong khyer du son pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:109a-0: nyes pa dang skye ba yod pa ni phyir ldog pa @109a * //
T11TD4221.1E:109a-2: des na bdag tu lta ba med pa'i phyir na nyes pa slar skye ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:109a-3: bdag tu lta ba'i sa bon drungs phyung ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:109a-4: nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir na skye ba yang srid pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:109a-5: des na slar mi gshegs pa nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:109a-6: skye ba las dang nyon mongs pa las byung ba yin no zhes ni phyis bstan par bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:109a-7: bdag tu lta ba med pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa yod pa ga la 'gyur zhes brjod de /
T11TD4221.1E:109a-8: bdag la phan 'dogs dran pa las //
T11TD4221.1E:109a-9: phan 'dogs pa la chags pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:109a-10: gnod byed dran na zhe sdang ste //
T11TD4221.1E:109a-11: bdag sogs lta ba gti mug yin //
T11TD4221.1E:109a-12: bdag la phan 'dogs pa dang gnod pa byed pa la chags pa dang sdang ba yin na de dag ni bdag med pa'i phyir med pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:109a-13: bdag tu lta ba ni gti mug yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:109a-14: de ni bdag med pa'i ngo bos gtan du bzlog pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:109a-15: gnyes su med pa mthong na ni 'dod chags la sogs pa shin tu gsal ba nyid ldog pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:109a-17: gal te bdag med pa mthong ba ji ltar bdag tu lta ba'i zlog par byed pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:109a-18: phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:109a-19: phyin ci log nyid ni phan tshun du mtshungs pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:109a-20: des na bdag med pa mthong ba'i bzlog pa'i bdag tu lta ba zlog par byed par yang 'gyur bas na phyir mi ldog pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:109a-21: des na ma lus par ldog pa yang med pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:109a-22: slar ldog pa las lus pa gzhan ni yod pa yang ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:109a-24: de bden tha dad bdag nyid kyis //
T11TD4221.1E:109a-25: lus ngag sems kyis gnas ngan len //
T11TD4221.1E:109a-26: nyon mongs med dang nad med dang //
T11TD4221.1E:109a-27: lam bshad mi gsal nyid lus yin //
T11TD4221.1E:109a-28: bdag med pa mthong ba de ni bden pa nyid yin pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:109a-29: phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir la /
T11TD4221.1E:109a-30: bdag tu lta ba ni de las zlog pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:109a-31: phyin ci log par 'gyur ba yin yang /
T11TD4221.1E:109a-32: phyin ci log tu gyur pa tsam gyis ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:109a-33: tha dad pa'i bdag nyid kyang yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:109a-34: bdag tu lta ba ni tha dad pa'i bdag nyid ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:109a-35: don dam par bdag med pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:109a-36: bdag ni bden pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:109b-0: 'o na phyin ci log las @109b gzhan pa'i lus pa gang yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:109b-2: lus ngag sems kyi gnas ngan len //
T11TD4221.1E:109b-3: gal te nyon mongs pa med pas nyon mongs pas byas pa ga las srid ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:109b-5: nyon mongs pa med pa dang nad med pa yin yang /
T11TD4221.1E:109b-6: bag chags tsam dang 'brel pa las te /
T11TD4221.1E:109b-7: dmangs so zhes brjod pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:109b-8: lam gyi rnam pa du ma brjod pa la mi gsal ba yang yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:109b-9: 'o na lhag ma de gang las spong ba yin /
T11TD4221.1E:109b-10: bdag med pas ma spangs pa ni spong ba'i rgyu gzhan yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:109b-11: ji srid smra ba de srid du ni nyes pa dang bral ba yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:109b-12: smra ba ni rtog dpyod sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa ni 'khrul pa nyid yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:109b-14: goms phyir ma lus spangs pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:109b-15: kha cig smra sogs phyir na skyon //
T11TD4221.1E:109b-16: zad min zhes zer 'di ldog la //
T11TD4221.1E:109b-17: the tshom za ba de phyir 'khrul //
T11TD4221.1E:109b-18: gang gi phyir goms pas blo gsal bar byas pa de'i phyir bag chags spangs pa yin no zhes bshad zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:109b-19: smra ba tsam gyis ni nyes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:109b-21: bsgrub pa la smra ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa'i mtshan nyid ldog pa la the tshom za ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:109b-22: des na 'di ldog pa la the tshom za ba yin pa'i phyir go bar byed pa ma yin pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:109b-23: tshig ni rnam par rtog pa bsgrub pa la yang 'khrul pa can yin te shin tu goms pa las rnam par rtog pa med kyang tshig 'jug pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:109b-24: 'phen pa'i shugs kyis tshig 'jug pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:109b-25: bshad zin pa'i rnam pa thams cad rnam rtog ni //
T11TD4221.1E:109b-26: mngon sum las dbyer yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:109b-27: gsal bar mi snang ba nyid las //
T11TD4221.1E:109b-28: sgra 'jug pa yang ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:109b-29: mngon sum gyis mthong ka sogs las //
T11TD4221.1E:109b-30: 'di ni ka ba yin no zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:109b-31: sgra 'jug phyir ro gzhan du na //
T11TD4221.1E:109b-33: 'dir ni shes pa mi gsal bar //
T11TD4221.1E:109b-34: snang ba rtogs pa yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:109b-35: de bzhin du ni gzhan la yang //
T11TD4221.1E:109b-36: sgra 'jug pa bzlog pa med pa'i de'i phyir smra yang nyes pa yod pa ma yin no zhes 'grub bo //
T11TD4221.1E:109b-37: gal te gzhan las nyes pa rnams zad pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ji ltar nyes pa med par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:110a-0: @110a * // nyes pa zad pa med pa'i rgyu mthong ba nyid las so //
T11TD4221.1E:110a-1: nyes pa zad pa med pa'i rgyu ma mthong ba tsam gyis ni /
T11TD4221.1E:110a-2: nyes zad pa med pa nyid ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:110a-4: mthong bar ji ltar rtogs par byed de //
T11TD4221.1E:110a-5: rtag nyid phyir ram thabs med phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:110a-6: yang na thabs ni mi shes phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:110a-7: skyon rnams mi zad pa nyid ces //
T11TD4221.1E:110a-8: bya bar yongs su rtogs grang na //
T11TD4221.1E:110a-9: ji ltar yang rung ba rtogs par 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:110a-10: 'on kyang rgyu mthong ba'i them skas kyi lam yod pa las yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:110a-11: gal te nyes pa 'di dag rtag pa yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:110a-13: rtag pa ni 'bad pa byas kyang zad par bya nus pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:110a-14: yang zad pa la thabs med dam //
T11TD4221.1E:110a-15: mi dmigs pa yin na de lta na yang mi zad par 'gyur ba zhig na /
T11TD4221.1E:110a-16: 'di gsum ka yang yod pa ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:110a-17: rgyu yod phyir dang rgyu yis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:110a-18: gnyen po goms pas zad phyir dang //
T11TD4221.1E:110a-19: rgyu yi rang bzhin shes pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:110a-20: de shes pa yang grub pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:110a-21: rgyu dang ldan pa ni snga na med pa yin pa'i phyir rtag pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:110a-22: gang gi tshe rgyu'i gnyen po goms par byes pa de'i tshe zad par 'gyur bas na thabs med pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:110a-23: rgyu'i gnyen po goms pa ni nyes pa zad pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:110a-24: de yongs su mi shes pa'ang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:110a-25: rgyu'i rang bzhin bdag dang bdag gir lta ba'i rnam pa nyid shes pas de las bzlog pa'i gnyen po shes pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:110a-26: gang zhig gang las phyin ci log tu gyur pa de ni de'i gnyen po yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:110a-27: grang ba dang rtsub pa'i rang bzhin gyi rlung la dro ba dang snum pa nyid kyis til mar bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:110a-28: mthu la sogs pa'i khyad par med pas phyi rol gyi gnyen po ma yin yang /
T11TD4221.1E:110a-29: bdag med pa ni bdag tu lta ba dang 'gal ba yin zhes bya ba la log rtogs med pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:110a-30: gal te yang bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa nyid yin pa de lta na yang 'di rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa nyid yin pas ji ltar gzhan dag la tshad ma yin /
T11TD4221.1E:110a-31: tshad ma ni phyin ci ma log pa'i don ston pas yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:110a-33: mi ston pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:110a-35: bcom ldan 'das thugs rje'i dbang gis dang /
T11TD4221.1E:110b-0: thabs @110b goms pa las skyob pa nyid yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:110b-1: skyob pa nyid gang zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:110b-3: skyob pa nyid gzigs lam gsung ba //
T11TD4221.1E:110b-4: 'bras med phyir na brdzun mi gsung //
T11TD4221.1E:110b-5: thugs brtser ldan phyir rtsom kun yang //
T11TD4221.1E:110b-6: gzhan gyi don du sbyor phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:110b-7: gang gis skyob pa nyid srid pa rig byed la 'gas kyang mthong ba yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:110b-8: rtsa ba med pa'i rtogs pa tsam yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:110b-9: gang bde bar gshegs pa nyid yin pa de la ni mngon par 'dod pa 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:110b-10: des na 'bras bu med pa'i phyir brdzun mi gsung ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:110b-11: brtse ba dang ldan pa'i phyir gzhan gyi don du thabs goms par mdzad pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:110b-12: de'i phyir phyin ci log tu gsung ba'i rgyu med do //
T11TD4221.1E:110b-13: des na thugs rje mnga' ba'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:110b-14: dgos pa med pa'i phyir de kho na nyid ma yin pa mi gsung ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:110b-15: thugs rje dang ldan pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:110b-16: 'phen pa'i shugs las mi gsung ba yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:110b-17: des na bde bar gshegs pa yin pas tshad ma nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:110b-18: nyid kyis gzigs pa thar pa'i lam ston pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:110b-19: gal te rang gis mthong ba ston pa zhes bya ba de tsam gyis ni skyob pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:110b-20: de lta yin na mu stegs byed mtha' dag tshad mar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:110b-21: rang gis mthong ba'i lam ston pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:110b-22: 'on te de dag gis de ni lam brjod pa nyid ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:110b-23: de lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:110b-24: 'o na 'di la yang ci ltar yid ces zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:110b-26: de ni bdag med pa mthong ba'am sbyor ba las yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:110b-27: lam 'di ni rigs pas mthong ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:110b-28: de dag gis ni bdag med pa mthong ba ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:110b-29: rigs pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir de dag ni tshad ma ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:110b-30: de dag ni rang gis mthong ba nyid kyang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:110b-31: nye bar bstan pa phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:110b-33: de phyir tshad yin yang na skyob //
T11TD4221.1E:110b-34: bden pa bzhi ni ston pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:110b-35: yang na bden pa bzhi ston par mdzad pa /
T11TD4221.1E:110b-36: skyob pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:110b-37: gal te yang rig byed kyi mtha' dag la stong pa nyid ston par byed pa yod na de lta na yang bdag yod pa'i phyir de ni lam ma yin pas /
T11TD4221.1E:111a-0: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ston pa nyid skyob pa @111a * //
T11TD4221.1E:111a-2: de na bcom ldan 'das nyag gcig thun mong ma yin pa'i don gsungs pa yin pa des na bden pa nyid yin pas /
T11TD4221.1E:111a-4: lam 'di ni rigs pa dang bral yang ma'i 'du shes bzhin du nye bar zhi ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir na gzhan gyis bstan pa ni lam ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:111a-5: 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag kyang gang zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:111a-10: 'di dag ni ming gis kyang skyo ba 'gyur ba yin te dper na gci ba'i lam zhes bya bas yin gyi yan lag mchog ces bya ba ni ma yin pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:111a-12: sdug bsngal 'khor ba can phung po //
T11TD4221.1E:111a-13: goms las 'dod chags sogs gsal ba //
T11TD4221.1E:111a-14: mthong phyir 'dod rgyal nyid min te //
T11TD4221.1E:111a-15: rgyu med skye ba 'gal phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:111a-16: gal te 'dod chags mngon par 'dod pa'i bud med mchog la 'khyud pa'i yan lag nyid kyis bde ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir bde ba nyid yin zhing /
T11TD4221.1E:111a-17: zhe sdang yang dgra bo sel bar byed pas bde ba'i rgyu yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:111a-18: 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i mtshan nyid dang 'dzin pa'i gti mug ni /
T11TD4221.1E:111a-20: dregs pa'i rgyu yin pas bde ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:111a-21: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa'i rten du gyur pa lus la sogs pa yang de lta bu nyid yin pa'i phyir sdug bsngal zhes bya ba med do //
T11TD4221.1E:111a-22: bkres pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de yang 'grangs pa ni bde ba'i rgyu chen po yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:111a-23: des na sdug bsngal gyi bde ba zhes bya ba med pas bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'bras bu med pa skyob pa nyid ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:111a-24: 'di ni yang dag pa nyid ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:111a-25: 'di ltar 'khor ba'i lam du zhugs 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:111a-26: yongs su ngal bas bde ba nyams pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:111a-27: phung nyid sdug bsngal chen po ste //
T11TD4221.1E:111a-28: ma rig pas ni gzhan du mthong //
T11TD4221.1E:111a-29: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i bde ba rgyu yin no zhes gang smras pa de las brjod pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:111a-30: 'dod chags goms pa'i rgyu can te //
T11TD4221.1E:111a-31: bde ba'ang de med mi 'byung min //
T11TD4221.1E:111a-32: goms pa yod med rjes 'jug phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:111a-33: ngo bo nyid du grub pa min //
T11TD4221.1E:111a-34: gal te 'dod chags la sogs pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:111b-0: bde ba la sogs pa 'dod rgyal du skyes pa'am @111b rtag pa yin na de'i tshe 'thad pa zhig na /
T11TD4221.1E:111b-1: gang gi tshe de nyid las gsal ba la sogs par mthong ba'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:111b-2: goms pa nyid las 'gyur ba yin pa de'i phyir yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun du rtog pa tsam yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:111b-3: des na goms pa dor ba nyid dge ste /
T11TD4221.1E:111b-4: byis rtseng goms pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:111b-5: des na don dam par bde ba yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:111b-6: bde ba ni sems mngon par dag pa'i mtshan nyid goms pa las 'byung ba yin pas /
T11TD4221.1E:111b-7: 'khor ba'i chos ldog par byed pa yin pas de kho na goms par byas pa nyid mchog yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:111b-8: sdug bsngal yang goms pa las 'dod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:111b-9: btang snyoms nyid mchog yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:111b-10: de lta yin dang sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa'i mtha' dag de ltar snang ba can yin no //
