T11TD4221.1E:111b-11: de nas 'dod chags la sogs pa'i gdung ba bsal ba nyid mchog yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:111b-12: 'dod chags la sogs pa yod par 'gyur ba na /
T11TD4221.1E:111b-13: bud med la 'khyud pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:111b-14: blo bzang 'ga' yang rma btod de //
T11TD4221.1E:111b-15: de yi gdung ba zhi ba las //
T11TD4221.1E:111b-16: phyis nas bde ba 'dod pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:111b-17: de lta na ni blo med nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:111b-18: gal te de ni 'gyur med na //
T11TD4221.1E:111b-19: blo ni de nyid la dga' gyis //
T11TD4221.1E:111b-20: de las nyon mongs med pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:111b-22: gal te de nyid min dga' na //
T11TD4221.1E:111b-23: log na de bde ga la yod //
T11TD4221.1E:111b-24: de nyid log pa med pas na //
T11TD4221.1E:111b-25: bde ba yang ni log mi byed //
T11TD4221.1E:111b-26: de'i phyir 'khor ba'i bde ba gang ci snyed de /
T11TD4221.1E:111b-27: de mtha' dag ni don dam par sdug bsngal ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:111b-29: ji ltar 'dod chags la sogs pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:111b-30: sdug bsngal bde ba'i rgyur mthong ba //
T11TD4221.1E:111b-31: de bzhin bde ba'ang sdug bsngal gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:111b-32: rgyu nyid du ni rtogs par gyis //
T11TD4221.1E:111b-33: dper na bkres pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dag /'grangs pa ni bde ba'i rgyu yin pa de bzhin du /
T11TD4221.1E:111b-34: bde ba yang bral ba na shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i rgyu yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:111b-35: des na bde ba ni sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir de ni bde ba nyid ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:111b-37: sdug bsngal 'khor ba can phung po zhes bya ba de grub pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:111b-38: 'dod chags la sogs pa ni goms pa las gsal ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:111b-39: gang gi phyir goms pa las yin pa de'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:112a-1: mthun pa snga ma snga ma de lta bu rgyu'i rgyu can yin pa'i phyir 'khor ba pa yang grub bo //
T11TD4221.1E:112a-2: gal te 'dod chags la sogs pa goms pa las ni ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:112a-4: gzhan las sam rgyu med par 'byung ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:112a-5: des na bde ba la sogs pa 'di dag ni don dam pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:112a-6: de'i phyir 'khor ba pa'i phung po ni sdug bsngal ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:112a-7: yang na ji ltar bde ba la sogs pa goms pa las yin pa de bzhin du sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa yang yin pas don dam par ma yin pa'i phyir 'khor ba'i phung po ni bde ba nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:112a-8: 'di yang legs pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:112a-10: gang gi phyir nam mkha' la sogs pa bzhin du rgyu med par skye ba ni mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:112a-11: bde ba la sogs pa rgyu gzhan dang ldan pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:112a-12: goms pa las gsal bar ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:112a-13: gang gis sdug bsngal goms pa las skyes par 'gyur ba sdug bsngal ni 'ga' yang goms par mi byed de /
T11TD4221.1E:112a-14: 'on kyang bde sogs 'phel ba'i bdag nyid can //
T11TD4221.1E:112a-15: goms pa las 'jug gang yin pa //
T11TD4221.1E:112a-16: de med sdug bsngal nyid 'gyur gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:112a-17: gang na sdug bsngal goms byed med //
T11TD4221.1E:112a-18: nga la sdug bsngal yod par gyur cig ces sdug bsngal goms par byed pa ni su yang med de /
T11TD4221.1E:112a-19: bde ba don du gnyer ba nyid kyis thams cad thams cad la 'jug pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:112a-20: des na bde ba ni 'bad pas bsgrub par bya ba yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:112a-21: sdug bsngal ni de med pa las rang bzhin du 'gyur ba yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:112a-22: bzlog pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:112a-23: des na sdug bsngal yang bde ba goms par byas pa nyid kyis byas pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:112a-24: des na bde ba nyid bzlog par byas pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:112a-25: don dam par ni sdug bsngal yang med pa nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:112a-26: de yang de la skrag pa goms pa nyid las sdug bsngal ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:112a-27: des na de med pa'i phyir sdug bsngal de nyid dam /
T11TD4221.1E:112a-28: sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa la bde ba'i blor 'gyur ba yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:112a-29: de med pa'i phyir yang bde ba 'am bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa la sdug bsngal gyi blor 'gyur ba yin gyi don dam par ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:112b-0: de'i phyir goms par byas @112b pa'i bde ba ni sdug bsngal gyi rgyu nyid do /
T11TD4221.1E:112b-1: gal te de med na ni sdug bsngal yang med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:112b-2: bu la chags pa la bu shi na sdug bsngal 'byung na /
T11TD4221.1E:112b-3: de nyid bu skyes na bde bar 'gyur ba yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:112b-4: don dam par ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:112b-5: rtag tu 'dod pa dag dang ni //
T11TD4221.1E:112b-7: 'khor ba pa yis skyed pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:112b-8: bde kun sdug bsngal don du 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:112b-9: sdug bsngal bskyed cing bskyed pa las //
T11TD4221.1E:112b-10: bden pa'i blo ni rigs ldan min //
T11TD4221.1E:112b-12: ma reg par ni bsrings pa mchog /'on te bde ba thams cad ni //
T11TD4221.1E:112b-14: dmyal la sogs pa'i gnas skabs kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:112b-15: sdug bsngal ci ltar spong bar 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:112b-16: dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal las kyang ci //
T11TD4221.1E:112b-17: bde ba skyed bar mi 'gyur ram //
T11TD4221.1E:112b-18: gang phyir sdug bsngal chen po las //
T11TD4221.1E:112b-19: sdug bsngal gzhan la'ang bde bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:112b-20: yang na sdug bsngal ni 'dir 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:112b-21: bde ba yang de las bzlog pas bdag la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:112b-22: de'i phyir don dam ni ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:112b-23: 'on kyang goms pa las yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:112b-24: de lta de ltar bdag la sogs pa rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:112b-25: 'dod chags la sogs pa de'i rtsa ba can yang goms pa de nyid las yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:112b-27: don dam pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:112b-28: gal te goms pa yang rgyu ma yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:112b-29: rgyu med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:112b-30: rgyu med par skye ba ni tha dad pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:112b-31: 'on te yang 'dod chags la sogs pa goms pa las skyes pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:112b-32: 'on kyang rlung la sogs pa las skyes pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:112b-33: 'di ltar rlung gi rang bzhin las ni gti mug / mkhris pa'i rang bzhin las ni zhe sdang /
T11TD4221.1E:112b-34: bad kan gyi rang bzhin las ni 'dod chags yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:112b-35: rtsa ba'i nyes pa bzhin du phrag dog la sogs pa'i nyes pa gzhan yang /
T11TD4221.1E:112b-36: rlung la sogs pa las skyes pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:112b-37: rlung la sogs pa yang don dam pa nyid du yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:112b-38: rgyu de las skyes pa'i phyir 'dod chags la sogs pa ni don dam pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:112b-40: 'khrul phyir rlung sogs chos ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:113a-2: skyon med ce na de yi chos //
T11TD4221.1E:113a-3: de las gzhan yang cis mi mthong //
T11TD4221.1E:113a-4: gang zhig gang gi rgyu can yin pa de ni /
T11TD4221.1E:113a-5: de la mi 'khrul ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:113a-6: me la du ba bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:113a-7: gal te gti mug la sogs pa rlung la sogs pa'i chos yin na de'i phyir de la 'khrul par mi 'gyur na de lta yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:113a-8: des na bzlog pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:113a-9: 'on te rlung gi rang bzhin la 'dod chags skyed par byed pa dang zhe sdang skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin gzhan yang yod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:113a-10: de las 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dag yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:113a-11: des na rang bzhin dang 'dres pa'i phyir 'khrul pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:113a-13: rgyu yod na ni de yi chos //
T11TD4221.1E:113a-14: de las gzhan yang ci phyir med //
T11TD4221.1E:113a-15: de yi 'bras bu med na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:113a-16: rgyu yod pa ni ga las rtogs //
T11TD4221.1E:113a-17: gal te de nyid de yi ni //
T11TD4221.1E:113a-19: gal te de nyid las na 'dir //
T11TD4221.1E:113a-20: de yod phyir de ci phyir min //
T11TD4221.1E:113a-21: gal te 'bras de gzhan las ni //
T11TD4221.1E:113a-23: de'i phyir gal te rlung la sogs pa'i chos yin na 'khrul par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:113a-24: rang bzhin de la rang bzhin gzhan yang rtog na ni 'bras bu yang brtag par bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:113a-25: 'bras bu ma mthong bas brtag pa ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:113a-26: rang bzhin gzhan yang mi brtag go //
T11TD4221.1E:113a-27: ji ltar 'bras bu las rgyu rtog pa de bzhin du 'bras bu yang rgyu nus pa thogs pa med pa las yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:113a-28: 'on te nus pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyu med na /
T11TD4221.1E:113a-29: mthong ba'i 'bras bu yang rgyu med par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:113a-30: yang na de'i rgyu nyid du mi 'gyur ro ;
T11TD4221.1E:113a-32: gal te mthong ba'i rgyu spangs nas //
T11TD4221.1E:113a-33: ma mthong ba ni rtog byed na //
T11TD4221.1E:113a-34: bad kan 'dod chags rgyu nyid du //
T11TD4221.1E:113a-35: mi 'gyur gzhan ni brtag par gyis //
T11TD4221.1E:113a-36: 'on te yang gang dang gang mthong ba de dang de nyid 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rgyu yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:113a-37: 'o na 'dod chags la sogs pa thams cad las mthong bas /
T11TD4221.1E:113a-38: ci thams cad de'i rgyu yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:113a-39: de ni de lta yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:113a-40: de lta bu nyid du mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:113a-43: thams cad 'dod chags mtshungs pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:113a-44: thal phyir kun gyi chos ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:113a-45: gzugs sogs bzhin skyon med ce na //
T11TD4221.1E:113b-0: gal te @113b de la khyad par can //
T11TD4221.1E:113b-1: las rnams bdag po ma yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:113b-2: de yang rtsod pa mtshungs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:113b-3: 'dod chags la sogs pa thams cad kyi chos yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:113b-4: srog chags thams cad 'ga' zhig tu 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:113b-5: des na bad kan la sogs pa gang yod pa de nyid 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rten yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:113b-6: 'dod chags mtshungs pa thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:113b-8: chags sogs rang bzhin thams cad kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:113b-9: chos yin par ni 'dod na go //
T11TD4221.1E:113b-10: nus byed rang bzhin med pas na //
T11TD4221.1E:113b-11: 'bras bu mi mtshungs ga las yin //
T11TD4221.1E:113b-12: gang gi tshe 'dod chags la sogs pa rang bzhin thams cad las 'byung bar 'dod pa de'i tshe /
T11TD4221.1E:113b-13: bad kan la sogs pa'i rang bzhin dang /
T11TD4221.1E:113b-15: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir 'dod chags la sogs pa mtshungs pa nyid bzlog par mi nus so //
T11TD4221.1E:113b-16: 'on te rang bzhin thams cad yin yang khyad par gzhan yod pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:113b-17: 'dod chags mtshungs pa nyid ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:113b-18: 'o na ni de'i tshe khyad par de thams cad kyi rgyu ma yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:113b-19: thams cad kyi chos ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:113b-20: ci ste yang bad kan la sogs pa rang bzhin thams cad rgyu yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:113b-21: 'dod chags la sogs pa thams cad kyi chos yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:113b-22: de dag nyid nang gi yongs su gyur pa'i bye brag las ni /
T11TD4221.1E:113b-23: 'dod chags la sogs pa mtshungs pa nyid ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:113b-25: rnam par 'gyur ba'i khyad par gang //
T11TD4221.1E:113b-26: ji ltar nye bar dmigs gyur pa //
T11TD4221.1E:113b-27: de la yang ni 'khrul nyid ces //
T11TD4221.1E:113b-28: yang dag par ni bsten pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:113b-29: rnam par 'gyur ba'i khyad par gang zhig rgyu gang las 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rgyur nye bar dmigs pa de nyid gang gi tshe /
T11TD4221.1E:113b-30: zhe sdang la sogs pa'i yang yin pas 'khrug pa de'i tshe thams cad kyi chos nyid du bsgrub pa na 'dod chags la sogs pa'i khyad par thams cad kyi rgyu can du yang bsgrub par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'dod chags la sogs pa mtshungs pa nyid du gsal ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:113b-31: des na yongs su gyur pa'i khyad par las so zhes bya ba 'di rgyur mi 'thad de /
T11TD4221.1E:113b-32: de yang 'dod chags la sogs pa khyad par thams cad kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:114a-1: khyad par gyi dpag par bya ba la yongs su gyur pa'i khyad par mi mthong ba nyid 'dod chags la sogs pa mi tshol ba'i rgyu yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:114a-4: me ma mthong ba'i du ba gang //
T11TD4221.1E:114a-5: de ni me rgyu can mi 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:114a-6: sa phyogs nyid kyi khyad par ni ;
T11TD4221.1E:114a-7: /'ga' de du ba'i rgyu yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:114a-8: du ba me yul na zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:114a-9: gzhan la khyad par de med pa //
T11TD4221.1E:114a-10: des na khyad par dang bral bas //
T11TD4221.1E:114a-11: du ba gzhan na med pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:114a-12: gal te thams cad kyi tshe ma mthong ba'i khyad par yang 'bras bu mthong ba tsam las brtags pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:114a-13: 'o na thams cad du rgyu dang 'bras bu'i so sor nges par nyams par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:114a-14: 'on te der ni khyad par rtogs par byed pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:114a-15: mthong ba'i me rtogs pas gnod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:114a-16: 'o na der yang mthong ba'i goms pas brtag par bya ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:114a-17: yongs su 'gyur ba'i khyad par brtags par ni mi 'thad do //
T11TD4221.1E:114a-18: gal te gzugs la sogs pa 'byung ba'i rgyu can 'dod pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:114a-19: de lta na yang 'byung bar khyad par med par khyad par du 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:114a-20: rtsod pa 'di yang khyed nyid la yod pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:114a-21: bdag la ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:114a-22: las bdag por 'gyur ba khyad par gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:114a-23: de lta ma yin na ni de dag kyang phyogs su byed pa yin pas des ma nges pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:114a-24: skyon rnams khyad par yod na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:114a-25: khyad par med phyir ma grub nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:114a-26: ma yin thams cad 'gyur ba yis //
T11TD4221.1E:114a-27: 'gyur phyir kun las skyes pa'ang min //
T11TD4221.1E:114a-30: tsha ba sogs bzhin chags sogs kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:114a-31: 'gyur ba bde sogs las skyes yin //
T11TD4221.1E:114a-32: ji skad du rgyu gzhan yod na yang 'bras bu gzhan mthong ba gang yin pa de ni khyad par yod pa yin pa'i phyir mthong ba'i khyad par rtogs pa yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur mod /
T11TD4221.1E:114a-33: gang gi tshe bad kan 'phel ba de'i tshe rgyu 'phel ba yin pa'i phyir 'bras bu'i 'phel ba ji ltar bzlog / der yang de las gzhan ba'i khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:114a-34: de lta na ni 'on te khyad par rgyu ma yin pa'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por 'dzin par ga la 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:114b-0: mthong ba'i khyad par ni mi mthong @114b bar rigs pa yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:114b-2: de yi khyad las khyad par du //
T11TD4221.1E:114b-4: de las khyad par yod min na //
T11TD4221.1E:114b-6: gal te khyad par med pa'i phyir bya ba'i gtan tshigs ma grub ste /
T11TD4221.1E:114b-7: mkhris pa 'phel na de ni sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa de'i zhe sdang 'phel ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:114b-8: ma grub pa nyid ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:114b-9: bad kan la sogs pa thams cad kyi 'phel pas gnod pas zhe sdang skye ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:114b-10: rang bzhin gyis zhe sdang chung ba la mi 'byung ba yang yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:114b-11: 'di ni rang mkhris pa 'phel pa la mtshungs pa'i phyir brjed par bya ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:114b-12: 'on te thams cad las skye ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:114b-14: thams cad las skyes pa nyid kyang ma yin no zhes bshad zin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:114b-15: gzhan yang gal te khyad par gzhan yod du chug pa de lta na yang khyad par des byas pa'i khyad par med mod /
T11TD4221.1E:114b-16: 'bras bu 'grib pa go ga las yin /
T11TD4221.1E:114b-17: gang gi phyir rgyu 'phel na 'bras bu 'phel ba nyid du rigs kyi 'grib par ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:114b-18: de lta ma yin na ni de de'i rgyur mi 'gyur ro zhes bshad zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:114b-19: dper na tsha ba la sogs pa mkhris pa 'phel na 'phel ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:114b-20: gal te zas bzhun po zos na bad kan dang 'brel pa las 'dod chags 'phel ba mthong ba ma yin nam zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:114b-22: nad kyis gdungs pas zhe sdang nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:114b-23: 'dod chags la sogs pa ni bde ba la sogs pa las skyes pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:114b-24: bad kan la sogs pa las byung ba ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:114b-25: bde ba la yang nang gi bag chags sad pa las 'ga' la rnam pa ji zhig ltar dmigs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:114b-26: des na 'dod chags la sogs pa nyes pa dag las yin no zhes mi rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:114b-27: gal te bad kan 'phel na 'dod chags ma yin pa de lta na yang de rgyu ma yin pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:114b-28: cha ma snyoms pa las skyes pa'i sdug bsngal gyi nus pa gegs byas pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:114b-29: gang gzhan gyis gegs byas na skyed par mi byed pa de rgyu ma yin pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:114b-30: thams cad rgyu ma yin par thal ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:115a-2: gal te 'dod chags mi skyed na //
T11TD4221.1E:115a-3: cis skyes smros shig cha mnyam la //
T11TD4221.1E:115a-5: cha mi mnyam la chags can mthong //
T11TD4221.1E:115a-6: gzhan ni cha mnyam na yang min //
T11TD4221.1E:115a-7: gzhan ni zad nas khrag 'dzag kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:115a-8: bud med gcig la khu nges med //
T11TD4221.1E:115a-9: des gcig la chags drag mi 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:115a-10: gal te gzugs sogs kyang yan lag / ma yin kun ma nges phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:115a-11: nges pa med par 'byung ba'ang min //
T11TD4221.1E:115a-12: yon tan ma bzung bar yang 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:115a-13: gal te yon tan 'dzin pa de'ang //
T11TD4221.1E:115a-14: yan lag yin na thams cad ni //
T11TD4221.1E:115a-16: rgyu ni khyad par med phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:115a-17: gnas skabs gang la chags can 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:115a-19: de gnyis ngo bo mi mtshungs phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:115a-20: 'di la nges pa mthong pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:115a-21: gal te bad kan la sogs pa cha mnyam pas 'gal ba'i nad med pa na khu ba 'phel ba la /
T11TD4221.1E:115a-22: de las 'dod chags skye ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:115a-23: de lta yin na nyes pa cha mi mnyam pa dang shin tu bud med bsten pa la gzhol ba'i khrag 'dzag pa dag 'dod chags can du mi 'gyur te khu ba zad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:115a-24: khu ba yang bud med thams cad la thun mong yin pa'i phyir bud med gcig la chags pa nges par mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:115a-25: des na khu ba mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:115a-26: gcig la 'dod chags lhag par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:115a-27: 'on te yul bud med dang rgyu nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:115a-28: gang gi phyir gzugs la sogs pa'i khyad par las khyad du 'gyur ba'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:115a-29: gzugs la sogs pa yang rgyu nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:115a-31: khyad par can gzugs zhags pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:115a-32: dbang med par ni 'gyur ba'i sems //
T11TD4221.1E:115a-33: rang gi chung ma bor nas ni //
T11TD4221.1E:115a-34: bud med gzhan dag 'dod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:115a-35: res 'ga'i tshe ni spyod tshul dag /'dod chags kyi ni rgyur 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:115a-37: rgyu min des na nges pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:115a-38: de phyir lhan cig byed pa yod pa'i phyir gcig la lhag par 'gyur ba yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:115a-39: gzhan la ni de ltar ma yin pas skyon med do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:115b-0: 'di yang gsha' ba ma @115b yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:115b-2: thams cad la ni 'khrul pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:115b-3: mthong phyir gzugs la sogs pa dag / rgyu min gzugs dang 'bral ba la'ang //
T11TD4221.1E:115b-4: chags phyir gal te spyod tshul dag / yod phyir zhe na 'o na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:115b-5: gzugs ni rgyu ma yin par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:115b-6: spyod tshul dang ni bral na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:115b-7: gzugs la chags pa yod pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:115b-8: spyod tshul de yang 'dod chags kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:115b-9: rgyu yin par ni 'thad ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:115b-10: la la gnyi ga dang bral yang //
T11TD4221.1E:115b-11: chags pa dag ni mthong phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:115b-12: kun la 'dod chags mtshungs par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:115b-13: thal phyir thams cad rgyu ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:115b-14: 'on te rgyu nges pa med pa nyid du 'dod de zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:115b-16: ma nges pa ni de las 'byung ngo zhes bya bar yang mi 'thad do //
T11TD4221.1E:115b-17: 'dod chags gcig la nges pa yin na yang /
T11TD4221.1E:115b-18: gzugs dang yon tan 'dod pas ma brtags par 'ongs pa'i gzugs ngan pa la 'dod chags kyi gzir ba 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:115b-19: gzhan yang khu ba 'dod chags kyi rgyu yin na yon tan ma bzung ba yang chags par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:115b-20: 'on te yon tan 'dzin pa yang yan lag yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:115b-21: de lta na thams cad yon tan 'dzin par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:115b-22: yon tan 'dzin pa'i rgyu thams cad la yod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:115b-23: 'on te yon tan yod pa tsam gyis ni yon tan 'dzin pa ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:115b-24: 'o na gang las yon tan 'dzin pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:115b-25: gal te yon tan 'dzin pa yul med pa ni yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:115b-26: thog ma med pa'i bag chags las yin pas goms pa nyid las 'dod chags la sogs pa yin te zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:115b-27: gzhan yang gnas skabs gang la gnas pa na 'dod chags pa'i gnas skabs der zhe sdang bar mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:115b-28: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dag ni mi mtshungs pa nyid kyis rang bzhin 'gal ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:115b-29: de dang 'gal ba'i rang bzhin la gnas pa la ni /
T11TD4221.1E:115b-31: mi 'gyur ba nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:115b-33: 'di la nges pa'ang mthong ba med /
T11TD4221.1E:115b-34: yang na gal te de gnyi ga'i rang bzhin na /
T11TD4221.1E:115b-35: de'i tshe gnyig yang dus mtshungs pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:115b-36: de bzhin nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:115b-38: nges pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:116a-0: 'di la dus mtshungs pa nyid du nges pa @116a * //
T11TD4221.1E:116a-2: 'on te mkhris pa'i rang bzhin la gnas pa la rdul la sogs pa res 'ga' 'byung gi thams cad kyi tshe ma yin pa de bzhin du 'dod chags la sogs pa yang yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:116a-4: rdul ni me dang 'brel pa las //
T11TD4221.1E:116a-5: de med na ni de mi 'byung //
T11TD4221.1E:116a-6: chags sogs dang ni gzugs sogs kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:116a-7: rgyu las de bzhin yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:116a-8: de yod na ni tshang ba'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:116a-9: chags sogs yod min med pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:116a-10: 'on te nang gi phan 'dogs par byas pa'i bag chags dang 'brel pa las nges pa las bzlog pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:116a-11: de lta yin na bag chags nyid 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rgyu yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:116a-12: 'dod chags kyi phan 'dogs pa yang goms pa yod pa las yod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:116a-13: 'on te yang gang zhig 'dod chags la sogs pa'i bag chags kyi khyad par las skye ba de la yang ji ltar nyes pa 'dir mi 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:116a-15: gang gi 'dod chags la sogs pa //
T11TD4221.1E:116a-16: rigs mthun bag chags khyad par la //
T11TD4221.1E:116a-18: de la skyon 'dir thal ba med //
T11TD4221.1E:116a-19: gang tshe 'dod chags la sogs pa bag chags kyi nyes pa nyid las 'jug pa de'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:116a-20: gang la gang gis skye ba gzhan dang 'brel pa'i bag chags yod pa de nyid las 'ga' zhig gi tshe rnam pa 'ga' zhig ltar rgyu 'ga' zhig gis de sad pa yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:116a-21: 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams kyi bag chags ma nges pa na /
T11TD4221.1E:116a-22: gzugs la sogs pa la ltos pa med pa'i phyir sngar gyi nyes pa'i go skabs med do//
T11TD4221.1E:116a-23: gal te chags pa la sogs pa nyes pa'i chos ma yin mod /
T11TD4221.1E:116a-24: 'byung ba'i chos su ni 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:116a-26: 'dis ni 'byung ba'i chos nyid bkag / rten la bkag pa nyid phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:116a-27: dkar po la sogs sa sogs la //
T11TD4221.1E:116a-28: brten pa nyid ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:116a-29: 'di dag ni sa la sogs pa 'byung ba rnams kyi chos yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:116a-30: 'di ltar sa dang chu shas che na ni 'dod chags so //
T11TD4221.1E:116a-31: me dang rlung dag la ni zhe sdang ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:116a-32: chu dang rlung dag la ni gti mug go zhes gang smras pa de yang bkag pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:116a-33: thams cad du ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:116b-0: gnas skabs gang la @116b chags can 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:116b-1: ces bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:116b-2: yod med dag rten med phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:116b-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pas rten yang bkag pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:116b-4: gal te ji ltar dkar po la sogs pa 'byung ba chen po la brten pa de bzhin du 'dod chags la sogs pa yang yin no zhe na de la bshad pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:116b-5: dkar po la sogs sa sogs la //
T11TD4221.1E:116b-6: brten pa nyid ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:116b-7: gal te sa la sogs pa la brten pa yin na ni de'i tshe gzugs la sogs pa 'byung ba dag las tha dad par khas blangs pas 'byung ba tsam du khas len pa la gnod par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:116b-8: 'byung ba tsam du khas len na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:116b-9: rten dang brten pa'i dngos por 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:116b-10: gal te shes pa 'byung ba la brten pa yin na de'i tshe kho na mang por thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:116b-11: tha dad pa ma yin na ni 'byung ba rnams gcig nyid du 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:116b-12: shes pa gcig dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:116b-13: gal te gzugs la sogs pa 'byung ba dag la brten nas zhes khas len pa na rten dang brten pa'i dngos po 'gog pa 'gal lo zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:116b-15: brten pa'i don ni rten gyi don ma yin gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:116b-18: de brten sgra'am rgyu don nam //
T11TD4221.1E:116b-19: yang na rang gi rten dag dang //
T11TD4221.1E:116b-20: dbyer med par ni gnas pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:116b-21: brten yin gzhan du 'thad ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:116b-22: rten pa'i don ni rten gyi don ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:116b-23: 'on kyang rgyu'i don ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:116b-25: rgyu ni 'bras dang lhan cig tu //
T11TD4221.1E:116b-26: dus mtshungs par ni rtogs ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:116b-27: dus mtshungs dag la 'bras bu nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:116b-28: la sogs med par rnam par nges //
T11TD4221.1E:116b-29: des na rten dang brten pa'i dngos po ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:116b-30: dus mtshungs pa dag dang brten dang brten pa'am rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yin du chug pa de lta na yang rang gi rten dang dbyer med par 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:116b-32: gal te gzugs sogs rten dang ni //
T11TD4221.1E:116b-33: brten pa'i ngo bor nges na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:116b-34: de dag rnam dbyer med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:116b-35: 'jug ces bya bar gzung bar gyis //
T11TD4221.1E:116b-36: gal te de dag rten dang brten pa'i ngo bo yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:116b-37: de'i tshe brten pa med na de'i rten kyang 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:117a-0: mi 'jig na ni phyis bzhin du sngar yang rten nyid @117a * //
T11TD4221.1E:117a-2: des na 'dod chags la sogs pa yang dbyer med par gnas par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:117a-3: gzugs la sogs pa la tha dad pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rang bzhin ni yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:117a-4: gzhan gyis khas blangs pas de skad brjod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:117a-5: 'dod chags la sogs pa ni dbyer med par gnas par yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:117a-7: gal te myos sogs nus pa bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:117a-8: dbyer yod ce na dngos po las //
T11TD4221.1E:117a-9: nus pa don gzhan nyid ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:117a-11: gnas na brten pa 'jig ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:117a-12: gal te de mtshungs she na min //
T11TD4221.1E:117a-13: snang ba tha dad rtogs pas na //
T11TD4221.1E:117a-14: 'byung sems tha dad nyid phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:117a-15: chang dang bu ram chang la sogs pa'i rdzas la myos pa'i nus pa brten pa yin yang rnam pa dbyer yod par gnas pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:117a-16: rdzas yod pa la ldog pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:117a-19: bska dang mngar sogs rdzas yod na //
T11TD4221.1E:117a-20: snga na med pa'i nus pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:117a-22: slar yang med par 'gyur ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:117a-23: 'di rten min pa'ang ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:117a-24: de bzhin nyid du rtogs phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:117a-25: de bzhin lus nyid la brten pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:117a-27: zhe na de yang mi 'thad de //
T11TD4221.1E:117a-28: nus pa'i don gzhan yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:117a-29: nus pa ni 'byung ba las don gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:117a-30: rdzas kyi nus pa zhes tha dad pa'i tha snyad ni /
T11TD4221.1E:117a-31: nye bar bstan pa can bzhin du 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:117a-32: mchi gu'i lus zhes bya ba la sogs bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:117a-33: 'di ji ltar yin pa de lta bu ni 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:117a-34: gal te me la sogs pa rnams kyi nus pa gzhan med na /
T11TD4221.1E:117a-35: de'i tshe sngags dang rgyud la sogs pas gang gis gegs byed /
T11TD4221.1E:117a-36: re zhig rang gi ngo bo ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:117a-37: gzhan la sreg pa'i phyir ro ;
T11TD4221.1E:117a-38: / nus pa bkag pa na yang de ma bkag pa'i phyir gzhan sreg pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:117a-40: nus pa bkag pa la yang ni //
T11TD4221.1E:117a-42: de yang 'gar ni yod pa dang //
T11TD4221.1E:117a-43: 'gar med ces byar nus ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:117a-44: nus pa rnams ni mang bas na //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-0: rnam dbye @117b ji ltar srid ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-1: de sreg byed pa'i nus med de //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-2: de las gzhan ni ldog ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-3: yang na sreg bya gzhan nyid du //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-4: byed pa des na tshig ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-5: gzhan gyis tshig 'gyur gzhan du ni //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-6: nus pa bkag pa med phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-8: dngos po de la de snyed kyis //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-9: nus pa ga las 'byung ba min //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-10: gang gis de dag la ltos pa //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-11: de dag gis ni ci byar yod //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-12: dngos po ltos pa yod min te //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-13: rgyu nyid las de de ltar 'byung //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-14: nus pa de dag med na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-16: nus pa mang por med na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-18: me la tshig pa la sogs pa //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-19: rnam par dbye ba mthong ba gang //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-20: de ni med 'gyur med sogs la //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-21: rang bzhin gcig po yod dam med //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-22: yod na thams cad sreg pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-23: med pa yin na 'ga' yang min //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-24: gcig ni cig car yod pa dang //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-25: med pa 'gar yang srid ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-26: de yang spang bar bya ste /
T11TD4221.1E:117b-28: ji ltar nus pa sna tshogs 'di //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-29: rgyu gcig nyid las 'byung ba bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-31: ma mthong brtags pas ci zhig bya //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-32: gal te 'bras bu sna tshogs ni //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-33: mthong bas nus pa sna tshogs par//
T11TD4221.1E:117b-34: rtogs na 'dir de nyid yin mod //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-35: gang gis sngags sogs dang ldan pas //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-37: rang bzhin nges pas de 'dra de //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-38: rang rgyu las skyes nus don med //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-39: me ni sngags dang mi ldan na //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-40: thams cad sreg pa'i rgyu yin la //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-41: de nyid sngags dang ldan pa'i phyir ;
T11TD4221.1E:117b-42: /'ga' zhig bsreg par nus pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-43: bsreg rdzas rang bzhin de yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-44: gang gis des ni me tshig cir //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-45: de ni gzhan gyis tshig 'gyur bar //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-46: rang gi rgyu las skyes phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-47: de ltar nus pa bkag pas na //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-48: rten dang brten la srid ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-49: des na mthong ba'i dpe de ni //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-50: rang bzhin sgrub par byed ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-51: des na der ni dngos po nyid 'jig par 'gyur ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:117b-52: rten mtshang ba med par gnas na brten pa med par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:117b-53: 'on te yang 'dir yang 'byung ba dang sems dag de bzhin du 'gyur ba nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:118a-0: 'dir lan ni 'byung ba dang sems dag ni tha @118a * //
T11TD4221.1E:118a-2: sems pa dag ni nus pa ltar //
T11TD4221.1E:118a-3: 'byung ba dang tha mi dad pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:118a-4: de nyid ga las she na snang ba tha dad par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:118a-5: snang ba tha dad thams cad du //
T11TD4221.1E:118a-6: dngos po tha dad sgrub byed yin //
T11TD4221.1E:118a-7: tha dad bsgrub pa'i thabs gzhan ni ;
T11TD4221.1E:118a-8: /'ga' yang mthong ba yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:118a-9: dbang po tha dad pa dang rtogs pa tha dad pas gzung bar bya ba yin yang /
T11TD4221.1E:118a-10: gal te tha dad pa med par snang na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:118a-12: tha dad par byed pa ni snang ba'i rang bzhin rtogs pa yin gyi rtogs pa'i rgyu tha dad pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:118a-13: 'on te rtogs pa'i rgyu tha dad na /
T11TD4221.1E:118a-14: rtogs pa yang tha dad do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:118a-15: 'o na rtogs pa tha dad pa de nyid tha dad par byed pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:118a-17: der yang snang ba ni tha dad de /
T11TD4221.1E:118a-18: rnam par shes pa ni bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi nang du rig la don sra ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:118a-19: dro ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis gzung ba nyid du rig pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:118a-20: 'on te bde ba la sogs pa ni nang gi rig bya'i khyad par gyi rang bzhin nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:118a-21: des na nang du rig pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:118a-22: gang zhig gang na gnas pa'i dngos //
T11TD4221.1E:118a-23: de ni de ltar myong 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:118a-24: nye dang ring ba'i bye brag gis //
T11TD4221.1E:118a-25: ji ltar shing sogs rig pa bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:118a-26: nang gi reg bya'i khyad par ni ring ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:118a-27: des na 'di bdag dang yul gcig pa nyid kyis lus kyi nang na gnas pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:118a-28: phyi rol gyi shing bzhin du rig pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:118a-30: gal te 'di ni reg bya nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:118a-31: yin na de ni gang gis rig / gzhan gyis rig na rig pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:118a-32: tha dad yin par thal bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:118a-33: 'on te de ni rang rig na //
T11TD4221.1E:118a-34: 'byung ba chen po'i rang bzhin min //
T11TD4221.1E:118a-35: rang rig rang bzhin de bzhin nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:118a-36: gzhan gyis ji phyir shes ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:118a-37: gal te khong nang chug phyir na //
T11TD4221.1E:118a-38: nang du reg ni rig par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:118a-39: gang zhig nang gi cha la reg pa des rig par thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:118a-40: phyi'i khyud pa'i reg pa yang bde ba'i rang bzhin nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:118a-41: gnyis pa phan tshun reg pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:118a-42: gnyi gas kyang ni rig par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:118a-43: gzhan gyis gzhan gyi rang bzhin rig / gzhan dag rang bzhin ji ltar min //
T11TD4221.1E:118b-0: 'on te @118b gzhan gyis reg pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:118b-1: bdag gi rang bzhin de nyid bde bar 'gyur ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:118b-2: de lta yin na gzhan gyis de bzhin du rig par thal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:118b-3: gzhan gyis rnam pa thams cad ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:118b-4: gal te don de gcig yin na ji ltar rnam pa thams cad ma rtogs /
T11TD4221.1E:118b-5: don rdul phra rab so sor tha dad pa du ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:118b-6: de lta yin na bde ba'i rdul phra rab tha dad par bde ba mang po las bde ba la sogs pa 'ga' zhig rtogs par 'gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:118b-7: gzhan gyis ni bde ba'i cha tsam yang rtogs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:118b-8: rang nyid rig pa zhes bya ba gcig nyid rtogs pa'i phyir bud med dang skyes pa gnyis mtshungs par myong bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:118b-9: thams cad rig pa yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:118b-10: rdul phra rab tu ma rig par thal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:118b-11: 'on te phan tshun 'byar bas rnam par dbye ba med pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:118b-12: ma yin te de las tha dad pa'i 'byar ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:118b-13: yod kyang tha dad par rtogs pa ldog par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:118b-14: 'byar bas rnam par dbye ba mi rtogs so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:118b-15: 'o na ni de dag gi rang gi ngo bo ma rtogs pa'i phyir 'byung ba dag las sems tha dad par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:118b-16: tha dad par snang ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:118b-17: 'on te yan lag can cig kho na'o zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:118b-18: de lta yin na gzhan la yang de ltar rtogs par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:118b-19: 'on te gzhan bdag nyid thams cad kyis rtogs par mi nus so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:118b-20: 'o na ni de'i rang bzhin rtogs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:118b-21: de ni 'khrul pa nyid de rtogs pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:118b-22: 'khrul pa yang nang gi reg pa'i khyad par gyi rang bzhin nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:118b-23: des na gzhan gyis de bzhin du rtogs par dben par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:118b-24: 'dir ni rig bya gcig pu nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:118b-25: bde ba la sogs gzhan du 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:118b-26: gal te gzhan gcig pu nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:118b-27: bde ba la sogs gzhan du 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:118b-28: gal te gzhan gyis gcig rtogs na //
T11TD4221.1E:118b-29: de lta yin na bde sogs gzhan //
T11TD4221.1E:118b-30: de'i phyir 'byung ba dang ni sems pa dag / snang ba tha dad rtogs pa'i nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:118b-31: gal te gzhan gyis rig pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:118b-33: reg pa de la yid 'ong ba //
T11TD4221.1E:118b-34: nyid kyis de ni ji ltar gnas //
T11TD4221.1E:118b-35: yid du 'ong phyir rgyu yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-0: las nyid skal pa'i sgra yis @119a * //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-2: / tha dad kyi ni lam du gnas //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-3: phan 'dogs pa yi khyad par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-4: skye ba 'di la mthong ba med //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-5: de lta yin na sems pa gzhan //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-7: mang du smra ba ci zhig bya //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-8: gal te de yi yid 'ong nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-9: rgyu las nye bar skyes yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-10: gzhan gyis kyang ni rtogs 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-11: min na de ni rnam shes nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-12: gal te de ni rtogs pa po'i //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-13: lus nang chud par rtogs na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-14: phyi rol du ni rtogs pa de //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-15: ji ltar lus kyi nang du chud //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-16: gzugs ni snang bar 'gyur na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-17: gzhan gyis rtogs pa ma yin phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-18: rang gis rig pa'i rang bzhin ni //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-20: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'am gzhan la gzugs snang ba yin yang /
T11TD4221.1E:119a-21: gzhan gyis rtogs pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:119a-22: des na de ni rang rig pa'i shes pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-23: 'on te gzhan gyi lus kyi nang du chud pas na mi rig go zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:119a-24: gzhan gyi lus kyang mi rig par thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-25: lus kyi nang du chud nyid na //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-26: bsgribs par gnas pa 'ba' zhig ni //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-27: ji ltar rig 'gyur yul gzhan dag / rnam par rtog par byed pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-28: rnam par rtog pa med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-29: lus rig de yang de med par ;
T11TD4221.1E:119a-30: / des na gcig gi sgrub byed pa //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-31: lhan cig dmigs pa nges pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-32: 'on te yang de tha dad par 'gyur mod /
T11TD4221.1E:119a-33: de lta na yang lus nyid de'i rgyu yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:119a-34: bde ba la sogs pa bag chags dang 'brel pa tsam gyis skye ba ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-35: des na don dam pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-36: lus kyang khu ba la sogs pa las yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:119a-37: des na 'jig rten pha rol med do //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-38: 'jig rten 'di 'gyur ba nyid kyi las yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-39: des na 'khor ba yod pa ma yin no zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-42: gzugs sogs bzhin du yid ngo bo //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-43: mtshungs 'gyur rnam par rtog pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-44: don gyi gzhan dbang can nyid gang //
T11TD4221.1E:119a-45: gang gi tshe 'dod chags la sogs pa lus kyi rgyu can nam /
T11TD4221.1E:119a-46: rang bzhin yin pa de'i tshe /
T11TD4221.1E:119a-47: lus ma gyur pa'i sngon rol du yid mtshungs pa nyid du 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:119a-48: rgyu'am rang bzhin gyis rten mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:119b-0: de lta ma @119b yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:119b-2: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:119b-3: lus la brten pa'i gzugs la sogs pa ni lus mnyam pa nyid na mi mnyam pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:119b-4: 'on te yul gzhan dang gzhan nye ba la rag las nas khyad par du 'gyur ba la skyon med do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:119b-6: yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang bde ba la sogs pa la don gyi gzhan dbang nyid ci zhig yod /
T11TD4221.1E:119b-7: bag chags sad pa tsam las skye ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:119b-8: gang tshe lus la ltos med par //
T11TD4221.1E:119b-9: shes pa 'ga' zhig 'ga' zhig gi / bag chags sad pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba //
T11TD4221.1E:119b-11: lus rgyu yin na ni sngar gyi skyon du thal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:119b-12: gang gi tshe lus ltos pa med par /
T11TD4221.1E:119b-13: bag chags sad pa'i rgyu'i shes pa 'ga' zhig la ltos nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'ga' zhig skye bar khas len pa de'i tshe ni rgyu des na lus 'gyur ba med kyang rnam par shes pa 'gar 'gyur gyi lus rgyu nyid yin na ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:119b-14: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa nyid las rnam par shes pa yin gyi lus las ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:119b-15: des na phung po ni 'khor ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:119b-16: gtan tshigs gzhan yang smras pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:119b-17: rnam par shes min rnam shes kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:119b-18: nyer len med pa'i phyir yang grub //
T11TD4221.1E:119b-19: gal te dngos po thams cad ni //
T11TD4221.1E:119b-20: rnam shes nus ldan yin 'dod na //
T11TD4221.1E:119b-21: rtsva mchog rtse na glang chen brgya //
T11TD4221.1E:119b-22: sngon tshe ma mthong yod do zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:119b-23: de skad grangs can phyugs las gzhan //
T11TD4221.1E:119b-24: ngo mtshar bcas pa su brjod rtsol //
T11TD4221.1E:119b-25: rgyu ni lan brgyar rnam phye yang //
T11TD4221.1E:119b-26: ngo bo gang zhig snang gyur ba'i //
T11TD4221.1E:119b-27: ngo bo de ni sngar mi snang //
T11TD4221.1E:119b-28: ji ltar de ni yod par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:119b-29: rnam par shes pa mthun pa dang mi mthun pa dag las /
T11TD4221.1E:119b-30: rnam par shes pa phyi ma mthun pa dang mi mthun par mthong ba'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:119b-31: nges par de 'gyur ba'i rjes su byed pas /
T11TD4221.1E:119b-32: rnam par shes pa'i nye bar len pa dang bral ba'i lus las rnam par shes pa mi skye ba'i phyir 'jig rten pha rol grub bo //
T11TD4221.1E:119b-33: 'dod chags la sogs pa cig car skye bar thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:120a-0: 'on te yang gal te shes pa nyid las shes pa yin pa de lta na yang 'jig rten pha @120a * //
T11TD4221.1E:120a-2: dngos po thams cad rnam par shes pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:120a-3: de lta bu'i nus pa'i 'bras bu rtsom pa med pa ni 'jig rten pha rol ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:120a-4: 'di ni grangs can pa'i rtogs pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:120a-5: gang las rtog ge ba thams cad kyi gtsug gi nor bu bdag nying rlom pa khyed kyi yin par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:120a-6: de skad du brjod par rtsol ba ni /
T11TD4221.1E:120a-7: gang zhig lung gcig po skyabs su gyur pa /
T11TD4221.1E:120a-8: ngo tsha med pa'i grangs can phugs nyid smra bar rtsol ba yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:120a-9: ngo tsha dang bcas pa ni de lta ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:120a-10: rtsva mchog rtse na sngon chad ni ;
T11TD4221.1E:120a-11: / ma mthong glang chen brgya yod par //
T11TD4221.1E:120a-12: grangs can las ni gzhan pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:120a-13: ngag gi spyod yul 'gyur ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:120a-14: 'di ltar rgyu ni rnam brgyar rnam phye yang //
T11TD4221.1E:120a-15: zho spogs rnams kyi rang bzhin gang //
T11TD4221.1E:120a-16: de ni sngar mthong nus min na //
T11TD4221.1E:120a-17: de ni de la ji ltar yod //
T11TD4221.1E:120a-18: rang bzhin gzhan gyis gal te de //
T11TD4221.1E:120a-19: de nyid yod ces brjod mi bya //
T11TD4221.1E:120a-20: rnam shes pa las gzhan rang bzhin ni //
T11TD4221.1E:120a-21: yod pas de yod ji ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:120a-22: gal te ma sogs shes pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:120a-23: nyer len las ni de 'dod na //
T11TD4221.1E:120a-24: de yi 'du pa'i bdag nyid ni ldog pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:120a-26: 'on te gal te mes po la sogs pa'i 'du byed kyang 'dod na /
T11TD4221.1E:120a-27: ma yin kun la de ma ni //
T11TD4221.1E:120a-28: thag pa'i 'du byed rjes su 'jug / de'i phyir rang gi rgyud la gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa las rnam par shes pa yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:120a-31: snga na med par 'byung ba la ;
T11TD4221.1E:120a-32: / chags sogs nges med thal bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:120a-33: gal te 'jig rten pha rol med par 'gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:120a-34: de'i tshe snga na med pa'i sems can 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:120a-35: de lta yin na 'dod chags la sogs pa nges par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:120a-36: 'ga' zhig 'dod chags dang bral bar yang 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:120a-37: gang gi tshe skye ba gzhan nas 'ongs pa de'i tshe srid pa nyid yod pa'i srog chags skye ba'i rgyu yin pa de lta na /
T11TD4221.1E:120a-38: skye bo 'dod chags dang bral bar mi 'byung ste /
T11TD4221.1E:120a-39: 'dod chags med par mi skye ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:120a-41: gal te kun chags sogs ldan na //
T11TD4221.1E:120b-0: 'on te yang @120b 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rgyu ni 'byung ba'i bdag nyid yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:120b-1: de yang bral ba med pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:120b-2: des na rgyu mtshang ba med pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:120b-3: 'dod chags la sogs pa med par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:120b-4: gal te de lta yin na rgyu de nyid kyis /
T11TD4221.1E:120b-6: gal te 'byung khyad las min na //
T11TD4221.1E:120b-7: 'di ltar gal te 'byung ba rnams phan tshun khyad par med pa yin na ni thams cad 'dod chags mtshungs par 'gyur ba zhig na /
T11TD4221.1E:120b-8: med pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:120b-9: des na thams cad 'dod chags mtshungs pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:120b-11: 'byung rnams srog chags khyad med kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:120b-12: khyad par 'di rten gang yin pa //
T11TD4221.1E:120b-15: chags sogs nges med ces gang brjod pa de la gzhan gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:120b-16: sa la sogs pa'i 'dus pa 'dod chags dang bral ba ni yod pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:120b-17: 'on te srog chags 'ga' zhig 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:120b-19: ci ltar srog chags srog chags ma yin par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
T11TD4221.1E:120b-20: 'dod chags dang bral bar yang mi 'gyur ro zhes brtsad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:120b-21: gal te de lta na yang ci ltar chags nyid khyad par yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du /
T11TD4221.1E:120b-22: 'dod chags la sogs pa yang yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:120b-23: thams cad 'dod chags mtshungs pa nyid du 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:120b-25: yang na gal te 'ga' zhig srog chag yin la 'ga' zhig gzhan du yin pa de bzhin du 'dod chag dang ldan pa dang gzhan du'ang 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:120b-26: 'on te srog chags nyid ni tha dad pa med pa la /
T11TD4221.1E:120b-27: 'dod chags la sos pa tha dad pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:120b-28: de tshe 'byung ba'i khyad par gyis rgyu gang las tha dad par 'gyur ba de bzhin du 'phel ba dang 'grib pa srid pas gtan nas med par yang 'gyur ba'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:120b-30: gal te yang rgyu 'phel ba dang 'grib pa rgyu dang ldan pa yin pa de lta na yang /
T11TD4221.1E:120b-31: 'dod chags la sogs pa rgyu mtshungs pa'i bsag nyid ni ldog pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:120b-33: gal te chags sogs tha dad kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:120b-34: rgyu mtshungs bdag nyid mi ldog na //
T11TD4221.1E:121a-3: gal te 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshungs pa nyid gang yin pa de /
T11TD4221.1E:121a-4: mi spong ba des na mtshungs pa nyid 'dod chags kyi rgyu yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:121a-5: rgyu mtshungs pa yin na yang 'bras bu 'dod chags la sogs pa mtshungs pa nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:121a-6: rgyu 'dra ba'i bdag nyid ni 'bras bu yang 'dra ba'i bdag nyid can nyid do zhes rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:121a-7: gal te rgyu mtshungs kyang 'bras bu khyad par dang ldan pa'i phyir mtshungs pa ma yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:121a-8: de'i tshe de'i 'bras bu nyid du mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:121a-9: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:121a-10: de'i phyir gang la khyad par gyi rim pa yod pa de la gtan med par 'gyur ba srid pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:121a-11: 'grib pa'i khyad par yod pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:121a-12: dkar po la sogs pa'i yon tan bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:121a-13: yang na ni mtshungs pa las mi nyams par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:121a-15: mtshungs bdag las 'byung ba lang gi / shes pa'am 'dir yang sa sogs la //
T11TD4221.1E:121a-16: srog sogs dag kyang khyad par gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:121a-17: rim par la lar yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:121a-18: de ma yin pa'i rang bzhin las ldog pa'am gzhan la yang rung ba mtshungs pa'i khyad par bdag nyid las 'byung ba'i ba lang gi shes pa de ni ba lang ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:121a-19: ches shin tu yang ba lang ngo zhes khyad par gyi rim pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa'am /
T11TD4221.1E:121a-20: 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i lta ba la ltos nas sa la sogs pa la srog chags dang cher srog chags dang /
T11TD4221.1E:121a-21: ches shin tu srog chags zhes khyad par gyi rim pa dang ldan pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:121a-22: de'i phyir rgyu mtshungs pa las ni mtshungs pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:121a-23: 'grib pa yod na ni gtan chad par yang 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:121a-24: dro rim khyad par yod na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:121a-25: dro med me 'ga' yod min pa //
T11TD4221.1E:121a-26: de bzhin 'dir yang zhe na min //
T11TD4221.1E:121a-27: dro las me gzhan bkag phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:121a-28: me la dro ba'i khyad par ni yod pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:121a-29: de lta na yang dro ba bdag nyid thams cad du med par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:121a-30: 'dod chags la sogs pa yang de bzhin du thams cad du srid pa med par ni mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:121a-31: ma yin te 'dod chags la sogs pa ni lus las tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:121b-0: 'dir @121b mi ni dro ba las tha dad pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:121b-1: dro ba nyid la me brjod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:121b-2: gal te dro ba med na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:121b-4: 'dod chags la sogs pa med na sa la sogs pa nyid du mi 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:121b-5: gal te 'byung ba'i 'dus pa gzhan chos can yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:121b-6: dro ba de'i chos su yongs su rtog na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:121b-7: de'i tshe thal bar 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs na dro ba de las rgyun 'chad pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:121b-8: 'on te 'bar ba chos can du brtags pa yin la dro ba chos yin zhing /
T11TD4221.1E:121b-9: de ni khyad par gyi rim pa yod kyang de 'chad pa ma yin no zhes bya ba gzhan gyi lan yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:121b-11: sngags rgyud la sogs nus pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:121b-13: nor bu 'bar ba dro med par //
T11TD4221.1E:121b-14: mthong ba de ni mi 'thad min //
T11TD4221.1E:121b-15: dbyer med phyir 'bar dro ba la //
T11TD4221.1E:121b-16: ltos te chos can nyid kyang yin //
T11TD4221.1E:121b-17: mdog dang dbyibs kyi 'bar ba ni //
T11TD4221.1E:121b-18: med kyang dro ba yod pa'i phyir ;
T11TD4221.1E:121b-19: / chos can nyid du de mi 'thad //
T11TD4221.1E:121b-20: des na de ni dbye ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:121b-21: 'bar ba ni dro ba med par mi 'byung la /
T11TD4221.1E:121b-22: dro ba ni 'bar ba med par mi 'byung ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:121b-23: des na chos can nyid du mi 'thad do //
T11TD4221.1E:121b-24: gtan mi 'bral ba'i 'bral ba dang de'i dro ba dag ni chos dang chos can gyi dngos po ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:121b-25: gtan tshigs ni khyad par dang bcas pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:121b-26: gang zhig gzhan yod yon tan ni //
T11TD4221.1E:121b-27: khyad par rim pa dang ldan par //
T11TD4221.1E:121b-28: de dag de yi khyad par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:121b-30: gang zhig gzhan du 'gyur ba'i yon tan khyad par gyi rim pa nyams su myong ba can de dag ni la lar 'chad pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:121b-31: dper na snam bu la sogs pa la dkar po la sogs pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:121b-32: gang gis yod pa gzhan de la dkar po la sogs pa 'chad par 'gyur ba /
T11TD4221.1E:121b-33: dkar po la sogs pa rang bzhin la tha dad pa'i snam bu la sogs pa gzhan gang yod ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:121b-34: de ni bden te 'on kyang snam bu la sogs pa ni rig bya'i rang bzhin yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:121b-35: kha dog gi khyad par gyi rang bzhin ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:121b-36: de med kyang snam bu yod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:121b-37: des na gzhan gyis zhes bya ba'i don ni 'di yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:121b-38: gang zhig rgyun gyis 'jug pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:122a-0: 'chad pa'i chos dang skye ba'i chos gang yin pa de ni gtan chad pa'i chos @122a * //
T11TD4221.1E:122a-2: dper na dkar po la sogs pa bzhin no zhes bya ba ni ngag gi don to //
T11TD4221.1E:122a-3: yang na me nyid rjes su 'jug pa na dro ba khyad par gyi rim pa yod kyang 'byung ba dang bral ba ma yin pa de bzhin du /
T11TD4221.1E:122a-4: 'dod chags la sogs pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:122a-6: nus pa mi 'chad do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:122a-8: nus pa'i don gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:122a-9: 'dod chags la sogs pa nyid ni nus pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:122a-10: nus pa yang la lar 'chad pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:122a-11: de nyid kyi phyir bshad pa /
T11TD4221.1E:122a-12: gzugs sogs bzhin du nges min de //
T11TD4221.1E:122a-13: de dag 'byung dang dbyer med phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:122a-14: gal te de mtshungs she na min //
T11TD4221.1E:122a-15: chags sogs lhan cig skye thal phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:122a-16: 'dod chags la sogs pa ni gzugs dang ro la sogs pa ltar 'byung ba dag dbyer med pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:122a-17: de med kyang 'byung ba rnams yod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:122a-18: gzugs dang ro la sogs pa med par ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:122a-19: 'on te der yang de lta bu nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:122a-21: 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams lus dang lhan cig skye bar thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:122a-22: 'dod chags la sogs pa ni lus dang thams cad kyi tshe lhan cig 'byung ba yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:122a-23: 'byung ba chen po tsam de kho nar smra ba rnams kyi gzugs la sogs pa 'byung ba dag las tha dad pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:122a-24: de kho na mang por thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:122a-25: des na rnam par dbyer med pa ni lhan cig skye ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:122a-26: gal te yul gyi rgyu can yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:122a-27: yul nye bar gnas pa med na res 'ga' med par yang 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:122a-29: rnam par brtags pa'i yul yin phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:122a-30: yul yang nges byed ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:122a-31: skal mnyam rgyu dang bral ba'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:122a-32: chags sogs nges pa med pa 'am //
T11TD4221.1E:122a-33: rgyu ni nye phyir blo rnams kun //
T11TD4221.1E:122a-34: thams cad tshe na skye bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:122a-35: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rgyu ni yul gyi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:122a-36: de med par 'gyur ba nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:122a-37: skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yang mi 'dod de /
T11TD4221.1E:122b-0: des na 'dod @122b chags la sogs pa nges pa med pa'i phyir res 'ga' mi skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-1: des na nges pa med pas lus 'dod chags la sogs pa re re dang lhan cig 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-2: yang na 'dod chags la sogs pa thams cad kyi rgyu lus dang lhan cig 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:122b-3: thams cad kyi rgyu lus nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-4: 'on te gang gi 'dod chags la sogs pa lhan cig mi 'byung ba de 'dra ba de ni lus kyi yongs su gyur ba'i khyad par nyid yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:122b-6: gang gis de dag de ltar 'gyur ba de'i yongs su 'gyur ba'i khyad par de 'dra ba de ga las yin ;
T11TD4221.1E:122b-7: gang yang rung ba las she na //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-9: gal te de ltar ma mthong zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-11: me med par yang du bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-12: kun las ci yi phyir mi 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-14: de ltar brjod par nus pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-15: dngos po rgyu med pa la yang //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-16: yul la sogs pa nges par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-17: nges pa med pa ma mthong zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-18: der yang brjod par nus pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-19: gal te rnam pa thams cad du //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-20: mthong ba tsam la rten byed na //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-21: mthong ba gnyis med nyid yin pas //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-23: gal te tha snyad dor bar ni //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-24: mu nus par ni rtogs byed na //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-25: 'jig rten pha rol la sogs pa //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-27: ji ltar rjes su dpag pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-28: tha snyad thams cad byed 'gyur ba //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-29: de bzhin 'jig rten pha rol la yang //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-31: tha dad shes dang don dag dang //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-32: sngon po la sogs byas pa'am //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-33: snga dang phyi ma'i ngo bo ni //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-34: mngon sum gyis ni rab grub med //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-35: des na tha snyad dbye ba ni //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-36: thams cad rjes su dpag par byas //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-37: des na rjes dpag spangs nas ni //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-40: gang dag mthong ba'i don spangs nas //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-41: ma mthong gzhan ni rtogs byed pa //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-42: rmongs pa zan gong spangs nas ni //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-43: lag stong ldag byed ci bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:122b-44: zhes bya ba de gsal ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:122b-45: blang dang dor bya'i khyad par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-2: 'di ni spang bya min no zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-3: 'di ni mngon sum tsam gyis min //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-4: blang bya nyid ni yod pa yang //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-5: dor bya nyid ni bkag las yin //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-6: blang bya nyid du bzhag pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-7: dor bya las ni bzlog phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-8: rtogs byed don du gnyer rnams kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-9: blang bya rtag tu don bya yin //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-10: de ni mngon sum gyis mi mthong //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-12: des na blang bya'i dngos po ni //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-13: mngon sum gyis ni rig ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-15: rig min bzlas pa yang ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-16: spang bya dbang po las 'das phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-17: spang bya dgag pa'ang ga la yod //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-18: dngos po 'di ni med do zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-19: rtogs 'di mngon sum las ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-20: blang dang dor bya rtogs pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-21: mngon sum gnyi ga yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-22: 'dir yang sngar gyi rigs pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-23: slar la bzlog na 'jug pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-24: gal te shin tu goms pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-25: mngon sum las kun rtogs she na //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-26: ma rtogs pa la goms pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-27: des na phan tshun brten pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-28: ji srid mngon sum med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-29: goms pa las ni rtogs ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-30: ji srid rtogs med ma goms la //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-31: mngon sum skye bar 'gyur ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-32: gal te mngon sum 'dir tshad yin na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-33: blang dang cig shos rnam 'byed med par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-34: des na rang gi rang bzhin tsam rig ste //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-35: gnyis med de nyid du ni thal bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-36: rjes su dpag pa la brten nas //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-37: blang bya la sogs pa rnam 'byed nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-38: des na tha snyad rtogs pas na //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-39: gzhan yang yongs su tshol mi byed //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-40: 'on te gnyis med la brten nas //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-41: 'jig rten pha rol spong byed na //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-42: 'di yang byos shig de tsam gyis //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-43: 'di ni rnam par gnas ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-45: des na med pa pa yang med //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-46: de lta yin na thams cad ni //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-47: spangs phyir sems ni grol ba nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-49: gus pa 'di ni rmongs pa ste //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-51: rmongs pa gzhan ni 'dod par byed //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-52: rmongs pa 'di nyid ga las yin //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-53: gal te thog mtha' med grub na //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-54: de nyid 'jig rten pha rol te //
T11TD4221.1E:123a-55: mang du smra ba gzhan don med//
T11TD4221.1E:123b-1: thams cad rgyu med nyid du 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-2: de lta yin na med pa pa //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-3: khyod kyis smras pa don med 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-5: nyer mkho min na ci don nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-8: 'on te gzhan gyis gzhan la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-9: 'di ltar brgal zhing brtag byed na //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-10: gal te 'ga' yi rgyu min na //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-11: des byas pas kyang don ci yod //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-12: gal te 'di ni ma rig pas //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-13: byas nyid su yis len zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-14: gal te ma rig chad min na //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-15: gzhan gyis bshad pa don med nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-16: 'on te ma rig chad na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-17: gzhan gyis brjod pa don med nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-18: ma rig rgyu dang ldan nyid na'ang //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-19: thog med ma rig rtogs par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-20: de lta yin dang 'khor ba ni //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-21: rtsod pa med par grub pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-22: ma rig rnam rtog las gzhan med //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-23: de yang rnam rtog snga ma las //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-24: des ni rnam par rtog pa 'di ;
T11TD4221.1E:123b-25: / thog med rgyun 'brel grub pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-26: de'i phyir bde ba la sogs pa ni thog ma med pa'i bag chags yongs su smin pas byas pa tsam yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:123b-27: don dam par ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-28: des na don dam par ni thams cad sdug bsngal ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-30: de ni res 'ga' dmigs pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-31: mi rtag nyes pa'i rten phyir dang //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-32: rgyu dbang phyir yang sdug bsngal yin //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-33: bdag min byin gyis brlabs pa'ang min //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-34: rgyu min byin gyis brlabs pa min //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-35: rtag pa'ang ji ltar skyed byed yin //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-36: de phyir gcig las du ma ni //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-37: dus tha dad pa skye mi 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-41: bdag med pa nyid ces bya ba ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i rnam pa bzhi'o //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-42: des na res 'ga' dmigs par bya ba nyid kyis mi rtag pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-43: rtag pa rtag tu mi dmigs par bya ba'i rang bzhin ni res 'ga' dmigs par mi 'thad de /
T11TD4221.1E:123b-44: dmigs par bya ba dang cig shos kyi rang bzhin dag phan tshun spangs te gnas pa nyid kyis 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:123b-45: dmigs par bya ba nyid ni yod pa yin no zhes pa bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:124a-0: thams cad kyi tshe thams cad dmigs par nus pa ni ma yin te mi rtag pa ni rim gyis dmigs pa yin pa'i @124a * //
T11TD4221.1E:124a-2: gcig la ni rim pa srid pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:124a-3: rim pa dang ldan pa cig shos nyid du mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:124a-4: mngon sum mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:124a-5: de med na rjes su dpag pa med pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:124a-6: mngon sum sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:124a-7: rjes su dpag pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:124a-8: long ba brgyud par thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:124a-9: de'i phyir 'du byed kyi phung po rnams ni mi rtag pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:124a-11: 'dod chags la sogs pa nyes pa rnams kyi rten yin pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:124a-13: rgyu dang 'brel pa'i phyir yang sdug bsngal ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:124a-14: gzhan dbang thams cad sdug bsngal yin //
T11TD4221.1E:124a-15: zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
T11TD4221.1E:124a-16: yang gi sgras ni goms pa tsam la brten pa'i phyir ro zhes rtogs par bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:124a-17: bdag gi rang bzhin ma yin la bdag gis byin gyis brlabs pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:124a-18: rgyu ma yin pa ni byin gyis rlob par byed pa nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:124a-19: byin gyis rlob par byed pa ni gdon mi za bar phan 'dogs pa dang bcas par 'gyur dgos so //
T11TD4221.1E:124a-20: phan 'dogs pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:124a-21: gal te phung po rnams bdag gi rang bzhin yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:124a-23: skyod par byed pa ma yin pa yang dngos po nyid ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:124a-24: dmigs pa mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:124a-25: shes pa dus tha dad pa du ma ni /
T11TD4221.1E:124a-26: rtag pa nyid kyis gcig las skye ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:124a-27: bdag gis byin gyis brlabs pa can du ni dmigs pa yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:124a-28: phung po rnams kyi rang bzhin dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni /
T11TD4221.1E:124a-30: gal te byin gyis ma brlabs pa'i rgyud dag ji ltar rang gi 'bras bu la 'jug ste /
T11TD4221.1E:124a-31: de'i phyir byin gyis brlabs par rjes su dpag go zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:124a-33: mi rtag pa'i sems pa byin gyis brlabs pa tsam gyis rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:124a-34: sems pa yang thog ma med pa can du bstan zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:124a-36: rgyu gzhan dag ni tshogs na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:124a-37: 'bras bu skye ba med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:124a-38: rgyu gzhan rjes su dpog 'gyur na //
T11TD4221.1E:124a-39: de ni rtag rnams la yod min //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-0: gal te rgyu gzhan pa dus pa yin yang 'bras bu skyed par byed pa ma @124b yin na de'i tshe gang ma tshang bas 'bras bu skyed par mi 'gyur ba'i rgyu gzhan yang yod pa ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:124b-1: de ltar ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:124b-2: mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen rung ba'i khyad par tsam gyis 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-3: gang gis de med pas rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba rtag pa dang khyab pa dag ni nam yang 'gar yang yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-4: rjes su 'gro ba tsam gyis skyed par byed pa yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:124b-5: nam mkha' la sogs pa thams cad byin gyis rlob par byed par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-6: de dag yod pa yin yang rgyu rnams rang gi 'bras bu la 'jug pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:124b-7: de dag kyang rtag pa dang khyab pa nyid du mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-8: de dag ni byin gyis rlob par byed pa po nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:124b-9: khyab pa dang rtag pa nyid kyi phyir de nyid mi 'grub pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-10: rtag par khyab pa ma yin yang //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-11: thams cad du ni rgyu nyid 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-12: nye ba nyid kyi rgyu min te //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-13: ring ba yin yang rgyur mthong ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-14: sgra sogs yul ni thag ring yang //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-15: rang 'bras sgrub par byed pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-16: de'i phyir rjes 'gro tsam gyis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-17: thams cad rgyu nyid yin par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-18: res 'ga' ba nyid yin pas na //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-20: rgyu med gzhan la mi ltos phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-21: rtag tu yod pa'am med par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-22: kun 'byung ba'i bden pa la'ang rnam pa bzhi nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-23: rgyu nyid dang kun 'byung ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:124b-24: rab tu skye ba nyid dang rkyen nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-25: de la rgyu ni rgyu ma yin pa spangs pas so //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-26: kun 'byung ba ni rgyu gcig nyid spangs pas so //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-27: rab tu skye ba ni mi nus pa spangs pas te /
T11TD4221.1E:124b-28: 'di las rab tu 'byung bas na rab tu skye ba'o //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-29: rkyen ni gtso bo spangs pas so //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-31: sdug bsngal gyi ni rgyu yod ces //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-32: dang por nyid du bstan pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-33: gzhan ni res 'ga' ba min te //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-34: rgyu ldan la ni mthong ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-35: rgyu med pa yi dngos po ni //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-36: yod pa'am gang na gzhan nyid 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-37: ci lta ci ltar rgyu med la //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-38: de ltar rtag par 'gyur ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-39: rab rib can shes skra la sogs //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-40: yul med par yang skye ba'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-41: rang rig pas ni rtogs bya ba //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-42: chos kyi dbyings ni rgyu med can //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-43: res 'ga' ba min mtshan nyid can //
T11TD4221.1E:124b-44: rtag pa nyid du dmigs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:125a-2: bdag nyid med phyir rtag tu med //
T11TD4221.1E:125a-4: ji ltar tsher ma la sogs kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:125a-5: rno ba'i rgyu sogs rgyu med pa //
T11TD4221.1E:125a-7: zhes ni kha cig rab tu brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:125a-8: rgyu med par smra ba dag go //
T11TD4221.1E:125a-9: rang bzhin nyid kyis 'byung ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid ni byed pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:125a-10: yul dang dus dang gnas skabs kyi khyad par dang ldan pa nyid kyis na khyad par nyid byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:125a-11: de la khyad par dag kyang rgyu med can du dmigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:125a-15: thur ma la sogs pa rnams kyi lcags la sogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid ni /
T11TD4221.1E:125a-16: mgar ba la sogs pas byed pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:125a-17: rno ba nyid byed pa'i yul yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:125a-18: lcags la sogs pa la yang sa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid ni /
T11TD4221.1E:125a-19: gzhan gyis byed pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:125a-20: lcags la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du byed pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:125a-21: mgar ba la sogs pa med kyang /
T11TD4221.1E:125a-22: tsher ma la sogs pa la rno ba mthong bas /
T11TD4221.1E:125a-23: de med kyang yod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:125a-24: rgyu nges pa med pa can 'di nyid rgyu med pa can yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:125a-25: de bzhin du 'gro ba sna tshogs su byed pa'i khyad par gzhan yang rgyu med pa nyid du 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:125a-26: 'di la 'gal ba ci yod ce na //
T11TD4221.1E:125a-28: gang yod nyid na'ang gang skye ba'am //
T11TD4221.1E:125a-30: de ni der rgyur rab tu brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:125a-31: de ni de rnams la yang yod //
T11TD4221.1E:125a-33: gal te khyad par nyid bskyed par bya ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:125a-34: de dag ni rgyu med pa nyid ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:125a-35: rgya shug gi tsher ma'i rno ba dang 'khyog pa ni rgya shug gi sa bon med par yod pa ma yin no / de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir de'i 'bras bu yin yang rgyu med pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:125a-36: 'on kyang mgar bas kyang byed pa des na 'khrul pas de skad brjod do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:125a-37: de yang ji lta ba bzhin ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:125a-38: blo sngon byed pa dmigs pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:125a-39: blo ldan rgyu yin de lta na //
T11TD4221.1E:125a-40: dbang phyug byed pa po de'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:125a-41: rgya shug gi ni tsher ma la sogs pa dpe de nyid la ni rgyu med par ni 'gyur ba ma yin /
T11TD4221.1E:125a-42: khyad par rtog phyir min zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:125a-43: khyad par yod mod rgyu bcas nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:125b-0: 'ga' zhig @125b rgya shug sa bon las //
T11TD4221.1E:125b-1: gzhan ni mgar ba la sogs las //
T11TD4221.1E:125b-2: gal te khyad par mtshon med na //
T11TD4221.1E:125b-3: khyad par med pa kho nar zad //
T11TD4221.1E:125b-4: gang phyir mthong ba tsam gyis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:125b-5: khyad par yongs su 'dzin ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:125b-6: gnyis med de nyid rgyu yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:125b-7: de nyid rgyu med yin par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:125b-8: de phyir gang las khyad par yod //
T11TD4221.1E:125b-9: de nyid las ni rgyu bcas yin //
T11TD4221.1E:125b-10: 'di ltar rgyu dang bral ba yi //
T11TD4221.1E:125b-11: khyad par nyid ni rab grub med //
T11TD4221.1E:125b-12: de phyir gal te tha dad pa'am gal te phyi'i don nyid yin na rnam pa thams cad du rgyu dang bcas pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:125b-13: de lta ma yin na ni bzlog pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:125b-14: gal te gang yod pa nyid na gang skye ba de rgyu yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:125b-15: reg pa yang mthong ba'i rgyu yin par thal te reg pa med par med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:125b-17: tshogs pa gcig la rag las phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:125b-18: gzugs dang reg bya phan tshun du //
T11TD4221.1E:125b-19: rnam par dbye ba med des na //
T11TD4221.1E:125b-20: reg pa med par mthong ba min //
T11TD4221.1E:125b-21: der ni reg pa med par gzugs nyid mi 'byung ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:125b-23: phan tshun mi 'bral ba nyid kyis //
T11TD4221.1E:125b-24: dus mtshungs 'di lta bu'i ldog pa las ni rgyur 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:125b-25: 'on kyang gal te gzugs nye bar bstan nas reg pa med na mthong ba med par bstan pa yin na 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:125b-27: reg pa gzugs rgyu nyid yin phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:125b-28: mthong ba la ni rgyu mtshan yin //
T11TD4221.1E:125b-29: phan tshun mi 'bral ba nyid kyis //
T11TD4221.1E:125b-31: rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ram /
T11TD4221.1E:125b-32: gzugs kyi rten pa'i rang bzhin gyi rgyu 'byung ba'i rang bzhin gyis reg pa nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:125b-33: des na brgyud nas reg pa mthong ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir gtan tshigs mi mthun pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa ma yin pas 'khrul pa med pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:125b-34: de ltar na re zhig rgyu ma yin pa nyid bkag pa'i phyir rgyu nyid ces bya ba'i rnam pa gcig rnam par gnas pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:125b-35: kun 'byung ba nyid ces bya ba'i rnam pa gnyis bshad pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:125b-36: rtag rnams bkag phyir dbang phyug la //
T11TD4221.1E:125b-37: sogs pa dag kyang srid min te //
T11TD4221.1E:125b-38: de'i phyir sdug bsngal rgyu dang bcas pa yin yang /
T11TD4221.1E:125b-39: de las rtag pa gcig pu'i rgyu bkag pas kun 'byung gi rnam pa nyid du gnod mi za ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:126a-0: gal te rgyu gcig yin na rtag pa @126a * //
T11TD4221.1E:126a-2: rtag pa ni ltos pa med pas khyad par du byar med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:126a-3: gtso bo la sogs pa rtag pa de rnams kyang sngar bkag zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:126a-5: nus pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:126a-6: rim dang cig car dag gi don byed nus pa dang bral ba'i phyir rnam pa gsum pa rab tu skye ba nyid ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:126a-7: rnam pa 'di ni srid pa nyid kyis yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:126a-9: nus med phyir ro de yi phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:126a-10: srid 'dod rgyu yin gang gi phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:126a-11: mi rnams yul gyi khyad par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:126a-12: yongs 'dzin de thob bsam pas byas //
T11TD4221.1E:126a-13: rgyu gzhan nam las ni rab tu skye ba gzhan nyid ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:126a-14: las sam lus sam ma rig pa'am rab tu skye ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:126a-15: nus pa'i rgyu zhes bya ba'i ming gzhan dang ldan pa'i sred pa med na skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:126a-16: sred pa ni rab tu skye ba nyid du mthong ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:126a-17: 'di ltar yongs su 'dzin pa dang kun tu 'dzin pa'i ming gi rnam grangs pa can ni /
T11TD4221.1E:126a-18: de thob pa'i sred pas byas pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:126a-19: yongs su 'dzin pa de yang skye ba rjes su 'brel pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:126a-20: des na 'di'i rab tu skye ba ni srid pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:126a-21: srid 'dod ni ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba'i don du gnyer ba'i rnam pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:126a-22: gal te yul gyi khyad par don du gnyer ba la sogs pa ni kun 'byung ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:126a-24: de la kun 'byung 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:126a-25: gang 'di srid pa kun 'byung ba can dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa de dang der mngon par dga' ba can de /
T11TD4221.1E:126a-28: srid pa'i sred pa dang 'jig pa'i sred pa zhes gsungs pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:126a-30: de ni srid 'dod gang phyir yang //
T11TD4221.1E:126a-31: srog chags bde sdug thob pa dang //
T11TD4221.1E:126a-34: gang 'di gnas dang longs spyod la sogs pa la sred pa de ni srid pa'i 'dod pa ste /
T11TD4221.1E:126a-35: 'khor pa'i srid pa dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa /
T11TD4221.1E:126a-36: de dang der mngon par dga' ba can no //
T11TD4221.1E:126a-37: de thams cad nyid ni 'dod pa'i sred pa dang srid pa'i sred pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:126b-0: gang zhig gnas la sogs pa la sred pa de ni srid @126b pa'i sred pa ste /
T11TD4221.1E:126b-2: bde ba'i don du gnyer ba'i rnam pa gang yin pa de ni 'dod pa'i sred pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:126b-3: sdug bsngal dang bral bar 'dod pa de ni 'jig pa'i sred pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:126b-4: des na 'gal ba med pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:126b-5: kun 'byung gi bden ba bstan pa lung dang 'gal ba 'ga' med do //
T11TD4221.1E:126b-6: bdag tu chags pa'i rgyu nyid las //
T11TD4221.1E:126b-7: bde min bde bar 'du shes pa //
T11TD4221.1E:126b-9: de phyir sred pa srid rten yin //
T11TD4221.1E:126b-10: ngar 'dzin pa yi gzhi yin phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:126b-11: gcig tu sgro btags pa'i sems ni bdag go //
T11TD4221.1E:126b-12: de la chags pa de ni thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa'i rgyu yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:126b-13: gnas dang longs spyod la sogs pa //
T11TD4221.1E:126b-14: don dam par bde ba dang bral ba na /
T11TD4221.1E:126b-15: bde ba ma yin pa la /
T11TD4221.1E:126b-16: phyin ci log bzhis nyams pa dag 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:126b-17: de'i phyir srid pa'i rten yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:126b-18: snying rje ldan pa ma gtogs pa //
T11TD4221.1E:126b-19: sred pa med pa gang du yang //
T11TD4221.1E:126b-21: de ni 'khor ba'i rgyu ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:126b-22: de nyid kyi phyir sred pa ni 'jug pa lhan cig byed pa yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:126b-24: nye bar len pa nyid ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:126b-25: de la nye bar len pa ni sems yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:126b-26: de'i rkyen ni res 'ga' srid pa yin la res 'ga' ni snying rje yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:126b-27: 'dis rkyen nyid ces bya ba'i rnam pa bshad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:126b-29: sred pa ni rkyen ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:126b-31: des na lus dang 'brel pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:126b-33: chags bral skye ba ma mthong phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:126b-34: zhes ni slob dpon rnams kyis gsungs //
T11TD4221.1E:126b-35: lus med chags pa ma mthong phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:126b-37: ji ltar 'dod chags dang bral ba skye ba ma mthong ba'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:126b-38: 'dod chags skye ba rgyu yin pa de bzhin du /
T11TD4221.1E:126b-39: rigs pa 'di nyid las lus 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:126b-40: lus med par chags pa ma mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:126b-42: 'dod chags med kyang snying rje'i dbang gis skye bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:126b-43: de'i mngon par dga' ba'i yul nyid ni sred pas byas pa yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:126b-44: khyad par tsam gyi rgyu yin pas na /
T11TD4221.1E:127a-2: de bzhin du gal te lus kyang 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rkyen tsam yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:127a-3: tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa nyid nye bar len pa'i rgyu yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:127a-4: de'i tshe 'dod pa nyid sgrub pa yin no zhes ston pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:127a-5: rgyu mtshan khas blangs phyir na 'dod//
T11TD4221.1E:127a-6: nyer len nyid ni gsal ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:127a-9: tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rjes su 'brel pa'i lus kyang 'dod chags kyi rgyur 'dod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:127a-10: de ni yul bzhin du res 'ga' bag chags sad pa'i rgyu yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:127a-11: rigs pa 'dis ni lus kyang 'dod chags kyi rgyu can nyid du sgrub par byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:127a-12: des na phan tshun rgyu yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:127a-13: de lta bu tshogs pa thog ma med pa las skye ba rab tu 'byung bas /
T11TD4221.1E:127a-14: skye ba gzhan rab tu grub pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:127a-15: tshu rol mdzes pa pas dpyad pa mes tshig pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:127a-16: gal te yon tan dang bcas pa rdzas nyid skye ba ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:127a-17: des na 'di gnyis ni phan tshun rgyu ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:127a-18: gal te skye ba chags mthong phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:127a-19: skye dang lhan cig 'byung zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:127a-20: skal mnyam skye las sngar grub yin //
T11TD4221.1E:127a-21: srid la mi shes rgyu yin yang //
T11TD4221.1E:127a-22: ma brjod sred pa 'dir bshad pa //
T11TD4221.1E:127a-23: rgyun ni 'phen byed pa yi phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:127a-24: gal te 'dod chags la sogs pa skye ba dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i phyir 'dod chags la sogs pa lus kyi rgyu ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:127a-25: de'i tshe lus kyang 'dod chags la sogs pa'i ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:127a-26: rgyu med pa nyid kyang ma yin pa de'i phyir 'dod chags la sogs pa rigs mthun pa'i rgyus bskyed pa'i phyir mngon par 'dod pa 'grub bo //
T11TD4221.1E:127a-27: gal te srid pa gcig pu ni rgyu ma yin pa yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:127a-28: ma rig pa dang sred pa dang las gsum rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:127a-29: de dang der mngon par dga' ba can gyi sred pa nyid kun 'byung ba'i bden par bstan pa ci ltar zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:127a-30: de ni med de rgyu nyid yin yang de ma thag pa'i rgyu ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:127a-31: sred pa nyid bar du ma chod pas rgyu yin te /
