T11TD4221.1E:127a-32: 'khor bar rgyur skul bar byed pa yang yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:127a-33: gti mug dang las dag ni yod kyang srid pa med pa 'gar yang 'jug par byed pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:127b-0: sred pa @127b med na dung la 'jug pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:127b-1: de nyid kyi phyir bshad pa /
T11TD4221.1E:127b-2: de ma thag pa nyid kyang min //
T11TD4221.1E:127b-3: de yod pa ni med phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:127b-4: sred pa med na ni las kyis sbyar ba'i rgyal srid la sogs pa yang 'dor bar byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:127b-5: gal te blo las kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:127b-7: gang gis thob par 'dor bar byed pa de'i las nyid de 'dra ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:127b-8: 'on te thar pa'i bdag nyid rnams la skye ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod na /
T11TD4221.1E:127b-9: de dag kyang las zad pa nyid kyis thar pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:127b-10: de lta ma yin na med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:127b-12: gal te las 'di thad pa ste //
T11TD4221.1E:127b-13: srid pa dang ni rnam 'bral na //
T11TD4221.1E:127b-14: sred pa gtso bo'i rgyu yi zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:127b-17: las zad pa ni med pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:127b-18: srid bcas de las gzhan pa dang //
T11TD4221.1E:127b-19: gzhan pa'i las ni yang 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:127b-20: de ltar na re zhig kun 'byung gi mtshan nyid /
T11TD4221.1E:127b-21: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam bzhir bshad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:127b-22: da ni sdug bsngal de 'gog pa srid pa yin no zhes 'gog pa'i bden pa'i rnam pa bzhi 'chad de /
T11TD4221.1E:127b-23: de ni gtan du ba min te /
T11TD4221.1E:127b-24: rgyu la gags sogs srid phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:127b-25: 'khor phyir thar pa med ce na //
T11TD4221.1E:127b-26: ma yin 'dod dang ma grub phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:127b-30: nges par 'byung ba nyid de rnam pa bzhi'o //
T11TD4221.1E:127b-31: 'gog pa nyid do zhes smras pa la 'gog pa nyid do zhes brjod do //
T11TD4221.1E:127b-32: grol ba rnams kyang 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ldan par pha rol pos khas blangs pa de bkag pas na zhi ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:127b-33: de las kyang mchog tu gyur pa'i thar pa yod do zhes zhes bya ba spangs pas na gya nom pa zhes bya ba'i rnam pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:127b-34: thar pa yang slar thar pa ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de bsal na nges par 'byung ba nyid ces bya ba nyid rnam pa bzhi pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:127b-35: de la rnam pa dang po ni //
T11TD4221.1E:127b-36: de ni gtan du ba min te //
T11TD4221.1E:127b-37: gtan du ni 'gyur ba ma yin te 'gog pa yang yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:127b-38: 'khor ba pa yin pa'i phyir thar pa ma yin pa ni nyes pa yang ma yin te 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:127b-39: thar pa ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:127b-40: 'ga' zhig bcings pa de ni thar pa yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:127b-41: de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:127b-42: thar pa la yang bcings pa yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:128a-1: thar pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:128a-2: 'on kyang sems kyi rgyun ma dag par 'gyur ba chogs pa'i khyad par las dag pa'i cha gzhan skyed pa 'ba' zhig go //
T11TD4221.1E:128a-3: de la phyi ma dag pa'i cha ni 'khor ba nyid du ma grub po //
T11TD4221.1E:128a-4: don dam par ni 'khor ba pa 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:128a-5: skad cig rnams 'khor ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:128a-6: rgyun kyang don dam par med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:128a-7: des na 'khor ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshegs ni ma grub bo //
T11TD4221.1E:128a-8: gang la thar pa yod pa'i thar pa po yang med do //
T11TD4221.1E:128a-9: gal te bcings pa thar min na //
T11TD4221.1E:128a-10: gzhan bcings gzhan ni gol 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:128a-11: gzhan ni bkres dang gzhan drangs dang //
T11TD4221.1E:128a-12: gzhan gyi gso ba'i sdug bsngal myong //
T11TD4221.1E:128a-13: gzhan ni nad las thar bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:128a-14: gzhan ni dka' thub kyis gdungs la //
T11TD4221.1E:128a-15: gzhan ni mtho ris bde ba myong //
T11TD4221.1E:128a-16: gzhan ni bstan bcos sbyong bas ngal //
T11TD4221.1E:128a-17: gzhan ni bstan bcos rtogs de'i tshe//
T11TD4221.1E:128a-18: rtogs ldan rgyu sbyor ci zhig dgos //
T11TD4221.1E:128a-21: ji srid bdag cag ma bcom zhing //
T11TD4221.1E:128a-22: de yi yongs su gdung 'gyur ba //
T11TD4221.1E:128a-23: de srid sdug bsngal sgro btags nas //
T11TD4221.1E:128a-24: rang bzhin du ni gnas pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:128a-25: grol ba po ni med na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:128a-26: log par sgro 'dogs gzhom phyir brtson //
T11TD4221.1E:128a-27: 'dod chags bral ba'i gnas pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:128a-28: brtse ba'am yang na las dag gis //
T11TD4221.1E:128a-30: gal te re zhig 'dir kho na mthong ba la brjod na ni de'i tshe grub pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:128a-31: de dag ni 'ga' zhig tu 'jug pa 'am rtsol ba byed pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:128a-32: chos nyid spangs bar bya ba na //
T11TD4221.1E:128a-34: 'on te nged lta bu la yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:128a-35: de'i tshe gcig po mngon par bzlog pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:128a-36: bcings pa de nyid grol ba yin pas de dag gi gcig pa de nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:128a-37: dngos po don dam par yod do zhes te /
T11TD4221.1E:128a-38: de tsam gyis ni de ltar tha snyad byed pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:128a-39: tha snyad ni rtogs pa la ltos pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:128a-40: 'di ltar don dam pa na sbrul ni spang bar bya ba yin pa'i yul ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:128a-41: 'on kyang sbrul nyid du lhag par mos pa yul yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-0: 'on te gal te kun rdzob tu gcig nyid yin pa lta bu na yang kun rdzob tu tha snyad yod par 'gyur mod don dam par ni gcig @128b med pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:128b-1: ji ltar don dam pa'i tha snyad du 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:128b-3: ce ltar gcig nyid kun rdzob pa //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-4: tha snyad kyang ni kun rdzob nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-5: ji ltar de nyid du gcig med //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-6: tha snyad kyi ni dngos med yin //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-7: rang gi ngo bo las gzhan pa //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-8: 'bad pa'ang la lar yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-9: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ni //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-10: rtsod pa'i skabs 'byed byed pa min //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-12: bya 'di mkhas pa'i tshul ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-13: de ltar rtogs pa dang ldan pa //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-15: sngon dang phyi mar dmigs pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-16: tshad mas rab tu rig med phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-17: skad cig tsam la 'gar yang ni //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-18: 'jug pa srid pa nyid ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-19: des na rtsol ba 'ga' yang ni //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-20: yod min de phyir nor pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-21: khas blangs nas kyang brjod pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-22: 'dod chags bral ba'i gnas pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-24: dam pa'i don rtogs 'gyur ba na//
T11TD4221.1E:128b-25: gal te 'jug pa med nyid na //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-26: chags bral spyod par mi 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-27: snga phyi rnam dbye la brten nas //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-28: spyod pa shes pa rtogs na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-29: snying rje yis ni 'jug pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-30: ji ltar rgyal po skyes bu la //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-31: phan byed la brgyud rang brtson bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-32: smon lam gtso bor byed pas na //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-33: de yi 'bras bu smon lam gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-34: las kyi mthu las skyes pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-35: 'di la brgal ba ci zhig yin //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-36: de phyir rnam pa lta bu'i ldog par sgro btags pa spang ba'i phyir brtson pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:128b-38: rmongs pa'i sdug bsngal myong bas spang bar mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-39: gal te las kyi gnas pa yin na'o na skye ba gzhan gyi las kyang yod pa'i phyir skye ba gzhan dang 'brel par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-40: 'on te dgra bcom pa las lan nus pa med na /
T11TD4221.1E:128b-41: gnas par yang mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:128b-44: srid pa'i srid las rnam brgal ba'i //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-45: las gzhan 'phen nus ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-46: lhan cig byed pa zad pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-47: 'phags pa ni rtsol ba med pa bzlog par nus pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-48: rtsol ba yang 'dod chags dang bral bas spang bar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:128b-49: btang snyoms pa nyid kyis de ni 'ga' yang re ba mi 'cha' ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:128b-50: re ba med pa de nyid kyi phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:129a-0: @129a * // skye ba gzhan 'grub pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:129a-1: de'i phyir lhan cig byed pa sred pa'i mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir sngon gyi sred pas bskyed pa'i skye ba de gcig 'ba' zhig tu zad kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:129a-2: gzhan ni med do zhes gnas so //
T11TD4221.1E:129a-3: gal te brtse ba ni sdug bsngal las bskyab par bya pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:129a-5: gzhan la ma yin pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:129a-6: bdag tu lta ba spangs pa'i phyir ni sems can 'ga' yang med la /
T11TD4221.1E:129a-7: sems can du lta ba yang med pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:129a-8: des na brtse ba'i phyir na sems can du lta ba ma spangs par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:129a-10: sdug bsngal shes la 'gal med phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:129a-12: dngos chos brtse ba skye ba de //
T11TD4221.1E:129a-13: sems can rjes 'bral can ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:129a-14: gang gi tshe sdug bsngal la gsum dang ldan pa mtha' dag sdug bsngal ba'o zhes mngon sum du byas pa de'i tshe /
T11TD4221.1E:129a-15: kun 'byung gi mtshan nyid sred pa dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:129a-16: kun 'byung spangs pa la ni 'dod chags la sogs pa med pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:129a-17: sems can gyi tshogs mtha' dag dang 'gal ba med pa mnyam pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:129a-18: des na sdug bsngal mthong ba las dngos po la brten pa nyid kyis brtse ba chen po skye ba yin gyi de'i gnas skabs na sems can du 'dzin pa dang 'brel pa ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:129a-19: de lta bur 'gyur ba'i sems can du 'dzin pa'i lta ba spangs pa'i bsam pa gang yin pa de ni brtse ba yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:129a-20: de yang bdag tu lta ba spangs pa kho na'i yin gyi gzhan gyi ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:129a-21: bdag tu lta ba ma spangs pa ni ji ltar gzhan dag de spang ba'i don du 'bad par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:129a-22: gal te 'dod chags dang brtse ba la khyad ci zhig yod ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:129a-24: de bdag min pa'i chos la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:129a-25: bdag gzhan sgro 'dogs pa la chags //
T11TD4221.1E:129a-26: sdug bsngal rgyun rig tsam las ni //
T11TD4221.1E:129a-28: 'dod chags dang brtse ba ni khyad che ste /
T11TD4221.1E:129a-29: rgyu tha dad pa'i phyir dang yul tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:129b-0: 'di ltar ma 'ongs pa med par sgro btags nas bdag nyid ma 'ongs pa'i bde ba dang phrad par smon pas dbang du byas pa'i 'dod chags ni de las 'jug pa yin la yul yang de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa @129b la de'i bdag nyid du mthong bar 'gyur ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:129b-1: phyin ci log rnam pa bzhis bsgom pa'i yid ni /
T11TD4221.1E:129b-2: chags par 'gyur gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:129b-3: brtse ba ni sdug bsngal gyi rgyun tsam mngon du byas pa nyid la /
T11TD4221.1E:129b-4: log par mngon par rlom pa dang bral bar bya ba'i don du 'jug pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:129b-5: gal te bdag gis 'di'i sdug bsngal bzlog par bya'o snyam pa'i bsam pa med pa ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:129b-7: gal te bdag don la 'jug na //
T11TD4221.1E:129b-8: de lta nyid du thal bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:129b-9: gzhan don cam la 'jug rnams la //
T11TD4221.1E:129b-10: rang 'dzin ched ka che ba min //
T11TD4221.1E:129b-11: rgyal po'i dpe ni bstan zin te //
T11TD4221.1E:129b-13: yang na snga ma snga ma yis //
T11TD4221.1E:129b-14: skyes bu dam pa'i 'du byed la //
T11TD4221.1E:129b-17: gnas pa ma yin tshad med phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:129b-18: khyod cag 'khrul pa nyid du zad //
T11TD4221.1E:129b-19: des na 'di ni brtse ba dang 'dod chags kyi khyad par yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:129b-20: shin tu rgyu skyed pas chog go //
T11TD4221.1E:129b-21: gal te de kho na mthong ba la skye ba'i phyir brtse / gal te bdag la gnod pa byed pa mthong na khro bar 'gyur ba rang bzhin du ni 'gyur ba nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:129b-22: mi gtsang ba la sogs pa mthong ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhe na / mi sdug pa bsgom pas ni thar pa ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:129b-23: 'on kyang sdug bsngal la sogs pa mthong ba las yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:129b-24: bdag yod na ni de rang dbang yin pas gzhan sdug bsngal bar byed pa'i phyir sdang bar 'gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:129b-25: gang gi tshe 'di rgyu la rag las pa de'i rang gi ngo bo tsam gyis 'jug pa dang gnod par byed pa'i dus na de nyid med pa la gnod par bya bar mi nus pa de'i tshe ni sngar bar 'dzin pa'i don med do //
T11TD4221.1E:129b-26: gti mug nyes pa'i rtsa ba de //
T11TD4221.1E:129b-27: de yang sems can 'dzin pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:129b-28: de med nyes rgyu la khro min //
T11TD4221.1E:129b-29: des na brtse ba nyes med 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:129b-30: gal te bdag la gnod pa byed pa mthong na khro bar 'gyur ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:129b-31: bdag ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:129b-32: 'on kyang sems can med par yang sems can du 'dzin pa tsam 'ba' zhig khro ba'i rgyu yin pas sems can du 'dzin pa med pa na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:129b-33: gti mug ni sems can du lta ba'i rmongs pa med pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:130a-2: de bas na nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba'i rtsa ba ni skyon yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:130a-3: gal te 'dod chags dang bral ba lus dang bcas pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:130a-4: de'i tshe ma grol ba nyid du mi 'gyur ram zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:130a-6: nyes pa dang bral ba'i sems yod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:130a-8: grol med ma yin sngon du med //
T11TD4221.1E:130a-9: zad na gzhan mtshams mi sbyor phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:130a-10: 'du byed nus pa ma zad pa //
T11TD4221.1E:130a-11: gal te gnas pa nyes med nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:130a-12: skye ba gzhan mtshams sbyor ba dang //
T11TD4221.1E:130a-13: 'gal ba'i yid la gnas pa ji ltar grol ba ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:130a-14: sngon gyi 'du byed skye ba de skyed par byed pa yang zad ba'i phyir mtshams sbyor ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:130a-15: gang dag skye ba gzhan du mtshan sbyor ba med par bya ba'i phyir 'du byed zad 'dod pa med pas /
T11TD4221.1E:130a-16: 'du byed pa zad pa de ni ji srid 'du byed rjes su 'jug gi bar du gnas pa la nyes pa med pa nyid do /
T11TD4221.1E:130a-17: snying rje dman pa nyid phyir yang //
T11TD4221.1E:130a-18: gnas pa'i 'bad rtsol chen po med //
T11TD4221.1E:130a-19: gang dag brtse ba chen po pa //
T11TD4221.1E:130a-20: gzhan gyi ngor ni bzhugs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:130a-22: snying rje dman pa nyid kyi phyir yang gnas pa'i 'bad rtsol med pas gtan du gnas pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:130a-23: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dag ni gnas pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:130a-24: de bzhed pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:130a-25: gal te lam nus pa yin na de'i tshe dang po rgyun du zhugs pa'i lam nyid du srid pa 'chad par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:130a-26: 'jig tshogs su lta ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro /
T11TD4221.1E:130a-27: 'di ltar 'jig tshogs su lta ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:130a-28: the tshom dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa spangs pas rgyun du zhugs par 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:130a-29: gti mug nyes pa'i rtsa ba ste /
T11TD4221.1E:130a-30: de yang sems can 'dzin pa yin no zhes kyang brjod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:130a-31: des na lam gzhan don med par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:130a-33: gal te 'jig tshogs lta bral phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:130a-34: lam dang bor ni srid med 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:130a-35: lhan cig skyes ba ma spangs phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:130a-36: spangs na srid pa ga la yod //
T11TD4221.1E:130a-37: 'jig tshogs su lta ba mtha' dag spangs pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:130a-38: mngon par 'du byed pa las byung ba nyid spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:130a-39: lhan cig skyes pa ni spangs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:130b-0: lam dang po pa @130b ni bden pa mthong ba tsam yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:130b-1: mthong bas kyang mngon par 'du byed pa las byung ba'i bdag tu 'dzin pa spangs pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:130b-2: gzhi med pa'i nyon mongs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:130b-3: nye bar bstan pa las byung ba'i bdag lta ba de ni /
T11TD4221.1E:130b-4: bzlog pa mthong ba tsam nyid kyis spong ba yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:130b-5: lhan cig skyes pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba ni thog ma med pa nas goms pas brtan pa yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:130b-6: gnyen po goms pa'i lam nyid kyis spong ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:130b-7: des na lhan cig skyes pa spangs pa las srid pa zad par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:130b-8: gang gi 'dod pas lhan cig skyes pa yang spangs par 'dod pas ni spangs nas srid pa ga la yod par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:130b-9: shes rab rnon po'i ni lam dang po nyid nus pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:130b-10: de nyid lam thams cad kyi rang bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:130b-11: gal te sems can du lta ba lhan cig skyes pa bdag gi rnam pa can yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:130b-12: de'i tshe bdag med pas mngon par 'du byed pa nyid las de las blo 'gyur ba yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:130b-13: skyed par byed pa'i dngos po med na nye bar bstan pa tsam zhig rgyu yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:130b-15: bde bar 'gyur ba'am sdug bsngal bar //
T11TD4221.1E:130b-16: ma gyur cig ces 'dod pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:130b-17: nga'o snyam pa'i blo gang des //
T11TD4221.1E:130b-18: sems can lta la lhan cig skyes //
T11TD4221.1E:130b-19: nga zhes mthong ba med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:130b-20: 'ga' yang bdag la chags pa min //
T11TD4221.1E:130b-21: bdag la sred pa med par yang //
T11TD4221.1E:130b-22: bde ba 'dod pas mngon rgyug min //
T11TD4221.1E:130b-23: bdag bde bar gyur cig ce'am //
T11TD4221.1E:130b-24: rnam pa gzhan du ma gyur ces bya ba de lta ba'i rnam pa can //
T11TD4221.1E:130b-25: nga'o snyam pa'i blo thog ma med pa'i bag chags kyi dbang gis skyes par 'gyur ba de ni sems can du lta ba lhan cig skyes pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:130b-26: de spangs ba'i phyir ni srid pa med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:130b-27: bdag go zhes ma mthong na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:130b-28: bdag tu zhen par mi 'gyur gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:130b-29: mthong ba la ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:130b-30: bdag la zhen pa med par yang bde ba 'dod pas mgon par rgyug par mi byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:130b-31: gang zhig sems can du lhan cig skyes pas bcug pa'i bdag nyid du zhen pa dang 'brel pa de ci ltar yang srid med par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:130b-32: des na sems can du lta ba lhan cig skyes pa yod pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:131a-0: lam dang po nyid du 'khor ba med pa ma yin @131a * //
T11TD4221.1E:131a-2: sems can du lta ba mtha' dag spangs pa las gdon mi za bar 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bya bar nges so //
T11TD4221.1E:131a-3: 'dis ni zhi ba nyid ces bya ba'i rnam pa bshad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:131a-5: bcings pa de nyid grol ba yin pa de'i phyir bdag la yongs su tshim pa'i khyad par las thar ba de gya nom par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:131a-6: bdag med pa na go gang las tshim par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:131a-7: gal te 'gyur na de 'khrul pa nyid yin pas nyes pa dang bcas pa nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:131a-8: 'di thar pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:131a-10: sdug bsngal skye ba'i rgyu nyid ni //
T11TD4221.1E:131a-11: 'ching yin rtag la de ga las //
T11TD4221.1E:131a-12: sdug bsngal mi skyed rgyu nyid ni //
T11TD4221.1E:131a-13: thar yin rtag la de ga las //
T11TD4221.1E:131a-14: gal te bdag rtag pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:131a-15: de bzhin khyab pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:131a-16: de'i tshe rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa med pa'i phyir de rang nyid bdag gi sdug bsngal skyed par nus pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:131a-18: gal te rang dbang dang nus pa yin na ji ltar bdag la sdug bsngal bskyed de /
T11TD4221.1E:131a-19: rang gsad par bya ba'i phyir gshed byed sgrub pa ni rtog ba dang ldan par rigs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:131a-21: de'i tshe bdag nyid mi shes pa ji ltar bdag yin /
T11TD4221.1E:131a-22: mi dmigs pa'i phyir 'di med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:131a-23: 'on te 'di de'i rang bzhin nyid yin na de'i tshe nam yang gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir de 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:131a-24: 'on te bdag nyid shes kyang chos dang chos ma yin pas sdug bsngal bskyed do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:131a-25: de lta na yang rtag pa dang khyab pa ni 'ga' yang sdug bsngal bskyed pa'i rgyu ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:131a-26: gal te 'di de'i tshe sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin yin na de'i tshe sdug bsngal sdug bsngal dang ldan pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:131a-27: de'i ngo bo yin na gzhan du ;
T11TD4221.1E:131a-28: mi 'gyur te des na thar pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:131a-29: gzhan gyi dngos por 'gyur na ni rtag pa ma yin pa'i phyir bdag ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:131a-30: de ltar bde ba dang sdug bsngal tha dad pa yin na de'i tshe bdag bde ba can ma yin la sdug pa can yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:131a-31: bde ba gzhan gyis gzhan bde ba nyid du ni 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:131a-32: 'on te der 'du ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:131a-33: 'du ba yang gzhan nyid ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:131a-34: gzhan nyid ma yin pa nyid na ni skyon de nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-0: bde ba dang bde ba ma yin pa la sogs @131b pa'i rang bzhin yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:131b-1: rang bzhin gzhan dang gzhan nyid pas mi rtag pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-2: ci ste 'di don dam par rnam par 'gyur ba med pa nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:131b-3: bde ba la sogs pas rtogs pa 'khrul pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:131b-5: gal te 'khrul pa bdag las ni //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-6: gzhan na bdag med rig med phyir ;
T11TD4221.1E:131b-7: / de yi rang bzhin rig ce na //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-8: rang rig ji ltar 'khrul pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-9: gal te thar kyang bde nyid na //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-10: thar pa gya nom mi 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-11: de la de ni rmongs yod phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-12: de phyir bdag ni thar ldan min //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-13: gang la yongs su tshim pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-14: skad cig gzhan dang gzhan srid pa //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-15: de yi thar te gya nom ste ;
T11TD4221.1E:131b-16: / nor dang mi rigs med pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-17: gal te bcings dang thar pa gnyis //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-18: gzhi mi gcig par thal zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-19: kun rdzob tu ni gcig pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-20: dngos po bzlog pa med pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-21: gang zhig thar de bcings pas kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-22: de yi tshe na ci zhig bya //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-23: gal te nga sngon gyur to zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-24: 'gyur na de yang gang du mkho //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-25: sngar ni gcig tu nges pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-26: rtogs sngon byed can mi 'gyur la //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-27: de yang rigs pa min zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-28: de ni 'dod pa nyid yin la //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-29: yang na de ni gzhan don du //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-30: rab tu sbyor zhes sngar brjod do //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-31: thar pa de ni gya nom nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-32: gzhan pa dag ni bzlog pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-33: 'on te 'di snyam du bdag ni rtag pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:131b-35: mi rtag pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:131b-36: rtog pa sngon du byed pa yin par thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-37: des na rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid du brjod bya ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:131b-39: mi rtag nyid du brjod med gang //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-40: de ni 'ga' yi rgyu ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-41: brjod bya min la'ang bcings dang thar //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-42: ci lta bu yang yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-43: mi rtag pa nyid du brjod du med par zhes bya ba ni /
T11TD4221.1E:131b-44: 'di ni mi rtag pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba ni ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:131b-45: gang de ma yin pa de ni rgyu nyid ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-46: rgyu la mi rtag pa nyid kyis khyab pa yin no zhes gzhan tu gtan la phab bo //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-47: des na khyad par med pa byed pas rgyu nyid kyang srid pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-48: gang zhig rtag pa yang ma yin pa de ni gtan med pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:131b-49: 'on te bcings pa dang thar pa dag gzhi gcig pa'i phyir mi rtag pa nyid ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:132a-0: rgyu yin pa'i phyir rtag pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba lan du @132a * //
T11TD4221.1E:132a-3: rtag dang mi rtag las grol ba'i //
T11TD4221.1E:132a-4: ngo bo nyid ni dmigs ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:132a-5: thams cad ldog dang rjes su ni //
T11TD4221.1E:132a-6: 'jug pa nyid du mthong phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:132a-7: ci ste gal te gzhan du mi 'gyur na //
T11TD4221.1E:132a-8: gnyi ga'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:132a-9: de la'ang nyes pa gang gi phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:132a-10: gang gi rang bzhin 'jig med pa //
T11TD4221.1E:132a-11: de la mkhas rnams rtag ces brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:132a-12: des na ngo tsha'i lta ba 'di //
T11TD4221.1E:132a-13: spangs te de ni rtag par brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:132a-14: 'jig pa yang yin pa la rtag pa yang yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni 'gal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:132a-15: gang gi phyir 'jig pa med pa de ni rtag pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:132a-16: zhig pa dang mi dmigs pa dang med pa zhes bya ba ni don gcig yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:132a-17: mi 'jig pa dang rtag pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:132a-18: dmigs pa zhes bya ba yang don gcig yin par grub par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:132a-19: des na rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dag gcig nyid yin zhes bya ba ni /
T11TD4221.1E:132a-20: dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa dag yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T11TD4221.1E:132a-21: dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa dag kyang ci ltar gcig tu 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:132a-22: gcig nyid du ni rtog pa gang //
T11TD4221.1E:132a-23: de ni gcig ces bya bar gnas //
T11TD4221.1E:132a-24: gal te ma rtogs rtogs yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:132a-25: 'di ni ha cang bab col yin //
T11TD4221.1E:132a-26: gal te rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid gcig yin na de'i tshe rtogs pa dang ma rtogs pa gcig yin no zhes bya bar thal bar 'gyur la /
T11TD4221.1E:132a-27: de ltar na yang 'brel pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:132a-28: rtogs pa 'di gzhan du gcig par rtogs pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:132a-29: ma rtogs pa nyid ni rtogs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:132a-30: ri bong gi rva ma rtogs pa ni rtogs pa 'ga' zhig dang lhan cig gcig nyid du nges par nus pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:132a-31: de la gcig rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:132a-32: 'dir yang ma rtogs pa ni ma rtogs pa nyid du gdon mi za'o //
T11TD4221.1E:132a-33: gang zhig gcig nyid du rtogs pa de ni /
T11TD4221.1E:132a-34: rtogs pa nyid de zhig pa ma yin zhing skye ba yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:132a-35: 'on te gzhan rtogs pa ma rtogs pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:132a-36: des na ma rtogs pa ni rtogs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:132a-37: de las gzhan pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa nyid de ma rtogs so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:132a-38: de lta na 'o na gzhan gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de nyid las de med do zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:132a-41: gzhan ba nyid du shes pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-0: ji @132b ltar gzhan ma yin par brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-1: de ni gzhan nyid ma yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-3: gzhan nyid na ni mi dmigs 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-4: ma dmigs na ni mi rtag nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-5: gzhan min nyid ni mi 'gyur la //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-6: dmigs pa nyid na rtag pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-7: de ni rang bzhin 'ga' zhig gis //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-8: mi dmigs gzhan gyi gzhan yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-9: rang bzhin gang gi rigs min pa //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-11: snga ma nyid du de nyid ni //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-12: de lta snga ma nyid 'gyur gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-14: min phyir ji ltar gcig nyid yin //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-15: snga phyi'i rang bzhin dag dang ni //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-16: ma bral phyir na gcig yin na ;
T11TD4221.1E:132b-17: / bral ba nyid du mthong bzhin du'ang //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-18: bral ba min par ji ltar 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-19: gal te rim gyis 'bral min na //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-20: de bzhin du ni bral ba yang //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-21: bral dang ma bral de nyid kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-22: phyir na gnyi ga'i rang bzhin ni //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-23: ji ltar cig car 'di yod pa //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-24: de bzhin nyid du de mthong 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-25: rim min pa yi yod pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-26: rim ldan dngos po la ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-27: snga phyi'i rang bzhin ma rtogs na //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-28: khyab pa nyid du 'dod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-29: rim gyis khyab pa nyid na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-30: de nyid khyab par 'gyur ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-31: gcig po de ni mthong ba dang //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-32: ma mthong bar ni 'thad ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-33: de tshe nyid de mthong ba dang //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-34: ma mthong bar ni 'thad par dka' //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-35: dus kyis dbye ba thams cad kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-36: mi 'grigs pa ni med par mthong //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-37: gcig phyir 'di ni gcig tshe nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-38: dus tha dad par ji ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-39: yang nas yang du 'dzin na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-41: gzung ngo zhes byar 'dzin pa gang //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-42: de ni dran par 'gyur ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-43: dran pa tshad ma ma yin phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-44: rim 'dzin pa ni srid ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-45: gang gis mngon sum nyid 'gyur ba //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-46: ma rtogs pa ni de dngos min //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-47: gal te de tshe yod pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-48: sngar gyi blo yis ma rtogs par //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-49: tha dad med phyir ci ltar de'i //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-50: rnam dbye 'di ni tshad ldan yin //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-51: gal te de la mthong zin nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-52: med phyir kun tshe da ltar ni //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-53: de yi snga ma phyi ma yi //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-54: dngos po gang gis rtogs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-55: snga phyi'i shes pa las she na //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-56: de dag tha dad ga las rtogs //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-57: gal te rang rig dngos las na //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-58: de la gnyis nyid rtogs mi 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:132b-59: snga ma phyi ma med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-2: gal te snga dang phyi ma yi //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-3: myong ba de dag gcig yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-4: gcig na mngon du byas pas na //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-5: ji ltar snga dang phyi mar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-6: mngon du byas bzhin pa nyid ni //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-7: sngon dang phyi mar 'gyur ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-8: gal te snga ma nyid min na //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-9: ji ltar snga ma nyid du rtogs //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-10: 'di rtogs med nyid rtogs de ni //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-11: mngon du byed pa nyid ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-12: 'di de'i dran pa yin zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-13: gang gi tshe de med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-14: dran pa nyid ni mthong 'gyur na //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-15: de yi zhes ni ji ltar brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-16: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos las ni //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-17: de tsam gyis ni 'dzin pa min //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-18: don ni mngon du byed pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-19: gzung yin bzlog pa las ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-20: myong bas bar du chod pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-21: don las dran pa dngos su min //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-22: myong ba snga ma de yis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-23: snga nyid 'dzin min phyi mas min //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-24: des na dran pa nyid las ni //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-25: snga ma nyid du grub ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-26: 'das pa sngon du byas pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-27: snga ma zhes ni bya bar brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-31: gang de yod ces 'dod na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-32: de rnams nyid ni yod mi 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-33: de ye dngos dang mi ldan phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-34: gang tshe zhig pa de tshe de //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-35: yod pa nyid du ji ltar rtogs //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-36: de sngar yod pa rtogs na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-37: de tshe de ni ji ltar zhig / brtan la gal te 'di blo 'di //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-38: med na ji ltar yod par rtogs //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-39: thams cad rtogs pa las yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-40: des na gzhan du ji ltar yod //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-41: de phyir rtag dang mi rtag pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-42: dngos po gar yang srid ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-43: dngos rtag pa 'am dngos mi rtag //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-44: mtha' gcig nyid du srid pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-45: da ni lam gyi zhar la /
T11TD4221.1E:133a-46: 'gog pa'i rnam pa bzhi pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
T11TD4221.1E:133a-47: bshad zin lam de goms pa las //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-49: lam bzhin skyon ni 'byung zhe na ;
T11TD4221.1E:133a-50: / ma yin nus pa med phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:133a-51: sngar bshad pa nyid kyis lam de goms pa las gnas sems kyi rgyun nam /
T11TD4221.1E:133a-52: kun gzhi yongs su dag par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:133a-53: bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang mi mthun pa bdag med pa de'i bdag tu gyur pa na nyes pa mtha' dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:133b-0: gal @133b te ji ltar nyes pa dang ldan pa la /
T11TD4221.1E:133b-1: yon tan ldan par 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
T11TD4221.1E:133b-2: yon tan dang ldan pa yang nyes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'khor ba las nges par 'byung ba med do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:133b-4: nyes pa rnams yon tan yod pas bcom pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:133b-5: bzlog pa ji ltar mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:133b-6: yon tan rnams ni dngos po'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:133b-7: nyes pa rnams ni de las bzlog pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:133b-8: de ci ltar zhe na bshad pa /
T11TD4221.1E:133b-9: rnam shes yul 'dzin pa yi chos //
T11TD4221.1E:133b-10: ji ltar yod de 'dzin pa dang //
T11TD4221.1E:133b-11: yod pa yi ni bdag nyid de //
T11TD4221.1E:133b-12: 'di yi skyed par byed pa'ang yin //
T11TD4221.1E:133b-13: rnam par shes pa ni skye ba rnams kyi lam 'jug par byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:133b-14: gang gis rnam par shes par 'gyur ba de'i rang bzhin gyi chos ni yul 'dzin pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:133b-15: rnam par shes pa ni rig pa ma yin par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:133b-16: rig pa ma yin pa rnams la ni de lta bu med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:133b-17: ji ltar yod pa de ltar de //
T11TD4221.1E:133b-18: gzung bar bya ba dang skyed par byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:133b-19: rnam par rtog par nus pa'i rgyu ni rnam par shes pa'i yul yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:133b-20: des rnam par shes pa'i chos ni rang bzhin rtogs par byed pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:133b-21: yul gyi chos ni de kho na ltar rtogs par bya ba nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:133b-22: des ni yul ni mi rtag pa nyid dang bdag med pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:133b-23: de lta bu 'dzin pa nyid ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yin gyi gzhan ni de'i rang bzhin ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:133b-25: rkyen gzhan gyis ni gol 'gyur zhing ;
T11TD4221.1E:133b-26: / ldog pa la ni rkyen la ltos //
T11TD4221.1E:133b-27: mi brten sprul gyi blo bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:133b-28: gang gi chos bdag med pa nyid la sogs pa 'dzin pa'i ngo bo gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:133b-29: de las gol ba ni glo bur ba'i rkyen rtsa ba med pa'i dbang gis yin zhing /
T11TD4221.1E:133b-30: gol ba nyid kyang gol ba de las bzlog pa la rkyen la ltos pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:133b-31: des na rtsa ba med pa can yin pa'i phyir mi brten te sbrul gyi blo bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:133b-32: gal te thag pa la sbrul gyi blor 'gyur ba'i rgyu ni 'dra ba dang yul thag ring ba la sogs pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:133b-33: rtag pa'i blo la rgyu ci zhig yod //
T11TD4221.1E:134a-0: mngon sum ni rtag pa nyid la 'jug pa ma @134a * //
T11TD4221.1E:134a-2: rjes su dpag pa yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:134a-3: tshad ma med par ni dogs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:134a-4: mngon sum gyis ni skad cig ma nyid rtogs so zhes kyang bsgrub par nus te /
T11TD4221.1E:134a-5: des na gang las rtag pa nyid 'dzin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:134a-7: mi rtag pa nyid de ni mthong bzhin du'ang /
T11TD4221.1E:134a-8: blo zhe na yod pa dmigs pas rtag tu de ltar yod par dogs pas bslus pa'am /
T11TD4221.1E:134a-9: 'dra ba gzhan 'byung bas bslus pas mi rtogs te /
T11TD4221.1E:134a-10: skad cig ma tha ma mthong ba rnams la nges pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:134a-11: 'di skad brjod par 'gyur ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:134a-12: gang gi tshe ji srid du don gyi bdag nyid dmigs pas phyis ma dmigs pa de'i tshe mi rtag pa nyid mthong ba nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:134a-13: de'i gnas skabs ma yin pa nyid ni mi rtag pa nyid du brjod do //
T11TD4221.1E:134a-14: 'on kyang ma dmigs su zin kyang blo zhan pa dogs pa dang mi bral te /
T11TD4221.1E:134a-15: des na de ltar yod par dogs pa yin pas na de ltar yod par dogs pa ste /
T11TD4221.1E:134a-16: ci snga ma de nyid da ltar yang yod dam ma yin zhes dogs pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:134a-17: des na phyis mthong ba las don bya ba thob pa'i phyir ma bslus pas na mi rtogs so //
T11TD4221.1E:134a-18: de ma thob pa'i phyir bslus pa ni rtogs par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:134a-19: chags pa'i bum pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:134a-20: don byed pa'i mtshan nyid yod pa dmigs na tha snyad par bzlog par sems pa'i skabs ci yod /
T11TD4221.1E:134a-21: de kho na sems par byed pa dag ni snang ba tha dad pas nges par byed pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:134a-22: tha snyad pa don byed pa don du gnyer ba ni /
T11TD4221.1E:134a-23: de thob pas yongs su tshim pa'i phyir gzhan rnam par dpyod pa mi byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:134a-24: don byas zin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:134a-25: yang na 'dra ba gzhan 'byung bas bslus pa de /
T11TD4221.1E:134a-26: 'dra ba la ni de nyid 'di yin no snyam pa'i blor 'gyur ba yin te mtshe ma dang sgro pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:134a-27: snga mar ni gang las rtsva la sogs pa gzhan dang gzhan las skyes pa'i me gcig nyid du lhag par zhen pa'i yul du 'byung ba de'i don byed pa la ma bslus pa tsam brjod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:134a-28: de la nye bar len pa ni bud shing nyid yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:134a-30: me las ma skyes pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:134a-31: dang po me mi skye bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:134b-0: me rdo dang brdabs pa'i sngon rol na ma @134b * //
T11TD4221.1E:134b-2: yang na med de nyid las skye'o //
T11TD4221.1E:134b-3: de bzhin du don thams cad rigs mthun pa snga ma las skye ba 'am /
T11TD4221.1E:134b-4: rigs mi mthun pa las skye ba ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:134b-5: las bdag po gyur pa las skye ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:134b-6: de nyid kyi phyir don 'di la ltos te 'am zhes phyogs gzhan brtag pa mdzad do ;
T11TD4221.1E:134b-7: / de yang las smra ba'i 'don pas ni snga ma bshad pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:134b-8: gzhan gyi 'dod pa ni phyi ma bzhin no zhes gor ma chag go //
T11TD4221.1E:134b-9: yang na de ltar yod pa la dogs pa med pas bslus zhes bshad par bya ste /
T11TD4221.1E:134b-10: de ltar yod pa la ni dogs pa 'ga' yang med do //
T11TD4221.1E:134b-11: rtag tu yod pa dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:134b-12: mi dmigs na ni de ltar yod pa la dogs par 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:134b-13: gang gi tshe rab tu ma dmigs pa de'i tshe tshul ji ltar gnas she na /
T11TD4221.1E:134b-14: der yang 'dra ba gzhan dang gzhan 'byung ba las bslus pas te /
T11TD4221.1E:134b-15: bregs pa las yang skyes pa'i skra dang sen mo la sogs pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:134b-16: zhig pa ngo shes pa'i phyir gcig nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:134b-18: ngo shes pa tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:134b-19: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa nyid mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:134b-21: de'i phyir nang gi ma rig pa'i bslad pa las dri ma rnams ni glo bur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:134b-22: de nyid kyi phyir bshad pa /
T11TD4221.1E:134b-24: rtag pa nyid dang bral ba nyid des 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:134b-25: dri ma rnams ni glo bur ba //
T11TD4221.1E:134b-26: yang dag pa ma yin pa sgro 'dogs pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:134b-27: rtsa ba med pa can nyid kyis glen pa tsam du zad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:134b-28: 'don dam pa ni rtag pa nyid 'gar yang snang ba med de /
T11TD4221.1E:134b-29: des na rnam pa dpyad pas stong pa'i phyir dri ma rnams ni glo bur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:134b-30: de yi phyir yang nus med na //
T11TD4221.1E:134b-31: de bdag 'gyur la phyis nus min //
T11TD4221.1E:134b-32: sngar thos bsam gyi dus na yang nus pa med pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:134b-34: nus pa yod na yang gnod pa can //
T11TD4221.1E:134b-35: skyes nus snying po can dngos la //
T11TD4221.1E:134b-36: yun du gnas nus yod min te //
T11TD4221.1E:134b-37: sa rlon la ni me bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:134b-38: gal te dad pa la sogs pa zhen pa'i dgra bcom pa yang /
T11TD4221.1E:134b-39: dgra bcom pa nyid las nyams par 'gyur ba ni ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:135a-0: des na ji ltar skyon rnams mi skye @135a * //
T11TD4221.1E:135a-2: gal te skyon rnams skye ba yin pa de lta na yang /
T11TD4221.1E:135a-3: gnod par byed pa bskyed par nus pa de nang du chud pa la /
T11TD4221.1E:135a-4: skyed par nus su zin yang nyes pa gtan chags par byed nus pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:135a-5: dper na chu 'dzag pa'i sa las me skyes su zin kyang yun du mi gnas pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:135a-6: de'i bdag nyid du gnas pa la ni nyes pa skye ba yang ma yin te 'di ltar /
T11TD4221.1E:135a-7: 'tshe ba med dang yang dag don //
T11TD4221.1E:135a-8: rang bzhin la ni phyin log gis //
T11TD4221.1E:135a-9: 'bad du zin kyang mi bzlog ste //
T11TD4221.1E:135a-10: blo ni de phyogs 'dzin phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:135a-11: rang bzhin ni 'bad pa med par bzlog nus pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:135a-12: 'bad pa yang yon tan dag la skyon mthong ba'am /
T11TD4221.1E:135a-13: skyon la yon tan mthong ba la 'jug pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:135a-14: bdag med pa de'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba mthong ba ni yon tan dag la skyon du mthong ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:135a-15: skyon la yon tan mthong ba las ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:135a-16: yon tan dag la yon tan ma mthong ba yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:135a-17: bdag med par mthong ba ni 'tshe ba med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:135a-18: de yi rang bzhin yang dag gi / bdag nyid 'tshe ba med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:135a-19: sems dang ldan pas ji ltar na //
T11TD4221.1E:135a-20: yongs su 'dor bar nus ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:135a-21: sems ni phyogs su ltung bas na //
T11TD4221.1E:135a-22: nyes pa rnams la 'jug ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:135a-23: des na de ni nyes pa la//
T11TD4221.1E:135a-25: dngos pos ma lus pa'i rang bzhin rtogs par nus pa la ni gal te nyes pa 'byung du zin yang /
T11TD4221.1E:135a-26: de lta na yang 'di 'gron po las grogs bzang po dang bral ba bzhin du /
T11TD4221.1E:135a-27: bar ma do'i gnas skabs na gnas pa 'di shugs dang ldan pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:135a-28: lam nyid dang 'bad pa rtsom ste /
T11TD4221.1E:135a-30: nyes pa la dga' ba ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:135a-31: gal te 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gi rnam pa mi mthun pa yin yang /
T11TD4221.1E:135a-32: gcig nyid gnod par byed pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:135a-33: zhe sdang gis gnod par byas pa'i 'dod chags phyis kyang gnod byed nyid du mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:135a-34: de bzhin du zhe sdang yang yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:135a-35: bdag med pa dang bdag tu lta ba yang /
T11TD4221.1E:135a-36: de bzhin du 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:135a-39: bdag 'dzin rgyu gcig can nyid dang //
T11TD4221.1E:135a-40: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:135b-0: 'dod chags khong khro phan tshun dag / tha dad na @135b yang gnod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:135b-1: gnyi ga yang bdag tu 'dzin pa'i rgyu can yin pa'i phyir phan tshun mi mthun pa yin yang bdag tu 'dzin pa yod na gcig kyang gtan chad pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:135b-2: cig car mi skye bar ni 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:135b-3: gzhan yang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:135b-4: gang zhig sdug bsngal gyi rgyu gang la dbugs 'byung bas de gdungs par 'gyur ba de /
T11TD4221.1E:135b-5: de'ang gzhan dag la bde ba'i rgyu 'dod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:135b-6: des na 'di dag ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:135b-7: dpe pa'i rgyur phan pa nyams su myong ba yang nges par de la gnod par byed pa la khong khro ba dang ldan par 'gyur te ;
T11TD4221.1E:135b-8: des na 'dod chags dang khong khro dag ni tha dad pa yin yang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yin pa'i phyir gnod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:135b-10: byams sogs rmongs dang 'gal med phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:135b-11: shin tu nyes pa tshar gcod min //
T11TD4221.1E:135b-12: nyes kun de yi rtsa ba can //
T11TD4221.1E:135b-13: de yang 'jig tshogs lta ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:135b-14: gal te zhe sdang gi gnyen po byams pa /
T11TD4221.1E:135b-15: 'dod chags kyi gnyen po mi sdug pa /
T11TD4221.1E:135b-16: rnam par 'tshe ba'i gnyen po snying rje /
T11TD4221.1E:135b-17: phrag dog gi gnyen po dga' ba /
T11TD4221.1E:135b-18: thams cad kyi gnyen po btang snyoms yin pa de lta na yang /
T11TD4221.1E:135b-19: shin tu nyes pa tshar gcod par byed pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:135b-20: gti mug dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:135b-21: gal te gti mug yod kyang /
T11TD4221.1E:135b-22: bdag tu 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir nyes pa thams cad spong ba nyid ma yin nam zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:135b-24: gti mug de nyid 'jig tshogs su lta ba kho na yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:135b-25: nyon mongs pa can gyi gti mug ni /
T11TD4221.1E:135b-26: 'jig tshogs su lta ba kho na yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:135b-27: dgra bcom rnams kyi shes pa gang //
T11TD4221.1E:135b-28: de ni nyon mongs can min te //
T11TD4221.1E:135b-29: des na 'jig tshogs lta ba ni //
T11TD4221.1E:135b-30: spangs pa de ltar rgyud grol lo //
T11TD4221.1E:135b-31: rig pa'i mi mthun phyogs nyid phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:135b-32: sems byung nyid kyi dmigs pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:135b-33: gsungs phyir log par dmigs pa nyid//
T11TD4221.1E:135b-34: ma rig gzhan ni rigs ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:135b-35: gal te ma rig pa ni so sor rtog pa med pa'i rang bzhin yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:135b-36: 'jig tshogs su lta ba ni rtogs pa'i rang bzhin ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:135b-37: de ni ji ltar ma rig pa 'jig tshogs su lta ba nyid yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:135b-38: skyon 'di med de gang gi phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:136a-2: ma rig yin na mya ngan las //
T11TD4221.1E:136a-4: zad na lus pa ci zhig yod //
T11TD4221.1E:136a-5: phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:136a-6: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bdag nyid ni so sor rtog pa med pa gtso bor 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:136a-7: 'on te de ni nyon mongs pa'i gzhi nyid ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:136a-8: 'o na ni de ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:136a-9: 'jig tshogs su lta ba nyid de'i gzhi yin pa'i phyir ma rig pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:136a-12: rigs dang 'gal ba'i chos gzhan ni //
T11TD4221.1E:136a-13: ma rig chos min brdzun sogs bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:136a-14: rig pa bdag med mthong ba ste //
T11TD4221.1E:136a-15: de dang 'gal ba bdag lta yin //
T11TD4221.1E:136a-16: re zhig rig pa med pa ni ma rig pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:136a-17: de med pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa la yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:136a-18: med pa ni rgyu yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:136a-19: de las gzhan pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:136a-20: gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:136a-21: de'i phyir ma rig pa ni rig pa dang 'gal ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:136a-22: chos ma yin pa dang mi bden pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:136a-23: de yang 'jig tshogs su lta ba nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:136a-24: 'di ltar chos ni pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid yin no ;
T11TD4221.1E:136a-25: / chos ma yin na ni de med pa tsam ma yin la de las gzhan tsam yang ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:136a-26: 'on kyang rjes su 'dzin pa las bzlog pa gnod par byed pa'i chos ma yin pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:136a-27: de bzhin du yang dag pa'i don ston pa med pa tsam ni brdzun pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:136a-28: 'on kyang yang dag pa ma yin pa ston pa /
T11TD4221.1E:136a-29: mi bden pa brjod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:136a-30: de lta yin na gang gi tshe bden pa'i don la 'khrul pas med par sems pa na yod do zhes /
T11TD4221.1E:136a-31: ston par byed pa de'i tshe mi bden pa nyid du mi 'gyur la /
T11TD4221.1E:136a-32: med pa la yod par sems pa'i de'i yang brdzun yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:136a-34: sgra rnams rnam rtog yul can te //
T11TD4221.1E:136a-35: dngos gang ji ltar rnam nges pa //
T11TD4221.1E:136a-36: de bzhin nyid brjod bden pa ste //
T11TD4221.1E:136a-37: gzhan du brjod pa brdzun pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:136a-38: sgra rnams ni lhag par nges pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:136a-39: lhag par zhen pa rjes su mthun par ston pa nyid bden pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:136b-0: gzhan @136b du ni mi bden pa yin no zhes rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:136b-1: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni 'khrul nas sems can du bslus pa yang mchog tu kha na ma tho ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:136b-2: des na de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par brtson pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:136b-3: des na 'jig tshogs la lta ba nyid ma rig pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:136b-4: rig pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:136b-5: sems las byung ba nyid yin pa'i rgyus na /
T11TD4221.1E:136b-6: dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir log par dmigs pa nyid ma rig pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:136b-9: rdzas mtshungs pas mtshungs par ldan pa yin pa'i phyir mtshungs par ldan pa dag yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:136b-10: gsungs pa'i yang phyir te shes rab kyi rnam pa las bzlog pa rtogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid ma rig pa yin par mdo de dang de las gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:136b-11: de la ma rig pa dang bral ba gang zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:136b-12: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi chos rnams la lhag par sgro 'dogs pa dang bral ba gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:136b-13: de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi nye bar spyod pa skye ba dang gang ji snyed pa de thams cad ni bdag tu lta ba mngon par zhen pa las byung ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:136b-14: bdag tu mngon par zhen pa bral na ni mi 'byung ngo zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:136b-15: gal te bdag tu mngon par zhen pa ni lta ba yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:136b-16: de yang ma rig pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:136b-17: des na med na mi 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir lta ba'i sgo nas ma rig pa nyid gsungs par shes par bya'i /
T11TD4221.1E:136b-18: 'jig tshogs su lta ba nyid ni /
T11TD4221.1E:136b-19: ma rig pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:136b-21: ma rig pa'i yan lag tu bstan na de'i rang bzhin bstan pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:136b-22: bzhag nas de la gzhan ston pa //
T11TD4221.1E:136b-23: sgra la bzo ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:136b-24: de ltar ma rig bstan 'di la //
T11TD4221.1E:136b-25: tshad ma cung zad yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:136b-26: bzlog pa la ni tshad ma dag / ji bzhin du ni bstan pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:136b-27: lta ba'i sgo nas ma rig pa nyid bstan pa zhes bya ba 'di la tshad ma ni cung zad kyang med do //
T11TD4221.1E:136b-28: 'jig tshogs su lta ba nyid nges pa thams cad kyi gzhi yin no zhes bya ba 'di la ni tshad ma bstan zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:137a-0: gal te 'jig tshogs su ni so sor rtog pa med pa'i rang bzhin nam ni so sor rtog pa med pa'i rang bzhin nam @137a * //
T11TD4221.1E:137a-1: gzhan du yin yang rung ba ste /
T11TD4221.1E:137a-2: nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:137a-3: des na de ltar 'jig tshogs la lta bar brjod do //
T11TD4221.1E:137a-4: khyad par gyi sgra ni spyi'i don can ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:137a-6: ma rig pa lta ba nyid yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:137a-7: de'i tshe lta ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ma rig pa zhes mtshungs par ldan pa'i don yang med par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:137a-8: de de nyid dang mtshungs par ldan pa ni ma yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:137a-11: stong nyid lta ba de 'gal phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:137a-12: de yi rang bzhin nyes kun dang //
T11TD4221.1E:137a-13: 'gal bar rab tu grub pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:137a-14: spyi dang khyad par gyi dngos pos tha dad par brtags pas na mtshungs par ldan pa'i don du 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:137a-15: dper na pa la sha dang ldan pa'i nags zhes bya ba bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:137a-16: don dam par ni pa la sha'i rang bzhin nyid du brjod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:137a-17: de bzhin du khyad par brjod pas de'i rang bzhin gyi ma rig pa gzhir gyur pas gtso bor bstan pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:137a-18: 'di ltar ma rig pa ni bdag tu lta ba yin pa de'i phyir de'i rtsa ba can gyi skyon thams cad ni /
T11TD4221.1E:137a-19: rtsa ba gcod par byed pa'i bdag med par lta bas rtsa ba gcad pa'i phyir gcad par 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:137a-20: gang gi phyir nyes pa thams cad 'gog par byed pa ni bdag med par lta ba yin la de yang rnal 'byor pas ma btang ba yin pa de'i phyir 'ga' slar yang 'byung ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:137a-21: des na 'gog pa'i rnam par nges pa 'byung ba nyid bshad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:137a-22: zad min srog chags chos nyid phyir//
T11TD4221.1E:137a-23: gzugs sogs bzhin min ma grub phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:137a-24: gnyen po'i phyogs dang 'brel pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:137a-25: ldog pa dag kyang mthong phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:137a-26: nyes pa thams cad 'gags pas ni //
T11TD4221.1E:137a-27: sra shing slar yang skye med de //
T11TD4221.1E:137a-28: de bdag nyid kyis 'brel med dang //
T11TD4221.1E:137a-29: thal ba bzhin du ma nges phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:137a-30: zhes bya ba ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag go //
T11TD4221.1E:137a-31: gal te bdag bsgoms pas kyang thal bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:137a-32: des na bdag med par lta bas ci bya /
T11TD4221.1E:137a-33: 'dir lung ni bdag bsam par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:137b-0: gang zhig bdag mthong @137b de la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:137b-1: nga zhes rtag tu zhen par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:137b-2: zhen pas bde la sred 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:137b-3: sred pas skyon rnams sgrib par byed //
T11TD4221.1E:137b-4: bdag tu mthong ba ni nges par bdag la bdag tu zhen pa dang 'brel par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:137b-5: zhen pas kyang de'i bde ba la sred pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:137b-6: gang zhig gang la zhen pa de ni de'i bde ba la sred par 'gyur ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:137b-7: dper na bu la sogs pa'i bde ba bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:137b-8: gal te bdag tu mthong ba la bdag la zhen par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba mi rigs pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:137b-9: ci shing mthong ba tsam gyis shing la zhen par 'gyur ba'am /
T11TD4221.1E:137b-10: bud med mthong ba tsam gyis /
T11TD4221.1E:137b-11: bud med la zhen par 'gyur ba'am de bzhin du /
T11TD4221.1E:137b-12: gang zhig bdag mthong de la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:137b-13: nga zhes rtag tu zhen par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:137b-14: zhes bya ba mi rigs pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:137b-16: gang zhig gzhan la chags pa de //
T11TD4221.1E:137b-18: bdag mthong nyid la zhen 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:137b-19: 'di la rtsod pa med pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:137b-20: bdag chags med par gzhan la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:137b-21: chags zhes bya ba 'thad par dka' //
T11TD4221.1E:137b-22: gal te bdag mthong ba tsam gyis chags pa ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:137b-23: 'ga' la yang chags par mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:137b-24: rgyu gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:137b-25: shing ni bdag la nye bar mkho ba ma mthong ba des na /
T11TD4221.1E:137b-26: zhen pa med pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:137b-27: gang zhig bdag la nye bar mkho ba la chags pa med de /
T11TD4221.1E:137b-28: ji ltar bdag la chags par mi 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:137b-29: 'on te sems can gyi khyad par nyid kyi bdag nyid la ni zhen pa med la gzhan la ni bdag nyid chen po nyid kyis snying rje las zhen pa dang ldan pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:137b-31: gal te bdag nyid chen po zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:137b-32: bya ba gzhan don byed na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:137b-33: rtogs pa sngon byed mi 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:137b-34: de lta yin na gtan med nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:137b-35: bdag nyid yal bar dor nas /
T11TD4221.1E:137b-36: rang gi ngo bo don gzhan la phan par byed pa na ;
T11TD4221.1E:137b-37: bdag gis rtog pa sngon du byed pa ma yin pa nyid chen por gsal bar byas par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:137b-38: 'on te gzhan gyi don byed pa nyid kyis bde ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:137b-39: de lta yin na rang gi bde ba la chags pas rmongs pa ji ltar thar pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:137b-41: de 'dra ba dag tshogs can ma'i //
T11TD4221.1E:138a-0: @138a * // lus nyed par yang byed par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:138a-1: gal te 'di ni ngan spyod na //
T11TD4221.1E:138a-2: ngan spyod 'di ni med pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:138a-3: ji ltar rang gi don la gnas pa bsam gtan gyi bde ba 'dod pa de bzhin du tshogs pa can ma yin pa'i yan lag dang 'brel pa'i bde ba yang yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:138a-4: de'am gzhan la bde bar ni //
T11TD4221.1E:138a-5: khyad par yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:138a-6: de lta yin na tshogs par 'byung ba ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:138a-7: tshogs par ni mi 'byung ba nyid ni med pa nyid de de khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:138a-8: dmyal ba la sogs par 'gro ba'i phyir mi rung ngo zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:138a-10: bdag nyid chen po'i khyad par nyid kyis so //
T11TD4221.1E:138a-11: gzhan gyi don du dmyal bar 'gro bar khas blangs pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:138a-12: cher bdag nyid chen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:138a-13: 'on te tshogs par dbyung ba ma yin pa'i tha snyad dang gzhan pa dag ni goms pa las bde ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:138a-14: des na tshogs par dbyung ba'i tha snyad khas blangs pa nyid du sla'o zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:138a-16: khyad par du med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:138a-17: de lta na yang bdag la sred pa dang bcas pa'i dbang gis nyes pa dang nyes pa med pa mnyam por byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:138a-18: des na nyes pas bsgribs pas na //
T11TD4221.1E:138a-19: yon tan mthong ba yongs sred pa //
T11TD4221.1E:138a-20: nga yi zhes de'i sgrub byed len //
T11TD4221.1E:138a-21: des na bdag mngon chags pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:138a-23: bdag don dam par yod na /
T11TD4221.1E:138a-24: gang zhig de la 'khor ba de yang don dam pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:138a-25: des na don dam par nye bar mkho ba gang yin pa /
T11TD4221.1E:138a-26: de nyid yon tan dang ldan pa yin no zhes rtogs par 'gyur zhing ;
T11TD4221.1E:138a-27: de las ni yon tan du lta ba nga'i zhes de'i sgrub byed len no //
T11TD4221.1E:138a-28: des na bdag tu mngon par zhen pa de 'khor bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:138a-29: bde ba'i sgrub byed grong gi phag mo'i reg pa yang /
T11TD4221.1E:138a-30: don du gnyer bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:138a-32: bdag yod na ni gzhan 'du shes //
T11TD4221.1E:138a-33: bdag gzhan cha las 'dzin dang sdang //
T11TD4221.1E:138a-36: bdag dang gzhan ni rnam par dbye bas ni yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:138b-0: de las yongs su 'dzin pa sdang ba dang 'brel pa'i skyon phrag dog dang ser sna la sogs @138b pa 'byung ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:138b-1: 'on te bdag po kho na la zhen gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:138b-2: bdag gi ba la ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:138b-3: des na bdag gi ba la zhen pa med pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:138b-4: tshogs par mi bzod pa'i tha snyad med do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:138b-6: nges par bdag la chags pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:138b-7: bdag gi la chags mi 'bral zhing //
T11TD4221.1E:138b-8: nyes med bdag la chags pa dang //
T11TD4221.1E:138b-9: bral ba'i rgyu yang yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:138b-10: bdag la chags pa 'jug pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:138b-11: nyes pa med par mi ldog go //
T11TD4221.1E:138b-12: bdag la chags pa ldan pa yang bdag gi ba la chags pa med par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:138b-13: des na bdag dang bdag gi ba yang chags pa dang bcas par 'gyur bas nyes pa thams cad bsgribs pas thams cad du 'jug pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:138b-15: 'di 'khor ba dang 'brel pa nyid log pa med pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:138b-16: 'on te bdag dang bdag gi ba la zhen pa gnyis ka 'khor ba'i rgyu yin pas bdag gi ba'i zhen pa dang 'brel pa nyes pa can yin pa'i phyir de la mi zhen te /
T11TD4221.1E:138b-17: nyes pa gzhan gyi skyon chags pa la yang zhen par mi byed na gang la zhen pa nyid nyes pa can du 'gyur ba de la lta ci smos she na /
T11TD4221.1E:138b-19: gal te chags pa skyon bcas na //
T11TD4221.1E:138b-21: 'di yul sun phyung med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:138b-22: de spang bar ni nus ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:138b-23: yul nyes pa can du 'gyur ba'i phyir skyon gzhan gyis zhen par mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs kyi yul skyon chags pa med pa la zhen pa med par ni mi rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:138b-24: bde ba'i rgyu la ni skyon yod par ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:138b-25: yon tan yin pa'i phyir ro ;
T11TD4221.1E:138b-26: /'on te zhen pa nyid skyon yod par yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:138b-27: yin mod cir 'gyur skyon chags pa yin pa'i phyir zhen pa spong bar bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:138b-29: yul la skyon med par zhen pa spong bar mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:138b-31: yon tan skyon dang rjes 'brel pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:138b-32: 'dod dang sdang sogs spong ba ni //
T11TD4221.1E:138b-33: de dag yul la ma mthong bar //
T11TD4221.1E:138b-34: yin gyi phyi tshul gang gis yin //
T11TD4221.1E:138b-35: 'dod pa dang sdang ba dag ni yon tan dang /
T11TD4221.1E:138b-36: skyon mthong ba las 'gyur ba yin no zhes rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:138b-37: bdag gi bde ba bsgrub pa ni yon tan yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:139a-1: byed pa ni skyon yin pas /
T11TD4221.1E:139a-2: gal te de dag yod na ni 'dod pa dang sdang ba spangs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:139a-3: 'on te phyi'i dngos po yon tan can yang 'dor ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:139a-5: phyi rol gyi dngos po spong ba ni phyi rol gyi rgyu la rag las pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:139a-6: zhen pa ni don mthong ba'i stobs kyis gzhan dang gzhan skye ba yin pas ji ltar 'dor bar nus /
T11TD4221.1E:139a-7: yul ni yon tan dang ldan pa nyid kyis zhen pa'i yul nyid dang nye bar len pa nyid yin la de med pa'i phyir ni der zhen pa 'dor ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:139a-8: blang bar bya ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:139a-9: zhen pa yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir nye bar len pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:139a-10: 'on kyang yul gyi yon tan gyis yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:139a-11: des na yul yon tan can gyi rgyu yod pa'i phyir zhen pa mi skye bar ga la 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:139a-12: chags yon tan gyi chags min gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:139a-13: don gyi yon tan mthong bas yin //
T11TD4221.1E:139a-14: ma tshang med rgyu de la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:139a-15: 'bras bu gang gis zlog par byed //
T11TD4221.1E:139a-16: ces bya ba ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:139a-18: chags la skyon yang gang zhig mthong //
T11TD4221.1E:139a-19: gal te sdug bsngal brten zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:139a-20: de ltar 'di la chags bral min //
T11TD4221.1E:139a-21: rang gir mthong phyir dper bdag bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:139a-22: sdug bsngal gyi rten ni dang po nyid du bdag yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:139a-23: bdag yod na phyis zhen pa sdug bsngal gyi rgyur 'gyur gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:139a-24: bdag med na su zhig sdug bsngal /
T11TD4221.1E:139a-25: de la gnyi ga sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:139a-26: gnyi ga la chags pa dang bral ba 'am /
T11TD4221.1E:139a-27: yang na gcig la yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:139a-28: 'on te 'di snyam du bdag gi sdug bsngal ni rgyu nyid ni gzhan gyis byas pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:139a-29: de rang nyid la brten pa'i skyon ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:139a-30: bdag dang bdag tu zhen pa dang chos dang chos ma yin pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:139a-31: 'du byed dang lhan cig pa'i bdag sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro snyam na /
T11TD4221.1E:139a-33: gal te de med bdag sdug bsngal //
T11TD4221.1E:139a-34: rgyu min de yang de dang 'dra //
T11TD4221.1E:139a-35: de ltar gnyi ga skyon med pa //
T11TD4221.1E:139a-36: des na gnyis la chags bral min //
T11TD4221.1E:139a-37: skyon med par ni su yang chags pa dang bral ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:139a-38: bdag tu zhen pa la sogs pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:139a-39: bdag la brten pa med par sdug bsngal gyi rgyu ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:139b-0: @139b des na de dag kyang bdag bzhin skyon med pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:139b-1: des na chags pa dang bral ba mi srid do //
T11TD4221.1E:139b-2: gal te sbrul bzung yan lag bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:139b-3: sdug bsngal bsgoms pas spong 'gyur na //
T11TD4221.1E:139b-4: bdag gi ba blo bcom pas ni //
T11TD4221.1E:139b-5: dor ba yin gyi bzlog la min //
T11TD4221.1E:139b-6: dbang po la sogs longs spyod kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:139b-7: rten nyid du ni bzung ba la //
T11TD4221.1E:139b-8: rang blo gang gis bzlog 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:139b-9: de la chags bral de gang las //
T11TD4221.1E:139b-10: gal te bde ba'i rgyu nyid ni zhen pa'i rgyu mtshan yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:139b-11: des na de la bzlog pa yod pa las chags pa dang bral ba ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:139b-12: gnod pa byed pa la zhen pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:139b-14: bdag gi ba'i blo'i yul la ni sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yin yang /
T11TD4221.1E:139b-15: sred pa mi 'bral bar mthong ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:139b-16: des na bdag gi ba'i blo dor bas chags pa dang bral ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:139b-17: bdag gi ba'i blo nyid yongs su 'dor zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:139b-18: longs spyod kyi rten nyid du rtogs pa lus la sogs pa la 'ga' yang bdag gi ba'i blo dang bral ba med do //
T11TD4221.1E:139b-20: klur gyur cig ces bdag gi lus la sogs pa khyad par can du gyur cig ces de dag la bdag gi ba'i blo byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:139b-21: des na de lta bu'i blo dang ldan pa nyid ci ltar chags pa dang bral ba yin /
T11TD4221.1E:139b-23: lus las pog pa'i skra sogs la ;
T11TD4221.1E:139b-24: / yid byung blo ni skye 'gyur zhing //
T11TD4221.1E:139b-25: gzhan la zhen bcas skye 'gyur ba //
T11TD4221.1E:139b-26: thams cad kyi ni mngon sum yin //
T11TD4221.1E:139b-28: skra la sogs pa nye bar spyod pa'i yul nyid yin pa de'i tshe /
T11TD4221.1E:139b-29: bdag gi ba'i blo zhen pa dang bcas pa nyid skyed par byed la /
T11TD4221.1E:139b-30: gang gi tshe bzlog pa de'i tshe zhen pa dang bcas pa dang bral ba'i rang bzhin chags pa dang bral ba nyid skyed pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:139b-31: gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam par dbye ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:139b-32: gzhan yang bye brag pa la sogs pa rnams kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:139b-34: rang gi blo ni skye 'gyur ba'i //
T11TD4221.1E:139b-35: 'brel de de bzhin nyid gnas phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:139b-36: mthong du zin kyang spong mi 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:139b-37: bde ba la sogs pa dang 'du ba'i 'brel pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:139b-39: lus la brten pa'i gzugs la sogs pa dang ni ldan par 'gyur ba la 'du ba'o //
T11TD4221.1E:139b-40: gzugs nyid la sogs pa dang ni ldan par gyur pa la 'dus par 'du ba'o//
T11TD4221.1E:140a-0: @140a * // nyan pa'i dbang po dang ni ldan pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:140a-1: mig la sogs pa dang ni ldan pa can la ldan pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:140a-2: bdag dang 'brel pa dang mi 'bral ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:140a-3: des na nyes pa mthong ba yang de dag la nyes pa spong ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:140a-4: 'on te 'du ba la sogs pa'i 'brel pa khas mi len na /
T11TD4221.1E:140a-5: des yang len glan pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:140a-6: 'du ba la sogs med na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:140a-7: phan 'dogs nyid ni kun la'ang yod //
T11TD4221.1E:140a-8: phan 'dogs pa las thams cad la //
T11TD4221.1E:140a-9: chags pa skye ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:140a-10: des na chags pa dang bral ba skye bar ga la 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:140a-11: ci ste pha rol phyir zlog par byed de //
T11TD4221.1E:140a-12: sdug bsngal bskyed phyir sor mo bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:140a-13: rang gi blo ni mi 'gyur na //
T11TD4221.1E:140a-14: gcig tu de ni sdug bsngal min //
T11TD4221.1E:140a-15: phal cher dug bcas zas bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:140a-16: ji ltar de sdug bsngal yin pa de bzhin du bde ba yang yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:140a-17: dug dang bcas pa'i zas bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:140a-18: dug dang bcas pa'i zas ni sdug bsngal nyi tshe ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:140a-19: bde ba nyid kyang srid pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:140a-20: de bzhin du grong gi phag mo la sogs pa sdug bsngal yin yang rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis bde ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:140a-21: des na dbang po la sogs pa ni dor ba'i yul ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:140a-22: gal te de 'dra ba sdug bsngal dang 'dres pa ni sdug bsngal nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:140a-23: de lta na 'o na bden pa dang 'brel pas bden pa nyid do zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:140a-25: khyad par can de la chags pas //
T11TD4221.1E:140a-27: bsam med bdag la chags pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:140a-28: ji ltar rnyed bzhin chags pa 'jug / bud med dag ni ma rnyed pa //
T11TD4221.1E:140a-30: gal te khyad par can gyi bde ba rnyed pa yin na gzhan du chags pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:140a-31: rnam par dpyod pa med pa la ni khyad par can gyi bde ba 'dod pa yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:140a-32: dpyod pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:140a-34: 'o na dpyod pa nyid sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:140a-35: dpyod pa nyid la chags pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:140a-36: 'on te dpyod pa ni gdon mi za ba kho nar rgyu'i stobs las byung ngo zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:140b-0: de lta na 'o na bdag med par rtogs pa yang dpyod pa las 'byung ba bzlog pa med @140b pas bdag tu lta ba las thar pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-1: bdag bsgoms pa ni mi srid pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-2: bdag de bde ba la sogs kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-5: de ni gzhan du ga la 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-6: bdag de ni blo dang bde ba dang sdug bsngal 'dod pa la sogs pa'i rten yin pas /
T11TD4221.1E:140b-7: bsgoms kyang 'di ni de 'dra ba kho nar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-8: 'on te skyes bu'i byed pa la brten pa'i phyir de nyes pa dang bral bar byed do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:140b-10: sol ba ji ltar bdar yang ni //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-11: nam yang dkar por 'gyur ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-12: gang gi rang bzhin dang 'brel ba //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-13: 'gas kyang bzlog par byar yod min //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-14: nyes can rang bzhin rang nyid kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-15: nyes pa bzlog par nus ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-16: nyes can ci ltar nyes med 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-18: de nyid kyi phyir bshad pa /
T11TD4221.1E:140b-19: bdag ni 'dod pa gang yin de //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-21: chags sogs can bdag skyon can te //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-22: de ldan pas yin rang rkyang yin //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-23: dbyug ldan pas na dbyug can nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-24: dbyug can ji ltar dngos po yin //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-25: 'dod chags la sogs ma myong bar //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-27: gal te myong ste chags can na //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-28: bud med rtogs phyir de ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-29: 'brel phyir de ni chags ldan te //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-30: chags sogs myong ba las ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-31: chags sogs myong bas rnal 'byor pa //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-32: gzhan gyi chags pas chags can 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-33: tha dad pa la ldan pa dang //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-34: 'du ba khyad par ci zhig yod //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-35: tha dad rtogs med las she na //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-37: bdag ni rang bzhin tha dad na //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-38: bdag rig med pas ji ltar na //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-39: rang rig rang bzhin rig na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-40: 'khrul mi srid ces bsgrubs zin te //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-42: rang bzhin rig bzhin rig yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-45: ro la sogs spyod bya nyid las //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-46: spyod pa nyid ni dmigs pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-47: spyod po de las gzhan 'gyur ba //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-48: de ltar yin phyir thug med 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-49: gal te de dang longs spyod pa //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-50: 'brel phyir spyod por de brjod na //
T11TD4221.1E:140b-51: spyod pa nyams myong las gzhan min //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-1: yang spyad bya la gnas blo //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-2: nga la nga yi 'di la zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-4: des na rten dang brten pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-5: dngos po gnyi ga la yang yod //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-6: ji ste rjes su dpag bya de //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-7: spyod po zhes ni rjod byed na //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-8: mngon sum mi srid de la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-9: rjes dpag yod pa min zhes gnas //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-11: nyid kyis rtogs bya zhes brjod de //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-12: shin tu phra ba'i phyir na de //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-13: ded cag lta bus rig min na //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-14: da ltar re zhig bdag cag la //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-15: de rig pa ni srid ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-16: de yi gnas skabs thob pa rnams //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-17: ji ltar 'gyur ba ci cha yod ;
T11TD4221.1E:141a-18: / rnal 'byor pa dngos nyer gzhag nas //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-19: gal te dngos po nges byed na //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-20: kho bo cag ni rnal 'byor pas //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-21: de med par ni mi byed min //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-22: de phyir bdag ni rang rig pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-23: rang bzhin nyid du khas blangs dgos //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-24: de lta ma yin na de med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-25: de yang bde pa la sogs pa rig pa'i rang bzhin yin pas gal te gzhan du 'gyur na ni de zhig pa nyid du 'gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:141a-26: bdag 'dod pa gang yin pa de ji ltar 'jig par 'dod /
T11TD4221.1E:141a-27: gal te des bdag sdug bsngal bar //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-28: 'dod bya sdug bsngal bden min nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-29: sdug bsngal gnas skabs zhig na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-30: rang nyid zhig par 'gyur pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-31: gal te de yi gnas skabs ni //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-32: zhig 'dod gnas skabs can min na //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-33: de yi ngo bo las gzhan pa //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-34: gnas skabs can ni dmigs pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-35: ji ste yang rig pa'i rang bzhin ni /
T11TD4221.1E:141a-36: mi 'jig pa nyid de zhig pa ni bde ba la sogs pa nyid yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:141a-37: de yang snying po med de /
T11TD4221.1E:141a-38: bde ba la sogs tha dad phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-39: spyod pa'ang tha dad thal 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-40: bde sogs las ni tha dad pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-41: rig pa dmigs su med phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-42: bdag tu gyur pa tha dad pas //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-43: tha dad med pa dmigs min te //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-44: ji ltar tha dad de nyid la //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-45: tha mi dad pa mi dmigs bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-46: rig pa rig pa zhes bya bas //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-47: gal te tha mi dad rig na //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-48: de phyir gzhan gyi bdag kyang ni //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-49: gzhan gyi bdag tu rang 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-50: de ni rig pa ma yin zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-52: rig pa'i dngos po min na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-53: gzhan pa thams cad bdag med 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:141a-54: de ni so sor rig ce na //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-0: gang @141b du'ang gcig pa nyid mi 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-1: des na snga ma phyi ma dang //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-2: gcig nyid min phyir zhig pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-4: bdag ni 'dod pa gang yin des //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-6: ther zug rtag pa nyid yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-7: de nyid la gnas 'dod par gyis //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-8: gal te ngo shes stobs kyis 'dir ;
T11TD4221.1E:141b-9: / ha cang thal bar med ce na //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-10: de yi rang bzhin yod pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-11: ngo shes de nyid cis mi 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-12: yul med par ni thogs med kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-13: bag chags las ni byung ba can //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-14: ngo shes pa ni dngos po rnams //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-15: rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyu ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-16: gal te ther zug rtag nyid na //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-17: gong nas gong du rig med 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-18: de lta na yang de rtag nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-19: khyod kyis 'dod pa grub pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-20: mtshungs pa nyid du dmigs na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-22: mi mtshungs par ni dmigs pas na //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-23: tha dad gsal bas zhig pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-24: gal te ther zug pa yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-25: gong nas gong du dmigs par mi 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:141b-26: de lta na yang 'gyur ba med pa nyid dang /
T11TD4221.1E:141b-27: dmigs pa rig pa med pas rtag pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-28: de'i phyir dmigs pa rig pa ldan pa yin na de khol bu nyid du dmigs pas /
T11TD4221.1E:141b-29: zhig pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-30: de lta yin na yang rim gyis dmigs par 'dod na yang /
T11TD4221.1E:141b-31: zhig pa nyid du 'dod par thal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-33: bdag ni 'dod pa gang yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-34: de ni ji ltar zhig par 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-35: mi dmigs pa ji ltar 'dod ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:141b-36: shi ba bas ni nyam chung bla //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-38: shi min mthong bas 'di yi ni //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-40: gal te ma mthong ba des ci bya zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:141b-41: de'i phyir slar yang mthong bar 'dod dgos so //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-42: de lta yin dang rim can du //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-43: 'gyur bas zhig pa de nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:141b-44: 'di ni 'di'i bdag nyid du smra ba'i zhes pa gzhan yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-45: yang na mtshungs pa'i rang bzhin dmigs pa las /
T11TD4221.1E:141b-46: snga ma dang phyi ma gcig nyid de rig pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:141b-47: tha dad pa dmigs na ni tha dad pa nyid du gsal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-48: de lta yin dang snga ma zhig par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-50: bdag ni 'dod pa gang yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-51: de ni ji ltar zhig par 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:141b-52: yang na rtogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis /
T11TD4221.1E:141b-53: bdag thams cad ni gcig pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:142a-1: par tha dad pas tha dad pa la brten pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:142a-2: dper na nam mkha' gcig nyid la /
T11TD4221.1E:142a-3: bum pa'i nam mkha' snam bu'i nam mkha' zhes nam mkha' tha dad par 'gyur ba bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:142a-4: des na bdag rnams kyi tha dad pa ni ma rig pas byas pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:142a-6: gal te grol la 'khrul med pas //
T11TD4221.1E:142a-7: gzhan gyi bdag tu gnas na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:142a-8: bdag nyid gcig pu de nyid na //
T11TD4221.1E:142a-9: de yi gnas skabs nyid du gnas //
T11TD4221.1E:142a-10: gal te bum pa'i nam mkha' bum pa med par 'gyur ba de bzhin du ma rig pa med na srog chags med par 'gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:142a-12: bum pa'i nam mkha' med na /
T11TD4221.1E:142a-13: gzhan dang lhan cig nam mkha' nyid du gcig tu 'gyur ba'i phyir nam mkha'i rnam par dbye ba med pa de bzhin du bdag gi rnam par dbye ba yang med par 'gyur ba'i phyir rang dang gzhan gyi rnam par dbye ba med pas bdag zhig pa nyid du 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:142a-14: nga'o zhes gzhan rnam par gcad pas bdag yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:142a-15: nam mkha' nyid du nye bar son pa ni bya ba dang longs spyod pa la sogs pa med pas nam mkha' las khyad par yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:142a-17: bdag ni 'dod pa gang yin de //
T11TD4221.1E:142a-18: de ni ji ltar zhig par 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:142a-19: 'di ni dngos po'i stobs kyis 'ongs pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:142a-20: 'o na ni bdag med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:142a-21: rang gi rang bzhin tsam rig pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:142a-22: khyab pa de ni gang yin brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:142a-23: du ma'i lus ni gnas pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:142a-24: dngos su khyab pa yin zhes brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:142a-25: du ma'i dus ni khyab pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:142a-26: rtag pa zhes ni brjod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:142a-27: khyab min rtag pa ma yin pa //
T11TD4221.1E:142a-28: ji ltar bdag tu rnam par gnas //
T11TD4221.1E:142a-29: 'on te 'di bum pa la sogs pa gzhan gyi rang bzhin du gnas pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:142a-30: de lta yin na shin tu gsal bar 'khor ba nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:142a-31: lha sbyin la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du rnam par gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:142a-32: de'i phyir thar par 'gyur na de nam mkha' bzhin du med pa nyid du 'gyur ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:142a-33: de 'dra ba'i thar pas ni dgos pa ci yang med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:142a-35: rnal 'byor pa rnams ni rtag pa sngon du byed pa chen po yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:142a-36: 'on te don dam par na bdag bya ba dang longs spyod pa la sogs pa'i rten ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:142b-0: 'di'i de nyid ni ma @142b rig pa'i dbang nyid kyis yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:142b-1: de bzhin du zhen pa la sogs pa yang ngo zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:142b-3: myong ba dang ni tha snyad dang //
T11TD4221.1E:142b-4: yon tan kun gyi rten log pa //
T11TD4221.1E:142b-5: ji ltar zhen pa yin 'dod de //
T11TD4221.1E:142b-6: zhen pa'i rang bzhin de ltar min //
T11TD4221.1E:142b-7: tha snyad thams cad las 'das pa'i bdag ni ;
T11TD4221.1E:142b-8: rdo dang shing bal la brten pa'i nam mkha'i bdag nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:142b-9: des na gang zhig de la zhen ba de ni de dang 'dra bar 'dod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:142b-10: de 'dra ba ni zhen pa'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:142b-11: 'gyur ba nyid du yin na yang rtog pa sngon du gtong ba ma yin pa nyid du gsal 'debs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:142b-12: de bas ni 'khor ba don du gnyer ba bla'o //
