T11TD4221.1E:142b-13: 'khor ba pa'i bde ba ni yongs su tshim pa skyed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:142b-15: mya ngan 'das pa'i bde bas kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:142b-16: yongs su tshim par byed nus min //
T11TD4221.1E:142b-17: bde phyir don gnyer bya nyid pas //
T11TD4221.1E:142b-18: bde ba thams cad spang bar bya //
T11TD4221.1E:142b-19: bde ba don gnyer bya min zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:142b-20: bya ba 'ga' yang yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:142b-21: des na bde ba thams cad phun sum tshogs pa gnas kyang de bas phul du byung ba'i bde ba gzhan 'dod pa nyid dang /
T11TD4221.1E:142b-22: bde ba de nyid kyang yang nas yang du don du gnyer ba'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:142b-23: 'di la don du gnyer ba ma yin pa'i sems med do //
T11TD4221.1E:142b-24: don du gnyer ba zhes bya ba 'di yang sred pa'i ming gi rnam grangs can cher sdug bsngal chen po yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:142b-25: des na bde ba thams cad yongs su tshim pa skyed par byed pa ma yin pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:142b-26: de'i phyir bde ba ni 'ga' yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med do ;
T11TD4221.1E:142b-27: /'di ltar de ni rnam grangs kyi bde ba thams cad 'dod pa nyid du 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:142b-28: de'i phyir sred pa dang ldan pa bde ba de nye bar len pa la sogs par byed pa des da 'di ni 'khor ba pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:142b-29: gal te chags pa dang bral ba yang mthong ba nyid ma yin nam zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:142b-30: ma mthong ba nam yin mod kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:142b-31: 'on kyang de ni bde ba la rig pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:142b-32: gang gi phyir de'i don du gnyer ba'i 'bad pas yongs su skyo ba nyid kyis sdug bsngal bar sems pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:143a-0: rnam pa gzhan mngon par 'dod pa can bde ba la mngon par phyogs pa nyid kyis 'dod chags dang bral ba mngon du byed par 'gyur gyi @143a * //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-1: bdag la zhen pa med pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-2: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:143a-3: rnam pa kun du bdag 'dzin ni //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-4: bdag la chags pa brtan par byed //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-5: de ni bdag gi zhen pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-6: sa bon gnas skabs de nyid gnas //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-7: 'dir don dam pa ni 'di yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:143a-8: ji srid bag chags de srid du //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-9: bdag tu zhen pa las mi grol //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-10: des na phan 'dogs la brten nas //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-11: bdag gi ba la'ang zhen par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-12: gal te de bdag tu 'dzin pa nyid spangs nas nyes pa spang ba'i phyir 'jug par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:143a-13: des na ji ltar bdag gi ba la chags pa la sogs par 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:143a-16: med na ci yi don du skyon //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-17: zlog byed don gnyer nyid min na //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-19: gzhan du sdug bsngal rten 'gyur na //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-20: de de'i sdug bsngal mi 'dod dang //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-21: der 'dzin pa yang med do zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-22: bya 'di phan tshun gnod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-23: gal te gzhan don byed pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-24: de bde bar ni 'dod ce na //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-25: gzhan gyi byed pa nyid yin mod //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-26: bdag tu 'dzin pas ci zhig bya //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-27: bdag ni skad cig yin na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-28: skad cig khyad par can rig phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-29: gzhan don srid pa nyid yin pa //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-30: des na bdag 'dzin don med do //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-31: nus pa chen po dang ldan phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-32: gal te de nyid kyis byed na //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-33: log par mngon rlom can de la //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-34: nus pa chen po ji zhig yod //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-35: de phyir gang zhig bdag nyid ni //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-36: sdug bsngal bar ni mi 'dod de //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-37: dngos su de yi bdag 'dzin de //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-38: de bzhin bdag gir 'dzin pa skye //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-39: de ste gal te yun ring du //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-41: yun ring bde ba ma mthong na //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-43: gal te brgya la 'gyur zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-45: brgya la med par 'gyur ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-46: spre'u zla bo stor ba bzhin//
T11TD4221.1E:143a-48: ji ltar 'gyur ba ci cha yod //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-49: de ltar phan tshun brten pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-52: brtson yang yon tan cha brten nas //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-53: 'jug ldan bdag gi ba la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:143a-54: chags bral gags byed pa nyid dang //
T11TD4221.1E:143b-0: de yi skyon yang @143b sgrib pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:143b-1: bdag tu 'dzin pa gang zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni /
T11TD4221.1E:143b-2: bdag la nye bar mkho ba'i yon tan gyi cha 'ga' zhig la brten nas /
T11TD4221.1E:143b-3: de la mngon du phyogs par 'gyur bas bdag gi ba la chags pa dang bral ba'i gags byed pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:143b-4: skyon mthong ba de lta ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:143b-6: yon tan gyi cha mthong ba des skyon mthong ba nyid kyis gegs byed pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:143b-7: de'i phyir bdag la chags pa dang ma bral ba'i bdag gi ba la chags pa dang mi 'bral pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:143b-8: gal te bdag la'ang chags bral na //
T11TD4221.1E:143b-9: da ni chags bral gang yin med //
T11TD4221.1E:143b-10: de ni ji ltar bdag 'dor ba ;
T11TD4221.1E:143b-11: / sdug bsngal bsgoms pa don med 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:143b-12: 'di snyam du bdag ni 'dor bar nus pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:143b-13: de nyid ni de nyid kyis dor ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:143b-15: ji ltar yod pa de ltar ni //
T11TD4221.1E:143b-16: mi 'dor med de ltar yang min //
T11TD4221.1E:143b-17: des na bdag ni 'dor min te //
T11TD4221.1E:143b-19: des na 'dod chags dang ldan pa nyid yongs su 'dor ba'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:143b-20: rtag tu bde ba nyid do snyam na 'di la smras pa /
T11TD4221.1E:143b-21: bde bar gnas pa 'dod pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:143b-23: de yang yod phyir chags ldan nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:143b-24: yin zhes sngar ni brjod zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:143b-25: gal te bdag la chags pa dang bral na chags pa dang bral ba de su yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:143b-26: da ni chags pa dang bral ba de nyid med do //
T11TD4221.1E:143b-27: gzhan ni gzhan la chags pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:143b-28: de nyid chags pa dang bral ba'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ba las chags pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:143b-30: bdag la bdag chags bral min cis //
T11TD4221.1E:143b-31: ci ltar de yod de ltar ni //
T11TD4221.1E:143b-32: chags bral ma yin ji ltar de //
T11TD4221.1E:143b-33: med de chags bral ltar yang min //
T11TD4221.1E:143b-34: de ni gzhan du 'gyur min la //
T11TD4221.1E:143b-35: gzhan yang de ltar gnas min te //
T11TD4221.1E:143b-36: bdag nyid kun nam phyogs gcig gis //
T11TD4221.1E:143b-37: rnam pa kun tu 'thad dka' phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:143b-38: gcig la phyogs gcig yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:143b-39: phyogs gcig la tha dad min med //
T11TD4221.1E:143b-40: gang zhig phyogs gcig de gzhan 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:143b-41: de lta yin na thug med 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:143b-43: de lta na yang thug med 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:144a-2: yongs su rdzogs pa med phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:144a-3: de'i phyir des ni bdag nyid 'dor bar bya ba yin pas /
T11TD4221.1E:144a-4: de ni ji ltar bdag 'dor ba //
T11TD4221.1E:144a-5: de ltar sdug bsngal sgom don med //
T11TD4221.1E:144a-6: rnam pa gang gis don min pa //
T11TD4221.1E:144a-7: de lta'ang sdug bsngal bsgom don med //
T11TD4221.1E:144a-8: sdug bsngal bsgom pas chags pa dang //
T11TD4221.1E:144a-9: bral bar byed mi nus pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:144a-10: yang na gal te bdag la chags bral na //
T11TD4221.1E:144a-11: da ni gang zhig gang la chags bral te //
T11TD4221.1E:144a-12: bdag bzhin du ni de ni dor min bas //
T11TD4221.1E:144a-13: sdug bsngal bsgom pa don med 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:144a-14: sdug bsngal bsgom pas 'dor bar nus pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:144a-15: ji ltar bdag la chags pa dang bral ba 'dor ba'i rgyu ma yin pa de bzhin du bdag gi ba yang med do //
T11TD4221.1E:144a-16: des na de dang bral ba'i chags pa dang bral bas ni grol bar mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:144a-17: de'i phyir yang sdug bsngal bsgoms pa don med de /
T11TD4221.1E:144a-19: de dag sdug bsngal bsgom pas kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:144a-20: sdug bsngal nyid ni rnam shes byed //
T11TD4221.1E:144a-21: de ni sngar yang mngon sum nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:144a-22: de lta na yang chags bral med //
T11TD4221.1E:144a-23: gal te sdug bsngal bsgom pas chags pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:144a-24: 'dod pa gang yin pa 'di rigs par 'gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:144a-25: 'dis ni 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:144a-26: sdug bsngal bsgom pa ni sdug bsngal sngon du byed pa'i rgyu nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:144a-27: de lta ma yin na ni 'dis 'dod chags dang bral bar mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:144a-28: bsgom pas sdug bsngal gyi rgyu rnam par shes pas ci nas kyang 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:144a-29: de ltar ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:144a-30: gang gi phyir sdug bsngal de ni sngar yang mngon sum nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:144a-31: mngon sum sngon du song ba can gyi nges pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:144a-32: de lta ma yin na ni 'khor ba yongs su 'dor ba don du gnyer bar mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:144a-33: mngon du ma byas pa'i sdug bsngal ni gdung bar byed pa ni ma yin no ;
T11TD4221.1E:144a-34: / de lta na yang chags pa dang bral ba ni med de des na sdug bsngal bsgom pa don med do //
T11TD4221.1E:144a-35: 'dod pa dang bral ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal ni 'jig rten mtha' dag gi mngon sum yin pas /
T11TD4221.1E:144a-36: gal te de'i tshe 'dod chags dang bral bar ma gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:144b-0: ji ltar sdug bsngal bsgom pas chags pa dang @144b bral bar 'gyur ba yin /
T11TD4221.1E:144b-1: gal te sdug bsngal sgom pas sdug bsngal mtha' dag dran pas bsdoms pa na /
T11TD4221.1E:144b-2: sdug bsngal gyi tshogs chen po shes par byed pa de'i phyir na 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:144b-3: de las skyo ba skyes pas chags pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:144b-6: ci ltar dran par 'gyur ba de //
T11TD4221.1E:144b-7: sdug bsngal tshogs ni rnam shes na //
T11TD4221.1E:144b-8: de bzhin bde ba'i tshogs yin pa //
T11TD4221.1E:144b-10: ji ltar sdug bsngal gyi tshogs shes pas chags pa dang bral pa de bzhin du /
T11TD4221.1E:144b-11: bzlog pa las chags pa can du yang 'gyur ba'i phyir ji ltar grol /
T11TD4221.1E:144b-12: gal te rab tu zhi ba'i bde ba'i ro la ni /
T11TD4221.1E:144b-13: skyo ba med pa'i phyir 'khor ba'i bde ba la sred par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:144b-16: 'dir ni zhi ba bdag lta la //
T11TD4221.1E:144b-17: mngon zhen can gyi skyo ba'i rgyu //
T11TD4221.1E:144b-18: ma yin du khrod kyi ni gnas //
T11TD4221.1E:144b-19: bya rog skyo rgyu yin nam ci //
T11TD4221.1E:144b-20: bya rog mi gtsang gnas la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:144b-21: mngon zhen dang ni rjes 'brel ba'i //
T11TD4221.1E:144b-24: gal te dga' ba'i rgyu la nyes pa mthong bas chags pa dang bral ba /
T11TD4221.1E:144b-26: de ji ltar sdug bsngal bsgom pas nyes pa mthong yang chags pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:144b-29: gal te de la nyes pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:144b-30: skad cig de la blo ldog kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:144b-31: de la'ang chags bral mi 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:144b-32: 'dod ldan bud med gzhan la bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:144b-33: gal te nyes pa byed pa'i skye bo 'ga' zhig la skad cig tsam chags pa dang bral ba de lta yang de dag gtan du chags pa dang bral ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:144b-34: 'dod ldan dag 'dod ldan ma 'ga' la chags pa dang bral ba de lta na yang bud med gzhan la chags pa dang mi 'bral ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:144b-35: de la yang rnam grangs kyis chags par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:144b-36: 'di ltar de ni chags pa dang 'gal ba'i gnas skabs nyid las chags pa dang bral la /
T11TD4221.1E:144b-37: de dang 'gal ba ma yin pa'i gnas skabs la brten pa ni slar chags par 'gyur ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:144b-38: de'i phyir 'di'i 'dod chags dang bral ba ni chags pa'i nus pa dang 'brel pa nyid yin gyi gtan du ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:145a-1: de nyid la chags par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:145a-2: de nyid kyi phyir dge slong dag 'phags pa'i shes rab kyis spangs pa gang yin pa de ni legs par spangs pa yin no zhes gsungs so //
T11TD4221.1E:145a-4: blangs dang dor bya'i khyad yod na //
T11TD4221.1E:145a-5: gcig la 'byung can chags gang yin //
T11TD4221.1E:145a-6: de nyid rnam grangs kyis 'byung tshe //
T11TD4221.1E:145a-7: chags pa kun gyi sa bon yin //
T11TD4221.1E:145a-8: gang la blang bya dang spang bya'i khyad yod pa de la 'dod pa dang ldan pa 'byung ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:145a-9: thams cad thams cad kyi tshe blang bar bya ba ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:145a-10: spang par bya ba yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:145a-11: rnam grangs kyis 'dod pa dang ldan pa dag phan tshun sa bon yin pas /
T11TD4221.1E:145a-12: 'di la rnam grangs kyis 'byung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ji ltar bdag tu smra ba la thar pa yod /
T11TD4221.1E:145a-13: bdag med par lta ba la ni /
T11TD4221.1E:145a-14: thams cad du btang snyoms nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:145a-15: blang bar bya ba med cing dor bar bya ba yang med de /
T11TD4221.1E:145a-16: des na chags pa'i dri ma mtha' dag dang bral ba la rnam par gnas pa la 'dod chags la sogs pa gal srid /
T11TD4221.1E:145a-17: gzhan yang 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid ni mi 'phrod pa'i dngos po la 'gyur gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:145a-18: gzhan la ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:145a-19: bdag tu lta ba la ni mi 'phrod pa nyid gang yang med pa nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:145a-20: re zhig bdag ni skyon dang bcas pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:145a-21: de chags pa yang skyon med kyi yul can yin pa'i phyir skyon med do //
T11TD4221.1E:145a-22: dmigs pa'i sgrub par byed pa yang skyon med pa nyid la /
T11TD4221.1E:145a-23: 'gro ba yang de tsam nyid du zab pas da ni gang la de chags pa dang bral bar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:145a-24: skyon med yul can chags pa dang //
T11TD4221.1E:145a-25: sgrub byed kyang ni skyon med yin ;
T11TD4221.1E:145a-26: /'gro ba'am de tsam nyid yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:145a-27: da ni gang la chags bral 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:145a-28: zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'o //
T11TD4221.1E:145a-30: der de skyon bcas kyang yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:145a-31: de ni bdag la mtshungs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:145a-32: der de'i skyon la chags bra med //
T11TD4221.1E:145a-33: da ni gang la de chags bral //
T11TD4221.1E:145a-34: gal te yul dang dbang po la sogs pa la ni /
T11TD4221.1E:145a-35: skyon can nyid kyang mthong ngo zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:145a-36: bde ba'i rgyu de dag gi skyon dang bcas pa ni gang yin /
T11TD4221.1E:145a-37: sdug bsngal gyi rgyu nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:145a-38: rnam grangs kyi rgyu thams cad bde ba'i rgyu nyid na ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:145a-39: res 'ga' sdug bsngal gyi rgyu nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:145a-40: de ni bdag la yang mtshungs pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:145b-0: gal @145b te bdag de la de'i skyon gyi chags pa dang ma bral ba na /
T11TD4221.1E:145b-1: gang la chags pa dang bral ba can du 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:145b-2: bdag ni 'dor bar mi nus so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:145b-3: bdag gi ba la yang chags pa dang bral ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:145b-4: nus pa'i phyir bdag gi ba nyid 'dor ro zhes bya ba yang log pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:145b-5: gang dang gang gi tshe nyes pa de dang de gang yod pa de dang de'i tshe de 'dor gyi gtan du ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:145b-6: ci ltar nyes pa rnams mi rtag pa nyid kyis 'dor ba de bzhin du 'dor ba mi rtag pa yang yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:145b-7: gal te bde ba'i rgyu ma 'dor na /
T11TD4221.1E:145b-8: phyis med pa'i tshe sdug bsngal chen po 'gyur ba'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:145b-9: de ni rtsa ba nas 'dor ba rigs so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:145b-10: de lta na 'o na sdug bsngal yod na yang de'i rjes la bde ba chen po 'byung ba'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:145b-11: sdug bsngal yang blang bar bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:145b-12: des na bdag tu lta ba ni gang la yang chags pa dang bral ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:145b-14: yon tan mthong ba las byung ba'i //
T11TD4221.1E:145b-15: zhen pa nyes pa mthong bas 'jig / de ltar dbang sogs la de min //
T11TD4221.1E:145b-16: byis sogs la yang mthong phyir dang //
T11TD4221.1E:145b-17: skyon ldan la yang yod phyir dang //
T11TD4221.1E:145b-18: yon tan ldan pa gzhan dag la //
T11TD4221.1E:145b-19: med phyir 'das pa la sogs pa //
T11TD4221.1E:145b-20: bdag gi ba la med phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:145b-21: bdag gi nyes pa mthong ba la ldog par 'gyur ba /
T11TD4221.1E:145b-22: dbang po la sogs pa la yon tan mthong ba las chags pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:145b-23: 'on kyang bdag gi bar mthong ba las yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:145b-24: 'di ltar dbang po la sogs pa bdag gi ba nyid du bzung ba la ni skyon yod kyang zhen pa 'byung ba'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:145b-25: gzhan la yon tan yod kyang /
T11TD4221.1E:145b-27: skyon yon mi rtogs pa'i phyugs dang byis pa la sogs pa la yang yod pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:145b-28: bdag nyid kyi 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag la yang med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:145b-29: de'i phyir nyes pa mthong bas ni spong ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:145b-30: de lta na 'o na nyes pa mthong ba las bdag gi ba'i blo nyid med par 'gyur la /
T11TD4221.1E:145b-31: de med pa'i phyir ni zhen pa med par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:145b-32: yon tan mthong ba las byung ba'i nyes pa mthong bas gsal ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:145b-33: 'di ni cung zad kyang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:145b-35: de nyid phyir na bdag gi ba'i //
T11TD4221.1E:145b-36: blo rgyu'ang yon tan mthong ba min //
T11TD4221.1E:145b-37: de'i phyir yon tan min mthong bas //
T11TD4221.1E:146a-2: nyes pa dang ldan pa 'ga' zhig la yang bdag gi ba'i blo yang yod pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:146a-3: yon tan dang ldan pa la yang med pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:146a-4: 'das pa la sogs pa la yod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:146a-5: gzhan yang yod min yon tan ni //
T11TD4221.1E:146a-6: sgro 'dogs chags pas der yang mthong //
T11TD4221.1E:146a-7: de ni de rgyu gnod med can //
T11TD4221.1E:146a-8: bsgrubs pas de lta ji ltar gnod //
T11TD4221.1E:146a-9: gal te de snyed na nyes pa mthong bas zhen pa zhes bya ba de spong ba zhig na /
T11TD4221.1E:146a-10: gang gi phyir nyes pa mthong ba de nyid ni yod pa ma yin par sgro 'dogs par byed pa'i zhen pas sel bar byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:146a-11: gal te sems dbu mar gnas pa na nyes pa mthong zhing yon tan yang sgro mi 'dogs so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:146a-13: zhen pas dbu mar gnas pa de nyid mi 'thob bo //
T11TD4221.1E:146a-14: de ni yul gzhan gyi chags pa gzhan gyis bzlog pa tsam du zad kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:146a-15: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:146a-17: de lta yin na 'di yi ni //
T11TD4221.1E:146a-18: gnod byed de nyid spobs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:146a-19: ma yis zos pa ci 'dra ba //
T11TD4221.1E:146a-21: de'i phyir bdag tu lta ba sdug bsngal bsgoms pas zhen pa spangs pa las /
T11TD4221.1E:146a-22: thar par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:146a-23: 'dir grangs can dag gis smras pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:146a-24: bdag tu lta ba rnams la sdug bsngal bsgom pa ni srid pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:146a-25: 'on kyang rang bzhin dang skyes bu'i bye brag yongs su shes pa las grol ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:146a-27: skyes bu 'di ni don dam du //
T11TD4221.1E:146a-28: rtogs pa dag pa'i rang bzhin te //
T11TD4221.1E:146a-29: rang bzhin gzhan du ma shes te //
T11TD4221.1E:146a-30: rmongs pas 'khor ba brten pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:146a-31: bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin tha dad par ma bzub [?] nga las bdag ma grol ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:146a-32: des na 'ba' zhig pa'i shes pa skyes pa nyid ni /
T11TD4221.1E:146a-33: bdag grol ba yin no zhes so //
T11TD4221.1E:146a-36: mchog gzhan don du gnyer phyir dang //
T11TD4221.1E:146a-37: skye 'jig blo can nyid kyi phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:146a-38: skye bo 'di yis dbang sogs las //
T11TD4221.1E:146a-39: bdag ni tha dad 'gyur bar shes //
T11TD4221.1E:146a-40: de phyir gcig nyid mthong bas kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:146a-41: chags min bdag la chags pa de //
T11TD4221.1E:146a-42: dmigs pa'i nang gi yan lag la //
T11TD4221.1E:146a-43: ngo bo nyid kyis rjes chags 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-0: nyams pa dang skye ba mthong ba nyid tha dad par @146b mthong ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-1: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis ni tha dad pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:146b-2: bdag ni rjes su 'gro ba yin la bde ba la sogs pa ni ldog pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-3: des na 'gal ba'i chos gnas pa'i phyir tha dad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-4: 'on te 'khor ba pa de nyid rtog par mi byed do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:146b-6: tha dad pa med pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-7: tha dad pa rtogs pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-8: bde ba don du gnyer ba de spang ba'i phyir gus pa ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-9: bde ba la sogs pa dang bral bar ni rtog pa dang ldan pa 'ga' yang don du gnyer ba med do //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-10: bdag ni 'jig chags pa'i sngon rol du 'ba' zhig pa nyid yin pas mkho ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-11: gtso bo dang lhan cig gcig tu bdag nyid mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:146b-13: rang nyid sems ba'i rang bzhin de //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-16: yul gyi 'dod pa gang las yin //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-17: gtso bo'i nang du zhugs pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-18: der med gcig pa ga las yin //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-19: bdag nyid la ni 'khrul min pa //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-20: de ni sngon du bstan pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-21: gal te yul nyid du 'dzin na //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-23: blo med par yang 'dzin pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-24: grangs can lta la rigs ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-25: skyes bu rnams kyi 'dod pa yang //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-26: mthong ba'i don la 'jug pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-27: spro ba 'jug pa'i sngon rol du //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-28: dran pa'i dngos po ga la yod //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-29: dran pa dang ni 'dod pa dag / rang bzhin nyid kyis 'jug las yin //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-31: yin phyir phan tshun rten par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-32: gal te thog med bag chags las //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-34: gtso bor gyur pa'i sngon rol du //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-35: bag chags kyang ni gang las yin //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-36: de'i phyir rang rtogs ngo bo yi //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-37: gal te de ni rang bzhin 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-38: gzhan du de byar mi nus phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-40: gal te sdug bsngal myong ba las skyo bar mthong ba nyid ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:146b-41: de ci ltar gzhan du byed ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:146b-43: gang zhig da ltar sdug bsngal bas //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-45: chags bral ma yin de tshe yang //
T11TD4221.1E:146b-46: chags yod skabs gzhan tshol phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-1: zhe sdang sdug bsngal rgyu can phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-2: de yi 'di srid tsam du gnas //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-3: de log na ni rang nyid kyis //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-5: sdug bsngal myong bas yid byung yang //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-6: 'dod chags dang bral ba ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-7: de ni bdag dang bdag gi ba la sogs pa nyid kyis na de'i tshe mi mthun pa'i mthong ba las sdang ba dang ldan pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-8: chags pa dang bral ba de ni don dam pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:147a-9: mi sdug pa la sogs pa'i dngos po rtogs pa tsam zhig yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-10: bdag tu lta ba ni zhen pa yod pas ma grol ba nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:147a-11: gnas skabs gzhan don du gnyer ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-12: zhe sdang gtan du 'byung ba nyid chags pa dang bral ba nyid yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:147a-14: ci srid de ni sdug bsngal ba //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-16: sdug bsngal rgyu ni log pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-18: gal te sdug bsngal rjes 'jug na //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-19: thar pa 'di ni zhi byed yin //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-20: sdug dang sdang bas zil non pa //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-21: rtag tu gnas pa phul ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-22: gal te skyo ba gnas pa ji ltar thar //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-24: sems ni thar pa don gnyer min //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-25: sdug bsngal gyis gdungs med par yang//
T11TD4221.1E:147a-26: skye bo skyo ba skye ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-28: blang dang dor bya spangs pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-29: thams cad la ni mnyam snyoms can //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-30: tsan dan ste'u mtshungs pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-31: chags bral zhes ni brjod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-32: kho bo cag gi phyogs la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-33: chos nyid tsam mthong bas sems mnyam pa nyid thob ste /
T11TD4221.1E:147a-35: khong khro dang brel bas na /
T11TD4221.1E:147a-36: rnal 'byor pa rnams chags pa dang bral ba yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:147a-37: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-38: 'o na ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis sdug bsngal bsgom pa gsungs zhes 'di la lan /
T11TD4221.1E:147a-39: 'du byed sdug bsngal la dgongs nas //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-40: sdug bsngal bsgom pa gsungs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-41: nged kyi de yang rkyen las skyes //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-42: de ni bdag med lta rten yin //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-43: stong nyid lta bas grol bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-44: sgom pa lhag ma de don yin //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-45: de phyir mi rtag las sdug bsngal //
T11TD4221.1E:147a-46: sdug bsngal las ni bdag med gsungs //
T11TD4221.1E:147b-0: sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal tsam la dgongs @147b nas sdug bsngal sgom pa gsungs pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:147b-1: 'dod chags can rnams de tsam gyis 'dod chags kyi bde ba nyams par 'gyur ba na phyogs su lhung ba dang bral ba'i sgo nas ci nas kyang 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal de yang don dam par stong pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:147b-2: de'i phyir stong pa nyid du lta ba nyid kyis grol ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:147b-3: bsgom pa lhag ma ni de'i don nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:147b-4: de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa ni stong pa nyid la gzhol ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:147b-5: ji skad du dge slong dag gzugs rtag pa yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:147b-7: btsun pa mi rtag pa lags so //
T11TD4221.1E:147b-8: gang mi rtag pa de sdug bsngal ba yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:147b-10: btsun pa mi rtag pa lags te /
T11TD4221.1E:147b-11: gang mi rtag pa de ni sdug bsngal ba /
T11TD4221.1E:147b-12: rtag pa rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can lags so //
T11TD4221.1E:147b-13: de nyid lta ba'i don du 'di ni nga'i'o 'di ni nga'o bdag go zhes bya bar 'gyur ram /
T11TD4221.1E:147b-14: btsun pa ma lags so zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:147b-15: de ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por bdag med pa mthong ba nyid thar pa'i rgyur bshad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:147b-16: bdag tu lta ba gang yin pa de ni chags pa dang bral ba ma yin pa nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:147b-17: chags bral min dang sred ldan dang //
T11TD4221.1E:147b-18: rtsom pa kun la brten pa de //
T11TD4221.1E:147b-19: nyon mongs las las grol ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:147b-21: bdag tu lta ba rnam par gnas na 'khor ba'i rgyu bdag gi bar blta bar nyams pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:147b-22: des na bdag dang bdag gi ba la chags pa ni gor ma chag par sred pa dang ldan pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:147b-23: des na las thams cad rtsom pa la bsten te ;
T11TD4221.1E:147b-24: las dang nyon mongs pa dag las ma grol ba de ni 'khor ba pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:147b-25: de la thar pa'i dri yod de skan /
T11TD4221.1E:147b-26: ji ste yang bdag gi ba nyid don dam par med pa des na chags pa gal srid /
T11TD4221.1E:147b-28: yul med par ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:147b-30: bdag gi nyid ni mi 'dod gang //
T11TD4221.1E:147b-31: de yi za ba po yang med //
T11TD4221.1E:147b-32: bya dang longs spyod mtshan nyid can //
T11TD4221.1E:147b-33: de tshe de yi bdag kyang med //
T11TD4221.1E:147b-34: bdag gi ba mthong bzhin du ji ltar med ces bsgrub par nus /
T11TD4221.1E:147b-35: thams cad ma rig pa'i rgyu mtshan las yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:148a-1: las tha dad pa'i ma rig pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:148a-2: ma rig pa ni skyes bu las gzhan ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:148a-3: 'di thams cad ni skyes bu nyid do zhes brjod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:148a-4: des na ma rig pa rang gi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir 'di'i 'khrul pa nyid nam yang ldog par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:148a-5: de'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba'i 'khrul pa ni de las bral ba ma yin te de nyid med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:148a-6: gnyi gar smra ba yang sun bton zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:148a-7: gzhan yang bdag gi ba med na bya ba dang longs spyod pa med par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:148a-8: bdag ni bya ba dang longs spyod pa'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro ;
T11TD4221.1E:148a-9: /'on te 'di don dam par na 'di yang mi 'dod pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:148a-10: bdag kyang don dam par rtogs pa su yod /
T11TD4221.1E:148a-11: de ni rigs pas bcad pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:148a-12: thams cad rigs bar thal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:148a-13: rmi lam la sogs pa ltar /
T11TD4221.1E:148a-14: goms pa las yin pas med pa nyid do zhes ni mi rigs te ;
T11TD4221.1E:148a-15: bdag kyang don dam pa pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:148a-16: de ste gnyis med pa ma yin na de'i tshe sna tshogs gnyis med yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:148a-17: bdag ces bya ba yod par mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:148a-18: da ltar gyi rang bzhin tsam 'dzin pa'i mngon sum gyis rtag pa nyid mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:148a-19: snga ma dang phyi ma'i mngon sum dag cig car med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:148a-20: re res ni rtag pa nyid rtogs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:148a-21: tshogs pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:148a-22: dran pa tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:148a-23: mngon sum med na rjes su dpag pa yang med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:148a-24: des na bdag nyid du lta bas ni mngon par 'dod pa'i don grub pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:148a-25: de'i phyir grol 'dod thog med pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:148a-26: rgyu can rigs mthun sa bon las //
T11TD4221.1E:148a-27: byung ba'i sems can lta ba dag / rtsa ba nyid las dbyung bar gyis //
T11TD4221.1E:148a-28: bdag med par lta ba nyid las rnam pa gzhan ni tshad ma dang ldan pa med do zhes mjug bsdu'o //
T11TD4221.1E:148a-29: gal te bdag med pa nyid dang /
T11TD4221.1E:148a-30: de'i thar pa yang lung las grub pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:148a-31: thar pa de yang gcig tu bde ba'i rang bzhin yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:148a-32: de ni nam yang med par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:148a-33: 'khor ba'i bde ba ni rnam par chad pa dang ldan pa yin pas de las yongs su tshim pa mi skye'o //
T11TD4221.1E:148b-0: de yang @148b dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i cho ga las grub pa yin pa'i phyir sngar gyi rtsod pa thams cad med do //
T11TD4221.1E:148b-2: dbang po las 'das rig bya min //
T11TD4221.1E:148b-3: dngos po mig gis mthong ba yi //
T11TD4221.1E:148b-4: drang srong de dag tshig la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:148b-5: rjes su dpag pas gnod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:148b-6: skyes bus ma byas pa'i tshig la yang ngo zhes smras pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:148b-8: lung ni de lta'i dngos yin pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:148b-9: rgyu ma mthong ba rnams la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:148b-10: lung tsam gyis ni grol ba yang //
T11TD4221.1E:148b-11: smra ba yongs su mgu byed min //
T11TD4221.1E:148b-12: dbang po las 'das pa mthong ba rnams kyi tshig la rjes su dpag pas mi gnod do zhes bya ba 'di ni bden mod kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:148b-13: 'on kyang des sbyar ba'i tshig de nyid mi rtogs te /
T11TD4221.1E:148b-14: de ni lung thams cad la thun mong yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:148b-15: lung thams cad ni tshad ma ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:148b-16: de'i rjes su bsgrub pa yang srid pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:148b-17: skyes bus ma byas pa ni mi rigs so zhes pa bshad zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:148b-18: gal te sa bon la sogs pa dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i cho ga dang 'brel pa las mi skye ba'i chos can du mthong ba ma yin nam zhe na de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:148b-19: sa bon sogs grub cho ga ni //
T11TD4221.1E:148b-20: skyes bu mi bskyed par nus min //
T11TD4221.1E:148b-21: til mar bskus dang mes bsregs sogs //
T11TD4221.1E:148b-22: las kyang grol bar thal phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:148b-23: ji ste til mar bsku ba la sogs pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:148b-24: de tsam nyid las nus pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:148b-26: dbang bskur ba la sogs pa la yang mtshungs so //
T11TD4221.1E:148b-28: sngar lci bdag phyis yang phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:148b-29: sdig pa bcom par byas pa min //
T11TD4221.1E:148b-31: lus can min phyir sdig lci min //
T11TD4221.1E:148b-32: gal te dbang bskur ba na sngar lci ba dag phyis yang bar zad mod /
T11TD4221.1E:148b-33: de cam gyis sdig pa bcom pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:148b-34: lci ba dang 'gal ba'i yang ba dmigs pas ni lci ba nyid med par rtogs par byed kyi ;
T11TD4221.1E:148b-35: sdig pa med par ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:148b-36: sdig pa med pa ni lci ba nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:148b-37: de ni sdig pa nyid kyis lci ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:148b-38: de ga las lung las so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:148b-41: de srid tsam gyis sdig pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:148b-42: zhig pas thar pa yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:149a-2: skye zhes bya bar rtogs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:149a-3: lha la sogs pa mthong ba ni //
T11TD4221.1E:149a-4: dga' ba yang ni med pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:149a-5: thams cad las ni grol zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:149a-6: de lta yin na khyad ci yod //
T11TD4221.1E:149a-7: gal te khyed kyi phyogs de yang bdag med pa bsgoms pas srid pa chad par 'gyur mod //
T11TD4221.1E:149a-8: de lta na yang thar pa ji ltar 'gyur zhes bsam dgos pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:149a-9: de yang ji lta ba bzhin ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:149a-11: log shes dang ni de las 'byung //
T11TD4221.1E:149a-12: sred pa sems pa'i dbang dag gis //
T11TD4221.1E:149a-13: dman gnas 'gro bar skye ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:149a-16: de tsam las ni 'byung ba'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:149a-17: skye la de dag nyid nus yin //
T11TD4221.1E:149a-18: sems pa de dag rang nyid las //
T11TD4221.1E:149a-19: yin phyir skye rgyu nyams pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:149a-20: yul la sogs par phyin pa ni sred pa'i dbang nyid kyis yin par dmigs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:149a-21: gal te las kyang skye ba'i rgyu ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:149a-22: de ci ltar de tsam las 'byung ba yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:149a-24: sems pa de gnyis nyid las yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:149a-25: sngar gyi sems pa'i mtshan nyid sbyin pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
T11TD4221.1E:149a-26: 'du byed pa'i sgo nas skye ba gzhan 'byung ba'i sems pa'i log pa'i shes pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:149a-27: de las byung ba'i sred pa'i sems pa gnyis 'grub par byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:149a-28: las ni dngos su 'di gnyis nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:149a-29: de'i de ma thag par skye ba 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:149a-30: snga ma dag ni de'i rgyu yin pas na nye bar btags nas las yin gyi dngos su ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:149a-31: des na dbang bskur ba la yang skye ba'i rgyu yongs su rdzogs pa yod pa'i phyir thar pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:149a-33: 'gro dang rtogs rten byed pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:149a-34: de ni ma mthong ba las 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:149a-35: ma mthong zhig phyir 'gro ba med //
T11TD4221.1E:149a-36: des na 'du byed sems pa min //
T11TD4221.1E:149a-37: dge ba'i las rnam pa bcu yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:149a-38: mi dge ba yang rnam pa bcu nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:149a-39: sems pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:149a-40: de yang dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i bsgrub pas 'jig pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:149a-42: don 'di ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:149a-44: yod dang med pa'i rjes 'jug phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:149b-0: byed @149b pa bskyed la blo yi ni //
T11TD4221.1E:149b-1: nus mthong gzhan gyis ma yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:149b-2: de yod de dag cis mi 'gro //
T11TD4221.1E:149b-3: mig la sogs pa'i byed pa dag ni blo'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa yin pas /
T11TD4221.1E:149b-4: de dag blos grub pa na gzhan dag skye ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:149b-5: des na ci'i phyir mi skye 'on te dbang bskur gyis bcom par bskyed pa la nus pa med do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:149b-7: gal te de dag nus med na //
T11TD4221.1E:149b-8: de la dbang sogs byas ma dag / sems pa'i dbang gis 'dzin dang 'jug / g-yeng dang 'gog pa med par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:149b-9: gal te dbang bskur bas blo la sogs pa bdag gi yon tan rnams skye nas nus pa med pa la brten na /
T11TD4221.1E:149b-10: de'i tshe dbang bskur ma thag nyid du blo nyams pas na /
T11TD4221.1E:149b-11: 'dzin pa yul dag la rang dgar 'jug pa bzlog pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:149b-12: mngon par 'dod pa la 'jug pa dang g-yeng ba mi mnyam par 'jug pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:149b-13: 'gog pa 'jig pa ste de dag med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:149b-14: 'on te shi ma thag tu nus pa med par 'gyur ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:149b-15: rgyu rnams ni yongs su 'byung ba'i khyad par la ltos pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:149b-17: gal te dbang bskur la sogs dag / de ltar mi skye la nus med /
T11TD4221.1E:149b-19: de 'dra ba yi tshad yod min //
T11TD4221.1E:149b-20: gal te de nyid nus pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:149b-21: cha dag rtogs pa yod na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:149b-22: de las phul byung thob pas na //
T11TD4221.1E:149b-23: gzhan du'ang yod ces bya bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:149b-24: gang gi tshe gong nas gong du 'gyur ba'i rjes su mthun pa nyid ma dmigs pa de'i tshe thar par rtog pa rgyu mtshan med pa can nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:149b-25: 'on te da lta ni blo yod pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:149b-26: 'dod chags la sogs pa 'khor ba'i rang bzhin 'byung ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:149b-27: shi ma thag tu ni blo med pa nyid kyis 'khor ba'i chos med par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:149b-28: de yang ma yin te skye ba gzhan du blo med pa nyid ci'i phyir shi ba'i phyir zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:149b-29: dbang bskur ba'i cho gdon med de /
T11TD4221.1E:149b-30: thams cad shi ba'i blo med par gyur pa na 'grol bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:149b-31: ci ste de tshe blo med phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:149b-32: mi 'gyur dri ma rnams kyi blo //
T11TD4221.1E:149b-33: mtshams sbyor de rnams nus med na //
T11TD4221.1E:149b-34: gson pa nyid na'ang nus med 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:150a-0: @150a * // mtshams sbyor ba'i rgyu'i 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri ma dag yod pas na blo med par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:150a-1: 'on te gti mug la sogs pa dbang bskur gyis nyams pa dag nus pa med do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:150a-2: de'i tshe gson pa nyid na blo mtshams sbyor ba'i rgyur mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:150a-3: des na dbang bskur ma thag tu thar par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:150a-4: yin pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:150a-6: gnyen po dang ni rang gi phyogs //
T11TD4221.1E:150a-8: nyes rgyun rang gi sa bon can //
T11TD4221.1E:150a-9: dbang bskur bal ldog pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:150a-10: nyes pa ni rang gi sa bon las skye ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:150a-12: gnyen po'i phyogs bdag med pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:150a-13: rang gi phyogs tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa 'phel na go rims bzhin du 'grib pa dang 'phel ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:150a-14: de lta bu'i dbang bskur ba la yang skye ba 'di dang gzhan du ldog pa med pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:150a-15: de ci ltar 'di thar pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:150a-16: gal te bdag med pa mthong ba //
T11TD4221.1E:150a-19: gang gi tshe 'dod chags la sogs pas nyams pa 'ga' zhig las dag par 'gyur ba /
T11TD4221.1E:150a-20: de'i tshe thar pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:150a-21: thar pa ni bcings pa grol ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:150a-22: bdag med pa'i lta ba la ni ;
T11TD4221.1E:150a-23: gang bcings pa de ni bcings pa nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:150a-24: de nyid thar pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:150a-25: mi rtag pa nyid kyis bdag tu lta ba med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:150a-27: dag pa gang yin de gzhan min /
T11TD4221.1E:150a-28: me shi ba ni me min pa //
T11TD4221.1E:150a-29: de ltar na yang me shi zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:150a-30: bya ba'i tha snyad 'di gnas so //
T11TD4221.1E:150a-31: de la nged kyi phyogs la ni tshig gi tshul tsam zhig mi 'byor pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:150a-32: de yang dpes lan btab bo //
T11TD4221.1E:150a-33: bdag tu smra ba la ni don nyid mi 'grigs pas /
T11TD4221.1E:150a-34: tshig gi tshul tsam ni 'grigs kyang ci yang byar med do //
T11TD4221.1E:150a-35: gtso bo dngos po mi 'grigs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:150a-36: 'di la ni dpe yang yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:150a-38: rtag pa ltos pa med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:150a-39: rim gyis skyed par byed pa dang //
T11TD4221.1E:150a-40: byed dang mi byed pa dag ni //
T11TD4221.1E:150b-0: gnas skabs kyi khyad par yin te ma dag pa'i gnas skabs su gyur pa las dag pa'i @150b gnas su gyur pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:150b-1: rim gyis 'byung ba'i gnas skabs dag ni bdag gi 'bras bu yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:150b-2: ltos pa med pa ni cig car nyid gnas skabs dang bcas par 'gyur ro zhes phyogs gzhan du gtan la phab zin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:150b-3: gzhan yang byed pa dang 'gal te /
T11TD4221.1E:150b-4: byed pa dang mi byed pa'i gnas skabs dag tu 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:150b-6: de dag de las tha dad na //
T11TD4221.1E:150b-7: byed po za po nyams par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:150b-8: nus pa yang ni 'grub ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:150b-9: de'i bdag nyid yin na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:150b-10: rgyu dang 'bras bu dag gcig par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:150b-11: bdag gcig gi khongs su gtogs pa'i phyir de'i bdag nyid bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:150b-12: rgyu dang 'bras bu de dag tha dad pa yin na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:150b-13: de byed pa po dang za ba por mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:150b-14: byed pa dang longs spyod dang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:150b-16: nyams su myong ba las kyang 'brel pa ma yin te ;
T11TD4221.1E:150b-17: gzhan gyi bdag nyid bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:150b-18: rnal 'byor pa gzhan gyi byed pa dang longs spyod pa mngon du byed pa las kyang byed pa po dang spyod pa por 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:150b-19: 'on te 'du ba'i 'brel pa nyid las so zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:150b-20: 'du ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:150b-21: 'du ba ni rnal 'byor pa la yang blo gcig tu 'gyur ba'i rgyu ma yin na ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:150b-22: 'on te rgyu dang 'bras bu dag dang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:150b-23: 'di byed pa po dang spyod pa po yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:150b-25: nus pa yang ni 'grub ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:150b-26: rtag pa la ni nus pa med do zhes bstan zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:150b-27: 'o na ni bdag med pa la yang dran pa dang longs spyod pa la sogs pa mi 'grub bo zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:150b-29: gzhan gyis dran dang longs spyod sogs //
T11TD4221.1E:150b-30: thal ba gnod byed ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:150b-31: 'ga' yang dran pa med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:150b-32: des na myong las dran pa 'byung //
T11TD4221.1E:150b-33: dran par byed pa po 'ga'i yang dran pa yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:150b-34: de med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:150b-35: longs spyod pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:150b-36: longs spyod pa po med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:150b-38: de nyid dran pa po dang /
T11TD4221.1E:150b-39: dran pa dang dran pa'i yul yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-1: spyod pa yang brjod par bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-2: bde ba nyid longs spyod bya dang longs spyod pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:151a-3: longs spyod pa po yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-4: dran pa de yang myong ba'i rgyu las skye'o //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-5: gal te gzhan gyis mngon par 'dod pa myong ba las kyang ci'i phyir mi skye /
T11TD4221.1E:151a-6: gzhan gyis byed pas kyang longs spyod par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:151a-7: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nges pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-8: bdag tu smra ba la yang nyes pa 'dir ci'i phyir mi 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:151a-9: bdag tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-10: tha dad pa de nyid ga las /
T11TD4221.1E:151a-11: ji ltar bdag la khyad med kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-12: gzhan las dran pa mi 'byung ba //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-13: de bzhin yid la khyad med kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-14: gzhan las dran pa skye ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-15: yid la tha dad rgyu yod pas //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-17: bdag ni tha dad rgyu med pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-18: rnam dbye 'di ni ga las yin //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-19: gal te bdag gcig med na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-20: bdag gis mthong ba dran no zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-21: gcig nyid 'brel pa ga las yin //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-22: skyon 'di bdag la yang mtshungs te //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-23: 'di la tshad ma skye ba yod pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-24: bdag yod kyang tshad ma gang gis dran pa dang mthong ba gzhi gcig nyid du rigs /
T11TD4221.1E:151a-25: mngon sum gyis so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:151a-26: snga phyi nyid la mngon sum gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-27: rtogs pa med ces bsgrubs zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-28: mngon sum med phyir rjes dpag ni //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-29: tshad ma de la 'jug ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-30: gal te bdag ni snga ma yi //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-31: ngo bor de nyid du bdag rig / snga ma yi ni myong ba nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-32: da lta'i tshe na yod par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-33: des na de la snga ma ni //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-34: nyid du rig par ga la srid //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-35: nyams su myong bzhin pa nyid ni //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-36: snga ma'i ngo bor rtogs ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-37: dran las snga nyid ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-38: dran pa nyid ni tshad ma min //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-39: gal te dran las ma grub na //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-40: gzhan du ci'i phyir de mi 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-41: de phyir bdag tu smra ba la //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-42: de nyid du ni gcig gnas med //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-43: de dag gcig car 'byung ba'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-44: gcig nyid du ni mngon par rlom //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-45: gcig nyid du ma mngon 'dod la //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-46: tha snyad rnam dbye med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-47: gcig pa nyid kyi tha snyad ni //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-48: 'bras bu gcig nyid las mthong ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-49: 'di ni thog med ma rig pa //
T11TD4221.1E:151a-50: goms pa'i nus pa rgyur 'gyur yin //
T11TD4221.1E:151b-0: bdag nyid myong ba @151b gcig nyid ni //
T11TD4221.1E:151b-1: de ltar bdag tu 'dzin pa'i rgyu //
T11TD4221.1E:151b-2: 'o na ji ltar bdag med pa'i 'khor bar 'jug ste /
T11TD4221.1E:151b-3: bdag med na 'jig tshogs la lta ba nyid mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:151b-4: dran pa yang snga ma dang phyi ma'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:151b-5: gcig pa nyid dang rtag pa nyid 'dzin pa'i nus pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:151b-6: des na 'khor ba nyid med pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:151b-8: don dam par na 'khor ba zhes bya ba yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:151b-9: rang las rang gi ngo bo rtogs zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:151b-10: de lta mod kyi 'di ni tha snyad las de ltar 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:151b-12: bden pa bzhi la brten pa dang //
T11TD4221.1E:151b-13: bde dang nga dang nga zhes sogs //
T11TD4221.1E:151b-14: yang dag min pa rnam bcu drug / sgro 'dogs nas ni yongs su sred //
T11TD4221.1E:151b-15: de nyid la ni de 'gal don //
T11TD4221.1E:151b-16: de nyid rnam par rjes rtogs can //
T11TD4221.1E:151b-17: legs bsgoms yang dag lta ba yis //
T11TD4221.1E:151b-19: / yang dag pa ma yin pa sgro 'dogs pa nyid 'khor ba yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:151b-20: don dam par ni 'khor ba med do //
T11TD4221.1E:151b-21: yang dag pa ma yin pa ni rnam pa bcu drug po ste /
T11TD4221.1E:151b-23: yongs su sred pa can las kyis 'khor bar mngon par rlom pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:151b-24: gzhan du ni 'khor ba sred pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:151b-25: mngon par rlom pa yang gzhan dang gzhan myong ba las tha dad pa 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:151b-26: des na gcig nyid dang bdag ni myong ba med kyang rig par mngon par rlom pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:151b-27: dpyod pa dang ldan pa dag de nyid yang dag par tshul bzhin du yid la byed pas ni 'di la cung zad kyang yod pas ni ma yin no zhes /
T11TD4221.1E:151b-28: bdag med pa goms pa las brtan par gyur pa na /
T11TD4221.1E:151b-29: rnam pa dag pa nyid du 'gyur bas /
T11TD4221.1E:151b-30: ma rig pa mtha' dag log pa'i mtshan nyid /
T11TD4221.1E:151b-31: mya ngan las 'das pa'i yul mngon du byed par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:151b-32: de'i phyir de kho na mthong bas sred pa log pa ni thar pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:151b-33: gal te las dang lus yod na ji ltar thar pa yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:151b-36: las dang lus dag gnas na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:151b-37: gcig med phyir na rgyu gsum can //
T11TD4221.1E:151b-38: skye ba srid pa ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:151b-39: sa bon med par myu gu bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:152a-0: de lta na ni las dang lus @152a * //
T11TD4221.1E:152a-1: dag las gang yang rung ba zhig med pa nyid na thar par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:152a-3: las zad pas thar par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:152a-6: las dang lus dag spong min te //
T11TD4221.1E:152a-7: gnyen po dag ni med phyir dang //
T11TD4221.1E:152a-8: nus med phyir na sred pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:152a-9: yod na slar yang 'byung phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:152a-10: sred pa bzlog pa ma gtogs par las dang lus dag gi gnyen po gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:152a-11: dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i cho ga ni bshad zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:152a-12: lung yang tshad ma ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:152a-13: sred pa dang 'brel pa ni lam mi byed pa ma yin no chags sdang la sogs pa ni de las ngang gis 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:152a-14: gnyis zad don du 'bad na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:152a-15: las zad dub pa don med yin //
T11TD4221.1E:152a-16: gnyi ga zad par byed na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:152a-17: de sred pa nyid bzlog pa zla'o //
T11TD4221.1E:152a-18: las kyang bzlog par bya ba nyid ma yin nam gang yin zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:152a-19: gnyen po mi sred pa'i phyir zhes bshad zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:152a-21: 'bras bu sna tshogs pa yi phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:152a-22: las dang nus pa tha dad du //
T11TD4221.1E:152a-23: rjes dpog des na dka' thub nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:152a-24: nyon mongs dngos gcig gis mi zad //
T11TD4221.1E:152a-25: 'bras bu du ma bsgrubs pa'i nus pa mngon du phyogs par byed pa'i bdag nyid can gyi las dag / ji ltar yang /
T11TD4221.1E:152a-26: rnam pa gcig gi 'bras bu spyad pa tsam gyis zad par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:152a-27: dka' thub kyis nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyang 'bras bu rnam pa gcig yin pas /
T11TD4221.1E:152a-28: de las zad par ni mi rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:152a-31: chung 'gyur rigs mi mthun rkyen gyi ;
T11TD4221.1E:152a-32: /'bras bu nyams su myong bas ni //
T11TD4221.1E:152a-33: las gang gis de'i rigs can nyid kyi 'bras bu nye bar bskyed par bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:152a-34: 'bras bu de'i cha nyams su myong ba'i phyir las des bskyed pa'i 'bras bu nyid nyams par 'gyur gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:152a-35: de dang mi mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni 'grib pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:152a-36: ji ste dka' thub nus pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:152a-37: nus pa 'dres pa zad pas na //
T11TD4221.1E:152a-39: nyon mongs med par kun spongs 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:152a-40: gal te dka' thub la nus pa yod na de'i tshe ma lus par nyon mongs pa med pa'am /
T11TD4221.1E:152a-41: spu gcig btogs pa tsam gyi cha las zad par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:152b-1: gal te dka' thub nyon mongs la //
T11TD4221.1E:152b-2: gzhan don nyon mongs nyid ce na //
T11TD4221.1E:152b-5: gal te dka' thub de nyon mongs las gzhan yin na de'i tshe de nyid las zad pas gdung ba lnga la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pas ci zhig bya /
T11TD4221.1E:152b-6: las ma lus par de nyid kyis zad par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:152b-7: gzhan byas pas ni gzhan gyi nus pa rtogs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:152b-8: nyon mongs pa nyid ni dka' thub ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:152b-9: de ni las kyi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:152b-10: las kyi 'bras bu nyid dka' thub tu 'gyur ba yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:152b-11: tsha grang spyod pa'i phyugs la sogs pa dag kyang dka' thub pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:152b-12: 'on te de ni las kyi 'bras bu ma yin te 'dod pas zhugs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:152b-13: las kyi 'bras bu ni de 'dod pa med kyang 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:152b-15: rgyal srid la sogs 'dod pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:152b-17: blo ni las kyi rten 'gro ba //
T11TD4221.1E:152b-18: de 'dra las kyang yod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:152b-19: gal te de las kyi 'bras bu ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:152b-20: 'o na ji ltar 'bras bu spyad pa las zad ces khyed rjod par byed /
T11TD4221.1E:152b-21: de'i phyir de ni las kyi 'bras bu nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:152b-22: des na sdig pa nyid zad par 'gyur gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:152b-23: rgyal srid la sogs pa'i las ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:152b-24: des na rgyal srid la sogs pa yang myong bar bya ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:152b-25: 'on te rgyal srid la sogs pa ni 'dod pa la sogs pa nyid la 'dod par 'gyur gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:152b-26: dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal la sogs pa ni dbang med du 'ongs pas de myong bar bya ba nyid de des na gdung ba nyid 'dod do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:152b-27: de ltar na 'o na dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal yang myong bar bya dgos so //
T11TD4221.1E:152b-28: 'on te de gnyis ni sdug bsngal nyid yin pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:152b-29: sdug bsngal tsam gyis zad par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:152b-30: dmyal ba la sogs pa skra 'bal bas zad par 'gyur ro zhe na de yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:152b-31: gang gi phyir tshad ma 'di yang yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:152b-32: sdug bsngal yin phyir las zad pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:152b-33: rgyu min phyugs kyi sdug bsngal bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:152b-34: gal te 'di ni ma nges na //
T11TD4221.1E:152b-35: de khyod smras la med dam ci //
T11TD4221.1E:152b-37: ji ltar rgyal srid bde ba'i dngos //
T11TD4221.1E:153a-0: @153a * // 'dod med la ni mi gnod pa //
T11TD4221.1E:153a-1: de bzhin goms las dmyal ba yi //
T11TD4221.1E:153a-2: sdug bsngal de la gnod byed min //
T11TD4221.1E:153a-3: goms pa'i stobs las 'jig rten na //
T11TD4221.1E:153a-4: bde dang sdug bsngal la sogs 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:153a-5: des na grol gnas 'di la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:153a-6: bde sdug la sogs yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:153a-7: 'on te las yod de las zad pa'i phyir 'bad do zhes bya ba de nyid khyed kyis khas blangs pa yin pa'i phyir khas blangs pas gnod do zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:153a-10: skye 'dod nyes pa bcom pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:153a-11: gang yang skyon rnams 'gog byed pa //
T11TD4221.1E:153a-12: nges bskyed las la nus 'gyur gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:153a-13: ci ltar byas pa nyams par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:153a-14: byas zin pa'i las 'jig pa ni med de /
T11TD4221.1E:153a-15: byas pa'i las la ni nyams pa yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:153a-16: 'o na ji ltar las zad par bshad ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:153a-18: gang gis tshogs pa gzhan yod na //
T11TD4221.1E:153a-19: 'bras bu ster byed las dang ni //
T11TD4221.1E:153a-20: 'gal ba yod na ma yin pa //
T11TD4221.1E:153a-21: las de de 'dra ba nyid yin //
T11TD4221.1E:153a-22: gang zhig gdon mi za bar 'bras bu 'byin par nus pa gang yin pa de ni gdon mi za ba kho nar 'bras bu 'byin pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:153a-23: de'i don du yang dag thub can dag mngon par sbyor ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:153a-24: de ni stobs kyis 'od ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:153a-25: 'dod chags la sogs pa zad pas ni ma 'ongs pa'i 'dod chags kyi 'bras bu ni zad pa'i 'gyur ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:153a-26: byas zin pa'i dngos po gdon mi za bar myong bar bya ba'i las ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:153a-27: gal te las ni ci ltar sred pa ji lta ba bzhin du gnas na las yang 'byung ba de bzhin las yod na sred pa slar 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:153a-30: las las nyes pa ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:153a-31: skyon ldan med 'gyur bzlog pas min //
T11TD4221.1E:153a-32: log pa'i rnam rtog med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:153a-34: sred pa yod na 'bras bu don du gnyer ba las byed kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:153a-36: sred pa med na ni ci yang mi byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:153a-37: 'on te dge ba'i las 'byin par nus pa'i phyir gdon mi za bar bde ba 'dod par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:153a-39: don dam par na 'khor bar bde ba nyid 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:153b-0: 'on kyang log pa'i rnam @153b par rtog pa 'ga' zhig tu zad do //
T11TD4221.1E:153b-1: log pa'i rtog pa de de med na ni gang las mngon par 'dod par 'gyur zhing /
T11TD4221.1E:153b-2: bde ba de yang gang zhig gis yin /
T11TD4221.1E:153b-3: de'i phyir 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i mtshan nyid ma rig pa zad pa nyid kyis thar par 'gyur gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:153b-4: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:153b-5: de'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ston par mdzad pa nyid kyi skyob pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:153b-6: des na bden pa bzhi ston pa'i mtshan nyid 'bras bur 'gyur ba'i /
T11TD4221.1E:153b-7: skyob las de nyid brtan pa dang //
T11TD4221.1E:153b-8: ma lus khyad par mkhyen par 'grub //
T11TD4221.1E:153b-9: gshegs pa rtogs pa'i don phyir te //
T11TD4221.1E:153b-10: de phyir phyi rol pa dang slob //
T11TD4221.1E:153b-11: mi slob las lhag gang gi phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:153b-12: skyob pa nyid las bcom ldan 'das //
T11TD4221.1E:153b-13: bde bar gshegs pa yin no zhes shes pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:153b-14: bde bar gshegs pa nyid de yang /
T11TD4221.1E:153b-16: brtan pa dang khyad par ma lus pa mkhyen pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:153b-17: de kho na nyid mkhyen pa ni legs par mkhyen pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:153b-18: brtan pa mkhyen pa ni slar mi log par mkhyen pa ste /
T11TD4221.1E:153b-19: brtan pa ni slar mi ldog pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:153b-20: khyad par ma lus pa mkhyen pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
T11TD4221.1E:153b-22: bde bar gshegs pa ni rtogs pa'i don yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:153b-23: bcom ldan 'das la di mnga' ba nyid ni skyob pa nyid las shes pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:153b-24: rjes su dpag pa las ni skyob pa nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:153b-25: gzhan la ni 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i skyob pa srid pa ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:153b-26: rjes su dpag pas 'jug pa yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:153b-28: de 'on te de ni rjes su dpag pa brgyud pa las 'byung ba yin no zhes bya ba lan du 'gyur ro snyam na /
T11TD4221.1E:153b-31: rjes su dpag pa 'ga' zhig la ni 'gyur ba gzhan la ma yin no zhes bya ba'i rnam par dbye ba ni yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:153b-32: gcig la yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nye bar bstan pa med par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:153b-33: des na don thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen pa yin no zhes shes so //
T11TD4221.1E:154a-0: don thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad ma gzigs par ni don thams cad skad cig ma la 'jig pa yin no zhes bya ba la @154a * //
T11TD4221.1E:154a-1: sogs pa 'di srid pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:154a-2: gang zhig ma mthong ba de nyid kyis ma nges par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:154a-3: 'on te bdag cag ci lta bu de ltar de yang 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:154a-4: bdag cag ni de'i nye bar bstan pa med pa ma yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:154a-5: de'i phyir gang mngon du gzigs pa'am /
T11TD4221.1E:154a-6: gzhan gyis nye bar bstan pa la nges pa 'di yod kyi gzhan la ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:154a-7: nges pa med pa nye bar ston pa ni mi srid do //
T11TD4221.1E:154a-8: 'on te 'khrul pa las kyang srid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:154a-13: gang gis de 'gyur skad cig ma //
T11TD4221.1E:154a-14: nyid du 'khrul rgyu ci zhig yod //
T11TD4221.1E:154a-15: the tshom yang med pa nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:154a-16: gnyi ga'i cha la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:154a-17: de'i phyir 'di ni nges pa nyid las nye bar ston par mdzad pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:154a-18: nges pa de yang mngon du mdzad pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:154a-19: bdag cag gi rjes su dpag pa ni nye bar bstan pa med pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:154a-20: the tshom gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:154a-21: gnyi gar ston par thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:154a-22: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ni de nyid dang /
T11TD4221.1E:154a-23: brtan pa dang ma lus pa'i khyad par mkhyen pa mnga' ba'i phyir bde bar gshegs pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:154a-24: des na bcom ldan 'das phyi rol pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:154a-25: slob pa dang mi slob pa las bde bar gshegs pa nyid kyis khyad par du 'phags pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:154a-27: gzhan don mkhyen sbyor de ston pa //
T11TD4221.1E:154a-28: de las brtse yin gzhan don ngor //
T11TD4221.1E:154a-30: / bcom ldan 'das la bde bar gshegs pa nyid mnga' ba ni /
T11TD4221.1E:154a-31: bden na de rgyu gang las yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:154a-32: lan du gzhan gyi don mkhyen pa la sbyor ba ston pa nyid ces bya ba'i rgyu rjes su dpag ste /
T11TD4221.1E:154a-33: de lta ma yin na bde bar gshegs pa nyid gang las srid /
T11TD4221.1E:154a-34: de las kyang brtse ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:154a-35: gzhan du na gzhan gyi don mkhyen pa la sbyor bar mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:154a-36: gal te de bsgrubs pas ci bya /
T11TD4221.1E:154a-37: bde bar gshegs pa tsam nyid kyis //
T11TD4221.1E:154a-41: de ni mkhyen pa tsam nyid las //
T11TD4221.1E:154a-42: tshad min de yi tshad ma nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:154b-0: kun tshe nye @154b bar bstan pa las //
T11TD4221.1E:154b-1: yin 'gyur de ltar ma yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:154b-2: de ni nged la tshad ma min //
T11TD4221.1E:154b-3: de bshad pa ni gzhan don ngor //
T11TD4221.1E:154b-5: brtse bas gzhan gyi don mkhyen par sbyor ba ni /
T11TD4221.1E:154b-6: rtag tu gzhan gyi don nyid du mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:154b-7: brtse bas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste //
T11TD4221.1E:154b-8: ci ltar sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:154b-10: brtse ba legs dang ye shes las //
T11TD4221.1E:154b-11: bde ba gsung mdzad sgrub byed bcas //
T11TD4221.1E:154b-12: de gsung bar yang mngon sbyor ldan //
T11TD4221.1E:154b-13: gang phyir des na tshad ma nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:154b-14: brtse ba dang ldan pas ni legs par gsung bar 'gyur la /
T11TD4221.1E:154b-15: mkhyen pas ni yang dag par phyin ci ma log pa gsung bar mdzad do //
T11TD4221.1E:154b-16: mkhyen pa de yang sgrub bar byed pa dang bcas pa de yang gsung ba'i don du mngon par sbyor ba dang ldan pa yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:154b-17: gang gi phyir rgyu bzhi po des na de tshad ma nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:154b-18: 'dis ni 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:154b-19: dong po yi ni tha ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:154b-20: dang 'og gi ni tha ltag yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:154b-21: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das tshad ma yin no zhes nges par brjod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:154b-22: de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das tshad ma'i mtshan nyid kyi yon tan 'di nyid kyis bstod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:154b-24: de lta'i dngos po bstod pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:154b-25: de yi bstan pa nyid las ni //
T11TD4221.1E:154b-26: tshad ma'i de nyid grub don te //
T11TD4221.1E:154b-27: rjes su dpag pa ma bzlog phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:154b-28: cung zad skye ba'i bdag nyid can //
T11TD4221.1E:154b-29: gang de thams cad 'gog chos can //
T11TD4221.1E:154b-30: zhes sogs rnam pa du mar ni //
T11TD4221.1E:154b-31: 'di yi sbyor ba mthong phyir ro /
T11TD4221.1E:154b-32: ci'i phyir tshad ma'i mtshan nyid de lta bu'i dngos po nye bar ston ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:154b-33: de'i nye bar ston pa nyid las tshad ma'i de kho na nyid ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur bar bya ba'i don du'o //
T11TD4221.1E:154b-34: de las mngon sum ni bcom ldan 'das kyis nye bar bstan pa yin te ;
T11TD4221.1E:154b-35: sngon po shes pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bus ni sngon po shes kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:154b-36: sngon po nyid do zhes ni ma yin no zhes so //
T11TD4221.1E:154b-37: rjes su dpag pa yang ma bzlog ste /
T11TD4221.1E:154b-38: de'i phyir bzhed pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:154b-39: sgra las byung ba la sogs pa dag ni bzlog ste /
T11TD4221.1E:154b-40: pha rol rab tu smra ba thams cad ni gsog ste /
T11TD4221.1E:155a-1: gcig pu de nyid gsungs pa yin no zhes so //
T11TD4221.1E:155a-2: yang na gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa'i mtshan nyid sbyor ba bstan pa yod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:155a-3: ji skad du gang cung zad skye ba'i bdag nyid can de thams cad ni 'gog pa'i chos can yin no zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:155a-5: med na mi 'byung mtshan nyid can //
T11TD4221.1E:155a-6: rtags ni rjes dpag rten yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:155a-7: bsgrub byas gtan tshigs khyab pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:155a-8: bstan phyir de yang gsal bar bshad //
T11TD4221.1E:155a-9: bsgrub byas khyab pa'i gtan tshigs ni go bar byed pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:155a-10: gtan tshigs kyi khyab pa de yang gang cung zad kyang cung zad skye ba'i bdag nyid can de thams cad ni 'gog pa'i chos can yin no zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam pa du mar bstan par mdzad de /
T11TD4221.1E:155a-11: des na rjes su dpag pa yang gsung ba nyid kyis tshad ma'i de kho na nyid ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dang po bstan pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:155a-12: de yang tshad ma yin pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:155a-13: des na dang por smos pa'i tshad ma nyid ni bcom ldan 'das kyis yon tan dam pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:155a-14: gang phyir gnyis ldan tshad ma'i de nyid ni //
T11TD4221.1E:155a-15: bcom ldan de bzhin bshegs pas bstan mdzad pa //
T11TD4221.1E:155a-16: de phyir de las tshad ma gzhan yod min //
T11TD4221.1E:155a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa 'di las thams cad grub //
T11TD4221.1E:155a-18: tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi rgyan las /
T11TD4221.1E:155a-19: tshad ma grub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o /
T11TD4221.1E:155a-21: // / de ltar spyi'i mtshan nyid brjod nas khyad par gyi mtshan nyid bshad pa /
T11TD4221.1E:155a-22: mngon sum dang ni rjes dpag tshad ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:155a-23: tshad ma de yang mi slu ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:155a-24: mi slu ba yang don las skyes pas don la mi 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:155a-25: gal te don la mi 'khrul pa de nyid ji ltar rtogs par bya zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:155a-26: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa nyid kyis te /
T11TD4221.1E:155a-27: mngon sum yin pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:155a-28: rjes su dpag pa yin pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:155a-29: gzhan sgra las byung ba la sogs pa yin pa'i phyir ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T11TD4221.1E:155a-30: gal te sgra las byung ba la sogs pa don dang 'brel pa med pa nyid do zhes bya ba gang las she na /
T11TD4221.1E:155a-31: 'di ltar mtshan nyid gnyis ni gzhal bya yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:155a-32: tshad ma ni gzhal bya la 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:155a-33: gzhal bya med na ni gzhal bya la mi 'khrul bar mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:155b-0: @155b gzhal bya yang mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pas rtogs par bya ba las gzhan yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:155b-1: rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid dag las gzhan pa'i gzhal bya ni med do zhes gang bshad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:155b-2: rang gi mtshan nyid ni mngon sum gyi yul yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:155b-3: spyi'i mtshan nyid ni rjes su dpag pa'i yul yin no zhes ston par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:155b-4: 'di nyid ston par byed pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:155b-5: gzhal bya gnyis phyir tshad ma gnyis //
T11TD4221.1E:155b-6: don byed nus dang mi nus phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:155b-7: skra shad la sogs don min te //
T11TD4221.1E:155b-8: don du mos pa med phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:155b-9: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i dbye bas tshad ma ni rnam pa gnyis kho nar rtogs par bya ste /
T11TD4221.1E:155b-10: de lta ma yin na gzhal bya rtogs par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro zhes ston par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:155b-11: mngon sum rjes su dpag bya yin //
T11TD4221.1E:155b-12: rnam pa las gzhan rtogs med pa //
T11TD4221.1E:155b-13: de phyir de las gzhan pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:155b-14: tshad ma yod par 'dod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:155b-15: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag par bya ba dag kho na dag phyin ci ma log par rtogs pa'i gzhal bya yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:155b-16: spyi dang khyad par gyi ngo bo yin pas rtogs pa'i rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:155b-17: yul gcig nyid kyang rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:155b-18: rtogs pa'i rnam pa gnyis yod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:155b-19: rtogs pa'i dbye ba yang tshad ma'i dbye ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:155b-20: de nyid ni yul gyi dbye ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:155b-21: gal te rtogs pa'i bye brag yul gyi dbye bar ji ltar 'gyur te gzhan tha dad pas gzhan tha dad par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:155b-23: rta yi dbye bas ba sogs kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:155b-24: ngo bo tha dad 'gyur min te //
T11TD4221.1E:155b-25: 'brel med phyir ro shes pa dang //
T11TD4221.1E:155b-26: shes bya dag ni de ltar min //
T11TD4221.1E:155b-27: don rnams yod med nges pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:155b-28: rnam gzhag shes la rag las yin //
T11TD4221.1E:155b-29: shes gzhan las ni don de nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:155b-30: don gzhan nyid du shes par byed //
T11TD4221.1E:155b-31: gang gi tshe shes pa skyed pa la dngos su nus pa nyid du rtogs pa de'i tshe ni /
T11TD4221.1E:155b-32: 'dir rang gi ngo bos mtshan pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:155b-33: gang gi tshe de nyid brgyud pas nus pa nyid du rtogs pa de'i tshe ni /
T11TD4221.1E:155b-34: spyi'i ngo bor mtshon pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:155b-36: ma yin par 'jug pas brgyud pas nus pa nyid nus pa med pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:156a-0: @156a * // gtan nus pa med pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:156a-1: rab rib can gyis dmigs pa'i skra shad la sogs pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:156a-2: skra la sogs pa las dmigs pa ni don med pa nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:156a-3: dngos sam brgyud pas nus par ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:156a-4: don du nus pa med pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:156a-5: mos pa med pa yang gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:156a-6: 'di las kyang gzhal bya gnyis yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:156a-8: sgra yi yul dang yul min phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:156a-9: rgyu mtshan gzhan ni yod pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:156a-10: blo ni yod dang med phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:156a-11: gang zhig rnam pa ci zhig ltar 'dra ba'i ngo bor rtogs pa de ni spyi'i mtshan nyid yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:156a-12: gzhan du rtogs pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:156a-13: gal te mdun na gnas pa'i ba lang la sogs pa'i 'dra ba'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:156a-14: de bzhin du ba men de ni 'di yin no zhes nye bar 'jal bas rtogs pa de ci ga spyi'i mtshan nyid yin nam zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:156a-16: 'dra ba'i ngo bo nyid du ni //
T11TD4221.1E:156a-17: gang la shes pa skye 'gyur ba //
T11TD4221.1E:156a-18: de ni spyi yi mtshan nyid yin //
T11TD4221.1E:156a-19: 'dir ni rang gi ngo bos rig / gang zhig 'dra ba'i ngo bo kho nar rtogs pa de spyi yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:156a-20: 'dir ni khyad par rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:156a-21: gal te 'dra ba'i ngo bo nyid du yang rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:156a-22: tha dad par de'i ngo bor rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:156a-23: 'o na ji ltar 'di ni 'dra ba yin no snyam du lhag par zhen ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:156a-24: lhag par zhen kyang logs shig tu //
T11TD4221.1E:156a-25: 'dra bar rtogs pa yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:156a-26: so sor rtogs pa yod min pa //
T11TD4221.1E:156a-27: de nyid gnyis med shes pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:156a-28: 'di 'dra'o snyam du rtogs pas ni 'dra ba gzhan dngos po las tha dad par shes pa nus pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:156a-29: mdun na gnas pa'i don gyi rnam pa dang bral ba'i don gzhan rtogs pa ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:156a-30: de'i phyir 'di la don gzhan rtogs pa med pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:156a-31: spyi'i phyir shes pa ni dmigs pa med pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:156a-32: rjes su dpag pa'i rtogs pa la ni dpe la mthong ba'i ngo bo sgro 'dogs pa'i 'dra ba'i yod pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:156a-33: gal te de lta na ni sgra las byung ba la sogs pa'i yul yang spyir 'gyur zhe na 'di la lan /
T11TD4221.1E:156b-0: don du mos pa med @156b phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:156b-2: de bzhin du gzhan du yang blta bar bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:156b-3: sgra'i yul ni spyi'i mtshan nyid yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:156b-4: yul ma yin pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:156b-5: gal te sgra'i yul spyi'i mtshan nyid yin na 'o na sgra yang tshad mar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:156b-6: spyi'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:156b-8: gzhan don rjes dpag gang yin pa //
T11TD4221.1E:156b-9: spyi ni de yi spyod yul yin //
T11TD4221.1E:156b-10: sgra yi spyod yul spyi nyid ces //
T11TD4221.1E:156b-11: de skad du ni mi brjod de //
T11TD4221.1E:156b-12: sgra yi spyod yul ma yin pa //
T11TD4221.1E:156b-13: spyi ma yin zhes rnam dpyod byed //
T11TD4221.1E:156b-14: spyi yi mtshan nyid gang yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:156b-15: sgra yi yul yin gzhan ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:156b-16: spyi ni sgra'i yul nyid yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:156b-17: sgra'i yul gang yin pa de spyi nyid ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:156b-18: yul ma yin pa rang gi mtshan nyid kho na ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:156b-19: 'on kyang yul ma yin pa kho na rang gi mtshan nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don brjod par 'dod pa yin pa des na 'di la skyon med do //
T11TD4221.1E:156b-20: des na sgra'i yul yang 'ga' zhig ni spyi yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:156b-21: 'ga' zhig ni don med pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:156b-22: de bzhin du yul ma yin yang kha cig ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:156b-23: kha cig ni don med pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:156b-24: rgyu mtshan gzhan brda dang rtsol ba la sogs pa yul las gzhan du gyur pa dag yod na gang la blo yod par 'gyur ba de ni spyi yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:156b-25: mig la sogs pa rgyu mtshan gzhan yod kyang gang la blo med par 'gyur ba de ni rang gi mtshan nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:156b-26: 'di la yang snga ma bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:156b-27: yang na rgyu mtshan gzhan yod na gang la blo yod pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin la ;
T11TD4221.1E:156b-28: rgyu mtshan gzhan yod kyang blo med pa de ni spyi'i mtshan nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:156b-29: rang gi ngo bos rtogs par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:156b-30: mi dmigs pa de ni lkog tu gyur pa dang spyi yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:156b-31: de la rang gi ngo bos mtshon pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:156b-32: rnam pa gzhan ni spyi'i mtshan nyid lkog tu gyur pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:156b-33: gal te mngon sum du gyur pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:156b-34: lkog tu gyur pa'i mtshan nyid kyi yul gyi dbye ba tshad ma gang gis rtogs /
T11TD4221.1E:156b-35: ci mngon sum gyis yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:156b-36: 'on te rjes su dpag pas yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:156b-37: de ste tshad ma gzhan gyis yin /
T11TD4221.1E:156b-38: gal te gzhal bya gnyis nyid ni //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-3: gsum pa dag kyang yod phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-4: 'on te tshad ma gnyis nyid kyis //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-5: yin na phan tshun brten par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-6: tshad ma gsum la sogs pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-7: gzhal bya gzhan ni grub pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-10: tshad ma'i dbye bas gzhal bya yi //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-11: dbye ba sgrub par byed pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-12: lkog gyur nyid kyang rjes dpag gis //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-14: lkog la mngon sum 'jug min te //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-15: 'jug na rjes dpag don med yin //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-16: gal te mngon sum 'jug na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-17: lkog gyur nyid du'ang ji ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-18: mngon sum log par 'gyur ba yi //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-19: dngos po nyid ni lkog gyur yin //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-20: de la mngon sum 'jug pa min //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-21: dbang po mthong ba med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-22: des de rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i//
T11TD4221.1E:157a-23: tshig gi tshul 'di sngon med yin //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-24: de phyir mngon sum yul nyid ni //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-25: mngon sum las ni rtogs par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-26: lkog gyur la ni tshad med phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-27: ji ltar gzhal bya gnyis su nges //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-28: de'i phyir gzhal bya gnyis ma grub pa'am /
T11TD4221.1E:157a-29: 'gal ba yin na ji ltar sgrub par byed pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:157a-30: gal te gzhal bya gnyis yin du chug pa de lta na tshad ma de tsam kho nar 'gyur dgos so zhes bya ba ga las yin /
T11TD4221.1E:157a-31: 'brel pa grub pa med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-32: gtan tshigs kun las nges mi 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-33: 'brel pa rab tu grub pa yang //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-34: mngon sum tshad ma dang ldan min //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-35: tshad ma nyid ni thun mong ba'i //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-36: sgrub byed mngon sum ji ltar yin //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-37: de ma grub na mngon sum gyis //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-38: de dang 'brel pa ji ltar nges //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-39: de ltar gzhal bya gnyis ma grub pa'am /
T11TD4221.1E:157a-40: gzhan gyis grub na 'gal bar 'gyur ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:157a-41: yang na de dang 'brel pa ma grub pas /
T11TD4221.1E:157a-42: gtan tshigs ma nges pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:157a-43: 'dir bshad pa yul rnam pa gnyis ni mngon sum kho nas rab tu grub ste /
T11TD4221.1E:157a-44: 'dra ba dang mi 'dra bar rtogs pa nyid ni shes pa nyid kyi chos yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:157a-45: de yang rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyis grub pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:157a-46: shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo la 'khrul pa yod pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:157b-0: de @157b la 'khrul par dogs na tha snyad med par 'gyur bas gtan tshigs brjod pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:157b-2: 'dri ba'i tshig gi skabs med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:157b-3: myong ba med pa gang gi tshig / gang zhig tu ni 'jug par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:157b-4: 'brel med rten la tshig dag ni //
T11TD4221.1E:157b-5: 'jug par gang na'ang yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:157b-6: dngos gzhan dag gi tha dad kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:157b-7: shes pa tha dad las yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:157b-8: de yi ngo bor gyur pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:157b-9: tshad ma'i dbye ba cis mi 'grub //
T11TD4221.1E:157b-10: rtogs pa nyid ni tha dad 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:157b-11: tshad ma'i dbye ba ji ltar yin //
T11TD4221.1E:157b-12: sngon du spyi yi mtshan nyid du //
T11TD4221.1E:157b-13: tshad ma 'di ni grub gyur ba //
T11TD4221.1E:157b-14: de yi tha dad tha snyad 'di //
T11TD4221.1E:157b-15: de ltar bsgrub byar rtogs min nam //
T11TD4221.1E:157b-16: 'di me zhes bya mngon sum nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:157b-17: rnam rtog bcas par gang smras la //
T11TD4221.1E:157b-18: ngo bo mngon sum las grub cing //
T11TD4221.1E:157b-19: sngon dang 'dra don gtan tshigs las //
T11TD4221.1E:157b-20: de ltar don bzung med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:157b-21: don gnyer don sgrub la 'jug med ;
T11TD4221.1E:157b-22: /'jug pa dang ldog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi tha snyad las tshad ma'i spyi'i mtshan nyid ni dang po nyid du grub pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:157b-23: da lta ni tha dad pa'i tha snyad tsam zhig bsgrub byar 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:157b-24: de la 'di ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i mngon sum gcig nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:157b-25: 'di lta ste 'di ni me yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:157b-26: 'di las mngon par 'dod pa'i don bya ba byed pa yin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o zhes gang smras pa de la /
T11TD4221.1E:157b-28: rtogs pa'i rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:157b-29: rtogs pa rnam pa tha dad pas ni phyi rol gyi dngos po yang tha dad par rtogs pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:157b-30: de'i ngo bor gyur ba'i tshad ma lta ci smos /
T11TD4221.1E:157b-31: de la 'bar ba'i rnam pa can gyi rang gi ngo bo mngon sum gyis grub pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:157b-32: mngon du byas pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:157b-33: mngon sum de ni lkog tu ma gyur pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:157b-34: spyi'i rnam par rtog pa sngar gyi don bya ba byed pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:157b-35: chos mthun pa ni lkog tu gyur pa yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:157b-36: tshad ma gzhan gyi yul yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:157b-37: 'on te de la 'jug par byed pa ni mngon sum kho na yin gyi gzhan gyi ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:157b-38: rtogs pa gzhan ni de na yod kyang tshad ma ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:158a-0: gang gi phyir ji snyed de dang lhan cig yod do cog / thams cad ni tshad mar 'gyur ba @158a * //
T11TD4221.1E:158a-2: lus dang sa gzhi la sogs pa yang tshad mar thal ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:158a-4: rjes 'gro ldog pa dag gis na //
T11TD4221.1E:158a-5: nyer mkho cig shos dag tu gnas //
T11TD4221.1E:158a-6: de med par ni mngon sum nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:158a-8: ci ste shin tu goms pa las mngon sum 'ba' zhig 'jug par byed pa mthong ba yin pas na /
T11TD4221.1E:158a-9: 'dra ba 'dzin pa'i rnam pa can gyi rjes su dpag pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:158a-11: mngon sum gyis rtogs pa 'ba' zhig dang po'i tshe 'jug par byed pa ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:158a-12: dang po ma yin kyang phyis 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:158a-13: 'di ni glen pa'i gtam yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:158a-14: gang de gang zhig yul der ni //
T11TD4221.1E:158a-15: dang po zhugs pa na byed na //
T11TD4221.1E:158a-16: dang po 'jug par mi bya ste //
T11TD4221.1E:158a-19: 'di ltar dang po 'jug pa med na /
T11TD4221.1E:158a-20: phyis kyi goms pa can gyi 'jug pa de nyid ga las yin /
T11TD4221.1E:158a-21: de'i 'og rol pa rnams kyi de'i 'og rol gyi ngo bo ni 'di kho na yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:158a-22: snga ma med na med pa nyid gang yin pa'o //
