T11TD4221.1E:158a-23: de'i phyir mngon sum dang cig shos kyi rtogs pa 'jug gi de lta ma yin na 'jug pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:158a-25: gang zhig du sogs rtags las ni //
T11TD4221.1E:158a-27: de ni mngon sum med na'ang mthong //
T11TD4221.1E:158a-28: des na de yang don med 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:158a-29: ji ltar shin tu goms pa las lkog tu gyur pa'i rtogs pa med kyang mngon sum nyid du 'jug pa de bzhin du /
T11TD4221.1E:158a-30: mngon sum gyi rtogs pa med kyang du ba la sogs pa las me la sogs pa la 'jug pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:158a-31: mngon sum de yang 'jug par byed par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:158a-33: mngon sum med par rjes dpag gis //
T11TD4221.1E:158a-34: rang don sgrub par byed ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:158a-35: de med par yang mngon sum ni //
T11TD4221.1E:158a-36: goms las 'jug par byed pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:158a-37: de phyir de la mngon sum nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:158a-38: tshad yin gang du'ang rjes dpag min //
T11TD4221.1E:158a-39: de med par yang de 'grub phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:158a-40: mngon sum nyid ni tshad ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:158a-43: goms med mngon sum tshad ma nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:158a-44: min zhes 'di la bshad zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:158a-45: de phyir 'di la rjes dpag nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:158b-0: @158b sgrub par byed pa yin zhes rtogs //
T11TD4221.1E:158b-1: gzhan tshe mkho ba med ces te //
T11TD4221.1E:158b-2: gzhan tshe'ang mkho ba med ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:158b-3: goms pa med na skye bo rnams //
T11TD4221.1E:158b-4: rjes dpag min pa gang las 'jug / mkho ba med na 'ga' zhig kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:158b-5: don du gnyer bar ji ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:158b-6: dngos po don du gnyer ba'i yul //
T11TD4221.1E:158b-7: mkho ba med par rigs ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:158b-8: ci ste mngon sum 'jug don du //
T11TD4221.1E:158b-9: rjes su dpag pa don gnyer na //
T11TD4221.1E:158b-10: rtags la mngon sum dag kyang ni //
T11TD4221.1E:158b-12: de'i phyir mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa gnyi ga yang rang gi yul la tshad ma ma yin no zhes gnas te /
T11TD4221.1E:158b-13: de nyid de ltar 'jig rten la grags pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:158b-14: ci ste de tshad ma ma yin pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:158b-15: ma yin te khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:158b-17: 'jug la mtshungs pa nyid yin yang //
T11TD4221.1E:158b-19: da ni 'jug byed cig shos kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:158b-20: rnam dbye mtshon pa med par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:158b-21: 'jug par byed pa las tshad ma nyid gzhan ni med de /
T11TD4221.1E:158b-22: des na mngon sum dang cig shos gnyis ka mtshungs par tshad ma yin pa'am /
T11TD4221.1E:158b-23: yang na 'ga' yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:158b-24: 'on te yang de la 'jug par byed pa ni mngon sum yin la 'bras bu'i rtags la sogs pa'i yul can mngon sum ma yin pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:158b-25: yod pa tsam du nye bar gnas pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:158b-26: de la 'jug par byed pa'i bya ba ni med do snyam na de yang mi bden te /
T11TD4221.1E:158b-27: de ltar rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:158b-28: de la 'jug par byed pa mngon sum nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i nges pa ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:158b-29: mngon sum la yang yod pa tsam las gzhan 'jug par byed pa nyid ni med de /
T11TD4221.1E:158b-30: thams cad rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa tsam gyis 'bras bu la nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:158b-31: 'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba tsam yin no zhes bya ba'i grub pa'i mtha' yin pa'i phyir don dam par 'ga' yang gang la yang bya ba dang bcas pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:158b-32: bya ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i don ni kun rdzob pa kho na yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:158b-35: 'dir yang rtags kyi sgrub byed kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:158b-36: mngon sum nyid kyis 'jig rten gzhan //
T11TD4221.1E:158b-37: grub phyir rtags can la gnod kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:158b-38: nged la chad pa ci zhig yod //
T11TD4221.1E:159a-1: te me la sogs pa'i yul can /
T11TD4221.1E:159a-2: rtags can gyi shes pa tshad ma ma yin yang mngon sum gyi ngo bo las /
T11TD4221.1E:159a-3: ma 'das par 'jug pa'i rtags kyi shes pa nyid kyis 'jig rten pha rol la sogs pa rtags dang rtags can yul du byas pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:159a-4: nged la chad pa ci zhig yod //
T11TD4221.1E:159a-5: rjes dpag tshad ma nyid min pa //
T11TD4221.1E:159a-7: med ltar ma gyur cig ces de //
T11TD4221.1E:159a-8: tshad ma nyid min 'gog par byed //
T11TD4221.1E:159a-9: gal te rjes su dpag pa tshad ma ma yin na de'i yul 'jig rten pha rol la sogs pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:159a-10: med par 'gyur du dogs nas kho bo cag gi rjes su dpag pa spong bar zlog par zad kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:159a-11: bsam pa gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:159a-12: gal te rjes su dpag pa'i yul 'jig rten pha rol la sogs pa'i mngon sum du ma gyur pa yang mngon sum gyi yul du byed na /
T11TD4221.1E:159a-13: rjes su dpag pa tshad mar bsgrubs pas ded la ci zhig bya /
T11TD4221.1E:159a-15: grub par 'dod pa gang yin pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:159a-16: don de gal te 'bad med par //
T11TD4221.1E:159a-17: grub na gnag gzhan don du gnyer //
T11TD4221.1E:159a-18: rnam pa gcig gis 'bad pa med par grub pa'i don la /
T11TD4221.1E:159a-19: rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i skye bo su zhig 'bad pa'i ngal ba'i snod rnams gzhan ston par byed /
T11TD4221.1E:159a-20: gal te rjes su dpag pas bsgrub par bya ba'i don /
T11TD4221.1E:159a-21: mngon sum tsam gyis grub na /
T11TD4221.1E:159a-22: de la rjes su dpag pa nye bar len pa ni ci dgos /
T11TD4221.1E:159a-24: gal te lkog kyang mngon sum las //
T11TD4221.1E:159a-27: thams cad don kun rig par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:159a-28: 'brel pa med phyir min zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:159a-29: 'o na de ni rjes dpag nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:159a-30: rjes su dpag pa smra ba pa rnams kyang 'brel pa las rtogs pa ma gtogs pa gzhan ni rjes su dpag par 'dod pa ma yin no//
T11TD4221.1E:159a-31: de'i phyir gang zhig /'dra ba'i ngo bor rtogs pa de ni spyi'i mtshan nyid kho na yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:159a-32: de ni rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyis grub pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:159a-33: 'dis ni 'bras bu'i rtags kyi yul bstan to //
T11TD4221.1E:159a-34: sgra'i yul nyid kyang sgra las byung ba'i shes pas rtogs par bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:159b-0: sgra'i shes pa @159b de nyid kyang rang la snang ba'i yul nyid rtogs par byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:159b-1: 'dis ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi yul bstan to //
T11TD4221.1E:159b-3: nye bar 'jal bas ba lang gi / dngos po 'dra ba'i nges pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:159b-4: 'dra ba de ni sgra las sngar //
T11TD4221.1E:159b-5: des ni rab tu rtogs pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:159b-6: de yi ngo bo mngon sum gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:159b-7: shes pa nyid kyis khong du chud //
T11TD4221.1E:159b-9: sgra yi shes pa'i spyod yul yin //
T11TD4221.1E:159b-10: 'di ltar 'di de dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:159b-11: 'di dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba ni don gcig pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:159b-12: de'i rjes su byed pa'i bya ba yang gnyi ga las dmigs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:159b-13: mngon sum gyis ni gnyi ga rtogs par mi nus te /
T11TD4221.1E:159b-14: des na 'dra ba ni sgra'i spyod yul du gyur pa rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis rtogs par bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:159b-15: de ni 'di dang 'dra ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:159b-16: 'di'i rnam pa de la yang mthong ba'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:159b-17: 'dra ba'i tha snyad tsam de la yang sgrub pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:159b-18: de lta bu shes pa'i rgyu mtshan du gyur pa'i rnam pa gnyis ni snga ma dang phyi ma'i mngon sum dag kho nas dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:159b-19: de'i phyir sgra'i yul ni rang gi mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:159b-20: sgra smos pas ni rnam par rtog pa nyid mtshon pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:159b-21: rnam par rtog pa yul yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T11TD4221.1E:159b-22: gang la rgyu mtshan gzhan yod pa na blo med par zhes bya ba 'dis ni mi dmigs pa 'phen pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:159b-23: gang la blo med pa de ni med pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:159b-24: de la blo 'ga' zhig la shes pa 'jug pa na /
T11TD4221.1E:159b-25: da ni gzhan la ma zhugs so zhes rtogs pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:159b-26: nges pa'i rnam pa can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:159b-27: des na thams cad du bdag nyid 'jug pa ni dmigs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:159b-28: des na mngon sum nyid kyis tha dad par smra ba'i dngos po rnam pa gnyis rtogs pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:159b-29: rtogs pa'i rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:159b-30: 'dra ba dang mi 'dra ba la sogs pa 'di thams cad ni lkog tu gyur pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:159b-31: cig shos kyi rtogs pa'i spyod yul yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:159b-32: de yang don byed pa nus pa dang mi nus pa la shes pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:159b-34: de las lkog du gyur pa las mngon sum yod pa ma yin no zhes gang smras pa de ni mi rigs te /
T11TD4221.1E:160a-0: gang la nga ni med pa @160a * //
T11TD4221.1E:160a-2: / ngas gsal mngon sum las gzhan yin //
T11TD4221.1E:160a-3: 'di tsam nyid kyi don rnams kyis //
T11TD4221.1E:160a-4: lkog gyur nyid ni nges pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:160a-5: nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:160a-6: mngon sum bdag nyid rig pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:160a-7: nges pa nyid du rtogs nyid ni //
T11TD4221.1E:160a-8: gzhan pa lkog gyur rtogs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:160a-9: lkog gyur nyid ni mngon sum gyis //
T11TD4221.1E:160a-10: rtogs kyang don gyi ngo bo ni //
T11TD4221.1E:160a-11: lkog gyur nyid de de don la //
T11TD4221.1E:160a-12: mngon sum 'jug pa yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:160a-13: mngon sum don shes med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:160a-14: lkog nyid ji ltar rig par byed //
T11TD4221.1E:160a-15: de rig na ni de yi chos //
T11TD4221.1E:160a-17: gal te lkog tu gyur pa'i don mngon sum gyis shes pa yin na de'i chos rtogs par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:160a-18: chos ni de'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:160a-19: de'i ngo bo ma yin pa ni de'i chos su mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:160a-20: de dang 'brel pa'i phyir de'i chos yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:160a-21: 'o na ni mngon sum gyis yongs su shes pa nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:160a-22: dngos po de dang 'brel pa'i chos mngon sum du rig na /
T11TD4221.1E:160a-23: lkog tu gyur pa'i dngos po nyid kyang mngon sum gyis rig par 'gyur dgos so //
T11TD4221.1E:160a-24: des na lkog tu gyur pa nyid du 'dod pa'i dngos po ni lkog tu gyur pa nyid du mi 'gyur ba des na rjes su dpag pa mi 'jug ste /
T11TD4221.1E:160a-25: mngon sum gyis gzung ba nying rjes su dpag pa'i yul du gyur pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:160a-27: rang rig pa yi mngon sum ni //
T11TD4221.1E:160a-28: lkog gyur nyid la 'jug pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:160a-29: dbang po shes pa gzhan dag ni //
T11TD4221.1E:160a-30: de yi chos can la 'jug go //
T11TD4221.1E:160a-31: gnyis rtogs na 'brel pa rtogs par 'gyur la /
T11TD4221.1E:160a-32: gnyis kyang tshad ma gcig nyid kyis ni rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:160a-33: de la rang rig pas ni don gyi chos lkog tu gyur pa nyid rtogs par 'gyur la /
T11TD4221.1E:160a-34: lkog tu gyur pa'i chos can gyi dngos po ni mngon sum gzhan dbang po'i shes pas rtogs par 'gyur la /
T11TD4221.1E:160a-35: de las ni 'brel pa rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:160a-36: des na lkog tu gyur pa nyid mngon sum gyis rtogs kyang dngos po rjes su dpag pas rtogs pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:160a-37: rjes su dpag pa mi 'jug pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:160a-39: tha dad med par gnas pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:160b-0: @160b bsgrub pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos //
T11TD4221.1E:160b-1: dngos po gzung ba med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:160b-2: rig par 'thad min bzlog pa min //
T11TD4221.1E:160b-3: dngos po dang tha mi dad pa sgrub pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos de ni /
T11TD4221.1E:160b-4: chos can dang lhan cig tshad ma gcig gis gzung bar bya ba yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:160b-5: lkog tu gyur pa nyid ni mngon sum gyi rtogs pa stong ba tsam yin pas de ni chos can 'dzin pa la mi ltos so //
T11TD4221.1E:160b-6: ci ste lkog tu gyur pa la mngon sum mi 'jug na rjes su dpag pa ji ltar 'jug ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:160b-7: 'di ni cung zad kyang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:160b-9: rjes su dpag pas dngos po de'i //
T11TD4221.1E:160b-10: lkog gyur nyid ni sgrub mi byed ;
T11TD4221.1E:160b-11: / mngon sum nyid du 'gyur na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:160b-12: mthong ba'i ngo bo sgrub pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:160b-13: gang gis de la mngon sum 'jug par 'dod pa rjes su dpag pas dngos po'i lkog tu gyur pa nyid ni mi sgrub kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:160b-14: 'on kyang 'di'i lkog tu gyur pa nyid ni rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyis grub pa yin no zhes 'di ni brjod zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:160b-15: lkog tu gyur pa nyid mngon sum gyis grub pa yin yang don gyis me la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid don byed par nus pa 'di rjes su dpag pas bsgrub par bya ba yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:160b-16: de la ni sngar mngon sum zhugs pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:160b-17: des na rjes su dpag pa 'jug pa mi 'gal lo//
T11TD4221.1E:160b-19: rjes su dpag pa de nyid kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:160b-20: ngo bo rtogs par mi nus phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:160b-21: de yi lkog tu gyur pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:160b-22: de yi shugs kyis gnas pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:160b-23: de'i ngo bo la rjes su dpag pa 'jug pa mi nus pa 'di nyid lkog tu gyur pa nyid yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:160b-24: 'di'i de yang de nyid kyi tshe 'gyur ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:160b-25: des na de la sngar tshad ma 'jug pa la mi ltos so //
T11TD4221.1E:160b-26: gang gis de la mngon sum 'jug pa la ltos par 'gyur ba lkog tu gyur pa nyid kyi sgo nas ni don du gnyer ba su yang med kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:160b-27: de ni mi 'dod kyang 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:160b-28: 'dis ni tshad mar rab tu grub pa yang gtan la phab pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:160b-29: lkog gyur dngos po grub na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:160b-31: lkog gyur dngos por grub nyid kyis //
T11TD4221.1E:160b-32: de dang 'brel par grub phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:160b-33: dngos dang 'brel pa tsam gyis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:160b-34: shes pa tshad mar brjod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:160b-35: dngos po dang ni 'brel pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:161a-2: lhag pa dag ni sngar nyid du //
T11TD4221.1E:161a-3: bstan phyir brjod par bya ba min //
T11TD4221.1E:161a-4: gal te gzhal bya gnyis ni gzhal bya nyid rnam pa gnyis yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:161a-5: gzhal bya gnyis ni rgyu yin la tshad ma gnyis ni 'bras bu yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:161a-6: des na rgyu las 'bras bu ji ltar 'grub ba ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:161a-8: gang phyir tshogs pa yod gyur na //
T11TD4221.1E:161a-10: de phyir 'bras bu rgyu las ni //
T11TD4221.1E:161a-11: mi rigs pas ni ji ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:161a-12: gal te yang gdon mi za bar rgyu ni 'bras bu dang ldan par 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bya bar rigs mod kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:161a-13: 'on kyang 'dir rgyu las 'bras bu 'grub par 'gyur ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:161a-14: gzhal bya gnyis las tshad ma gnyis thams cad kyi tshe sgrub pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang tshogs pa yod pa'i phyir ro zhes kho bo cag smra'o //
T11TD4221.1E:161a-15: tshogs pa srid pa nyid kyang phyir bstan par bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:161a-16: gzhal bya gnyis grub pas ni gdon mi za bar tshad ma gnyis 'grub pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:161a-17: gang las 'di'i nges pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu 'grub pa de nyid tshad ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:161a-18: gcig gis ni gnyis mi 'grub bo zhes bstan zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:161a-19: gang gi tshe 'di tshad ma gsum la sogs pa bsal ba'i don yin pa de'i tshe ni /
T11TD4221.1E:161a-20: yul gzhan med pas khyad par byed pa med pa'i phyir tshad ma gzhan log par bsgrub pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:161a-21: gzhal bya dang bral ba'i tshad ma ni med de /
T11TD4221.1E:161a-22: rang gi ngo bo'am gzhan gyi ngo bor gyur pa'i gzhal bya med na shes pa 'di med par 'gyur ba'i phyir gang zhig tshad ma yin /
T11TD4221.1E:161a-23: bdag nyid yod do zhes na /
T11TD4221.1E:161a-24: rang dang gzhan gyi ngo bor gzhal bya med na de nyid med par thal ba'i phyir tshad ma zhes bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:161a-25: de'i phyir rang gi ngo bos rtogs pa'i yul ni gcig yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:161a-26: de las gzhan pa ni gzhan yin no zhes bya bar gnas so //
T11TD4221.1E:161a-27: don dam don byed nus pa gang //
T11TD4221.1E:161a-28: de 'dir don dam yod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:161a-29: gzhan ni kun rdzob yod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:161a-30: de dag rang spyi'i mtshan nyid bshad //
T11TD4221.1E:161a-31: ces bya ba ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:161a-32: gal te de don byed nus pa gang yang med pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:161a-33: ji ltar don byed nus pa don dam par yod pa'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:161a-35: don byed nus pa nyid du ni //
T11TD4221.1E:161b-0: gang @161b gis gang zhig rtogs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:161b-1: shes pa dang ni shes bya dag //
T11TD4221.1E:161b-2: de ltar rtogs pa yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:161b-3: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dang shes pa dang shes bya la yang rung ste /
T11TD4221.1E:161b-4: don bya ba byed pa nyid dam don byed pa nyid du yang mngon sum ma ma rjes su dpag pas rtogs pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:161b-6: ldog pa grub pa med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:161b-7: rtag la nus pa yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:161b-8: rjes 'gro grub pa med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:161b-9: mi rtag pa la nus pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:161b-10: rjes 'gro ldog pa dag gis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:161b-11: khyab pa nus pa yin par rtogs //
T11TD4221.1E:161b-12: gnyi ga ltar yang de dag ni //
T11TD4221.1E:161b-13: ma grub nus pa ji ltar brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:161b-14: rtag pa yul thams cad du khyab pa dang 'bras bu 'ga' la yang byed pa med pa ni nus pa zhes bya ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:161b-15: gal te khyab pa dang dus thams cad du gnas pa nus pa ma yin yang /
T11TD4221.1E:161b-16: ma khyab pa dang dus gzhan du gnas pa ni yin pa nyid do snyam na /
T11TD4221.1E:161b-18: de yul khyab min gang las yin //
T11TD4221.1E:161b-19: rtogs med las yin ga la rtag //
T11TD4221.1E:161b-20: ji ltar khyab byed de ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:161b-21: de ltar de la rtag pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:161b-22: skad cig yin phyir mi rtag pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:161b-23: dngos po 'bras bu ga la yod //
T11TD4221.1E:161b-24: skad cig ma yi dngos rnams ni //
T11TD4221.1E:161b-25: dngos po tsam du rnam par gnas //
T11TD4221.1E:161b-26: gal te de yi de ma thag / gzhan yod phyir na nus par brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:161b-27: gzhan gyi'ang de ma thag yin phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:161b-29: dngos po skad cig ma kun gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:161b-30: snga ma thams cad ltos pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:161b-31: de med par yang de yod phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:161b-32: zhe na skad cig la ji ltar 'bras bu skad cig ma nyid ni de med kyang yang 'byung bar rigs pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:161b-33: de ni de nyid kyi tshe yod pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:161b-34: gzhan gyi tshe ni nam yang med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:161b-35: ci ste rgyu dang 'bras bu ni rgyun yin par brjod na /
T11TD4221.1E:161b-36: skyon 'di med do snyam na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:161b-37: rgyun ni de las tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:161b-38: yod na ni de la rgyu dang 'bras bu'i yod pa yin pas skad cig ma la nus pa med pa'i phyir med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:161b-39: 'brel pas rgyu dang 'bras bu yod pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:161b-41: tha dad pa la ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po las gzhan pa'i 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-0: rgyun de ni skad cig ma thams cad kyi de ma thag pa yin pas thams cad @162a * //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-2: de la yang sngar brjod pa /
T11TD4221.1E:162a-3: rtag pa dang skyon de nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-5: rgyun nyid de las gzhan pa dang //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-6: nus pa'ang de nyid yin 'gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:162a-7: nus pa med phyir skad rnams //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-8: med 'gyur brtags pa don med yin //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-9: de dang 'brel pas nus pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-10: gal te nus par rtogs byed na //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-11: dngos kyi nus pas stong pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-12: de ni brnyan po'i rgyan du 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-13: gal te rgyun dang cig shos dang //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-14: rgyu dang 'bras bu 'brel ba gyur pa //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-15: de lta yin na khams gsum gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-16: skad cig rnams kyi rgyun du 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-17: rgyun yang 'bras bu byed pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-18: nus las yod min de yi phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-19: rtags dang cig shos phyogs dag gi //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-20: skyon de nyid du khyed la 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-21: gal te rgyun gzhan dag tu ni //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-24: skad cig la ni 'bras bu nyid med //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-25: gang phyir 'dir yang rgyun gzhan gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-27: 'bras bu nyid kyi blo de ni //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-28: thug pa med pa'i stag gis zos //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-30: shes las gzhan pa'i 'bras bu yis //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-31: gal te rgyu ni yod 'gyur na //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-32: 'bras bu gzhan skye med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-34: des na thug pa med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-35: rtsa ba'i yod pa nyid med 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-36: shes pa'i 'bras bus thams cad kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-37: yod kyi de las gnod pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-38: 'di la'ang shes bya shes pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-39: 'bras dang ldan par gang las rig //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-40: shes bya gnyis ni shes pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-42: mdun na gnas pa nyid du ni //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-43: gnyi ga snang ba yin phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-44: shes pa 'bras bu nyid du ni //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-45: de'am gzhan gyis rtogs ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-46: mngon sum de nyid las min te //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-47: de ltar 'jug pa min phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-49: de yang snga ma las 'jug na //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-50: de ltar mthar thug nyid med pas //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-52: gal te dus mnyam nyid dag ni //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-54: khyad par med phyir snang ba yis //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-55: dus mnyam ka ba bum pa dag //
T11TD4221.1E:162a-56: der 'gyur de lta ma yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-0: gal te bum pa @162b 'ba' zhig kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-1: mthong phyir 'bras bu ma yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-2: shes pa'ang de yod ma yin par //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-3: 'jug pa mthong ba min nam ci //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-4: gal te shes te gzhan min na //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-5: des na 'khrul pa med snyam na //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-6: ka ba'ang ci phyir gzhan ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-7: ngo shes skye bar mtshungs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-8: de lta na ni rtag 'gyur na //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-9: ngo shes tshad ma nyid ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-10: snga ma phyir ma'i ngo bo dag / gcig tu rtogs pa yod min te //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-11: snga nga phyi ma'i rtogs pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-12: so sor gzung ba med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-14: 'di ni tshad ma yin ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-15: rtogs pa snga ma phyi ma dang //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-16: phan tshun 'dres pa med pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-18: gcig nyid shes par byed pa min //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-19: gal te bdag cig yod kyang des //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-20: ji ltar rig 'gyur de yang ni //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-21: mngon sum la sogs tshad ma yis //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-22: don rnams rtogs par byed pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-23: bdag la brten pa tsam gyis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-24: shes pa tshad mar mi 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-25: bdag la brten pa ma yin yang //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-26: mi slu ba las tshad ma nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-27: mthong ba phyi nas thob na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-28: tshad ma tshad ma nyid du 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-29: gal te bdag med rtag nyid du //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-30: dngos po 'di rtogs min zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-31: bdag yod na yang gang rung gi / tshad ma nyid du 'gyur ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-32: mngon sum dang ni rjes dpag dag / kho na der yang tshad ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-33: snga ma phyir ma'i ngo bor ni //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-34: bdag gam yang na gzhan gyis kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-35: bdag gzhan rtogs pa yid min pa //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-36: de las rtag pa yod mi srid //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-37: des na shes pa don gyi ni //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-38: 'bras bu nyid du rtogs ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-39: shes pa myong ba'i bdag nyid ni //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-40: bdag dang de yi rig bya rig / snga phyi bdag nyid gyu 'bras la //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-42: 'o na rjes su dpag pa las //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-43: 'bras bu'i sngon du rgyu rig pas //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-44: de las shes pa 'di skyes zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-46: rjes dpag de yang mngon sum gyis //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-47: rab tu rtogs pa med pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-48: dngos la 'jug pa yod min zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-49: sngar nyid rab tu bstan zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-50: sngon rol mngon sum tshad med na //
T11TD4221.1E:162b-51: rjes dpag tshad mar 'gyur ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-1: la sngon rol rjes dpag nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-2: yod do zhe na thug thug med 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-3: 'bras sogs gzhal bya re zhig zhog //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-4: gang la de yod de rtogs med //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-5: gzhi med skyed 'grub med pa bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-6: chos grub chos can med mi 'thad //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-7: shes pa dmigs dang bcas gyur na //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-9: gang tshe dngos po grub med pa //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-10: de tshe gang zhig rgyu 'bras yin //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-11: dmigs pa dang bcas pa nyid du ji ltar ma grub ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:163a-14: 'gyur gyi snang ba tsam gyis min //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-15: snang ba tsam gyis yin na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-16: rab rib can blo'ang der 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-17: gang zhig gang gi rgyu yin pa //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-18: de med par ni de med pas //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-19: mig sogs blo yang dmigs pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-21: zla gnyis rnam can mig sogs shes //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-22: dmigs pa med kyang skye bar mthong //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-23: de'i phyir dmigs pa'i rgyu med kyang skye bar mthong bas 'khrul pa'i phyir na dmigs pa ni rgyu yin pa dang rnam par shes pa ni 'bras bu yin par mi 'gyur bar rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-24: 'di ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:163a-25: phan tshun tha dad par gyur pa na khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i gang yin pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-26: rgyur 'dod pa med par 'bras bu 'dod pa yod na ni de de'i rgyu ma yin la 'bras bu yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-27: des na dmigs pa med pa'i phyir dngos po mtha' dag ma grub pas rgyud dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ga la yod /
T11TD4221.1E:163a-28: ci ste rgyu nyid kyis ni dmigs pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang gzung bar bya ba nyid kyis yin no snyam na /
T11TD4221.1E:163a-31: sngon po la sogs pa ma rtogs pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-32: gzung ba gzhan ni gang na'ang med //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-33: sngo sogs dag ni gang na'ang med //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-34: sngo sogs dag ni 'khrul pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-35: rnam shes la yang snang ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-36: gsal bar mdun du snang ba nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-37: 'khrul pa'ang mthong ba min nam ci //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-38: de phyir gang zhig 'khrul pa las //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-39: ma gtogs gzung ba yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-41: myong ba thams cad 'khrul pa yin no zhes bya ba de ni med de //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-43: 'khrul pa'i sems la don byed pa //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-44: 'ga' yang snang ba yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-45: de phyir 'dir ni yul med pa //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-46: 'khrul yin bzlog po gzhan du yod //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-48: don byed myong ba de las gzhan //
T11TD4221.1E:163a-49: don gyi bdag nyid yin nam ci //
T11TD4221.1E:163b-0: 'on @163b te de myong yin yang rung //
T11TD4221.1E:163b-1: de dag kun kyang yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:163b-3: de yi bya ba don gzhan na //
T11TD4221.1E:163b-4: de med pas na de med min //
T11TD4221.1E:163b-6: de yang med par 'gyur ba min //
T11TD4221.1E:163b-7: gal te don bya ba mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu med pas ni de nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:163b-8: med par 'gyur gyi rgyu yang med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ga las yin /
T11TD4221.1E:163b-9: gzhan med na gzhan med par 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:163b-10: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:163b-11: gal te 'bras bu med na 'bras bu med pa'i nus pa nyid med du chug kyang rang gi ngo bo med par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:163b-12: ci ste shes pa don bya ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:163b-13: de la yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T11TD4221.1E:163b-14: de nyid dam shes pa gzhan gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:163b-15: gal te yang skye ba'i shes pa de nyid don bya ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:163b-16: 'khrul pa la yang 'khrul pa'i shes pa yang nas yang du skye ste /
T11TD4221.1E:163b-17: 'khrul pa'i shes pa skad cig gcig kho na skye bar 'gyur dgos pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:163b-18: ci ste rig pa la sogs pa'i shes pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:163b-20: gal te gzhan skyes te de lta na yang /
T11TD4221.1E:163b-21: de yi yul nyid yod 'gyur gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:163b-22: gzhan dag myong na gzhan dag ni //
T11TD4221.1E:163b-23: dngos po yod par ci ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:163b-24: myong ba gzhan la rang myong la //
T11TD4221.1E:163b-25: yid mi chos pa gang gis zlog //
T11TD4221.1E:163b-26: de ni myong yang mi bden par //
T11TD4221.1E:163b-27: dogs par ci ltar 'gyur ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:163b-28: lus kyi myong ba mig gis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:163b-29: myong ba las khyad ci zhig yod //
T11TD4221.1E:163b-30: gal te don der tshim zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:163b-31: yongs su tshim par ga las rtog / ji ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa dmigs pa med pa de bzhin du reg pa'i rnam par shes pa yang yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:163b-32: gnyi ga yang da bang po 'i rnam par shes pa nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:163b-33: rab rib la sogs pas nyams pa srid pa ni gnyi ga la yang mtshungs te /
T11TD4221.1E:163b-34: gnyi ga la yang mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:163b-35: mkhris pa'i rims skyis nyams pa las dro bar myong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:163b-36: yongs su tshim pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:163b-37: grang ba'i dus su mkhris pa'i rigs kyis nyams pas cha bar myong ba la yang ci ste yongs su tshim pa med /
T11TD4221.1E:163b-39: myong ba tshad ma yin na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:163b-40: yongs su tshim pa don ci yod //
T11TD4221.1E:163b-41: myong ba tshad ma yin na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:163b-42: yongs su tshim pa don ci yod //
T11TD4221.1E:163b-43: gal te myong ba tshad ma yin na de nyid kyi don grub pas yongs su tshim pa gzhan gyis ci zhig bya /
T11TD4221.1E:164a-0: myong bas ma grub gang yin @164a * //
T11TD4221.1E:164a-2: / yongs su tshim pa brgya yis kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:164a-4: yongs su tshim pa sgrub byed min //
T11TD4221.1E:164a-5: myong bsal gzhan pa'i yongs su tshim pa ci dgos /
T11TD4221.1E:164a-6: don sgrub par byed do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:164a-10: yongs su tshim pa las so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:164a-11: der yang 'brel pa grub pa la ltos par bya ba yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:164a-13: gal te nyams su myong ba las so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:164a-14: de nyid las don grub pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:164a-15: yongs su tshim pa don med do //
T11TD4221.1E:164a-16: de la yang skyon de nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:164a-17: gal te nyams su myong ba las don grub na sngar nyams su myong ba las ci'i phyir ma yin /
T11TD4221.1E:164a-18: 'dis ni don du mos pa yang gsal ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:164a-20: myong ba las gzhan don du ni //
T11TD4221.1E:164a-21: mos pa don gyi sgrub byed min //
T11TD4221.1E:164a-22: mos pa nyams myong nyid yin yang //
T11TD4221.1E:164a-23: myong nyid don kun sgrub byed yin //
T11TD4221.1E:164a-24: 'dis ni mngon par 'dod pa dang dran pa dang sdang ba dang 'dod pa la sogs pa yang bshad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:164a-25: gzhan yang nyams su myong ba las mngon par 'dod pa la sogs pa yin gyi de dag las ni nyams su myong ba ma yin pa'i phyir 'di ni gyi na'o / ci ste yang nyams su myong ba thams cad dmigs pa dang bcas pa nyid du 'gyur mod kho bo cag la chad pa cung zad kyang med do //
T11TD4221.1E:164a-26: tshad ma dang tshad ma ma yin pa'i rnam par dbye ba ci ltar zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:164a-28: tshad ma cig shos rnam par gnas //
T11TD4221.1E:164a-29: rnam byed de ni ci ltar shes //
T11TD4221.1E:164a-30: gnod byed cig shos dang 'brel phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:164a-31: gang gis gnod byed cig shos dag //
T11TD4221.1E:164a-32: 'jig rten cig shos nyid du gnas //
T11TD4221.1E:164a-33: gnod dang cig shos srid phyir na //
T11TD4221.1E:164a-34: thug pa med par thal par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:164a-35: gal te thun mong ba ni 'jig rten pa yin la gzhan du ni cig shos yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:164a-36: de ni gyi na ste 'di ltar /
T11TD4221.1E:164a-37: gang phyir mngon sum rjes dpag gis //
T11TD4221.1E:164a-38: de dag rig pa yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:164a-39: mngon sum gyis rig rang nyid kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:164a-40: rig bya gzhan la de yod min //
T11TD4221.1E:164a-41: de la snang ba 'di ni gzhan la yang yin no zhes bya ba 'di la mngon sum ni mi 'jug go //
T11TD4221.1E:164a-42: rjes su dpag pas rig pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:164a-43: 'brel pa gzung ba med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:164a-44: rjes dpag skye bar ga la 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:164a-45: spu ldang sogs 'bras mthong phyir na //
T11TD4221.1E:164b-0: rang nyid mthong la @164b rjes dpag med //
T11TD4221.1E:164b-1: 'bras bu du ba mthong ba las //
T11TD4221.1E:164b-2: me de nyid ces rab sgrub min //
T11TD4221.1E:164b-3: gang phyir spyi yi yul can gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:164b-4: rjes dpag khyad par rig pa min //
T11TD4221.1E:164b-5: der du tha dad phyir zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:164b-6: spu ldang ba'ang gcig nyid ci //
T11TD4221.1E:164b-7: gcig tu mngon par zhen pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:164b-8: shes pa las gzhan rig pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:164b-9: gal te gang la ngas mig gis bltas pa de nyid la /
T11TD4221.1E:164b-10: 'dis kyang yin na zhes bya ba'i tha snyad las gcig pa nyid yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:164b-11: 'di ni rab rib kyis dmigs pa'i skra shad la sogs pa yang mtshungs pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:164b-12: de la yang rab rib can gnyis don gcig tu mngon par zhen pas mtshungs so //
T11TD4221.1E:164b-13: gzhan yang ji ltar rab rib can dmigs pa 'ga' zhig gis rig pa de ltar gzhan du yang yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:164b-14: gal te bum pa la sogs pa ni thams cad kyi rig pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:164b-16: rab rib can gyis bum pa la sogs pa rig pa yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:164b-17: gal te dbang po nyams pa yin pa'i phyir rig pa yin yang skyon med do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:164b-18: dbang po nyams pa nyid gang las shes /
T11TD4221.1E:164b-19: mi bden pa'i don rig pa las so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:164b-20: 'di ni phan tshun rten pa'i skyon du 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:164b-21: nyams pa yin na mi bden par 'gyur zhing /
T11TD4221.1E:164b-22: mi bden pa yin yang nyams pa nyid du 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:164b-23: des na gzhan gyis cung zad kyang dmigs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:164b-24: gal te mi dmigs pa nyid do zhes bya bar yang mi 'grub bo zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:164b-25: gzhan gyis dmigs par bya bas dben pa dmigs pa'i bdag nyid kyi mngon sum nyid kyis gzhan gyis dmigs par bya ba nyid 'gog pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:164b-26: gal te gzhan gyi mngon sum ni de'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir dgag par mi nus so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:164b-27: 'o na des dmigs par bya ba gzhan gyis dmigs par bya ba'o ngo bor ci ltar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:164b-28: gal te de'i ngo bo dmigs kyi gzhan gyis dmigs pa nyid du ni dmigs pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:164b-29: de'i ngo bo las gzhan gzhan gyis dmigs pa ni gang zhig yin /
T11TD4221.1E:164b-30: ci ste de'i ngo bo nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:164b-31: de'i ngo bo nyid du ci ltar ma dmigs /
T11TD4221.1E:164b-32: gzhan gyi ngo bo nyid yin na ni de gzhan gyis dmigs par ci ltar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:164b-33: dmigs par bya ba nyid gzhan gyis dmigs par ci ltar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:165a-0: dmigs par bya ba nyid gzhan gyis dmigs pa yin gyi don de nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ci ltar 'di gzhan gyis @165a * //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-2: gang zhig dmigs par bya ba nyid du dmigs pa yin la de lta na yang don ni gang gis kyang dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-3: rang rang gas dmigs par bya ba phan tshun ldog pa /
T11TD4221.1E:165a-4: 'di dag kho na rang dang gzhan dag gis dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir thun mong du dmigs pa zhes bya ba ni 'ga' yang med de /
T11TD4221.1E:165a-5: dmigs pa las tha dad pa'i don yang med pa'i phyir rang rig pa nyid yin pas 'dzin pa'i rnam par ltar gzung ba'i rnam par yang rang rig pa tsam nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-6: gang zhig nus pa'i mtshan nyid kyis yod pa nyid yin pa bsam pa phyir rol gyi don zhes bya ba ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-7: ci ste myong ba nyid phan tshun rgyu 'bras kyi dngos po yin pa'i phyir nus pa'i mtshan nyid don dam par yod pa grub pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:165a-9: rang rig tsam gyis mngon sum la //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-10: rjes su dpag pa ga la yod //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-11: lkog min rnam shes mngon sum la //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-12: gang phyir rjes su dpag 'gyur min //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-13: shes gnyis gyur 'bras dngos por yang //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-15: rang tsam rig phyir de nyid kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-16: myong ba gnyis su rig ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-17: gang tshe rgyu ni rnam par shes //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-18: de tshe 'bras rig med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-19: 'bras bu rig pa med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-20: de rgyu nyid du ci ltar 'dzin //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-21: 'bras bu'i dus su'ang de med pas ;
T11TD4221.1E:165a-23: gal te rgyu ni rjes dpag gis //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-24: yongs su shes par 'dod na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-25: de tshe rjes dpag gis ma shes //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-26: da ltar shes par ci ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-27: sngar ni mngon sum gyis shes shing //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-28: da ltar rjes dpag las yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:165a-29: shes de da ltar yod min na //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-30: ji ltar rjes dpag las rig 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-31: snga ma nyid du rjes dpag na //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-32: mngon sum gyis rig med phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-33: de la rjes su dpag pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-34: rig 'gyur snga nyid bla lhag med //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-35: snga ma nyid ni yod min te //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-36: mngon sum gyis ni gnod phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-37: de phyir snga dang phyir mar ni //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-38: ji ltar bu yang myong ba med //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-39: dran ba tsam zhig der yod de //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-40: rang rig phyir na de tshad med //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-41: rang tsam rab tu rig pa yang //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-42: de rang rig las mngon sum yin //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-43: de phyir gzhan gyi 'bras bur ni //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-44: des de rig pa yod pa ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-45: de phyir shes dang shes bya dag //
T11TD4221.1E:165a-46: nus pa nyid du 'grub pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:165b-1: yod med nyid du rtogs pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:165b-2: med pa rta yi rva nyid las //
T11TD4221.1E:165b-3: rgyu nyid cung zad yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:165b-4: gal te gzhan nas med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:165b-5: de la rgyu mi 'dod ce na //
T11TD4221.1E:165b-7: de yang med nyid lan gdab dka' //
T11TD4221.1E:165b-8: yod na sngon med ci ltar yin //
T11TD4221.1E:165b-9: de ni med na'ang ci ltar 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:165b-10: med par ri bong rva la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:165b-11: snga ma med pa yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:165b-12: mthong ba sngon med yin zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:165b-13: phan tshun rten par 'gyur ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:165b-14: ji srid sngon med nyid min pa //
T11TD4221.1E:165b-16: ji srid 'di dang snga na med pa dang 'brel pa ma yin pa de srid du ni skye ba ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:165b-17: ji srid skye ba ma yin pa de srid du yang snga na med pa nyid de ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:165b-18: gal te 'bras bus stong ba'i rgyu nyid snga na med pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:165b-20: stong nyid de ni rgyu ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:165b-21: gzhan pa dag la'ang med dam ci //
T11TD4221.1E:165b-22: des na de dang yang 'bral pas //
T11TD4221.1E:165b-24: 'bras bu nyid ni snga na med pa dang 'brel pas yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:165b-25: snga na med pa de yang 'bras bus stong pa'i don gzhan yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:165b-26: des na rgyur mngon par 'dod pa las gzhan dag kyang /
T11TD4221.1E:165b-27: snga na med pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:165b-28: de dang yang 'brel pas 'bras bur gyur pa'i dngos po ni de'i yang 'bras bur 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:165b-29: de'i rjes su 'gro ldog gi rjes su byed pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:165b-31: snga na med pa zhes bya ba mngon sum la sogs pa'i tshad mas gzung bar bya ba ni med de /
T11TD4221.1E:165b-32: rgyu dang 'bras bu dag gi rang gi ngo bo tsam zhig gzung ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:165b-33: gal te snga na med pa ni rgyu'i rang bzhin nyid yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:165b-34: 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yang de ltar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:165b-35: 'bras bu gzhan la ltos na de yang 'gyur ba nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:165b-36: rgyur mngon par 'dod pa la ltos nas kyang ci ste mi 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:165b-37: de ltar rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:165b-38: dngos po la mi ltos pa'i rtogs pa tsam la su yid ches /
T11TD4221.1E:165b-39: de phyir tshad yod dngos po yi //
T11TD4221.1E:165b-41: de la 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa //
T11TD4221.1E:165b-42: gzhan ni 'dzin pa yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:165b-43: sngon po la sogs pa dang 'bras bu nyid du ni po gang gis gzung ba med de /
T11TD4221.1E:166a-0: sngon po la sogs pa las tha dad pa'i 'bras bu nyid ni rtogs pa med pa'i @166a * //
T11TD4221.1E:166a-2: snga ma dang phyi ma'i dngos po la mngon sum mi 'jug pa'i phyir snga na med pa la sogs pa 'dzin par ga la 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:166a-3: ci ste yang yod pa nyid 'bras bu yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:166a-4: rgyu rnams kyi byed pa ni 'bras bu yod pa la srid pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:166a-5: med na ni yul med pa'i phyir ci ltar byed pa yin zhe na ;
T11TD4221.1E:166a-7: bltas mnyan de ste shes byas nas //
T11TD4221.1E:166a-8: rgyu yis 'bras bu byed dam ci //
T11TD4221.1E:166a-9: blun phyir rang bzhin de 'dra ba //
T11TD4221.1E:166a-10: rgyu la rag las yin par 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:166a-11: gal te dbang phyug rgyu yin yang //
T11TD4221.1E:166a-12: de ni rgyu yin sbyor byed yin //
T11TD4221.1E:166a-13: gang phyir dbang po las 'das blo //
T11TD4221.1E:166a-14: med pa shes par mi 'dod min ;
T11TD4221.1E:166a-17: ci thams cad thams cad la yod pa zhes bya ba grangs can gyi 'dod pa la brten nas yod pa nyid mthong bar zad kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu zhes bya ba'i dngos po ma yin pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:166a-18: ci ga med pa nyid la brten nas 'gro ba'i rgyu dbang phyug gis rgyu rnams so sor nges pa la sbyar //
T11TD4221.1E:166a-19: 'bras bu snga na yod na ci thams cad kyi dmigs par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'gro ba 'chol bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:166a-20: dmigs par byed pa so sor nges pa'i phyir de ltar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yang gyi na ste /
T11TD4221.1E:166a-21: dmigs par byed pa yang thams cad thams cad kyi tshe yod pa'i phyir so sor nges pa ci yod //
T11TD4221.1E:166a-25: med pa'i rgyu las 'bras skye zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:166a-26: bya ba legs par gnas pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:166a-27: zhig nas med pa dang gtan nas med pa la khyad par ci zhig yod //
T11TD4221.1E:166a-28: gal te sngon yod pa myong ba'i dus na rgyu yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:166a-29: gang gi tshe yod par gyur pa de'i tshe rgyu ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:166a-30: gzhan gyi tshe ni rgyu yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni legs par smras pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:166a-32: med pa rgyu nyid yin 'gyur gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:166a-33: gang zhig yod de rgyu ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:166a-34: de dang 'di dag rnams la yang ;
T11TD4221.1E:166a-35: / byed par srid pa mthong ba med //
T11TD4221.1E:166a-36: gal te byed pas rgyu yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:166a-37: byed pa de nyid gang las 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:166a-38: byed can don las yin zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:166a-39: der ci byed pa gzhan yod dam //
T11TD4221.1E:166a-40: gal te de la'ang byed yod dam //
T11TD4221.1E:166a-41: gal te de la'ang byed yod na //
T11TD4221.1E:166a-42: don te chod par 'gyur ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-1: de ltar de bzhin yun ring du //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-2: lon yang 'bras bu cis mi skye //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-4: de srid bar du su zhig 'tsho //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-5: de ste rang bzhin byed pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-7: byed pa'i dus su 'bras yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-8: dus mtshungs par ni thal bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-9: gal te rgyu yod dus su ni //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-10: 'bras bu yod pa min zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-11: gang zhig zhig ma thag pa dag //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-12: de lta yin na khyad med 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-13: de yi de ma thag byung ba //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-14: skye ba'i dus su yod ce na //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-15: skye ba 'bras bu las gzhan min //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-17: ci yang yin smra sun phyung bas //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-18: phyogs gnyis la yang bzlog pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-19: brjod par bya ba mang 'gyur ram //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-20: de phyir da ni 'phro bcad do //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-21: ci ste yang shes pa'i rgyu ni don yin no zhes rjes su dpag pas sngar ma rig pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:166b-23: mngon sum la ni snang gyur pa //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-24: rjes su dpag pas sngar rig pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-25: phan tshun 'dre ba med pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-26: de yi 'bras bu ji ltar rtogs //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-27: gal te rjes su dpag pas rtogs pa sngar byung bar rtogs su bcug kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-28: de mngon sum gyi shes pa'i rgyu yin no zhes gang gis rtogs par byed //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-29: rjes su dpag pa ni mngon sum gyis mthong ba'i dngos po ni mngon sum gyi rgyu yin no zhes rtogs par byed pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-30: nyams su myong ba nyid la ni rjes su dpag pas 'jug pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:166b-31: de'i yul ni lkog tu gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-32: rjes su dpag par bya ba la mngon sum 'jug pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:166b-33: de'i yul ni lkog tu ma gyur pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-34: rtogs pas gyur pa nyid ni lkog tu gyur pa yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-35: lkog tu gyur pa nyid du rtogs pa ni lkog tu gyur pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:166b-38: rang gi ngo bo rtogs na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-39: 'di la lkog gyur gzhan ci yod //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-40: rnam pa mi gsal snang yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-41: mngon sum de ltar snang mi 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-42: rang bzhin gnyis ni rig pa'i tshe //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-43: mngon sum gnyis su 'dod pa yin ;
T11TD4221.1E:166b-44: / dper na ka sogs tshu rol dang //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-45: pha rol ngo bor rig tshul gyis //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-46: gang gi tshe don de gsal ba dang mi gsal ba'i rang bzhin du gyur pa //
T11TD4221.1E:166b-47: de'i tshe de mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dang gis rig pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:167a-0: ka ba la sogs pa'i tshu rol dang pha rol la sogs pa gzung ba @167a * //
T11TD4221.1E:167a-1: bzhin du mngon sum gyi rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur la rag go //
T11TD4221.1E:167a-2: 'on te gsal ba dang mi gsal ba ni khyad par gzhan gyi dbang gis yin gyi don gyi rang bzhin ni sngon po nyid yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:167a-3: gal te khyad par tha dad pas //
T11TD4221.1E:167a-4: rang bzhin gzhan du rig 'gyur na //
T11TD4221.1E:167a-5: rang gi rang bzhin rig med phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:167a-6: kun tshe mngon sum nyid mi 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:167a-7: ci ste sngo sogs rig pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:167a-8: mngon sum nyid du brjod na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:167a-9: rang gi rang bzhin rig pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:167a-10: rjes dpag nyid kyang mngon sum 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:167a-11: dbang po dang ni bral bas na //
T11TD4221.1E:167a-12: rjes dpag mngon sum min zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:167a-13: dbang po dang ni ldan pas yang //
T11TD4221.1E:167a-14: rjes su dpag pas ces mi dpog / dbang po dang bral ba nyid kyis mi 'grub ste /
T11TD4221.1E:167a-15: de'i rjes su dpag pa rang gi ngo bor rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:167a-16: 'on te dngos po med pa yin pa'i phyir dbang po dang 'du ba med do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:167a-17: dngos po'i rang bzhin 'dzin pa'i rjes su dpag pas rtogs pa med par ji ltar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:167a-18: med do zhe na yang rjes su dpag pas dngos po'i rang bzhin ji ltar 'dzin /
T11TD4221.1E:167a-19: ci ste dbang po dang 'brel par rjes su dpag pa ma yin pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:167a-21: rjes su dpog pa do ma med yin //
T11TD4221.1E:167a-22: blta min reg par bya min pa //
T11TD4221.1E:167a-23: de la 'jug pa don med nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:167a-24: mkho ba don du gnyer ba rjes su dpag pa'i don la 'jug pa yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:167a-25: 'jug par byed pa yang tshad ma nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:167a-26: des na 'jug par byed pa ma yin pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:167a-27: tshad ma ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:167a-28: ci ste phyis dbang po dang 'brel par 'gyur ba rjes su dpog pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:167a-29: des ni de'i tshe dbang po dang 'brel pa med pas mngon sum nyid ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:167a-32: snga ma'i rang bzhin ma rtogs pas //
T11TD4221.1E:167a-33: rgyu nyid du ni mi rtogs pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:167a-34: rjes su dpag pa don med yin //
T11TD4221.1E:167a-35: de nyid tshe na gzhal bya dang //
T11TD4221.1E:167a-36: 'jal byed ngo bor yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:167a-37: de tshe nyid kyi gzhal bya dang //
T11TD4221.1E:167a-38: 'jal byed da ltar byung bar brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:167a-39: de'i tshe rang gi ngo bor snang ba las gzhan da ltar byung ba nyid ni ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:167a-40: rang gi ngo bor snang ba nyid da ltar byung ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:167a-41: gal te 'das pa la sogs pa'i ngo bor snang bas da ltar byung ba nyid ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:167b-0: @167b rjes su dpag pas 'das pa'i rang bzhin nyid du ji ltar rtogs /
T11TD4221.1E:167b-1: 'di ltar mngon sum gyis sum gyis ma rtogs pa la ni rjes su dpag pa 'jug pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:167b-2: mngon sum yang 'das pa'i rang bzhin la 'jug pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:167b-3: gang gi tshe de mngon sum gyis mthong ba de'i tshe ni 'das pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:167b-4: gal te da ltar 'das pa'i rang bzhin yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:167b-5: 'o na ni de gzhan nyid skyes pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:167b-6: de la yang mngon sum med pa'i phyir ji ltar rjes su dpog gang yang phyis mngon sum du 'gyur ba de ni 'byung ba'i rang bzhin nyid du mngon sum ma yin pa'i phyir de la rjes su dpag pa'i skabs med par mtshungs so //
T11TD4221.1E:167b-7: gal te 'di ci khyed la yang mtshungs pa ma yin nam //
T11TD4221.1E:167b-8: gzhan la yang mngon sum las de ltar rtogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ji ltar de'i rnam par snang zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:167b-10: de ni bag chags kyi stobs kyis de ltar snang ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:167b-12: don la brten nas 'byung ba'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:167b-13: de yi ngo bo rjes byed phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:167b-14: de ni cha 'ga' zhig gis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:167b-15: gzhan las kyang ni tha dad 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:167b-17: des na shes pa de ni rgyud nas don las skyes pa yin la //
T11TD4221.1E:167b-18: bag chags dang 'brel pas ni rnam pa gzhan du yang snang ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:167b-19: dper na rab rib la sogs pas zla ba gnyis la sogs pa snang ba bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:167b-20: des na 'das pa'i dus nyid kyi rang bzhin las 'ongs pa'i phyir 'das pa nyid du zhen pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:167b-21: des na 'das pa'i dus nyid du 'dzin pa'i phyir 'das pa nyid yin zhing de yang med pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:167b-22: de ni da ltar ba nyid la ni tshad ma ma yin no ;
T11TD4221.1E:167b-24: yod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:167b-25: ji ltar yod pa nyid yin //
T11TD4221.1E:167b-26: mthong ba'i rtags des rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:167b-27: de'i sgo nas shes pa yang der 'jug par byed pa yin pas tha snyad rdzogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:167b-28: gal te shes pas don ma rtogs na ji ltar 'jug par byed pa yin zhe na ;
T11TD4221.1E:167b-30: gal te du ba 'ba' zhig kyang rnam par 'jog par byed par 'gyur ro zhen //
T11TD4221.1E:167b-31: ji ltar rnam par 'jog par byed pa yin par mthong ba de ltar rnam par 'jog par byed pa yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin pas klan ka med do //
T11TD4221.1E:167b-33: shes pa de ni rang bzhin dang //
T11TD4221.1E:168a-2: de la don du zhen pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:168a-3: nges par bag chags stobs kyis yin //
T11TD4221.1E:168a-4: de'i phyir snga ma nyid du rtogs pa de ni da lta yod pa yin no zhes bya bar ni shes pa des mi rtogs so //
T11TD4221.1E:168a-5: rang bzhin gang zhig da ltar yod pa de mi mthong ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:168a-6: des na mi mthong ba nyid ni lkog tu 'gyur ba yin la de ni lkog tu gyur to zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:168a-7: rtogs pa med pa nyid ni lkog tu gyur pa nyid du rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:168a-8: lkog gyur don gyi rang bzhin nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:168a-9: yin na de ni mngon sum nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:168a-10: de la rjes dpag 'jug min zhing //
T11TD4221.1E:168a-11: the tshom 'brel pa'ang yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:168a-12: zhig na rnam pa de lta bu'i ;
T11TD4221.1E:168a-14: shes don dag kyang gcig nyid min //
T11TD4221.1E:168a-15: de phyir don de yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:168a-16: de'i phyir gal te rjes su dpag pa don 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin yin na mig la sogs pa dang 'brel pa yang rjes su dpag par bya ba yin par 'gyur bas mngon sum gyi don nyid rjes su dpag par bya bar 'gyur la //
T11TD4221.1E:168a-17: de ltar yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:168a-18: des na lkog tu gyur pa'i don gyi yul can gyi shes pa ni don 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:168a-19: de'i phyir rjes su dpag pas rtogs pa ni rgyu'i dngos pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:168a-20: de'i phyir na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:168a-22: gal te thams cad nus med na //
T11TD4221.1E:168a-25: sa bon sogs ni myug sogs la //
T11TD4221.1E:168a-26: nus mthong zhes bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:168a-27: 'di ltar sa bon las ni myu gu skye ba mthong zhes rnam par dbye ba med par 'jig rten pa'i rtogs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:168a-28: de nyid phyir na mthong ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:168a-29: gang la 'di ni bdag gis mthong ba'o snyam du rtogs pa de nyid rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:168a-30: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po 'di bdag gis mthong ngo zhes lhag par mos pa yang yod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:168a-31: des na gnod pa med pa'i lhag par mos pa srid pa'i phyir gzhan du 'gyur bar dgos par byas pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:168a-33: dngos ; di bdag gis dran snyam las //
T11TD4221.1E:168a-34: mos pa'i rnam pa gzhan yod min //
T11TD4221.1E:168a-35: dran pa dngos dang 'brel par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:168a-36: rtogs pa yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:168a-37: re zhig mngon sum gyis rtogs pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:168a-38: dran pa mngon sum ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:168b-0: rang rig pas ni dran pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid tsam mngon @168b du byed pa yin gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:168b-1: dngos po dang 'brel par ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:168b-2: sngar gyi mngon sum yang dran pa la 'jug pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:168b-4: 'di bdag gis dran no snyam pa'i shes pa gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa yang yod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:168b-5: de'i phyir lhag par mos pa nyid thams cad du rnam par gzhag pa thams cad kyi sgrub byed yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:168b-7: gal te de kun rdzob 'dod na /
T11TD4221.1E:168b-9: dngos po'i de kho na rnam par 'jog pa'i tshad ma med na /
T11TD4221.1E:168b-10: thog ma med pa'i tha snyad goms pa las byung ba'i lhag par mos pa tsam gang yin pa de ni kun rdzob kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:168b-11: kun rdzob kyi don ni ma brtags na nyams dga' ba'i yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:168b-12: dper na lha sbyin la sogs pa 'ga' zhig ma mthong yang mthong bar rlom pa de ni rnam par dpyad pas ldog pa de bzhin du //
T11TD4221.1E:168b-14: 'di don dam pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:168b-15: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad thams cad kyang de lta bu nyid yin pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:168b-16: thams cad kun rdzob tsam yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:168b-17: tshad ma med par rtogs par rlob pa tsan ni kun rdzob yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:168b-19: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rtogs pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:168b-20: rjes 'gro ldog pa dag las yin //
T11TD4221.1E:168b-21: mngon sum de bzhin rjes dpag gis //
T11TD4221.1E:168b-22: tshad ma de la yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:168b-23: mngon sum mi dmigs pa dag las //
T11TD4221.1E:168b-24: rjes 'gro ldog pa rtogs pa gang //
T11TD4221.1E:168b-25: gal te rjes dpag las yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:168b-26: phan tshun rten par 'gyur ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:168b-27: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag mngon dum 'ba' zhig gis mi 'dzin pa'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po sgrub par byed pa ni mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa yin par brjod do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:168b-29: phan tshun rten pa'i nyes par thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:168b-30: rjes su 'gro ba mngon sum gyis 'dzin pa ni ma yin no /
T11TD4221.1E:168b-31: 'di yod na 'di 'byung ngo zhes bya ba de lta bu rnam pa ni mngon sum gyi bya ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:168b-32: gnyis 'dzin pa tsam gyi bya ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:168b-33: 'di'i de ma thag tu mthong ba 'di ni 'di las byung ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:168b-34: zhes bya ba 'di ni mngon sum yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:168b-35: 'di ltar 'di nyid las 'byung ba'am 'di las 'byung ba nyid dam //
T11TD4221.1E:168b-36: 'di las kyang 'byung ba zhes 'di tsam zhig 'dir rnam par brtag par bya ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:169a-1: gzhan mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:169a-2: gal te 'di nyid las 'byung ba zhes bya ba yin na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:169a-3: shugs kyis gzhan las mi 'byung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'dir 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:169a-4: de la yang rnam par rtogs pa gnyis te //
T11TD4221.1E:169a-5: de'i tshe'am 'on te gzhan gyi tshe yin //
T11TD4221.1E:169a-6: gal te de'i tshe 'di nyid las yin no zhes 'dod na /
T11TD4221.1E:169a-7: 'on ni gzhan gyi tshe ni gzhan las yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:169a-8: da ltar yang yul gzhan du gzhan las mi 'byung ngo zhes gang las yin //
T11TD4221.1E:169a-9: de lta bu ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:169a-10: nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:169a-11: 'di las 'byung ba nyid do zhes nges par 'byung ba yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:169a-12: dus gzhan du res 'ga' mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:169a-13: des na mngon sum gyis ni rgyu dang 'bras bu rtogs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:169a-14: 'di las kyang 'byung la gzhan las kyang 'byung ba yin no zhes bya ba phyogs 'di la ni rang nyid kho nas 'khrul pas khas blangs pa'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por mi 'gyur ro zhes bstan par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:169a-15: des na phyogs 'di yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:169a-16: ci ste de med na med pa'i phyir ro zhes mi dmigs pa la rtogs so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:169a-17: de ltar gyur na yang gcig la gcig brten pa'i nyes pa yod do //
T11TD4221.1E:169a-19: gcig mi dmigs pa mngon sum las //
T11TD4221.1E:169a-20: gzhan nam de bzhin gzhan ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:169a-21: mngon sum las ni gzhan min na //
T11TD4221.1E:169a-22: ming tsam sgrub byed yin par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:169a-23: rjes su dpag pa nyid du ni //
T11TD4221.1E:169a-25: gang phyir rjes 'gro ldog pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:169a-26: 'brel la rjes su dpog phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:169a-27: gal te mi dmigs pa mngon sum nyid yin na ni mngon sum la brjod pa'i skyon de nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:169a-28: de ste rjes su dpag pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:169a-29: de'i 'brel pa ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las 'jug pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:169a-30: de'i phyir rjes su dpag pa med na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa 'dzin ba dang ldog ba 'dzin pa med la /
T11TD4221.1E:169a-31: de med na yang rjes su dpag pa 'jug pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:169a-32: rjes su dpag pa thug pa med par yang 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:169a-33: 'on te dngos po med pa'i tshad mas de med na med par 'dzin pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:169a-36: yul dang dus nye ba can dag gis dngos po med par rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:169b-0: gzhan dag ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo ni dpyod pa'i tshad mas rtogs @169b par bya ba yin no zhes smra ste /
T11TD4221.1E:169b-1: 'brel pa mthong ba med par lkog tu gyur pa rtogs pa ni dpyod pa'o zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:169b-2: 'di ltar me dang du ba dag gis nges pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo ni de yod na yod par dmigs pa las yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:169b-3: de yod na yod pa de dang rgyu dang bras bu 'brel par ni dmigs pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:169b-4: gang gi phyir de las 'byung ba yin pa de'i phyir 'di ni de'i 'bras bu yin no zhes 'jig rten pas rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:169b-5: des na de'i 'bras bur rtogs pa ni dpyod pas yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:169b-6: yang na don gyis go bas de'i 'bras bu nyid du rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:169b-7: gal te 'di de'i 'bras bu ma yin na ni de las 'byung ba nyid du mi 'thad do zhes ma mthong ba'i don rtogs pa ni don gyis go ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:169b-9: gal te rgyu dang 'bras bu yin //
T11TD4221.1E:169b-10: rtogs pa'ang mthong ba yod na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:169b-11: dpyod pa'ang don gyis go ba las //
T11TD4221.1E:169b-12: rtogs so zhes ni mthong bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:169b-13: de las 'byung ba ma rtogs pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:169b-14: rgyu 'bras nyid ni mthong ba med //
T11TD4221.1E:169b-15: de la'ang skyon ni sngar brjod do //
T11TD4221.1E:169b-16: nges par 'dzin pa med phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:169b-17: gal te rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por rtogs pa'i yul srid ni //
T11TD4221.1E:169b-18: dpyod pa'am gzhan las de rtogs par 'gyur ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:169b-19: de ni de las yod pa las rang bzhin gzhan brtson pa dang ldan pas kyang rtogs pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:169b-20: nges par de las 'byung ba yin no zhes bya bar ni gang las kyang rtogs pa med de //
T11TD4221.1E:169b-21: dus de srid tsam zhig de las 'byung bar rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:169b-22: de ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:169b-23: gal te nges pa ni dpyod pa'am //
T11TD4221.1E:169b-24: don gyis go ba las rtogs pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:169b-25: gang gi phyir de ltar de'i de ma thag par dmigs pa de'i phyir gzhan gyi tshe yang 'di ni de nyid las yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:169b-26: de lta ma yin na de nyid kyi tshe yang mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:169b-28: gal te ltar de las dmigs su chug kyang gzhan gyi tshe yang yin no zhes bya bar ga las yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:169b-29: de lta bu kho nar rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:169b-30: 'o na bum pa yang snam bu'i de ma thag tu dmigs pa de'i phyir de la yang de ltar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:169b-31: de la ni 'khrul ba mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:169b-32: 'o na ni 'di nyid kyis de la yang yid brtan du med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:170a-0: @170a * // yid mi ches pa'i rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:170a-1: ring po mthong ba ma yin pa rnams kyi de ni yang nas yang du mthong ba las yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:170a-2: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad ni de lta bu nyid yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:170a-3: nus pa kun rdzob tu rtogs zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:170a-4: bya ba de nyid 'ongs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:170a-5: de nyid don ni ma brtags pas //
T11TD4221.1E:170a-6: rtogs pa kun rdzob yin par 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:170a-7: ci ste dus gzhan du de'i 'bras bu de ni 'di nyid yin no zhes ngo shes pa las snga ma nyid 'bras bur rtogs pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:170a-8: de lta ma yin na ngo shes pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:170a-10: ngo shes sngar gyi mthong ba dang //
T11TD4221.1E:170a-12: dpyod pa'am don gyis go ba las //
T11TD4221.1E:170a-13: zhe na sngar 'di sun phyung zin //
T11TD4221.1E:170a-14: ci ste dran pa las yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:170a-16: kho bo sa mthong ba de nyid ni //
T11TD4221.1E:170a-17: dran zhes de ltar rtogs phyir ro / dran pa'am nyams su myong ba dang //
T11TD4221.1E:170a-19: dran pa ni chad ma ma yin pas de grub pa ni kun rdzob tu grub pa yin zhes /
T11TD4221.1E:170a-20: de ltar dogs pa bsu nas /
T11TD4221.1E:170a-24: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad 'khrugs pa med pa ni de kho na ltar yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:170a-25: don dam pa ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad la nye bar sbyar ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:170a-26: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad la skur bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:170a-27: mos pa'i rnam par dbye ba tsam gyis nges pa grub pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:170a-28: rmi lam gyi tha snyad nges pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:170a-29: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi rgyu ni thog ma med pa nges pa'i bag chags 'ba' zhig lus pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:170a-30: de lta ma yin na dmigs pa dang bcas pa dang dmigs pa med pa'i shes pa la sogs pa'i rnam par byed pa thams cad mi 'grub pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:170a-31: yang gang dag kun rdzob ces bya ba 'di ci zhig yin zhing /
T11TD4221.1E:170a-32: kun rdzob kyi bden pa yang gang yin /
T11TD4221.1E:170a-33: bden na kun rdzob de ji ltar //
T11TD4221.1E:170a-34: log pa yin na bden gang lags //
T11TD4221.1E:170a-35: brdzun don dam pa'i don dag la //
T11TD4221.1E:170a-36: bden nyid thun mong yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:170a-37: kun rdzob kyang yin la bden pa yang yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni 'gal lo zhes zer ro //
T11TD4221.1E:170a-39: kun rdzob ces bya ba ni thog ma med pa'i bag chags las byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i shes pas mos pa tsam yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:170b-0: des na don ni thog ma med pa'i bag chags @170b kyi stobs las byung ba 'ba' zhig snang ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:170b-1: sngon po la sogs pa ni rmi lam snang ba bzhin du bden pa ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:170b-2: rnam par shes pa yang de las tha dad pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:170b-3: des na de kho na nyid ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:170b-4: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad chad pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:170b-5: des na nye bar mkho bas na bden ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:170b-6: de ltar na kun rdzob kyi bden pa zhes bya bar mi 'gal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:170b-7: des na don dam par na bdag nyid thams cad dben pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:170b-8: phyir rol gyi don dang ni shes pa lhan cig rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa rtogs pa med kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:170b-9: 'on kyang bag chags nyid kyi rgyu yin par rmi lam gyi snang ba rtogs pa yin pas //
T11TD4221.1E:170b-10: gzhan yang de bzhin du 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:170b-11: de'i rigs can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:170b-12: yang na skye ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid kun rdzob yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:170b-13: tshad mas yongs su bcad pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:170b-14: de'i tshe kun rdzob tu skye ba zhes bya ba ni skye ba la sogs pa ni tshad mas yongs su ma bcad pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T11TD4221.1E:170b-15: ci ste kun rdzob ces bya ba ni bdag nyid thams cad den pa yin pa'i phyir nus pa med pa yin la //
T11TD4221.1E:170b-16: skye ba zhes bya ba ni nus pa yin pas 'di ni 'gal ba yin no zhes bya ba de yang mi bden te /
T11TD4221.1E:170b-17: kun rdzob ces bya ba ni don dam par nus pa med pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:170b-18: de ltar ni skye ba yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:170b-19: skye ba zhes bya ba ni tshad ma dang bral ba'i phyir grags pa tsam du nus pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:170b-20: de ltar ni skye ba yin pa kho na'o /
T11TD4221.1E:170b-21: skye ba skye'o zhes bya ba'i skyon du yang mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:170b-22: rang bzhin gang gi skyes pa de kho nas nus pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:170b-23: gang gi rang bzhin du skyes she na /
T11TD4221.1E:170b-24: kun rdzob tu yin gyi don dam par ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T11TD4221.1E:170b-25: de bzhin du kun rdzob ming tsam byed pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:170b-26: tshad mas rtogs pa la de skad du brjod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:170b-27: gang yang rgyu dang 'bras bu dag mtshungs pa yin zhes bya ba de la //
T11TD4221.1E:170b-28: rgyu las ni 'bras bu skad cig gnyis pa las skye ba yin no zhes bya ba 'byin pa de yang mi bden te /
T11TD4221.1E:170b-29: 'das pa nyid du ni 'das nas yun ting du lon pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:170b-30: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:170b-31: 'das nas yun ring du lon pa ni skye ba'i dus na med pa'i phyir la //
T11TD4221.1E:171a-0: 'das ma thag pa ni bzlog pa yin pa'i phyir ro @171a * //
T11TD4221.1E:171a-2: skye ba'i dus te gang yin /
T11TD4221.1E:171a-3: gal te 'byung ba'i dus yin na ni de'i tshe 'byung ba 'byung ba po las tha mi dad pas rgyu dang 'bras bu dus mtshungs pa de nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:171a-4: 'on te 'byin pa'i dus na yod pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:171a-5: 'byin pa de ni 'byin par byed pa po'i byed pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:171a-6: des na 'byin par byed pa'i dus zhes byas pa de'i tshe rgyu'i dus na yod pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:171a-7: de'i phyir chod pa yang rgyur 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:171a-8: de yang rang gi dus na yod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:171a-9: skad cig gis dngos po thams cad kyang de'i tshe yod pas rgyur thal bas na ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:171a-10: rgyud tha dad pa'i phyir mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:171a-11: 'di ni phan tshun rten pa'i nyes par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:171a-12: rgyu ma yin pa nyid yin na rgyud tha dad pa yin yang /
T11TD4221.1E:171a-13: rgyud tha dad pa nyid yin na yang rgyu ma yin pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:171a-14: rgyu yang yin la rgyud tha dad pa yang yin no zhes bya ba ni 'gal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:171a-15: ma brtags pa'i don ni kun rdzob kyi don yin no zhes gang bshad pa yang /
T11TD4221.1E:171a-16: brtags pa ni tshad ma la brjod kyi rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:171a-17: des na tshad ma grags pa'i don yin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T11TD4221.1E:171a-18: sgyu ma'i don yang 'di nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:171a-19: 'jig rten la grags pa'i don zhes bya ba la /
T11TD4221.1E:171a-20: 'jig rten gyi grags pa ni ma brtags na nyams dga' ba yin te des na skyon med do //
T11TD4221.1E:171a-21: bstan bcos byed pa'i grags pa ni tha snyad du byed pa ma yin pas de ni 'dir mi gzung ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:171a-22: 'di skad du yang kun rdzob kyi bden pa gang zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:171a-23: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad ji snyed pa ste zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:171a-24: tshad ma dang tshad ma ma yin pa'i rnam par dbye ba yang kun rdzob kho na ste /
T11TD4221.1E:171a-25: 'di ltar tshad ma ni slu ba med pa can yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:171a-26: mi slu ba yang nye bar bstan pa'i don thob pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:171a-27: thob pa yang nyams su myong ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:171a-28: gal te don nyams su myong ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:171a-29: phyis kyang de nyid yin pas ci'i phyir thob pa don du gnyer bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:171a-30: des na blo thams cad tshad ma ma yin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:171a-31: 'on te phyis rtogs pa de ni gzhan yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:171a-32: des bstan pa ni ma yin pas na /
T11TD4221.1E:171a-33: de thob pa ni tshad mar 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:171a-34: de ltar na thams cad tshad mar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:171b-0: ci ste nye bar bstan pa la cung zad nye bar ma bstan pa yod de des na de thob pas tshad @171b ma nyid do zhe na de yang mi bden te /
T11TD4221.1E:171b-1: ma bstan pa la tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:171b-3: de'i phyir don dam par cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin pas kun rdzob tu ji lta ba de ltar yin du zad do //
T11TD4221.1E:171b-4: 'di tsam gyis kyang tshad ma dang chad ma ma yin pa'i rnam par gzhag pa yin pas kho bo cag la chad pa cung zad kyang med do //
T11TD4221.1E:171b-5: khyod kyi phyogs na kho bo cag gi 'dod pa nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:171b-6: des na dngos po'i de kho na nyid las 'da' bar mi nus so //
T11TD4221.1E:171b-7: gal te don byed nus pa kun rdzob tu yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:171b-8: spyi la yang yod pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:171b-9: des na mtshan nyid ha cang khyab ches pa'i skyon yin no zhe na ;
T11TD4221.1E:171b-11: gal te kun la de yod na //
T11TD4221.1E:171b-12: spyi yi mtshan nyid rjes 'gro ldog / blo la ma mthong phyir min te //
T11TD4221.1E:171b-13: mig dang gzugs sogs blo bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:171b-14: dper na mig dang gzugs la sogs pa'i blo rnams dmigs pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:171b-15: bdag po'i rkyen gyi yul la rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa de bzhin du /
T11TD4221.1E:171b-16: spyi'i blo dag ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:171b-17: spyi'i blo ni sngon mthong ba'i 'bad rtsol tsam las 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:171b-18: de ltar gzugs la sogs pa'i blo ni mig la sogs pa med par nang gi byed pa tsam las 'byung ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:171b-20: gal te dngos po de nyid du //
T11TD4221.1E:171b-21: sngar yod mthong ba ma yin yang //
T11TD4221.1E:171b-22: 'on kyang ldog pa mthong ba las //
T11TD4221.1E:171b-23: yod do zhes ni nges par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:171b-24: gal te bden pa'i ka ba'i tshogs su snang ba yul la mi ltos par mig tsam las 'byung ba yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:171b-25: gang dang gang du mig bltas pa de dang der 'byung bar 'gyur te rab rib can gyis skra shad la sogs pa snang ba bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:171b-26: de dang bral ba'i phyogs su 'byung ba yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:171b-27: des na ka ba la sogs pa sngar yod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:171b-28: des na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dang 'brel pa'i phyir na de la snam bu la sogs pa'i blo skye ba na snam bu la sogs pa'i nus pa khong du chud par byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:171b-29: spyi'i blo ni de lta ma yin te nang gi byed pa tsam las 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:171b-30: 'bras bu gang zhig gang tshogs pa tsam las 'byung ba de ni de las tha dad pa'i dngos po'i bdag nyid kyi nus pa rtogs par byed pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:172a-0: mig la sogs pa tsam gyi tshogs pa las byung ba'i mig gi sems @172a * //
T11TD4221.1E:172a-2: ba lang nyid kyi blo rta la mi skye ba ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:172a-3: des na ldog pa ci ltar med ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:172a-5: rta la ba lang nyid med phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:172a-6: ba lang blo mi skye ba min //
T11TD4221.1E:172a-7: bag chags sad byed de min phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:172a-8: de la ba lang blor mi 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:172a-9: rta de ni ba lang nyid kyi bag chags sad par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:172a-10: de la ba lang gi blo med pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:172a-11: ba lang zhes bya ba'i brda ni de nyid la grub pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:172a-12: ba lang nyid med pa las ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang de 'dra ba'i 'dus byas pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:172a-13: gang gis de yod dam 'on te ma yin zhes rnam par gzhag par bya ba spyi'i rnam pa gsal ba las tha dad pa ni de la rtogs pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:172a-14: de'i phyir spyi ni ma brtags na nyams dga' bar grags pa tsam yin gyi don dam pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:172a-15: gal te don dam pa ma yin na ba lang nyid dang /
T11TD4221.1E:172a-16: rta nyid phan tshun ldog par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:172a-17: phan tshun ldog pa ni rtogs pa nyid dam gsal ba nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:172a-18: gal te gsal ba med kyang brdar rtsol ba tsam las thams cad la spyi'i blo 'byung ba ma yin na ni de'i tshe ldog pa las spyi nus pa med par mi 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:172a-19: spyi ni khyab pa yin te des na thams cad du spyi'i blo skye ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:172a-20: rab rib can gyis nye bar dmigs pa'i skra shad la sogs pa yang de lta bu kho nar thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:172a-21: gzhan gyis ma mthong ba'i phyir ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:172a-22: spyi yang de'i rtsol ba la sogs pa dang bral bas mi rtogs pa /
T11TD4221.1E:172a-23: de la yang skyon du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:172a-24: de yod na dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yang rigs pa ma yin te ;
T11TD4221.1E:172a-25: skra shad la sogs pa yang rab rib yod na gzhan gyis ci ltar mi dmigs /
T11TD4221.1E:172a-26: rab rib kyis nyams pa'i phyir de kho na ma yin pa dmigs par byed pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:172a-27: de kho na ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni ci zhig / dbang po nyams pas dmigs par bya ba nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:172a-29: de kho na nyid ma yin pa la dmigs par byed pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:172a-30: 'di ni phan tshun bsten pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:172a-31: gzhan yang spyi yang phyin ci log gi bag chags sad pas nyams par byas pa'i nang gi byed bas dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir 'di ni mtshungs so //
T11TD4221.1E:172b-0: gal te khyab byed yin pa'i @172b phyir ;
T11TD4221.1E:172b-1: / spyi mi ldog pa nyid ce na //
T11TD4221.1E:172b-2: rab rib can gyi rnam shes kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:172b-3: rtogs bya'am khyab byed nyid du 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:172b-4: gal te dbang po nyams pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:172b-5: 'dzin phyir sbrang bu mi bden na //
T11TD4221.1E:172b-6: mi bden pa nyid ma grub par //
T11TD4221.1E:172b-8: nyams pa bden pa ma yin pas /
T11TD4221.1E:172b-9: don byed grub pa min zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:172b-11: spyi la'ang mtshungs par 'gyur ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:172b-12: des na spyi ni don byed nus pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:172b-13: shes pa tsam la'ang nus pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:172b-14: de brda rtsol ba la sogs pa //
T11TD4221.1E:172b-15: nang gi yan lag rjes 'jug phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:172b-16: bum pa la 'degs spyi dang ni //
T11TD4221.1E:172b-17: grangs sogs blos ni bshad pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:172b-18: gzugs dang ro dang dri dang reg pa'i rten bum pa'i yan lag can gyi rdzas so //
T11TD4221.1E:172b-21: 'di la'o snyam pa'i blo ni 'du ba'i yul can yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:172b-23: de dag gi blo gang yin pa de yang brda rtsol ba la sogs pa nang gi rgyu tsam la rag las pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:172b-24: yul ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:172b-26: gzugs sogs las ni tha dad par //
T11TD4221.1E:172b-27: rdzas zhes bya ba yod min te //
T11TD4221.1E:172b-28: bum pa'i bdag la bum pa'i blo //
T11TD4221.1E:172b-29: rjes 'gro ldog pa yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:172b-30: mig la sogs pa'i blos ni gzugs la sogs pa 'ba' zhig dmigs te /
T11TD4221.1E:172b-31: des na de ma dmigs pas sad par byas pa thog ma med pa'i bag chags kyi mtshan nyid rang gi rgyu kho na las 'di bum pa'o snyam du gcig nyid du mngon par zhen pa'i blo skye bar skye bos nyams su myong ba yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:172b-32: bum pa la sogs pa rdzas kyi ngo bo nyid gzhan ni yongs su brtags na rnam pa thams cad du yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:172b-33: gal te rdzas ni mthong ba'am reg pas yongs su gcod pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:172b-34: rdzas ni rnam pa gnyis te blta bar bya ba dang reg pa bya ba'o zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:172b-37: rdzas de gzugs las gzhan min pa'am //
T11TD4221.1E:172b-39: gzhan ma yin pas 'dzin na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:172b-40: gzugs nyid gzugs ldan yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:172b-41: gzhan du rig pa yin na blo //
T11TD4221.1E:172b-42: rnam pa gnyis su myong 'gyur na //
T11TD4221.1E:172b-43: rnam pa gnyis su snang bar ni //
T11TD4221.1E:173a-2: ci ste bum pa'o snyam pa'i blo ni /
T11TD4221.1E:173a-3: gzugs so snyam pa ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:173a-4: des na rig pa tha dad pa ci ltar med /
T11TD4221.1E:173a-6: bum pa'am snam bu dmar snyam pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:173a-7: blo ni 'khrul pa med pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:173a-8: don 'jig byed pa'i rgyu mtshan yang //
T11TD4221.1E:173a-9: rig pa las gzhan yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:173a-10: gal te gzugs tsam rig pa yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:173a-11: dmar po'i snyam pa kho nar 'gyur gyi bum pa'o snyam pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:173a-13: dmar po dang ni mi dmar ba'i //
T11TD4221.1E:173a-14: don la bum par tha snyad byed //
T11TD4221.1E:173a-15: bum pa dang ni bum min pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:173a-16: don yang dmar po'i sgra yis brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:173a-17: des na rjes 'gro ldog pa las //
T11TD4221.1E:173a-18: tha dad yongs su brtags nas ni //
T11TD4221.1E:173a-19: tha dad don du ston byed kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:173a-20: dngos po de bzhin gnas ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:173a-21: zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhan du dpyad zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:173a-22: ci ste gal te yan lag can med par gzugs la sogs pa 'ba' zhig yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:173a-23: gang la gzugs yod pa de nyid la reg pa yod do zhes bya ba'i blor ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:173a-25: tshogs pa gcig la rag las dang //
T11TD4221.1E:173a-26: 'bras bu gcig la mkho ba'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:173a-27: tshogs pa gcig tu rab brtags pas //
T11TD4221.1E:173a-28: gang la de la zhes byar rtogs //
T11TD4221.1E:173a-29: dmag gang la glang po che la sogs pa yod pa de la skyes bu yod pa yin no zhes bya ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:173a-30: de bzhin du gang na pa la sha la sogs pa yod pa'i nags de nyid la seng seng la sogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha snyad med dam ci /
T11TD4221.1E:173a-31: skyes bu la sogs pa las tha dad pa'i dmag gam //
T11TD4221.1E:173a-32: pa la sha la sogs pa las tha dad pa'i nags ni yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:173a-33: de'i phyir tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa nyid dam 'bras bu gcig pa nyid kyi pan tshun ma bral ba la brten pa na skye bos de ltar tha snyad byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:173a-34: gal te de lta na ni phan tshun tha dad pa med pa'i lus su gyur pa'i gzugs la sogs pa nyid yan lag can yin te /
