T11TD4221.1E:173a-35: gzugs la sogs pa'i bum pa dang ka ba la sogs pa bzhin du phan tshun tha dad pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:173a-36: yan lag can ni nags tshal la sogs pa ltar tha snyad tsam ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:173b-0: de'i yan lag ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las brtags pas de ltar @173b bzhag pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:173b-1: 'di ltar mthong ba gang yin pa de nyid la reg go zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:173b-2: yul tha mi dad par yang rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:173b-3: gzugs kyi yul spangs nas reg pa'am myangs par rtogs pa'i blo ni med do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:173b-5: gal te gzugs sogs phan tshun du //
T11TD4221.1E:173b-6: rang bzhin tha dad med gyur na //
T11TD4221.1E:173b-7: gzugs sogs dbye ba gang las yin //
T11TD4221.1E:173b-8: de nyid gzhan du ci ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:173b-9: de nyid ni gzhan ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:173b-10: snang ba tha mi dad par thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:173b-11: 'on te gcig po de nyid dbang po tha dad pas gzung ba'i phyir tha dad pa lta bur rtogs pa yin te mig gi dbang pos rtogs na ni gzugs nyid yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:173b-12: lus kyis rtogs na ni reg bya nyid dang lces rtogs pa na ni ro nyid yin no zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:173b-14: 'dzin pa'i dbye bas gcig pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:173b-15: dngos nyid gzhan du rtogs sam ci //
T11TD4221.1E:173b-16: 'on te tha dad rtogs pa'i lam du gnas pa tha dad nyid /
T11TD4221.1E:173b-17: re zhig gcig nyid do zhes bya ba la ni tshad ma med do //
T11TD4221.1E:173b-18: gcig nyid ni 'dzin pa'i bye brag gis tha dad par rtogs pa ma yin te 'khrul pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:173b-19: ci ste gzhan du 'dzin pa med pas rten med pa de nyid ma 'khrul bar brjod do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:173b-20: de ni de ltar don dam nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:173b-21: yin par ci yi phyir mi rtog //
T11TD4221.1E:173b-22: tha mi dad par rtogs pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:173b-23: med pa'i phyir na rtogs ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:173b-24: ci ste yang tha dad pa yul gcig pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:173b-25: mi 'brel ba ji ltar 'gyur snyam na /
T11TD4221.1E:173b-26: de ni rtogs par sla ste 'di ltar /
T11TD4221.1E:173b-27: de las gzhan du snang med phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:173b-28: yul ni yul can las gzhan min ;
T11TD4221.1E:173b-29: / yul can snang bar tha dad phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:173b-30: gang las tha dad med pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:173b-31: yul zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa dag las gzhan ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:173b-32: de de dag la tha dad pa yang /
T11TD4221.1E:173b-33: tha dad par snang ba nyid las yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:173b-34: yul tha dad pas ni ma yin te thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir mi rtogs pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:173b-35: rang gi ngo bos tha dad na ni gzugs la sogs pa yang tha dad pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:173b-36: snang ba'i rang bzhin las rang bzhin gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:173b-37: snang ba yang tha dad pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:173b-38: gzugs snang ba nyid ni de snang ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:174a-0: dbang po gzhan don med par @174a * //
T11TD4221.1E:174a-1: thal bar 'gyur ba dang snang ba tha mi dad par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:174a-2: dbang po tha dad pa'i phyir tha dad do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:174a-4: dbang po tha dad kyang tha mi dad pa tha dad par snang ba ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:174a-5: de ltar yin na ni tha dad pa lkog tu gyur pa kho nar 'gyur ba'i phyir ;
T11TD4221.1E:174a-6: yan lag can ni gzugs la sogs pa tsam du thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:174a-7: gal te dbang po'i mthu las gzhan du gyur pa'i don yang rnam pa gzhan du rtogs pa yin na ni mig ser can la dung ser por snang ba bzhin du 'khrul pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:174a-8: ci ste mi slu ba'i phyir ma 'khrul ba nyid do snyam na /
T11TD4221.1E:174a-9: de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:174a-10: mi slu ba yang snang ba nyid yin pas de yang dbang po'i khyad par nyid las snang ba'i rnam pa de ltar 'gyur ba de'i phyir na de yang 'khrul pa kho na yin pas ji ltar ma grub pa 'grub par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:174a-11: mi slu ba'am gzhan gyi snang ba ni dbang pos byas pa yin pa na don gyi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa rtogs pa med pa'i phyir don zhes bya ba med pas yan lag can gyi sgrub par byed pa ni legs pa kho na zhig go //
T11TD4221.1E:174a-12: don med par sgrub par byed pa ni yan lag can gyi sgrub byed ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:174a-13: de ni don gyi khyad par nyid du 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:174a-14: de'i phyir dbang po'i byed pa las ni gcig du mar snang ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:174a-15: 'on kyang gzugs la sogs pa ni du ma nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:174a-16: de'i phyir gcig tu rtogs pa ni nang gi byed pa la rag las pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:174a-17: 'degs pa'i rtogs pa yang lag pa la sogs pa'i skad cig yul gzhan dang gzhan du skye ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:174a-18: 'degs so snyam pa ni nang gi byed pa nyid las de'i tshogs pa 'ba' zhig la rtogs pas sgro 'dogs pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:174a-19: yul gyi stobs kyis 'byung ba ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:174a-20: de lta na ni 'o na ni snga ma dang phyi ma'i skad cig rnams kyis gsal bar bya ba'i las nyid 'degs pa'i shes pa'i yul yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:174a-22: spyi ni gsal bas gsal bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:174a-23: las nyid kyi spyi ni las kyi gsal ba rnams kyis gsal bar bya ba yin gyi don gyi skad cig rnams kyis ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:174b-0: lag pa la sogs pa'i skad cig ma'i gsal ba la brten pa'i las kyi gsal @174b ba gzhan ni yod pa'am dmigs pa ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:174b-1: gsal ba gzhan gyis kyang spyi gsal bar bya ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:174b-2: 'on te las nyid kyi rigs lag pa la sogs pa'i skad cig gis gsal bar bya ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:174b-4: skad cig re res gsal bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro ;
T11TD4221.1E:174b-5: /'degs pa nyid la sogs pa'i skad cig gcig gis gsal bar bya ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:174b-6: skad cig dang po kho nar rtogs par thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:174b-7: 'on te las nyid kyi rigs ni dus cig car du gsal bar bya ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:174b-8: brda sprod pa bas ni gdon mi za bar gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha'i rjes su 'jug par bya ba ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:174b-9: kho bo cag gi lta ba rnam par gnas pa ni 'di kho na'o snyam na de ni mi bden te /
T11TD4221.1E:174b-10: gal te rigs re res gsal ba ma yin na 'o na ni spyis gsal bar bya bar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:174b-11: rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:174b-12: goms pa las gcig gis gsal bar 'gyur ro zhe na ;
T11TD4221.1E:174b-13: 'o na ni goms pa nyid nang gi rgyu yin pa'i phyir shes pa de yul gyi stobs kyis byung ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:174b-14: de bzhin du ldan pa'i rnam par dbye ba'i shes pa la yang brjod par bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:174b-16: grangs ldan pa la sogs pa dang //
T11TD4221.1E:174b-17: de ldan rang gi ngo bo dang //
T11TD4221.1E:174b-18: brjod pa las ni tha dad pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:174b-19: ngo bo blo la snang ba med //
T11TD4221.1E:174b-21: gal te don byed par mi nus pa zhes bya ba spyi'i mtshan nyid ma yin nam des na skra shad la sogs pa yang don byed mi nus pa'i phyir spyir thal lo zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:174b-24: skra shad sogs ni spyi min te //
T11TD4221.1E:174b-25: don du zhen pa med phyir ro ;
T11TD4221.1E:174b-26: / shes byar 'dzin phyir med pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:174b-27: nyes pa dag tu thal mi 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:174b-28: rang gi mtshan nyid kyis bdag nyid kyi don nyid spyi'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa na spyi yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:174b-29: gal te 'di rang gi mtshan nyid yin na don bya ba byed pa'i phyir ji ltar spyi yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:174b-30: spyi ni don bya ba byed pa med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:174b-31: don byed pa med pa ni don du yang ji ltar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:174b-32: don byed pa nyid kyis don yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:174b-33: don byed pa byed pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:174b-34: cig shos gnyi ga ni gcig la yod par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:174b-35: 'di ni 'thad par dka' ba ma yin pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:174b-36: dngos su don byed mi nus dang //
T11TD4221.1E:175a-2: de ni spyi dang don nyid dang //
T11TD4221.1E:175a-3: nus pa dang ni nus med nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:175a-4: spyi ni don du zhen pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:175a-6: don dam par ni don med pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:175a-7: 'di'i don nyid ni nye bar btags pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:175a-8: brgyu nas don gyi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:175a-9: 'o na ji ltar sgra'i yul spyi yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:175a-10: chu klung gi 'gram na kha ra'i phung po yod do zhes bya ba ni brgyud nas kyang don byed pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:175a-12: de spyi min mod nged pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:175a-13: chad pa ci yod sgra rnams ni //
T11TD4221.1E:175a-14: tshad ma min par sgrub pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:175a-15: mchog tu legs par 'gyur ba nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:175a-16: 'di ltar spyi ni kho bo cag tshad ma'i yul du 'dod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:175a-17: gal te de yang tshad ma'i yul yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:175a-19: 'o na ji ltar sgra'i yul spyi yin par brjod ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:175a-20: spyi kho na sgra'i yul yin no zhes pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:175a-21: 'o na ci zhe na spyi ni sgra'i yul kho na yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:175a-22: yul ma yin pa ni med do zhes bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:175a-23: sgra'i yul nyid kyis ni rjes su 'gro ba'i rnam pa nyid mtshon pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:175a-24: de bzhin du yul ma yin pa rang gi mtshan nyid zhes te /
T11TD4221.1E:175a-25: skra shad la sogs pa rang gi mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:175a-26: sgra 'ga'i'ang yul ma yin pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:175a-27: 'dir yang rang gi mtshan nyid kho na yul ma yin pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang rang gi mtshan nyid ni yul ma yin pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:175a-29: sgra la sogs pa'i yul can gyi shes pa ni tshad ma ma yin pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:175a-31: tshad ma slu ba med can gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:175a-32: shes pa spyi yi mtshan nyid ni //
T11TD4221.1E:175a-33: bya ste yul gyi dbye ba yis //
T11TD4221.1E:175a-34: de la tha dad sgrub pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:175a-35: de yi yul nyid tha dad pa //
T11TD4221.1E:175a-36: bsgrub bya nyid du 'dod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:175a-37: des na tshad ma'i yul min pa //
T11TD4221.1E:175a-38: yul nyid du ni ji ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:175a-39: gal te don nyid spyi yin na dngos po med pa ni spyi nyid du mi 'gyur te don gyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:175a-40: de ni yul ma yin pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:175a-41: mi dmigs pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:175a-42: spyi'i ngo bo yang yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:175a-43: snga na med pa dang zhig nas med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bye brag khyab par byed pa yin pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:175a-44: de ni dang po med pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:175b-0: de ltar med pa zhes gsal bas khyab par byed pa @175b yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:175b-2: shes byar 'dzin phyir zhes bya ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:175b-3: dngos po med pa yang rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis shes bya nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:175b-4: gzhan gyi dngos po nyid dngos po med pa yin no zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha' yin la de yang don bya ba byed pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:175b-5: yang na de yang tshad mas yongs su gcad par bya ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:175b-6: dgos pa yod pa'i phyir nus pa yang yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:175b-7: dngos po med pas kyang dgos par 'gyur ba nyid de dogs pa med par 'gro ba'i don yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:175b-8: des na de la don du mos pa yod pa'i phyir dngos po med pa ni rang gi ngo bos don kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:175b-9: skra shad la sogs pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:175b-10: 'khrul pa'i shes bya nyid du yongs su dpyod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:175b-11: gal te skra la sogs pa yang gang gi tshe 'di lta bur gyur pa'i skra la sogs pa 'di ni mi bden no zhe'am /
T11TD4221.1E:175b-12: bden pa'i skra dang 'dra ba'o zhes shes pa de'i tshe de la yang rang dang rjes su mthun pa'i dgos pa mi bden pa'i rgyu mtshan can gegs med par 'gro ba la sogs pa yod pa kho na ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:175b-13: de'i phyir de dag kyang tshad ma'i yul nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:175b-14: ci ste de ltar yongs su bcad pa ni spyi'i rang bzhin kho na snyam na /
T11TD4221.1E:175b-15: de lta na ni gsal bar snang ba nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:175b-16: gsal par snang ba nyid kyis don yin na ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin pas /
T11TD4221.1E:175b-17: de'i shes pa don med pa can du ma'i 'gyur ba'i phyir ma 'khrul bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:175b-19: de dag gi yang de lta'i dngos //
T11TD4221.1E:175b-20: bkag med gsal bar snang nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:175b-21: shes pa'i ngo bo'i don nyid phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:175b-22: skra sogs zhes bya'i blo dag ni //
T11TD4221.1E:175b-23: spyi yi spyod yul can yin la //
T11TD4221.1E:175b-24: skra snang don med can yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:175b-25: gal te rab rib can gyis dmigs pa'i skra la sogs pa yang mi bden par yongs su gcod pa de'i tshe /
T11TD4221.1E:175b-26: mi bden pa zhes bya ba'i don ci yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:175b-27: don byed pa'i shes pa'am skyes bu gzhan gyis ma dmigs pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:175b-28: des dmigs par rung ba nyid med par yongs su bcad pas na dngos po med par gzhal bya nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:175b-29: des na dngos po med pa nyid du gzhal bar bya ba ni spyi'i mtshan nyid du bkag pa med pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:176a-0: yang gang gi tshe 'di ni skra la sogs pa gzhan dang 'dra ba yin no snyam pa de'i tshe shes pa'i rang bzhi la 'dra bar tha snyad @176a * //
T11TD4221.1E:176a-2: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi yul nyid yin pas skra la sogs pa gzhal bya nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:176a-3: 'o na ji ltar spyi gsal bar snang ba yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:176a-4: shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis don yin pa'i phyir na ni rang gi mtshan nyid kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:176a-5: de ltar na mngon sum du 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:176a-6: 'gyur ba kho na ste rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyi yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:176a-7: ci ltar spyi'i rang nyid yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:176a-8: rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa gzhan gyis sngar gyi sgra la sogs pa dang 'dra bar yul du byas pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:176a-10: rab rib can shes rtogs bya ba //
T11TD4221.1E:176a-11: skra sogs bden min sngon chad ni //
T11TD4221.1E:176a-12: de bzhin nyid du dmigs pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:176a-13: yang na tshul mthun phyir 'dra yin //
T11TD4221.1E:176a-15: 'dra ba nyid ni sngon rang bzhin gyis rjes su 'brang ba med na mi 'gyur ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:176a-16: des na 'dra ba dang mi bden pa dag ni rnam par rtogs pas gcad par bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:176a-17: snga ma dang phyi ma'i rang bzhin la 'jug pa ni rnam par rtog pa med pa ma yin no zhes ston par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:176a-18: des na ldog tu gyur pa nyid kyis spyi yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:176a-19: 'o na don med pa'i shes pa gang yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:176a-20: skrar snang ba'i dbang po'i rnam par shes pa ni don med pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:176a-21: bsam pa ni rang rig pa la ni mngon sum yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:176a-22: skra la sogs pa'i rang bzhin la rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par shes pa ni rjes su dpag pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:176a-23: dbang po'i shes pa ni don med pa'o zhes rnam par dbye ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:176a-24: de nyid dbang po'i shes pa yin la de nyid rang rig pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:176a-25: rang rig pa'i rnam par shes pa las gzhan dbang po'i shes pa ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:176a-26: rang rig pa de nyid dbang po la brtan nas skyes pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:176a-27: don la de ni dbang shes yin /
T11TD4221.1E:176a-29: rang rig dbang po las min te //
T11TD4221.1E:176a-30: de med par yang 'jug phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:176a-31: gang zhig med kyang gang 'byung ba de ni de'i rgyu ni de ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:176a-32: dbang po med na rang rig pa yongs su gsal bar mi 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:176a-34: rang rig pa thams cad ni rang gi ngo bos gsal ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:176b-0: gang zhig gang la rang gi ngo bo dngos su byed pa'i rnam par snang ba de gsal ba @176b yin no /
T11TD4221.1E:176b-1: rnam par shes pa thams cad kyi rang gi rang bzhin yang dngos su snang ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:176b-2: rang gi ngo bo nyid ni lkog tu gyur pa ma yin te rang gi ngo bo med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:176b-3: de'i phyir mi gsal ba thams cad ni lkog tu gyur pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:176b-4: rmi lam gyi shes pa dbang po med kyang gsal ba'i rang bzhin yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:176b-5: des na dbang po ni don nyid la 'jug par byed pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:176b-6: de med na ni don med pa can nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:176b-7: des na skra'i shes pa ni don med pa can yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:176b-8: de la skra thob pa ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:176b-9: de'i phyir don la ltos nas don med pa can yin no zhes bya bar gdeng ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:176b-10: gal te shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi don yin na spyi yang rang gi mtshan nyid dang /
T11TD4221.1E:176b-11: gsal bar snang bar thal ba'i phyir 'gal lo zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:176b-14: gal te spyi ni shes ngo bos //
T11TD4221.1E:176b-15: don nyid yin na thal bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:176b-16: de ltar 'dod phyis skyon yod min //
T11TD4221.1E:176b-17: don gyi ngo bo nyid kyis spyi //
T11TD4221.1E:176b-18: shes pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis na rang gi mtshan nyid dang gsal bar snang ba ni spyi la yod pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:176b-19: de'i gsal bar snang ba nyid ni de lta bur gyur pa kho na yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:176b-20: don ni mi gsal ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:176b-21: gzhan la ltos nas gzhan mi gsal bar snang ba nyid du snang ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:176b-22: shes pa'i rnam pa ni de nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:176b-23: gang la ltos nas de mi gsal ba nyid du brjod par 'byung /
T11TD4221.1E:176b-24: de'i phyir rang gi ngo bo gsal bar snang ba'i phyir mi gsal ba nyid du ga la 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:176b-25: rnam pa thams cad snang ba gang yin pa 'di nyid gsal ba nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:176b-26: don gyi rang bzhin ni gzhan yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:176b-27: de mi snang na mi gsal ba nyid du snang ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:176b-28: 'o na de ji ltar de spyi nyid dang /
T11TD4221.1E:176b-29: mi gsal bar snang ba yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:176b-30: bshad pa phyi rol gyi don gyi ngo bo nyid kyis spyi nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:176b-31: dpyad pas na ngo bo ste nges par brtags pa zhes bya ba'o //
T11TD4221.1E:176b-32: don du nges par brtags pas spyi nyid dang /
T11TD4221.1E:176b-33: don mi gsal bar snang ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:176b-34: de mi gsal ba nyid dang spyi'i rnam pa ni lkog tu gyur pa nyid kyis yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:176b-36: kun la ngo bo mtshungs phyir dang //
T11TD4221.1E:176b-37: de ldog pa la brten phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:176b-38: rno ba dang zhan pa dang drag pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:177a-1: pa thams cad la ngo bo mtshungs pa nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:177a-2: snang ba dang brtags pa'i don gcig tu byas pa'i phyir gcig nyid du lhag par zhen pas de thun mong nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:177a-3: 'di ltar mtshungs pa rnams kyi ngo bo yin pas ni de spyi nyid du nye bar rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:177a-4: shes pa'i rnam pa yang gsal ba de'i rang bzhin du zhen pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:177a-5: khra bo la sogs pa gsal ba mtha' dag la gnas pa nyid kyis spyi'i rnam par gyur pa'i shes pa'i rnam pa khyad par du gyur pa ni kun rdzob tu spyi'i ngo bo nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:177a-6: de ltar lhag par zhen pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:177a-7: de la de las skyes pa'i lhag par zhen pa'i rgyu ni bag chags kyi khyad par yang yin no zhes bya ba ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:177a-8: de ni ldog pa'i khyad par de la brtan nas byung ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:177a-9: de ni brgyud nas ldog pa'i don la brten nas skyes pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:177a-10: ldog pa'i don rnams la 'jug par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:177a-11: ldog pa de nyid ni spyi yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:177a-12: ldog pa nyid ni thams cad la khyad par med pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:177a-13: ldog pa dang 'brel pas don gyi rnam pa yang ldog pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:177a-14: ci ltar rnam pa spyi yin /
T11TD4221.1E:177a-15: gzugs la sogs pa nyid khyad par med pas rjes su dpag pa'i spyod yul gyi spyi ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:177a-16: gsal ba gzhan ma spangs pa'i gsal ba nyid spyir brjod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:177a-17: gsal ba mtha' dag spangs nas ni rjes su dpag pa tshad ma ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:177a-18: de'i phyir rjes su dpag pa tshad mar khas len pas ni gdon mi za bar mtshon zin pas mtshon pa nyid kyis gsal ba yul nyid du khas blang bar bya dgos kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:177a-19: rnam pa tsam gyi mthar thug pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:177a-20: 'jug par byed pa nyid ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:177a-21: spyi 'ba' zhig 'dzin pa la yang skyon 'di nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:177a-22: de'i phyir shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi don spyir smra ba rnams kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:177a-23: shes pa'i rnam pa de las gsal ba rjes su dpag pa'i phyir spyi'i rjes su dpag pas gsal ba'i yul can du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:177a-24: de la spyis kyang gsal ba dpog pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:177b-0: de la yang spyi snang bar 'gyur ba'i phyir 'jug par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa'i don med @177b pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:177b-1: spyi brgyud pa de tsam du zad pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:177b-2: spyi las spyi rjes su dpog cing de las kyang spyi gzhan dpog pa'i phyir thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:177b-3: de'i phyir mthar yang gsal ba rtogs par bya ba yin pa'i phyir gsal ba nyid spyi yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:177b-6: brjod pa nyid phyir te dngos min //
T11TD4221.1E:177b-7: dbang sogs 'bras bcas nyid phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:177b-8: ming sogs brjod na 'chad pa po //
T11TD4221.1E:177b-9: nyan po brjod bya rjes 'brel phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:177b-10: ming sogs 'brel pa med pa can //
T11TD4221.1E:177b-12: spyi'i gzugs la sogs pa nyid ni spyi'i shes pas rtogs pa'i spyi ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:177b-13: gzugs la sogs pa re re'am mtha' dag spyi'i shes pas rtogs grang /
T11TD4221.1E:177b-14: gal te mtha' dag rtogs na ni de'i tshe dbang po'i tshogs 'bras bu med par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:177b-15: sgra las skyes pa'i spyi'i shes pa gang yin pa des gsal ba'i rang bzhin thams cad rtogs pa'i phyir ro ;
T11TD4221.1E:177b-16: / mig la sogs pa dbang po'i rtogs ni gsal ba rtogs pa'i don du 'dod pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:177b-17: gsal ba de ni mig la sogs pa dang bral yang rtogs pa'i phyir dbang pos ci zhig bya /
T11TD4221.1E:177b-18: dbang po ni bde ba'i don du 'dod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:177b-19: 'di ltar dbang po la brten nas 'gyur ba'i bde ba de ni gzhan du ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:177b-21: de yang sgra nyid las rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:177b-22: dbang po med par sgra las ni //
T11TD4221.1E:177b-23: bde skye ma yin bde skye bar //
T11TD4221.1E:177b-24: rtogs tsam yin na sgra las kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:177b-25: bde ba de nyid skye ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:177b-26: gal te de yang rtogs sam las //
T11TD4221.1E:177b-27: bde ba skye ba med ce na //
T11TD4221.1E:177b-28: bde ba skye ba'i ngo bor ni //
T11TD4221.1E:177b-29: rtogs pa ci ltar de ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:177b-30: gal te bde ba skye ba'i rang bzhin du rtogs kyang de ltar ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:177b-31: de ltar gyur na ni rtogs pa gzhan la yang ci zhig yid brten du yod /
T11TD4221.1E:177b-32: rtogs par gyur pa kho na yod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:177b-33: 'on te dbang po'i tshogs don med pa yin yang las kyi dbang gis skyes pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:177b-34: skyes su chug mod mig zhar yang bzhugs mthong bas de 'bras bu med pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur dgos na /
T11TD4221.1E:177b-35: de lta na ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:177b-36: de'i phyir gsal ba nyid sgra las rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:178a-0: des na gzugs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin ni spyi ma @178a * //
T11TD4221.1E:178a-2: de lta na ni 'o na ming la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ba yin pas dbang po'i tshogs 'bras bu med pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:178a-8: 'chad pa po dang nyan pa po dang 'brel pa'i ming dang mtshan ma rtogs na don rtogs pa ni ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:178a-9: ma rtogs pa'i don la ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:178a-10: ma rtogs pa la yang 'jug na ni thams cad la 'jug par thal ba'i phyir dang rtogs pa don med par thal pa'i phyir de ni rigs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:178a-11: 'on te 'di snyam du mtshan ma gang yin pa don gang yin pa de gnyis ni tshul 'dra ba'i phyir gcig rtogs pas kyang gzhan la 'jug pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:178a-12: dper na tsitra aa ga da dang /
T11TD4221.1E:178a-13: sna tshogs brtson 'grus zhes bya ba'i mtshe ma gnyis las gcig brjod pas der gzhan la 'jug par mi 'gyur ba ni ma yin pa bzhin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:178a-17: 'khrul kyang dngos po rig ces pa //
T11TD4221.1E:178a-19: gal te ming dang mtshan ma snang ba yin na blo de ji ltar 'khrul pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:178a-20: 'khrul pa yin no zhe na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:178a-21: dmigs pa med pa nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:178a-22: de ltar gyur na ni ming dang /
T11TD4221.1E:178a-23: mtshan ma rtogs par mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:178a-24: ming dang mtshan ma'i rang bzhin snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:178a-25: de la yang ming dang mtshan ma gzhan rtogs na ni thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:178a-26: de'i phyir mtshe ma dag las 'khrul par shes pa la yang ming dang mtshan ma snang ba nyid yin pas dpe ma grub bo //
T11TD4221.1E:178a-27: der yang de rtogs pa nyid kyis 'jug pa'i phyir ji ltar don la 'jug par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i rtsod pa ni de la yang yod pa'i phyir dpe ni bsgrub bya'i phyogs su bzhag pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:178a-28: khas blangs nas kyang brjod pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:178a-29: gal te don la tshul 'dra las //
T11TD4221.1E:178a-31: yul la 'khrul min shes pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:178a-32: mtshungs min rnam pa de 'dra'i blo //
T11TD4221.1E:178a-33: skye phyir gzhan la de med de //
T11TD4221.1E:178a-34: blo ni khas len med phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:178a-35: phyi rol don du snang ba can //
T11TD4221.1E:178b-0: khas len na yang rnam shes @178b las //
T11TD4221.1E:178b-1: tha dad pa ni tshad can min //
T11TD4221.1E:178b-2: ldog pa grub pa med phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:178b-3: gal te gzhan rtogs kyang phyi rol la 'jug pa 'di tshul 'dra bas bskyed pa'i 'khrul pa'i rgyu can yin na de'i tshe dus thams cad du mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:178b-4: mtshe ma dag gcig rtogs pa na dus thams cad du gzhan kho na la 'jug pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:178b-5: de la yang 'jug pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:178b-6: lus can dang lus can ma yin pa'i tshul 'dra ba yang med de mthun pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:178b-7: de yod na yang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed du mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:178b-8: gzugs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa nyid kyis gzugs kyi phung po'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:178b-9: gzhan yang yul 'di nyid du rtogs so zhes yul la 'khrul par yang mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:178b-10: de dang gzhan gyi yul dag gi tshul 'dra ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:178b-11: 'on te yul yang rang gi ngo bos rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:178b-13: de yang de ming dang mtshan ma 'khrul pas rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:178b-14: de lta na ni 'o na yul zhes bya ba rtogs pa med pa'i phyir yul gyi khyad par la 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:178b-15: yul med pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba rtogs pas ni yul gyi khyad par dang 'brel pa'i gzugs la sogs pa 'ga' zhig la 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:178b-16: gcig tu zhen pa'i phyir 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:178b-17: gcig tu zhen pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig / ming dang mtshan ma la 'jug pa'i yul gyi don du yin par rtogs pa'o zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:178b-18: ji ltar gzhan la gzhan du rtogs te /
T11TD4221.1E:178b-19: bum pa ni snam bu'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:178b-20: de'i rang bzhin der lhag par zhen par byas pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:178b-21: 'o na ni lhag par zhen par byas pa gang yin pa de nyid rtogs par 'gyur gyi ming dang mtshan ma ni dri tsam yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:178b-22: gang lhag par zhen par byas pa de nyid la 'jug par 'gyur gyi phyi rol gyi don la ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:178b-23: ci ste de la ming dang mtshan mar lhag par zhe na pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:178b-24: de ltar yin na ming dang mtshan ma nyid rtogs pa yin pas ci ltar phyi rol la 'jug / nya phyis la dngul du zhen pa ni ji ltar nya phyis la 'jug ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:178b-25: nya phyis kyang de na yod pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:178b-26: yul de yang mngon sum gyis gzung ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:179a-1: yul ni yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:179a-2: yul yongs su 'dzin pa ni yul na gzhan par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:179a-3: de ni gzhi'i don gyi yul yin no zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:179a-4: rnam par dbye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:179a-5: nya phyis kyi yul yin gyi dngul gyi ma yin pa de bzhin du 'dir yang yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:179a-6: ma yin te dngul ni med pa'i phyir yul med pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:179a-7: ming dang mtshan ma ni yul med pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:179a-8: dngul ni mthong bas sgro 'dogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:179a-9: ming dang mtshan ma ni mthong ba med de /
T11TD4221.1E:179a-10: de ni sgro 'dogs pa'i dus nyid kyi tshe mthong ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:179a-11: de'i phyir 'di ni sgro btags pas 'jug pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:179a-12: bram ze'i khye'u la mer rtogs pa bzhin du blo 'khrul pas gzung ba nyid kyang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:179a-13: shin tu goms pa'i phyir ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:179a-14: shin tu goms so zhes bya ba 'di ga la rtogs te tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:179a-15: tshad mas rtogs na de ltar tha snyad bya ba yin gyi gzhan du na ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:179a-16: gzhan du ni tha snyad 'thad pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:179a-17: de nyid kyis brtag par bya ba yin pa de ni tshad ma med pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:179a-19: de lta ma yin yang tha snyad 'dogs pa'i phyir ro zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:179a-20: gang gi sgra las don la reg pa med pa can rang gi rnam par nyid kyis shes pa skye ba de'i ltar na don la 'jug ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:179a-21: shes ste shes pa'i rnam par brjod par bya ba yin pa la ni mtshungs pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:179a-22: 'khrul pa'i blo skye ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:179a-23: bag chags kyi stobs kyis de ltar skye ba na rang gi ngo bo nyid la khyad par can gyi yul na gnas pa'i don du rlom pas tha snyad 'dogs pa po 'jug par byed pa'i phyir 'di la 'gal ba cung zad kyang med do //
T11TD4221.1E:179a-24: 'di ltar ci srid rang gi ngo bo la don du sgro btags pas 'jug pa byed pa de tsam gyis 'di yi tha snyad yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir gzhan gyis ci bya /
T11TD4221.1E:179a-25: ming dang mtshan ma don du rlom pa la rnam par rtog pa gnyis te /
T11TD4221.1E:179a-26: rtogs nas don gyi rnam pa nyid du lhag par zhen par byed dam /
T11TD4221.1E:179a-27: 'on te ma rtogs par gal te sgra'i rnam par shes pas ming dang mtshan ma rang gi ngo bor rtogs pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:179a-28: ji ltar de don du rtogs par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:179b-0: rang gi ngo bo la rtogs pa ni gzhan gyi rnam par lhag par zhen @179b par brjod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:179b-1: rnam pa gzhan ni de ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:179b-2: rnam pa tha dad pa kho na tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:179b-3: de'i phyir ming dang mtshan ma ni don gyi rnam par rtog pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:179b-4: rnam pa 'di ni don gyi ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:179b-5: de la don med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:179b-6: ming dang mtshan ma yang ma yin te ;
T11TD4221.1E:179b-8: rnam pa de ni shes pa nyid kyi yin pa de mchog yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:179b-9: shes pa'i rnam pa de nyid don nyid du rtogs pa yin gyi bar gyi sha lhag pa'i ming dang mtshan mas ci zhig bya /
T11TD4221.1E:179b-10: shes pa ni brgyud nas de las skyes pa'i phyir don gyi rnam pa dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rigs na ;
T11TD4221.1E:179b-11: ming dang mtshan ma'i don gyi rnam pa can yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las yin don gyi rnam pa dang ldan pa nyid la ni tshad ma cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no /
T11TD4221.1E:179b-12: ci ste don gyi rnam pa ni ming dang mtshan ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:179b-13: 'o na ni de nyid don yin pas dbang po'i tshogs pa don med pa ma yin par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:179b-14: ci ste yang de ni don bya ba byed pa ma yin pas na /
T11TD4221.1E:179b-15: dbang po'i tshogs ni don bya ba byed pa 'dzin pa'am 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:179b-17: don bya ba byed pa ma bzung ba'i phyir 'jug par byed pa ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:179b-18: lhag par sgro btags pa las 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:179b-19: lhag par sgro btags pa de ni shes pa'i rnam pa nyid do zhes bshad zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:179b-20: de lta ma yin na ni der yang ming dang mtshan ma gzhan yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:179b-21: de la yang gzhan yin pa'i phyir thug pa med par 'gyur bas lan du mi rung ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:179b-22: de la yang 'khrul pa nyid du 'dod na ni ming dang mtshan ma la tshad ma med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:179b-23: 'khrul pa'i shes pas ni don rnam par 'jog pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:179b-24: rnam pa yang de nyid don rnam par 'jog par byed pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:179b-25: ma yin te ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:179b-26: mdo sde pa bzhin du ming dang mtshan mar sgrub pa la ni ldog par grub pa med de /
T11TD4221.1E:179b-27: ming dang mtshan ma'i yul can du 'dod pa'i blo ni yid la byed pa la sogs pa tsam las 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:179b-28: shes pa don gyi rnam pa can du khas len na ni de don gyi rnam pa nyid na par rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:179b-29: ci'i phyir rnam pa mi gsal zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:180a-2: tshogs pa'i bye brag gi rnam pa cha 'ga' zhig skyed pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:180a-3: gang las rnam pa gang 'gyur ba de bdag nyid thams cad kyis 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:180a-4: cha 'ga' zhig gis 'dra ba'i bu bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:180a-5: gal te shes pa thams cad don gyi rnam nyid ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:180a-6: de la sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa snang ba gang yin pa de ni don nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:180a-7: de la sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa thams cad ni don yin gyi shes pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:180a-8: des na shes pa thams cad don dang ldan pa yin gyi rang gi rnam pa ni 'ga' yang med pa'i phyir gang las 'khrul pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:180a-9: rnam pa 'di ni shes pa ma yin te phyi rol gyi ngo bor snang ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:180a-11: shes kun don ldan phyir zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:180a-12: 'thad min rmi sogs rnam gzhan du //
T11TD4221.1E:180a-13: mthong phyir 'du byed las kyang min //
T11TD4221.1E:180a-14: sngo la sogs pa snang phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:180a-15: thog med phyir na sngo sogs min //
T11TD4221.1E:180a-16: rung yul gnas pas mi shes pa //
T11TD4221.1E:180a-17: rang nyid shes phyir de shes yin //
T11TD4221.1E:180a-18: des ni ming sogs brjod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:180a-19: shes pa thams cad don dang ldan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i khyab pa ga las yin /
T11TD4221.1E:180a-20: mdun na gnas pa'i rnam par nyams su myong ba tsam gyis ni don dang ldan pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:180a-21: de lta yin no zhe na ni 'khrul pa dang ma 'khrul pa'i rnam par dbye bar mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:180a-22: mtha' dag dmigs pa dang bcas bas pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:180a-23: dmigs pa dang bcas pa yin yang don bya ba mi 'thob pa'i phyir 'khrul pa nyid du tha snyad bye do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:180a-24: de ltan 'o na dmigs pa med pa nyid yin yang don bya ba thob pas thad mar tha snyad bya bar ci ste mi 'dod /
T11TD4221.1E:180a-25: 'di la de kho na nyid ci yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:180a-26: dmigs pa med pa med pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:180a-27: 'di ltar rmi lam la sogs pa dag na dmigs pa med pa nyid yin yang mdun na gnas pa 'dzin pa mthong ba'i phyir na gzhan du yang de mthong ba las dmigs pa dang bcas par ni mi 'thad do //
T11TD4221.1E:180a-28: bzlog par ci ltar mi 'gyur zhes bya ba yang lan ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:180a-29: dmigs pa dang bcas pa nyid ni grub pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:180a-30: dmigs pa dang bcas pa nyid ni 'gar yang grub pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:180a-31: sad pa'i gnas skabs yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:180b-0: 'o na ni gnas skabs de bzhin du med @180b pa'i phyir der shes pa dmigs pa med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:180b-1: de'i phyir ma nges pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:180b-2: rmi lam la sogs pa na rnam pa gzhan du myong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:180b-3: ci ste rmi lam gyi shes pa yang ming dang mtshan ma la dmigs pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:180b-4: des na rmi lam gyi shes pa dmigs pa med pa zhes bya bar ma grub bo zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:180b-6: rmi lam gyi shes pa ni ming dang mtshan ma la dmigs pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:180b-7: sngon po'i rnam par dmigs pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:180b-8: ming dang mtshan ma ni rnam pa de med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:180b-9: der sngon po la sogs pa nyid dmigs pa yin no zhes bya bar mi 'thad de /
T11TD4221.1E:180b-10: rnam pa de ni sngon po la sogs pa dang mi mthun pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:180b-11: bden pa'i sngon po la gos pa de la ni thogs pa med pa nyid yod pa ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:180b-12: rmi lam gyi sngon po ni de las bzlog pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:180b-13: de ltar yangs phyogs shin tu dog par yang glang po che'i khyu mchog mthong ba'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:180b-14: gang gi nang na gnas pas mthong ba der ni glang po che'i khyu'i go skabs med pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:180b-15: bcad pa'i nang nas phyir 'gro ba'i yang nus pa me pa'i phyir dang lang po che'i khyu'i 'bras bu kha bad bshig pa la sogs pa ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:180b-16: me'i 'bras bu tshig pa la sog pa yang ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:180b-17: gal te gzugs la sogs pa thogs pa med par de lta bur gyur pa kho na skyes pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:180b-18: de lta yin na ni der sad pa thams cad kyis ci'i phyir ma mthong ba de la de 'dra ba'i tshogs pa med pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:180b-19: rmi lam gyi gzhug sla sogs pa mthong bar rgyu ni gnyid tshogs pa can yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:180b-20: gal te gnyid tshogs pa dang ldan pa yin na thams cad kyis mthong bar 'gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:180b-21: de lta ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:180b-22: yul de nyid du gnyid log pa rnams kyis rmi lam gzhan mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:180b-23: rnam pa gzhan du mthong ba ni 'du byed kyi khyad par gyis yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:180b-24: 'di ltar sad pa'i gnas skabs na gang gis 'du byed pa yod pa de lta bu nyid mthong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir thams cad kyis thams cad mthong ba ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:180b-25: 'du byed ni 'dus byas pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rgyun las tha dad pa gzhan med pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:181a-0: des na de las skyes pa'i rnam par shes pas yul nye bar @181a * //
T11TD4221.1E:181a-1: 'dzin pa'i phyir nye ba thams cad 'dzin par thal bar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:181a-2: mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa skyes pa na nye ba rnams las kyang 'ga' zhig 'dzin par ni 'thad pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:181a-3: de'i phyir rmi lam du ni 'ga' yang skyes pa med de rnam pa tha dad par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:181a-4: sngon gyi rang bzhin ma mthong ba la ni rnam pa tha dad par 'thad pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:181a-5: sngon mthong ba gang gis 'du byed yod pa de nyid des mthong ba yin gyi gzhan gyis ni sngon med pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:181a-7: 'o na ni phyin ci log tu snang ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:181a-8: sngon gyi dus de nyid de'i dus su mthong ba yin no zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:181a-9: de'i dus nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:181a-10: de nyid kyi phyir phyin ci log tu snang ba yin no zhe na 'di la brjod pa /
T11TD4221.1E:181a-11: ci ga snang ba log pa'am //
T11TD4221.1E:181a-12: yang na log pa snang ba 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:181a-13: gal te phyin ci log snang na //
T11TD4221.1E:181a-14: de la phyin ci log yod min //
T11TD4221.1E:181a-15: gal te phyin ci log snang ba yin na de la ni phyin ci log nyid yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:181a-16: phyin ci log yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:181a-17: thams cad kyis de ltar 'dzin par thal /
T11TD4221.1E:181a-18: de dag kyang phyin ci log snang ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:181a-19: 'di ni mtshar po ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:181a-20: gal te thams cad log pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:181a-21: snang na log pa gang la ltos //
T11TD4221.1E:181a-22: 'khrul pa nyid du ltos nas ni //
T11TD4221.1E:181a-24: 'khrul pa nyid la ltos nas ni //
T11TD4221.1E:181a-25: de lta bur gyur pa de las gzhan pa dag kyang 'khrul pa nyid du brjod pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:181a-27: gzhan la mngon par 'dod pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:181a-28: log snang de ni gzhan la 'ongs //
T11TD4221.1E:181a-30: mnyam pa de ni 'dam du ltung //
T11TD4221.1E:181a-31: rmi lam gyi mthong ba phyin ci log snang ba yin par bsgrub par bya'o snyam pas sad pa phyin ci log pa snang bas bsgrubs so //
T11TD4221.1E:181a-32: ci ste snang ba phyin ci log yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:181a-33: 'o na ni yang phyin ci log nyid 'di ni snang ba kho na yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:181a-34: don ni ma yin pas don de nyid kyi ngo bor snang ba'i phyir phyin ci log par snang ba ci yod //
T11TD4221.1E:181a-35: phyin ci log ces bya ba gang yin pa de'i rang bzhin ni snang ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:181a-36: gang gis gzhan yang de ltar rtogs par 'gyur ba snang ba'i rang bzhin gzhan ni gzhan gyis ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:181a-37: shes pa rnams ni tha dad pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:181b-0: de lta na ni 'o na shes pa nyid de ltar rtogs pa @181b yin pa'i phyir rmi lam gyi mthong ba dmigs pa dang bcas pa nyid ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:181b-2: dus der don de yod min par //
T11TD4221.1E:181b-3: 'du byed las ni de ltar skyes //
T11TD4221.1E:181b-4: yod min mthong ba ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:181b-5: shes pa kho nas rang nyid rig / yul gzhan na gnas pa yul gzhan du mthong ba zhes bya ba nyid rigs pa yin yang /
T11TD4221.1E:181b-6: de'i tshe yod pa ma yin pa dus gzhan dang 'brel pa go ci ltar mthong bar 'gyur ba yin /
T11TD4221.1E:181b-7: de'i phyir sngon mthong ba las de ltar skyes pa'i shes pa kho na rig pa yin gyi don ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:181b-8: de ni med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:181b-9: gal te dus gzhan yang dus de yin par mthong na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:181b-10: sad pa'i gnas skabs kyi ka ba la sogs pa mthong ba thams cad du phyin ci log tu snang ba yin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:181b-11: ma yin te de la gnod par byed pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:181b-12: gnod par byed pa med pa nyid kyang phyin ci log tu snang ba kho na ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:181b-13: don thob pa'i phyir phyin ci log tu snang ba ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:181b-14: don thob pa yang phyin ci log tu snang ba kho na ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:181b-15: don yod pa la phyin ci log tu snang bar ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:181b-16: don mthong ba nyid la ji ltar thob par byed /
T11TD4221.1E:181b-17: de'i tshe med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:181b-18: med na ci ltar rig / gzhan gyi tshe na yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:181b-20: gzhan gyi tshe nyid yod pa'i phyir te de ltar ni med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:181b-22: de'i dus kyi rang bzhin gyis thob pa yang de'i dus su ci ste med /
T11TD4221.1E:181b-23: mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:181b-25: mthong ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:181b-26: ci zhig mthong ba de nyid mi shes pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:181b-27: ngo shes pa'i phyir mthong ba 'di ni sngon gyi yin no zhes nges so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:181b-29: rmi lam dang skye ba gzhan mthong ba la ngo shes pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:181b-30: ngo shes par gyur pa gzhan dang chos mthun pa las der yang rjes su dpag pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:181b-31: dri za'i grong khyer la sogs pa la med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:181b-32: de la ni ngo shes pa yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:181b-34: thams cad sngon ma mthong ba nyid ngo shes par bya ba yin par 'gyur gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:181b-35: da ltar ba mthong ba ni ma yin par 'gyur 'dis ni dran pa nyams pa yang bshad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:182a-0: 'jig rten pa ma yin pa yang @182a * //
T11TD4221.1E:182a-1: 'di nyid kyis bshad pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:182a-2: 'di ltar 'jig rten pa ma yin pa gang yin /
T11TD4221.1E:182a-3: thun mong ma yin pa gzhan gyis blta bar bya ba ma yin pa'o zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:182a-5: de ni shes pa nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:182a-6: rung ba'i yul na 'dug pa gzhan gyis mi shes pa'i phyir 'dzin pa'i rnam pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:182a-7: gzung bar bya ba nyid du 'dzin pa'i phyir don nyid yin gyi shes pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:182a-8: de la gzung bar bya ba nyid du 'dzin pa ni med de /
T11TD4221.1E:182a-9: rang gi ngo bor 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:182a-10: don de ni rang gi ngo bor yin gyi gzung bar bya ba nyid du ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:182a-11: gzung bar bya ba nyid yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:182a-12: gzung bar bya ba'i don du snang ba las gzhan med pa /
T11TD4221.1E:182a-13: yod pa ni de nyid yin pa'i phyir don zhes bya ba med do //
T11TD4221.1E:182a-14: gzung ba'i rnam pa ni don nye bar mtshon pa yin gyi de nyid ni ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:182a-15: ci ltar gzhan gyis gzhan mtshon de'i phyir 'di ni gyi na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:182a-16: don snyam pa'i shes pa skye ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:182a-18: 'di ni skra shad la sogs don min te //
T11TD4221.1E:182a-19: don du mos pa med phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:182a-21: 'dis ni ming la sogs pa bshad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:182a-22: gzhan yang shes pa thams cad mdun na gnas par snang ba yin pas /
T11TD4221.1E:182a-23: 'di la ni phyin ci log par snang ba yin la 'di la ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:182a-24: 'di la ni 'jig rten pa ma yin pa snang la de la ni ma yin no zhes gang las 'gyur ba yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:182a-25: mig la sogs pa'i blo 'dod pa //
T11TD4221.1E:182a-26: de nyid don ldan gang gis 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:182a-27: gal te don nus mthong phyir na //
T11TD4221.1E:182a-28: gzhan pa don med can thob 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:182a-29: gzhan yang mig la sogs pa'i blo phyin ci ma log par snang ba gang yin pa de nyid don dang ldan pa don nye bas bskyed par gang gis 'dod de 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod /
T11TD4221.1E:182a-30: snang ba nyid du ni khyad par med pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:182a-31: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las don gyi nus pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:182a-32: 'di ltar don de sngar gzhan gyis mthong ba'am rang nyid kyi rjes su dpag pas shes pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:182a-33: phyis kyang thob pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:182a-34: des na don gyi nus pa mthong ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:182a-35: gal te de lta na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:182a-36: gzhan gang la de lta bu'i tshogs pa med pa'i shes pa de ni don med pa can 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:182b-0: 'di ltar 'di la ni don med pa 'di la ni yod do zhes bya @182b ba'i blo ni tha snyad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:182b-1: blo 'di ni mi slu ba yang yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:182b-2: 'di ltar bdag la ni shes pa tsam zhig skyes kyi 'di la don yod pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:182b-3: 'dir bdag la 'di ltar snang ba ni sngon goms pa'i mthu las yin no snyam gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:182b-4: de bdag gis mthong ba'am bdag gis dran no zhe'am don 'di ni 'jig rten pa ma yin no zhes bya bar ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:182b-5: gnod par byed pa gang gis 'jig rten pa ma yin par rtogs pa de nyid kyis don med pa can nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:182b-6: 'jig rten pa nyid du rtogs pa ni 'jig rten pa ma yin par mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:182b-7: de la phyin ci log tu snang bar thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:182b-8: de yang 'jig rten pa ma yin pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:182b-10: thug pa med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:182b-11: ci ste thun mong ma yin pa nyid du rtog pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:182b-12: 'di gzhan gyis rtogs so snyam pa'i rtog pa ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:182b-13: don gyi yul can mi shes pa la ni rjes su dpag pa'i rtog pa yin pa nyid du rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:182b-14: de lta na ni 'o na 'dir don gzhan med pa de nyid la rtogs pa 'di 'gyur ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:182b-15: 'di ni rtogs pa tsam yin no snyam gyi don yin no snyam du rtog pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:182b-16: de'i phyir 'chad pa po dang nyam pa po dag dang 'brel par 'gyur ba'i ming la sogs pa snang bas dmigs pa dang bcas par ni rigs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:182b-18: gal te don dang 'brel ldan yin //
T11TD4221.1E:182b-20: don dang de ni zad phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:182b-21: gal te ming dang mtshan ma don dang 'brel par khas len na /
T11TD4221.1E:182b-22: de'i tshe mi 'jug pa kho na ste /
T11TD4221.1E:182b-23: gang gi phyir de ni don dang lhan cig tu zad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:182b-24: 'brel pa med pa la ni shin tu yang 'jug pa med pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:182b-25: gang la don dang 'brel kyang 'ba' zhig rtogs pa'i phyir mi 'jug par thal ba de la 'brel pa med na ni shin tu yang mi 'jug pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:182b-26: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i don kyang med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:182b-27: gal te ming dang mtshan ma yod pa de lta na yang /
T11TD4221.1E:182b-28: don la ni mi 'jug pa nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:182b-29: don gyi rnam pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:182b-30: gzhan rtogs pas gzhan du 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:182b-31: lhag pa ni bshad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:182b-32: sgra yi spyi ni brjod pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:182b-33: gal te thal bar mi 'dod na //
T11TD4221.1E:183a-2: brjod med phyir ro brjod na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:183a-3: de mtshungs min dang gsal ba min //
T11TD4221.1E:183a-4: des na rtag tu dmigs 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:183a-5: rtag nyid phyir ro gal te yang //
T11TD4221.1E:183a-6: gsal las mngon sum la gsal yin //
T11TD4221.1E:183a-7: bdag la shes pa bskyed pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:183a-8: nus pa gang de nus nyid yin //
T11TD4221.1E:183a-9: gal te 'ga' tshe nus med na //
T11TD4221.1E:183a-10: de ni kun tshe nus med 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:183a-11: gal te spyi sgra'i shes pa'i spyod yul yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:183a-12: spyi de'i yan 'gar ba'am gzhan du 'dzin par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:183a-13: gal te 'ba' zhig 'dzin na ni gsal ba med par yang shes par ni 'gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:183a-14: 'on kyang 'das pa la sogs pa ni rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:183a-15: spyi ni 'das pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:183a-16: gal te spyi 'das pa la sogs pa'i gsal ba dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir 'das pa la sogs par tha dad du byed cing lhag par zhen par byed pa yang yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:183a-17: de lta yin na gsal ba'i rang bzhin dang lhan cig pa nyid du 'dzin par 'gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:183a-18: gsal ba 'das pa la sogs pa la ni rang bzhin yod pa ma yin pas ji ltar 'das pa la sogs pa'i gsal ba'i rang bzhin gyi sgo nas 'das pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du rtog par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:183a-19: de'i rang zhin yul du ma byas par ni gzhan de'i rang bzhin du 'dzin nus pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:183a-20: ci ste spyi 'ba' zhig gzung ba la yang tha snyad du 'gyur ba yin pa de'i tshe yang skyon gzhan yin te de de'i spyir mi 'gyur ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:183a-21: des gsal bar bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:183a-22: de med par rang dbang du gzung ba de ni 'di yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:183a-23: bsnyad pa'am des gsal bar bya ba yin par 'ongs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:183a-24: sgron ma la sogs pa'i snang ba ni rang shes pa'i sgo nas rtogs pa'i rgyu yin pas gsal bar byed pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:183a-25: gal te gsal ba rtogs pa med par spyi yan 'gar ba rtog pa med na ni gsal bas gsal bar bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:183a-26: des na 'di rtag tu dmigs par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:183a-27: gsal bas stong pa'i sa phyogs su yang spyi dmigs par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:183a-28: dper na sgra las gsal ba de med pa'i yul der yang dmigs pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:183a-29: 'on te gsal bar byed pa'i gsal ba med na dbang pos 'dzin pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:183b-0: spyi dbang pos gzung ba ni gsal @183b bas gsal bar bya ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:183b-1: dper na sgra las bum pa la sogs pa rtogs pa ni sgron ma la sogs pa la mi ltos la /
T11TD4221.1E:183b-2: dbang pos rtogs par bya ba ni ltos pa yin pa'i phyir skyon med do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:183b-3: de ni mi rigs te sgra las ni bum pa la sogs pa'i spyi nyid rtogs pa yin pa des na ji ltar de nyid dpe yin par 'gyur te spyi ni phyogs su byas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:183b-4: phyogs nyid ni dpe'i skyon med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:183b-5: des na gal te sgra las spyi rang gi ngo bos rtogs na de la mngon sum gyi rtog pas ci bya /
T11TD4221.1E:183b-6: gal te mngon sum gyi gzung ba med na ji ltar sgra las rtogs te 'brel pa 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na ci sgra las spyi'i rnam pa gang yin pa de nyid spyi yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:183b-7: de ste rang bzhin gzhan yin /
T11TD4221.1E:183b-8: gal te de nyid kyi rang bzhin yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:183b-9: 'o na ni gsal bas gsal bar byas pa de nyid mngon sum gyis rtogs pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:183b-10: rang bzhin de nyid kyis shes pa skyed par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:183b-11: 'on te gang zhig mngon sum gyis rtogs pa de spyi'i rang bzhin yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:183b-12: de ltar yin na de la brdar btags pas /
T11TD4221.1E:183b-13: ci ltar gzhan du rtogs pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:183b-14: sgra'i shes pa la yang mngon sum gyis rtogs pa'i rang bzhin kho nar snang bar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:183b-15: de'i rang bzhin ni shes pa gzhan la yang gzhan gyi rang bzhin du snang bar mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:183b-16: spyi ni rtag tu de'i rang bzhin nyid yin pas thams cad kyi tshe snang bar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:183b-18: de'i nus pa'am nus med pa //
T11TD4221.1E:183b-19: ngo bo nyid kyis gang gnas pa //
T11TD4221.1E:183b-20: rtag phyir bcos su yod min na //
T11TD4221.1E:183b-21: de zad bya phyir nus pa gang //
T11TD4221.1E:183b-22: spyi yi rnam par shes de la'ang //
T11TD4221.1E:183b-23: rjes 'brel sngon po la sogs pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:183b-24: rnam pa'i cha ni rnam nges gang //
T11TD4221.1E:183b-25: de ni de la gnag gis sprul //
T11TD4221.1E:183b-26: gal te sgra las spyi 'ba' zhig rtogs na spyi'i rnam pa 'ba' zhig tu snang bar 'gyur gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:183b-27: sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i cha'i skabs yod par ga la 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:183b-28: gsal ba las so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:183b-29: gsal ba mi snang na ga las gsal bas bskyed pa'i phyir zhes ni mi 'thad de /
T11TD4221.1E:183b-30: spyi med par thal ba'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:183b-31: de las tha dad par mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:183b-32: rjes su song ba'i rnam pa nyid kyang sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa las gzhan ma yin no zhes bshad zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:184a-1: yin yang don rnams kyi spyi zhes bya bar ni mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:184a-2: gnyi ga yang snang ngo zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:184a-3: ma yin te dbang pos gzung ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:184a-4: dbang pos rtogs par 'gyur ba'i gsal ba dbang po'i gzung ba yin pa'i phyir mi rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:184a-5: dbang pos gzung bar bya ba nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:184a-6: dbang pos rtogs par 'gyur ba'i gsal ba dbang po'i gzung ba yin no zhes ni mi rigs par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:184a-7: sgra las rtogs pa spyir mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:184a-8: de lta bur gyur ba'i spyi yod do zhes rtogs pa ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:184a-9: yid ches pa med pa'i phyir dang snang ba tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:184a-10: de'i phyir gsal ba las tha dad pa sgras rtogs par bya ba ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:184a-11: des na gsal ba nyid sgras rtogs na dbang po'i tshogs 'bras bu dang bcas par mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:184a-13: gal te mngon sum shes don nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:184a-14: phyir na dbang po don med min //
T11TD4221.1E:184a-15: de dngos gcig phyir sgra sogs las //
T11TD4221.1E:184a-16: tha dad snang blo ga las yin //
T11TD4221.1E:184a-17: mngon sum nyid ni don gyi rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa kho na yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:184a-18: de yod na dbang po rnams don med pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:184a-19: mngon na gnas pa nyid du rtogs pa mngon sum yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:184a-20: mngon du byed pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:184a-22: sgra ni rnam pa gzhan du yang rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:184a-23: sgra ni mdun na gnas par rtogs pa ma yin pa des ni mngon sum gnyid du mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:184a-24: bdag nyid thams cad rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:184a-25: sgra las kyang de nyid rtogs pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:184a-26: de nyid la brda gzung ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:184a-27: yongs su tshim pa'i don gyi phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:184a-29: khyod kyis yongs su tshim pa ni 'di 'dra ba yin no zhes bya ba'i sgra thos pa las yongs su tshim pa yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:184a-30: byung bar gyur to zhes rab tu sbyar ba'i phyir ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:184a-32: 'das pa las byung nas gnas pa zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba srid pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:184a-33: de lta na yang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag dang /
T11TD4221.1E:184a-34: da ltar ba chod pa kho na la sgra sbyor bar 'gyur gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:184a-35: ma chod par snang ba nyid la ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:184a-36: de la sbyor ba 'bras bu med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:184a-37: gzugs la sogs pa 'das pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:184a-38: chod pa ltar mi rung ba ni yongs su tshim pa'i rgyu ma yin pa des na dbang po rnams 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:184b-1: rang gi ngo bos mthong ba gang //
T11TD4221.1E:184b-2: de ni 'das sogs ci ltar yin //
T11TD4221.1E:184b-3: snang ba med las 'das sogs kyis //
T11TD4221.1E:184b-4: ngo bo gzhan ni rtogs pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:184b-5: mig la sogs pas mthong ba yang //
T11TD4221.1E:184b-6: rang gi ngo bos mthong ba kho nas ma chod pa dang yongs su tshim pa'i rgyu yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:184b-7: rang gi ngo bos gzung ba'i glu sgra ni chod kyang yongs su tshim pa sgrub par mi byed pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:184b-8: chu rlabs kyi tshul du 'ongs pa'i phyi rma chod pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:184b-9: de la yang snying po yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:184b-10: nye bar len pa rtog yang ring zhing //
T11TD4221.1E:184b-11: de ni rgang ring yul nyid du //
T11TD4221.1E:184b-12: rtogs phyir 'ongs pa ga la yin //
T11TD4221.1E:184b-14: gal te yul rgyang ring por rtogs kyang /
T11TD4221.1E:184b-15: lus la gnas pa dang phrad pa yin na gzugs la sogs pa yang de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:184b-16: des na sgra dang rjes su dpag pa las sam /
T11TD4221.1E:184b-17: rnam par rtog pa gzhan gyi don rtogs pa la yang rung ste /
T11TD4221.1E:184b-18: rigs ngan la reg pa dang //
T11TD4221.1E:184b-19: bgrod par mi bya ba la bgrod pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:184b-20: des na gal te sgra las don rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis rtogs na /
T11TD4221.1E:184b-21: 'das pa la sogs par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:184b-22: snang bzhin pa yang rang gi ngo bos rtogs pa kho na las 'das pa la sogs pa ma yin pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:184b-23: mi slu ba yang mi slu ba la sogs pa'i sgra las yod pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:184b-24: ci ste dbang pos rtogs pa nyid yod pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:184b-25: rtog pa tsam ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:184b-26: sgra'i rnam par rtog pa la sogs pa ni yod pa nyid ma yin pa la 'jug pa mthong ba'i phyir zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:184b-27: gal te dbang pos rtogs pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:184b-28: yod nyid ce na sbrang bu sogs //
T11TD4221.1E:184b-29: ci phyir yod min nyams phyir na //
T11TD4221.1E:184b-30: ji lta bur na nyams par 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:184b-31: gal te de lta ma yin par //
T11TD4221.1E:184b-32: rtogs phyir sbrang sogs med ce na //
T11TD4221.1E:184b-33: de ltar 'o na ngo bo yis //
T11TD4221.1E:184b-34: rtogs phyir yod par 'dod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:184b-35: de'i phyir rang gi ngo bos rtogs pa kho na yod pa nyid dang mngon sum nyid dang ma chod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:184b-36: sgra dang dbang po'i rtogs pa gnyis khyad med pas dbang po rnams mngon sum du rtogs pa nyid kyi dgos pa dang ldan pa ma yin te des na 'bras bu med pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:184b-37: 'di'i phyir yang spyi dngos po ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:185a-2: gsal ba'i ngo bo gzhan rten med //
T11TD4221.1E:185a-3: gal te tha dad grub ce na //
T11TD4221.1E:185a-4: ltos phyir 'bras bu nyid du brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:185a-5: rang gi rgyu las grub pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:185a-6: 'bras bu rag las med pa yang //
T11TD4221.1E:185a-7: rtog pa yis ni 'brel par byed //
T11TD4221.1E:185a-8: 'bras min ci ltar yang ci zhig / gzhan nyid yin na de 'brel med //
T11TD4221.1E:185a-9: de phyir rang bzhin med par grub //
T11TD4221.1E:185a-10: rigs dang ldan pa'i dngos po nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:185a-13: de la re zhig gsal ba'i rang bzhin nyid ni spyi'i dngos po'i ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:185a-14: gang gi phyir gsal ba rnams gzhan la brten pa med pa ste ma 'dres par mngon sum du rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:185a-15: ma 'khrul pa'i shes pas gzhan du rtogs pa ni gzhan du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:185a-16: de bzhin du khra bo la sogs pa ni gzhan la ltos pa med par so sor rtog pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:185a-17: 'on te gsal ba gnyis pa la sogs pa ni phyis snga ma snga ma la ltos nas ;
T11TD4221.1E:185a-18: 'di ni de dang mtshungs so zhe'am /
T11TD4221.1E:185a-19: de ni 'di nyid do zhes rtog pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:185a-21: myu gu la sogs pa'i 'bras bu ji snyed pa yang rtogs pas rang gi rgyu dang 'brel pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:185a-22: grub zin pas gzhan la rag las pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:185a-23: de ltar ci srid ma grub pa de srid du ni 'dir rtogs pa 'ba' zhig yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:185a-24: grub pa'i dus na yang de dang lhan cig tu yod pas gzhan la rag mi las pa'am /
T11TD4221.1E:185a-25: rgyu zhig pa'i phyir 'bras bu rnams kyang rtog pa kho nas rgyu dang 'brel par byed pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:185a-26: shes ldan ci bzlog pa la ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:185a-27: de'i phyir gsal ba las gsal ba gzhan nam /
T11TD4221.1E:185a-28: spyi tha dad pa yin na de 'brel pa med pa nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:185a-29: de'i phyir spyi ni ngo bo nyid med pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:185a-30: 'brel pa med par rtogs pa la ni spyi yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:185a-31: 'o na ni 'brel pa med par rtogs pa'i dngos po med pa yang spyi thal bar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:185a-32: ngo bo nyid med par mtshungs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:185a-33: med pa rigs su thal mi 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:185a-34: de la ltos pa med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:185a-35: ri bong gi gi rva ri bong gi rva zhes bya ba ni rang gi gsal ba la ltos nas spyir 'gyur ba kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:185a-36: gzhan gyi gsal ba ma yin pa //
T11TD4221.1E:185b-0: spyi dngos por smra ba la yang ba lang nyid @185b rta dang ba lang la sogs pa'i ma yin pa /
T11TD4221.1E:185b-1: ci'i phyir ltos pa med pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:185b-2: de ni rta dang ba lang la sogs pa'i gsal bas gsal bar bya ba ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:185b-3: de lta na ni 'o na bong bu'i rva la sogs pa la yang khra bo la sogs pa la mi ltos pa'i phyir de'i spyi'i ngo bo nyid ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:185b-4: ba lang nyid ni de la brten nas 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:185b-5: de la 'jug par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ltos pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel par 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba ni skyon med do //
T11TD4221.1E:185b-6: de'i rang bzhin ni de rnams la yod pa ma yin la de'i bdag nyid kyi 'brel pa yang med mod kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:185b-7: 'on kyang thog ma med pa'i bag chags kyi mthu las de ltar 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:185b-8: de'i phyir ngo bo la brten nas //
T11TD4221.1E:185b-9: ngo bo med pa'i rigs brtags pa //
T11TD4221.1E:185b-10: khyad par de la 'jug don can //
T11TD4221.1E:185b-11: sgra rnams kyis ni rab tu bstan //
T11TD4221.1E:185b-12: rigs ni rang bzhin yod pa ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:185b-13: 'on kyang brgyad nas skye ba'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin rnams la brten pa tsam zhig yin pa'i phyir rang bzhin dang ldan par rtog pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:185b-14: de las skyes pa de nyid kyi phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:185b-15: der lhag par zhe na pa yin pa'i phyir na rigs de rtog pa na khyad par la 'jug pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:185b-16: des na khyad par de la 'jug par bya ba'i don can gyi sgra rnams kyis de nyid bstan par bya ba yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:185b-17: gzhan dang tha dad med pa ni ma yin no zhes mjug bsdu ba'o //
T11TD4221.1E:185b-18: rigs rang gi ngo bo'i rnam pa dang ldan pa yin du zin kyang gsal ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:185b-19: gcig tu lhag par zhe na pa ga las yin /
T11TD4221.1E:185b-20: ngo bo nyid ni mthong ba yin gyi ma mthong bar gcig tu lhag par zhen pa /
T11TD4221.1E:185b-23: de la ngo bor snang ba'am //
T11TD4221.1E:185b-24: don la de nyid du 'dzin pa //
T11TD4221.1E:185b-25: gang de 'khrul pa thog med pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:185b-26: dus can mthong goms kyis sprul yin //
T11TD4221.1E:185b-27: de kho na mthong ba nyid kyis de'i ngo bor sgro 'dogs par ni ma zad kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:185b-28: 'khrul pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yang yod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:185b-29: dbang phyug la sogs par rtogs pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:185b-30: mi gsal bar snang ba yang gsal bar snang ba las ci ltar zhes bya ba 'di la yang 'khrul pa brgyud pa nyid skyabs yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:185b-31: de'i phyir 'khrul pa ni 'khrul pa'i mthong ba gzhan la rag las pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:186a-2: 'khrul pa thog ma med pa nyid legs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:186a-3: de'i phyir de'i rang bzhin ni mthong ba ni dgos pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:186a-5: don rnams kyi ni spyi gang yin //
T11TD4221.1E:186a-6: gzhan las ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can //
T11TD4221.1E:186a-7: sgra 'di dag gis gang brjod pa ;
T11TD4221.1E:186a-8: / de la ngo bo cung zad med //
T11TD4221.1E:186a-9: gzhan las ldog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi spyi las ni rang bzhin yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:186a-10: sgras ni mngon par 'dod pa ma yin pa'i rigs mi mthun pa de las ldog pa tsam nyid med pa nyid byed pa yin la ldog pa yang sgra de las 'jug pa med pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:186a-11: gal te 'jug par yang byed pa kho na ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:186a-12: ldog pa tsam gyis ni su yang don du gnyer ba med do //
T11TD4221.1E:186a-13: bum pa khyer shog ces bya ba snam bu la sogs pa khyer nas mi 'ongs ba nyid don du gnyer ba ni ma yin no zhe na de ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:186a-14: khyer shog bya ba 'di khyer nas mi 'ong ba 'gog pa yin la de las ni rang nyid khyer nas 'ong par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:186a-15: de yang bum pa ma yin pa la yang thal bar 'gyur bas de 'gog pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:186a-16: dgag pa la ngo bo nyid ni yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:186a-17: gal te sgra dang po'i sgra'i don sgrub pa yin par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:186a-18: de la ni dgag ba srid pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:186a-19: thal ba med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:186a-21: btang snyoms las ni gzhan min pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:186a-22: len pa mi byed pa nyid 'dir //
T11TD4221.1E:186a-24: de la thal ba gzhan ci yod //
T11TD4221.1E:186a-25: 'dir ni sbyor ba med pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:186a-26: mi len pa yin pas thal ba de nyid sgro 'dogs pa 'gog pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:186a-27: gal te de dgag pa ni gzhan sgrub pa kho na ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:186a-28: de ci ltar na de la ngo bo nyid med pa yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:186a-30: de yi ngo bo bkag pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:186a-31: gzhan ni rang nyid rtogs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:186a-32: sgra yi byed pa de la med //
T11TD4221.1E:186a-33: don gnyer yin phyir rang gis rtogs //
T11TD4221.1E:186a-34: gzhan yod pa nyid gzhan med pa //
T11TD4221.1E:186a-35: yin par ci ltar 'gyur zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:186a-36: gzhan rtogs na der rtogs pa skye ba'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:186a-37: de skad bshad pa ni rtogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis gzhan sel ba'i phyogs yin pa'i phyir skyon med do //
T11TD4221.1E:186b-0: rang gi blo nyid des dben par nyams su myong ba dag med do zhes rtogs pa'i phyir @186b ro ;
T11TD4221.1E:186b-1: / gal te re zhig spyi'i blo ni yod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:186b-2: de la don gyi rnam pa yod pa gang yin pa de ni spyi yod pa nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:186b-3: gal te rnam pa gzhan du snang ba'i phyir de la don gyi ngo bo nyid med du chug mod /
T11TD4221.1E:186b-4: de spyi tha dad pa ma yin no zhes bya bar ni mi 'thad do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:186b-6: ngo po med can spyi blo la //
T11TD4221.1E:186b-7: spyi nyid du ni mthong phyir dang //
T11TD4221.1E:186b-8: don la 'khrul pa'ang med na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:186b-9: spyir 'dod de yang slar phyir dang //
T11TD4221.1E:186b-10: de nyid du na don dngos su //
T11TD4221.1E:186b-11: med phyir ngo bo can ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:186b-12: spyi'i blo la snang ba ni spyir 'dod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:186b-13: gal te ngo bo med pa can te /
T11TD4221.1E:186b-14: rnam pa med pa nyid du grub na de tshe nges par de blo las gzhan du 'gyur dgos pa'i phyir spyir 'gyur ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:186b-15: de spyi'i ngo bo mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:186b-16: 'on kyang de ni don la 'khrul pa yang yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:186b-17: de ni ci ltar spyir mthong ba de bzhin du 'khrul pa yin no zhes kyang rtogs pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:186b-18: de yang rang gi rnam pa ni spyi ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:186b-19: rang gi rnam pa'i mthar thug pa nyid kyi rang gi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:186b-20: 'on kyang de tha dad pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:186b-21: don la bslad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:186b-22: de kho na nyid du don gyi rang bzhin du med do zhes kyang rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:186b-23: spyi 'di ni ci ltar de'i mthar thug par rtogs pa zhes zer /
T11TD4221.1E:186b-24: de la brten par rtogs pa bzhin du don la yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:186b-25: des na rang bzhin des dmigs pa dang bcas pa nyid kyis ni ngo bo dang ldan pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:186b-26: rang bzhin dang bcas pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:186b-27: de ltar brtag mi bzod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:186b-28: de lta ma yin na ser po la sogs pa yang /
T11TD4221.1E:186b-29: dung dkar po la sogs pa la yod par 'gyur ba kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:186b-30: de'i phyir spyi ni dngos po ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:186b-31: brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir yang spyi ni dngos po ma yin no /
T11TD4221.1E:186b-32: spyi de dang gzhan dag tu brjod par bya ba nyid ma yin /
T11TD4221.1E:186b-33: yang dngos par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:186b-35: ngo bo med pas brjod bya min //
T11TD4221.1E:186b-36: gal te brjod pa 'ga' zhig las //
T11TD4221.1E:186b-38: brjod bya min pa nyid ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:186b-39: gang zhig de nyid dang gzhan dag tu brjod par bya ba ma yin pa de ni rang gi ngo bo med pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:186b-40: dngos po nyid du gyur pa ni gdon mi za bar de nyid dam gzhan du brjod par bya ba yin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:187a-1: ste spyi gzhan las gzhan du brjod par bya ba yin pa'i phyir tha dad pa nyid du nges par gyur pa ni spyi dngos por 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:187a-2: gal te dngos po yin no gsal ba las kyang de nyid dang gzhan dag tu brjod par bya bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:187a-3: de nyid las brjod du med pa'i phyir dngos po ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:187a-4: de dang 'brel pa nyid kyi phyir de las brjod par bya ba ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:187a-5: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ni tha dad pa nyid kyi 'brel pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:187a-6: des na 'bras bu thams cad rgyu la ltos nas rjod par byed pa ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:187a-7: du ba ni me las de nyid dang gzhan nyid du brjod par mi bya ba yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:187a-8: yul tha mi dad pa'i phyir spyi gsal ba las brjod par bya ba ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:187a-9: yul zhes bya ba ni don dam par dngos po las gzhan yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:187a-10: tha mi dad par snang na ji ltar tha dad pa med pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:187a-11: tha dad snang na gang gis na tha mi dad pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:187a-12: des na de nyid dang gzhan dag las gzhan gyi dngos po ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:187a-13: gang las kyang brjod du med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:187a-14: de ni spyi gzhan las kyang gzhan du brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:187a-15: spyi gzhan yang dngos por ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:187a-16: ci ste kun brtags pa las tha dad par brjod par bya bas dngos po yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:187a-17: ri bong gi rva la sogs pa yang phan tshun tha dad pa'i phyir dngos po nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:187a-18: gal te de dag gis nye bar len pa tha dad pa las tha dad pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:187a-19: don dam par ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:187a-20: ri bong gi mgo la sogs pa tha dad pa'i nye bar len pa can gyi blo nyid de ltar tha dad pa yin gyi ri bong gi rva la sogs pa nyid ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:187a-21: 'di la yang de ltar brjod na ci 'gal /
T11TD4221.1E:187a-22: 'dir yang nye bar len pa gsal ba tha dad pas blo tha dad pa nyid du zad kyi dngos por ni tha dad pa yod pa ma yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:187a-24: nyer len tha dad phyir gzhan du //
T11TD4221.1E:187a-25: brjod par bya min nyer btags phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:187a-26: gal te spyi'am gsal ba sgra rnams kyi brjod par bya ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:187a-27: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa brjod par bya bar mi 'gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:187a-28: de lta yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:187a-31: don la'ang spyi yi rgyu can gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:187b-1: yod pa med chos ci ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:187b-2: gal te dngos po 'das pa'am ma 'ongs pa brjod pa la yang spyi rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:187b-3: 'o na ni spyi yod pa de /
T11TD4221.1E:187b-4: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i dngos po med pa'i chos su ci ltar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:187b-5: yod pa ni med pa'i chos su 'gyur ba ma yin no ;
T11TD4221.1E:187b-6: / gsal ba gzhan yod pa nyid kyi chos yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:187b-7: de yi chos su ma rtogs na //
T11TD4221.1E:187b-9: spyi ni gsal ba 'das pa'i dbang gis 'das pa nyid du 'gyur ba yin gyi rang gi ngo bos ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:187b-10: des na spyi ni 'das pa dang 'brel pa nyid kyis 'das pa yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:187b-11: yang gdon mi za bar spyi med pa'i chos su 'gyur dgos so //
T11TD4221.1E:187b-12: med pa'i chos gang yin pa de ni yod par mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:187b-13: dper na ri bong gi rva nyid dam /
T11TD4221.1E:187b-14: dngos po med pa nyid bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:187b-15: yod pa yin na yang med pa'i chos su 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:187b-16: dper na myu gu la sogs pa'i 'bras bu skyed pa'i nus pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:187b-17: ci 'gal zhe na 'brel pa med pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:187b-18: med pa dang ni 'brel par nus pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:187b-19: de ltar yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:187b-20: spyi yang med pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:187b-22: dper na gsal ba bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:187b-23: 'o na gsal ba yang yod pa nyid du rtogs te 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:187b-24: gal te yod na 'das par ji ltar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:187b-25: shes pa 'das pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:187b-26: shes pa de yang rtogs pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:187b-27: mngon sum nyid du ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:187b-28: rang gi ngo bos rtogs pa la mngon sum ma yin pa nyid med pa'i phyir zhes bshad zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:187b-29: de'i phyir spyi de ni 'das pa la sogs pa'i med pa'i chos ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:187b-31: gang zhig snam sogs la med pa //
T11TD4221.1E:187b-32: da ltar ba yi bum pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:187b-33: dngos po med dang ni nye ba gang //
T11TD4221.1E:187b-34: med pa'i chos zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ni ma grub ste /
T11TD4221.1E:187b-35: med pa'i chos nyid ni nye bar btags pa las 'dod pa yin gyi don dam par ni ma yin pa'i phyir na med pa'i chos kyi gtan tshigs ni ma grub bo //
T11TD4221.1E:187b-36: gang zhig nye bar btags pa de ni /
T11TD4221.1E:188a-0: de la don dam par ni med pa'i phyir 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa de la spyi don dam par @188a * //
T11TD4221.1E:188a-1: yod pa nyid ma yin pas gtan tshigs yod pa nyid ma grub pa yin no snyam du bsam pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:188a-2: 'dir len ni 'das pa la sogs pa de la spyi nye bar btags sam /
T11TD4221.1E:188a-3: sgra'am 'on te gsal ba zhes bya ba'i phyogs gsum mo //
T11TD4221.1E:188a-4: gal te spyi'i chos nye bar 'dogs so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:188a-6: da ltar ba'i bum pa la /
T11TD4221.1E:188a-10: de lta ma yin na nye ba med par 'dod pas na ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:188a-11: med pa dang ni 'dra ba'am 'brel par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:188a-12: yod par thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:188a-13: 'das pa la sogs pa yang dngos po yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:188a-14: blo zhes bya ba ni bkag zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:188a-17: don med par sgra mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:188a-18: 'jug na ni med pa la yang 'jug go zhes bya bar 'gyur la /
T11TD4221.1E:188a-19: de yang spyi yin pa des na dngos po med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:188a-20: 'on te gsal ba nye bar 'dogs so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:188a-21: de la yang nye bar yod dgos te /
T11TD4221.1E:188a-22: nye bar med par 'dogs pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:188a-23: sgra nye bar 'dogs pa la yang 'di nyid brjod par bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:188a-24: 'on te 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar du gcig yin pa'i phyir rang bzhin 'dra bas nye bar 'dogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:188a-25: 'das pa ni de nyid yin te 'on kyang don byed pa med par zad do //
T11TD4221.1E:188a-26: des na don byed par nye bar 'dogs pas de la spyi lta bur rtogs pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:188a-27: gzhan du ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:188a-28: 'o na ni de thams cad yod pa yin pas /
T11TD4221.1E:188a-30: des don byed pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:188a-31: gal te de med na de nyid 'das par 'gyur mod /
T11TD4221.1E:188a-32: ji ltar dngos po yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:188a-33: de dang ldan pa'i dngos po yang 'das pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:188a-34: de dang ldan par cis shes she na ni dngos po med la yang shes par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:188a-36: thams cad yod ces lta ba la //
T11TD4221.1E:188a-37: de yi don byed pa yang yod //
T11TD4221.1E:188a-38: de yod pa na dngos po yi //
T11TD4221.1E:188a-39: med pa ci ltar bden par mar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:188a-40: 'on te 'das pa la sogs pa ni kun rdzob yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:188a-41: don dam par ni thams cad yod pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:188a-42: kun rdzob 'di ci gal te don dmigs pa nyid ni yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:188b-0: @188b don dam pa nyid 'gyur mtha' dag ni //
T11TD4221.1E:188b-1: kun rdzob bden par ci ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:188b-2: med pa'i rang bzhin gyi don dmigs pa ni kun rdzob yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:188b-3: de kho na sgrib par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:188b-4: de kho na snang ba ni kun rdzob ces bya ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:188b-5: gal te 'das pa la sogs pa yang kun rdzob yin na ni don dam pa med par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:188b-6: 'das pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan pa'i dngos po med pa'i phyir de kho na 'ga' yang med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:188b-7: 'das pa la sogs pa ni kun rdzob yin gyi don dam par ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:188b-8: da ltar bar ni don dam par yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:188b-9: spyi dngos po med par grub bo //
T11TD4221.1E:188b-10: da ltar tsam gyi dngos po la spyi med pas thams cad legs par gnas pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:188b-11: de'i phyir dngos po brjod par bya ba yin na nye bar btags pa zhes bya ba med do //
T11TD4221.1E:188b-12: 'on te med pa btags pa gang yin pa 'di nyid nye bar btags pa yin la 'das pa'i dngos po brjod pa'i sgra rnams kyi don du gyur ba'i spyi rang gsal ba yang med pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:188b-13: 'di ltar gang zhig mthong ba de ni gdags par bya ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:188b-15: ngo bo gang du de mthong ba //
T11TD4221.1E:188b-16: de nyid kyis ni sgro gdags min //
T11TD4221.1E:188b-17: gang gi de dngos mthong min pa //
T11TD4221.1E:188b-18: des kyang sgro gdags bya ba min //
T11TD4221.1E:188b-19: 'on te shes pa 'das pa la sogs pa 'jug pa na /
T11TD4221.1E:188b-20: de'i yul dang dus la sogs pa dang 'brel par rtogs te /
T11TD4221.1E:188b-21: des na da ltar 'das kyang sngon gyi rang bzhin de nyid sgro 'dogs pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:188b-22: dper na khur bu ba la sngon mthong ba'i ba lang sgro 'dogs pa bzhin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:188b-24: de 'das kyang sngon gyi rang bzhin du sgro btags pa yin te /
