T11TD4221.1E:217b-23: de yang sngar mthong ba kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:217b-24: gang du mthong ba der de nyid kyi tshe ma dmigs pa ni zhig pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:217b-25: de nyid kyi tshe dmigs la de nyid kyi tshe ma dmigs zhes bya ba 'di 'gal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:217b-26: de ma thag pa'i dus gzhan du ma dmigs pa yin no zhe na ;
T11TD4221.1E:217b-27: bar du mchod pa'i yul gzhan du ma dmigs pa ji ltar zhig pa ma yin /
T11TD4221.1E:217b-28: dus gzhan ma mthong ba zhig yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:217b-29: dngos po nyid du dran par byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:217b-30: de'i phyir rjes su dpag pa ni tha snyad tsam kho na sgrub par byed pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:217b-32: gal te 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs las me la sogs pa dngos po ma grub pa nyid sgrub par byed pa yin gyi tha snyad tsam ni ma yin pa ma yin nam zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:217b-34: gal te de yang rjes dpag gis //
T11TD4221.1E:217b-35: dngos por rab tu sgrub byed na //
T11TD4221.1E:217b-36: rnam kun grub 'gyur de nyid la //
T11TD4221.1E:217b-38: gal te rjes su dpag pas me la sogs pa'i dngos po nyid grub na /
T11TD4221.1E:218a-1: tshe de la me 'di ci 'dra ba zhig yin zhes nang tshan gyi khyad par shes par 'dod pa na /
T11TD4221.1E:218a-2: mngon sum la sogs pa'i tshad ma gzhan mi 'jug par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:218a-3: rjes su dpag pa nyid kyis de'i rnam pa thams cad sngar grub zin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:218a-6: tshad ma dang 'gal ba ste rnam pa gsum yod pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:218a-7: rung ba'i rgyu las 'bras bu skye ba zhes bya ba ni srid pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:218a-8: rgyu med na 'bras bu mi skye'o zhes bya ba ni mi srid pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:218a-9: tshad ma dang 'gal ba yang me grang po zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
T11TD4221.1E:218a-10: de la mngon sum gyis rnam pa thams cad 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni srid pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:218a-11: rjes su dpag pas 'dzin pa ni mi srid pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:218a-12: tshad ma dang 'gal ba yin pa'i phyir tshad ma gzhan 'jug go zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:218a-13: 'di ni rmongs pa'i spyod pa'i tshul te /
T11TD4221.1E:218a-15: mi srid pa dang 'gal ba ni //
T11TD4221.1E:218a-16: dngos po 'dzin pa gang las yin //
T11TD4221.1E:218a-17: dngos po 'dzin pa yin na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:218a-18: 'di gnyis rigs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:218a-19: gal te rnam pa thams cad 'dzin pa mi srid pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:218a-20: tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir de dang tha mi dad pa'i rnam pa 'dor na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:218a-21: de'i tshe dngos po 'dzin pa nyid kyang ma yin par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:218a-22: de nyid kyi tshe de nyid bzung ba dang ma bzung bar ni mi rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:218a-23: de bzhin du shes pa gang de 'dzin pa rang yin la mi 'dzin pa'ang yin no zhes bya ba 'di yang mi srid pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:218a-25: 'khrul phyir rtags ni rnam pa kun //
T11TD4221.1E:218a-26: 'dzin par byed pa'i rgyu ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:218a-27: spyi la 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:218a-29: gsal ba thams cad thun mong du bzung ba'i rtags ni so sor nges pa'i gsal ba la ma nges pa yin no snyam na /
T11TD4221.1E:218a-31: gtan tshigs nyid ni ma nges phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:218a-32: rtags kyi stobs las khyad par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:218a-33: 'dzin par srid pa ma yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:218a-34: ji ltar dngos po 'dzin pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:218a-35: 'di na me gang yod ni mi shes kyi sngar me du ma mthong ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas /
T11TD4221.1E:218a-36: 'di na me 'ga' zhig yod do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:218a-37: me tsam 'ba' zhig shes pa 'di ni rtogs pa kho na ste /
T11TD4221.1E:218a-38: 'on kyang dngos po dngos po la reg pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:218a-39: mngon sum du dngos po la reg na khyad par la the tshom za bar ji ltar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:218a-40: the tshom za na thob par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:218a-41: thob pa yang the tshom dang rjes su mthun pa nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:218a-42: res 'ga' me 'ga' zhig thob pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:218a-43: des na 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs la yang /
T11TD4221.1E:218b-0: tha snyad 'ba' zhig sgrub @218b par zad kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:218b-1: dngos po ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:218b-2: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs la ni dngos po mthong ba'i phyir thob par 'gyur ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:218b-3: 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs la dngos po ma mthong bar ji ltar thob par 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:218b-4: don ni mthong ba 'ba' zhig nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:218b-5: thob min kun tshe yod pa las //
T11TD4221.1E:218b-6: dngos po de thob 'khrul pas kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:218b-7: de don gnyer rnams 'jug par byed //
T11TD4221.1E:218b-8: skra shad la sogs pa dag la mthong ba yod pa /
T11TD4221.1E:218b-9: yul gzhan ma mthong cis ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:218b-10: dus gzhan khyab pa med ce na //
T11TD4221.1E:218b-11: yul gzhan la ni ji ltar yod //
T11TD4221.1E:218b-12: gal te yul gzhan du khyab pa 'ga' yang mi srid pa des na des nyid mi 'jig pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:218b-13: dus gzhan la khyab pa yang mi srid pas de yang ji ltar zhig pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:218b-14: yul gzhan du ma dmigs kyang yul gzhan du dmigs pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:218b-15: ji ltar zhig pa yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:218b-16: 'o na ni yul gzhan dus gzhan du yang dmigs pas ji ltar zhig pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:218b-17: dus gzhan du mthong zin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:218b-18: 'di ni gnyi ga la mtshungs so //
T11TD4221.1E:218b-20: dngos gang ji ltar mthong ba de //
T11TD4221.1E:218b-21: de lta nyid yin gzhan du min //
T11TD4221.1E:218b-22: sngon po nyid du mthong ba yi //
T11TD4221.1E:218b-23: sngon po dkar por yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:218b-24: des na de nyid bshig pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang rgyu med par gzhan mi skye ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:218b-25: de ma mthong ba na de zhig go zhes bya ba ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal tsam du zad do //
T11TD4221.1E:218b-26: des na lhan cig mi gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'gal ba ni yul de lta bu la rnam par 'jog pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:218b-27: don dam par na 'gal ba'i yul ni rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:218b-28: phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'gal ba yang de kho na ltar yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:218b-29: skad cig skyed par byed pa de ni rtag pa skyed par mi nus te des na rtag pa mi skye ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:218b-30: ji ltar mi rtag pa nyid rtag pa dang ma 'dres pa de bzhin du /
T11TD4221.1E:218b-31: sngon po nyid la sogs pa yang phan tshun de bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:218b-32: 'gal ba 'di gnyis la don dam pa ni khyad par yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:218b-33: des na 'gal ba ni phan tshun mi mthun pa nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:218b-34: de yang don gyi rang bzhin nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:218b-35: de lta ma yin na ni rang bzhin med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:218b-36: de dag gi phan tshun mi mthun pa'i rang bzhin dmigs pa de yang gzhan la ltos nas mi dmigs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:218b-37: med pa'i tha snyad thams cad ni mi dmigs pa las yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:219a-0: des na thams cad du sbyor ba 'ba' zhig tha dad par zad kyi don la tha dad pa med do zhes bya ba ni rigs par brjod @219a * //
T11TD4221.1E:219a-2: dbang po las 'das pa rnams la ni 'gal ba de med pa'i phyir med pa sgrub pa'i 'gal ba dmigs pa med pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:219a-3: mi dmigs pa tsam gyis kyang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:219a-4: ma dmigs so zhes bya ba de tsam gyis ni med do zhes bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:219a-5: gang gis mthong ba yod pa la khyab pa des de skad du smra na ni mdzes par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:219a-6: de'i tshe yang thams cad mkhyen pa ni spangs pa ma yin te de nyid thams cad mkhyen pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:219a-7: 'jig rten pha rol la sogs pa thams cad mkhyen pas dmigs par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba yang ma yin te de la tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:219a-8: bzlog pa la ni tshad ma bshad zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:219a-10: ji ltar dngos rnams sgrub pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:219a-11: dngos po rnams kyi sgrub byed 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:219a-12: de bzhin dngos nyid rang ldog na //
T11TD4221.1E:219a-13: dngos rnams ldog par byed pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:219a-14: ji ltar 'brel pa'i phyir dngos po nyid dngos po sgrub par byed pa yin gyi 'brel pa med pa ni ji ltar yang dngos po'i sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa de bzhin du /
T11TD4221.1E:219a-15: dngos po nyid rang log na dngos po'i ldog par byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:219a-16: 'brel pa med par ni dngos po log na dngos po gzhan ldog pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:219a-18: 'bras bu rgyu sgrub par byed pa'am /
T11TD4221.1E:219a-19: khyab par bya ba khyab par byed pa bsgrub pa de bzhin du /
T11TD4221.1E:219a-20: rgyu med pa 'bras bu med pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:219a-21: khyab byed med pa khyab bya med pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:219a-22: de lta ma yin na ni 'brel pa de nyid med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:219a-23: 'brel pa'i ngo bo ni 'di nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:219a-24: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa gang yin pa ste /
T11TD4221.1E:219a-26: 'dis ni rtogs pas sbyar ba'i chos //
T11TD4221.1E:219a-27: phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs dag las //
T11TD4221.1E:219a-28: gang rung nyid sogs gsal yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:219a-29: ci yang rung ba srid phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:219a-30: phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs las gang yang rung ba nyid ni /
T11TD4221.1E:219a-31: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dag la gcig dang yang 'brel pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:219a-32: phyogs ni 'dod pas byas pa yin la de'i rjes su 'brang bas mthun pa'i phyogs gang yin par ste /
T11TD4221.1E:219a-33: de yang de lta bu nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:219a-34: des na 'dod pa tsam dang rjes su 'brel pa'i phyir dngos po go bar byed pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:219a-35: gzhan du 'brel pa ni gzhan go bar byed pa ma yin te ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:219a-36: gang gis de med par rtogs pa 'ga' zhig las ldog par byed pa yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:219a-37: 'dod pas byas pa'i phyogs nyid ni 'brel pa nyid yod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:219b-0: des na phyogs dang mthun pa'i @219b phyogs gang rung zhig yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni go bar byed pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:219b-1: de bzhin du mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:219b-2: de'i phyir sgrub pa dang 'gog pa ni 'brel pa nyid la 'grub pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:219b-3: de la'ang khyab par byed pa'i chos //
T11TD4221.1E:219b-4: khyab bya ldog pa'i go byed 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:219b-5: gal te ngang gi ldog pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:219b-7: zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:219b-8: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa yang go bar byed pa nyid ma yin nam zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:219b-10: de la don dam par na go bya go byed med do //
T11TD4221.1E:219b-11: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa ma dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid med pa yin no ;
T11TD4221.1E:219b-12: / des na grub pa des khyab par bya ba med par sgrub par byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:219b-13: med pa la ni de nyid kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:219b-14: tshad med rtags su brjod gang yin //
T11TD4221.1E:219b-15: de ni shin tu rmongs don te //
T11TD4221.1E:219b-16: gnag rdzi mo bar grags phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:219b-17: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid dngos po med pa yin pa 'di ni gnag rdzi dang bud med kyi bar la grub pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:219b-18: 'on kyang grangs can bstan bcos kyi lta bas rmongs pa rtogs par byed pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:219b-19: med pa'i tha snyad 'di ni gzhan du yang 'di tsam gyis rgyu mtshan can yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:219b-21: bde ba la sogs pa dang skyes bu tha dad par mi 'grub bo //
T11TD4221.1E:219b-22: bstan bcos nyid la tha dad par grub bo zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:219b-24: tha dad pa ni tshad ma la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:219b-25: phan tshun tha par dmigs pa med par ni /
T11TD4221.1E:219b-26: bstan bcos nyid kyang phan tshun tha dad par mi 'grub la /
T11TD4221.1E:219b-27: tha dad du bya bar dmigs pa de nyid ni gzhan mi dmigs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:219b-28: gsal ba dang mi gsal ba dag kyang mi dmigs pa med na tha dad par mi 'grub bo //
T11TD4221.1E:219b-29: mi dmigs pa ni 'di tsam zhig / med la nges pa'i 'bras can yin //
T11TD4221.1E:219b-30: de yang snang bar 'dod pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:219b-31: rgyu'am rang bzhin snang med nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:219b-32: mi dmigs pa ni rnam pa gsum kho na ste /
T11TD4221.1E:219b-33: rgyu dang bya bar byed pa yang rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:219b-34: de yang rgyu la sogs pa dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa mi dmigs pa kho na go bar byed pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:219b-35: gzhan dang rnam pa gzhan du ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:219b-36: de'i phyir 'bras bu dang rang bzhin dang mi dmigs pas skyed pa'i rtags can gyi shes pa bsgrub par bya ba rtogs par byed pa ni slu ba med pa can yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:219b-37: des na des dngos po nyid de ltar grub pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:219b-38: dngos po'i chos ma yin pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:220a-0: gal te kha dog 'di mi rtag @220a * //
T11TD4221.1E:220a-1: po'o zhes rang gi mtshan nyid la mi rtag pa nyid sbyor ba ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:220a-2: des na kha dog spyi la sbyor phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji ltar zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:220a-4: rjes su dpag pas mi rtags sogs //
T11TD4221.1E:220a-6: gzhan du gzung ba 'dzin pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:220a-7: tshad ma nyid du 'dod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:220a-8: rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ba ma yin pa dang kha dog nyid dam /
T11TD4221.1E:220a-9: mi rtag pa la sogs pa bzung nas kha dog la sogs pa ni mi rtag pa'o zhes mi rtag pa nyid dang yid kyis sbyor bar slob dpon gyis bshad pa gang yin pa la /
T11TD4221.1E:220a-10: kha dog spyi la sbyor ro zhes bya ba la sogs pas tshul 'di bshad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:220a-11: kha dog gi spyi la mi rtag pa nyid rjes su dpag pas rtogs na tshad ma gzhan yod par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:220a-12: chos can spyi de gang gis rtogs //
T11TD4221.1E:220a-13: rjes su dpag pas rtogs na ni de la yang chos can gzhan dgos pas thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:220a-14: gang gi tshe mngon sum gyi dus phyis 'byung ba rtags can gyi shes pa ma yin pa de'i tshe ni tshad ma gzhan nyid du 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:220a-15: rang gi mtshan nyid dang sbyor ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:220a-16: gnyi ga la yang la na /
T11TD4221.1E:220a-17: de la ni tshad ma nyid yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:220a-18: gnyi gar mngon sum nyid kyis grub pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:220a-19: spyi 'dzin pa'i rjes su dpag pa ni gzung ba 'dzin pas tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:220a-20: mi rtag pa nyid mngon sum gyis ji ltar grub ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:220a-22: dngos las mi rtag gzhan du med //
T11TD4221.1E:220a-23: de yang dbang po las sngar grub //
T11TD4221.1E:220a-24: du ma'i dngos de brjod bya min //
T11TD4221.1E:220a-25: rtogs las skyed chos brjod bya yin //
T11TD4221.1E:220a-26: mi rtag pa nyid dam kha dog nyid la sogs pa dngos po'i rang bzhin las gzhan ni med kyi 'on kyang de 'dra ba de ni dngos po'i rang bzhin kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:220a-27: rnam par rtog pas de'i ngo bo 'dzin par mi nus pa'i phyir de nyid spyi'i ngo bos 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:220a-28: spyi ni 'dzin pa'i byed pa yin gyi gzhan ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:220a-29: 'di sngon po zhes mngon sum la snang ba'i rang bzhin las gzhan pa ni rjes su dpag pa la 'di ni sngon po'i zhes snang ba med kyi de nyid de ltar tha snyad byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:220a-31: 'di ni sngar gyi sngon po ji lta ba de lta bur gyur pa nyid do zhes snga ma dang phyi ma'i shes pas ma bzung ba'i spyi nyid 'dzin pa nyid 'dzin pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:220a-33: snga ma pyi ma'i rang bzhin las tha dad pa'i spyi ni ma dmigs kyi de nyid des tha snyad byed pa ni spyi yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:220a-34: tha snyad kyi rten kyang rang gi mtshan nyid de kho na yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:220a-35: gal te mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i spyi rnams phan tshun dang /
T11TD4221.1E:220b-0: de dang ldan pa las tha dad @220b pas du ma nyid yin nam zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:220b-2: rang gi mtshan nyid kyi bdag nyid /
T11TD4221.1E:220b-3: du ma'i dngos po de ni brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:220b-4: tha dad pa ni thog ma med pa'i bag chags kyi mthu las byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa tsam gyis sbyar ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:220b-5: rnam par rtog pa ni ldog pa tha dad pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa yongs su brtags pas tha dad par lhag par zhen nas 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:220b-6: spyi yi rten ni grub pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:220b-7: spyi de nyid ni grub pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:220b-8: de ma grub na de ltar de //
T11TD4221.1E:220b-9: rab tu grub phyir rjes dpog yin //
T11TD4221.1E:220b-10: spyi ni tha snyad tsam yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:220b-11: tha snyad kyang tha snyad kyi yul rab tu grub pa na /
T11TD4221.1E:220b-13: gzhi mthun pa nyid du rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ro ;
T11TD4221.1E:220b-14: / tha snyad ma grub na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:220b-15: rgyu mtshan bstan pas tha snyad byed pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:220b-16: tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan brjed pa rgyu mtshan dran pa'i sgo nas yul gyi ma yin pa de lta na yang de don du gnyer ba nyid kyis 'jug par 'gyur bas /
T11TD4221.1E:220b-17: gang du yod pa der ni thob pa yin la gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya bar gor ma chag go //
T11TD4221.1E:220b-18: mngon sum du gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs dang 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs la dngos po 'dzin pa ni yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:220b-19: thams cad du ma bzung ba nyid thob pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:220b-20: thob par bya ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:220b-21: de'i rang gi ngo bo ni ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:220b-23: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin nyid du 'dzin to zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:220b-25: de ltar ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:220b-26: ci ste 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa de lta na yang gzhan du rtogs pa de gzhan du skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:220b-27: gal te spyi rtog pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:220b-28: spyi rtogs pa na khyad par thob par ji ltar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:220b-30: 'di ltar spyi ni dngos po med par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:220b-31: 'o na ni du ba la sogs pa'i rtags nyid dngos po med na ni mi 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:220b-32: de nyid las yod pa nyid thob pa'i phyir spyis ci bya /
T11TD4221.1E:220b-33: spyi rtogs pa med na ji ltar 'jug ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:220b-34: rtags rtogs pa nyid kyis 'jug par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:220b-35: gzhan rtogs pas gzhan la 'jug par mi ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:220b-36: spyi yang gzhan yin pa'i phyir nyes pa mtshungs so //
T11TD4221.1E:220b-37: gal te spyi ni gzhan kho nar gcig tu nges pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:220b-38: gal te de lta na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:220b-39: don gyi spyi ni bzung ba na //
T11TD4221.1E:220b-40: don de nyid ni gzung bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:220b-41: de lta yin dang the tshom ni //
T11TD4221.1E:220b-42: med 'gyur bzung la de ji ltar //
T11TD4221.1E:220b-43: spyi'i tshul gyis bzung ba yin gyi bye brag gi tshul gyis ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:221a-2: de yang bzung ba kho na'o zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:221a-4: thob pa'i don du'o zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:221a-5: thob pa de yang rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa kho na yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:221a-6: gal te de yang skyes par 'gyur na 'jug pa la don ci zhig yod /
T11TD4221.1E:221a-7: tshul 'ga' zhig gis ni rtogs la tshul 'ga' zhig gis ni ma rtogs she na /
T11TD4221.1E:221a-8: tshul gang gis rtogs pa'i tshul de nas ni 'jug pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:221a-10: gang gis ma rtogs pa de nas kyang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:221a-12: shes pa la ni the tshom mi za la /
T11TD4221.1E:221a-13: ma shes pa la yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:221a-14: the tshom ni gnyi ga'i rang bzhin la reg pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:221a-15: gal te spyi dang khyad par dag ngo bo gcig pa'i phyir khyad par la ma rtogs kyang 'jug go zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:221a-17: yul du ma byas par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:221a-18: rtogs pa dang ma rtogs pa ni gcig pa nyid ma yin no zhes kyang bstan zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:221a-19: shes pa gcig tu rtogs par 'gyur gyi ma shes pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:221a-20: 'on te yang dus gzhan du shes par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:221a-21: dus gzhan la ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa med do zhes bya ba 'di ni bstan zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:221a-22: gal te mi rtag pa la sogs pa dngos po'i bdag nyid thams cad bzung ba ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:221a-23: rjes su dpag par bya ba ji ltar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:221a-24: tha snyad du bya ba nyid du'o snyam na /
T11TD4221.1E:221a-25: tha snyad kyi bdag nyid nges pa de nyid ci ste med ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:221a-28: 'dra ba gzhan ni yod pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:221a-29: la lar yongs su mi shes te //
T11TD4221.1E:221a-30: 'khrul phyir sgong gi tha dad bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:221a-31: tha dad mthong ba med phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:221a-32: sgong la tha dad par ma rtogs pa ni ma yin mod kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:221a-34: de nyid 'di yin no zhes de las gzhan du rtogs pa'i phyir tha dad pa'i tha snyad med pa yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:221a-35: gal te de nyid 'di'o snyam du rtogs pa 'khrul pa yin du zin kyang /
T11TD4221.1E:221a-36: mthong ba ma 'khrul pa nyid ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:221a-37: ji ltar tha dad pa ma rtogs /
T11TD4221.1E:221a-38: ci ste bsgribs pa'i phyir rtogs su zin kyang 'bras bu las ma rtogs pa nyid yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:221a-39: bsgribs pa zhes bya ba ni yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:221a-40: rang gi ngo bo rig pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:221a-41: ma rig pa dag phan tshun spangs te gnas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:221a-42: yang na gnyig phan tshun du bsgribs par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:221a-43: phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:221a-44: gal te bsgribs pa nyid yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:221a-45: phan tshun spangs te gnas par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:221b-0: mtshungs phyir gnyi ga bsgribs par @221b 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:221b-1: ji ltar rnam par rtog pa rang gi ngo bo rig pa'i nyams su myong ba las tha dad pa'i phyir nyams su myong ba sgrib par byed pa yin pa de bzhin du nyams su myong ba yang rnam par rtog pa sgrib par byed par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:221b-2: 'on te sems gcig la chags pa la blo tha dad pa nyid mi skye ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:221b-3: de lta na nyams su myong ba nyid med pa'i phyir de la gags byas pa'i don ci yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:221b-5: sngar gyi tha dad dngos po de //
T11TD4221.1E:221b-6: zhig phyir mthong ba med pa dang //
T11TD4221.1E:221b-7: rtag par lhag par zhen pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:221b-8: rtag pa nyid du sems pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:221b-9: sngar gyi dngos po dang mthong ba yang 'das pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:221b-10: de ni da ltar tha snyad du bya ba 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
T11TD4221.1E:221b-11: tha snyad kyang rtag pa nyid du byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:221b-12: des na mthong ba 'das pa des 'di ji ltar sgrib par byed /
T11TD4221.1E:221b-13: phyin ci log tu nges pa'i ni de'i tshe yod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:221b-14: des na 'jig rten de nyid kyi tha snyad du byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:221b-15: des na de dang rjes su mthun pa'i tha snyad med pa gang yin pa 'di nyid de bsgribs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:221b-16: tha dad pa gzhan nye bar mi mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:221b-17: de'i phyir sgong bzhin du skad cig ma gnyis pa la sogs pa tha dad pa nye bar mi mtshon pas de nyid 'di yin no zhes tha snyad du byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:221b-18: 'di ltar rtags med byis par gyis //
T11TD4221.1E:221b-19: skye bos phyis 'byung ba dang ni //
T11TD4221.1E:221b-20: 'brel med mar me la sogs kyis //
T11TD4221.1E:221b-21: 'jig pa mthong bas yongs gcod nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:221b-22: gal te sgong la sogs pa'i tha dad par ni zhib mo dag gis rtogs pa'i phyir gzung ba kho na yin gyi skad cig ma nyid ni de lta ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:221b-25: de'i gnas skabs ma yin pa dang 'jig pa dang mi rtag pa zhes tha snyad byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:221b-26: sgron ma la sogs pa ni de'i skabs ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:221b-27: 'on kyang til mar gzhan dang gzhan gyis bskyed pa na /
T11TD4221.1E:221b-28: sgron ma gzhan dang gzhan 'bar ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:221b-29: de lta mod kyi 'dra ba 'am tshogs mtshungs pa las de nyid 'di yin no zhes tha snyad ni byed pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:221b-30: gal te mar me 'bar ba'i bkod pa 'di ni gcig nyid kyi tshe til mar gyis bskyed pa gcig kho na yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:221b-31: de yang yang dag pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:221b-33: gal te de ni dang po yi //
T11TD4221.1E:221b-34: tshogs pa tsam du dus gzhan du //
T11TD4221.1E:221b-35: gnas par skyes na de las gzhan //
T11TD4221.1E:221b-37: til la sogs pa'i tshegs pa dang po tsam las dus kyi tshogs mtha' dag la khyab pa sgron ma la sogs pa skye na de la gzhan sgong bu dang /
T11TD4221.1E:222a-2: me dang sbyor ba'i tshogs pa rnams don cung zad rgyas par byed pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:222a-3: grub zin pas na gzhan la rag las pa med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:222a-4: ci ste skyes zin kyang dus gzhan du khyab pa nyid ni til la sogs pa rjes su 'jug pa kho na yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:222a-5: gzhan du ni ma yin no zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:222a-6: dus gzhan du gnas pa nyid du skyes zin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:222a-7: dus gzhan du mi gnas pa yin na ni til mar la sogs pa'i tshogs pas phyis cung zad kyang bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir don med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:222a-8: gzhan skyed na ni de nyid mi rtag pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:222a-9: de bzhin du gal te skyes pa de bdag nyid thams cad gzung bar bya ba yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:222a-10: mig la sogs pas de'i bdag nyid thams cad bzung ba'i phyir mig la sogs pa'i rjes su 'jug pa don med pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:222a-11: 'on te mthong ba gzhan dang gzhan dag gam /
T11TD4221.1E:222a-12: dus gzhan du gnas pa'i 'dzin pas dus gzhan du gnas pa nyid du 'dzin pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:222a-13: de ltar gyur na mthong ba gzhan dang gzhan dag rnam par chad pa'i phyir gcig gis kyang dus gzhan du gnas pa nyid 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:222a-14: 'dzin pa dus gzhan du gnas pa can nyid yin na ni cig car kho na de ltar bzung ba'i phyir mig la sogs pa rjes su 'jug pa don med pa zhes bya ba de nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:222a-15: de'i phyir mthong bas ni snga ma dang phyi ma'i ngo bo cung zad kyang ma bzung ba'i phyir skad cig tsam kho na snang ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:222a-16: ci ste yang snga phyi dang bral ba'i dngos po'i rang bzhin de nyid yun ring por 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:222a-18: cig car mthong yun ring gi dus //
T11TD4221.1E:222a-19: yun ring dus ni cig car nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:222a-20: mthong na thams cad de bzhin 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:222a-21: mthong ba rjes 'jug kho na yis //
T11TD4221.1E:222a-22: dus ring rtogs par byed pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:222a-23: ji lta ji ltar mthong ba gzhan dang gzhan rgyun du skye ba de lta de ltar ring por rtogs pa yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:222a-24: dus gcig nyid du rtogs pa ni dus ring po nyid kyis ring po ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:222a-25: dus ring por cig car du ni rigs pa rtogs pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:222a-26: mthong ba ni skad cig nyid rtogs par byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:222a-27: gal te mngon sum gyis rang gi ngo bor gyur pa skad cig ma nyid du yongs su bcad na /
T11TD4221.1E:222a-28: yongs su bcad pa la yang rmongs par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:222a-30: nus pa dngos po'i rang bzhin du //
T11TD4221.1E:222a-31: gyur kyang de ma thag med pas //
T11TD4221.1E:222b-0: 'bras bu mthong @222b pa med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:222b-1: rmongs 'gyur nges gsal med phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:222b-2: dper na 'bras bu de ma thag tu ma mthong ba dag gis nus pa yongs su bcad kyang nges par mi byed pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:222b-3: de nyid bzlog pa'i ched du ni //
T11TD4221.1E:222b-4: rjes su dpag pa brjod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:222b-5: blo gros chen pos mthong nyid pas //
T11TD4221.1E:222b-6: rnam pa thams cad nges par byed //
T11TD4221.1E:222b-7: goms pa dang bral ba rnams dngos po'i rnam pa thams cad mthong na yang rmongs pa des na nges pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:222b-8: de'i phyir rmongs pa bzlog pa'i ched du rjes su dpag pa 'jug go //
T11TD4221.1E:222b-9: gang dag la goms pa gsal ba la sogs pa nges pa'i rgyu yod pa /
T11TD4221.1E:222b-10: blo chen po can gyi rgyud de dag ni mthong ba nyid las nges pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba kho na yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:222b-11: des na gang la rmongs pa med pa der ni spyi'i rten grub na spyi'i grub pa kho na yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:222b-12: gang la rmongs pa yod pa der ni rjes su dpag pa yin pa na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:222b-13: 'o na ni dngos po gcig yin pa'i phyir de'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par rtog pas kyang chos du ma nyid du rnam par 'jog par ci ltar 'gyur te sngon po nyams su myong ba'i rjes su 'brang ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i ser po'i rang bzhin du nges pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:222b-15: thams cad la ni ldog pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:222b-16: tha dad med don de la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:222b-17: ldog pa'i rgyu mtshan can blo dang //
T11TD4221.1E:222b-18: ji ltar brdar btags pa yi sgra //
T11TD4221.1E:222b-20: 'khrul rgyu med na de yis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:222b-21: ngo bo nyid kyis rang dang ni //
T11TD4221.1E:222b-22: rjes su mthun pa'i blo skyed byed //
T11TD4221.1E:222b-23: skye ba can gyi 'gro ba thams cad ni rigs mthun pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:222b-24: mi mthun pa las ldog pa la brten pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:222b-25: de dag ni gang dang gang las ldog pa de dang de las tha dad pa ldog pa'i mtshams tha dad par nye bar btags pa /
T11TD4221.1E:222b-26: de dang de la brten nas chos tha dad par rtogs par byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:222b-27: gal te dngos po thams cad las ldog pa can yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:222b-28: ji ltar dus gcig nyid du ldog pa thams cad mi nges she na /
T11TD4221.1E:222b-29: 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan yod pa'i phyir ro zhes smra'o //
T11TD4221.1E:222b-30: sngar mthong ba brjed pa'i phyir te sngar mthong ba ji lta ba bzhin yul du byed na ni ldog pa nges par mi 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:222b-32: nyams myong ji lta ba bzhin du //
T11TD4221.1E:222b-33: dran sogs nges yin gzhan du ni //
T11TD4221.1E:222b-34: gcig tu nges pa'i phyin ci log / gnyis kar nges med the tshom yin //
T11TD4221.1E:222b-35: nyams su myong ba ji lta ba bzhin du dran na ni nges pa med par mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:222b-36: ji lta ba bzhin du dran pa gang yin pa de nyid nges pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:223a-1: bzhin du dran pa yang goms pa las yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:223a-2: des na goms pa dang ldan pa rnams ni mthong ba'i de ma thag kho nar nges par byed la /
T11TD4221.1E:223a-3: de lta ma yin na ni mi dran pa bzlog pa'i phyir rjes su dpog pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di gnas pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:223a-5: yang na 'dir yang mi dmigs pa'i ;
T11TD4221.1E:223a-7: dngos po thams cad ni skye ba dang 'jig pa dang rjes su 'brel ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:223a-8: skye ba ni mngon sum dang yod pa bsgrub pa'i rjes su dpag pas bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:223a-9: 'jig pa ni dngos po med pa yin pas /
T11TD4221.1E:223a-10: de ni mi dmigs pas bsgrub par bya ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:223a-11: dgag pa gang ji snyed pa de thams cad ni mi dmigs pas bsgrub par bya ba yin pas dgag pa sgrub par byed pa'i thabs gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:223a-12: gal te mi rtag pa ni dngos po'i rang bzhin du gyur pa nyid yin pas yod pa sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma nyid kyis rtogs par byed pa ma yin nam zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:223a-14: rang gi ngo bo tsam nyid kyis ni mi rtag pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:223a-16: sngar byung dngos po med gyur pa //
T11TD4221.1E:223a-17: mi rtag ces ni brjod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:223a-18: byung ba med pa gang yin pa de mi rtag pa yin gyi byung ba tsam gyis ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:223a-19: dngos po med pa de ni 'dir yang mi dmigs pas sgrub pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:223a-20: gal te rgol ba gzhan gyi ltar na mtha' gnyis chod pa dang ldan pa'i yod pa nyid mi rtag pa yin gyi dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:223a-21: snga ma dang phyi ma'i mtha' gnyis kyi mtha' nyid dang /
T11TD4221.1E:223a-22: yod pa nyid ni mi dmigs pas bsgrub par bya ba ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:223a-23: des na 'di ji ltar zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:223a-25: gang gis mtha' gnyis chod yod pa'am //
T11TD4221.1E:223a-26: 'brel pa brjod pa'i ngang tshul can //
T11TD4221.1E:223a-27: mi rtag nyid kyi sgra yin pa //
T11TD4221.1E:223a-28: des mtha' de dag gang la brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:223a-29: re zhig yod pa tsam ni mi rtag pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:223a-30: bdag la sogs pa yang mi rtag par thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:223a-31: gzugs dang tshor ba la sogs pa la yang khyad par med par ro //
T11TD4221.1E:223a-32: gzugs dang tshor ba la sogs pa rnams kyi yod pa mthar gyur pa gnyis kyi dbus su gnas pa ni khyad par med par mi rtag par brjod par bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:223a-33: dngos po med pa ma rtogs ni med na ni mtha' gnyis nyid 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:223a-34: dngos po med pa dang 'brel pa yin na ni dngos po med pa de mi dmigs pas gzung ba yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:223b-0: gal te snga @223b phyir med yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:223b-1: de nyid mi rtag cis ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:223b-2: gal te snga na med pa dang //
T11TD4221.1E:223b-3: zhig nas med pa'i mtha' gnyis kyis bcad pa'i yod pa nyid mi rtag pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:223b-4: dngos po med pa de nyid mi rtag par yin par ci ste mi 'dod /
T11TD4221.1E:223b-5: drug pa sogs sbyor mi rung phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:223b-6: zhe na mtha' la de ji ltar //
T11TD4221.1E:223b-7: gal te bsam pa 'di yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:223b-8: gal te mi rtag pa nyid dngos po med pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:223b-9: dngos po med pa dang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:223b-10: dngos po'i mi rtag pa nyid ces drug pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:223b-11: dngos po dang dngos po med pa la ni sbyor ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:223b-12: 'du ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:223b-14: khyad par khyad par can nyid kyis //
T11TD4221.1E:223b-15: 'brel pa gang gis zlog byed pa //
T11TD4221.1E:223b-16: gal te de yang med na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:223b-17: 'o na mtha' la de ci ltar //
T11TD4221.1E:223b-18: gal te 'du ba la sogs pa'i 'brel pa med pas khyad par dang khyad par can gyi dngos po yang mi 'dod na /
T11TD4221.1E:223b-19: 'o na ni mtha' gnyis kyi yod pa nyid dam dngos po dang khyad par dang khyad par can gyi ngo bo'i drug pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba de ji ltar 'thad pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:223b-20: yod pa nyid ni mtha'i mtshams can dang de'i khyad par can yin no zhes tha dad par brjod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:223b-21: yod nyid dang 'brel rtag pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:223b-22: mtha' yis khyad par gyur pa min //
T11TD4221.1E:223b-23: mtha' gnyis kyis bcad pa'i yod pa'am /
T11TD4221.1E:223b-24: de'i 'du ba'i mtshan nyid kyis 'brel pa mi rtag pa nyid yin no zhes smra ba ni /
T11TD4221.1E:223b-25: gdon mi za bar yod pa dang 'brel pa dag / mtha' gnyis kyi khyad par du gyur par khas blangs pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:223b-26: de ltar ni mi rigs te /
T11TD4221.1E:223b-27: gnyi ga rtag par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:223b-28: ji ltar yod pa mtha'i khyad par dang ldan par 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:223b-29: gal te skye 'jig dang ldan na'o zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:223b-30: ci ste dngos po gang la yod pa nyid dam 'brel pa de dag yod pa de mtha' dag gi khyad par du 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:223b-31: de lta na ni 'o na de'i khyad par can gyi dngos po de nyid mi rtag pa yin pas yod pas ci bya /
T11TD4221.1E:223b-32: tha dad pa med pas drug pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:223b-33: yod pa nyid kyi gnas tshul zhes bya ba ci ltar yin /
T11TD4221.1E:223b-34: gzhan yang dngos po'i mi rtag pa nyid ces bya ba ni dngos po'i snga na med pa dang zhig nas med pa gang yin pa de dag nyid mi rtag pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:223b-35: des na tha dad pa'i phyir tha dad pa'i rnam par dbye bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:223b-36: ci ste mtha' gnyis ni rgyu dang 'bras bu dag yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:223b-37: rgyu zhes bya ba ni mtha' gcig yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:224a-0: 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni mtha' gnyis pa @224a * //
T11TD4221.1E:224a-2: rgyu dang 'bras bu de dag gi yod pa nyid dam 'brel pa khyad par du byas pa la ni mi rigs pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:224a-3: rgyu dang 'bras bu dag ni dngos po'i 'brel pa ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:224a-4: yod pa nyid dang dngos po'i 'brel pa ni 'du ba'i mtshan nyid yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:224a-6: gal te rgyu 'bras mtha' yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:224a-7: khyad par med pa nyid 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:224a-8: 'brel med phyir ro de yis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:224a-9: dngos po sngar med 'dod min pas //
T11TD4221.1E:224a-10: de la de yi khyad par can //
T11TD4221.1E:224a-11: brjod pa de yang mi 'gyur phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:224a-12: gang zhig snga na med pa de ni rang gi rgyu dang 'brel par 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:224a-13: dngos po ni snga na med pa dang 'brel par khas ma blangs so ;
T11TD4221.1E:224a-14: / de khas len yang snga na med pa dang zhig nas med pa nyid mi rtag pa yin pas rang gi gzhung nyams pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:224a-15: phyogs gzhan la brten par yang 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:224a-16: des na dngos po ni snga na med pa dang 'brel pa med pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:224a-17: brjod pa'i khyad par de ni snga na med pa'i khyad par can yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:224a-18: de med na 'di ni 'bras bu yin no zhes bya ba der mi 'gyur la /
T11TD4221.1E:224a-19: 'bras bu med pa'i rgyu yang yod par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:224a-20: yang na rnam pa gzhan gyi sgo nas rgyu dang 'bras bu med par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:224a-22: yod pa nyid dang rang rgyu dang //
T11TD4221.1E:224a-23: 'brel byed phyir na rgyu zhes grag / yod nyid de dang 'brel de yang //
T11TD4221.1E:224a-25: yod pa nyid dang 'brel par byed pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:224a-26: rang gi rgyu dang 'brel par byed pa ni rgyu yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:224a-27: rang gi rgyu ni 'du ba can gyi rgyu ste /
T11TD4221.1E:224a-28: skye ba can gyi dngos po dag ni phal cher 'du ba can gyi rgyu dang 'du ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:224a-29: yod pa nyid dang 'brel pa na 'bras bu ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:224a-30: dngos po yang yod pa dang 'brel pa nyid kyis 'bras bu yin gyi gzhan du ni 'bras bu ma yin no ;
T11TD4221.1E:224a-31: / rang gi ngo bo kho nas 'bras bu yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:224a-32: gang zhig med pa de byed na //
T11TD4221.1E:224a-33: dngos po sngar med ldan min te //
T11TD4221.1E:224a-34: 'brel pa khas len med phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:224a-36: snga na med pa dang 'brel pa'i dngos po ni 'ga' yang med do //
T11TD4221.1E:224a-37: gal te dngos po med pa'i phyir 'brel pa ma yin pa de lta yang 'dir sngar med pa kho na yin te des na 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:224a-38: gang zhig med pa dang 'brel pa de med par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:224a-39: de lta ma yin na thams cad med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:224a-40: des na snga na med pa dang 'brel pa yod pa yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ba yin na khas kyang ma blangs te /
T11TD4221.1E:224b-0: de'i phyir 'gro ba ril rtag par thal @224b lo ;
T11TD4221.1E:224b-1: /'on te ci ltar dngos po med pa dang 'brel pa yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:224b-2: de phyir med don sgro 'dogs pa //
T11TD4221.1E:224b-3: brjod bya tha dad can blo ni //
T11TD4221.1E:224b-4: tha dad med don mngon 'dod can //
T11TD4221.1E:224b-5: sgra la'ang ldog pa'i rten yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:224b-6: don tha dad dam tha mi dad kyang bla ste /
T11TD4221.1E:224b-7: 'brel pa ni thams cad du de la blos btags pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
T11TD4221.1E:224b-8: gal te dngos po la dngos po tha dad pa yin na ci zhig 'brel pa tha dad pa nyid 'brel pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:224b-9: gal te tha dad du chug mod de la 'brel pa ci zhig yod /
T11TD4221.1E:224b-10: tha dad pa ni thams cad la thun mong yin pa'i phyir ma 'brel pa med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:224b-11: de'i bdag dang de las byung ba'i mtshan nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:224b-12: tha dad yin na ci zhig 'brel //
T11TD4221.1E:224b-13: tha dad med na rgyu 'bras gang //
T11TD4221.1E:224b-14: gzhan zhig yod pas ma 'dres gnyis //
T11TD4221.1E:224b-16: tha mi dad pa la ni 'brel pa yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:224b-17: de ni gnyis la gnas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:224b-18: gal te rgyu dang 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid med mod /
T11TD4221.1E:224b-19: de'i bdag nyid du ci ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:224b-21: de la ni 'brel ba'i yul nyid btags pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:224b-22: de la ni 'brel pa can btags pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:224b-23: tha dad pa nyid yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:224b-24: de'i bdag nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa med do zhes bya ba 'di grub pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:224b-25: gal te rgyu dang 'bras bu yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:224b-26: rgyu dang 'bras bu zhes bya ba la 'di ci yin /
T11TD4221.1E:224b-27: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:224b-29: de ni btags pa yin pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:224b-30: mngon sum gyis mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:224b-31: de'i phyir 'di thams cad ni rnam par rtog pas sprul pa tsam yin gyi don dam par ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:224b-32: de'i phyir rnam pa gzhan mi srid pas na ji ltar rnam pa 'ga' zhig ltar btags pa'i 'brel pa la brten nas tha dad pa'i rnam par dbye ba 'di 'jug pa bzhin du /
T11TD4221.1E:224b-33: snga na med pa la sogs pa dang dngos po yang kun rdzob tu 'brel pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:224b-34: don dam par ni 'ga' yang gang dang yang 'brel pa med do zhes bya ba 'di ni nges pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:224b-35: des na kha dog gi spyi la sbyor ba'i gzhal bya gzhan yod pa ma yin pas tshad ma gzhan yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:224b-36: yang nas yang du ngo shes par byed pa la ni nus pa gnas pa yang yod pa ma yin te dran pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:224b-37: yang ngo shes pa byed pa ni dran pa nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:224b-38: dbang po'i byed pa la brten pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:224b-39: mi slu ba'i phyir tshad ma nyid ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:224b-40: ngo shes pa tshad ma ma yin par ni ji ltar 'gyur zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:225a-0: dbang po'i bya ba ni nye ba tsam gyi yul @225a * //
T11TD4221.1E:225a-2: gal te nye ba tsam gyi yul can yin na ci ltar de nyid 'di yin no zhes bya bas 'jug can /
T11TD4221.1E:225a-3: de lta ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:225a-5: de 'di'o zhes bya tsam gyis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:225a-6: gang du'ang rtogs ldan 'jug pa min //
T11TD4221.1E:225a-7: de ni phan 'bras thob pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:225a-8: rgyu yin snyam pa nyid kyis 'jug /
T11TD4221.1E:225a-9: gal te de nyid 'di yin pa de lta na yang 'jug pa'i yul du 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:225a-10: rtogs pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'jug pa'i yul ni don bya bsgrub par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:225a-11: de nyid kyis de don bya ba sgrub par byed pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:225a-12: rang gi rgyu la rag las pa'i nus pa can gyi dngos po rnams ni don bya ba de'ang gzhan byed pa yin gyi gcig nyid la brten pas ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:225a-13: don byed pa'i 'brel pa ni mngon sum gyi yul ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:225a-14: sngon mthong ba nyid dran pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:225a-15: de'i don bya ba byed pa nyid kyis kyang de nyid 'dir yin no zhes shes pa'i yul du 'gyur ba yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:225a-16: rang gi ngo bos ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:225a-17: sngon mthong ba nyid du 'dzin pa ni dran pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:225a-18: 'di la sbyor ba ni rjes su dpag pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:225a-19: de'i don byed par rung ba ni 'di la yang yod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:225a-20: des na tha dad par nye bar btags pas gcig nyid kyi tha snyad byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:225a-21: mi slu ba yang gcig gi yul can ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:225a-22: du ma nyid yin yang don bya ba thob pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:225a-23: bgrod par bya ba ma yin pa bgrod pa la sogs pa ni de las rab tu skyes pa'i phyir rgyun la ltos pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:225a-24: des na mngon sum ni spyi'i yul can ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:225a-25: rjes su dpag pa yang khyad par gyi yul can ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:225a-26: gal te khyad par mthong ba'i rjes su dpag pa khyad par kho na ngo shes par byed pa ma yin nam zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:225a-28: skad cig sor tha dad phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:225a-29: khyad par ngo shes ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:225a-30: mthong dang mtshungs par de 'dzin phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:225a-31: khyad par yul can nyid kyang min //
T11TD4221.1E:225a-32: gang gi tshe me mthong nas song ste chod pa'i tshe yang du ba las nges par byed pa de'i tshe /
T11TD4221.1E:225a-33: khyad par de nyid dus gzhan du ngo shes par byed pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:225a-34: tha dad pa gzhan dang gzhan yin pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:225a-35: tha dad par gyur pa la gcig tu lhag par zhen pas rtogs pa ni spyi yul du byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:225a-36: 'o na gang la 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir tha dad pa mi srid pa /
T11TD4221.1E:225a-37: don gyi bdag nyid brten pa yin pa de la ni khyad par de nyid ngo shes pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:225a-38: 'di ci ltar rtogs par bya ste /
T11TD4221.1E:225a-39: mi snang ba ni 'gyur ba med pa yin no zhes nges pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:225b-0: ci ste gzhan du yang de @225b lta bu nyid du mthong ngo zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:225b-1: de lta na ni mthong ba'i gsal ba gzhan dang chos mthun par rtogs pa'i phyir khyad par gyi yul can ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:225b-2: gal te de nyid dpe yin pa //
T11TD4221.1E:225b-3: phyir na spyi 'dzin min zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:225b-4: dpe nyid yin phyir grub de la //
T11TD4221.1E:225b-5: tshad ma gzhan gyis ci zhig bya //
T11TD4221.1E:225b-6: gal te sngar mngon sum gyis grub pa'i phyir de nyid dang dpe yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:225b-7: de lta yin na ni sngar gyi mngon sum nyid kyis bzung ba'i phyir 'di rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma gzhan ci dgos /
T11TD4221.1E:225b-8: gal te khyad par lta bar byed pa'i mngon sum snga ma de nyid kyis rjes su dpag pa'i dus su 'gyur ba'i yod pa bzung ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:225b-9: de nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir rjes su dpag pas ci zhig bya /
T11TD4221.1E:225b-10: rjes su dpag pa ni mngon sum gyi yul ma yin pa la 'jug par 'dod kyi de nyid la ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:225b-11: gal te de nyid kyi phyir khyad par mthong ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:225b-12: khyad par mthong ba yin na ni tshad mar mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:225b-13: ci ste mthong bas ni dus mnyam du byung ba'i don 'dzin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:225b-14: des na 'byung bar 'gyur ba la 'jug pa'i rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:225b-15: gal te de ltar yin na ni gang gis rang bzhin sngar shes pa dpe yang gzhan yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:225b-16: dus phyis rjes su dpag pas rtogs pa'i don gang yin pa yang gzhan kho nar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:225b-17: 'on te de ni bzung ba kho na yin mod kyi 'on kyang brjed pa de'i phyir 'di la skyon med do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:225b-19: gal te brjed phyir skyon med na //
T11TD4221.1E:225b-20: de nyid phyir na dpe ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:225b-21: gal te brjed pa de phyis yang gtan tshigs kyi sgo nas ci lta ba bzhin du dran par byed pa yin pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa don med pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:225b-22: 'o na ni brjed pa ji ltar dpe nyid yin /
T11TD4221.1E:225b-23: dpe'i sgo nas ni sgrub par byed pa 'jug pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:225b-24: gal te de brjed na dper ji ltar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:225b-25: gal te rtags kyi sngon rol du ma tshang ba med par dpe nyid du dran pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:225b-26: de'i tshe de la rtags gzhan gyis ci bya /
T11TD4221.1E:225b-27: de nyid yang nas yang du dran par byed do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:225b-29: 'on te de'i tshe brjed na ni dpe nyid ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:225b-30: ci ste du ba glo bur ba las me rtogs bzhin du dpe med pa kho nar brjed pa de rtags las rtogs par byed pa yin pa de'i tshe ni /
T11TD4221.1E:225b-31: dus kyi cha ma tshar ba med pa la khyab pa de sngar gyi mngon sum nyid kyis bzung ba'i phyir khyad par rtogs pa med pas ji ltar tshad ma nyid yin /
T11TD4221.1E:225b-32: dran pa yod na de la tha snyad byed pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:226a-0: 'di ltar rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi bdag nyid thams cad bzung zin pa nyid ji lta ba @226a * //
T11TD4221.1E:226a-1: bzhin du tha snyad du byed pa na tshad ma nyid yin pa bzhin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:226a-3: de la ni mthong ba gzhan dang chos mtshungs pa nyid kyis tha snyad du byar rung ba bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:226a-4: 'dir ni de lta ma yin te sngon de 'dra ba med pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:226a-5: goms pas bskyed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:226a-6: 'di ni mthong ba yin no zhes bya ba yang ma 'brel pa ste /
T11TD4221.1E:226a-7: rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba srid pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:226a-8: 'di ni bzung ba ni nyid dran pa yin no zhes ma grub ste /
T11TD4221.1E:226a-9: ma bzung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:226a-10: mngon sum gyi tshad mas ni rang gi dus na gnas pa'i rang bzhin 'dzin pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:226a-11: de lta ma yin na 'chi ba'i mtha' dang bcas par bzung ba'i phyir ni de nyid kyi tsha 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:226a-12: rjes su 'jug pa nyid kyis 'chi ba'i mthar thug pa dang ldan par 'dzin te /
T11TD4221.1E:226a-13: mngon sum ring pos ring po 'dzin //
T11TD4221.1E:226a-14: ring min pas ni cig shos 'dzin //
T11TD4221.1E:226a-15: de nyid tshe na 'chi ba yi //
T11TD4221.1E:226a-16: mtha' dang ldan par de mi 'dzin //
T11TD4221.1E:226a-17: gal te rjes su mi 'jug pa yin na de lta na ni des dus gzhan khyab pa 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:226a-18: des na khyad par mthong ba'i rjes su dpag pa bzung ba nyid la 'jug par ji ltar 'gyur zhing /
T11TD4221.1E:226a-19: ji ltar na de nyid dpe yin pa'i phyir spyi 'dzin pa ma yin /
T11TD4221.1E:226a-20: ci ste dus gzhan dang 'brel par mthong ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:226a-21: dus gzhan dag tu gzhan skyes pa gang yin pa de la de'i dngos po grub pa'i phyir 'dis khyad par mthong ba'i phyir mthong ba kho na yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:226a-23: gal te mthong na de dngos ni //
T11TD4221.1E:226a-24: tshad mas grub na dngos gzhan la //
T11TD4221.1E:226a-25: de nyid sgro 'dogs phyin ci log / des grub tshad can nyid ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:226a-26: gal te mthong ba gzhan yin yang //
T11TD4221.1E:226a-27: phyis dus gzhan gyi tshe de nyid 'di yin no zhes bsgrub par bya ba yin zhes len to zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:226a-28: 'o na ni de ma yin pa la der sgro 'dogs pa de nges par phyin ci log yin te gzhan nyid du mthong ba ni de kho nar de nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:226a-29: ma mthong ba la ni mthong ba'i rang bzhin sgro 'dogs pa tsam zhig nus kyi de nyid du gzung bar ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:226a-30: sngar mthong ba de ni sngar gyi shes pas gzhan gyi rang bzhin dang ma 'dres par gzung ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:226a-31: gal te ma bzung ba de lta na yang rjes su dpag pas de nyid du 'dzin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:226a-32: gzhan nyid du ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:226a-34: rjes su dpag pa ni sngar mthong ba rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:226a-35: rjes su dpag pa ni dran pa tsam las gzhan ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:226a-36: ci ste rjes su dpag pa dngos po 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:226b-0: mngon sum cig @226b shos gcig yin phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:226b-1: gcig grub pa na gnyi ga'ang 'grub //
T11TD4221.1E:226b-2: gal te mngon sum dang cig shos rang bzhin gcig nyid yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:226b-3: de'i tshe mngon sum mam gzhan yang rung ba'i tshad ma gcig nyid kyi grub pa'i phyir gzhan tshad ma ma yin par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:226b-4: gzhan gyi khyad par cung zad kyang byas pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:226b-5: de'i phyir gnyi ga gsal ba'i rnam pa can nam cig shos su 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:226b-6: ci ste mig la sogs pa'i byed pa med pas mi gsal ba nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:226b-7: de ni gsal ba nyid du rab tu grub pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:226b-9: gal te gsal bar snang ba 'di //
T11TD4221.1E:226b-10: mig sogs rgyu mtshan can yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:226b-11: gzugs 'dzin pa la snang ba ni ;
T11TD4221.1E:226b-12: / sbyor byed min pa nyid du 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:226b-13: 'on te gsal ba nyid snang bas byas pa yin na ni de'i tshe snang ba yod pa na rjes su dpag pa mi gsal bar ji ltar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:226b-14: snang ba ni res 'ga' ba yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:226b-15: 'o na snang ba de don dam par yod pa yin yang nges par mi byed pa de dngos po 'dzin par ji ltar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:226b-16: snang ba dang bral ba'i dngos po tsam 'dzin pas nyes pa med do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:226b-17: snang ba dang ldan pa la de dang bral bar 'dzin to zhes bya ba ni bab col yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:226b-18: de ltar gyur na ni de nyid spyi 'dzin pa yin pa'i phyir de ni khyad par mthong ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:226b-19: gzhan dang mtshams ni sbyor ba yis //
T11TD4221.1E:226b-20: zhen pa dran pa yin par shes //
T11TD4221.1E:226b-21: gal te de rtags la ltos phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:226b-22: dran min ma yin 'khrul phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:226b-24: 'di ni sngon mthong ba mtshams sbyor ba tsam yin gyi gsal ba'i rang bzhin du 'dzin pa ni ma yin pa de'i tshe dran pa nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:226b-25: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag par bya ba dag rang bzhin gcig nyid yin pa de'i tshe gzhal bya bla lhag cung zad kyang med pa'i phyir ;
T11TD4221.1E:226b-26: 'di dran pa kho na yin gyi dngos po 'dzin pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:226b-27: gal te rtags las skyes pa de ci ltar dran pa yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:226b-29: khyod kyi 'dod pas rtags nyid med pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:226b-30: dpe dang don dag gcig pas tshul gsum med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:226b-31: nged kyi phyogs la ni de spyi'i yul can gyi rjes su dpag pa yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:226b-32: gang zhig sngon gyi rang bzhin du rtogs pa de ni dran par bya ba yin gyi gzung ba ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:226b-33: gzung bar bya ba nyid du ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:226b-34: rjes su dpag pa dran pa las gzhan ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:226b-35: rtags las skyes pa'i dran pa kho na rjes su dpag pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:227a-0: de'i phyir gang gis de nyid lan @227a * //
T11TD4221.1E:227a-1: cig ma yin par mthong ba de ni dran pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:227a-2: 'on de ltar yod do zhes ji ltar rtogs she na /
T11TD4221.1E:227a-3: da ltar yod pa nyid kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi stobs kyis rtogs pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:227a-4: phyogs de na gnas pa'i du ba ni phyogs de nyid na yod pa'i mes bskyed pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:227a-5: de ltar sngar 'brel pa bzung bas thog ma med pa'i bag chags sad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:227a-7: rjes su dpag pa thams cad ni dran pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:227a-8: de'i phyir gzhal bya gnyis yin pa'i phyir mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i dbye bas tshad ma rnam pa gnyis yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:227a-9: dngos dang cig shos kyi rtogs pa'i khyad par las ma rtogs pa'i rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di gnas so //
T11TD4221.1E:227a-10: de la mngon sum ni rtog pa dang bral zhing ma 'khrul pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:227a-11: khyad par la sogs pa dang 'brel pa'i don snang ba'i shes pa ni rtog pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:227a-12: gzhan du snang ba ni 'khrul pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:227a-13: de gnyi ga dang bral ba ni mngon sum yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:227a-14: gal te 'khrul pa nyid ni phyis mngon sum gyis gzhan du mthong ba las rtogs pa yin no /
T11TD4221.1E:227a-15: rtog pa dang bral ba nyid gang las yin /
T11TD4221.1E:227a-16: mngon sum sngon du 'gro ba can gyi rjes su dpag pa ni de med na 'jug par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:227a-17: mngon sum mtha' dag kyang sgra'i rjes su 'jug pa can du skye ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:227a-18: des na mngon sum rtog pa dang bcas pa yin pas bdag nyid rtogs pa med par rtogs par yang ci ltar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:227a-19: gang gi dang po lta ba'i shes pa rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba skye ba de'i yang rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa ni dran pa la sogs pa'i tshogs pa nye ba las skye ba yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:227a-20: de yang dbang po'i byed pa las 'gyur bas mngon sum kho na yin pas /
T11TD4221.1E:227a-21: de la yang rtog pa med par ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:227a-23: mngon sum rtog dang bral bar ni //
T11TD4221.1E:227a-25: kun gyi rnam rtog ming rten can //
T11TD4221.1E:227a-26: so sor rang gis rig bya yin //
T11TD4221.1E:227a-27: mngon sum rnam par rtog pa dang bral bar ni rang rig pa kho nas rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:227a-28: rnam par rtog pa ni ming skyed par byed pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:227a-29: ming gis kyang rnam bar rtog pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:227a-30: ming gi rten can gyi rnam par rtog pa de ni so so rang rig pas nyams su myong ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:227a-31: rnam par brtag par bya ba ni rang rig pas nyams su myong ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:227a-32: snang ba mig la sogs pas nyams su myong bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:227b-0: des na @227b 'gal ba'i chos gnas pas na rnam par rtog pa can dang /
T11TD4221.1E:227b-1: cig shos kyi shes pa dag ni tha dad pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:227b-2: ci ste yang de ni thams cad kyi tshe yod pas shes pa gcig kho nar zad do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:227b-3: de ltar yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:227b-4: thams cad las ni sems bsdus nas //
T11TD4221.1E:227b-5: nang gi bdag nyid g-yo med pas //
T11TD4221.1E:227b-6: gnas na'ang mig gis gzugs dag ni //
T11TD4221.1E:227b-7: mthong ba'i blo de dbang skyes yin //
T11TD4221.1E:227b-8: gal te rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs pa med par /
T11TD4221.1E:227b-9: dbang po mi 'jug pa nyid yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:227b-10: de med par rnam par rtog pa bsdus pa'i gnas skabs sam /
T11TD4221.1E:227b-11: rnam par rtog pa gzhan mngon du gyur pa na /
T11TD4221.1E:227b-12: don 'dzin pa'i dbang po'i byed pa med par 'gyur ro ;
T11TD4221.1E:227b-13: / des na de'i gnas skabs na rnam par rtag pa'i snang ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:227b-14: ma 'brel pa'i shes pa ni mngon sum kho nas rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:227b-15: gal te 'di la rnam par rtog pa 'brel pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de'i tshe nyid rtog pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:227b-16: ci ltar gnas skabs de rnam par rtog pas dben pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:227b-17: ci ste de'i tshe rnam par rtog par mi byed pa nyid yin na de'i tshe 'di ni rnam par rtog pa med pa yin no zhes ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:227b-18: rnam par rtog pa med par ni tha snyad yod pa ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:227b-19: gzhan la tha snyad du ma yas par yang gzhan rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:227b-20: de lta ma yin na skad cig ma nyid la yang tha snyad byed par rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis ci dgos she na /
T11TD4221.1E:227b-22: slar yang cung zad rnam rtog na //
T11TD4221.1E:227b-24: cis rig sngar bshad gnas skabs kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:227b-25: dbang po'i rtogs pa la med do //
T11TD4221.1E:227b-26: de nyid kyi tshe 'di rnam par rtog pa med pa'o snyam pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni skye ba de ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:227b-27: de lta ma yin na mngon sum rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i shes par smra ba la yang /
T11TD4221.1E:227b-28: ci srid du 'di ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'o snyam pa'i nges pa ma skyes pa de srid du de rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi tha snyad ga las yin /
T11TD4221.1E:227b-29: des na rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i tha snyad la yang /
T11TD4221.1E:227b-30: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gzhan 'dod par bya dgos shing de la yang gzhan yin pas thug pa med par 'gyur ba'i phyir rtogs pa med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:227b-31: ci ste de rang nyid kho nar rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'o zhes bya bar 'gyur bas de la gzhan gyis ci bya zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:227b-32: rnam par rtog pa med pa yang rtogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pas /
T11TD4221.1E:228a-2: des na gnyis ka la yang mtshungs so //
T11TD4221.1E:228a-3: 'on te rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa la ni /
T11TD4221.1E:228a-4: 'di ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa zhes phyis tha snyad byed pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:228a-5: 'di la yang nges par rtog par byed pas rnam par rtog pa brgyud pa 'di lta bu byung bar gyur to zhes tha snyad byed pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:228a-6: rnam par rtog pa bsdus pa'i gnas skabs su ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:228a-7: de la rnam par rtog pa med par gyur to zhes tha snyad byed pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:228a-8: gal te de'i tshe med pa la rnam par rtog pas tha snyad ji ltar byed ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:228a-9: shi ba la shi'o zhes ji ltar tha snyad byed /
T11TD4221.1E:228a-10: de lta ma yin na rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa la yang rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid du ji ltar tha snyad byed /
T11TD4221.1E:228a-11: yang de'i rigs can mthong ba las so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:228a-12: 'di la yang rnam par rtog pa bsdus pa'i gnas skabs na yang nas yang du mthong ba bkag pa med pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:228a-13: des na mtshan nyid tha dad pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:228a-14: phan tshun med pa yang 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa dang cig shos dag ni gcig pa nyid ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:228a-15: ci ste tshogs pa yod pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa gzhan nyid skye ba yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:228a-16: de med pas ni rnam par rtog pa med par 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:228a-18: gal te tshogs pa las rtog ni //
T11TD4221.1E:228a-19: sngo ser tha dad med 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:228a-20: bsdoms pa gzhan du gyur pa ni ;
T11TD4221.1E:228a-21: / skyes so zhes ni rtog phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:228a-22: de ni der sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa bsdoms pa gzhan zhig skyes pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:228a-23: tshogs pa'i khyad par srid pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:228a-24: ci ste ngo shes pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:228a-25: 'di ni sngon po de nyid yin gyi bsdoms pa gzhan ni ma yin no zhes rtogs pa'i phyir de dag tha dad pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:228a-26: tha dad par rtog pa ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa dag cig shos la yang mtshungs so //
T11TD4221.1E:228a-27: de'i phyir mngon sum ni rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:228a-28: dran pa la sogs pa 'di ni dbang po'i rnam par shes pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi rgyu ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:228a-29: dbang po'i don 'dzin pa la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:228a-30: dbang pos gzung ba'i don la ni sgra dang sbyor ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:228a-31: de brjod pa nyid kyi sgra med pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:228a-32: rang gi mtshan nyid la brda mi 'jug pa'i phyir dang spyi dbang po'i gzung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:228a-33: ci'i phyir de ltar yin zhe na bshad pa /
T11TD4221.1E:228a-34: gcig tu mthong ba'i khyab par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:228a-36: de las spyi gzhan tha dad pa //
T11TD4221.1E:228b-0: @228b yod min tha dad blo med phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:228b-1: gang gi phyir khyad par ni yul dang dus kyi rjes su 'gro ba ma yin te gang gi phyir gzhan du mngon sum de nyid dam gzhan gyis mthong ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:228b-2: de ni dus gzhan na gnas pa la med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:228b-3: mngon sum gyis ni rang gi dus su chad pa'i dngos po rtogs pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:228b-4: des na snga ma phyi ma la mngon sum ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:228b-5: phyi ma la yang snga ma la ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:228b-6: gal te ngo shes pas de nyid 'di nyid yin no zhes snga ma dang phyi ma 'dzin to zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:228b-8: ngo shes pas ni mngon sum ma yin pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:228b-9: de la dbang po'i byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:228b-11: dbang po rung ba'i yul gnas pa //
T11TD4221.1E:228b-13: de la brten pa'i rnam shes kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:228b-14: dus gzhan dag tu 'byung la min //
T11TD4221.1E:228b-15: dbang po'i shes pas yul dang dus khyab par 'dzin pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:228b-16: de ltar yin na ni thams cad rnam pa thams cad mthong ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:228b-17: gal te dbang po 'das pa'i dngos po la mi 'jug kyang /
T11TD4221.1E:228b-18: de la brten pa'i rnam par shes pa la 'gal ba ci yod ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:228b-19: gal te de la brten pa'i rnam par shes pa 'das pa la 'jug na ni mig kyang 'jug par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:228b-20: mig gzhan du 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:228b-21: snga ma dang phyi ma 'dzin pa la ni mig gi byed pa rtog pa med de /
T11TD4221.1E:228b-22: snga ma dang phyi ma dag la ni /
T11TD4221.1E:228b-24: srid par rjes su dpag pa 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:228b-25: gal te de nyid dbang po 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:228b-26: rjes su dpag pa yang mngon sum du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes ston par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:228b-27: de'i phyir khyad par rnams ni rjes su 'gro ba can ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:228b-28: spyi dbang pos gzung ba rjes su 'gro ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:228b-31: de las spyi gzhan tha dad pa //
T11TD4221.1E:228b-32: yod min tha dad blo med phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:228b-33: khyad par rnams rjes su 'gro ba ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:228b-35: de ni med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:228b-36: khyad par rnams ni yod pa yin na de dag rjes su 'gro ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:228b-37: spyi rjes su 'gro ba ma yin yang de ni med pa'i phyir ma mthong bas dbang pos gzung ba'i rjes su 'gro ba ni mi srid do //
T11TD4221.1E:228b-38: 'dir spyi ni snang ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:228b-39: rnam pa gzhan snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:228b-40: tha mi dad pa yin na ni gsal ba nyid yin la de yang rjes su 'gro ba can ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:228b-41: de nyid kyi phyir tha dad pa dang tha mi dad par brjod du med pa'i phyir yang yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:229a-0: de'i phyir dbang po las skyes @229a * //
T11TD4221.1E:229a-2: thams cad khyad par yul can yin //
T11TD4221.1E:229a-3: khyad par rnams la sgra dag ni //
T11TD4221.1E:229a-4: 'jug pa srid pa yod min te //
T11TD4221.1E:229a-5: khyad par rjes 'gor med pas na //
T11TD4221.1E:229a-6: brda 'jug pa ni med phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:229a-7: rjes su 'gro ba med par snang ba la ni spyi'i rang bzhin yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:229a-8: khyad par rnams la sgra 'jug pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:229a-9: rjes su 'gro ba med pas brda mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:229a-10: brda ni tha snyad pa dag gi yul dang dus gzhan du tha snyad 'jug par bya ba'i phyir 'dod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:229a-11: de lta ma yin na ni zhen pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:229a-12: chos kyi don du yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:229a-13: de ltar su zhig yid ches des na yul dang dus so sor nges pa la ni brda 'jug pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:229a-14: de'i phyir khyad par ni sgra'i yul ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:229a-15: sgra rnams yul yang gang de nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:229a-16: de rnams la ni yang dag sbyor //
T11TD4221.1E:229a-17: des yang dag par sbyor ba ni khyad par ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:229a-18: de'i phyir khyad par 'dzin pa'i shes pa ni rtog pa dang bcas pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:229a-19: gang rtog pa dang bcas pa yang khyad par 'dzin pa med de /
T11TD4221.1E:229a-20: sgra yi spyi la sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:229a-22: sgra rnams yul ni gang yin pa //
T11TD4221.1E:229a-23: de nyid de rnams kyis sbyor byed //
T11TD4221.1E:229a-24: des na khyad par ni sbyor nas 'dzin pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:229a-25: de'i phyir khyad par 'dzin pa'i shes pa rtog pa dang bcas pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:229a-26: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa gang yin pa de yang khyad par 'dzin pa ni yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:229a-27: spyi sgra dang sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:229a-31: don snang ba ni gang yin pa //
T11TD4221.1E:229a-32: de dag nyid ni 'brel yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:229a-33: de yi dbang po'i spyod yul min //
T11TD4221.1E:229a-34: don mthong yang de ni 'di'i rjod par byed pa yin la 'di ni 'di'i brjod par bya ba yin no zhes 'brel par byed pa'i shes pa la snang ba de dag nyid brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:229a-35: de'i dbang po'i yul ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:229a-37: 'di 'di'i brjod par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don ci yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:229a-38: 'di las 'di rtogs par bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:229a-39: ges pa gang gis rtogs par bya ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:229a-40: ci lkog tu gyur pa'i don can rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pas sam /
T11TD4221.1E:229a-41: 'on te mngon sum du byed pa'i mngon sum gyis yin /
T11TD4221.1E:229a-42: gal te mngon du byed pa'i mngon sum gyis de rtogs par bya ba yin na ni dbang po'i tshogs don med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:229a-43: 'on te lkog tu gyur pa'i don can gyis yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:229a-44: de'i tshe dbang po'i yul gyi don 'brel pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:229b-0: de'i @229b tshe dbang po'i yul gyi don med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:229b-1: yang na don dang sgra med kyang 'di'i rjod par byed pa 'di'i yin no zhes 'brel par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:229b-3: de tshe gsal bar snang ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:229b-4: don snang ba ni med phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:229b-5: shes snang tha dad pa yis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:229b-6: don rnams khyad par byed pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:229b-7: dbang po'i yul gyi don ni gsal bar snang ba yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:229b-8: lkog tu gyur pa'i don la ni mi gsal bar snang ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:229b-9: snang ba tha dad pa yin yang gcig pa nyid ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:229b-10: gal te nye ba dang ring bar ngas pas shes pa'i snang ba gsal ba dang mi gsal bar tha dad kyang yul gcig pa nyid yin pa'i phyir snang ba tha dad pa tha dad par ji ltar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:229b-11: tha dad pa'i don byed pa tha dad pa las yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:229b-12: don byed pa tha dad pa yang snang ba tha dad pa kho na ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:229b-13: gzhan du gyur pa'i 'bras bu tha dad pas ni tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:229b-14: snang ba tha dad pa med par 'bras bu tha dad pas ni rgyu tha dad par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:229b-15: snang ba tha dad pa yang yod pa kho na'o zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:229b-16: 'o na ni de nyid las tha dad par 'gyur bas 'bras bu tha dad pas ci bya /
T11TD4221.1E:229b-17: gal te 'bras bu tha dad pas rgyu tha dad pa yin na 'bras bu tha dad pa gang las yin /
T11TD4221.1E:229b-18: 'bras bu gzhan tha dad pa las so zhe na thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:229b-19: snang ba tha dad pa las yin no zhe na ni rgyu yang de nyid las tha dad par 'gyur bas 'bras bu tha dad pa ci zhig bya /
T11TD4221.1E:229b-20: don byed pas tha dad pas tha dad pa la yang snang ba tha dad pa de nyid tha dad par byed pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:229b-21: gsal bar snang ba nyid don byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:229b-22: de'i phyir yul thag ring po na gnas pa'i mi gsal bar snang ba ni dngos po'i yul can ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:229b-23: mi slu ba'i phyir yul gcig nyid yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:229b-24: de ni rjes su dpag pa la yang yod pa yin pas der yang snang ba tha dad pa 'ba' zhig gis tha dad par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:229b-25: 'o na ni gang gi tshe mig mngon du phye bas de lta bu las brda byed pa de'i tshe sgra dngos po yul can du 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:229b-27: mig la don snang ba na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:229b-28: 'di zhes gzhan gyis bstan pa gang //
T11TD4221.1E:229b-29: de nyid sgra yis sbyor byed kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:229b-30: dbang po'i spyod yul ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:230a-0: gal te mig dang rna ba dag la sgra dang bum ba la sogs pa snang ba de ltar yang rang gi ngo bor snang ba tsam gyis ni 'brel pa ma yin gyi 'di'i rjod par byed pa ni 'di yin no zhes tha dad pa'i rnam par dbye bas bstan pa gang yin pa de nyid sbyor @230a * //
T11TD4221.1E:230a-1: ba yin na mngon sum la ni rnam par dbye ba'i don snang ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:230a-2: don rkyang pa tsam zhig snang ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:230a-3: rnam par dbye ba'i don ni rnam par rtog pa'i snang ba'i yul nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:230a-5: 'di'i zhes 'brel pa ni phan gdags bya 'dogs byed med par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:230a-6: des na res 'ga' ni blo'i yul gyi don las sgra 'byung la /
T11TD4221.1E:230a-7: res 'ga' ni sgar las blo la gnas pa'i don yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:230a-8: blo'i rang bzhin dang rnam par rig byed rgyu dang 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid kyis 'brel pa la brten nas rnam par dbye ba 'byung ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:230a-9: mngon sum la snang pa'i rgyu mtshan / ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:230a-10: de med par yod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:230a-11: gal te mig la sogs pas bskyed pa la snang ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid la brda byed pa yin na ni de'i tshe de nyid kyis snang bar 'gyur ba zhig na de ltar ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:230a-12: dbang po'i bya ba med pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:230a-13: gzhan dag tsam gyis snang med phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:230a-14: ci ste yang gal te rang gi mtshan nyid la brda med mod /
T11TD4221.1E:230a-15: de lta na yang de nyid brjod bya yin pa'i phyir 'gal ba ci yod ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:230a-16: 'brel pa ma byas can min te //
T11TD4221.1E:230a-17: rang nyid shes par thal phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:230a-18: yang na gal te rang gi mtshan nyid la brda byed na ci ltar spyi rtogs par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:230a-19: de lta bu nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:230a-21: 'brel par ma byas can zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:230a-22: de'i phyir dbang po'i shes pa ni 'brel pa med par brjod bya ma yin pa kho na shes pa yin pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:230a-23: 'o na ji ltar 'di ba lang zhes bya ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:230a-24: spu la sbrul snyam pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa gsal bar snang bar rtogs 'dir rnam par rtog pa'i gzhan nyid do zhes bya bar ni nus pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:230a-25: 'dzin par byed pa gzhan rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:230a-26: 'di la rnam par rtog pa'i gzung ba lkog tu gyur pa yang med de gsal ba dang cig shos kyi snang ba gnyis rtogs par thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:230a-27: 'on te sngar rnam par mi rtog pa yang de snang ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:230a-28: rnam par rtog pa'i dus su gzung bar bya ba khyad par du yang gyur pa yang yod pa ma yin zhing //
T11TD4221.1E:230a-29: gzung ba khyad par du gyur pa ma yin na ni 'dzin par yang ji ltar 'gyur snyam na /
T11TD4221.1E:230a-31: nges pa dang ni ma nges pa //
T11TD4221.1E:230a-32: nyid kyis khyad par dmigs pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:230a-34: mthong ba nyid ni mi 'thad min //
T11TD4221.1E:230b-0: shes par 'gyur ba nyid ni dgag pa'i @230b yul ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:230b-1: rnam par rtog pas shes par 'gyur ba ni mi bden pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:230b-3: bden min nyid ni ga las grub //
T11TD4221.1E:230b-4: rnam rtog phyir na 'dir tshad gang //
T11TD4221.1E:230b-5: rnam rtog med pa'i blo la yang //
T11TD4221.1E:230b-6: mi bden nyid ni brjod par bya //
T11TD4221.1E:230b-7: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba de tsam nyid kyis ni mi bden pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:230b-8: rnam par rtog pa med pa yang mi bden par thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:230b-9: rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de ltar ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:230b-10: de ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa la yang mtshungs pa'i phyir khyad par med do //
T11TD4221.1E:230b-12: mngon sum du byed pa ji ltar mi bden pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:230b-13: rnam par rtog pa med pa ni nges pa med pa yin pas mi bden pa nyid du srid kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:230b-14: nges pa'i rang bzhin mngon du byed pa go mi bden pa nyid du ji ltar dogs /
T11TD4221.1E:230b-15: 'on te nges pa 'di ni rjes su dpag pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:230b-17: yul ni lkog tu ma gyur pas //
T11TD4221.1E:230b-18: rjes dpag srid pa min phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:230b-19: yul gyi dbye ba nyid las ni //
T11TD4221.1E:230b-20: tshad ma'i dbye ba sgrub phyir te //
T11TD4221.1E:230b-21: tshad ma nges pa med pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:230b-22: min par sgrub par byed phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:230b-24: de thams cad ni bden pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:230b-26: rtog bcas rtog pa med pa'i yid //
T11TD4221.1E:230b-27: cig car bu ni 'jug phyir ram //
T11TD4221.1E:230b-28: 'jug pa myur phyir blun po dag / de dag la ni gcig tu zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:230b-30: gal te ba lang snyam pa'i rnam par rtog pa ba la sogs pa'i yi ger nges pa can rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin par nus pa yin na ni mngon sum gyis shes pa 'di ni gcig tu rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid do zhes bya bar rig par 'gyur ba zhig na /
T11TD4221.1E:230b-31: gang gi phyir yi ge'i rnam par 'dzin pa thams cad ni sngon mthong ba'i stobs las byung ba'i bag chags kyi sa bon sad pa las yi ge mi gsal bar snang bar rtogs pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:230b-32: de'i phyir gzhan kho na yin la mdun na 'dug pa'i ka ba gsal bar snang ba'i shes pa ni mngon sum yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:230b-33: de la ni rnam par rtog pa yod pa'i phyir 'di nyid mngon sum gyi shes pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:230b-34: 'o na gcig tu zhen par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:230b-36: re zhig 'di ni ba lang ngo snyam pa'i shes pa ni khra bo dang ba lang la sogs pa'i yi ge rnam pa gcig tu zhen pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:230b-37: snang ba tha dad pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:230b-38: yi ge ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa rim gyis skye bar 'gyur ba rnams kyang gcig gi ngo bo nyid ma yin no /
T11TD4221.1E:231a-0: @231a * // yi ge snang ba'i shes pa nyid ni khra bo la dmigs pa ma yin te de med kyang khra bor snang ba'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:231a-1: yi ger snang ba de yang mig btsums pa la yang snang ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:231a-2: de med kyang snang ba ni ma nges pa'i bdag nyid yin la nges pa ni de las khyad par du gyur pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:231a-3: nges pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin ;
T11TD4221.1E:231a-4: rang bzhin gsal bar snang ba'o zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:231a-5: ma yin te sngon nyid snang ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:231a-6: sngon gyi rang bzhin nyid du snang ba na rnam pa gzhan de nyid mi gsal ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:231a-7: de'i phyir ji ltar rnam pa gzhan snang ba na gzhan nges pa zhes bya /
T11TD4221.1E:231a-8: de dang gcig tu nges par byas pa'i phyir nges pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:231a-9: tha dad par snang bdag la gcig tu nges pa bden par ji ltar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:231a-10: 'o na gcig nyid kyi tha snyad ji ltar zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:231a-11: 'bras bu 'jug pa gcig yin pa'i phyir te 'bras bu gcig pa nyid kyis ni de gcig tu zhen pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:231a-12: 'o na rim gyis 'dzin par ji ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:231a-13: yul cig car nye bar gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:231a-14: yi ger rnam par rtog pa'i dus su mngon sum gyi shes pa'i don nye bar mi gnas pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:231a-15: yang na khyed kyi yul nye ba na myur du 'jug pa'i phyir rim gyis 'dzin par nges pa ma yin pa de bzhin du kho bo cag gis 'dzin pa yang yin pas khyad par med do //
T11TD4221.1E:231a-16: gal te rnam par rtog pa gzhan nyid yin na ji ltar de'i yul brjod par bya ba'i rang bzhin mi gsal ba nyid du snang bar ma gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:231a-17: de la yul gzhan med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:231a-18: 'o na ni der yul med pa zhugs pas de bar du bcad pa na /
T11TD4221.1E:231a-19: mthong ba rgyun chad par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:231a-21: bar du bcad pa med pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:231a-22: dus mnyam pas ni bar du gcod pa mi srid do //
T11TD4221.1E:231a-24: gal te rnam rtog gis bcad pas //
T11TD4221.1E:231a-25: mthong ba rgyun chad 'gyur zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:231a-26: gzhan gyi'ang rigs ni tha dad pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:231a-27: rnam par rtog tshe ji ltar min //
T11TD4221.1E:231a-28: mngon sum gcig tu rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa gang yin pa de la ni rgyun chad pa med de /
T11TD4221.1E:231a-29: de nyid kyi bar du gcod pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:231a-30: rnam par rtog par med par smra ba la ni rnam par rtog pa gzhan kho na yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:231a-31: des na bar du gcod do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:231a-32: rigs mi gcig pa'i rnam par rtog pa byung ba'i tshe don gzhan mthong ba'i rgyun mi 'chad par ji ltar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:231a-33: rigs mi gcig pa'i rtogs pa ni gzhan gyi mngon sum gyi shes pa'i rang bzhin nyid ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:231b-0: gzhan la snang ba'i rang bzhin du rnam par @231b rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:231b-1: ci ste de la rgyun chad pa ni yod pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:231b-2: 'on kyang mthong ba'i dngos po stobs dang ldan pas rab tu zhugs pa'i mthong ba ma yin pas bsgribs pa ni rang gi tha snyad mi mthong ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:231b-3: des na rgyun chad pa med par zhen pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:231b-6: gal te mgal me mthong ba bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:231b-7: dngos phyogs stobs dang ldan 'dod na //
T11TD4221.1E:231b-8: de ni gzhan la'ang mtshungs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:231b-9: yi ge'ang cig car thos par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:231b-10: gal te rnam par rtog pa rigs mtshungs kyang dngos po'i phyogs stobs dang ldan pa yin na /
