T11TD4221.1E:231b-11: rnam par rtog pa med par smra ba la yang mtshungs pa'i phyir bar du chod pa ma yin pas skyon med do //
T11TD4221.1E:231b-12: 'di ni khas blangs nas brjod par zad do //
T11TD4221.1E:231b-13: bar du gcod pa ni mi srid do //
T11TD4221.1E:231b-14: myur ba'i phyir na bar du chod pa la yang bar mchod par shes pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:231b-15: gang gi phyir myur ba'i phyir na myur bar brjod pa'i yi ge dag kyang dus gcig tu thos par thal bar 'gyur na de ltar yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:231b-16: de'i phyir myur ba ni 'dir rim pa dang ldan pa la yang bar du mchod par snang ba'i rgyu ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:231b-17: ci ste de la ni myur ba nyid med pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:231b-18: des na dus gcig tu thos pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:231b-19: 'dir myur ba med pa yin no zhes bya ba ga las yid dag tu gcig tu 'jug pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:231b-21: de lta ma yin na cig car du rtogs pa nyid med par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:231b-23: cig car ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:231b-24: 'o na autpala'i 'dab ma brgya phigs pa yang cig car nyid du 'gyur bas rim par brtags pa ci bya zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:231b-26: de la ni rim gyis yul du phyin pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pas rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:231b-27: 'di ni de ltar rjes su dpag pa med pa'i phyir rim par rtogs par ji ltar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:231b-28: rim yang med par rtog pa la rgyu ci yod ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:231b-29: mngon sum gyi bdag nyid kyi snang ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:231b-30: mngon sum du snang ba las gzhan pa'i sgrub par byed pa yang rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:231b-31: sngar brjod pa'i yi ge cig car thos pa'i rgyu mgyogs pa gang yin pa de nyid med pa de la brjod pa /
T11TD4221.1E:231b-32: 'dir don kun dang cig car du //
T11TD4221.1E:231b-33: 'dus can dbang rnams yod pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:231b-34: lnga po rnams kyis chod na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:231b-35: chod med bzhin du snang ba'i blo //
T11TD4221.1E:231b-36: gang de ming gi mthar thug pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:231b-37: shes pa'i skad cig dang 'dres phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:231b-38: chod par snang ba de ngo mtshar //
T11TD4221.1E:231b-39: de phyir blo ni cig car 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:231b-40: gang zhig blo cig car skye ba ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:232a-1: zhen pa der ni myur du 'jug pa las rgyu gzhan med de /
T11TD4221.1E:232a-2: de ltar lhag par zhen pa ni mgyogs par 'jug pa las yin no zhes 'dod pa de la 'di skad brjod do //
T11TD4221.1E:232a-3: yi ge skyen par brjod pa la yang ji ltar mi 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:232a-4: gal te de lta bu'i mgyogs pa nyid med pa'i phyir gzhan ma yin nam zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:232a-5: 'o na 'dir yang de bas kyang mgyogs pa ches shas chung ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:232a-6: gang du yul lnga nye bar gnas pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:232a-7: rnam par rtog pa nus pa dang ldan par gyur pa /
T11TD4221.1E:232a-8: dper na dri zhim zhing blta na sdug pa'i na chung gi kha'i ro myong ba glu snyan pa la rna gtod pa lta bu'o //
T11TD4221.1E:232a-9: der ni sems re re yang lngas bar du chod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:232a-10: 'dir ches mgyogs pa shas chung ba de 'dra ba yin mod kyi de lta na yang cig car 'dzin par snang ba de bzhin du yi ge rnams la yang 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:232a-11: gang du lngas bar du chod kyang cig car du zhen pa sgrub par nus pa'i mgyogs pas /
T11TD4221.1E:232a-12: yi ge'i yul can skad cig shes pas bar mchod pa der ji ltar nus par mi 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:232a-13: de'i phyir blo ni cig car kho na skye bar rigs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:232a-14: de lta ma yin na 'gal ba bsgrub par mi nus pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:232a-16: rtog bcas rtog pa med pa'i yid //
T11TD4221.1E:232a-17: cig car du ni 'jug phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:232a-18: zhes bya ba 'di ni 'thad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:232a-20: snang ba la yang khyad med na //
T11TD4221.1E:232a-21: bar bcas bar med ci ltar yin //
T11TD4221.1E:232a-22: yid kyi rtog pa 'ba' zhig la //
T11TD4221.1E:232a-24: la lar ni bar dang bcas pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:232a-25: gang du rigs mi mthun pas bar du bcas pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:232a-26: la lar ni bar chad med pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:232a-27: rigs mi mthun ba'i rnam par rtog pas bar du ma bcas pas so zhes bya ba'o //
T11TD4221.1E:232a-28: bar chad dang bcas pa dang bar chad med pa de dag gal te snang ba khyad par med na ji ltar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:232a-29: yid kyi rnam par rtog pa 'ba' zhig rgyun du 'byung ba gang yin pa de'i yang rim pa dang ldan par snang bar mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:232a-31: gal te rnam par shes pa cig car 'byung na res 'ga' don tshogs kyang 'dzin pa med par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:232a-33: la lar kun tu chags sems can //
T11TD4221.1E:232a-34: don nye ba la'ang 'dzin med gang //
T11TD4221.1E:232a-35: chags pas gzhan skyed nus nyams phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:232a-36: gnyi ga la yang rtsod 'di yod //
T11TD4221.1E:232b-0: gzhan la chags pas nus pa nyams par 'gyur ba yin na ni shes pa de nye bar gnas pa thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa skyed pa'i de ma thag rkyen du mi @232b 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:232b-1: gnyi ga la brgal zhing brtag pa mtshungs pa yang yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:232b-3: gcig kho na la yid kyi nus pa yod pa'i phyir zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:232b-4: de lta na yang cig car 'dzin par snang bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:232b-5: gang la cher chags pa med pa de la 'gyur ba kho na'o zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:232b-6: kho bo cag kyang de skad smra ste /
T11TD4221.1E:232b-7: gang du chags pa der rim gyis 'dzin la /
T11TD4221.1E:232b-8: gzhan du ni cig car ro //
T11TD4221.1E:232b-9: thams cad du rim gyis 'dzin pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di la ni tshad ma med do //
T11TD4221.1E:232b-10: rnam par shes pa snga ma las ma gtogs pa yid gzhan ni tshad ma'i yul du 'gyur ba med do //
T11TD4221.1E:232b-11: gal te mgal me rim gyis 'dzin pa yin yang cig car du snang ba ma yin nam zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:232b-13: der rim gyis snang ba mtshams sbyar bas blo der 'gyur ba ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang der ni cig car kho na snang ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:232b-15: mgal me la sogs myur 'jug pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:232b-16: rjes su 'gro bas gnod pa can //
T11TD4221.1E:232b-18: de mthong mtshams sbyor bas ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:232b-19: myur du bskor ba'i mgal me'i skad cig rnams kyi rjes su 'gro bas nyams par byas pa'i mig nyid kyis 'khor lor snang ba blo skyed par byed kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:232b-20: dngos po'i phyogs stobs dang ldan pa ni yid kyi shes pa de ltar gyur pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:232b-21: ci ste na yang yul lnga nye bar gnas pa ni cig car snang ba ni 'khrul pa kho na yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:232b-22: 'o na ni thams cad du ni cig car snang ba 'khrul pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:232b-25: 'khrul pa nyid la tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:232b-26: cig car snang ba nyid ni 'khrul pa med pa'i mngon sum gyi rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:232b-27: gnod par byed pa med kyang de ltar snang ba de 'khrul pa yin na ni shes pa thams cad de ltar thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:232b-28: des na gnod par byed pa med pa'i phyir cig car dmigs pa'i shes pa lnga po cig car nyid yin no zhes 'grub pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:232b-29: des na mngon sum ni rnam par rtog pa med pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:232b-30: da ni gzhan gyi 'dod pa nye bar bkod de 'gog par byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:232b-31: la la dbang skyes la sogs phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:232b-32: byis pa'i blo bzhin rtog med dang ;
T11TD4221.1E:232b-33: / byis pa'i rtog med nyid kyi rgyu //
T11TD4221.1E:232b-34: brda nyams pa nyid yin smra pa //
T11TD4221.1E:232b-35: gzhan dag mngon sum ni rtog pa med pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:232b-36: dbang po las skyes pa yin pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:232b-37: nyams su myong ba'i rnam pas 'jug pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:232b-38: yid ma yin pa'i phyir byis pa'i rnam par shes pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:233a-1: par shes pa rtog pa med pa nyid ni brda 'dzin par mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes smra ba /
T11TD4221.1E:233a-2: de dag gi ni rtog med phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:233a-3: byis pa'i mngon sum nyid du 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:233a-4: brda yi rgyu dang bral ba'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:233a-5: de ni phyis kyang mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:233a-6: de skad smras pa de dag gi ltar na byis pa dag ni mngon sum kho na 'gyur mod /
T11TD4221.1E:233a-7: byis pa la ni thams cad rtog pa med par 'dod pa kho na'o zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:233a-9: byis pa la yang rang gi don bya ba la snga ma dang phyi mar rtogs pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:233a-10: ci ste de'i tshe med na ni phyis kyang rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:233a-11: brda 'dzin pa'i thabs med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:233a-12: brda 'dzin pa'i thabs ni rnam par rtog pa yin pa de ni byis pa la med do //
T11TD4221.1E:233a-13: 'on te gal te brda la ma byang ba'i //
T11TD4221.1E:233a-14: yid yod des na de 'dod na //
T11TD4221.1E:233a-15: de bzhin dbang skyes la yang 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:233a-17: gal te byis pa rnams kyi yid kyi tha snyad byed pa de'i phyir byis pa rnams la rnam par dpyod pa yod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:233a-18: des na brda 'dzin pa'i phyir phyis yid rnam par rtog pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:233a-19: gal te de ltar na ni dbang po las skyes pa la yang 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:233a-20: dbang po las skyes pa yang phyis rnam par rtog pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba cis zlog par byed //
T11TD4221.1E:233a-21: byis pa'i dbang po'i rnam par shes pa de yang brda 'dzin par nus pa med pa ga las yin /
T11TD4221.1E:233a-22: dbang po las skyes pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:233a-24: gzhan yang gal te byis pa'i dbang po las skyes pa rnam par rtog pa med pa yin du chug kyang /
T11TD4221.1E:233a-25: thams cad du de ltar 'gyur dgos so zhes bya ba 'di ga las yin /
T11TD4221.1E:233a-26: gnod par byed pa'i tshad mas 'brel ba grub pa med par dpe tsam gyis ni gtan tshigs go bar byed pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:233a-27: ci ste gang zhig dbang po las skyes pa de ni nye ba tsam 'dzin par byed pa yin pas snga phyi 'dzin pas stong pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa med pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:233a-28: 'di snga phyi 'dzin pas stong pa nyid du ji ltar 'grub /
T11TD4221.1E:233a-29: mngon sum du byed pa ni snga ma dang phyi ma de dag la med pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:233a-30: mngon sum du byed pa ma yin pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:233a-31: mngon sum nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:233a-32: de lta na ni 'o na dbang po'i shes pa yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:233a-33: byis pa'i rnam par shes bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:233a-34: zhes bya ba don med pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:233a-35: rtog pa med pa nyid ni mngon sum gyis grub par 'gyur te mngon sum du byed par so sor nges pa nyid ni /
T11TD4221.1E:233a-36: mngon sum gyis nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:233b-0: de lta ma yin na gal te @233b gang du yang mngon sum rtog pa med pa nyid kyi sgrub par byed pa ma yin na ji ltar de'i rjes su 'brangs nas rjes su dpag pa 'jug / ci ste byis pa'i rnam par shes pa mngon sum du byed pa'i rnam pa can yin pa de'i phyir dbang po'i shes pa gzhan yang da lta bu nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:233b-2: byis pa la sgrub gang yin pa //
T11TD4221.1E:233b-3: de nyid 'dir yang brjod bya ste //
T11TD4221.1E:233b-4: dbang po'i blo ni mtshungs phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:233b-5: 'dis ni myong sogs bshad pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:233b-6: bskal ba la mngon du byed pa ma mthong ba'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:233b-7: gzhan la mthong ba'i phyir lkog tu ma gyur pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir mngon sum rtog pa med pa yin no zhes spyir bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:233b-8: dbang po las skyes pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyis ci zhig bya /
T11TD4221.1E:233b-9: mngon sum du byed pa ni de ni rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid du brjod do //
T11TD4221.1E:233b-10: rnam par rtog pa nyid ni rtog pa dang bcas pa 'gal ba'i phyir mngon sum du byed pa yin pa de ni rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyis khyab pa yin pa de'i phyir 'di ni 'gal bas khyab pa'i dmigs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:233b-11: yang na rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyis ni rtog pa dang bcas pa 'gal ba'i phyir mngon sum du byed pa sgrub cing de las kyang mngon sum nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:233b-12: gal te rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyis ni mngon sum du byed pa sgrub pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:233b-13: des mngon sum nyid yin na zla ba gnyis la sogs pa rig pa rnams kyang 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:233b-14: ma 'khrul pa nyid yin na zhes rjod par byed pa yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:233b-15: gal te ma 'khrul pa nyid kyis chog mod rnam par rtog pa med pas ci bya zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:233b-16: khyad par ni gzhan la ltos pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:233b-17: de skad du yang mtshan nyid la gzhan gyi lugs la ltos nas khyad par du byas so zhes bshad do ;
T11TD4221.1E:233b-18: / thams cad du yang rtog pa ni med pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:233b-19: 'khrul pa med pa'i shes pa thams cad ni rtog pa med pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:233b-20: 'khrul pa med pa nyid kyang slob dpon gyi dmigs kyis bsal ba'i sgo nas bstan pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:233b-21: yang na dbang po las brten pas ni mngon sum ste /
T11TD4221.1E:233b-22: des ni mngon sum du byed pa nyid mtshon pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:233b-23: de'i phyir mngon sum du byed pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa'i shes pa thams cad ni rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:233b-24: yang na 'jug par byed cing khyad par byed par phyir mngon sum yin la yul gyi rang bzhin la khyad par byed pa yang mngon du byed pa kho na yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:233b-25: des dbang po las skyes pa thams cad ni rtog pa med pa kho na'o//
T11TD4221.1E:234a-0: @234a * // yang na slob dpon gyis ma 'khrul pa smos pa med pa kho na ste /
T11TD4221.1E:234a-1: rtog pa dang bral ba'i zhes bya ba kho na mtshan nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:234a-2: 'o na ji ltar 'khrul pa'i shes pa rnam par bcad ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:234a-3: mngon sum du byed pa thams cad ni mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:234a-4: zla ba gnyis kyi shes pa la sogs pa yang gnyis nyid du snang ba la mngon sum kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:234a-5: des na gang zhig gang la mngon sum du byed pa de ni de la mngon sum yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:234a-6: de ni phyi rol la 'khrul pa yin na de la ni mngon sum du byed pa nyid ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:234a-7: snang ba'i rang bzhin las tha dad pa gzhan yod do zhes bya ba 'di ni rtog pa tsam yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:234a-8: de skad du yang 'khrul par 'gyur ba ni yid kyis 'khrul pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do //
T11TD4221.1E:234a-9: phyi rol la ma 'khrul pa yang rtog pa'i shes pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:234a-12: ci lta ci ltar don bsams pa //
T11TD4221.1E:234a-13: de lta de ltar rnam par bral //
T11TD4221.1E:234a-14: mkhas pa rnams kyis gang gsungs pa //
T11TD4221.1E:234a-15: de ni dngos stobs 'ongs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:234a-18: khyad par dang ni khyad par gzhi //
T11TD4221.1E:234a-20: bzung nas de dag bsdams byas te /
T11TD4221.1E:234a-21: de ltar rtogs kyi gzhan du min //
T11TD4221.1E:234a-22: dper dbyug can bzhin rigs sogs kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:234a-23: bye brag rtogs pa med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:234a-24: de ldan sbyor ba yod min pa //
T11TD4221.1E:234a-25: des na 'di la rtogs pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:234a-26: rtogs pa ni sbyor ba 'dzin pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:234a-27: sbyor bar byed pa yang khyad par la sogs pa so sor 'dzin pa med pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:234a-28: dper na dbyig pa can du rtogs pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:234a-29: rigs la sogs pa ni so sor nges par bzung ba med pa'i phyir de dang ldan pa dang sbyor ba med pa'i phyir ji ltar dbang po'i rnam par shes pa rtog pa dang bcas pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:234a-31: tha dad med par snang ba ni //
T11TD4221.1E:234a-32: gang zhig gang dang sbyor bar byed //
T11TD4221.1E:234a-33: tha dad par ni snang ba dag / sbyor ba dang ni rtogs pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:234a-34: tha mi dad par snang ba de ni gcig kho na yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:234a-35: de la sbyor ba'i don spyi zhig yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:234a-36: sbyor ba ni gnyis la ltos pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:234a-37: ci ste tha dad par snang na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:234a-38: de'i tshe gnyis phan tshun dben par snang ba'i phyir sbyor ba shin tu yang med pas na sbyor ba ni srid pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:234a-39: de'i phyir don dam par na sbyor ba med do //
T11TD4221.1E:234a-40: gal te khyad par la sogs pa so sor snang ba dag la 'gyur du chug kyang rigs dang ldan pa la sogs pa la ni 'di srid pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:234b-0: rigs pa @234b dang yon tan dang bya ba dag ni de dang ldan pa las tha dad par snang ba med do //
T11TD4221.1E:234b-1: de nyid kyi phyir 'dres par snang ba ni sbyor ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:234b-3: tha dad pa dag ni 'dres par snang ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:234b-4: de ltar snang ba yul dang dus mtshungs pa'i phyir de ltar 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:234b-6: yul dang dus mtshungs pa dag kyang rang bzhin tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:234b-7: yul dang dus tha dad pa dag kyang rang bzhin tha dad pa kho na'i phyir de ltar snang ba yin gyi yul dang dus tha dad pas ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:234b-8: gal te de la rang bzhin tha dad pa med na ni yul la sogs pa tha dad par snang bar mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:234b-9: yul tha mi dad kyang gzhan dag ni kha dog dang dbyibs dag dang /
T11TD4221.1E:234b-10: rlung dang nyi ma dag tha dad par snang ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:234b-11: yul la sogs pa tha mi dad pas ni snang ba tha dad par nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:234b-12: ci ste 'phrod pa 'du ba'i 'brel pa'i stobs kyis gcig tu 'dres pa'i ngo bor snang ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:234b-13: de ltar yin na ni thams cad du de ltar rtogs par thal bar 'gyur bas /
T11TD4221.1E:234b-14: tha dad pa med par snang ba thams cad tha dad pa med pa'i sgrub byed du mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:234b-15: gal te ba lang zhes khyad par can gyi shes pa nyid las blo 'di sbyor ba'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:234b-16: khyad par can gyi shes pa ni gang du yang khyad par med par dmigs pa ma yin te dbyug pa can zhes rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:234b-17: de ni 'di yin no zhes bstan par bya ba ni ma yin te so sor snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:234b-18: dbyig pa can no zhes bya bar shes pa la yang dbyug pa tha dad par snang ba ni yod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:234b-19: der ni skyes bu tsam zhig snang ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:234b-20: dbyug pa dang 'brel pa'i snga rol nyid du ci'i phyir mi 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:234b-22: tshogs pa med pas khyad par can nyid gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:234b-23: skyes bu la khyad par can nyid gzhan yod pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:234b-24: de rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:234b-25: khyad par can ni dbyug pa can nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:234b-26: dper na chu la sogs pa'i nus pa ni sa bon gyi lhan cig byed pa nyid yin pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:234b-27: gal te dbyig pa yang snang ba yin na ni dbyug pa dang skyes bu dag go zhes rtogs par thal lo zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:234b-28: de thams cad ni mi 'thad de /
T11TD4221.1E:234b-29: gal te 'ba' zhig snang na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:234b-30: mi rtogs khyad par nyid mi 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:234b-31: de ste snang ba yin na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:234b-32: dbyug dang skyes bu dag ces 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:235a-0: dper na skyes bu'i zhes bya bar snang ba 'ba' zhig la khyad par can nyid yod pa ma yin pa de @235a * //
T11TD4221.1E:235a-1: bzhin du dbyig pa can zhes bya ba la yang 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:235a-2: gal te khyad par can nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:235a-4: rang la brten pa'i khyad par gyis //
T11TD4221.1E:235a-5: khyad par can gyi shes yin nam //
T11TD4221.1E:235a-6: gzhal bya'i khyad par las kyang rung //
T11TD4221.1E:235a-7: gnyi ga'ang bden pa nyid ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:235a-8: gal te re zhig rang la brten pa'i khyad par gyi rtogs pa yin na ni de'i tshe don sbyor ba'i rang bzhin rtogs pa yin par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:235a-9: bde ba la sogs pa rang la brten pa'i khyad par gyis ni dbang po'i rtog pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:235a-10: yul med par shes pa 'i khyad par gyi de nyid mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:235a-12: de ma thag pa'i rkyen las kyang khyad par bsgrub pa yin no zhes bshad par bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:235a-13: khyad par yul la brten pa yin na ni dbyug pa dang skyes bu gnyi ga rtogs pa'i phyir dbyig pa can gyi shes pa bskyed pa tsam gyis yul can du ji ltar 'gyur gnyi ga rtogs so zhes bya ba 'di ni tha snyad tsam du brjod par zad kyi don dam par ni ma yin te rnam par rtog pa ni yul med pa can yin na ji ltar gnyis kyi tshig tu mi 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:235a-14: 'di ni tha snyad tsam du zad de /
T11TD4221.1E:235a-15: bag chags kyi khyad par snga ma snga ma las 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir skyon med do //
T11TD4221.1E:235a-16: gtso bo ma yin pa'i phyir khyad par ni rtogs kyang de brjod par mi 'dod pas skyes bu tsam zhig brtsis nas gcig tu 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:235a-17: gal te tshul 'dis skyes bu tsam yul yin par brjod na brjod la rag mod /
T11TD4221.1E:235a-18: snang ba med par ni mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:235a-19: ci ste yul dang dus la sogs pa'i khyad par can rnams 'ba' zhig snang ba yin yang de la khyad par can nyid shes pa la snang ba med pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:235a-22: rang bzhin mi mthun pa nyid ni //
T11TD4221.1E:235a-23: khyad par can nyid de yi tshe //
T11TD4221.1E:235a-24: gzhan phyogs thams cad nyams par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:235a-25: gal te re zhig don gzhan dang bcas pa nyid khyad par can yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:235a-26: dper na rgyan gyi khyad par can bzhin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:235a-27: snga ma dang phyi ma la sogs pa de ni shes pa la snang ba yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:235a-28: de la phyogs gzhan snang ba ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:235a-29: ci ste mi 'dra ba nyid yin pa de'i tshe ni snga ma dang phyi ma'i bum pa dag mi 'dra ba nyid du snang ba yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:235a-30: mi 'dra ba ni don gyi rang bzhin nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:235a-31: de snang na ni rtog pa med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:235a-32: khyad par can gyi shes pa'i yul nyid kyang spangs zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:235b-0: de'i phyir gal te gnyis su snang @235b ba yin na ni sbyor ba yin zhing de las ni rtog par 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:235b-1: de la gnyis su snang ba tsam ni rtog pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang sngar so sor mthong ba sngon du 'gro ba can gyi sbyor bar byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:235b-2: gal te rjes su 'gro ba can gyi shes pa dmigs pa'i phyir rigs la sogs pa snang ba nyid ma yin nam zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:235b-4: rjes 'gro can gyi rnam shes gang //
T11TD4221.1E:235b-5: de yang sgra dang gsal bar snang //
T11TD4221.1E:235b-6: kha dog dbyibs yig rnam pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:235b-7: stong pa ba lang nyid du brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:235b-8: de nyid mtshungs pa nyid yin yang //
T11TD4221.1E:235b-9: mig gi yul la mthong med de //
T11TD4221.1E:235b-10: snang ba gnyis ni med phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:235b-11: blo tha dad pa'ang rnyed par dka' //
T11TD4221.1E:235b-12: rjes su 'gro ba can gyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de la ni spyi gzhan snang ba med do //
T11TD4221.1E:235b-13: rjes su 'gro ba'i rang bzhin snang ngo zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:235b-15: sgra dang gsal ba las ma gtogs pa gzhan mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:235b-16: sgra las spyi'i rnam par shes pa snang bar 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:235b-18: mthong ba'i mdog dang dbyibs ci lta ba bzhin du dran pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:235b-19: 'dir rjes su 'gro ba gzhan snang ba ni yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:235b-20: kha dog dang dbyibs tsam zhig snang ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:235b-21: rje sus 'gro ba can thams cad ni ming tsam dang 'brel pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:235b-22: 'di yang ba lang 'di yang ba lang zhes ming dang /
T11TD4221.1E:235b-23: don byed pa mtshungs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:235b-24: yang na rtogs par byed pa'i shes pa nyid kyi mtshungs pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:235b-25: don ni 'ga' zhig gi yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:235b-26: 'on te sgra las skye ba na de nyid mi gsal ba'i rnam par gyur pa ni spyi yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:235b-27: thams cad la mtshungs pa'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin te ba lang zhes brjod pa na res 'ga' ni /
T11TD4221.1E:235b-28: khra bo dang res 'ga' ni ser skya zhes bya ba la sogs par rtogs pa'i phyir de yang so sor nges pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin yin pas spyi'i rnam par rtog pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:235b-29: nyams su myong ba ji ltar ba bzhin dran pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:235b-30: sgra 'di ni sngar thams cad dang 'brel par mthong ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:235b-31: go sgra don dgu la 'jug pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:235b-32: gal te ba lang la sogs pa don dug po dag ni so sor nges pa yin pa'i phyir de nye bar ston par byed pa dang ston pa'i yul can gyi brda srid pa yin gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:235b-33: so sor nges pa med pa'i gsal ba rnams la ji ltar brda byed pa'am 'dzin par nus she na /
T11TD4221.1E:235b-35: de nyid mtshungs pa nyid yin du zin kyang /
T11TD4221.1E:236a-0: @236a * // mig gi yul gyi don la ni mthong ba med do //
T11TD4221.1E:236a-1: gsal bar snang ba'i mig gi rnam par shes pa la ni mig gsal bar snang ba yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:236a-2: de nyid 'di'o snyam pa'i rtog pa 'byung ba kho na'o zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:236a-4: gsal ba dang mi gsal bar snang ba dag ni gcig nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir ro ;
T11TD4221.1E:236a-5: / rgyu tha dad pa'i yang phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:236a-7: bag chags rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:236a-8: de'i phyir na mig la sogs pas bskyed pa'i blo la ni snang ba gnyis yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:236a-9: ci ste gal te rnam pa'i rgyu tha dad pa yin du chug kyang gsal ba dang mi gsal bar snang ba'i phyir blo de ni gcig nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:236a-11: gal te snang ba'i rgyu tha dad kyang blo rnams tha mi dad pa yin na gzhan du yang tha dad pa rnyed par dka' bar 'gyur te thams cad du dus mnyam par 'byung ba'i mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag gi blo gcig kho nar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:236a-12: gal te 'phrod pa 'du ba'i 'brel pa ji ltar mi 'dzin te /
T11TD4221.1E:236a-13: rigs la sogs pa tha dad par nges pa med pa ni 'phrod pa'i 'du ba yod pa nyid las yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:236a-14: 'di ni bzang po ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:236a-17: 'brel pa mthong ba med par gnas //
T11TD4221.1E:236a-18: 'phrod pa 'du ba dbang po las 'das pa yin pa'i phyir mig la sogs pas rig par srid pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni khyed nyid kyi rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:236a-19: ci ste snal ma 'di dag la snam bu'o zhes bya ba'i tha snyad las 'phrod pa 'du ba 'grub pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:236a-22: snal ma 'di la snam bu zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:236a-23: sgra 'di dag kyang rang gis byas //
T11TD4221.1E:236a-24: snal ma rnams la snam bu /
T11TD4221.1E:236a-25: rva la sogs pa rnams la ba lang zhes bya ba'i blo ni 'gar yang yod pa ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:236a-26: de med pas 'phrod pa'i 'du ba ji ltar rtogs pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:236a-28: ba lang rva zhes 'jig rten na //
T11TD4221.1E:236a-29: rva la ba lang 'jig rten min //
T11TD4221.1E:236a-30: ba lang rva yod do zhes bya ba'i blo ni 'jug pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:236a-31: lkog shal la sogs pa de dag ni de la 'phrod pas 'dus pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:236a-32: gang zhig de dag la 'du bar 'dod pa de ni brten pa nyid du rtogs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:236a-33: des na blo 'di ni 'phrod pa 'du ba las ni ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:236a-35: ba lang zhes bya yan lag ni //
T11TD4221.1E:236a-36: lhag ma rnams chad dmigs med phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:236a-37: 'di las snyam pa'i blo ni 'du ba med pa la dmigs pa nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:236b-0: dper na nyi ma nub ka'i dus na shing 'di la nyi ma'o @236b zhes bya bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:236b-1: yan lag lhag ma dag la ba lang ngo zhes rtogs na rva'i rten nyid du brtags pa'i phyir ba lang la rva'o snyam du shes pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:236b-2: 'di ltar gang zhig rten dang brten par 'gyur ba la rva la sogs pa'i tshogs las tha dad pa'i ba lang ni med de 'di ni rtog pa tsam du zad do //
T11TD4221.1E:236b-3: ci ste yang snal ma 'di dag la snam bu'o snyam pa'i shes pa ni 'byung ba kho na zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:236b-5: snal ma 'di rnams kyis snam bu //
T11TD4221.1E:236b-7: phyis byung 'bras bur brjod yin gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:236b-8: ji lta bur yang dus gcig min //
T11TD4221.1E:236b-9: snal ma'i sgra ni sngar snam bu med pa'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par la 'jug par 'gyur la de'i phyis 'byung ba'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par ni snam bu yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:236b-10: de'i snal ma de dag gi snam bu 'di byas so zhes de'i phyis 'byung ba la 'bras bur bsnyad pa yin gyi snal ma dang dus mtshungs pa ni ma yin no /
T11TD4221.1E:236b-11: des na gang las rten dang brten pa'i dngos po yin /
T11TD4221.1E:236b-12: dus tha dad pa dag ni rten dang brten pa'i dngos po ma yin gyi ;
T11TD4221.1E:236b-13: rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid dam 'brel pa med par 'gyur ba 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
T11TD4221.1E:236b-14: de'i phyir rten dang brten pa'i dngos po yang tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa nyid kyis na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'i khyad par nyid /
T11TD4221.1E:236b-15: tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa'i khar gzhong dang de la brten par 'dod pa dag kho na la de ltar tha snyad byed pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:236b-16: gnas pa ni de'i rang bzhin khyad par las gzhan ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:236b-17: snal ma dang snam bu dag la rtogs pa 'di yang yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:236b-18: des na rnam pa ci zhig ltar rnam par brtags pa 'ba' zhig tu zad kyi rten dang brten pa'i dngos po ni ma yin te tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:236b-19: snam bu'i gnas skabs na ni snal ma yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:236b-20: gal te tha dad pa med na snam bu'i gnas skabs snal ma med pa'i phyir snal ma de dag ni 'di yin no zhes shes pa 'am snam bu 'di zhes bya bar ji ltar 'gyur zhen /
T11TD4221.1E:236b-23: don dam par ni de la gnyis yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:236b-26: sgra yi rten ni ston pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:236b-27: snal ma gcig ni bkar byas pas //
T11TD4221.1E:236b-29: snam bu ni snal ma dag gi 'bras bu yin pas de'i tshe snal ma yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:236b-30: snal mar shes pa ni rgyu'i rang bzhin sgro btags pa las yin gyi don dam par ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:237a-1: ltar 'di snal ma yin no snyam pa'i shes pa ni snga ma dran pa yod na 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:237a-2: yang na gcig bkar ba las yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:237a-3: snal ma re rer bkar na snam bu zhes bya ba yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:237a-4: dmag dang nags la sogs pa ltar de dag ni tshogs pa nyid snam bu'i tha snyad rten yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:237a-5: snam bu ni kun rdzob tu yod pa nyid do /
T11TD4221.1E:237a-6: des na rten dang brten pa'i dngos po ni brtags pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:237a-7: gal te snam bu zhes bya ba med pa yin na ji ltar snam bu'i sgra 'jug pa ste rgyu mtshan med par sgra 'jug pa ni med do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:237a-9: phan gdags phan 'dogs byed nyid dam //
T11TD4221.1E:237a-10: rnam par chad med snang ba nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:237a-11: snam bu'i tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan yin no zhes kha bskang ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:237a-12: de la phan gdags bya dang 'dogs byed nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:237a-13: snal ma de dag nyid phan tshun phan par bya ba dang phan par byed pa'i dngos po rnam par gnas pa'am /
T11TD4221.1E:237a-15: bgo ba la sogs pa 'dod pa'i don bya ba nye bar bskyed pa ni snam bu la sogs pa'i tha snyad brten pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:237a-16: de dag gi phan par bya ba dang phan par byed pa'i dngos po de ni snam bu zhes bstan par bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:237a-17: ji ltar thag bzangs dang snas la sogs pas phan btags pa dang 'bral ba rnam par chad pa'i snal ma dag brtsal ba med par phan tshun gyis pa de bzhin du snam bu'i gnas skabs na ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:237a-18: de'i phyir rnam par chad pa ma mthong ba ni 'di'i rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir tha snyad nyid las don gzhan brtag par bya ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:237a-19: don rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan ni tshad ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:237a-20: tha snyad ni phal cher gzhan du yang 'jug pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:237a-21: gal te tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan gzhan med na de ltar gyur na ni 'o na snam bu'i tha snyad dngos ma yin par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:237a-22: khur bu ba la ba lang du bsnyad ba bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:237a-23: khur bu ba la gtsang sbra chung ba la sogs pa rgyu mtshan yod kyang de las tha snyad pa'i ba lang nyid kyi spyi med pa'i phyir ba lang nyid kyi tha snyad kyi dngos po ma yin pa de bzhin du /
T11TD4221.1E:237a-24: phan gdags bya 'dogs byed la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi snam bu'i tha snyad 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:237a-26: 'khrul med can shes dang po yi //
T11TD4221.1E:237a-27: brda yi spyod yul gang yin dngos //
T11TD4221.1E:237a-28: dang po'i brda'i yul gang yi pa de ni dngos po yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:237a-29: dang po'i brda'i yul yin pa nyid kyis 'khrul pa med par shes pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:237b-0: gang zhig brda'i yul gyi dngos po dang chos @237b mtshungs pa na de nyid du lhag par zhen nas zhugs pa de ni de'i dngos po ma yin te 'khrul pa'i blo'i yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:237b-1: snal ma'i tshul med na 'dra ba las gzhan pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'brangs bas shes pa la 'khrul pa yin pa de /
T11TD4221.1E:237b-2: de'i rjes su ma 'brangs par ni de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:237b-3: de'i phyir dngos dang btags pa'i dbye ba las ni snam bu la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyi rgyu mtshan gzhan yin par mi 'grub po //
T11TD4221.1E:237b-4: ci ste rigs la sogs pa'i rjes su dpag pas sgrub pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:237b-6: de yi ngo bor gzhan shes pa //
T11TD4221.1E:237b-7: de mtshungs rgyu mtshan las yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:237b-8: dper na dbyig can snyam shes pa //
T11TD4221.1E:237b-9: mtshungs pa'i dbyig pa las yin bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:237b-10: mtshan nyid mi mthun skyes bu la sogs pa la yang dbyig pa can no snyam pa'i mtshungs par rtogs pa ni mtshungs pa'i rgyu mtshan can yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:237b-11: khra bo la sogs pa mtshan nyid mi mthun pa dag la ba lang ngo snyam pa'i blo de la yang ba lang nyid rgyu mtshan yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:237b-12: dbyig pa bzhin no zhe na 'di ni lan du mi rung ste /
T11TD4221.1E:237b-14: dngos po las ni tha dad can /
T11TD4221.1E:237b-15: rigs sogs la ni rjes dpag med //
T11TD4221.1E:237b-16: dbyig pa can sogs thams cad la //
T11TD4221.1E:237b-17: kun rdzob pa las tha snyad 'dogs //
T11TD4221.1E:237b-18: gal te kun rdzob pa'i mtshungs pa'i rgyu mtshan la brten nas khra bo la sogs pa la ba lang la sogs pa'i shes 'jug pa yin na ni de'i tshe grub pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:237b-19: 'di ltar dbyig pa can no zhes bya ba'i shes pa la yang dbyig pa ni rgyu mtshan ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:237b-20: de lta ma yin na thams cad dbyug pa can du thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:237b-21: 'on te 'brel pa las 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:237b-22: 'brel pa yang 'brel pa can no snyam du shes pa las rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:237b-23: de la yang 'brel pa gzhan rtogs na ni thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:237b-24: ci ste 'brel pa gzhan med par 'brel pa can no zhes na de lta yin na ni 'brel pa yang brtags pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:237b-25: des na dbyig pa can no snyam pa'i shes pa ni kun rdzob pa'i rgyu mtshan kho na las yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:237b-26: de nyid 'brel pa yin pa'i phyir thams cad mtshungs so //
T11TD4221.1E:237b-27: ci ste dbyig pa dang 'byor pa nyid ni bden pa kho na yin gyi kun rdzob pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:237b-29: de las tha dad pa'i 'byor ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:237b-30: gnyis po tsam nyid 'byor ba yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:237b-31: ji ltar skyes bu dbyig pa can zhes bya ba de bzhin du dbyig pa skyes bu can zhes bya bar yang 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:238a-2: 'di dag phan tshun 'byor pa yin no zhes bya ba'i rtogs par 'gyur gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:238a-3: de dag khyad par dang khyad par can gyi dngos por ni mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:238a-4: ci ste dbyig pa ni phan 'dogs par byed pa yin pas gtso bo ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:238a-5: de lta yin na kun rdzob pa'i phan 'dogs par byed pa de nyid de la rgyu mtshan yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:238a-6: de yang mngon sum la snang ba ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:238a-7: de'i phyir de'i khyad par can gyi rtogs pa ni dbang po las byung ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:238a-8: ci ste yang khyad par gyi ngo bo ni kun rdzob pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:238a-9: khyad par dbyig pa nyid ni don dam pa kho na yin pa de bzhin du ba lang nyid la sogs pa yang yin no zhe na ma yin te ;
T11TD4221.1E:238a-10: tha dad par mngon sum gyi gzung ba'i phyir dbyig pa ni don dam par 'gyur gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:238a-11: rigs la sogs pa ni don dam par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:238a-12: 'phrod pa 'du bas tha dad par 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:238a-13: 'phrod pa 'du ba nyid ci'i phyir tha dad par mi snang /
T11TD4221.1E:238a-14: 'phrod pa 'du ba gzhan dag las so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:238a-17: der yang don dam pa yi ni //
T11TD4221.1E:238a-18: don gyi 'brel pa yod pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:238a-19: bzho dag la la sogs 'bras bu ni //
T11TD4221.1E:238a-20: don dam nyid kyis der 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:238a-21: ji ltar don dam pa'i dbyig pa nyid dbyig pa can ni snyam du mtshungs par rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan yin pa /
T11TD4221.1E:238a-22: de kho na ltar dgal ba la sogs pa'am rva la sogs pa ni ba lang nyid la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:238a-23: rva la sogs pa ni tha dad pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:238a-24: dbyig pa la sogs pa yang tha dad par mtshungs pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:238a-25: mtshungs pa yang tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir ji ltar dbyig pa can zhes bya ba dper 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:238a-26: de'i phyir tha dad pa nyid la tha mi dad par rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:238a-27: dag la sogs 'brel pa las gzhan pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:238a-28: rigs ni 'gar yang mthong ba med //
T11TD4221.1E:238a-29: de dag rnams la ba lang nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:238a-30: ci zhes pa 'di rva sogs ston //
T11TD4221.1E:238a-31: ji ltar bram ze la sogs pa'i rigs 'dri na /
T11TD4221.1E:238a-32: rus dang 'don pa la sogs pa ston gyi rigs ni ma yin pa de bzhin du ba lang nyid la yang bzho ba dang dgal ba la sogs pa ston gyi tshad ma'i yul du gyur pa'i rigs gzhan yod pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:238a-33: des na dngos su tha snyad kyi yul du gyur pa don dam pa'i rgyu mtshan ni gang du yang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir rigs don dam pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:238a-34: rigs ni tha snyad kyi yul nyid du 'dod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:238b-0: de ni kun rdzob pa kho nas 'grub pa'i phyir rigs ni @238b don med do //
T11TD4221.1E:238b-1: gzhan yang gal te thams cad du tha snyad don dam pa'i rgyu mtshan la brten nas 'jug pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:238b-2: de'i tshe de la ltos pa med pa'i sgra med par 'gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:238b-5: dngos po khang bzangs phreng sogs kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:238b-6: sgra yang gzhan la ltos pa min //
T11TD4221.1E:238b-7: tshig gi don drug po dag la dngos por tha snyad 'dogs pa yin pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:238b-8: khang bzangs rnams la khang bzangs kyi phreng ba la sogs pa'i tha snyad gang yin pa de ni rgyu mtshan gzhan la ltos pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:238b-9: rdzas la sogs pa'i tshig gi don rnams la ni dngos po nyid ces bya ba gzhan yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:238b-10: re zhig dngos po nyid rdzas ni ma yin te rdzas ni yon tan la sogs pa rnams la 'du ba'am ldan par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:238b-11: khang bzangs kyang rdzas nyid ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:238b-12: rigs mi mthun pas mi rtsom pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:238b-13: ldan pa nyid du 'gyur grang na /
T11TD4221.1E:238b-15: gal te khang pa ldan pa yin du chug na 'dir phreng ba ci zhig yin /
T11TD4221.1E:238b-17: gal te khang pa ldan yin yang //
T11TD4221.1E:238b-18: de phreng de ni ci zhig yin //
T11TD4221.1E:238b-19: rdzas ma yin la yon tan dang las kyang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:238b-20: rdzas ni yon tan la med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:238b-21: de nyid kyi phyir yon tan yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:238b-22: las kyang ma yin te las ni rdzas la brten pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:238b-23: 'du ba dang khyad par yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:238b-24: de'i 'bras bu med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:238b-25: gal te rigs ni yon tan la yang yod pa'i phyir rigs yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:238b-27: rigs ni rigs la mtshungs pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:238b-28: tha snyad don du brtags pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:238b-29: der yang 'di yi tha snyad kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:238b-30: rgyu mtshan rigs gzhan yin par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:238b-31: de yang rigs gzhan dag nyid las ;
T11TD4221.1E:238b-32: / rigs su bsnyad pa'i yul du 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:238b-33: de phyir rtogs pa mtha' med pas //
T11TD4221.1E:238b-34: rtogs pa 'thad pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:238b-35: de'i phyir phreng ba la sogs pa'i sgra 'jug pa ni de'i rgyu mtshan can ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:238b-37: gal te rigs yin kha cig kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:238b-38: shing bzhin phreng zhes brjod par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:238b-39: ji ltar dal ba la sogs pa gcig kyang shing gi rigs dang ldan pas shing du brjod pa de bzhin khyim gcig la yang phreng bar brjod par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:238b-40: rigs ni re re la yang tha snyad byed pa'i rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:238b-41: ci ste phreng ba ni dbyibs kyi khyad par yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:239a-0: phyogs gcig tu mngon du phyin par gnas pa'i dngos po ni phreng ba'i @239a * //
T11TD4221.1E:239a-1: tha snyad brten pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:239a-2: dbyibs de yang rdzas la sogs pa las tha dad pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:239a-3: de ltar khas len na tshig gi don bdun pa gzhan du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:239a-4: de'i nang du 'dus pa la ni nyes pa brjod zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:239a-5: gal te phreng ba rigs yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:239a-6: de'i tshe phreng ba mang po la /
T11TD4221.1E:239a-8: phreng ba'o zhes de yi sgra //
T11TD4221.1E:239a-9: ji ltar rigs la rigs med phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:239a-10: rigs la ni rigs khas len pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:239a-11: khas len na yang de la yang rigs so zhes nye bar bsnyad pa'i rgyu mtshan du 'gyur dgos so //
T11TD4221.1E:239a-12: rigs rgyu mtshan yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:239a-13: de la yang rigs gzhan yod par 'gyur bar mi 'thad do ;
T11TD4221.1E:239a-14: /'di ltar phreng ba la sogs pa la phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa chen po nyid kyi tha snyad gang yin pa de ji ltar 'gyur ba yin /
T11TD4221.1E:239a-15: yon tan chen po nyid ni rdzas la 'du ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:239a-16: phreng ba la sogs pa ni rdzas ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:239a-17: nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:239a-20: phreng sogs la ni chen po sogs //
T11TD4221.1E:239a-21: nyer btags las 'dod gang yin pa //
T11TD4221.1E:239a-22: dngos dang khyad med rnams shes kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:239a-23: gzung bya yin phyir nyer btags min //
T11TD4221.1E:239a-24: phreng ba la sogs pa dag la chen po nyid nye bar btags pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las yin /
T11TD4221.1E:239a-25: 'di nye bar btags pa nyid du rtogs pa ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:239a-26: de ltar rtogs pa ma yin pa la ni de ltar khas blang bar nus pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:239a-27: khas len pa ni rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:239a-28: chen po nyid don gzhan du gyur pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:239a-29: de med pa nyid ga las med par grub na de'i phyir nye bar btags pa yin la nye bar btags pa yin pa na yang med pa yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:239a-30: 'di ni phan tshun rten pa'i skyon yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:239a-31: rdzas ma yin pa'i phyir chen po nyid rdzas kyi chos ni phreng ba'i ma yin no zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:239a-32: rdzas ma yin pa nyid du ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:239a-33: bya ba dang yon tan can 'du ba can gyi rgyu ni rdzas yin pa'i phyir rdzas kyi mtshan nyid yod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:239a-34: bya ba can nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhen ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:239a-35: bsdus pa ni mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:239a-36: nam mkha' la sogs pa ni bya ba dang ldan pa nyid ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:239a-37: la lar ni bya ba can la sogs pa bsdus pa mtshan nyid yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:239a-38: la lar ni 'ga' zhig yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:239a-39: gal te rnam par dpyad na chen po nyid don dam par med pa'i phyir rdzas ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:239b-0: rtogs pa yod pa'i phyir med do @239b zhes bya ba 'di ga las yin /
T11TD4221.1E:239b-1: rtogs pa ni gtso bor 'gyur ba las med par grub na de'i phyir nye bar btags pa yin la nye phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:239b-2: gal te gtso bo dang khyad par med pa can yang gtso bo ma yin pa nyid yin na ni gtso bo ma yin pa'i rnam par dbye ba med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:239b-3: des na khyad par med pa'i phyir thams cad ni gtso bo yin pa'am /
T11TD4221.1E:239b-4: yang na 'ga' yang ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:239b-5: de'i phyir phreng ba la sogs gzhan gyi rdzas la sogs pa rnam par gzhag pa byas ba 'di ni legs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:239b-6: phreng ba zhes pa shing la sogs pa las tha dad ba ni cung zad kyang dmigs pa med de /
T11TD4221.1E:239b-7: 'di ni gnas pa'i khyad par las rtogs pa tsam yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:239b-8: de'i phyir phreng ba la sogs pa la chen po la sogs pa'i sgra ni nye bar btags pa ma yin zhing gtso bo nyid kyang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:239b-9: re zhig gtso bo nyid ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:239b-10: rgyu mtshan don gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:239b-11: nye bar btags pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:239b-12: nye bar btags pa'i rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:239b-13: dper na me tog rgyas pa'i nags zhes don gcig la 'du ba las nags la me tog rgyas par nye bar btags pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:239b-14: nags dang me tog rgyas pa dag ni shing rnams la 'dus pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:239b-15: dngos su mngon par 'dod pa la'ang //
T11TD4221.1E:239b-16: rgyu gzhan min pa nyid de mtshungs //
T11TD4221.1E:239b-17: drug rnams la ni tshig don sgra //
T11TD4221.1E:239b-18: rgyu gzhan gang la ltos par mthong //
T11TD4221.1E:239b-19: rgyu gzhan dang ldan pa ni gtso bo yin la rgyu gzhan med pa ni phal ba yin no zhes gang bshad pa de ni srid pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:239b-20: gang gi phyir dbyig pa can zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa gtso bor mngon par 'dod pa gang yin pa de dag la yang rgyu gzhan yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:239b-21: dbyig pa can la sogs pa yang kun rdzob pa nyid do zhes da ltar kho na bshad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:239b-22: drug po rnams la tshig gi don gyi sgra 'jug pa yang rgyu gzhan gang zhig la ltos pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:239b-23: rdzas la sogs pa 'jug pa na rang gi ngo bo nyid 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ni rgyu mtshan gzhan med pa nyid dbang med du 'ongs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:239b-24: ci ste rgyu mtshan med par 'jug pa'i tshig gi don gyi sgra de ni de gtso bor zhes bya bar rigs pa yin gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:239b-25: chen po la sogs pa'i sgra gang yin pa de ni yon tan rgyu mtshan can yin pas /
T11TD4221.1E:239b-26: gang la rgyu mtshan med par 'jug pa de la gdon mi za bar phal pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:239b-27: de'i phyir don yod pa ni gtso bo yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:240a-1: phal pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:240a-4: ji ltar grags las grub gang yin //
T11TD4221.1E:240a-5: dngos dang de dang mtshungs pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:240a-6: gang la de skad brjod phal pa //
T11TD4221.1E:240a-7: dngos la'ang dngos med btags phyir ro /
T11TD4221.1E:240a-8: rgyu mtshan yod dam gzhan du rung ste grags pa las gzhan du'ang 'jug pa ni gtso bo nyid yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:240a-9: de dang mtshungs pa la ltos nas gang du de ltar 'jug pa de la ni gtso bo ma yin pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:240a-10: bu la sogs pa'i dngos po la yang med pa nye bar btags pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:240a-13: gtso bo nyid kyi rgyu ni grags pa kho na yi na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:240a-14: de lta ma yin na phyin ci log tu mthong ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:240a-15: rgyu mtshan med pa ni gzhan du 'gyur ba na nye bar btags pa'i rgyu mtshan yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:240a-16: tshig gi don gyi sgra rgyu mtshan med pa nyid de ni de kho na ltar gtso bor gyur pa yin pa de lta na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:240a-17: 'o na rgyu mtshan dang ldan pa nyid dngos kyi rgyur mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:240a-18: de med kyang yod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:240a-19: gang zhig gang med kyang 'byung ba de ni de'i rgyu mtshan can ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:240a-20: rgyu dang 'bras bus ni rjes su 'gro ldog gi mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:240a-21: rgyu mtshan ni rgyu yin la rgyu mtshan can ni 'bras bu yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:240a-22: gal te grags pa de nyid sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan med par ji lta zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:240a-25: grags pa brda yi rjes 'gro can //
T11TD4221.1E:240a-27: tha snyad don du byas pa'ang ste //
T11TD4221.1E:240a-28: sdeb sbyor ming dang sgra cha bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:240a-29: gang la brda zhugs pa de ni grags pa'i don yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:240a-30: brda yang smra ba po'i 'dod pa dang 'brel pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:240a-31: sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan yod do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:240a-32: smra ba'i 'dod pa med par sgra 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:240a-33: 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan med kyang 'dod pas 'jug pa ni mthong ba kho na ste /
T11TD4221.1E:240a-34: dper na skyes bu la seng ge la sogs pa ming 'jug pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:240a-35: des na 'dod pa la rang dbang du gyur ba'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:240a-36: de nyid 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan no zhes bya bar rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:240a-37: de nyid rgyu mtshan med par ci'i phyir brda'i sgo nas sgra 'jug par byed ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:240a-38: rgyu mtshan la yang ci'i phyir 'jug / tha snyad kyi don du'o zhe na tha snyad de ni 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan med kyang mtshungs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:240a-39: tha snyad kyang don byed pa'i yul can yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:240a-40: rgyu mtshan med pa don byed pa med par gyur pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:240a-41: rgyu mtshan med na mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:240b-0: bram ze la sogs pa'i rigs med par don byed par @240b nus pa ni ma yin no zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:240b-1: de la tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:240b-2: rigs 'ga' zhig yod do zhes bya ba'i tshad ma ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:240b-3: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las rang bzhin ji snyed cig nus par mthong ba de tsam kho na cig nye bar sbyor ba dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rigs te /
T11TD4221.1E:240b-4: de lta ma yin na ha cang thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:240b-5: de'i phyir rgyu mtshan med kyang tha snyad kyi don du brda byed pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:240b-6: dper na sdeb sbyor dang sgra la phreng ba 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i ming dang rang bzhin la sogs par brda ra btags pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:240b-7: de la ni rgyu mtshan 'ga' zhig yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:240b-8: phreng ba 'dzin pa dang rang bzhin la sogs pa dag ni ji ltar 'dod par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:240b-9: yi ge'i rim pa la ni rgyu mtshan cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:240b-10: de lta ma yin na brda ma bzung bas kyang rtogs par thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:240b-11: gang zhig rtogs pa yod pa de la brda ci zhig bya /
T11TD4221.1E:240b-12: brda gsal bar byed do zhen ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:240b-13: rtogs pa med na de nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:240b-14: ma rtogs pa la ni brda yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:240b-15: brda nyid kyis rtogs par byed do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:240b-16: phan tshun brten pa'i nyes bar thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:240b-17: ji srid dngos po mthong med par //
T11TD4221.1E:240b-18: de la brda 'jug yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:240b-19: brda zhugs pa ni med na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:240b-20: mthong bas srid par ga la 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:240b-21: rang bzhin la sogs pa dag ni rnam par gnas pa'i rang bzhin ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:240b-22: 'di ltar kha cig ni yod pa las zhes bya ba 'di khams su byas te /
T11TD4221.1E:240b-23: de'i 'og tu aa ta glo bur du 'ongs par byed la gzhan dag ni yod pa la aa sa khams su byas nas dang po'i aa phyis te /
T11TD4221.1E:240b-24: santi zhes bya bar byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:240b-25: de'i phyir rnam pa 'di lta bu'i yul la tha snyad tsam gyi dgos pas brdar btags pa yin gyi rgyu mtshan gzhan yod pas ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:240b-26: 'dod pa dang rjes su 'brel pa can gyi brda ni rgyu mtshan can yod pa kho na la 'gyur ba yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:240b-27: 'khrul pa mthong bas 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:240b-28: de'i phyir dngos po dang khang bzangs la sogs pa'i sgra ni dngos por gyur pa tha dad pa'i don gyi rgyu mtshan can ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:240b-29: des na tha snyad mtshungs pa mthong ba las spyi brtag par bya ba ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:240b-30: 'o na ji ltar blo dang sgra dag rjes su 'gro ba yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:240b-32: dngos po la sogs rjes su 'gro ba yod pa las shes pa rjes su 'gro ba ni ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:240b-33: 'on kyang bag chags kyi sa bon rab tu sad pa rjes su 'gro ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:241a-0: dper na mi sdug pa'i dngos po @241a * //
T11TD4221.1E:241a-1: la yang goms pa las sdug pa nyid rjes su 'gro ba bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:241a-3: tha snyad kyang gang dngos chos kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:241a-4: de 'dra'i rnam shes rgyu yi ni //
T11TD4221.1E:241a-5: don de dag la shes pa des //
T11TD4221.1E:241a-6: de ltar rtogs par 'gyur ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:241a-7: tha dad tha dad min bar ni //
T11TD4221.1E:241a-8: rtog la shes pa'ang de bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:241a-9: de phyir de 'bras med bral ba //
T11TD4221.1E:241a-10: rjes 'gro dngos gcig yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:241a-11: gang gis bag chags sad pa'i rim pas /
T11TD4221.1E:241a-12: thams cad la rnam pa gcig tu rtogs pa'i shes pa skyed par byed pa'i dngos po rnams nyid kyis rnam pa de lta bu'i shes pa skyed par byed pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:241a-13: bde ba la sogs pa'i tshor ba bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:241a-14: bde ba la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa la ni /
T11TD4221.1E:241a-15: don la brten pa'i rgyu mtshan bde ba zhes bya ba yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:241a-16: de lta bu'i nyid yin na sdug bsngal mi skye bar thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:241a-17: de lta bu nyid ma yin pa'i yang yod do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:241a-18: de lta na rang bzhin gnyi ga rtogs par thal te /
T11TD4221.1E:241a-19: kha dog dang dbyibs rtogs pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:241a-20: ci ste ma mthong bas gegs byas pas de lta ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:241a-21: de ltar gyur na ni ma mthong ba kho nas de lta bur gyur pa' rtogs pa nyid skyed par ci ste mi 'dod /
T11TD4221.1E:241a-22: ma mthong ba ni nges par byed pa yin gyi sgrub par byed pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:241a-24: tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:241a-25: sgrub pa dang nges par byed pa dag srid na /
T11TD4221.1E:241a-26: sgrub pa nyid mchog yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:241a-27: nges par byed pa ni rtog pa du ma'i rten du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:241a-29: bde ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid don yin par brtag gam /
T11TD4221.1E:241a-30: 'on te gzhan du yin mthong ba ba yin par rtogs pa la ni mthong ba'i rtogs pa 'ba' zhig tu zad /
T11TD4221.1E:241a-31: de'i phyir tha dad par gyur pa nyid 'ga' zhig la tha dad par 'dzin pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:241a-32: de rjes su 'gro ba nyid las spyi'i don grub pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:241a-33: bar gyi sha lhag pa'i spyis ci zhig bya /
T11TD4221.1E:241a-34: nang gi rgyu shes pa rnams kyi rgyu mtshan yin par ni gdon mi za bar khas blang dgos te /
T11TD4221.1E:241a-36: spyi dang de'i rgyu rnam pa gnyis su rtogs par thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:241a-37: 'phrod pa 'du bas gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:241a-39: 'phrod pa 'du ba yang rnam pa gsum par rtogs par thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:241a-40: de'i phyir na der rtogs par 'gyur ba'i nus pa med pa nyid nang gi rgyu la rag las par khas blang bar bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:241a-41: de bzhin du shes pa yang de la gcig tu rtogs pa'i skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:241b-1: rigs zhes bya ba yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:241b-2: rigs gzhan las khas blang bar ni rigs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:241b-3: lhag ma ni skabs nyid du bshad zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:241b-4: de'i phyir tha mi dad par zhen pa 'bras bu can nyid kyis spyi'i tha snyad yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:241b-5: de'i 'bras bu can de nyid spyi'i yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:241b-7: rang gi ngo bo las tha dad pa'i de'i 'bras bu can med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:241b-9: de lta na ni chu dang sa la sogs pa rnams la yang 'bras bu myu gu yod pa'i phyir gcig tu rtogs par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:241b-10: de'i 'bras bu can du rtogs pa nyid ni spyi'i shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:241b-12: ba lang nyid du rtogs pa kho na de ltar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:241b-13: de'i phyir tha dad pa ma 'phrigs pa las spyir rtogs pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:241b-14: gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di gnas pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:241b-15: ci ste der spyi nyid rtogs so zhes ci ste mi 'dod /
T11TD4221.1E:241b-16: 'di la spyi yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i gnod par byed pa'i shes pa skyes pa ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:241b-17: rtsod pa'i dub pa la ni dgos pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:241b-18: ji ltar du mar rtogs pas dub pa de bzhin du rtsod pas dub pa yang yin pas mtshungs par thal lo zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:241b-21: rtsod pa tsam zhig 'dren pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:241b-22: gal te spyi ni rtog byed na //
T11TD4221.1E:241b-23: ma brtags gcig pus spyod yul ni //
T11TD4221.1E:241b-24: kun rdzob yod pa yin par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:241b-25: spyi ni rnam par dpyad na yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:241b-26: rnam par dpyad pa med par khas len na ni gcig tu ma brtags na nyams dga' ba yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:241b-27: 'bras bu gcig pa nyid de ni //
T11TD4221.1E:241b-28: dngos rnams la yod de yi phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:241b-29: dngos la mnyan pa de mtha' nyan //
T11TD4221.1E:241b-30: de'i 'bras bu ma yin pa rnams las log pa 'bras bu gcig pa'i mtshan nyid can de nyid ni khro bo la sogs pa rnams la yod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:241b-31: de'i phyir dngos po la 'jug pa'i mnyan pa ni 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan de dang ldan pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:241b-32: 'o na ji ltar spyi'i blo rnam pa dang ldan par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:241b-33: ma 'dres pa la ni rnam pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:241b-35: de las gzhan dang ma 'dres pa ni nges par rnams pa dang ldan pa'i blo dang 'brel pa yin la ;
T11TD4221.1E:241b-36: de yang bag chags dang 'brel ba las rnam pa dang ldan pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:241b-37: 'di ltar blo de ni de lta bur gyur pa'i shes pa snga ma snga ma las 'ongs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:241b-38: 'di ba lang ngo snyam pa'i shes pa la khra bo la sogs pa las tha dad pa'i gzhal bya gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:242a-0: gzhal bya'i rnam par snang ba'i shes pas gzhal @242a * //
T11TD4221.1E:242a-1: bya'i rnam pa 'jog pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:242a-2: gzhal bya'i rnam pas stong pa'i shes pa tsam gyis ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:242a-3: gal te shes pa de thog ma med pa'i bag chags kyi mthu las byung ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:242a-4: 'o na ni de dang 'brel pa yin pa'i phyir de nyid la mi slu bar 'gyur ba yin gyi dngos po la mi slu bar go ji ltar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:242a-5: de'i phyir de'i 'bras bu med pa las ldog pa yongs su bcad par 'gyur dgos so //
T11TD4221.1E:242a-6: de'i 'bras bu can nyid de las de'i phyi rol gyi nus pa nyid dam /
T11TD4221.1E:242a-7: phyi rol gyi rang bzhin gyi ldog pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:242a-8: de'i rjes su 'gro ba na de nyid rigs yin pas rigs spangs pa ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:242a-9: de yongs su bcad pa la yang phyi rol nyid yongs su bcad par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:242a-11: phyi rol gyi rang bzhin gyi rnam par bcad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:242a-12: phyi rol nus pa rnam gcod la //
T11TD4221.1E:242a-13: reg pa med kyang sgra de ni //
T11TD4221.1E:242a-14: rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan ni //
T11TD4221.1E:242a-15: de yi mthar thug rnams dang 'brel //
T11TD4221.1E:242a-16: des na gzhan sel mthar thug phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:242a-17: mnyan pa gzhan sel byed par brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:242a-18: gal te yang sgra las skye ba can gyi rnam par rtog pa phyi rol gyi rang bzhin la reg pa med pa de lta na yang /
T11TD4221.1E:242a-19: rnam par rtog pa de'i gzugs brnyan ni phyi rol gyi mthar thug pa'i nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:242a-20: phyi rol gyi sgo nas skye ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:242a-21: brgyud pas skye ba'i phyir don la ma reg kyang phyi rol gyi mthar thug pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:242a-22: gzhan las ldog pa'i don gyis bskyed pa gzugs brnyan de yang gzhan las ldog pa nyid du snang ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:242a-23: sgra las kyang de nyid tha mi tha dad pa'i ldog pa rtogs par 'gyur gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:242a-24: phyi rol dang tha mi dad pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:242a-25: des na gzhan las ldog pa'i rnam pa can gyi rnam par rtog pa skyed pa'i phyir mnyan pa gzhan sel ba byed par brjod do //
T11TD4221.1E:242a-26: gzhan las ldog pa dag la 'jug par byed pa'i yang phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:242a-27: phyi rol la reg pa med kyang rnam par rtog pa de las tha snyad byed pa rnams gzhan las ldog pa dag la 'jug pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:242a-28: gzhan las ldog pa'i yul can du brjod do //
T11TD4221.1E:242a-29: rnam par rtog pa'i bzung ba blo las tha dad par snang ba ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:242a-30: de ji ltar na blo'i rang bzhin nyid yin /
T11TD4221.1E:242a-31: de nyid las tha dad par snang ba ni de nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:242a-32: las tha dad par snang ba ni de nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:242a-33: tha dad par snang ba ni tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:242a-34: de las gzhan tha dad pa'i rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:242b-0: tha @242b dad par snang ba tsam ni mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:242b-1: 'khrul pa med pa'i tha dad par snang ba ni tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid yin gyi gang 'ga' zhig ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:242b-2: ldog pa bzhin du sgra dag las //
T11TD4221.1E:242b-3: shes la don gyi gzugs brnyan snang //
T11TD4221.1E:242b-4: gang de'ang don gyi bdag nyid min //
T11TD4221.1E:242b-5: de 'khrul bag chags las byung yin ;
T11TD4221.1E:242b-6: / gal te yang de kha dog dang dbyibs su snang ba de lta na yang de dngos po ni ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:242b-7: 'on kyang de'i gzugs brnyan yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:242b-8: 'gal ba ci yod ce na gang gi phyir de ni bag chags kyi mtshan nyid kyi rgyu las byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:242b-10: ji ltar dngos por mi 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:242b-11: rang gi rgyu la rag las pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:242b-12: rab rib can gyis dmigs pa'i skra shad la sogs pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:242b-13: ci ste bag chags kyi stobs las skyes pa yin yang dngos po nyid do snyam na /
T11TD4221.1E:242b-14: dngos po ni de ltar 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bshad par bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:242b-15: 'o na blo'i mtshan nyid kyi dngos po de nyid sgras brjod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:242b-16: de nyid dngos por gyur ba'i gzhan sel ba yin no zhes kha cig zer ro //
T11TD4221.1E:242b-19: de ni mnyan pas brjod pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:242b-20: don gyi cha gang rtogs par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:242b-21: de ma rtogs na de don can //
T11TD4221.1E:242b-22: brda byed ba ni don med 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:242b-23: ci nas kyang sgra las dngos po'i cha rtogs par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir brda byed pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:242b-24: blo'i gzugs brnyan tsam zhig rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:242b-25: des na brda byed pa ni don med par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:242b-26: de ni dngos po rtogs par bya ba'i don du yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:242b-27: 'o na ni gzhan sel ba yang sgra'i don ma yin par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:242b-28: des na de la yang brda byed par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:242b-30: gzhan sel ba ni don gyi cha nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:242b-32: sgras don cha ni ci brjod ces //
T11TD4221.1E:242b-33: de la gzhan sel brjod par bya //
T11TD4221.1E:242b-34: rnam pa de yang don la med //
T11TD4221.1E:242b-35: de brjod ji ltar don rten yin //
T11TD4221.1E:242b-36: gal te gzhan sel ba nyid de yin na de'i tshe de rtogs pa na gzhan sel ba don gyi cha nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:242b-37: gzhan sel ba ni don gyi cha nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:242b-38: sgras don gyi cha ci zhig brjod ces 'dra ba na /
T11TD4221.1E:242b-39: gzhan sel ba'o zhes len 'debs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:242b-40: rnam pa de yang don la de yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:242b-41: blo'i rnam pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:242b-42: gang zhig don la yod pa ma yin pa de rtogs pas ni don rtogs par mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:243a-0: rab rib can gyis rtogs pa'i skra @243a * //
T11TD4221.1E:243a-1: shad la sogs pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:243a-2: gzhan yang gzhan sel ba ni spyi yin no zhes 'dod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:243a-5: don gyi 'bras yin mthong goms pas //
T11TD4221.1E:243a-6: sprul de'ang rjes 'gro med ba can //
T11TD4221.1E:243a-7: blo las tha dad med phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:243a-8: sgra ni khra bo la sogs pa dag la rjes su 'gro bar mthong ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:243a-9: rjes su 'gro ba de yang sbyor bar byed pa rjes su 'gro ba'i don nyid kyis 'gyur ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:243a-10: rnam pa de ni rjes su 'gro ba can ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:243a-11: blo las tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:243a-12: mthong bas goms pas bskyed pa yin pa'i phyir te blo nyid bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:243a-13: rjes su 'gro ba can ma yin pa'i 'bras bu ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldan pa rigs pa ma yin te rgyu tha dad pas tha dad par 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:243a-14: de'i phyir gzugs brnyan ni gzhan sel ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:243a-15: rjes su 'gro ba can ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:243a-16: de'i phyir dngos po ni gzhan sel ba ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:243a-17: blo'i rnam pa yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:243a-18: 'o na ji ltar sgra las don rtogs pa na spyi rtogs par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:243a-19: de dngos po la brten pa'i ldog pa rtogs na ni dngos po nyid rtogs pas na de ni spyi ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:243a-20: de ste dngos po rtogs pa ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:243a-21: ji ltar gzhan sel ba dngos po'i char rtogs par 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:243a-23: de dngos sgro btags rtog pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:243a-24: gzhan las bzlog pa rtogs phyir yang /
T11TD4221.1E:243a-25: sgra don gang yin de nyid ces //
T11TD4221.1E:243a-26: brjod pa la ni 'gal ba med //
T11TD4221.1E:243a-27: blo'i rang bzhin nyid las dngos po'i rang bzhin du sgro btags pas de dang gcig tu lhag par zhen nas rtogs pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:243a-28: don dam par ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:243a-29: de yang gzhan las ldog ba yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:243a-30: sgra'i don gzhan sel ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:243a-31: blo'i rang bzhin nyid las dngos po'i rang bzhin de yang thams cad la sgro 'dogs te de'i phyir gzhan sel ba ni spyi dang /
T11TD4221.1E:243a-32: dngos po'i cha yin par rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:243a-33: shes pa sgra yis nges sprul pa //
T11TD4221.1E:243a-34: de dag log par snang ba nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:243a-35: don gyi cha la 'di rjes su 'gro //
T11TD4221.1E:243a-36: de ltar mnyan pa gzhan sel byed //
T11TD4221.1E:243a-37: log par snang ba'i phyir dngos po'i yul can nyid ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:243a-38: gzhan sel ba ni bden pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:243a-39: ji ltar dngos po'i rnam pa ltar de la ni gnod par byed pa yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:243a-40: 'di ni gzhan sel ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don gnod par byed pa ni de la yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:243a-41: de'i phyir tha snyad du gnod par byed pa yod pa dang med pa dag las rtogs pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:243b-0: cig @243b shos su rnam par gzhag gi don dam par ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:243b-1: de'i phyir gzhan sel bar rtogs pa ni gnod pa med pa yin pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:243b-2: cig shos ni gnod pa yin pa'i phyir gzhan sel ba sgra'i don yin no zhes khong du chud do //
T11TD4221.1E:243b-3: des na gzhan sel ba de ni sgra'i don du 'gro ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:243b-4: sgra ni 'dod pa spangs nas 'jug par byed pa yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:243b-5: mnyan pa de ni gzhan sel ba byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:243b-6: yang na rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan gyis gzhan sel ba nyid phyi rol du lhag par zhen par 'gyur ba yin gyi rang gi ngo bos ni ma yin pas skyon med do //
T11TD4221.1E:243b-7: de'i phyir sgra la rang gi ngo bos brjod par bya ba ni cung zad kyang med pas sgrub pa ni sgra'i don ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:243b-8: gal te rang gi ngo bo nyid shes pa la snang na ji ltar phyi rol la 'jug ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:243b-9: phyi rol du lhag par zhen pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:243b-10: lhag par zhen ba zhes bya ba 'di ci yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:243b-11: de'i tha snyad kyi yul nyid du rnam par 'jug pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:243b-12: de ltar gzhan gzhan gyi tha snyad kyi yul yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:243b-13: 'dra bas de la rjes su chags pa'i 'khrul pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:243b-15: de la rang bzhin gzhan lhag par sgro btags pa lhag par zhen pa ma yin nam zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:243b-17: lhag par sgro btags pa yang shes pa gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:243b-18: gal te des de'i rang bzhin rtogs pa yin na lhag par sgro btags pa ci yod /
T11TD4221.1E:243b-19: gzhan du rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:243b-20: ci ste gzhan de la yod dam de lta'o zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:243b-21: lhag par sgro btags pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:243b-22: bden pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
T11TD4221.1E:243b-24: 'o na ni de shes pa tsam zhig yin pa'i phyir ji ltar gzhan sgro btags pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:243b-25: gang la de sgro btags par bya ba de yang don gyi rang bzhin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:243b-26: shes pa'i rang bzhin yin yang rung ste /
T11TD4221.1E:243b-27: de'i tshe de la sgro btags so zhes bya ba'i don ci zhig yin /
T11TD4221.1E:243b-29: de dang lhan cig rtogs pa yin pa de'i tshe yang lhag par sgro btags pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:243b-30: 'on te med pa nyid las yod par rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:243b-31: med pa nyid du ji ltar rtogs //
T11TD4221.1E:243b-32: de'i rang bzhin ma dmigs pa'i phyir gzhan gyis rtogs pa yin no zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:243b-34: de yul ma yin pa'i phyir med par ji ltar rtogs /
T11TD4221.1E:243b-35: mi dmigs pa ni spyod yul du gyur pa'i dngos po la go bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:243b-36: dbang po nyams pa las de ltar rtogs pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:243b-37: de ni snga ma med pa nyid rtogs pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:244a-0: med par rtogs pa ni ma @244a * //
T11TD4221.1E:244a-2: de ni de'i tshe nyid yod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:244a-3: 'on te thob par bya ba'i tha snyad byed pa'i phyir thob par bya ba ma yin pa'i tha snyad mi byed pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:244a-4: de ltar na ni 'o na de las gzhan du lhag par sgro 'dogs pa yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:244a-5: lhag par sgro 'dogs pa ni gzhan gyi tha snyad kyi yul du byed pa zhes bya ba de nyid grub pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:244a-6: de'i phyir sgra'i don ni gzhan sel ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:244a-8: de'i phyir brda yi dus na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:244a-9: rang nyid rtogs pa'i 'bras bu can //
T11TD4221.1E:244a-10: bstan pa'i don dang 'brel pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:244a-12: brdar byed pa na yang brda byed pa po sgrub pa'i sgo nas ni brda byed pa ma yin te ;
T11TD4221.1E:244a-13: 'on kyang gzhan sel ba'i sgo nas yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:244a-14: gang gi phyir brda'i dus na yang /
T11TD4221.1E:244a-15: gzhan sel ba nyid mnyan pa dang 'brel pa yin gyi dngos po ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:244a-16: 'di ni lha sbyin no zhes brda 'dogs pa na /
T11TD4221.1E:244a-17: rang gi mtshan nyid kho na 'brel par mthong ba ma yin nam zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:244a-18: de ni legs pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:244a-19: de na bstan kyang gzugs brnyan kho na rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:244a-21: brda ni don rtogs don yin par //
T11TD4221.1E:244a-22: gnyi ga yis kyang 'dod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:244a-23: gzugs brnyan rtogs 'gyur mngon sum gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:244a-24: dngos po nyid ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:244a-26: 'di las ni dus gzhan du yang 'di rtogs par bya ba yin no zhes brda ni de las gzhan pa'i dus kyi rtogs pa'i gnas skabs khyab pa nyid du rang dang gzhan gnyi ga yang gdon mi za bar 'dod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:244a-27: des na mnyan pa dang gzhan sel ba nyid 'brel pa yin gyi rang gi mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:244a-28: ci ste 'di'i ming ni 'di yin no zhes gzugs brnyan khyad par yin par ni rtogs pa med kyi 'on kyang 'di'i ming ni 'di yin no zhes rang gi mtshan nyid kho na brda'i yul nyid du rtogs so snyam na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:244a-29: shin tu goms pa'am rtog pa sngon du gtong ba can ma yin pa'i phyir de ltar rtogs pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:244a-30: bzlog pas ni nges pa kho nar gzugs brnyan du rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:244a-31: yang gang zhig tha snyad las brdar rtogs pa dang ldan pa de ni nges par brda'i dus kyi rang bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan gyi ngo bo nyid lhag par zhen par byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:244a-35: 'di ni rtog ldan nyid yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:244a-36: gzhan du rtog ldan ji ltar yin //
T11TD4221.1E:244a-37: de bzhin du 'di 'on cig ces brjod pa las /
T11TD4221.1E:244b-0: de log par ni @244b mthong ba na //
T11TD4221.1E:244b-3: yang na bstan pa ni sngar bshad zin pa'i gzugs brnyan gang yin pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:244b-4: de ldog pa'i rang bzhin gyi gzhan sel ba ni de dang 'brel pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:244b-5: gzugs brnyan de'i 'bras bu yang gzhan sel ba rtogs pa nyid yin gyi rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:244b-6: rang gi ngo bo ni don la med pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:244b-7: ldog pa ni yod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:244b-8: ldog pa de ni gzhan yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:244b-10: rtogs pas bkar nas de dang gcig par tha snyad byed pa'i phyir ro /
T11TD4221.1E:244b-12: gzhan du ma ma mthong la ltos dang //
T11TD4221.1E:244b-13: la lar de mthong la ltos phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:244b-15: de ni dngos la mi rung ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:244b-16: sgra ni de dang rigs mi mthun pa gzhan la ma mthong ba'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:244b-17: de'i rigs can 'ga' zhig la mthong ba'i phyir gzhan sel ba nyid la brdar 'dogs pa yin no zhes shes so //
T11TD4221.1E:244b-18: spyi'am gsal ba la brda 'dogs par ji ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:244b-20: de ltar gyur na sgrub pa'i tshul kho nas brdar btags pa'i phyir thams cad la mthong bar thal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:244b-22: mthong ba tsam la ltos par 'gyur gyis gzhan du ma mthong ba la ltos par ni mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:244b-23: spyi ldog pa dang bcas par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:244b-24: 'o na ni de las gzhan las ldog pa de nyid yin par 'gyur gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:244b-25: spyi btags pas ci zhig bya /
T11TD4221.1E:244b-26: gsal ba nyid de las gzhan las ldog pa dang ldan par rtogs par 'gyur gyi spyis ci bya /
T11TD4221.1E:244b-27: gsal ba nyid ni mi rtogs so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:244b-29: gsal ba med par spyi rtogs pas kyang ci zhig bya /
T11TD4221.1E:244b-30: mtshon zin pas mtshon pa'i phyir gsal ba yang rtogs so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:244b-31: ci 'dir gnyis rim gyis rtogs sam /
T11TD4221.1E:244b-33: dang po ni ba lang nyid tsam rtogs pas yul du byed la /
T11TD4221.1E:244b-34: de'i 'og tu ni khra bo la sogs pa'i khyad par ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:244b-36: khra bo la sogs pa rnams kyi nang gi khyad par rtogs pa ni mi srid do //
T11TD4221.1E:244b-37: des na de yang spyi nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:244b-38: de'i phyir gsal pa rnams ni spyis mtshon pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:244b-39: spyi nyid mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:244b-40: gdon mi za bar 'dir khyad par 'ga' zhig yod dgos so zhes mtshon pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:244b-42: de la sgra'i byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:244b-44: 'on te ma yin zhes bya ba 'di la tshad ma med do //
T11TD4221.1E:245a-1: gyur pa ni rtogs pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:245a-2: des na dngos po dang bral pa'i phyir de ni blo nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:245a-3: phyir de ni blo nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:245a-4: 'o na ji ltar gzhan sel ba sgra'i don yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:245a-6: gzhan las ldog pa kho na la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:245a-7: gal te spyi'am gsal ba rtogs pa yin na ni slu bar mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:245a-8: rtogs pa la ni slu ba yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:245a-9: slu bar gyur na gzhan las ldog pa yang sgra'i don du ji ltar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:245a-10: gzhan mthong yang de las gzhan len pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:245a-11: re zhig de ni blangs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:245a-12: gzhan blang dgos so zhes bya ba'i nges pa ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:245a-13: de nyid kyi phyir sgra'i rtogs pa dang rnam pa mtshungs pa'i phyir na /
T11TD4221.1E:245a-14: rjes su dpag pa yang rnam par gcod pa tsam zhig gi sgrub par byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:245a-16: gzhan du ma mthong la ltos dang //
T11TD4221.1E:245a-17: zhes bya ba ni tha snyad kyi brda 'dzin pa na /
T11TD4221.1E:245a-18: gzhan du ma mthong ba la ltos pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:245a-19: rigs mthun pa 'ga' zhig la mthong ba la ltos nas brda 'dzin par byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:245a-20: des na gang la de ma mthong ba de thams cad ni rnam par bcad pa shes pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:245a-21: gang la tha snyad mthong ba de ni yod dam /
T11TD4221.1E:245a-22: 'on te med ces bye brag tu mi rtogs so //
T11TD4221.1E:245a-23: 'di ltar brda 'dzin pa ni de kho na ltar yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:245a-25: dngos po 'di 'on cig ces bya ba'i ngag gi byed pa ni len pa la yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:245a-26: dngos po yod pa nyid la ni ma yin no//
T11TD4221.1E:245a-27: med pa ni blang bar mi nus so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:245a-28: gal te 'di rgyal po'i bka' yin na ni de'i tshe gor ma chag par khyer 'ongs dgos so //
T11TD4221.1E:245a-29: de ni yongs su brtag pa na tshad ma gzhan nam /
T11TD4221.1E:245a-30: don gyis go ba las yod pa nyid du rtogs pas yul du byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:245a-31: don gyis go ba dang lhan cig pa'i sgra ni yod pa nyid la tshad ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:245a-32: don gyis go ba med pa'i phyir na /
T11TD4221.1E:245a-34: 'di ni byis pa mngon par 'dod pa slong ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:245a-35: des na yod pa srid na len pa yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:245a-36: gzhan ni mi len pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:245a-37: yang gzhan dag ni rigs mi mthun pa thams cad ldog pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:245a-38: 'ga' zhig tu bsgrub par 'jug pa la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:245a-39: ldog pa lhu che ba yin gyi rjes su 'gro ba ni gtso bo ma yin pas ldog pa nyid gtsor rtogs so zhe'o //
T11TD4221.1E:245a-41: gal te rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las gcig gtsor gyur pa yin du chug kyang /
T11TD4221.1E:245b-0: de lta na yang sgra'i don sgrub pa yin pa las ni 'das pa ma yin no zhes bya bas tha ma rjes @245b su 'gro ba ni gtso bo ma yin par rtogs par yang mi nus so //
T11TD4221.1E:245b-1: gsal ba gcig mthong bas kyang spyi'i bdag nyid thams cad rtogs pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:245b-2: rjes su 'gro ba gtso bo ma yin no zhes bya bar ni mi rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:245b-4: la lar de mthong la ltos phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:245b-5: zhes bya ba ni 'di'i ming yin no zhes bya bas /
T11TD4221.1E:245b-6: thams cad kyi tshe sgra sbyor ba la don yod par 'gyur ba ni ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:245b-7: 'di'i ming 'di yin no zhes bya ba ni 'di las 'di la tha snyad du byas pa yin no zhes de tsam zhig la yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:245b-8: gzhan du tha snyad med pa'i phyir sgra rnams ni gzhan sel ba'i yul can yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:245b-9: ci ste gang du rjes su dpag pas dngos po thob par 'gyur ba na /
T11TD4221.1E:245b-10: shes pa de ci ltar gzhan sel ba'i yul can yin par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:245b-11: de la yang gzhan sel ba'i yul can nyid du 'dod pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:245b-13: der yang khyad par la the tshom za ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:245b-14: der ni 'di ltar rtogs pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:245b-15: re zhig 'di me yin par ni 'gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:245b-16: me ci lta bu yin pa mi shes so //
T11TD4221.1E:245b-17: gal te spyi yongs su ma bcad na ji ltar me'i khyad par la the tshom za bar 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:245b-18: rtogs pa tsam gyis the tshom za ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:245b-19: re zhig rtogs pa de ni yod pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:245b-20: ci me yod dam 'on te med ce'am /
T11TD4221.1E:245b-21: de la me ji lta bu zhig yod ces khyad par mi shes pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:245b-22: gang du yang 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs yod pa der me nges par yod pa ma yin nam zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:245b-24: me ni reg pa'i khyad par yin pa'i phyir ro //
