T11TD4221.1E:245b-25: de la ni nges pa yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:245b-27: dro ba tsam zhig rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:245b-28: spyi rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:245b-30: khyad par gyi rim pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:245b-31: khyad par gyi rim pa las sogs pa'i bye brag las tha dad pa'i dro ba'i spyi zhes bya ba ni /
T11TD4221.1E:245b-33: de yang rtogs pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:245b-34: rtogs pa yang khyad par gyi rim pa nyid dmigs pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:245b-35: dmigs la ni rag na blo gcig nyid ni med de /
T11TD4221.1E:245b-36: res 'ga' ni 'di lta bu res 'ga' ni 'di lta bu zhes blo gzhan skye ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:245b-37: gcig nyid dus gcig gi tshe rang bzhin du mar dmigs pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:245b-39: gdon mi za bar gcig ni mi bden par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:245b-40: de'i phyir der yang rtogs pa tsam zhig bden pa yin gyi gzhan ma yin pas /
T11TD4221.1E:245b-41: gzhan sel ba tsam gzhig sgra dang rjes su dpag pa'i yul yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:245b-42: dngos po la ni de 'thad pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-1: ni rtags la'ang 'brel pa yin no zhes blta bar bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-2: de'i phyir rigs sogs de ldan ni //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-3: yod min don dang de dag la //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-4: mnyan pa 'brel min gzhan las ni //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-5: ldog pa nyid la sgra sbyor phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-6: des na tshad ma med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-7: rigs la sogs pa'i 'brel pa rtogs pa ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-8: rdzas 'brel pa yang rang gi ngo bos snang ba nyid la ci zhig yod /
T11TD4221.1E:246a-9: ldan par snang ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:246a-11: gzhan rtogs pas rnam par rtog par mi byed kyang de'i ngo bor snang ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-12: de tsam 'ba' zhig gis rtogs par srid pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-13: de nyid la rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:246a-14: 'dod pa'i phyir gnod pa ci yod gnyi ga las skyes pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:246a-15: gang yang rung ba'i las skyes pa dang ldan pa las skyes pa zhes ni rtogs pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-16: rang gi ngo bo tsam du rtogs so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:246a-18: ldan pa'i rang gi ngo bo snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-19: dngos po gnyis kho nar de ltar skyes pa'i snang ba yin gyi ldan pa'i ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-20: dngos po gnyis po de nyid ldan pa yin no zhes rtogs pa yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-21: des na ldan pa gzhan ni med de snga ma dang lhan cig gcig tu rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-22: mngon sum ni snga ma dang phyi ma'i dngos po la byed pa yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-23: snga ma rtogs par ma gyur mod //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-24: de lta na yang ldan pa rtogs pa ni yod pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:246a-26: mi ldan pa las ldan 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-28: gcig dgos byed mkhan nga yin zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-29: de ni rtogs par 'dod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-30: gal te de ltar ma rtogs na //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-31: ldan par rtog pa don med 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-33: ldan pa don ldan 'gyur ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-34: sgra sbyor bar byed pa yang med de /
T11TD4221.1E:246a-35: sgra de la med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-36: brda'i dus na sgra yod par gyur pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:246a-37: de dang sbyor bar byed pa yang yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:246a-39: brda dran pa yi rgyu can gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-40: mthong ba sre byed bdag nyid can //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-41: snga phyi stong bas 'dzin pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-42: mig shes la ni de ji ltar //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-43: 'di ba lang ngo zhes bya ba 'di ba lang gi sgra nyid ni ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:246a-44: 'di ba lang gi sgras brjod par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-45: gzhi mthun pa ni de dang 'brel pa las te /
T11TD4221.1E:246a-46: dper na dbyig pa zhugs so zhes bya ba bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-47: yang na gang la ba lang gi sgra yod pa de ba lang gi sgra yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:246a-48: de la gang gi tshe sbyor bas phyogs gcig la 'di ni ba lang ngo zhes bya ba de la ni /
T11TD4221.1E:246b-0: 'di ba lang gi sgras brjod @246b par bya ba yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:246b-1: ba lang gi sgra las 'di rtogs par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:246b-2: ba lang de ni 'di'o zhes bya bar ni 'di la ba lang gi brdar btags pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:246b-3: de lta bu'i dngos po de ni snga ma dang phyi ma 'dzin pas stong pa'i bdag nyid kyi mngon sum gyis ji ltar 'dzin par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:246b-5: dbang rnams rung ba'i yul gnas la //
T11TD4221.1E:246b-7: dbang po la brten rnam shes kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:246b-8: spyod yul dbang po'i byed can yin //
T11TD4221.1E:246b-9: zhes de ni bshad zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:246b-10: gal te mig la sogs pa'i dbang po snga ma dang phyi ma dag la yang 'jug ba yin na ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa thams cad rtogs par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:246b-11: thams cad 'ga' zhig dang rnam pa 'ga' zhig ltar 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:246b-12: sngar gzung ba rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:246b-14: thams cad kyi tshe rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:246b-15: dran pa yod na 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:246b-16: dran pa nyid de yin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:246b-17: dran par bya ba dang lhan cig mngon sum gyis gcig tu rtogs pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:246b-19: dran pa tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:246b-20: dran par bya ba mi bden pa nyid de dang lhan cig tu rtogs pa bden par ji ltar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:246b-21: ci ste yang de'i don bya ba byed pa'i phyir de nyid 'di yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:246b-22: don bya ba zhes pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:246b-23: de'i sgras brjod par bya ba nyid yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:246b-24: de nyid kyis don bya dgos so zhes bya ba las /
T11TD4221.1E:246b-25: de'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam du zad kyi ;
T11TD4221.1E:246b-26: gcig nyid du 'dzin pa la tshad ma ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:246b-27: tha snyad mi slu ba nyid las tshad mar 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:246b-28: gcig nyid la ni mi slu ba yod ba ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:246b-29: 'on kyang don bya ba la yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:246b-30: de ni yod pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:246b-31: de'i don nyid ni don bya ba byed pa las yin gyi snga ma dang gcig nyid ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:246b-32: ci ste de nyid 'di yin no snyam pa'i mtshams sbyor ba 'di ni yod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:246b-33: gal te snga ma dang phyi ma dag gcig pa nyid med na mtshams sbyor bar byed pa po nyid du su zhig 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:246b-34: mtshams sbyor ba po gcig nyid yin na snga ma dang phyi ma 'dzin pa'i mngon sum mtshams sbyor ba po la brten pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:246b-36: dran ba dang mthong ba'i rnam pa las tha dad pa'i mtshams sbyor ba gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:246b-37: gal te mngon sum pa dag la brten pa yin yang /
T11TD4221.1E:246b-38: de tsam gyis ni de tshad mar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:246b-39: dbang po la brten pas na tshad ma yin la bdag la brten pas ni gcig nyid du 'dzin pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:247a-0: de ni dbang po'i rjes su 'brangs nas @247a * //
T11TD4221.1E:247a-2: dbang po yang snga ma dang phyi ma la mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:247a-3: de'i rjes su 'brang ba'i shes pa ni 'jug go zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:247a-5: de'i rjes su 'brang ba nyid mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:247a-6: sten gyi shes pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa med par ni snga ma la shes pa 'jug pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:247a-7: de las gzhan pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa yin no zhes bya ba ni bab chol yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:247a-8: gcig nyid du rtogs pa ni dbang po med par mi 'byung ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:247a-9: des ni gcig nyid du rtogs pa dbang po las skyes pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:247a-10: mngon sum las 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:247a-12: gcig nyid las khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:247a-13: gsal ba nyid kyis khyad par yod pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:247a-14: gsal ba nyid gcig yin la rag mod /
T11TD4221.1E:247a-15: mi gsal ba dang gcig nyid du go mngon sum gyis ji ltar khong du chud /
T11TD4221.1E:247a-16: de ni 'di dang gcig par mngon sum gyis khong du chud pa ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:247a-17: 'di go de dang ji ltar ma yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:247a-20: gnyi ga mngon sum gyis gzung ba med par de gcig par mngon sum gyis ji ltar yul du byed /
T11TD4221.1E:247a-21: gcig nyid mngon sum gyis 'dzin pa yin gyi don ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:247a-22: 'o na gcig nyid de don la brten pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:247a-23: gcig nyid dang brgyud pa med pa'i phyir de dang ldan pa 'phen pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:247a-24: 'phen pa zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:247a-25: des na mngon sum gyis rang dbang du bzung ba la rjes su dpag pas gzhan du 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni 'thad pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:247a-26: rjes su dpag pa ni mngon sum sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:247a-27: des na mngon sum gyis ni 'di ba lang ngo zhes rtogs pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:247a-28: snga ma dang phyi ma 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:247a-29: gzhan yang shi ba la yang snga ma dang phyi mar 'dzin pa yod pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:247a-30: de ji ltar 'di tshad ma ma yin par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:247a-31: de'i phyir nye bar gnas pa 'dzin pa tsam kho na tshad ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:247a-32: de la yang sbyor bar byed pa med pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:247a-33: dbang po'i shes pa ni rtog pa med pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:247a-35: gzhan la 'jug sems can gyi yang //
T11TD4221.1E:247a-36: mig gis gzugs dag mthong gyur pa //
T11TD4221.1E:247a-37: der ni gsal bar de yi brda //
T11TD4221.1E:247a-38: des na de bskyed rtog pa'ang med //
T11TD4221.1E:247a-39: gang gis dran pa dbang po'i lhan cig byed par 'gyur ba /
T11TD4221.1E:247a-40: gzugs la sogs pa rnam par rtog pa bzhin pa nyid na /
T11TD4221.1E:247a-41: mthong ba ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:247b-0: gang zhig gang gi lhan cig @247b byed pa yin pa de med par rang gi 'bras bu la nus pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:247b-1: sa la sogs pa med par myu gu byed pa la sa bon bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:247b-2: 'on te 'bras bu byed do cog la ni dran pa lhan cig byed pa ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:247b-3: 'on kyang rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa skyed pa la yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:247b-5: gal te rnam rtog gzhan gyis de /
T11TD4221.1E:247b-6: rnam rtog bcas pa nyid yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:247b-7: grub pa la sgrub gzhan du na //
T11TD4221.1E:247b-9: gal te rnam par rtog pa gzhan dang lhan cig 'jug pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:247b-10: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:247b-11: de lta bur gyur pa la dran pa lhan cig byed pa yin par grub pa la sgrub po //
T11TD4221.1E:247b-12: de ste bdag nyid du gyur pa'i rnam par rtog pas yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:247b-14: de yod na yang med 'gyur la //
T11TD4221.1E:247b-15: de med na yang yod pa gang //
T11TD4221.1E:247b-16: 'gal ba'i chos dang ldan pas na //
T11TD4221.1E:247b-17: de dang de gcig ji ltar yin //
T11TD4221.1E:247b-18: ci ste rnam par rtog pa can de ni gzhan yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:247b-19: sngar gyi rnam par rtog pa med pa yang gzhan yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:247b-20: de lta yin na ni khyed kyi ngo shes pa nyams pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:247b-21: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang bshad zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:247b-22: de'i phyir lhan cig gi tshe /
T11TD4221.1E:247b-23: sems gzhan du song ba'i gnas skabs su rnam par rtog pa med pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan gyi tshe yang de lta bu kho na yin par rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:247b-24: 'on te rnam par rtog pa gzhan gyis rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:247b-25: de lta yin na ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las kyang rtog pa dang bcas pa yin par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:247b-26: rna ba yang lhan cig byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:247b-27: 'on te shes pa de gnyis ni tha dad pa kho na'o zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:247b-28: gzhan du yang mtshungs pa'i phyir khyad par med do //
T11TD4221.1E:247b-29: 'on te gnas skabs de na rnam par rtog pa gzhan yang yod do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:247b-32: ci ste mi dmigs kyang tha snyad las sgrub pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:247b-33: rnam par rtog pa med par ni tha snyad ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:247b-34: tha snyad dang ni rnam rtog dag / rgyu dang 'bras bur grub pas na //
T11TD4221.1E:247b-37: rjes su dpag pas ni sgra sbyor bar byed pa rtogs par ni 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:247b-38: de yang tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:247b-39: 'on te 'di nyid kyis 'khrul pa yin no snyam na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:247b-40: phyogs nyid kyis ni 'khrul par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:248a-0: de la ma yin na ni du ba las me rjes su dpog pa la yang phyogs @248a * //
T11TD4221.1E:248a-3: de ni rjes su dpag pas dmigs pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:248a-5: tha snyad las kyang rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:248a-6: grang ba zlog pa'i tha snyad dam //
T11TD4221.1E:248a-7: reg pa'i rnam par shes pa las //
T11TD4221.1E:248a-8: lkog gyur me yi bdag nyid ni //
T11TD4221.1E:248a-9: rtog na de yang 'thad par dka' //
T11TD4221.1E:248a-10: gal te me med kyang da lta nyid du ba ni yod pa ma yin no zhes res 'ga' rjes su dpag par bya ba ma mthong ba'i me the tshom gyi yul du gyur pa der ni /
T11TD4221.1E:248a-11: du ba'i rang bzhin rtogs pa las reg pa'i rnam par shes pa'am /
T11TD4221.1E:248a-12: grang ba zlog pa'i tha snyad kyis 'khrul pa spong ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:248a-14: reg shes tha snyad dag las ni //
T11TD4221.1E:248a-15: rjes su dpag pas de rtogs na //
T11TD4221.1E:248a-16: rjes dpag de yi 'khrul med pa'ang //
T11TD4221.1E:248a-17: rjes dpag gzhan las 'gyur ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:248a-18: rjes dpag nyid du mtshungs phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:248a-19: de lta yin na thug med 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:248a-20: gal te rjes su dpag pa las 'khrul par dogs pa na /
T11TD4221.1E:248a-21: rjes su dpag pa nyid 'khrul pa med pa'i sgrub byed yin pa de lta na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:248a-22: rjes su dpag pa nyid du mtshungs pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:248a-23: de'i mtshan nyid can thams cad la dogs par 'gyur ba de ni ma grub pas ma grub pa bsgrub pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:248a-24: reg pas ni gzugs grub pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:248a-25: dung ser por shes pa'i yul la yang reg pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:248a-26: gang du du bar 'khrul bar dogs pa der blo sngon du btang nas byas pa'i grang ba med pa la sogs pa'i tha snyad ni ches shin tu 'khrul par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:248a-27: de'i phyir rjes su dpag pas rnam par rtog pa sgrub pa la gal te phyogs nyid kyis 'khrul pa yin na rjes su dpag pa mtha' dag la 'gyur ba'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:248a-28: rtog pa 'di ni legs pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:248a-30: ji ltar du bas dngos stobs las //
T11TD4221.1E:248a-31: rjes su dpag par ba 'jug cing //
T11TD4221.1E:248a-32: de yang slu ba med mthong ba //
T11TD4221.1E:248a-33: de ltar rtogs pa'i sgrub byed min //
T11TD4221.1E:248a-34: yul lkog tu gyur pa la me'i rjes su dpag pa 'jug pa la ni mngon sum gyis gnod pa med de de ni mngon sum gyi yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:248a-35: rnam par rtog pa'i sgrub pa la ni rgyang ring ba la sags [*sogs?] pa yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:248a-36: rnam par rtog pa ni rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyi yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:248b-0: phra mo nyid kyang gzhan gyis dmigs pa dang gzhan gyis ma dmigs pa la ltos pa yin na rang gi rang bzhin la ni ji ltar dmigs par bya ba phra ba de bzhin du dmigs byed pa yang yin pas khyi 'tshod pa khyi 'tshod pas mi @248b 'jigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:248b-1: rang rig par bya ba'i med pa ni di kho na'o ste /
T11TD4221.1E:248b-2: nyams su myong ba med pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:248b-3: me la sogs pa ltar rnam par rtog pa la rjes su dpag pa la 'jug pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:248b-4: de ltar rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:248b-5: gal te rnam par rtog pa med par tha snyad mi 'thad pa'i phyir 'brel pa bzung ba na /
T11TD4221.1E:248b-6: ji ltar rjes su mi dpog ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:248b-8: 'brel pa 'dzin pa nyid rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:248b-10: dpyod sogs med na med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:248b-11: goms pa med pa'i tha snyad ni //
T11TD4221.1E:248b-13: tha snyad de med par yang 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:248b-14: goms pa med pa'i tha snyad ni dpyod pa la sogs pa med par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:248b-16: goms par 'gyur ba la ni rnam pa gzhan du yang 'gyur ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:248b-17: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:248b-18: de'i phyir med kyang goms pa las //
T11TD4221.1E:248b-19: srog chags rnams kyi tha snyad 'di //
T11TD4221.1E:248b-21: tha snyad kyis ni rjes dpog med //
T11TD4221.1E:248b-22: rjes su dpag pa 'jug pa ni 'brel pa 'dzin pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:248b-23: rjes su mthun pa kho nar yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:248b-24: de ltar ma yin na 'brel pa 'dzin ba rjes su dpag pa la nye bar mkho ba med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:248b-25: 'brel pa de yang ma goms pa'i gnas skabs nyid na 'dzin pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:248b-26: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:248b-27: de'i phyir dpyod sogs tha snyad las //
T11TD4221.1E:248b-28: rjes su dpag pa nyid ma yin ;
T11TD4221.1E:248b-29: / gang phyir tha snyad ces bya 'di //
T11TD4221.1E:248b-30: rnam pa gzhan du'ang dmigs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:248b-32: 'phyor mo gzugs dang ldan pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:248b-34: de las gzugs dang mi ldan pa'ang //
T11TD4221.1E:248b-35: gzugs dang ldan par dpog par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:248b-36: de'i phyir gzhan rnam rtog pa na brda'i dus na dmigs pa'i sgra 'dzin pa med par gsal ba'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:248b-37: de las skyes pa'i rtog pa yang med pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:248b-38: gal te mngon sum nyid sgra dang 'brel pa mi 'dzin na /
T11TD4221.1E:248b-39: ji ltar de'i brjod par bya ba de ni 'di yin no zhes bya ba de ltar tha snyad byed ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:248b-41: 'khrul pa las kyang tha snyad du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:248b-42: 'khrul pa yin yang dngos po dang 'brel pas na tshad ma nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:248b-43: dper na shing dag la gong bur 'dzin pa'i shes pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:248b-44: de la yang gong bu zhes bya ba ni med mod kyi 'on kyang shing gi tha snyad ni mi slu ba dang ldan pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:248b-45: de bzhin du sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni med mod kyi 'on kyang sbyor ba can gyi tha snyad ni phyin ci ma log pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:249a-1: ltar 'di ba lang ngo zhes de'i gzhi mthun pa nyid du rtogs pa na ba lang gi sgra ni 'di rjod par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T11TD4221.1E:249a-2: des na rtogs pa 'di ni mi slu ba dang ldan pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:249a-3: de ni de lta bur gyur pa nyid kyi yul la sbyor bar mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:249a-4: dper na shing gi yul la gong bur rtogs pa 'byung gi gzhan la ma yin pa de'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:249a-5: 'brel pa las mi slu ba yin pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:249a-6: gal te ba lang gi sgra las rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs par mi 'gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:249a-7: 'o na ji ltar de mthong ba ni de ni 'di yin no zhes rtogs par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:249a-8: bdag gis sngon rtogs pa de ni 'di yin no zhes bya ba'i shes pa ni 'jig rten yod pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:249a-10: mthong ba la ngo shes par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:249a-11: de 'di yin no snyam pa ni ngo shes pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:249a-12: 'di'o snyam pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:249a-13: de'o snyam pa ni lkog tu gyur pa'i rnam pa yin gyi mthong ba'i rnam pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:249a-14: des na rtogs pa gnyis phan tshun mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i phyir yul gcig pa nyid ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:249a-15: snang ba tha dad pa ni tha dad par byed pa yin pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:249a-16: de tha dad par byed pa nyid ma yin na ni tha snyad pa med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:249a-17: ci ste don bya ba tha dad pa yin gyi snang ba tha dad pas ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:249a-19: snang ba tha dad pas tha dad pa'i don bya ba byed pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:249a-20: don bya ba'i khyad par can gyi snang ba tha dad pa las yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:249a-21: gal te don byed pa dang bral ba la snang ba yod na 'o na ni dmigs pa med pa'i rnam par shes pa de dbang po las skyes pa'i phyir shes pa las gzhan yin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:249a-22: de'o snyam pa'i bag chags tsam las byung ba yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:249a-23: don byed pa'i dngos po 'dzin pa'i shes pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:249a-24: des na dngos po la ma reg pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:249a-25: de'o snyam pa dang 'di'o snyam pa'i shes pa dag gi gzhi mthun pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:249a-26: 'di'o zhes bya bar snang ba yang 'di ni de'o zhes mdun na gnas pa thams cad la thun mong du lhag par zhen pa can yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:249a-27: thun mong ba nyid dang brel na ni rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:249a-28: gal te dbang po'i rnam par shes pa rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:249a-29: de'i tshe skyon gzhan 'dir yang 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:249a-30: gang la sgra ni des 'god pa //
T11TD4221.1E:249a-31: de la rnam rtog skye bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:249a-32: des na dbang skyes 'dod pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:249a-34: sgra ni lkog tu gyur pa'i don la 'jug cing rnam par rtog pa rnams kyang de la 'jug pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:249b-0: de'i phyir dbang po'i rnam @249b par shes pa sgra bzhin du dmigs pa kho nar 'gyur gyi phyi rol mthong ba ni mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:249b-1: lkog tu gyur pa'i don la 'jug pa ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:249b-2: rang gi ngo bo la reg pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:249b-3: rang gi ngo bo la reg na ni da ltar ba gsal bar 'dzin ba'i phyir 'di'o zhes bya ba nyid du 'gyur gyi de zhes bya bar ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:249b-4: yang na dran pa thams cad dbang po'i shes pa nyid du 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:249b-5: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:249b-6: sgra'i shes pa'i phyi rol gyi rang bzhin la reg pa can ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:249b-7: ci ste phyi rol gyi don la sgra 'god pa de lta yin yang sgra'i shes pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin 'jug pa /
T11TD4221.1E:249b-8: de bzhin du dbang po las skyes pa yang 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:249b-9: des na phyi rol gyi don med pa dag kyang 'jug pas dmigs pa med par gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:249b-10: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:249b-11: 'on te gang la 'dod pa'i rjes su byed pa med pa der don gyi rjes su byed pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:249b-12: phyi rol gyi don la dmigs par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:249b-13: gal te don gyi rjes su byed pa mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid yin pa de lta na ni de'i tshe dbang po'i rnam par shes pa rnam par rtog pa med ba nyid du 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:249b-14: sgra'i rnam pa nyid ni 'dod pa la rag las pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:249b-15: de ni phyi rol gyi don gyi rjes su 'gro ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:249b-16: bag chags kyi rjes su 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:249b-17: ci ste gal te sgra'i rnam ba bag chags kyi rjes su 'gro ba yin pa de lta na yang bag chags dang /
T11TD4221.1E:249b-18: dbang po'i tshogs pa las gcig po nyid yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:249b-19: mngon sum rtog pa dang bcas pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:249b-20: tha snyad ni de lta bu nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:249b-21: de lta ma yin na zhes pas yul du ma byas ba la tha snyad du mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:249b-22: 'di ni bde ba la sogs pa'i sgrub par byed pa yin par nges so zhes 'jig rten gyi tha snyad mthong ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:249b-23: de yang mi bden pa nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:249b-25: ji ltar tshogs las shes pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:249b-28: tshad ma med pa nyid phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:249b-29: tha dad pa ni rgyu tha dad pa las yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:249b-30: sgra dang dbang pos bskyed pa'i shes pa'i don gyi rnam pa dag ni bag chags la sogs pa rgyu tha dad pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:249b-31: tha snyad ni gcig nyid ma yin gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:249b-34: shes pa gnyis kyi tha snyad skye ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:249b-35: gzhan rnam par rtog pa na yang tha snyad srid pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:249b-36: rnam par rtog pa gzhan mngon du gyur pa na de zhen pas yul du /
T11TD4221.1E:249b-37: de nyam su myong ba med pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:249b-38: de lta dang phyis myong bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:249b-39: de ni dbang po'i shes tha snyad 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:250a-0: @250a * // don bya ba sbyor bar byed pas tha snyad du 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:250a-1: don bya ba yang sngar nyams su myong ba dang phyis myong bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:250a-2: de ni dbang po'i shes pa'i yul ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:250a-3: rjes su dpag pa med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:250a-4: phyi rol mthong mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don ci yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:250a-5: phyi rol mthong ba ma yin pa de dag kyang dbang po las skyes par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:250a-7: chod pa la sogs yod na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:250a-8: dbang po'i blo ni skye bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:250a-9: zhes bya ba yang bar chod la sogs pa yod pa la yang skye ba'i blo gang yin pa dper na de zhes bya ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:250a-10: cha shas so snyam pa'i de yang dbang po las skyes par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:250a-12: 'o na ji ltar dngos po 'di snyam du nges pa mdun na gnas pa'i dngos po nges par byed pa yin 'di la nges pa'i yul lkog tu gyur pa ni yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:250a-13: 'di zhes bya ba ni mngon sum du nye ba'i don yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:250a-15: 'di ni yid kyi mngon sum yin no zhes bshad par bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:250a-16: gal te nges pa med par tha snyad med pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:250a-18: nges par ma byas pa gzung ba med par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:250a-19: gzugs la gzugs zhes mthong ba na /
T11TD4221.1E:250a-20: de yi blo zhen ji ltar mthong //
T11TD4221.1E:250a-21: de yi nyams su myong ba'ang yod //
T11TD4221.1E:250a-22: de ni rtog med ji ltar yin /
T11TD4221.1E:250a-23: shes pa thams cad rnam par rtog pa dang bcas par smra ba'i ltar na /
T11TD4221.1E:250a-24: gzugs la gzugs so snyam du mthong ba yin yang /
T11TD4221.1E:250a-25: de'i blo ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:250a-26: de la de'i blo'o snyam pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:250a-27: ci ste snyam su myong ba nyid med pa de lta na yang tha snyad yod pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:250a-28: de nyams su myong ba med kyang shes pa la khyed kyi 'dod pas don gyis go ba la sogs pas tha snyad ji snyed pa srid pa yin na rnam par rtog pa ni yod pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:250a-29: med pas gsal bar nyams su myong ba la lti ci smos /
T11TD4221.1E:250a-30: de nyams su myong ba med pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:250a-31: de lta ma yin na ni 'di ni gzugs mthong bar byed pa yin no snyam pa'i rnam par rtog pa srid par ga la 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:250a-32: de'i tshe bde ba la sogs pa ni nyams su myong ba kho na yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:250a-33: de la bde ba la sogs pa'o snyam pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i nyams su myong ba med do //
T11TD4221.1E:250a-34: des na blo nyams su myong ba ni rnam par rtog pa med pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:250b-0: rnam par rtog pa med pas nyams su myong ba la yang @250b tha snyad yod pa yin na ni blo bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa la yang tha snyad du 'gyur mod /
T11TD4221.1E:250b-1: ci ste 'di ni gzugs mthong ba yin no snyam pa de yang rnam par rtog pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:250b-2: rtog pa dang bcas pa'i mngon sum nyid yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:250b-3: 'di la brjod pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i mngon sum de /
T11TD4221.1E:250b-4: gzugs mthong ba nyid yin nam ;
T11TD4221.1E:250b-5: gzugs mthong ba las gzhan yin zhes pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:250b-7: de nyid kyis myong yin na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:250b-8: rtog gnyis cig car mthong ba med //
T11TD4221.1E:250b-9: gal te gzugs kyi shes pa de nyid kyis brtag par bya ba bdag nyid rtog pa yin na de'i tshe /
T11TD4221.1E:250b-10: gcig la rim pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:250b-11: cig car rnam par rtog pa gnyis su thal bar 'gyur na mthong ba yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:250b-12: de nyid rim gyis gzugs la sogs pa dang rang gi ngo bo nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:250b-13: gal te blo gcig rim pa bdag gir byed na /
T11TD4221.1E:250b-14: rim pa yang rim pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:250b-15: de yang rim gyis bdag gir byed do zhe na thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:250b-16: gzugs la mngon bar zhen pa'i gnas skabs na rang la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ji ltar gcig nyid yin /
T11TD4221.1E:250b-17: mngon par zhen ba ma yin pa'i blo gzhan ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:250b-18: de tha snyad ni blo nyid tha dad par yin pa'i phyir ji ltar gcig nyid kyi rim pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:250b-19: mngon par zhen pa tha mi dad do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:250b-20: rang gi ngo bo mngon par zhen pa de la yang gzhan gyis mngon par zhen par 'gyur dgos pas thug pa med pa de nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:250b-22: de nyid kyis nyams su myong ba yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:250b-23: cig car rnam par rtog pa gnyis 'byung bar thal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:250b-24: des ni dus mtshungs rnam par shes //
T11TD4221.1E:250b-25: gzhan gyis myong ba bstan pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:250b-26: dus mtshungs pa'i rnam par shes pa nyams su myong ba la yang /
T11TD4221.1E:250b-27: cig car rnam par rtog pa gnyis su thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:250b-28: des na de la yang rnam par rtog pa gzhan gyis 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:250b-29: rnam par rtog pa mthar thug pa med par thal ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:250b-30: ci ste yang mngon sum mam don gyis go ba'i blo phyis 'byung ba'i nyams su myong ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:250b-34: myong ba med la de ji ltar //
T11TD4221.1E:250b-35: rang gi blo dang gzhan gyi blo //
T11TD4221.1E:250b-36: yongs gcod ngo bor gcig par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:250b-37: gal te 'das pa'i rig pa yin na de la mngon sum du mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:250b-38: yod pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:251a-1: nyid snang ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:251a-2: 'o na ni gzugs 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin ma yin par 'gyur la /
T11TD4221.1E:251a-3: blo gzhan yang yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:251a-4: ci ste blo'i rang bzhin ni rtogs pa yin pas /
T11TD4221.1E:251a-5: de la ni gang dang gang nye ba'i don de dang de nyid snang ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:251a-6: shel dang me long la sogs pa bzhin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:251a-8: 'o na ni de'i tshe gzugs 'dzin pa 'das pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:251a-9: rtogs pa'i rang bzhin ni de'i tshe yod kyang gang du nye bar mkho ba yin /
T11TD4221.1E:251a-10: des na nga'i gzugs 'dzin pa 'di yin no zhes bya bar mi 'gyur gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:251a-11: byung bar gyur to zhes bya bar 'gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:251a-12: de ltar ni mngon sum 'jug pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:251a-13: 'on te gzugs 'dzin pa la ni 'das pa yang yod la da ltar ba yang yod do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:251a-14: de lta yin na sngar yang 'das pa nyid yod pa'i phyir 'thad par dka'o //
T11TD4221.1E:251a-16: kun tshe 'das pa'i dngos yin pas //
T11TD4221.1E:251a-17: de ni kun tshe da ltar min //
T11TD4221.1E:251a-18: de ltar yin gzugs 'dzin na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:251a-19: kun tshe yod ces bya min bden //
T11TD4221.1E:251a-20: rtag tu 'das pa nyid yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:251a-21: de las kyang sngar yod pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:251a-22: de las kyang sngar yod pa yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:251a-23: gzugs 'dzin pa dus thams cad du yod par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:251a-24: 'on te sngar da ltar byung ba'i yin la phyis 'das pa nyid yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:251a-25: de lta yin na de shes pa gcig ces bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:251a-26: ci ste gcig nyid yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:251a-27: de lta yin na gnyi gcig car 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:251a-28: rim gyis 'dzin na ni gcig nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:251a-29: gcig kyang yin la rim dang bcas pa yang yin no zhes bya bar ni 'gal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:251a-30: gcig spangs nas gzhan nye bar len pa ni rim pa'i don yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:251a-31: 'di ni sngar bshad zin pas yang mi brjod do //
T11TD4221.1E:251a-32: des na 'das pa 'dzin pa ni med pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:251a-33: dran pa yang 'dzin pa med na med pa yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:251a-34: gzugs 'dzin pa'i rtogs pa ni med pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:251a-35: gal te myong ba 'das pa yin gyi myong ba 'di'o snyam du rtog pa med pa yin pa de lta na /
T11TD4221.1E:251a-37: mi shes pa'i phyir gzhan gyi blo rtogs pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:251a-38: 'das pa dran par khyad med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:251a-39: gzhan blo yongs gcod ces bya ba 'di ji ltar shes par bya ba yin ci blo gzhan yongs su gcod pa yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:251a-40: 'on te gzhan gyi blo yongs su gcod pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:251a-41: gal te re zhig blo gzhan yongs su gcod pa yin pa de'i tshe /
T11TD4221.1E:251b-0: rang rig pa med par smra ba de ni @251b 'dod pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:251b-1: 'on te gzhan gyi blo yongs su gcod pa yin no zhe na de ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:251b-2: gzhan gyi blo yongs su gcod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:251b-3: gzhan gyi blo ni rjes su dpag pas yongs su gcod pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:251b-4: rjes su dpag pa rang gi blo yongs su gcod par byed pa ni ma yin pa de'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:251b-5: ji ltar mtshungs par yongs su gcod par byed pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:251b-7: 'das pa lkog gyur yin par ni /
T11TD4221.1E:251b-8: brtsams nas 'di skad brjod pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:251b-9: mngon sum grub la 'das pa dang //
T11TD4221.1E:251b-10: lkog tu gyur pa srid ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:251b-11: gal te de yongs su rtogs pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:251b-12: de'i tshe 'di gzugs la sogs pa bzhin du lkog tu gyur pa nyid dang 'das pa nyid ma yin mngon sum du byas pa ni da ltar ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:251b-13: de lta ma yin na ni da ltar ba nyid med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:251b-14: des na lkog tu gyur pa thams cad ni rjes su dpag pas rtogs par bya ba yin la de yang dran pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir blo myong ba mtshungs pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:251b-15: ci ste rang gi blo de ni lkog tu gyur ba yin /
T11TD4221.1E:251b-16: yang rjes su dpag pa las gzhan pa'i tshad mas gzhal bar bya ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:251b-17: de lta ma yin na de nyid mtshungs pa yin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:251b-18: 'on te gzhan gyi blo ni gzhan dang 'brel par rtogs pa yin gyi bdag gi blo ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:251b-19: de ni rang dang 'brel ba nyid du rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:251b-20: gzhan ni rnam pa gzhan du rtogs par 'thad pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:251b-22: mngon du byed pa'i rang bzhin du //
T11TD4221.1E:251b-23: 'dzin na de ltar srid pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:251b-24: rjes su dpag pas dran pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:251b-26: de nyid ston par byed pa 'di //
T11TD4221.1E:251b-27: don rig 'das pa dpe dag dang //
T11TD4221.1E:251b-28: bral zhing rtags ni yod min te //
T11TD4221.1E:251b-29: cis grub gang phyir de la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:251b-30: mngon sum ma yin rtags can min //
T11TD4221.1E:251b-31: shes pa 'das pa la dpe ni med de /
T11TD4221.1E:251b-32: mngon sum med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:251b-33: des na rig pa bdag dang gzhan dang 'brel par rtogs so snyam du shes pa ni rtags can ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:251b-34: de bzhin du mngon sum med pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:251b-35: yod na 'das pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhes bshad zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:251b-36: de'i phyir rtags dang 'brel pa bzung ba med par rjes su dpog pa yin pa'i phyir blo tsam zhig yongs su gcod par thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:251b-37: rang rig pa nyid yin na ni de dang gzhan gyis byas pa'i rnam par byed par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:252a-0: ci ste ji ltar 'brel pa med par rjes su dpog pa yin pa de @252a * //
T11TD4221.1E:252a-1: bzhin du rnam par dbye ba yang rjes su dpog pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:252a-3: gang gis blo de mthong 'gyur ba //
T11TD4221.1E:252a-5: dper na tshig pa mthong ba las //
T11TD4221.1E:252a-6: phyogs der me sngon byung ba bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:252a-7: de la me bdag gam gzhan gyis byas pa zhes rnam par dbye ba 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:252a-8: ci ste gang zhig gzhan gyi lus dang 'brel par rjes su dpag par bya ba de ni gzhan gyi blo yin la de lta ma yin no zhes rnam par dbye ba yod pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:252a-9: bdag gi blo mngon sum gyis bzung ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:252a-11: 'di ltar gzugs 'dzin pa gang zhig rang rig par 'gyur ba de ni bdag gi yin la gzhan ni gzhan du yin pa'i phyir rnam par dbye ba 'thad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:252a-12: 'on te dper na mdo sde pa'i gzugs la sogs pa de'i de ma thag tu byung ba de'i ngo bor snang ba'i rnam par shes pas gzung bar bya ba de bzhin du gzugs 'dzin pa 'das pa nyid du yod pa yang yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:252a-15: gal te de yi ngo bor ni //
T11TD4221.1E:252a-16: snang can de ma thag pa'i blos //
T11TD4221.1E:252a-19: gzugs la sogs pa ni snga ma'i ngo bor snang ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:252a-20: da ltar gyi blo la gnas pa'i rnam pa ni da ltar ba kho nar snang ba'i phyir ro ;
T11TD4221.1E:252a-21: / de'i rang bzhin gyi blo gzung ba nyid gzugs 'dzin pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:252a-22: blo'i blo ni de lta ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:252a-23: blo'i blo la blo 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:252a-24: ci ste blo'i blo yang de'i tshe 'dzin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:252a-25: de lta yin na de las gzhan pa'i yang gzung dgos pas thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:252a-26: de ltar gyur na ni thams cad ma bzung ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:252a-27: ci ste de'i tshe blo'i blo ma bzung ba nyid yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:252a-28: de lta yin na de la zhugs pa'i gzung ba yang bzung bar thal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:252a-29: blo'i blos de ma thag tu snang ba can gang yin pa de nyid 'dzin par 'gyur gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:252a-30: de las snga ma dag ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:252a-31: ci ste blo dang po'i de ma thag par yang blo skye ba dang ldan par 'dod na /
T11TD4221.1E:252a-32: de lta yin na gzugs kyi blo la sogs pa bar chod pa med par 'dzin pa med par 'gyur ro zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:252a-33: 'o na ni blo ni rgyun gcig tu skye ba yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:252a-34: de'i de ma thag tu sngar gyi blo thams cad 'dzin par byed pa'i blo gcig skye ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:252a-35: de lta na yang blo thams cad rim pa dang ldan par rtogs par mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:252b-0: @252b blo rim pa ma yin par snang ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:252b-1: 'on te rim pa kho nar snang ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:252b-2: mngon sum gcig nyid kyis rtogs par mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:252b-3: rnam par chad pa 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:252b-4: dran pa nyid ces bya ba la ni sngar nyes pa brjod zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:252b-5: gal te rang gi ngo bo rang gis 'dzin pa ni rtog pa med par 'dzin pa yin du chug kyang ;
T11TD4221.1E:252b-6: gzung bar bya ba tha dad pa rnam par rtog pas 'dzin pa la 'gal ba ci yod ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:252b-7: cung zad kyang med mod kyi 'on kyang /
T11TD4221.1E:252b-8: ji ltar rang gi yul can gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:252b-9: rnam shes nyams myong de rtogs med //
T11TD4221.1E:252b-10: de bzhin brdar bya mi nus pa //
T11TD4221.1E:252b-11: gzhan yang rtog pa med par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:252b-12: re zhig rang gi ngo bos 'dzin pa de ci'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:252b-13: rnam par rtog pa med par 'dzin pa yin par bzung //
T11TD4221.1E:252b-16: sgra'am chos gzhan yang rung ste /
T11TD4221.1E:252b-17: rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis ni rang gi ngo bo nyid sbyor bar byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:252b-18: de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa yang gzhan gyis gzhan dang sbyor bar nus pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:252b-19: rang gi ngo bos snang ba la ni sbyor ba srid pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:252b-20: rang gi ngo bos snang ba ni gzhan du snang ba dang ba lang gi sgra'i rang bzhin yin no snyam du shes pa ni ma yin sbyor bar byed pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:252b-21: rang gi ngo bor snang ba las tha snang ba ma yin pa sbyor ba yin no zhes bya ba yang don dam pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:252b-22: ci ste 'di ni ba lang ngo zhes bya bar shes pa la snang ba nyid sbyor ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:252b-24: 'di ba lang ngo zhes bya ba yang 'di ba lang gi sgra'i rang bzhin yin no snyam du shes pa ni ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:252b-25: 'on kyang 'di ni ba lang gi sgra'i brjod par bya ba yin no snyam pa'i yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:252b-26: de kho na ltar nges pa nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:252b-27: gzhan yang spyod pa gang zhig gi //
T11TD4221.1E:252b-28: spyi brjod dang tshul can sgra dang //
T11TD4221.1E:252b-29: rtog pa'ang de dang don gcig na //
T11TD4221.1E:252b-30: de yi rtog pa med na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:252b-31: khyad par gang gis rtogs par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:252b-32: 'on te rnam par rtog pa de dang don gcig pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:252b-34: khyad par sgra dang mi sbyor ba'i phyir ba lang ngo snyam pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa'i khyad par 'dzin ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:252b-35: sbyor ba'i shes pa yang gzhan yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:252b-36: khyad par 'dzin pa yang gzhan yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:252b-38: cig shos kyi rang gi ngo bo tha dad pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:252b-39: rgyu tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:252b-41: sgra dang spyi yi rnam pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:253a-2: gzugs sogs gsal bar snang ba ni //
T11TD4221.1E:253a-3: mig sogs dag las byung ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:253a-4: sgra'i rnam pa nyid ni brda'i dus su nyams su myong ba'i sgra goms pa'i stobs las skye ba yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:253a-5: mig la sogs pa las ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:253a-6: spyi'i rnam pa gnyis kyang de bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:253a-7: 'di ltar mig la sogs pa nyid kyang sngon nyams su myong ba'i bag chags kyis sems kyi rgyud mngon par 'dus byas pa la 'byung ba yin la mig la sogs pa yod kyang /
T11TD4221.1E:253a-8: de dang rjes su mthun pa'i bag chags dang bral ba'i sems la de med pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:253a-9: mig la sogs pa'i rgyu can nyid ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:253a-10: ci ste mig la sogs pa med par ni /
T11TD4221.1E:253a-11: mig la sogs pa'i rgyu dang rjes su 'brel pa la snang ba'i don dang gzhi mthun pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar 'dod na /
T11TD4221.1E:253a-14: shes pa gzhi mthun can yin phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:253a-15: rjes su dpag pas rtogs pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:253a-16: rang bzhin dang yang mthong ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:253a-17: de dang gzhi mthun pa can tsam gyis ni de 'dzin pa'i shes pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:253a-18: rgyu gcig la rag las pa'i shes pas gzung bar bya ba yin par mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:253a-19: rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa'i shes pa gzhan gyis gzung ba dang yang gzhi mthun pa can nyid srid pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:253a-20: rnam pa gnyis nyams su myong ba'i de las ma gtogs pa'i gzhi mthun pa nyid kyang yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:253a-21: 'o na gzhi mthun dang cig shos khyad par gang yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:253a-22: rang bzhin gnyis nyams su myong ba ni gzhi tha dad pa'i don dag la yang med pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:253a-23: de yang rtogs par sla ste /
T11TD4221.1E:253a-25: don gcig byed pas gcig nyid kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:253a-26: tha snyad rab tu skye ba'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:253a-27: gzhi mthun pa dang ldan pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:253a-28: tha snyad kyang ni 'thad par bla //
T11TD4221.1E:253a-29: tha snyad ni rnam par ci zhig ltar rgyu tsam las skye ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:253a-30: gzhi mthun pa la sogs pa'i tha snyad ni thog ma med pa'i tha snyad brgyud pa las 'ongs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:253a-31: yongs su brtags na ni mi bzod pa nyid de gang gi phyir brtags na ni nyams par 'gyur ba kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:253a-33: me de 'di zhes shes pa der //
T11TD4221.1E:253a-34: gnyis po 'ba' zhig kho na ste //
T11TD4221.1E:253a-35: de yi ngo bor snang ba las //
T11TD4221.1E:253a-36: gzhi mthun pa ni gzhan yod min //
T11TD4221.1E:253a-37: zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:253a-38: gnyis su snang ba gzhan la /
T11TD4221.1E:253a-39: gzhi mthun pa'i tha snyad du ji ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:253b-0: bag chags nges pas tha snyad nges pa'i phyir @253b ro ;
T11TD4221.1E:253b-1: / don bya ba gcig pas byas pa'i bag chags sad pa yang nges pa kho na yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:253b-2: shes pa gnyis snang ba yin na tha dad pa'i tha snyad nyid du ci'i phyir mi 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:253b-3: bag chags nges pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:253b-4: de'i phyir gzhi mthun pa can las ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa gcig pu yin par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:253b-5: ci ste spyi dang khyad par shin tu tha dad pa ma yin pa de'i phyir don gcig pa yin yang rnam par rtog pas khyad par rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:253b-7: gal te bdag nyid thams cad dam //
T11TD4221.1E:253b-8: rnam 'gas tha dad med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:253b-9: spyi las khyad par shes na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:253b-11: gal te rtog pa la spyi snang ba na /
T11TD4221.1E:253b-12: de dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir khyad par yang snang ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:253b-13: sgra'i shes pa la yang snang bar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:253b-14: rigs pa mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:253b-15: rigs pa mtshungs pas ni rigs pa'i yul mi mtshungs pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:253b-16: pa mtshungs pas ni rigs pa'i yul mi mtshungs pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:253b-17: 'on te mig la sogs pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:253b-18: khyad par de mi snang ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:253b-19: 'o na de tha mi dad par ji ltar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:253b-20: de dang lhan cig rjes su zhugs pa ma yin pa ni gcig par shes nus pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:253b-21: phyis rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:253b-22: de nyid de'i tshe med pa yin gyi de rjes su 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:253b-23: de ni de'i rang bzhin nyid kyis de kho na yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:253b-24: gal te de ni der snang na //
T11TD4221.1E:253b-25: ji ltar rjes su 'jug par rtogs //
T11TD4221.1E:253b-26: gal te de ni der snang ba yin na'ang //
T11TD4221.1E:253b-27: ji ltar rjes su 'jug par rtogs //
T11TD4221.1E:253b-28: gal te de sngar rang bzhin gang gis mthong ba'i rang bzhin de nyid kyis snang ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:253b-29: ji ltar rjes su zhugs par rtogs te /
T11TD4221.1E:253b-31: gal te de'i rang bzhin du mi snang ba nyid na yang de nyid gzhan la med pa'i phyir de rjes su zhugs so zhes ji ltar rtogs /
T11TD4221.1E:253b-32: de'i phyir mi snang ba dang ni gcig ma yin la du ma yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:253b-33: de'i phyir sngar tha dad par snang ba'i phyis rjes su chud pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni gyi na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:253b-34: des na rgyu med pas gcig tu snang ba med pa yang /
T11TD4221.1E:253b-37: rtog pa med pa med na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:253b-38: khyad par gang gis rtogs par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:253b-39: gal te rtogs med 'ga' zhig kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:253b-40: yod na de dang mtshungs rgyu can //
T11TD4221.1E:253b-41: thams cad de bzhin 'bras bdag nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:253b-42: tha dad rgyu tha dad las yin //
T11TD4221.1E:254a-1: bzhin spangs nas khyad par khong du chud pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:254a-2: mig la sogs pa'i rgyus bskyed pa ni khyad par rig pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:254a-3: de ltar yin na de'i rgyu la rag las pa thams cad rtogs pa med pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:254a-4: rgyu tha dad pa la ma brten par ni dngos po tha dad pa tshad ma dang ldan par mi 'thad do //
T11TD4221.1E:254a-5: de'i phyir de'i rigs can gyi rgyu dang 'brel pa ni de'i rigs can nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:254a-6: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa dang cig shos ni rgyu mtshungs pa nyid ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:254a-8: phyi rol don la ltos med par //
T11TD4221.1E:254a-9: brda dran pa las sbyor ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:254a-10: de bzhin brda la ltos med par //
T11TD4221.1E:254a-11: dngos nus nyid la mig blor 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:254a-12: dbang po'i rnam par shes pa dang sbyor ba'i rtogs pa ni phan tshun spangs te /
T11TD4221.1E:254a-13: gnas pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis tshogs pa dag gi stobs kyis bskyed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:254a-14: ji ltar rang gi ngo bo'i tshogs pa las byung ba las brten pa can gyi rang bzhin dang 'brel pa can du 'gyur ba yin /
T11TD4221.1E:254a-15: sbyor ba ni phyi rol la mi ltos par brda dran pa'i stobs las byung ba yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:254a-16: dbang po'i shes pa ni brda la mi ltos par phyi rol la ltos pas yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:254a-17: de la ni rtog pa yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:254a-18: rtog pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:254a-19: rgyu med par 'bras bu 'byung ba ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:254a-20: 'on te sgra dang spyi la sogs pa dang 'brel pa'i phyi rol gyi mthus bskyed pas na dbang po'i rnam par shes pa rtog pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:254a-23: gang zhig gang dang mngon 'brel te //
T11TD4221.1E:254a-24: nges par de dang lhan cig tu //
T11TD4221.1E:254a-25: snang ngo zhes ni bya ba 'di //
T11TD4221.1E:254a-26: tshad ma'i yul du gyur pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:254a-27: de lta yin na ni ma la sogs pa mthong ba na /
T11TD4221.1E:254a-28: 'brel pa thams cad snang bar thal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:254a-29: 'on te gang zhig gang la gnas pa spyi la sogs pa de ni de snang ba na kho na'o snyam na /
T11TD4221.1E:254a-31: sgra mi 'dzin par thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:254a-32: snam bu la sogs pa la sgra ni yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:254a-33: de lta ma yin na ni brda ma bzung ba la yang snam bu snyam pa'i shes pa 'byung bar gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:254a-34: yod pa yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:254a-35: brjod par bya ba nyid la the tshom za bar mthong ba'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:254a-36: don de grub kyang rjod par byed pa'i bye brag ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:254a-37: spyi'i rnam pa nyid du ni nges pa kho na'o zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:254a-39: dang po mthong ba la med pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:254a-40: de las tha dad pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:254b-0: @254b ci ste yang 'di ba lang ngo snyam pa la sogs pa'i shes pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i dbang po'i lhan cig byed pa can gyi gzugs la sogs pa nyid kyis brda dran pa la ltos nas skyed par byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:254b-1: ma ltos par ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:254b-2: 'bras bu'i tshogs pa las 'grub pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:254b-3: gang gi tshe sgra dang spyi'am khyad par gzhan yang rung ste /
T11TD4221.1E:254b-4: sngar bzung ba dran pa de'i tshe dran pa dang lhan cig pa'i mig la sogs pas skyed par byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:254b-5: des na brda ma bzung ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:254b-6: sngon mthong ba dang bral ba dag la ni mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:254b-7: de ni legs par ma brtags pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:254b-9: gal te gzugs ni brda dran la //
T11TD4221.1E:254b-10: ltos nas dbang po'i blo dag la //
T11TD4221.1E:254b-11: nus 'gyur ltos med ma yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:254b-12: rtags bzhin dran pa nyid la 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:254b-13: sngon nyams su myong ba med par ni de dang sbyor ba yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:254b-14: so sor nges pa'i dran pa med par yang so sor nges pa'i sgra la sogs pa med med par ni de dang sbyor ba yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:254b-15: so sor nges sa bon sad pa med par ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:254b-16: so sor nges pa'i dran pa'i sa bon sad par byed pa yang mthong ba med pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:254b-17: des na de mthong ba ni de'i rjod par byed pa dran la /
T11TD4221.1E:254b-18: dran na ni sbyor ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:254b-19: de ltar na mthong ba la de dran na rab tu sad par byed pa'i gzugs la sogs pa ni rtags nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:254b-20: des na sbyor ba'i shes pa thams cad na rtags can kho nar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:254b-21: 'on te spyi mthong ba med pa kho na yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:254b-22: ji ltar rtags las rtogs par 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:254b-23: cha shas mtshungs pa nyid ni spyi zhes brjod pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:254b-24: de yang sngar dmigs pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:254b-25: des na dran par bya ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:254b-26: cha shas de 'dra ba dang ldan pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:254b-27: de dang mtshungs pa'i tha snyad kyi yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:254b-28: cha shas rnams kyi mtshungs pa yang de 'dra ba'i cha shas mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba nas ji srid du de lta bur gyur pa'i blo mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:254b-29: blo yang de lta bur gyur pa'i zhen pa las yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du yin la zhen pa yang thog ma med pa'i bag chags las yin pa'i phyir skyon med do //
T11TD4221.1E:254b-30: des na sgra'am spyi la sogs pa dang sbyor ba ni rtags nyid las yin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:254b-31: 'di dran pa'i rjes su dpag pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:254b-32: ci ste dbang po'i byed pas sbyor ba mngon sum nyid du brjod do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:255a-0: de lta yin na rjes su dpag pa mtha' dag dbang po las @255a * //
T11TD4221.1E:255a-1: skyes pa nyid yin pa'i phyir mngon sum du thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:255a-4: dbang po'i byed dang ma bral bar //
T11TD4221.1E:255a-5: phyogs dang me ni sbyor byed pa //
T11TD4221.1E:255a-6: ji ltar mngon sum nyid mi 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:255a-7: 'on te me tsam la ni rjes su dpag pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:255a-8: sbyor ba ni mngon sum kho na'o snyam na /
T11TD4221.1E:255a-9: de yang ma shes pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:255a-10: gang gi phyir 'di skad kyang brjod par nus te /
T11TD4221.1E:255a-11: phyogs tsam la ni mngon sum de //
T11TD4221.1E:255a-12: sbyor ba rjes su dpag pa las //
T11TD4221.1E:255a-13: me la dbang po'i shes pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:255a-14: ma bzung ba ni sbyor ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:255a-15: sbyor ba ni rjes su dpag pa kho na las yin par rigs te /
T11TD4221.1E:255a-16: me la dbang po'i byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:255a-17: mngon sum gyis ma bzung ba ni des sbyor bar mi nus te /
T11TD4221.1E:255a-18: ma rtogs pa de dang ldan par rtogs so zhes bya ba ni 'gal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:255a-19: rjes su dpag pas kyang sbyor bar mi 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:255a-21: phyogs la rjes dpag 'jug ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:255a-22: ma bzung ba ni sbyor ba med //
T11TD4221.1E:255a-23: mngon sum nyid ni rjes dpag gis //
T11TD4221.1E:255a-24: bzung ngo zhes bya bab chol yin //
T11TD4221.1E:255a-25: ji ltar lkog tu gyur pa'i me la mngon sum mi skye ba de bzhin du mngon sum du gyur pa'i phyogs la yang rjes su dpag pa ma yin pa'i phyir rigs pa mtshungs so //
T11TD4221.1E:255a-26: rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid yin na ni mngon sum ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:255a-27: tshad ma'i rnam par gzhag pa nyams par ni mi 'dod do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:255a-28: don dam du ni sbyor ba nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:255a-29: 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:255a-30: rnam pa de lta'i rnam rtog ni //
T11TD4221.1E:255a-31: gnyi ga'i de ma thag tu skye //
T11TD4221.1E:255a-32: 'di na 'di'o zhes sbyor ba'i shes pa ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i rjes la byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:255a-33: de yang thog ma med pa nas de lta bu'i tha snyad las skyes pa'i rjes su dpag pa nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:255a-34: des na rjes su dpag pas sbyor ba tha snyad byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:255a-35: des na mngon sum gyis de ltar ma bzung ba'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:255a-36: rjes su dpag pa yang ji ltar sbyor bar byed pa'i rang bzhin du skye zhes bya ba ni skyon yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:255a-37: de'i phyir mngon sum gyi sbyor ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa zhes bya bar gnas so //
T11TD4221.1E:255a-39: ji ltar dran par bya ba lkog tu gyur pa la yang mngon sum 'jug pa nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:255a-40: des na mngon sum nyid sbyor bar byed pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:255a-43: der ni der 'brel skye ba'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:255a-44: dran las dbang blo 'gyur ba'ang yin //
T11TD4221.1E:255b-0: de las dus gzhan du yang @255b 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:255b-1: la lar rnam g-yeng srid phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:255b-2: gal te dbang po'i blo de dran pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:255b-3: 'brel pas dran par bya ba la skye bar 'dod na de'i tshe dbang po'i blo dran pa nyid las 'gyur te don nye ba la ltos par ni mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:255b-4: 'on te don nye ba la ltos na ni de'i tshe 'di dran pa las 'gyur ba ma yin te mngon du byed pa ni dran pa las gzhan pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:255b-5: yang na dus gzhan du yang 'gyur te 'ga' zhig la rnam par g-yeng ba rnam par rtog pa gzhan gyi mtshan nyid de'i tshe srid pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:255b-6: de'i phyir dbang po'i shes pa de yang dus gzhan du dran par 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:255b-7: gzhan yang gal te don de dang dbang po ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i shes pa'i rgyu yin na thams cad kyi tshe de kho na ltar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:255b-8: des na mngon sum rnam par rtog pa med pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:255b-9: gal te rim gyis gnyis rgyu yin //
T11TD4221.1E:255b-10: tha dad med phyir sngar nyid 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:255b-11: gal te 'di gnyis ka'i rgyu yin na sngar nyid gnyis ka skyed pa dang 'brel par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:255b-12: ci ste dran pa dang lhan cig pa'i dbang pos rnam par rtog pa dang bcas par bskyed kyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:255b-14: dran pa mig dang lhan cig pa nyid du dmigs pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:255b-15: lhan cig pa zhes bya ba tsam gyis ni thams cad thams cad kyi lhan cig pa ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:255b-16: 'on kyang gang zhig de ltar mthong ba de nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:255b-17: dran pas ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs par byed pa ma yin no ;
T11TD4221.1E:255b-18: /'on te nges pa'i rang bzhin nyid du byed pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:255b-19: de yang snying po yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:255b-21: gal te rang bzhin de nges na //
T11TD4221.1E:255b-22: tha dad med phyir sngar nyid 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:255b-23: de dngos min na dbang skyes las //
T11TD4221.1E:255b-24: de ni shes rab nyid du 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:255b-25: gal te sngar snang ba'i rang bzhin nyid lhag chad med par nges pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:255b-26: sngar gyi rang bzhin dang mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:255b-27: nges pa la ma nges pa las bla lhag med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:255b-28: 'on te de la rang bzhin lhag pa snang ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:255b-29: 'o na ni rang bzhin gzhan dang 'brel pa de shes pa gzhan nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:255b-30: rang bzhin de la yod pa'i khyad par la sogs pa la ni dbang po'i byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:255b-31: 'on te 'di'o zhes bya bar snang ba ni de nyid la 'jug pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:255b-32: de'i phyir mngon du byed pas 'jug pa'i phyir 'di ni mngon sum nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:255b-35: 'di'o zhes bya ba'i rnam rtog ni //
T11TD4221.1E:255b-36: rnam rtog med pa nyid 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:255b-37: don bya sogs dang 'brel pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:256a-2: gzugs la sogs pa nye ba tsam mngon du byed pas don byed pa la sogs pa dang 'brel par snga ma dang phyi mar 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i phyir rtog pa med pa gzhan las khyad par yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:256a-3: rnam par rtog par mi byed pa nyid ni rtog pa dang bcas pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:256a-4: de'i phyir 'di'o zhes bya ba gsal ba'i rnam pa can ni dran par bya ba'i khyad par la sogs pa gsal ba'i rnam pa can ma yin pa las gzhan kho na yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:256a-6: dbang po'i blo rgyu gzhan yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:256a-7: de la'ang dran pa yod med 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:256a-8: 'on te rnam pa gsal ba can dbang po'i shes pa'i yul ni dran par bya ba'i rnam pa las gzhan yin pa nyid do snyam na /
T11TD4221.1E:256a-9: gal te de lta na de la yang dran pa don med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:256a-10: der 'dzin pa la ni dran pa mkho ba yod pa ma yin te dran pa med kyang de ni de ltar rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:256a-11: brda dran ji ltar brdar btags pa //
T11TD4221.1E:256a-12: grub ba'i don du 'dod ba dang //
T11TD4221.1E:256a-14: de la dran pa don ci yod //
T11TD4221.1E:256a-15: gal te dran pa dang lhan cig pa'i mig la sogs pas de'i rang bzhin du snang ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:256a-16: de med na de'i rang bzhin du shes pa med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:256a-17: 'di zhes bya bar snang ba mi 'gyur ba kho na'o zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:256a-19: 'di zhes bya bar snang ba med kyang de'i rang bzhin snang ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:256a-20: yod kyang des ni khyad par gzhan yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir de la dgos pa ci yod /
T11TD4221.1E:256a-21: 'jug pa la dgos so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:256a-22: de med kyang 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bstan par bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:256a-23: de ni yid kyi mngon sum yin no zhes kyang ston par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:256a-24: 'on te dran pa med par dang po pa goms pa dag mi ldan pa mi 'jug pa'i phyir de'i don du dran pa 'dod pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:256a-26: gal te khyad par brdar btags pa med pa 'brel par ma byas pa 'dzin na /
T11TD4221.1E:256a-27: de dran pas gzhan ci zhig byed par 'gyur te gang gi phyir dran pa ni 'brel par byas pa grub pa'i don du 'dod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:256a-28: gal te de ltar ma grub na ni de rtogs pa la dran pa mkho ba med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:256a-30: tshad ma gzhan rjes su dpag pa las 'gyur ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:256a-31: de'i phyir rnam par rtog pa ni rang gi ngo bo nyid 'dzin pa la byed pa yod pa ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:256a-32: 'jug par byed pa yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:256a-33: 'di ni dgos pa med pa yin yang goms pa las 'jug pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:256b-0: dngos po rnams dgos pa yod pa nyid kyi @256b phyir 'byung ba ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:256b-1: dngos po ni rgyu tsam la rag las pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:256b-2: 'on te snga ma las gzhan pa'i rang bzhin 'dzin pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:256b-3: de lta na ni 'di yid kyi mngon sum gyi rang bzhin gyi shes pa gzhan nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:256b-4: de ltar yang ston par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:256b-5: 'on te spyi nyid de ltar 'dzin pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:256b-6: sngar ma mthong ba'i khyad par ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:256b-7: de lta na ni 'o na spyi tsam 'dzin pa yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:256b-8: khyad par la ltos mi rung ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:256b-9: gal te mig la sogs pa dag gis spyi 'dzin pa nyid yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:256b-10: de'i tshe khyad par 'dzin pa gzhan med pa'i phyir spyi 'dzin pa na khyad par 'dzin pa la ltos par mi 'gyur na 'gyur ba yang yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:256b-11: 'di ltar ba lang ngo zhes spyi bzung ba na /
T11TD4221.1E:256b-12: ba lang ji lta bu zhig ces rtogs pa ni 'jig rten na mthong ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:256b-13: de'i phyir mig dang gzugs dag la //
T11TD4221.1E:256b-14: brten nas mig blo skye bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:256b-15: de la dran pa mkho ba med pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:256b-16: mig gi blo ni mig dang gzugs tsam kho na las skye ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:256b-18: mig ni mdun na gnas pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:256b-19: gzugs tsam la ni 'jug par rtogs //
T11TD4221.1E:256b-20: gzhan du rtogs par 'gyur ba yi //
T11TD4221.1E:256b-21: byed pa gzhan du ji ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:256b-22: gzhan du rtogs pa ni gzhan du rtogs par mi nus so //
T11TD4221.1E:256b-23: mdun na gnas pa'i gzugs tsam la 'jug par mthong ba'i mig ni /
T11TD4221.1E:256b-24: sgra dang spyi la sogs pa 'jug pa yin no zhes brjod par mi nus te /
T11TD4221.1E:256b-25: tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:256b-26: de ltar rtogs pa yin na ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:256b-29: dran pa las ni sngar yang rung //
T11TD4221.1E:256b-30: mngon sum rnam rtog ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:256b-31: yul tha dad pa nyid phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:256b-32: dran pa las dus phyis 'di ni dri zhim pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:256b-33: 'di ni dri mi zhim pa'o snyam pa la sogs pa'i shes pa ni mngon sum ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:256b-34: mig gi shes pa'i byed pa ni gzugs tsam ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:256b-35: de'i phyir mig la sogs pa la brten nas don rnams la skye ba can gang yin pa de kho na mngon sum yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:256b-36: des na sgra dang spyi la sogs pa'i rnam pa can ni mngon sum nyid ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:256b-37: gang zhig gsal bar snang ba'i rgyu mtshan gzhan la brten pa de yang gzung bar bya ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:256b-38: des na yid la sogs pa de yang mngon sum yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:256b-39: yang na don gyi rang bzhin la 'jug cing khyab par byed pas na de yang dbang po nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:257a-1: ga la rag las nas skyes pa la dbang po la brten par brjod kyi yul la brten par ma yin gzugs la sogs pa'i yul gyi sgo nas tha snyad du bya ba'i rigs kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:257a-2: dbang po'i sgo nas ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:257a-3: dbang po las skyes pa tsam nyid kyis ni mngon sum du 'gyur ba ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:257a-4: yul gyi rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pas 'jug pa ni thams cad mngon sum kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:257a-5: dbang po la brten pa ni 'ga' zhig mngon sum yin la gzhan ni gzhan du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:257a-6: 'khrul pa med pa'i rgyu mtshan des ni de la tha snyad byed par 'thad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:257a-7: yul gyis bskyed pa yin yang zla ba gnyis la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can 'khrul pa nyid ma yin nam ;
T11TD4221.1E:257a-8: des na yul las skyes pa yang thams cad la ma 'khrul pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:257a-9: de ni yul nyid ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:257a-10: de ni rnam par gtod par nus pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:257a-12: de ni dbang po nyid ma yin te des na yul las nyams pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:257a-13: dbang po ni nyams pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:257a-14: dbang po ni nyams pa yin la de ni dbang po ltar snang ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:257a-16: gal te dngos su shes skyed la //
T11TD4221.1E:257a-17: dbang po bzhin du yul nus yin //
T11TD4221.1E:257a-18: 'o na ci phyir gnyis rag las //
T11TD4221.1E:257a-19: skye ba de ni des mi brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:257a-20: yul dang dbang po dag rgyu nyid du mtshungs pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:257a-21: ci'i phyir yul gyi sgo nas tha snyad du mi byed /
T11TD4221.1E:257a-22: rtog pa sngon du gtong ba dag ni ci rung bar tha snyad byed pa'am spong ba ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:257a-24: go bar byed pa nyid mthong nas //
T11TD4221.1E:257a-25: tha snyad nges par sbyar ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:257a-26: dbang po'i tha snyad la de yod //
T11TD4221.1E:257a-27: sbyar bar bya ba'ang de chos yin //
T11TD4221.1E:257a-29: go bar byed pa ma yin pa nyid kyis len pa dang 'dor ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:257a-30: go bar byed pa nyid kyang dbang po'i tha snyad la yod de /
T11TD4221.1E:257a-31: gang dbang po la brten pa de ni mngon sum yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:257a-32: nyams pas 'khrul pa yang sngar spang zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:257a-33: 'o na ni yul dang yang 'khrul pa med de /
T11TD4221.1E:257a-34: de ni yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:257a-36: gal te de ni yul yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:257a-37: gzhan gyi mngon sum ji ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:257a-38: dbang po nyid ni gcig nyid la //
T11TD4221.1E:257a-39: yod dang med pa'i khyad par min //
T11TD4221.1E:257a-40: de nyid kyi phyir thun mong ma yin pa'i sgo nas tha snyad du byed pa ni mthong ste /
T11TD4221.1E:257a-41: rnga bo che'i sgra dang nas kyi myu gu zhes bya ba lta bu'o zhes bshad do //
T11TD4221.1E:257a-42: nas kyi myu gu zhes brjod na /
T11TD4221.1E:257a-43: nas ma yin pa'i myu gu rtogs par mi 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:257a-44: sa'i myu gu zhes bya ba ni de yang 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:257b-1: 'on te yul la brten pa'i zhes bya ba ni yul gyi rang bzhin 'dzin pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:257b-2: de lta yin na rang rig pa kho na mngon sum du 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:257b-3: gzhan du go bar byed pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:257b-4: ci ste 'jig rten na rab tu grags pa'i yul gyi rang bzhin rtogs pa brjod pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:257b-5: de lta na dbang po la brten pa zhes 'jig rten na grags pas 'di nyid du 'gyur mod /
T11TD4221.1E:257b-6: tha snyad gzhan yongs su brtags pas ci zhig bye brag tu smra ba la sogs pa'i gzhung ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang mngon sum du 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:257b-8: de'i dbang po'i tha snyad nyid 'thad do //
T11TD4221.1E:257b-9: de skad du yang yul ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang rgyud gzhan dag gi rnam par shes pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir thun mong yin no zhes bshad do //
T11TD4221.1E:257b-10: de'i phyir dbang po'i tha snyad kyis mngon sum gyi rang bzhin rtog pa dang bral ba mtshon par nus kyi yul gyi tha snyad kyis ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:257b-11: yul gyis kyang mtshon par nus pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:257b-12: 'di ltar don gyi mthu las ni //
T11TD4221.1E:257b-13: yang dag skye ba yin phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:257b-14: de ni don gyi mthu las skye ba na de'i rang bzhin kho na'i rjes su byed do zhes bshad pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:257b-16: ma nges pa'i phyir te zla ba gnyis kyi rnam pa can nyid kyis 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:257b-17: 'on te don gyi mthu las 'khrul pa mi skyed do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:257b-18: de lta yin na de rigs pa 'dis rtog pa med pa nyid du ma grub par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:257b-19: de'i phyir 'dir ni dbang po'i nyid la don du tha snyad byas pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:257b-20: don du mngon par zhen pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:257b-21: de lta bu nyid kyi dbang po ni go bar byed pa shin tu yin pa'i phyir de nyid kyis tha snyad du byas pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:257b-22: de'i phyir tha snyad 'di la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:257b-23: sbyar bya rang bzhin rtag yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:257b-24: khyab par byed pa'i rang bzhin ni //
T11TD4221.1E:257b-25: log pa'i phyir na ldog par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:257b-26: rtog pa'i sngon du gtong ba'i sbyar ba nyid go bar byed pa yin no zhes brjod de /
T11TD4221.1E:257b-27: de'i phyir de nyid go bar byed pa'i rtags yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:257b-28: gal te rtog pa sngon du gtong bas byas par cis shes she na /
T11TD4221.1E:257b-30: skyes bu tshad ma yin pas tshig tshad mar rtogs pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:257b-31: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du de skad brjod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:257b-32: don dam par ni gang gis khyab par byed pa'i rang bzhin log pas ldog par brjod pa rtags nyid la khyab ba brjod pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:258a-0: gal te yul la brten pa zhes bya ba'i tha snyad ni 'jig rten na grags pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i go bar @258a * //
T11TD4221.1E:258a-2: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i mngon sum gyi yul ni snga ma dang phyi mar gyur pa gcig nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:258a-3: 'di ni 'jig rten na mngon sum zhes rab tu grags pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:258a-5: gang zhig bdag gis mthong ba de //
T11TD4221.1E:258a-6: mngon sum gyis ni rtogs 'di nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:258a-7: sgra don thams cad 'jig rten gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:258a-8: grags pas rtogs par byas pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:258a-9: gnod pa med pa'i rtogs pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:258a-10: tshad ma'i tha snyad brten pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:258a-11: tshad ma yis ni grub 'gyur pa //
T11TD4221.1E:258a-12: gzhan du bya bar ji ltar nus //
T11TD4221.1E:258a-14: 'dir ni mngon du byed pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:258a-15: mngon sum don rtogs can yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:258a-16: mngon du byed pa las gzhan la //
T11TD4221.1E:258a-17: rjes dpag ma gtogs tshad gzhan med //
T11TD4221.1E:258a-18: mngon sum du byed pa'i rnam pa can ma yin pa la ni rjes su dpag pa nyid gcig pu zhig tshad ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:258a-19: des na gal te ngo shes pa'i tshad ma mngon du byed pa'i rnam pas mi 'jug na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:258a-20: de'i phyir rjes su dpag pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:258a-21: mngon du byed na mdun na gnas pa'i dngos po tsam la 'jug pa'i phyir ngo shes pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:258a-22: des na mngon du byed pa ni dbang po'i tha snyad kho nas rtogs par 'gyur gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:258a-23: gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:258a-24: yul gyi tha snyad kyis ni yul dang bcas pa zhes bya bar 'gyur gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:258a-25: mngon du byed pa nyid du ni brjod par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:258a-26: de ltar tha snyad bya ba la ni 'jig rten na mngon sum du ma grags so //
T11TD4221.1E:258a-27: mngon sum ni tshad ma nyid kyang yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:258a-28: mngon du byed pa las ma gtogs par mngon sum nyid kyang rigs pa med pa'i phyir na mngon sum rtog pa med par 'grub bo //
T11TD4221.1E:258a-30: der don mang pos bskyed pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:258a-31: rang gi don la spyi yul can //
T11TD4221.1E:258a-33: spyi'i yul can ni rnam par rtog pa med pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:258a-34: spyir rnam par rtog pa nyid kyis de dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:258a-36: bsags pa dag ni tshogs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:258a-37: de spyi de la dbang po'i blo //
T11TD4221.1E:258a-38: spyi blo gdon mi za bar yang //
T11TD4221.1E:258a-39: rnam par rtog dang rjes su 'brel//
T11TD4221.1E:258a-40: mang po rang bzhin phan tshun spangs te gnas pa rnams de kho na ltar gzung na spyi'i blor 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:258a-41: tshogs pa don dam pa pa'am btags pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:258a-42: de la re zhig dom dam pa pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:258a-43: de las tha dad par rtogs pa snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:258b-0: snang na yang gzhan du snang ba de dag las gzhan du @258b de tshogs pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:258b-1: de lta yin pa nyid na yang /
T11TD4221.1E:258b-2: de dag nyid phan tshun ltos nas tshogs pa'i tha snyad brten par 'gyur gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:258b-4: 'on te de dag gi rang bzhin mi snang bar gyur nas /
T11TD4221.1E:258b-5: gzhan gyi rang bzhin snang ngo zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:258b-6: de yang dngos po la de lta bu med pa'i lhag par sgro btags pa tsam yin pas ji ltar rtogs pa med pa'i yul yin /
T11TD4221.1E:258b-7: btags pa'i yul can nyid ni rtog pa dang bcas pa bzlog par dka'o zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:258b-9: don gzhan dang ni mngon 'brel phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:258b-10: rdul phran gzhan gang skye 'gyur ba //
T11TD4221.1E:258b-11: de dag bas gas bshad de dag ni //
T11TD4221.1E:258b-12: shes pa skye ba'i rgyu mtshan yin //
T11TD4221.1E:258b-13: rdul phran gzhan dag med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:258b-14: rdul phran khyad par de yang med //
T11TD4221.1E:258b-15: shes te gcig las nges min phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:258b-16: spyi yi spyod yul can du bshad //
T11TD4221.1E:258b-17: gzhan las shes pa'i rgyu'i nus pa ma skyes pa'i rdul phra rab de dag ni phra ba ma yin pa mthong ba rnams kyi shes pa skyed par nus pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:258b-18: des na thams cad kyi shes pa bskyed par bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:258b-19: shes pa de ni gcig la nges pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:258b-20: spyi'i yul can du bshad do //
T11TD4221.1E:258b-21: phan tshun tha dad pa nyid du ci'i phyir mi snang zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:258b-22: skra la sogs pa ma 'dres pa rnams kyang thag ring po nas ma 'dres pa nyid du snang ba'i spyod yul du 'gyur ram /
T11TD4221.1E:258b-23: des na gal te rang gi rgyud las rang gi rnam par gtod pa'i nus pa med pa nyid du nges pa'i phyir mi snang ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:258b-25: 'o na mngon sum la dngos po'i de kho na mi snang ba'i phyir 'khrul pa nyid du 'gyur ro /
T11TD4221.1E:258b-26: lhag par sgro btags pa'i rang bzhin snang ba ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:258b-27: spyi'i rnam par rtog pa gzhan bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:258b-28: 'on te der blo'i rang bzhin nyid rags pa /
T11TD4221.1E:258b-29: ling ling po gcig gi rnam par mngon du byas par snang ba des na rtog pa med pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:258b-30: da ni rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid chad par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:258b-31: rtog pa'i shes pa thams cad la blo'i rang bzhin nyid snang ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:258b-33: da lta'i skye bo la ltos nas //
T11TD4221.1E:258b-34: gnod byed shes pa med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:258b-35: ma 'khrul par bshad don dam du //
T11TD4221.1E:258b-36: dmigs pa thams cad 'khrul pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:258b-37: da ltar gyi skye bo rtogs pa'i snang ba ma shes pa rnams la 'di ma 'khrul pa nyid du snang bas /
T11TD4221.1E:258b-38: de la ltos nas ma 'khrul pa yin no zhes de skad bshad par gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:259a-1: pa thams cad la 'khrul pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:259a-2: gang gi phyir mngon du byed pa'i rang bzhin gyis /
T11TD4221.1E:259a-3: 'dzin pa la ni mngon phyogs pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:259a-4: mngon sum la ni de skad du //
T11TD4221.1E:259a-5: rnam rtog bcas pa de mi brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:259a-6: mngon du byed pa ni rtog pa dang bcas pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:259a-7: rtogs pas ni snga ma dang phyi mar mthong ba'i don lhag par zhen pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:259a-8: mngon sum du byed pa nyid ni lhag par zhen pa zhes brjod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:259a-9: de nyid ni de las bzlog pa la grags pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:259a-10: 'o na de lta na ni spyi'i spyod yul med par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:259a-11: de ni 'jig rten gyi grags pas rang gi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:259a-12: 'di dag ni skye mched kyi rang gi mtshan nyid la ltos nas rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:259a-13: rdzas kyi rang gi mtshan nyid ni ma yin no zhes bshad do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:259a-15: rnam dbye 'di ni don dam la //
T11TD4221.1E:259a-16: dgongs nas sngon gyi slob dpon gyis //
T11TD4221.1E:259a-17: btags yin de yi phyir na spyi //
T11TD4221.1E:259a-18: spyod yul yin bar 'gal ba med //
T11TD4221.1E:259a-19: de ltar gzung ba'i rdul phra rab nyid spyi yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:259a-20: gang yang thams cad rtog pa med pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa de la yang brjod par bya ste /
T11TD4221.1E:259a-21: tshad mas rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:259a-23: gzhan la grags pa la brten nas //
T11TD4221.1E:259a-24: bstan bcos mdzad pas rnam dbye gsungs //
T11TD4221.1E:259a-25: spyod pa la sogs pa gzhan la rab tu grags pa la brten nas rjes su dran pa'i rnam par rtog pa nyid du bstan gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:259a-26: mngon du byed pa la ni de med pa'i phyir na rnam par rtog pa can dang /
T11TD4221.1E:259a-27: cig shos kyi rnam par dbye ba ni bstan bcos mdzad pa dag gis mdzad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:259a-28: gal te skye mched gcig yin yang //
T11TD4221.1E:259a-29: cig car du mar 'dzin pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:259a-30: de yi phyir na sngar bzung don //
T11TD4221.1E:259a-31: sgro 'dogs phyir na rtog bcas yin //
T11TD4221.1E:259a-32: rdul phra rab du ma cig car 'dzin na ni sngar bzung ba sgro 'dogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:259a-33: rjes su dran pa'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:259a-34: rim gyis 'dzin pa la ni bzlog par dka'o //
T11TD4221.1E:259a-35: shes pa gcig gis ni dus gcig tu du ma 'dzin par nus pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:259a-36: gcig la yid 'brel par gyur pa na gzhan la de nyid kyi tshe byed par mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:259a-37: yang na ni dus gcig tu bzung ba'i phyir yan lag can gyi rdzas gcig khas blang bar bya'o zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:259a-38: du ma gcig gis mi 'dzin pa'am /
T11TD4221.1E:259b-0: de gcig pa @259b yang gang las yin //
T11TD4221.1E:259b-1: til sogs tha dad la ji ltar //
T11TD4221.1E:259b-2: cig car 'dzin par snang ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:259b-3: gal te rdul phra rab dag cig car 'dzin pa ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:259b-4: de lta na ni snga ma sgro 'dogs pa'i phyir kho bo cag rnam par rtog pa dang bcas par 'dod pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:259b-5: 'on te mthong ba yin na de lta na ni mngon du byed pa yin pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid grub po //
T11TD4221.1E:259b-6: gzhan yang rung ba'i yul na gnas pa du ma gcig gis dus gcig tu mi 'dzin pa 'di cis grub /
T11TD4221.1E:259b-7: yid gcig yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:259b-8: yid ni rnam par shes pa'i cig car skyed pa 'gal bar ma grub pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:259b-9: yid nyid ni yid la byed pa tsam yin par grags pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:259b-10: gzhan yang phan tshun ma 'dres pa'i til dang /
T11TD4221.1E:259b-15: rna rgyan la sogs pa dag la cig car 'dzin pa'i shes pa nyid ni rtogs pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:259b-16: myur ba'i phyir 'dzin pa cig car bar mngon pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:259b-18: 'di ltar 'di la mgyogs pa bshad zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:259b-19: rim bzhin 'byung ba de nyid la //
T11TD4221.1E:259b-21: blo rnams dag ni thams cad kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:259b-22: dus mtshungs ji ltar de dag la //
T11TD4221.1E:259b-23: 'ga' zhig rim bzhin snang ba dang //
T11TD4221.1E:259b-24: gzhan ni rim ldan snang bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:259b-25: de'i phyir don kun 'dzin pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:259b-27: mgyogs pa'i phyir ni cig car 'dzin par mi 'thad de /
T11TD4221.1E:259b-28: bshad zin pa'i phyir na mgyogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
