T11TD4221.1E:259b-29: mgyogs pa'i phyir cig car ma bzung yang cig car gzung bar mngon par rlom pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las yin /
T11TD4221.1E:259b-30: autpala'i 'dab ma brgya phigs pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:259b-32: dpe tsam gyis don mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:259b-33: gcig la grub bas gzhan du yang de ltar 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:259b-34: blo 'og gi rim pa dang bcas pa'i 'dab ma brgya po dag phigs pa ni dus gcig tu phigs par mi srid pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:259b-35: rjes su dpag pas rim pa grub pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:259b-36: de ltar rtog na ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba bzlog par nus pa yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:259b-37: de'i phyir gnod par byed pa med pas 'khrul par mi 'grub bo //
T11TD4221.1E:259b-38: gal te mgyogs pa'i phyir cig car 'dzin par rlom pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:259b-39: rim gyis 'bab pa de dag nyid la de ltar ci ste mi 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:259b-40: mgyogs pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes na /
T11TD4221.1E:260a-0: 'di la yang de yod do zhes bya ba 'di ga las cig car 'dzin par rlom pa'i phyir ro @260a * //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-2: de nyid kyang ga las yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:260a-3: phan tshun brten par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-4: ji srid du cig car 'dzin pa 'khrul par ma grub pa de srid du ni mgyogs par mi 'grub la /
T11TD4221.1E:260a-5: ji srid du de ma grub pa de srid du yang 'khrul pa nyid du mi 'grub po //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-7: skad cig nyid kyis blo rnams ni //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-8: thams cad dus mtshungs pa nyid yin //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-9: des na blo rnams thams cad ni //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-10: rim ma yin par snang bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-11: gzhal bya snang ba ni blo yongs su 'gyur ba'i dus yin pa des na gzhal bya thams cad kyang rim ma yin par snang bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-12: de'i phyir cig car snang ba myur bas byas pa ni ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:260a-13: 'on kyang de kho na ltar yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-14: de la rgyu ma tshang bas cig car snang ba med pa der ni zlog pa yin no zhes rnam par gnas so //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-15: rim gyis 'dzin na rtog med kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-16: snang ba nyid ni med par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-17: rtog med nyid ni med 'gyur na //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-18: gsal bar snang ba srid mi 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-19: sngon gyi mthong ba sgro btags pa //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-20: gsal bar snang bar ji ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-21: shin tu goms par 'gyur ba las //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-22: de ni rtog pa med pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-24: shes pa rtogs med de bzhin nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-26: sngon gyi rang bzhin 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-27: ci car snang ba kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-28: phyi ma leb khra la sogs gzugs //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-29: du ma'ang ji ltar snang bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-30: gal te sna tshogs de gcig na //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-31: de bas ches 'di ngo mtshar che //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-32: gal te yid gcig la 'jug pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:260a-33: cig car du ma mi 'dzin na //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-34: de'i phyir phyi ma leb khra bo'i gzugs mi 'dzin pa'i phyir yan lag can gcig kho na'o zhes khas blang ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-35: de khas blang na ni phyi ma leb khra bo la sogs pa'i bkra ba'i mtshar ba de bas kyang ches mtshar ro //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-37: sna tshogs gcig pa'i rang bzhin min //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-38: dper na nor bu'i gzugs de bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-39: sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni dngos po'i bdag nyid phan tshun ma 'dres pa la tha snyad du byed pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:260a-40: de lta ma yin na sna tshogs pa'i don ci zhig yod /
T11TD4221.1E:260a-41: des na gzugs sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i tshogs bzhin du phye ma leb khra bo gcig gi bdag nyid du ga la 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:260a-42: ci ste rnam par dbye ba dang ldan pa'i phyir nor bu rnams ni tha dad pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:260a-43: phyi ma leb la ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:260a-45: de la yang rnam par dbye ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:260a-46: phan tshun tha dad par snang ba nyid rnam par dbye ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:260b-0: ci ste rnam @260b par dbye ba yod kyang gcig yin na de lta na ni rin po che'i phung po yang 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:260b-1: de la ni ma 'byar ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par dbye ba gzhan yod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:260b-2: des na sna tshogs kyang ma 'byar ba med pa ni gcig nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:260b-4: ma 'byar ba ni thams cad la yod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:260b-5: 'di ltar bcad dang phug sogs kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:260b-6: 'dres med pa ni kun la yod //
T11TD4221.1E:260b-7: de yi tshe na rdzas zhig ces //
T11TD4221.1E:260b-8: bya ba 'di yang kun la srid //
T11TD4221.1E:260b-9: gal te nor bu'i tshogs la ma 'dres pa zhe bya ba'i rnam par dbye ba srid pas der yan lag can gcig yod pa ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:260b-10: phyi ma leb khra bo la sogs pa ci ste lta na ma yin /
T11TD4221.1E:260b-11: de la ni bcad pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas 'bar bas phyi na rnam par dbye ba skyes pas yan lag can zhig pa de'i phyir ma 'dres par 'gyur bas nyes pa med do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:260b-12: nor bu'i tshogs la yang de ltar brtag pa'i phyir mtshungs par thal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:260b-13: gal te sngon po la sogs pa phan tshun spang par dmigs kyang de'i reg pa rang bzhin gcig pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:260b-14: phan tshun yongs su chad pa ma yin pa'i phyir yan lag rnams la yan lag can nyid yod do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:260b-17: sngo sogs rnam par dbye ba ni //
T11TD4221.1E:260b-18: ras bkra la sogs dag la'ang mtshungs //
T11TD4221.1E:260b-19: sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba'i rigs mi 'dra ba rnam par dbye ba med pa'i reg pa la sogs pa dang lhan cig tu rgyu ba ni skud pa 'dus pa'i rang bzhin gyi snam bu khra bo dang /
T11TD4221.1E:260b-20: bcos ma'i phyi ma leb khra bo la sogs pa la yang mtshungs pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:260b-21: de'i phyir gcig la ni yan lag can yin la gzhan la ma yin no zhes bya ba'i rnam par dbye ba 'di ga las yin //
T11TD4221.1E:260b-22: gal te de la yan lag gzugs //
T11TD4221.1E:260b-23: 'ba' zhig de ltar mthong zhe na ;
T11TD4221.1E:260b-24: / gal te sngo sogs spangs pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:260b-25: khra bo gzhan mthong ngo mtshar che //
T11TD4221.1E:260b-26: gal te rnam bu khra bo la sogs pa bcos bu dag la yan lag ni gzugs nyid gcig tu mngon sum par zhen par de ltar dmigs pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:260b-27: de'i tshe sngon po la sogs pa rnam par dbye ba'i rang bzhin du gnas pa las ma gtogs pa'i khra bo gzhan ni bcos ma ma yin pa dag la yang med pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:260b-28: de la ni gcig tu mngon par zhen pa nyid skabs su gyur pa nyid yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:260b-29: de ni yan lag can med kyang bcos ma dag la yod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:260b-30: des na re ba de yang med pa nyid pas khra bo yan lag can gyi gzugs nyid du ni rigs pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:261a-1: su dpag pas ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:261a-2: gcig drangs na gzhan 'ong ba ni khab long dang /
T11TD4221.1E:261a-3: lcags la sogs pa dag la yang mthong ba nyid yin pas /
T11TD4221.1E:261a-4: du ma cig car dmigs so zhes ni der yang grub pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:261a-5: 'on te bcos ma la ni sngon po la sogs pa'i dmigs pa rim gyis 'gyur ba yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:261a-6: de las gzhan la ni cig car ro zhes bya ba'i bye brag yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:261a-8: dus dang don gyi rnam pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:261a-9: mtshungs par rtogs pa'i blo dag las //
T11TD4221.1E:261a-10: gcig ni rim ldan don mang dang //
T11TD4221.1E:261a-11: gcig ni rim min don gcig ces //
T11TD4221.1E:261a-12: dus dang don gyi rnam pa mtshungs pa yin yang /
T11TD4221.1E:261a-13: bcos ma dang bcos ma ma yin par mngon par 'dod pa'i khra bo dag gi blo las blo gcig ni rim pa dang bcas pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:261a-14: don du ma snang ba can yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:261a-15: gzhan ni rim pa can mi ldan pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:261a-16: yan lag can gcig nyid rang gi spyod yul du kun du spyod par byed pa zhes bya ba 'di la go rgyu ci zhig yod /
T11TD4221.1E:261a-17: thams cad mtshungs pa nyid du rtogs pa ni mi mthun par khas blang ba'i yul ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:261a-18: gal te bcos ma dang bcos ma ma yin par mngon par 'dod pa dag de ltar khas len na ni de'i tshad ma med pa'i khas blangs pa tsam de la skyob pa yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:261a-19: gal te de rgyu tshad ma 'ga' zhig gi dbang gis gcig dang du ma'i rnam par dbye ba 'di nyid yin na de'i tshe 'di la skyon ci yod ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:261a-22: blo rnams sna tshogs ngo bo'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:261a-23: don rnams sna tshogs ngo bo nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:261a-24: gal te de rgyu min zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:261a-26: gcig dang du ma'i ngo bor snang ba can gyi blo nyid de'i ngo bo rnam par 'jog pa la tshad ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:261a-27: tshad ma gzhan gyi rtsom pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:261a-28: gal te rtsom pa gegs med par de ltar rnam par 'jog pa'i blo de dag kyang chos mthun pa tsam gyi rgyu mtshan gyis nye bar btags pa'i tshad ma blo gzhan gyis sel bar byed na chos mthun pa 'di gang du rnyed par mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:261a-29: des na dngos po rnam par gzhag pa med pa'i phyir thams cad 'chol bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:261a-30: de'i phyir snang ba gzhan las ni //
T11TD4221.1E:261a-31: 'brel par grub pa'i blo dag la //
T11TD4221.1E:261a-32: snang ba don med ces bya bar //
T11TD4221.1E:261a-33: brjod pa 'thad pa dang ldan yin //
T11TD4221.1E:261a-34: gal te chos mtshungs tsam nyid las //
T11TD4221.1E:261a-36: gang la de med de yi phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:261a-37: thams cad grub pa'am 'gar yang min //
T11TD4221.1E:261b-0: mngon @261b sum gyis 'brel pa bzung ba can gyi rjes su dpag pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:261b-1: 'gal zla dang ldan par 'dzin par de ltar skyes pa'i rjes su dpag pa gzhan nam mngon sum gzhan gyis spong bar nus pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:261b-2: tshad ma ni tshad mas sel bar byed pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:261b-3: stobs mtshungs pa nyid yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:261b-5: sel bar byed pa la yang stobs mi mtshungs na yang ji ltar tshad ma yin 'on te rjes su dpag pas gnod pa gang yin pa de ni tshad ma nyid ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:261b-6: gang zhig mngon sum dang 'gal ba de ni rjes su dpag pa nyid ma yin no zhes mtshungs par thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:261b-7: 'on te snang ba ni ci zhig ltar rgyu las nyes pa dang bcas par 'gyur gyi rjes su dpag pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:261b-8: des na de nyid gnod par byed pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:261b-9: de yang legs pa ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:261b-10: rgyu yi nyes pas gzhal bya'i blo //
T11TD4221.1E:261b-11: gzhan du'ang srid ces rigs par ldan //
T11TD4221.1E:261b-12: ngo bo nyid la rgyu yi skyon //
T11TD4221.1E:261b-13: brgya phrag gis kyang ji ltar 'thad //
T11TD4221.1E:261b-14: rim pa dang ldan par snang ba'i rang gi ngo bo ni rgyu'i nyes pas rim pa med par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar mi rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:261b-15: rang bzhin gcig la ni du ma yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:261b-16: de ltar rtogs par thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:261b-17: gcig mi snang ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:261b-19: rang gi ngo bo nyid med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:261b-20: mi snang ba snang ba yod do zhes bya ba ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:261b-21: mi snang ba snang ba'i rang bzhin yin no zhes bya ba ni 'thad par dka'o //
T11TD4221.1E:261b-22: 'on te de la rim pa nyid snang ba yin gyi cig shos ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:261b-23: cig shos na 'khrul pa zad do zhe na 'khrul pa zhes bya ba ci zhig ci mi snang ba yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:261b-24: rnam pa gzhan du snang ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:261b-25: gal te mi snang 'khrul yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:261b-26: thams cad la 'gyur ldog pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:261b-27: de ltar de nyid snang na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:261b-28: ji ltar 'khrul pa yin par brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:261b-29: gal te thams cad mi snang ba 'khrul pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:261b-30: gnyid stug po log pa dang rdol sogs pa yang 'khrul pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:261b-31: gal te rim ma yin pa mi snang ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:261b-32: de lta na ni 'o na ni rim pa nyid nyams pa med par snang ba yin to /
T11TD4221.1E:261b-34: ka ba la sogs pa snang ba nyid ni 'khrul par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:261b-35: gal te gzhan snang 'khrul yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:261b-36: rang dngos snang bar ji ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:261b-37: rang gi ngo bo mi snang yang //
T11TD4221.1E:261b-38: de med pas na ji ltar 'khrul //
T11TD4221.1E:262a-0: gal te brjod par 'dod pa las gzhan snang ba nyid 'khrul ba yin @262a * //
T11TD4221.1E:262a-1: na de'i tshe de'i rang gi ngo bor snang ba nyid med pas ji ltar blo de yod pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:262a-2: gal te mi snang yang blo yod na ni thams cad kyi tshe thams cad la blo thams cad yod pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:262a-4: 'on te blo de ni med pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:262a-5: 'o na de lta na ni rim pa dang ldan pa'i blo ni med pa kho na yin pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:262a-6: rim pa ma yin pa gzhan skyes pa yin pa'i phyir ji ltar 'khrul pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:262a-7: 'on te de'i gzhal bya med pa'i phyir de 'khrul pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:262a-8: rim ma yin pa til la sogs pa la rim ma yin pa nyid kyi blo'i gzhal bya yod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:262a-9: gzhan du snang ba'i phyir na slar la rim pa dang ldan pa'i gzhal bya nyid med pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:262a-10: 'on te rim ma yin pa ni gzhal bya nyid ma yin pa des na de ltar 'gyur pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:262a-11: 'o na ni rang gi ngo bo la yang rim ma yin par snang ba med pa des na 'khrul pa dang mi ldan par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:262a-13: gal te blo yi ngo bo la //
T11TD4221.1E:262a-14: blo gzhan 'dzin par byed yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:262a-15: rim gyis 'dzin pa'i ngo bo ni //
T11TD4221.1E:262a-16: ji ltar rim mi snang bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:262a-17: gal te rim pa dang ldan pa'i blo blo gzhan gyis 'dzin na nor bu dang mu tig la sogs pa'i gzhal bya rim ma yin par snang bar mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:262a-18: de 'dzin pa'i blo rim gyis 'jug pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:262a-19: blo 'dzin par byed pa yang gzhal bya la mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:262a-20: rim ma yin par snang ba ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:262a-21: gal te 'khrul pas de snang na //
T11TD4221.1E:262a-22: de nyid 'khrul med yin par thal //
T11TD4221.1E:262a-23: de yi gzhal bya 'dzin pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:262a-24: de ltar yin pa gang gis bzlog / gal te rim par snang ba can gyi blo skye ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:262a-25: blo'i blo yang de ltar 'gyur dgos so //
T11TD4221.1E:262a-26: 'khrul pas dus gcig tu 'dzin pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:262a-27: gcig gis cig car du ma bzung bar thal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:262a-28: snga ma dang phyi ma'i 'dzin pa dag gis ni gcig nyid ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:262a-29: rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:262a-30: blo phyi mas gcig gis rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:262a-31: rim pa dang ldan pa de yang gcig tu rtogs par ci ltar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:262a-32: 'dzin pa'i dus ni 'dzin par byed pa'i dus las 'das pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:262a-33: 'on te 'di ni rim med pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:262a-34: de lta yin na gcig gis du ma 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:262a-35: de nyid kyi phyir 'di 'khrul pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:262a-36: de lta na yang du ma'i ngo bor snang ba yang mi ldog pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:262a-37: sna tshogs pa ni blo gcig nyid yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:262b-0: nor bu dang mu tig la sogs pa ci @262b ste ma yin /
T11TD4221.1E:262b-1: gal te sngon po la sogs pa'i gzhal bya'i ngo bor snang yang blo'i ngo bo nyid yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:262b-2: gzhal bya thams cad de lta bu nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:262b-3: des na 'khrul pa la yang du ma cig car snang bar ni mi rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:262b-4: des na cig car ram gzhan du yang rung ste /
T11TD4221.1E:262b-5: gang zhig ji ltar nyams su myong ba de ni de kho na ltar khas blangs par byas te /
T11TD4221.1E:262b-6: de kho na ltar dpyad zin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:262b-7: de lta ma yin na gzhal bya gzhag pa med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:262b-8: gal te ri mo la sogs pa dag la sna tshogs blo rtogs pa yin na ji ltar gcig tu mi rigs /
T11TD4221.1E:262b-9: nor bu dang mu tig la sogs pa dag la ni sna tshogs pa gcig gi blo med de /
T11TD4221.1E:262b-10: rnam par dbye ba 'di ni blo'i rnam par dbye ba nyid las yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:262b-12: rang gi gzhung dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:262b-14: rigs mi mthun rnams rtsom med phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:262b-15: ris sogs sna tshogs blo yod min //
T11TD4221.1E:262b-16: gzugs med phyir ldan sna tshogs min //
T11TD4221.1E:262b-17: nye bar btags la brten pa'ang min //
T11TD4221.1E:262b-18: gal te blo'i rjes su 'brang na rigs mi mthun pa rnams rtsom pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gzhung dor dgos so //
T11TD4221.1E:262b-19: snam bu la sogs pa'i ngo bo ni rigs mi mthun pa'i snal ma'i ldan pa las skyes pa yin gyi yan lag can sna tshogs pa nyid ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:262b-20: ci ste de ni blo 'khrul yin //
T11TD4221.1E:262b-21: de tshe'ang cig car 'dzin pa yod //
T11TD4221.1E:262b-22: bden min rang bzhin 'dzin na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:262b-23: ci ste bden dngos 'dzin ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:262b-24: blo 'khrul pa 'jug pa yin yang du ma cig car 'dzin par 'jug pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:262b-25: mdun na gnas par snang ba la bden pa dang mi bden pa'i rnam par dbye ba ci yod 'on te rang bzhin de ni blo nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:262b-27: bden min rang bzhin de ji ltar //
T11TD4221.1E:262b-28: bden pa blo yi bdag nyid yin //
T11TD4221.1E:262b-29: gcig nyid yin na rnam dbye 'di //
T11TD4221.1E:262b-30: mi bden yang na gcig ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:262b-32: blo yi bdag nyid de yi ngo bor bden 'gyur ba //
T11TD4221.1E:262b-33: phyi rol rang bzhin ser sogs dag ni bden min na //
T11TD4221.1E:262b-34: de la gal te mnog med de yi rang bzhin med //
T11TD4221.1E:262b-35: de la de med rtogs 'di rigs pas 'thad ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:262b-36: ci ste bdag nyid kyi ngo bo ni du ma la yang blo gcig 'jug pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:262b-37: de la 'bad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:262b-38: gzhan gyi ngo bo la ni 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi blo 'bad pa chen po dang ldan pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:263a-0: des na yul la sogs pa 'gal ba dag tu cig car 'gro ba mi srid pa'i phyir rnam pa gcig tu 'dzin pa mi srid do @263a * //
T11TD4221.1E:263a-2: gal te yin song nas 'dzin pa med pa yin na 'o na ni ljon pa'i rtse mo dang /
T11TD4221.1E:263a-3: zla ba dus gcig tu 'dzin pa mi srid par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:263a-4: mgyogs par 'jug pa'i phyir cig car 'dzin par mngon pa yin no zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:263a-5: shin tu thag ring ba la mgyogs pa nyid mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:263a-6: gzhan yang mig la sogs pa dag phrad nas 'dzin par byed do zhes bya ba 'di la tshad ma ci yod ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:263a-7: pha rol po dag na re /
T11TD4221.1E:263a-8: dmigs pa dang mi dmigs dag ni ma bsgribs pa dang cig shos la ltos pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:263a-9: ring ba dang cig shos la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:263a-10: gal te mig dang rna ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:263a-11: yid dag ni ma phrad pa'i yul can no zhes ji skad brjod pa bzhin du mig la sogs pa phrad par 'dzin par byed pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:263a-12: de'i tshe sgrib pa yod pas mi dmigs pa dang gzhan du ni dmigs pa zhes bya bar mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:263a-13: sgrib pa de la nyams par byed pa'i mthu ni yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:263a-14: phrad nas 'dzin pa la ni lus can gyi rdzas thogs pa yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:263a-16: shin tu thag ring por yang 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes 'dzer to //
T11TD4221.1E:263a-18: ma phrad par 'dzin ba yin yang yul du rung ba la ltos pa'i phyir to /
T11TD4221.1E:263a-20: khab long ni ma phrad par 'dren pa la 'jug kyang lcags thams cad len par nus pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:263a-21: 'on te de la yang lcags dang reg pa yod pa nyid phra ba'i phyir ma 'phrigs pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:263a-22: dper na mig gi 'ong zer gyi reg pa bzhin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:263a-23: 'di nyid gzhan gyis bsgrub par bya ba ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:263a-24: ji ltar de nyid sgrub byed du 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:263a-26: 'chal pa rnams kyi shin tu yang //
T11TD4221.1E:263a-27: tshogs chen pos ni brtags byas 'di //
T11TD4221.1E:263a-28: mkhas pa rnams kyis bzhad gang nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:263a-30: 'on te phrad pa la 'dren par mthong ba'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:263a-31: khab long gi 'dren pa la yang de yod pa yin no zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:263a-32: sngags kyis kyang 'dren par mthong bas des 'gugs pa yang reg par thal bas thal ches par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:263a-33: der yang 'gyur ba kho na'o zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:263a-34: sgra ni nam mkha'i yon tan yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:263a-35: gal te ma nges par bstan pa'i phyir yul la yang chos de nyid sbyor na gang yang ma nges par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:263b-0: de ni sngo @263b bsangs yin te de'i bu yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba bu dkar sham gyi 'phrul par bstan pa na /
T11TD4221.1E:263b-1: de la yang sngo bsangs yod pa nyid do zhes bya bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:263b-2: ci ste mi mthong zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:263b-3: mi mthong ba'i rgyu rjes su dpag par bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:263b-4: gzhan yang gal te mig gi 'od zer 'phros nas phrad par byed pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:263b-5: ci'i phyir shin tu thag ring por mi mthong mar me'i 'od bzhin du mchod pa la yin pas nyes pa med do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:263b-6: de lta na ni 'od shin tu nye ba la thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:263b-7: mar me'i 'od ni shin tu nye ba la mi 'jug pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:263b-8: des na mig la sogs pa la ni mar me las chos gzhan dang ldan par khas blang bar bya ba de nyid 'dzin pa'i rgyu yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:263b-9: 'od dang phrad pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:263b-10: gal te mig la sogs pa la 'od zer yod na mun bar yang 'dzin par thal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:263b-11: 'on te gang las mgyogs par 'gyur ba de ni yid kyi nus pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:263b-12: 'o na cig car 'dzin pa nyid skyed la rag mod /
T11TD4221.1E:263b-13: 'bad pas brtags pa 'dis ci zhig bya /
T11TD4221.1E:263b-14: de lta bu'i yid ni tshad mas grub pa yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:263b-15: rnam par shes pa snga ma'i ngo bo yid la byed pa nyid kyis de'i don byed pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:263b-16: de yul gzhan la rtse gtang pas nus pa nyams pa na gzhan la shes pa mi skye ba'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:263b-17: cig car rnam par shes pa mi skye ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:263b-18: de'i phyir rtags de las yid rtogs pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:263b-19: rnam pa gzhan du yang 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:263b-20: des na de rnams blo can la //
T11TD4221.1E:263b-21: 'dzin byed yin zhes rjod byed kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:263b-22: skam pa bzhin du shes pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:263b-23: don 'dzin par ni mthong ba med //
T11TD4221.1E:263b-24: de phyir ri mo la rnam pa //
T11TD4221.1E:263b-25: du ma cig car 'dzin pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:263b-27: ci ste de la sna tshogs pa ni ldan pa yin gyi yan lag can gyi gzugs ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:263b-29: ldan pa ni yon tan yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:263b-30: de la gzugs kyi yon tan 'du ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:263b-31: de ltar gyur na ni yon tan dang ldan pas rdzas nyid du 'gyur ro ;
T11TD4221.1E:263b-32: / de lta na yang rigs mi mthun pas mi rtsom pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gzhung dang 'gal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:263b-33: 'on te nye bar btags pa'i sgo nas ldan pa sna tshogs nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:263b-34: de yang legs pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:264a-0: dper na me tog rgyas pa'i nags zhes bya ba'i blo don gcig la 'du ba las 'gyur ba de bzhin du @264a * //
T11TD4221.1E:264a-3: mang po'i grangs nyid kyi nags gang yin pa ni gal te me tog rgyas pa nyid yod pa'i shing dag la 'du ba des na don gcig la 'phrod pa 'du ba zhes bya bar rigs na sna tshogs pa ni 'dir gang na ldan pa yod pa'i yan lag can nyid la 'du ba ma yin no zhes gang 'chad pa /
T11TD4221.1E:264a-4: re re sna tshogs min phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:264a-6: gang dang 'du bas ldan pa yang de ltar 'gyur ba skud pa la sogs pa re re ni sna tshogs pa nyid ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:264a-7: 'on te ji ltar me la mer bzung ba /
T11TD4221.1E:264a-8: chos mthun pa rno ba nyid bzung bas me'i bag chags sad par gyur pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:264a-9: de dran pas bram ze'i khye'u la yang mer sgro 'dogs pa byed pa de bzhin du /
T11TD4221.1E:264a-10: sngon po la sogs pa rim gyis bzung ba dag las gcig bzung ba'i dus su bzung ba la sgro 'dogs par byed pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:264a-11: sna tshogs par rtogs pa yin no zhe na de ni mi 'thad de 'di ltar /
T11TD4221.1E:264a-12: rim bzhin du ni bzung ba la //
T11TD4221.1E:264a-13: sna tshogs blo yis bsres min te /
T11TD4221.1E:264a-14: gcig gis du ma mi 'dzin phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:264a-15: de la ni rno ba nyid du 'dra ba'i sgro 'dogs pa'i rgyu mtshan yin na mthong ba'i sngon po la sogs pa la 'dir sgro ji ltar 'dogs /
T11TD4221.1E:264a-16: 'on te nye bas so zhe na nye bar 'dzin pa ni cig car 'dzin pa nyid la rig pa dang ldan gyi rim gyis 'dzin na ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:264a-17: yul de bzung ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:264a-18: yul der bzung ba yang snga ma dang phyi ma dag la sna tshogs par bzung ba ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:264a-19: sgro btags pas 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya bar ni mi rigs te /
T11TD4221.1E:264a-20: de nyid bsam par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:264a-21: 'on te tha dad pa ma bzung ba'i phyir dran pa la gzung bar bya ba nyid du snang ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:264a-22: ji ltar gzhan la gzhan du 'dzin //
T11TD4221.1E:264a-23: de ni dran par bya ba'i rang bzhin yongs su spangs nas snang ba nyid 'dzin pa yin te nges na bsre ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:264a-24: 'on te bsre ba ni 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:264a-25: de lta yin na du ma gcig gis 'dzin par thal na 'dod pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:264a-26: mig gi byed pas thams cad shes par rtogs pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:264a-27: des na ma 'brel par rtogs pa'i dri mas mtshon pa blun po'i skye bos brtags pa 'dis ni chog go zhes bshad pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:264a-28: de phyir gcig don du ma can //
T11TD4221.1E:264a-29: gang phyir don gcig rtog pa na'ang //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-0: @264b gzhan dag mthong ba de phyir yang //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-1: rtog pa med pa grub pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-2: sngon po la sogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo du ma can sna tshogs par snang ba na 'di sngon po zhes rnam par rtog par byed kyang mtha' na 'dug pa'i ser po la sogs pa mthong ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-3: rnam par rtog pa du ma cig car 'byung ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-4: sna tshogs pa zhes rnam par brtag par rung ba kho na'o zhe na ma yin te nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-5: gdon mi za bar sna tshogs pa //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-6: zhes bya ba nyid du brtags par bya ba ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:264b-7: gcig la yang rtogs pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-8: de lta na yang cig car ba'i sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa thams cad ni /
T11TD4221.1E:264b-9: rnam pa sna tshogs pa can gyi blo gcig go //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-11: sna tshogs snang can don rnams la //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-12: gal te gcig nyid mi rigs na //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-13: re zhig gcig pu'i blo de nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-14: sna tshogs su ni ji ltar snang //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-16: ji ltar blo nyid sna tshogs kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-17: rnam dbyer khyed kyis khas blangs pa //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-18: phyi yang gal te de lta nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-19: de la gang gis rnam dbye byed //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-20: gang la blo ni sna tshogs phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-21: don rnams sna tshogs ngo bo ni //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-22: de la gnas pa'i ngo bo can //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-23: blo ni ji ltar 'gyur ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-24: des na sna tshogs pa yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:264b-25: gcig ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni blo'i ngo bo nyid kyis ma nges pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:264b-27: ji lta ji ltar don bsams pa //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-28: de lta de ltar rnam bral zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-29: mkhas pa rnams kyis gang gsungs pa //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-30: de ni dngos stobs 'ongs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-31: gcig la sna tshogs de cir 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-32: de ni blo la'ang mi 'grub bo //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-34: de la bdag gis ci zhig bya //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-36: gcig yin na blo yang sna tshogs ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-37: de la yang rnam pa du ma yin pa'i phyir du ma nyid du 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:264b-38: dngos po'i mtshan nyid rnam pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-39: rnam pa du ma 'dzin na dngos pa yang gdon mi za bar du mar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:264b-40: de'i phyir gal te blo de snyed yin na phyogs phyi ma smra ba la chad pa yod /
T11TD4221.1E:264b-41: ci ste blo du ma nyid yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:264b-42: rdul phra rab so so la blo yang de snyed du 'gyur bas rdul phra rab 'dzin par thal la /
T11TD4221.1E:264b-43: phan tshun mi rtogs pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:265a-0: rtogs pa po gzhan yang med pa'i phyir du ma @265a * //
T11TD4221.1E:265a-2: rang rig pa rnams ni du ma nyid rtogs pa ma yin te rgyud gzhan dag kyang snang bar thal ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:265a-3: de ni yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:265a-4: mthong ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:265a-5: mthong ba yang mi 'thad do zhes bya ba ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:265a-6: 'o na ni rang rig pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:265a-7: phan tshun yang rig pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:265a-8: ma yin te rang rig med par rig pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:265a-10: rang rig pa yin na ni gzhan rig pa la dogs pa yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:265a-11: 'on te mang po nyid du rtogs pa gang zhig yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:265a-12: 'ga' yang ma yin te de las tha dad pa'i rtogs par byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:265a-14: blo rnams gcig pa ma yin zhing //
T11TD4221.1E:265a-15: du ma nyid du'ang 'thad ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:265a-16: gcig na sna tshogs med 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:265a-17: du ma nyid la 'di ches gsal //
T11TD4221.1E:265a-18: de'i phyir dngos po rnams ji ltar rnam par bsams pa /
T11TD4221.1E:265a-19: de lta de ltar rnam par gzhigs par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'di la ci zhig byar yod /
T11TD4221.1E:265a-20: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo zhes gsungs pas na chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid do zhes bya bar rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:265a-21: ci ste gcig dang du ma'i rnam par rtog pas snang ba nyid med par ji ltar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:265a-22: de ni rnam par brtags kyang snang ba kho na'o zhen /
T11TD4221.1E:265a-23: sgyu ma dang smig rgyu la sogs pa ltar med kyang skyon med do //
T11TD4221.1E:265a-24: de dag kyang med pa yin na ji ltar snang /
T11TD4221.1E:265a-25: snang ngo zhe na ni ji ltar med pa nyid yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:265a-26: don bya ba byed pa med pa nyid kyi phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:265a-27: yod pa'i mtshan nyid ni don byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:265a-28: snang ba tsam gyis yod pa'i tha snyad du 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:265a-29: skra shad la sogs pa snang ba yin yang med par nges phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:265a-30: don byed pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig yin /
T11TD4221.1E:265a-31: ci snang ba'i rang bzhin las gzhan yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:265a-33: gzhan yin no zhe na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:265a-34: de la yang snang ba'i rang bzhin las don byed pa gzhan khas len pa na thug pa med pas mi rtogs par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:265a-35: de nyid na ni snang ba thams cad yod par thal ba'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:265a-36: sgyu ma la sogs pa med par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:265a-37: 'di la brjod pa 'ga' zhig gi ni tha snyad de //
T11TD4221.1E:265a-38: 'ga' zhig gi ni bzlog pas yin //
T11TD4221.1E:265a-39: rnam par dbye bas gnas pa 'di //
T11TD4221.1E:265b-0: dngos @265b po rnams kyi rang bzhin yin //
T11TD4221.1E:265b-1: snang ba tsam nyid kyis ni thams cad don byed pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:265b-2: gang zhig don byed pa nyid du snang ba de kho na don byed pa'i rang bzhin ni med par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:265b-3: tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pas yong pa nyid rnam par gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:265b-4: de lta yin na ni snang ba thams cad med par mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:265b-5: 'ga' zhig don byed pa dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:265b-6: gzhan gyis khas blangs pa'i sgo nas thal bar 'gyur ba byed pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:265b-7: yod par smra ba ni don byed pas yod par khas len par byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:265b-8: des na don byed pa snang ba las tha dad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:265b-9: sngon po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin las don byed pa gzhan na snang ba med do //
T11TD4221.1E:265b-10: gang zhig gang gis 'dod pa de nyid don byed pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:265b-11: de nyid ni gnas pa med pa kho na ste /
T11TD4221.1E:265b-12: 'ga' zhig kho na cung zad cig gdod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:265b-13: gdung ba bzlog pa'i tshim pa'i don bye pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:265b-15: gdung ba dang tshim pa dag gnas pa med pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:265b-16: goms pa'i stobs kyis thams cad la skyes pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:265b-17: goms pa med pa'i ni med pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:265b-18: don dam pa nyid do zhes rnam par gnas so //
T11TD4221.1E:265b-19: gal te de ltar na goms pa'i stobs kyis shes pa nyid de ltar gyur pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:265b-20: med pa ni ma yin no zhe na ma rig pa'i stobs kyis skyed pa nyid med pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:265b-21: de lta bu gnas pa'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:265b-22: snang ba tsam ma brtags na nyams dga' bar yod pa'i phyir ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:265b-23: de'i phyir don dang shes pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:265b-24: rags snang yod min de dag nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:265b-25: gcig la bkag pa nyid phyir dang //
T11TD4221.1E:265b-26: mang po la yang yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:265b-27: rdul phra rab bam yan lag can gyi don la ni rigs par snang ba yod pa ma yin te gang gi phyir rags pa nyid ni phyogs kyi cha tha dad pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:265b-28: phyogs kyi cha rnams kyang phan tshun yongs su spangs pas gnas pa'i phyir gcig ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:265b-29: ci ste dags par snang ba ni mang po la yod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:265b-30: 'di ltar rigs mthun pa mang po gzhan gyis mchod par snang ba na rags pa nyid du tha snyad byed pa yin no zhe na de yang mi 'thad de /
T11TD4221.1E:265b-31: de dag ni mang po kho na yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:265b-32: rags pa nyid so so la med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:266a-2: de dag las gzhan pa'i tshogs pa gang yin par rags pa'i tha snyad ni lings po gcig tu snang ba la brten pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:266a-3: phan tshun tha dad par snang ba ni lings po gcig tu snang ba yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:266a-4: bar yang snang ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:266a-6: 'o na ni de dag snang bar mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:266a-7: ci ste rdul phra rab dengs pa na de dag ldan pa las yan lag can gzhan nyid skye ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:266a-8: de la rdul phra rab bam yan lag ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no snyam na gal te yan lag can gzhan nyid skyes pa yin na de lta na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:266a-9: sa bon las myu gu bzhin rdul phra rab zhig cing /
T11TD4221.1E:266a-10: yan lag can gzhan skyes bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:266a-11: des na ldan pa dang lhan cig pa'i rdul phra rab la sogs pas rang dang phrad pas 'dus pa'i yan lag can rtsom par byed pa'i phyir snal ma la sogs pa 'du ba can gyi rgyu yin no zhes bya bar mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:266a-12: 'brel ba nyid ni gnyis la gnas ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:266a-13: 'di la'o snyam pa'i blo yang dmigs pa med par 'gyur te dmigs pa'i don med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:266a-14: cha med pa de bzung ba na pha rol la sogs pa'i cha yang bzung bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:266a-15: tshu rol gyi cha bzung na pha rol yang mthong bar 'gyur te de yang pha rol gyi cha'i yan lag can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:266a-16: des na thams cad thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:266a-17: 'on te pha rol gyi cha ni mthong ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:266a-18: pha rol gyi cha nyid med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:266a-19: gzhan gyis ji ltar mthong ba yin pa de ni gzhan nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:266a-20: 'o na ni 'di yan lag can nam rags par ni mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:266a-21: de ni rnam grangs kyis mthong ba yin no zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:266a-22: gcig la rnam grangs mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:266a-23: de nyid ni 'di yin no zhes rtogs par mi nus so //
T11TD4221.1E:266a-24: mthong ba dang reg pas kyang rtogs pa'i phyir yan lag can yin no zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:266a-25: tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:266a-26: phan tshun spangs par rtogs pa dag ji ltar gcig nyid yin /
T11TD4221.1E:266a-27: phan tshun gyi rnam par dbye ba 'di ni 'dzin pas byas pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:266a-28: gzung ba ni gcig kho na'o zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:266a-29: 'o na ni tha dad pa mtha' dag zhig pa nyid kyis gnyis med pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:266a-30: de yang de las tha dad par snang ba med pas chos thams cad stong pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:266b-0: mthong ba gang yin pa de nyid reg pa yin @266b no zhes bya ba la ni tshad ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:266b-1: de'i phyir na snang ba'i spyod yul du gyur pa'i yan lag can nam /
T11TD4221.1E:266b-2: yan lag ni yod pa ma yin pas snang ba tsam zhes bya ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:266b-3: gal te 'di snang ba kho nar zad pa yin na 'o na ni rnam par shes pa smra ba de nyid thal bar 'gyur bas /
T11TD4221.1E:266b-4: ji ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:266b-6: yongs gcod nang yin phyi rol ltar //
T11TD4221.1E:266b-7: gnas pa 'di ni cha gzhan yin //
T11TD4221.1E:266b-8: tha dad med can shes pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:266b-9: tha dad snang ba bslad pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:266b-10: gal te 'di rang rig yin na shes pa yin yang tha dad par snang ba mi rigs te /
T11TD4221.1E:266b-11: rang gi ngo bo'i mthar thug ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:266b-12: rang rig pa yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:266b-13: gzhan rig pa ma yin pa des na tha dad par snang bar mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:266b-14: ci ste phan tshun rig pa nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:266b-15: nges na tha dad pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:266b-16: de la'ang so sor rig pas na //
T11TD4221.1E:266b-17: tshad ma rgyud gzhan nyid du 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:266b-18: de bzhin bdag gis yang bcad ces //
T11TD4221.1E:266b-19: bya ba rang rig min la med //
T11TD4221.1E:266b-20: gal te de dag rig pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:266b-21: rang dang gzhan yang rig pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:266b-22: rang dang gzhan rig na ni rang nyid kyis rang rig par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:266b-23: rang gi ngo bo rig pa na /
T11TD4221.1E:266b-24: gzhan rig pa la 'jug pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:266b-25: 'on te rang rig pa ni med pa nyid de phan tshun du gzhan nyid rig pa yin no zhen /
T11TD4221.1E:266b-26: de lta yin na ltas byin dang mchod sbyin gyis yongs su bcad pa ltar gnyis rig pa zhes bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:266b-27: 'di bdag gis rig go zhes bya bar yang mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:266b-28: byed pa po rang rig pa ma yin pa nyid kyis mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:266b-29: de'i phyir na de dag nyid rang rig par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:266b-31: rgyud gzhan gyis rtogs pa bzhin du gnyis su rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:266b-32: gzhan na re de nyid kyi phyir bdag gis gnyi ga rtogs par 'dod de /
T11TD4221.1E:266b-33: de lta ma yin na thal ba 'dir 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
T11TD4221.1E:266b-35: rang rig dang ni cig shos la //
T11TD4221.1E:266b-36: snga ma'i tshul las ma 'das phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:266b-37: de yang brgal zhing brtag pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:266b-38: 'di nyid las ni mthar ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:266b-39: gal te bdag rang rig pa'i ngo bo yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:266b-40: de la gzhan rig pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:266b-41: rang gi bdag nyid la gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:266b-42: gzhan yang rig pa la 'gal ba ci yod ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:267a-0: rang bzhin de nyid dam gzhan nyid kyis gzhan rig pa yin @267a * //
T11TD4221.1E:267a-1: zhes bya ba'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis las gcig la gnas par bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:267a-2: rang gi rang bzhin gyis rig pa zhes bya bar ni mi 'thad de /
T11TD4221.1E:267a-3: rang gi rang bzhin ni rang bdag nyid la rnam par gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:267a-4: rang bzhin gang zhig rang gi ngo bo nyid la gnas pa rang la mngon du phyogs pa rjes ji ltar gzhan reg par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:267a-5: gzhan gyi sgo nas so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:267a-6: 'o na ni der rang gi bdag nyid rtogs pa ma yin pa des na rgyud gzhan gyis rtogs pa bzhin du gnyis rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:267a-7: de la mngon du phyogs pa gnyis po de ni gcig nyid yin no zhe na 'di ni gnyis so zhes rtog pa dang ldan pa de su yin /
T11TD4221.1E:267a-9: yang mngon du phyogs pa gnyis su 'gyur dgos pa'i phyir thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:267a-10: des rang reg pa'i rang bzhin gsum du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:267a-11: de'i phyir de rig pa la bdag gzhan khas blangs dgos la /
T11TD4221.1E:267a-12: de la yang gzhan yin pa'i phyir don med par brgyud pa chen por 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:267a-13: des na myong ba las rig pa gcig nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:267a-14: des na tha dad pa med pa'i shes pa la tha dad par snang ba ni bslad pa yin pas na /
T11TD4221.1E:267a-15: shes pa yang rang gi ngo bor rtogs pa med pas med pa kho na yin pa'i phyir stong pa nyid 'ba' zhig lus par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:267a-17: de la gcig ni med pas kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:267a-18: gnyi ga'ang nyams par 'gyur ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:267a-19: de'i phyir gnyis stong gang yin pa //
T11TD4221.1E:267a-20: de ni de yi'ang de nyid yin //
T11TD4221.1E:267a-21: 'di snyam du gcig spangs na shes pa tsam du 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:267a-22: snang ba spong bar byed na ni gnyi ga de ltar 'gyur ba'am /
T11TD4221.1E:267a-23: yang na ni 'ga' yang ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni mtha' gcig tu nges pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:267a-24: gnyi ga yang 'gyur la rag go zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:267a-25: lan btab zin pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:267a-26: rang rig pa med pa dang gzhan rig pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:267a-27: de'i phyir stong pa nyid kho na legs pa yin no zhes bya bar rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:267a-28: da ni dbu ma pa dang rnal 'byor spyod pa pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:267a-29: phyi rol gyi don yod par smra ba'i lugs kyis stong pa nyid kyi don ston par byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:267a-34: rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dngos po rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:267b-0: dngos rnams tha @267b dad gnas pa 'di //
T11TD4221.1E:267b-1: de tha dad la brten pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:267b-2: de ni bslad pa nyid yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:267b-3: de dag tha dad kyang bslad 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:267b-4: rnam par shes par byed pas na rnam par shes pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:267b-5: gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa las //
T11TD4221.1E:267b-6: mtshan nyid gzhan ni yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:267b-7: des na mtshan nyid stong pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:267b-8: rang bzhin med par rab tu bshad //
T11TD4221.1E:267b-9: phung po la sogs bye brag gi / mtshan nyid thams cad byed pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:267b-10: khyad par can de'ang de nyid min //
T11TD4221.1E:267b-11: des na de dag mtshan nyid bral //
T11TD4221.1E:267b-12: bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag go //
T11TD4221.1E:267b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis gzugs la sogs pa phyi rol gyi don dang /
T11TD4221.1E:267b-14: de las gzhan dag kyang bstan pa ji ltar bshad par bya ba yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:267b-16: ma rig gis bslad bdag nyid la //
T11TD4221.1E:267b-17: ji lta'i rang rkyen la ltos nas //
T11TD4221.1E:267b-18: rnam rig de bzhin min rnam pa //
T11TD4221.1E:267b-19: skye 'gyur rab ri ba la sogs bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:267b-20: pha rol mthong min thams cad kyis //
T11TD4221.1E:267b-21: de nyid de ni rig ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:267b-22: gzung dang 'dzin pa'i bslad pa dag / med na de ni med phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:267b-23: des de nyid don btang snyoms can //
T11TD4221.1E:267b-24: glang chen gzigs stangs nyid mdzad nas //
T11TD4221.1E:267b-26: phyi rol dpyod la 'jug par mdzad //
T11TD4221.1E:267b-27: gal te don dam par ni thams cad stong pa yin la bcom ldan 'das kyang de kho na gzigs pa yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:267b-28: de ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis phyi rol gyi don bstan par mdzad de de kho na gzigs pa ni de kho na nyid ma yin pa ston par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:267b-29: ston na yang ji ltar de kho na gzigs pa yin no zhes khod du chud ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:267b-30: 'di la smras pa phyi rol sgrub pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis phyi rol bstan pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:267b-32: rjes su de brjod pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:267b-33: de rjes su brjod pas bdag bkag par brjod par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:267b-34: stong pa nyid mthong ba rjes su brjod par yang ji ltar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:267b-35: de snang ba med pa'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:267b-36: 'jig rten gyi thugs nyid kyis rjes su brjod pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:267b-37: 'jig rten gyi blo de lta bu yang thog ma med pa nas ma rig pa goms pa las yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:267b-38: gal te bcom ldan 'das la 'jig rten gyi blo mnga' na ji ltar de kho na mthong ba yin zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:267b-39: sngon gyi shugs kyis ston pa srid pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:268a-1: des na 'jig rten gzhug pa'i don du du mar bstan pa 'gal ba med do //
T11TD4221.1E:268a-2: de ltar re zhig stong pa nyid du khas blangs nas ma nges pa spangs nas /
T11TD4221.1E:268a-3: da ni sna tshogs par khas blangs te spong bar byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:268a-4: sna tshogs su snang ba yang blo ni gcig nyid du 'gyur te ;
T11TD4221.1E:268a-5: phyi rol gyi sna tshogs dang mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:268a-6: rnam par dbye bar nus pa'i sna tshogs ni du mar 'gyur ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:268a-7: blo'i sngon po la sogs pa ni rnam par dbye bar nus pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:268a-9: shes la sngo sogs sna tshogs pa //
T11TD4221.1E:268a-10: shes pa'i khyad par gzhan sten med //
T11TD4221.1E:268a-11: mthong nus ma yin de yi tshe //
T11TD4221.1E:268a-13: rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'i sna tshogs pa'i sngon po la sogs pa'i gang yin pa ni yan gar du mthong bar nus pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:268a-14: des ni rnam bar dbye bar mi nus pa'i phyir na blo ni sna tshogs pa nyid yin yang gcig nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:268a-15: gal te sna tshogs kyang gcig yin na 'o na ni sgra la sogs par snang ba yang gcig tu 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:268a-16: gal te rnam par dbye bar mi nus pa yin na 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:268a-17: 'on te rna ba bkag kyang gzugs la sogs pa dmigs pa des na yang yan 'gar du 'dzin pa'i phyir du ma nyid do zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:268a-19: de'i tshe shes pa rnam par 'byed pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:268a-20: mi snang ba'i phyir de'i tshe sngar gyi snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:268a-21: mi snang yang sgra yod pa des na tha dad ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:268a-22: de ni de'i tshe shes pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:268a-23: lkog tu gyur ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:268a-24: de ltar rnam par dbye ba ni don la 'bab par 'gyur ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:268a-25: don ni rig pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:268a-26: ci ste lhan cig tu snang ba'i sngar gyi shes pa'i rnam pa las da ltar yan 'gar bar snang ba ni gzhan yin no zhes rnam par 'byed pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:268a-29: mngon sum gyi shes pa 'jug pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:268a-31: shes gang ci ltar snang ba de //
T11TD4221.1E:268a-32: de lta nyid du myong ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:268a-33: de ltar 'gyur ro myong bar gyur to //
T11TD4221.1E:268a-34: zhes bya ba ni de med do //
T11TD4221.1E:268a-35: rang rig pa'i mngon sum ni lkog tu gyur pa las 'jug pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:268a-36: lkog tu gyur pa ni rang rig pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:268a-37: 'on te dran pas shes par byed do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:268b-1: dran pa tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:268b-2: ci ste nyams su myong ba las skyes pa'i dran pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:268b-3: tshad ma nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:268b-4: nyams su myong ba las dran pa skyes pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di la ni tshad ma cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:268b-5: nyams su myong ba'i dus na dran pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:268b-6: dran pa 'dis ni bdag nyams su myong ba las skyes so zhes bya bar shes pa yang med de /
T11TD4221.1E:268b-7: myong ba ni de la ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:268b-8: nyams su myong ba yin na yang dran par mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:268b-9: de'i tshe nyams su myong ba kho nar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:268b-10: de'i phyir rnam par dbye bar mi nus pa'i sna tshogs pa ni gcig yin pas skyon med do //
T11TD4221.1E:268b-11: 'o na ni phyi rol yang rnam par dbye bar mi nus pa'i phyir na gcig nyid do zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:268b-12: de nyid kyi tshe gzhan gyis gcig mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:268b-13: 'on te pha rol gyis mthong ba gang yin pa de ni gzhan kho na'o zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:268b-14: 'o na ni shin tu yang rnam par phye ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:268b-15: rang gis mthong ba nyid gcig yin no zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:268b-16: rang rig pa la snang ba'i phyir de ni shes pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:268b-17: de ltar sems kyi rnam pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:268b-18: sna tshogs gcig gi ngo bor 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:268b-19: shes pa ma rtogs pa ni rnam par dbyer med par yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:268b-20: de'i phyir na gzung ba dang 'dzin pa sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa ni blo gcig nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:268b-21: sna tshogs ni gnyis med pa yin pa'am /
T11TD4221.1E:268b-22: ma yin na yang sna tshogs pa de sna tshogs ma yin pa las tha dad par gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:268b-23: des na gzhan med pa'i phyir myong ba gnyis med pa nyid 'ba' zhig yin no zhes bya bar gnas so //
T11TD4221.1E:268b-24: de lta na ni 'o na dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag gis tha dad pa srid pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:268b-25: ji ltar gnyis med pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:268b-27: tha dad med na med de las //
T11TD4221.1E:268b-28: tha mi dad tha dad gnas 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:268b-29: tha dad dngos po med rtogs na //
T11TD4221.1E:268b-30: tha mi dad nyid ga las yin //
T11TD4221.1E:268b-31: gal te tha dad pa yod na tha dad pa las gzhan tha mi dad pa nyid yod do zhes rtogs par 'gyur la /
T11TD4221.1E:268b-32: de lta na yang dngos po med pa dang dngos po yang rtogs pas na /
T11TD4221.1E:268b-33: dngos po dang dngos po med pa gnyis su rtogs par 'gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:268b-34: de ci ltar gnyis med par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:268b-36: bum pa 'di la ka ba ni //
T11TD4221.1E:269a-0: @269a * // med ces smin par dgag pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:269a-1: yod min med na med pa can //
T11TD4221.1E:269a-2: tha dad rig pa nyid 'ongs so //
T11TD4221.1E:269a-3: dgag pa thams cad ni tha dad med na mi 'byung ba can yin pas de la dgag pa rtogs na ji ltar tha mi dad par rtogs par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:269a-4: dgag pa ma rtogs na ni ji lta ba bzhin du gnang ba'i phyir cung zad kyang rtogs par ma byas par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:269a-5: gzhan rtogs par byed pa las gzhan khas blang bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir na ci ltar gnyis med pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:269a-6: bdag nyid kho na rtogs par byed pa ni 'ga' yang med do //
T11TD4221.1E:269a-7: 'on te gzhan 'ga' yang rtogs par mi byed na /
T11TD4221.1E:269a-8: de lta na ni bdag nyid rmongs pa yin pas ji ltar gnyis med par rtogs par byed par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:269a-9: rmongs pa bsal ban gzhan nyid skyes pa'i phyir gnyis med pa nyid ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:269a-10: snga ma dang phyi ma yang ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:269a-11: des na 'di ni gyi na'o zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:269a-13: gang gis de ltar bsgrubs bas ni //
T11TD4221.1E:269a-14: tha dad ces bya 'di mthong med //
T11TD4221.1E:269a-15: de la dngos dang dngos med sogs //
T11TD4221.1E:269a-17: re zhig snga ma dang phyi ma tha dad pa 'di ni snang ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:269a-18: snga ma dang phyi ma la yang mngon sum mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:269a-19: gang la snga ma mngon sum yin na de nyid kyi tshe na snga ma da ltar ba nyid du 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:269a-21: de'i da ltar ba nyid ni 'di kho na yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:269a-22: gang zhig mngon sum du byed pa'i rang bzhin gyis mngon sum la snang ba'o //
T11TD4221.1E:269a-23: ci ste rnal 'byor pa rnams la mngon sum du byed pas snang ba yang ji ltar 'das pa la sogs pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:269a-24: 'on te mi snang ngo zhes brjod na /
T11TD4221.1E:269a-25: ci ltar 'das pa la sogs pa rig pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:269a-26: re zhig skye ba 'di la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:269a-27: 'ga' yang dmigs pa yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:269a-28: de yi gnas skabs thob rnams la //
T11TD4221.1E:269a-29: ji ltar 'gyur ba mi shes so //
T11TD4221.1E:269a-30: gang du mthong bar 'dod pa rnams kyang bkag ba der ma 'ongs pa la gus par ji ltar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:269a-31: rmi lam bden pa mthong bas 'di nyid du yang 'das pa la sogs pa rig pa nyid do zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:269a-32: mi dmigs pa'i gnas skabs na sad pa rnams /
T11TD4221.1E:269a-33: de ltar tha snyad du byed pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:269a-34: de'i phyir 'das pa mngon sum gyis mi mthong zhing ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:269b-0: des na ji ltar de @269b las tha dad par rtogs par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:269b-1: 'das pa la ni dran pa nyid yin na de yang tshad ma ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:269b-2: 'o na te bstan pa la sogs pa'am /
T11TD4221.1E:269b-3: rgyu rtogs pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pas yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:269b-4: des na tha dad par rtogs par 'gyur ro zhe na yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:269b-6: de dang 'brel pa rig pa las ;
T11TD4221.1E:269b-7: /'byung bar 'gyur don rjes su dpog / rgyu dang brtan pa nyid dag la //
T11TD4221.1E:269b-8: mngon sum gyis ni rig pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:269b-9: gal te 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don dang brtan pa'am rgyu dag 'brel par bzung na ni de'i tshe /
T11TD4221.1E:269b-10: rjes su dpag par rig pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:269b-11: 'brel pa las lkog tu gyur pa'i don rtogs pa ni rjes su dpog pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag par smra ba'i yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:269b-12: 'on te mthong ba'i phyir 'brel pa gzung ba med pa kho nar rjes su dpag pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:269b-13: 'o na ni ha cang thal ba nyid du thal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:269b-14: ma mthong ba nyid kyi phyir mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:269b-15: mthong ba nyid dang cig shos ni gcig tu bya bar mi nus so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:269b-16: gal te mthong ba'i phyir zhes lan 'debs na mthong ba de nyid mngon sum mam /
T11TD4221.1E:269b-17: rjes su dpag pas yin zhes bsam par bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:269b-18: gal te rjes su dpag pas so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:269b-19: rjes su dpag par de nyid bsam par bya ba yin pas ji ltar des yin /
T11TD4221.1E:269b-20: 'on te mngon sum gyis yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:269b-22: mngon sum gyis ni rjes su dpag pa mthong bar mi nus so //
T11TD4221.1E:269b-23: de ni lkog tu gyur pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:269b-24: lkog tu gyur pa la yang mngon sum mi 'jug pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:269b-25: ji ltar lkog tu gyur pa'i yul can nyid kyis rjes su dpag pa bdag gir byed /
T11TD4221.1E:269b-26: lkog tu gyur pa'i yul du mi byed pas ni yul de'i khyad par can gyi rjes su dpog pa rtogs par nus pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:269b-27: 'on te de'i yul can nyid du mi 'dzin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:269b-28: de ltar yin na ni rjes su dpag pa ma mthong ba kho na yin pas ji ltar mthong ba'i phyir zhes bya ba gtan tshigs yin /
T11TD4221.1E:269b-29: rang gi ngo bo rig pa tsam zhig rjes su dpag pa yin par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:269b-30: rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyis de ltar mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:269b-31: 'on te de kho na ltar tha snyad byed pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:269b-32: de ltar yin na tha snyad tsam du 'gyur bas tha dad pa la mngon par zhen pas ci bya /
T11TD4221.1E:270a-0: tha dad par mngon par zhen pa yang mthong ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na mthong ba spang bar mi @270a * //
T11TD4221.1E:270a-3: mthong ba nyid kyis rmongs pa thams cad spang bar mi nus pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:270a-4: khyed kyi nye bar bstan pa la brtson pa ni don med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:270a-5: khyed kyi yang don med do zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:270a-6: ma mthong ba la mthong bar rlom pa srid pas de lta bu brjod pa'i don du yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:270a-8: khyed tha dad par mngon par mthong ba med par tha dad par mngon par zhen par rlom pa'i phyir de ni do rab kho nar rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:270a-10: cha med da ltar snang ba yi //
T11TD4221.1E:270a-11: tha dad pa la brten ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:270a-12: snga ma phyi ma'i rtogs pa yang //
T11TD4221.1E:270a-13: so sor tha dad 'dzin pa min //
T11TD4221.1E:270a-14: bu ram dong gra'i 'bras bu bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:270a-16: der ni 'bras bu gcig pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:270a-17: phyir na 'dus nas med pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:270a-18: 'dir ni snga ma phyi ma nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:270a-19: sems la 'bras bu cung zad med //
T11TD4221.1E:270a-20: de las gzhan pa'i rnam rig ni //
T11TD4221.1E:270a-21: dran yin de ni myong las byung //
T11TD4221.1E:270a-22: tha dad pa ni nyams myong med //
T11TD4221.1E:270a-23: nyams myong med par dran pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:270a-24: de dang dus mtshungs pa nyid ni //
T11TD4221.1E:270a-25: rig na gnyis med thob par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:270a-26: bu ram dang li dong gra dag gis ni des bzlog bar bya ba'i nad log pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:270a-27: bde bar gnas pa'i 'bras bu byed pa des na chogs par tha snyad byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:270a-28: 'dir ni rang gi don tsam rtogs pa'i rang bzhin snga ma dang phyi ma'i sems dag la 'bras bu gzhan cung zad kyang med do //
T11TD4221.1E:270a-29: rtogs pa ni de dag gi bdag nyid du gyur pa yin pas de yang tha dad pa na gang la ltos nas tshogs par 'gyur ba'i tha dad pa med pa gzhan ci zhig yod /
T11TD4221.1E:270a-30: snga ma dang phyi ma 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin gyi dran ba ni de dag gi 'bras bu gcig yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:270a-32: de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi rjes su byed pa'i dran pa ni nyams su myong ba las 'byung ba yin na gnyis 'dzin pa'i nyams su myong ba ni yod pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:270a-33: des na dran pa yang med do //
T11TD4221.1E:270a-34: 'o na ci ltar dran pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'di ni gzugs dang reg pa'i rjes su byed pa'i yin no zhes bshad ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:270a-35: tha dad pa 'dzin pa 'dod pa byas nas de skad du bshad pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:270a-36: 'dir ni de lta bu'i skabs ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:270a-37: gang gis rang dbang du 'dzin par 'gyur ba dran pa ni don 'dzin pa la 'jug pa yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-0: dus mtshungs pa @270b gnyis dran pas 'dzin to zhe na ni de tha dad par rnam par dbye bar mi nus pas na gcig nyid do zhes bstan zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-2: tha dad 'dzin par byed pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-3: dran pa nyid ces 'dod yin gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-4: nyams myong min phyir tha dad du //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-5: rig pa 'di ni kun rdzob nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-7: bsgyur dang ma bsgyur snang ba la //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-8: sna tshogs rtogs pa gcig tu 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-9: bdag gis tha dad mthong 'gyur dang //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-10: mthong bar 'gyur zhes de bzhin du'ang //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-13: de phyir de nyid du na 'gar //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-14: tha dad 'dzin pa grub pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-15: snang ba tsam gyis sna tshogs dang //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-16: sna tshogs min nyid rnam 'byed min //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-18: snga ma'i rjes su 'brangs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-19: 'o na ni dran pa goms pa las gsal bar 'gyur ba'i mngon sum gyis tha dad pa 'dzin pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:270b-20: gang zhig mngon sum gyis ma grub //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-21: de ni goms las ji ltar yin //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-22: goms pa las kyang mthong ba de //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-23: cig car du ni snang ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-24: der yang rnam par dbye ba de //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-25: dran pa nyid kyis byas par 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-26: de ltar nyams myong la snang ba //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-27: gang du'ang tha dad grub pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-28: gal te dran la dran pa dang //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-29: nyams myong yan 'gar ba myong na //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-30: du ma'i rang bzhin de yang ni //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-31: phan tshun rnam dbye yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-32: rang ngam gzhan gyis de nyid du //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-33: rnam dbye nus pa min phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-34: logs su gcod par mi nus shing //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-35: gzhan du lta bar mi nus gang //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-36: blang dang dor nyid byas nyid phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-37: tha dad na yang des ci bya //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-38: gal te mngon sum gyis rtogs pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:270b-39: dus mnyam du rtogs pa'i dran pa yang de dang lhan cig gcig nyid du bdag gir byed na /
T11TD4221.1E:270b-40: mngon sum rtogs pa dang bcas pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:270b-41: des na mngon sum rtogs pa med pa yin no zhes bya ba skabs kyi don nyams pa na /
T11TD4221.1E:270b-42: skabs la babs par bya'o snyam pa de 'dam rdzab tu ltung ngo zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:270b-44: tha dad smra ba brtsams nas ni //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-45: dran pa gzhan du brjod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-46: thams cad rgyu dang ngo bo yin //
T11TD4221.1E:270b-47: dbye bas tha dad pa nyid yin //
T11TD4221.1E:271a-0: tha dad par smra ba'i ltar na ni rgyu tha dad pas rang gi @271a * //
T11TD4221.1E:271a-1: ngo bo tha dad pa'i phyir na /
T11TD4221.1E:271a-2: thams cad tha dad pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:271a-3: de la dran pa ni bag chags tsam las skyes pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:271a-4: dbang po'i shes pa ni de lta ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:271a-5: dran pa ni lkog tu gyur ba'i yul can yin gyi dbang po las skyes pa'i rig pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:271a-6: des na 'di dag ni ka ba la sogs pa'i ltar tha dad pa'i phyir na /
T11TD4221.1E:271a-7: phyi'i don du smra ba rang gi khas len pas rtogs par byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:271a-8: tha dad pa med par smra ba la ni rnam par dbye ba 'di ga la yod de rgyu dang ldan pa nyid ni rig par med de /
T11TD4221.1E:271a-9: mngon sum gyis de mi 'dzin phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:271a-10: rjes su dpag pa'ang mngon sum ni //
T11TD4221.1E:271a-12: mngon sum gyis ni snga ma dang //
T11TD4221.1E:271a-13: phyi ma'i dngos po gnyis 'dzin pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:271a-14: 'bras bur 'dod pa 'dzin pa'i dus su ni /
T11TD4221.1E:271a-15: rgyur mngon par 'dod pa dran pa tsam du zad la /
T11TD4221.1E:271a-16: gang gi tshe ni rang gi ngo bo kho nar 'dzin gyi 'bras bur ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:271a-17: 'bras bu 'dzin pa'i dus na yang 'das pas dran pa tsam gyi spyod yul yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:271a-18: nyams su ma myong ba dran pa ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:271a-19: rgyu nyid nyams su myong ba yang med pas ji ltar dran par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:271a-20: 'on te 'bras bu'i dus su yang de nyams su myong ba mi srid pa'i phyir dus mtshungs pa yin pas rnam par dbye bar mi nus pa'i phyir tha mi dad pa nyid yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:271a-21: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por ga la 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:271a-22: 'on te 'di ni sngar yang yan 'gar du nyams su myong bar 'gyur te zhes dran pas rnam par 'jog go //
T11TD4221.1E:271a-23: des na rnam par dbyer yod pas tha dad pa nyid do zhe na ci ste dran pa de ci zhig rjes su dpag pa yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:271a-25: re zhig gal te rjes su dpag pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:271a-26: ci ltar mngon sum med par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:271a-27: mngon sum gyis ni sngar snga ma nyid du gzung ba med do //
T11TD4221.1E:271a-28: mngon sum thams cad ni da ltar ba 'dzin pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:271a-29: 'o na mngon sum gyis dus nges pa nyid gzhan dang ma 'dres par bzung ba gang yin pa de nyid bzung ba phyi ma la ltos nas snga ma zhes tha snyad byed pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:271a-31: gzhan la ltos nas snga ma yi //
T11TD4221.1E:271a-33: de phyir nges ni snga ma nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:271a-34: mi 'dzin rang bdag la gnas phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:271b-0: rang gi dus kyi rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pa'i mngon sum snga ma gzhan la ltos pa'i bdag @271b nyid ji ltar 'dzin par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:271b-1: mngon sum phyi ma yang de bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:271b-2: des na snga ma dang phyi ma la ltos pa 'di ni snga ma dang phyi ma'i mngon sum gyis gzung ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:271b-3: des na de la dran pa yang ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:271b-4: des na ltos pa ni mngon sum dang /
T11TD4221.1E:271b-5: dran pas kyang rtogs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:271b-6: de'i phyir rigs pa ma yin pa la gang las rjes su dpag pa 'jug /'on te dran pa tsam yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:271b-7: de ni tshad ma ma yin pas gang gis snga ma phyi ma la ltos pa'i 'bras bu rig par 'gyur ba de las rtogs par ji ltar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:271b-8: 'on te tshogs pa'i stobs las de nyid 'di yin no snyam du shes pas gcig nyid du gzung ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:271b-9: des na rnam par 'byed pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:271b-10: de nyid 'di yin no zhes bya ba yang dran pa dang nyams su myong ba'i rang bzhin gyi shes pa gnyis yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:271b-14: 'dzin pa mthong ba ni ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:271b-16: 'o na dran par bya ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:271b-19: shing rta bzhin du ji ltar ma rtogs she na /
T11TD4221.1E:271b-20: gal te rnam par brtags na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:271b-21: de lta bu kho nar rtogs so //
T11TD4221.1E:271b-22: dran pa dang mngon sum gyi rnam pa dag ni gcig tu rtogs pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:271b-24: de dag nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:271b-26: snga ma dang phyi ma dag ni gcig tu rtogs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:271b-27: dran pa'i rnam pas ni rtogs pa'i don snga ma yin no zhes bya bar mi nus la /
T11TD4221.1E:271b-28: mngon sum du byas na ni da ltar ba nyid du 'gyur gyi snga ma la ni ma yin no zhes bya bar rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:271b-29: 'on te tha snyad 'dogs pa'i phyir gcig nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:271b-30: 'dis ni mun khung du gar byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:271b-31: don gzhan nam cig shos ni /
T11TD4221.1E:271b-32: rtogs par sgrub par byed pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:271b-33: rtogs pas sgrub pa ma yin pa //
T11TD4221.1E:271b-34: tha snyad las ni ci ltar grub //
T11TD4221.1E:271b-35: cig tha snyad tshad ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:271b-36: 'on te tshang ma ma yin na mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir na /
T11TD4221.1E:271b-37: sgrub par byed pa ma yin no zhes bstan zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:271b-38: de ste tshad ma ma yin na de las ji ltar tha dad pa grub ces smos shig / tha dad pa med na 'o na ji ltar tha snyad du 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:271b-39: 'di ni tha dad pa la yang mtshungs so //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-1: pa las tha dad pa'i thob par bya ba yod pas de don du gnyer ba 'jug pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-2: tha dad pa med pa la ni 'brel pa med pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:272a-4: tha dad yin yang gal te de //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-5: shes na ci'i phyir 'jug par byed //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-6: 'on te ma shes mo gsham gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-8: de yod 'di ni med phyir na //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-9: de nyid ga las 'dod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-10: reg pa la sogs sngar mthong phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-11: snga ma kho nar zhugs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-12: da ltar rig pa med pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-13: ji lta bur na 'jug pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-14: rjes su dpag pas rig ce na //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-16: de yi spyi ni rig ce na //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-18: gal te spyi tha dad med na //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-20: tha dad tha mi dad ci ltar //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-21: tha dad de la ji ltar 'jug //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-22: ji ltar tha mi dad pa de //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-23: thob phyir ci phyir der 'jug byed //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-24: 'jug pa mthong nyid ce na ci //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-25: mngon sum las sam 'on te gzhan //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-26: rang don rig phyir mngon sum gyis //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-28: 'jug pa snga phyir rang bzhin yin //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-29: de la mngon sum rig pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-30: mngon sum med par rjes dpag nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-31: des kyang 'jug pa rig ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-32: gnyis med pa la 'jug pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-33: ji ltar zhes bya'i rtsod pa'ang bsal //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-34: gnod sbyin ji bzhin gtor ma yang //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-35: yin phyir gang zhig gang dang 'brel //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-36: 'dis ni gnyis med pa la ji ltar gzhan rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'jug pa yin zhes bya ba de yang gsal ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:272a-37: 'di la don dam par rnam par dbye ba yod pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-38: 'dri bar byed pa bdag dang 'chad par byed pa gzhan 'di gnyi ga yang rang gi rnam pas nye bar bsgyur ba'i shes pa yang dag par rig pa nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:272a-39: des na rnam par dbye ba med de /
T11TD4221.1E:272a-40: rmi lam gyi rtogs pa bzhin dang /
T11TD4221.1E:272a-41: smyon pa'i rtogs pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-42: 'o na ni smra ba bo smyon par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:272a-43: de las gnyis med pa yang ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:272a-44: 'dir rtogs pa thams cad spang ba la zhugs pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:272a-45: 'di la rtogs pa skye ba ni yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:272a-46: 'on rgol ba'am gzhan gyis bya ba ci zhig yod ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:272a-47: ci byed pa 'ga' zhig mthong ngam /
T11TD4221.1E:272a-48: ci ltar mthong ba med pa de ltar yang bstan zin pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:272b-0: 'o na @272b ji ltar dngos po rgyu med par yod ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:272b-1: khyed kyis dngos po gang zhig 'dir //
T11TD4221.1E:272b-2: rgyu las yod par rtogs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:272b-3: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ni //
T11TD4221.1E:272b-4: rtogs pa med ces bsgrubs zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:272b-5: 'o na yod pa glo bur ba yin pas 'di re 'ga' yang 'ga' zhig tu ldog par mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:272b-7: rgyu med gzhan la mi ltos phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:272b-8: rtag tu yod pa'am med par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:272b-12: yod pa ldog par 'gyur ba de //
T11TD4221.1E:272b-13: khyod kyis gang yang rtogs sam ci //
T11TD4221.1E:272b-14: ci ste res 'ga' bas she na //
T11TD4221.1E:272b-15: 'di ni glen pa'i smra ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:272b-16: de ni tha dad par smra ba la lan bstan pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:272b-17: don dam par ni rnam par dbyer med kyang blo'i bdag nyid yin no zhes bya ba 'di nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:272b-18: de'i phyir sna tshogs su snang ba ni blo gcig nyid do zhes bya bar gnas so //
T11TD4221.1E:272b-19: ci ste blo bzhin du snam bu la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du sna tshogs pa yang gcig kho na yin par ci 'gal zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:272b-20: ras sogs gzugs ni gcig yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:272b-22: gal te ras la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnam par dbyer med pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:272b-23: de lta na ni nge blo'i rang bzhin nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:272b-24: blo dang chos mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:272b-25: 'di ltar blo ni gzhan gyis mthong ba ma yin /
T11TD4221.1E:272b-27: bkag pas dum bur 'gyur ba yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:272b-28: gal te phyi rol gyi don yang de lta bu yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:272b-29: de lta bu ni de blo nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:272b-30: phyi rol zhes bya ba de lta bu ni ming tsam du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:272b-31: ci ste bkag pa na gzhan kho na zhig de ltar skyes pa yin pas de dang ldan pa gang yin pa de phyed la sogs par mthong ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:272b-32: des na dngos po gang ji ltar skyes pa de de bzhin nyid du dmigs pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:272b-34: sems min sna tshogs rnam pa yang //
T11TD4221.1E:272b-35: ji ltar gcig tu 'gyur ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:272b-37: ci lta ci ltar mthong ba de //
T11TD4221.1E:272b-38: gal te de ltar skyes na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:272b-39: de ni lkog dang gzhan gyis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:272b-40: mthong ba'i dngos por ma skyes 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:272b-41: rgyu gzhan gyis ni bskyed bya ba //
T11TD4221.1E:272b-42: de bzhin min zhes rtogs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:272b-43: rnam par shes pa'i rgyu dag las //
T11TD4221.1E:272b-44: skyes pa rnam par shes pa nyid dngos po ni lkog tu gyur pa nyid du ma mthong la /
T11TD4221.1E:273a-0: gzhan gyis mthong bar yang mthong ba ma @273a * //
T11TD4221.1E:273a-2: / rgyu gzhan las byung ba yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:273a-3: de ni 'dzin pa'i rnam pa dang 'dra ba mig la sogs pa'i rgyu ma kho na las 'jug pa yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:273a-4: ji ltar rnam par shes pa ma yin pa nyid yin /
T11TD4221.1E:273a-5: 'on te dmigs pa gang ji snyed pa de thams cad ni don kho na yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:273a-6: bde ba la sogs pa la yang rigs pa'i rang bzhin ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang de ni rang gi dngos po nyid ces gzhan dag zer ba /
T11TD4221.1E:273a-9: gal te dmigs pa thams cad ni //
T11TD4221.1E:273a-10: dngos po yin par rtog na go //
T11TD4221.1E:273a-11: dmigs ma yin pa'i shes pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:273a-12: yod pa tshad can min par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:273a-13: gang gis gzung ba dmigs pa de //
T11TD4221.1E:273a-14: shes yin zhe na de yang min //
T11TD4221.1E:273a-15: de lta yin na rang nyid kyis //
T11TD4221.1E:273a-16: dmigs pa rig pa nyid du 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:273a-17: gal te 'dzin pa ma dmigs na de yod do zhes bya ba ga las /
T11TD4221.1E:273a-18: dmigs par bya ba nyid du dmigs pa'i phyir dmigs pa po'am /
T11TD4221.1E:273a-19: dmigs par byed pa rjes su dpog go //
T11TD4221.1E:273a-20: de lta ma yin na 'di gang gis dmigs zhes rgol zhing brtags par 'jug par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:273a-21: gal te don gyis go bar med na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:273a-23: de'i phyir don gyis go bas rnam par shes pa yod par rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:273a-25: rang dam 'on te gzhan gyis zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:273a-26: dmigs pa nyid du dpyad bya'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:273a-27: 'on te gzhan gyis dmigs bya ba //
T11TD4221.1E:273a-28: gtan tshigs gang gis dmigs par byed //
T11TD4221.1E:273a-29: gal te de yang gzhan gyis na //
T11TD4221.1E:273a-30: de lta na ni thug med 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:273a-31: rang nyid kyis ni dmigs yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:273a-32: gzung ba la yang thal bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:273a-33: bdag bzhin bzung ba'i dngos po kun //
T11TD4221.1E:273a-34: rang nyid rtogs pa'i ngo bor 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:273a-35: 'on te bdag nyid rang nyid rtogs pa'i rang bzhin du dmigs la /
T11TD4221.1E:273a-36: gzugs la sogs pa ni gzhan la ltos par dmigs pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:273a-37: 'di ni ngas dmigs pa'am gzhan gyis zhes bya ba'i tha snyad nges pa'i phyir ro /
T11TD4221.1E:273a-39: gal te gzhan la ltos she na //
T11TD4221.1E:273a-40: ci ltar gzhan ni rig mi 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:273a-41: gzhan ltos de ni gzhan med par //
T11TD4221.1E:273a-42: gzhan ltos nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:273a-43: the tshom za na gzhan ltos pa //
T11TD4221.1E:273a-44: the tshom nyid 'gyur nges ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:273a-45: gtan tshigs nges ba ma yin pas //
T11TD4221.1E:273a-46: nges par byed pa yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:273b-0: @273b 'on te bya ba bdag la ltos //
T11TD4221.1E:273b-1: 'on te bdag la rig bya ba //
T11TD4221.1E:273b-2: rang rig pas ni rig byar grub //
T11TD4221.1E:273b-3: de tsam gyis ni rdzogs pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:273b-4: de las gzhan pa'i blo yong min //
T11TD4221.1E:273b-5: bdag bzhin mtha' dag rang rig par //
T11TD4221.1E:273b-6: 'gyur te gzhan rig yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:273b-7: 'on te ci ltar nga ni bdag dang /
T11TD4221.1E:273b-8: byed pa po dang shes pa po yin no zhes gzhi mthun par byed pa de bzhin du /
T11TD4221.1E:273b-12: shing rta yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur la /
T11TD4221.1E:273b-13: de bzhin du nga'i rig pa zhes bya ba de bzhin du /
T11TD4221.1E:273b-14: nga'i gzugs dang reg pa dang dri yin no zhes bya bar yang 'gyur ro snyam na /
T11TD4221.1E:273b-16: gal te gzhi mthun dbang gis na //
T11TD4221.1E:273b-17: gcig pa nyid du 'gyur na go //
T11TD4221.1E:273b-18: bdag ni dkar sham zhes de ltar //
T11TD4221.1E:273b-19: gzhi mthun nyid 'gyur yin nam ci //
T11TD4221.1E:273b-20: gal te gang la gzhi mthun pa yod pa der /
T11TD4221.1E:273b-21: gdon mi za bar gcig tu 'gyur la de med pas du mar 'gyur na de'i tshe des du ma nyid 'grub par 'gyur gyi bzlog par mi 'gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:273b-22: de bzhin du sgra gcan gyi mgo zhes gzhi mthun pa la yang med pas tha dad par grub par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:273b-23: gal te tha dad med mthong bas //
T11TD4221.1E:273b-24: sgra gcan gyi mgo zhes 'di gnod //
T11TD4221.1E:273b-25: 'dir yang tha dang sgro btags la //
T11TD4221.1E:273b-26: gnod par byed pa rang rig yod //
T11TD4221.1E:273b-27: ci ltar sgra gcan gyi mgo zhes tha dad par sgro btags pa de las bzlog par dmigs pas gnod pa de bzhin du /
T11TD4221.1E:273b-28: nga yi rig pa nga yi gzugs /
T11TD4221.1E:273b-29: mthong ba zhes bya ba las rang rig pa tsam gyis gnod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:273b-30: tha dad pa ltar sngon po dang lus dang bde ba la sogs pa ni rig pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:273b-31: rang gi ngo bo rig par bsgrubs ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:273b-32: gang gis rig bya rig pa dag //
T11TD4221.1E:273b-33: tha dad par ni rtogs 'gyur ba //
T11TD4221.1E:273b-34: rig pa'i don dang shes pa dag / gzhi mthun mthong ba med dam ci //
T11TD4221.1E:273b-35: gal te don dam par tha dad pa mthong ba med na /
T11TD4221.1E:273b-36: 'o na tha dad par sgro 'dogs par yang ci ltar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:273b-37: rgyu mtshan med par skye ba ni 'ga' yang med do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:273b-39: ldog pa dag las rab tu brtags //
T11TD4221.1E:273b-40: rjes 'gro ldog pa rig pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:273b-41: thog med bag chags 'brel las yin //
T11TD4221.1E:273b-42: gzugs la sogs pa ni med kyang gzhan gyis nges par btags pa yin zhing /
T11TD4221.1E:274a-1: na yang yod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:274a-2: des na yul dang dus rang /
T11TD4221.1E:274a-3: rang bzhin dang 'brel pa las tha dad par rtogs pa la 'jug pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:274a-4: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag ni don dam par rig pa ma yin no zhes bstan zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:274a-6: mngon sum gyis ni rjes 'gro dang //
T11TD4221.1E:274a-7: rang bzhin nyid ni rig pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:274a-8: yod dang med pa'i rnam dbye ni //
T11TD4221.1E:274a-9: rig med rig par mngon par rlom //
T11TD4221.1E:274a-10: 'ga' zhig rig par med kyang rig par mngon par rlom pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:274a-12: 'di ni ngas byas pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:274a-13: 'di ni ngas mthong ba yin no zhes bya ba bzhin te /
T11TD4221.1E:274a-14: de la rig pa ni 'das pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:274a-15: mngon par rlom pa ni brjod na 'gyur ba yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:274a-16: brjod pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig phyin ci log tu sgro 'dogs pa'o zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:274a-18: 'du byed tha dad pa'o zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:274a-20: 'du byed pa ni snga na med par zad pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:274a-21: bden pa ni zad par bya mi nus so zhes bstan zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:274a-22: gal te 'du byed pa zad pa phyin ci log tu sgro 'dogs pa'i rgyu yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:274a-23: tha dad par sgro 'dogs pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:274a-25: ldeg par sgro 'dogs pa la yang de ltar 'gyur ba'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:274a-27: mngon par rlom pa las ma gtogs pa don dam par ni rjes su 'gro ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:274a-28: ldog pa rtogs pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:274a-29: mtha' dag ni mngon par rlom pa tsam du tha dad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:274a-30: de'i phyir snga ma dang phyi ma dag rnam par dben par gzung yang gcig tu khas blang bar bya ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:274a-31: de lta ma yin na shes pa tsam du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:274a-32: de khas blang bar nus pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:274a-34: tha dad can ni rnam gsal ba //
T11TD4221.1E:274a-35: tha dad med pa gzhan mthong med //
T11TD4221.1E:274a-36: ma mthong ba ni yod do zhes khas blang bar nus pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:274a-37: de med par ni tha dad pa'i yan lag rnams tha dad pa med pa'i yan lag can gyi yin no zhes bstan par nus pa ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:274a-38: de'i phyir phyi rol gyi don khas len pas cig car nyid du 'dzin pa nyid khas blang bar bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:274a-39: gal te du ma gcig gis ji ltar 'dzin te /
T11TD4221.1E:274a-40: gcig pa zhugs pa'i mthong ba gang yin pa nyid ni de nyid kyi tshe gzhan la 'jug par nus pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:274b-0: du ma mthong ba nyid yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes gang @274b bstan zin pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:274b-1: don dam par ni rang rig pa gcig nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:274b-2: gzhan gyis gzhan 'dzin pa ni mi srid do //
T11TD4221.1E:274b-3: gzhan yang 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni 'ga' yang med kyi 'on kyang blo de'i rnam par bskyed pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:274b-4: du ma gcig gi skyed par byed pa ma yin pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:274b-6: gal te dbang po la sogs bzhin //
