T11TD4221.1E:274b-7: khyad par skyes 'gyur mang po dag / cig car blo yi rgyur 'gyur yang //
T11TD4221.1E:274b-8: 'gal ba dag ni ci zhig yod //
T11TD4221.1E:274b-9: ci ltar dbang po dang don dang yid la byed pa'am /
T11TD4221.1E:274b-11: yid phrad pa las cig car dbang po'i rnam par shes pa de bzhin du gal te ;
T11TD4221.1E:274b-12: rdul phra rab dag kyang yin na mi 'gal te rdul phra rab dag mi rtag pa nyid yin yang khyad par ci zhig yod /
T11TD4221.1E:274b-13: lhan cig byed pa nyer zin kyang rdul phra rab dag ni chen por 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:274b-14: phra mo nyid mi 'dor ro zhe na ni ltar bzung ba yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:274b-16: 'dir ni chen po khyad par min //
T11TD4221.1E:274b-17: khyad par de ni nus pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:274b-18: nus pa med phyir rgyur mi 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:274b-19: chen po min phyir 'dod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:274b-20: gal te rang gi ngo bo'i rjes su byed pa'i blo skyed pa'i rdul phra rab dag bltar rung ba nyid yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:274b-21: de ni med pa'i phyir grub pa la sgrub pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:274b-22: 'on te rnam par shes pa tsam skyed pa yin na de ni yod pa kho na ste /
T11TD4221.1E:274b-23: skra shad la sogs pa dag la mthong ba'i phyir 'gal ba med do //
T11TD4221.1E:274b-24: dper na yul thag ring por ma 'dres pa'i skra yang sbom po gcig tu snang ba bzhin du rdul phra rab dag kyang yin pa'i phyir 'gal ba med do //
T11TD4221.1E:274b-25: yan 'gar ba bzhin du phra mos de yang ci ltar skyed par byed ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:274b-26: yan 'gar ba rnams ni mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:274b-27: nus pa med pa nyid rgyu'i dngos po 'gal gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:274b-28: phra mo nyid ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:274b-30: tshogs pa'i gnas skabs na dbang po la sogs pa rnams la rags pa nyid kyi khyad par skye ba med pa de lta na yang nus pa'i khyad par nyid las skyed par byed pa nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:274b-31: 'o na nye ba na gnas pa gzhan gyi nus pa de ci ltar mi mthong na ci ltar yod pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:274b-32: mtshungs pa nyid yin na de 'bras bu gcig skyed par byed kyi gzhan ma yin no zhes bya ba'i rnam par dbye bar yang ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:275a-0: yul thag ring ba la sogs pa lhan cig @275a * //
T11TD4221.1E:275a-1: byed pa'i rnam par dbye ba las so //
T11TD4221.1E:275a-2: gal te yul thag ring po nyid kyis kyang skra de nyid rnam par dbye bar gal 'gyur zhe na tshogs pa gzhan rjes su zhugs pa'i phyir ro zhes 'di ni dpyad zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:275a-3: gal te rgyu yin pa'i phyir 'dzin na mig la sogs pa yang gzung ba nyid du thal te /
T11TD4221.1E:275a-4: rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:275a-6: rgyu yi dngos po ma gtogs pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:275a-7: bzung ba zhes bya gzhan ci'ang med //
T11TD4221.1E:275a-8: de la blo ni gang du snang //
T11TD4221.1E:275a-9: de ni de yi bzung bar brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:275a-10: gzugs kyi skye mched du mtshungs pas na de'i rnam pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:275a-11: don dam par ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:275a-12: 'di ltar sngon po'i rdul phra rab kyi tshogs las rnam par shes pa sngon po'i rnam pa nyid du 'gyur ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:275a-13: rdul phra rab kyi rnam pa nyid du ni 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:275a-14: gal te rdul phra rab kyi rnam pa mi snang na sngon po'i rnam pa 'di rdul phra rab rnams kyi yin no zhes bya ba ga las yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:275a-15: gzhan du mi 'thad pa'i phyir de ltar skyon med do //
T11TD4221.1E:275a-16: gal te ci car du ma mi 'dzin na de'i tshe skyon gzhan 'di yod do zhes gang bshad pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:275a-17: ji ltar rang gi yan lag bcas //
T11TD4221.1E:275a-18: cig car yan lag can gzung yin //
T11TD4221.1E:275a-19: mi 'dzin pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:275a-21: lkog shal sogs mthong med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:275a-22: ba lang shes par mthong ba med //
T11TD4221.1E:275a-23: gal te yon tan gtso bo dag / cig car rtogs par 'dod na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:275a-24: cig car yan lag rdzogs 'dzin min //
T11TD4221.1E:275a-25: yon tan la sogs ldan pa'ang min //
T11TD4221.1E:275a-26: gang zhig khyad par nyid du 'dod pa'i cha de nyid du gzung ba'i phyir yan lag rdzogs par mi 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:275a-27: de dag thams cad khyad par 'dod do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:275a-29: khyad par dang ni khyad par can //
T11TD4221.1E:275a-30: brjod par 'dod pa'i gzhan dbang phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:275a-31: yan lag nyid du 'gyur ba gang //
T11TD4221.1E:275a-33: khyad par dang khyad par can gyi dngos po don dam pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:275a-34: gzhan dag gam de nyid kyi gzhan gyi tshe /
T11TD4221.1E:275a-35: khyad par nyid khyad par nyid khyad par can du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:275a-36: 'di ltar rva can ba lang dang /
T11TD4221.1E:275a-40: gru bzhi ma yin no zhes rtogs pa sna tshogs par mthong gi dus gcig tu khyad par thams cad 'dzin pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:275b-0: ci car du ma khyad par nyid du bzung bar mi nus pa'i @275b phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:275b-1: rnam par rtog pa med pas ni khyad par dang khyad par can gyi dngos po 'dzin pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:275b-3: rang gi dngos po gzhan dag las //
T11TD4221.1E:275b-4: tha dad med phyir yon tan rdzogs //
T11TD4221.1E:275b-5: tha dad byed pa'ang ma bzung phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:275b-6: gzhan gzhan mthong yang blo gcig 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:275b-7: ba lang rang nyid kyis ni ba lang ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:275b-8: ba lang ma yin pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:275b-9: ba lang nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir ba lang yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:275b-10: de bzhin du dkar po nyid kyis ni dkar po'am dkar po ma yin pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:275b-11: dkar po nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir dkar po yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:275b-12: des na yon tan la sogs pa tha dad par byed pa cig car ma bzung ba'i phyir gzhan dang gzhan mthong yang gcig nyid kyi blor 'gyur zhing phyis ni yon tan 'ba' zhig mthong ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:275b-13: ci ste yon tan bzung ba'i phyir na phyis tha dad pa'i blor 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:275b-15: yon tan la sogs khyad par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:275b-16: gzung phyir du mar rtogs 'gyur na //
T11TD4221.1E:275b-17: 'gyur mod de ltar yin na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:275b-19: sngar rdzas gcig tu bzung nas phyis khyad par bzung yang tha dad par sbyor ba med pa'i phyir 'chol bar thal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:275b-20: 'di ltar gcig nyid du bzung na phyis gcig nyid la khyad par du ma sbyar bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir na /
T11TD4221.1E:275b-21: khyad par du ma yang gcig gi yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:275b-22: yul dad pas tha dad par sbyar ba ni gcig tu mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:275b-24: yul tha dad pa la yang khyad par yin pa'i phyir yul tha dad pa de yang gcig gi yin no zhes bya bar yang 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:275b-25: de'i phyir du ma dus gcig tu 'dzin pa ma yin la phyis gzung ba'i khyad par ni gang gi yin pa mi shes par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:275b-26: khyad par tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa'i phyogs la ni tha dad pa 'ga' yang med pa'i phyir 'brel pa 'chol bar shin tu gsal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:275b-27: grangs can gyi lta ba la ni /
T11TD4221.1E:275b-28: sgra stsogs du ma nyid yin phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:275b-30: bkod pa can ni ma bzung bar //
T11TD4221.1E:275b-31: bkod pa 'dzin pa mi rung phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:275b-32: bum pa la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad ni de tsam lnga'i gnas pa'i khyad par ram /
T11TD4221.1E:275b-33: yon tan gsum gyi bdag nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:276a-1: na sgra la sogs par gzung ba na yon tan gsum gzung ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:276a-3: de ma bzung bar ni de'i gnas pa 'dzin par mi srid de /
T11TD4221.1E:276a-4: sor mo ma bzung bar khu chur mi 'dzin pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:276a-5: 'bras bu gzhan gcig nyid skyed pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:276a-6: 'bras bu thams cad rgyu las tha mi dad par 'dod pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:276a-7: yongs su gyur pa'i phyogs de dag gis 'dod pa yin gyi 'bras bu'i phyogs ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:276a-8: yongs su gyur ba ni de nyid las ma nyams pa'i chos gzhan yongs su gtong ba dang gzhan skye ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:276a-9: de la sgra'i yongs su gyur pa ni nam mkha'o //
T11TD4221.1E:276a-10: sgra dang rig pa yongs su gyur pa ni rlung ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:276a-11: sgra dang reg pa dang gzugs yongs su gyur pa ni me'o //
T11TD4221.1E:276a-12: sgra dang reg pa dang gzugs dang ro yongs su gyur pa ni chu'o //
T11TD4221.1E:276a-13: sgra dang reg pa dang ro dang /
T11TD4221.1E:276a-14: dri yongs su gyur pa ni sa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:276a-15: de ltar na bum pa la sogs pa dag ni du ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:276a-16: de bzung na du ma bzung ba zhes bya bar grub bo //
T11TD4221.1E:276a-17: lan lhag pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:276a-18: de'i phyir cig car du ma bzung ba yang rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:276a-19: mngon sum rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid do zhes bya bar gnas so //
T11TD4221.1E:276a-20: gal te mngon sum rtog pa med pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:276a-21: 'o na ci ltar chos dang chos can la sogs pa mngon sum gyis 'dzin /
T11TD4221.1E:276a-22: chos can mngon sum gyis ma bzung na yang rjes su dpag pa 'jug pa med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:276a-23: chos can yang rjes su dpag pas 'dzin na ni de la yang chos can gzhan dgos pas thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:276a-24: chos can bzung na ni chos du ma dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid de 'dzin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:276a-25: ci ltar rnam par rtog pa med pa yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:276a-27: chos can du ma'i ngo bo ni //
T11TD4221.1E:276a-28: rnam kun dbang po las rtogs min //
T11TD4221.1E:276a-29: rang bzhin rig bya bstan min pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:276a-30: ngo bo dbang po'i spyod yul yin //
T11TD4221.1E:276a-31: gzugs la sogs pa'i chos du ma dang ldan pa'i chos can ni 'ga' yang dbang po'i shes pas 'dzin pa ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:276a-32: 'on kyang rang nyid kyis rig par bya ba'i rang bzhin dang byed pa pos yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:276a-33: rang bzhin de nyid ni dbang po'i yul yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:276a-35: gzugs sogs phan tshun dben par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:276a-36: mig la sogs pa dag gis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:276b-1: nyid do rtog pa med phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:276b-2: gzugs la sogs pa'i chos can ni //
T11TD4221.1E:276b-3: dbang po'i shes pas dmigs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:276b-4: phan tshun tha dad pa'i gzugs la sogs pa nyid du bzung ba las gzhan pa'i gzhi 'am de la brten pa ni 'dzin pa'i spyod yul du gyur pa med do zhes bya ba 'di ni bshad zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:276b-5: gal te bdag gis mthong ba gang yin pa de nyid reg pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa rtogs pa las gzhi gcig pa nyid dam rtogs pa yin no zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:276b-6: ngo shes pa ni mngon sum ma yin no zhes bstan zin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:276b-7: gzugs dang reg pa'i shes pas sad par byas pa'i thog ma med pa'i bag chags las de lta bu'i shes pa skye ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:276b-9: mig ni gzugs tsam nyid dang ni //
T11TD4221.1E:276b-10: gzhan ni reg pa tsam nyid dag //
T11TD4221.1E:276b-11: rig phyir rig pa 'jug pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:276b-12: ces bya ba ni mthong ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:276b-13: de dag phan tshun 'dus pa gzhan gyis ni dmigs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:276b-14: reg pa nyid mthong ba yin no zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:276b-15: reg pa ni gzugs la 'jug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:276b-16: gal te don gcig la 'jug par rtogs na de lta na ni gcig tu grub par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:276b-17: gal te mthong ba'i dkar po nyid reg pas dri ma can du byed pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:276b-18: lag pas bzung bar dmigs pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:276b-19: de ci ltar don gcig la 'jug pa ma yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:276b-20: 'di ni nam mkha'i go skabs su ka sha dbyangs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:276b-21: gang tshe dngos de reg pa dang //
T11TD4221.1E:276b-22: gang gi reg pa yul gyur pa //
T11TD4221.1E:276b-23: de tshe des rtogs med ce na //
T11TD4221.1E:276b-24: rjes su dpag pa sgrub byed min //
T11TD4221.1E:276b-25: phan tshun 'dzin par byed pa'i mngon sum dag 'jug pa med na mngon sum gyi tha dad par yongs su bcad pas rjes su dpag pa stong phrag kyang nus pa'i lam du 'jug pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:276b-26: 'on te de nyid la reg go zhes bya ba 'di ni yid kyi mngon sum yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:276b-27: dbang po las skyes pa nyid tshad ma yin pa'i phyir tshad ma 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:276b-28: dbang po las skyes pa yang don la mi 'khrul pa las tshad ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:276b-29: dbang po las skyes pa'i phyir ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:276b-30: yid las skyes pa'i phyir zhes bya ba yang srid pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:276b-32: gang nyid mthong zhes rtogs pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:277a-0: rjes dpag med na tshu rol @277a * //
T11TD4221.1E:277a-2: / mthong ba 'ga' yang rtogs ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:277a-3: de la 'ga' zhig sngar mthong ba nyid reg pa yin no zhes khyed kyis ci ltar rtogs zhes /
T11TD4221.1E:277a-4: gal te brgal zhing brtag pa byed na de'i tshe ji skad bya /
T11TD4221.1E:277a-5: de lta bu nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'am ci mthong ba gang yin pa ni reg pa'i dus na ma mthong na de ci ltar na de nyid la reg go zhes bya bar rtogs /
T11TD4221.1E:277a-6: gang gis de dri ma can du byas pa de'i phyir de yin par shes so zhes bya ba'i rnges su dpag pa bstan pa de nyid kyang 'dir lan ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:277a-7: 'o na ci ltar ma reg par nyams par byed ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:277a-8: reg pa nyid na 'o na 'di dkar po'i zhes ci'i phyir mi rtogs /
T11TD4221.1E:277a-9: reg pa la dkar po dang cig shos dag mtshungs pa dang mi mtshungs pa'i rang bzhin rang yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:277a-10: lan ni 'di ni bzang po ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:277a-11: mtshungs pa dang mi mtshungs pa'i dngos po gcig ces bya ba ni bab chol yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:277a-12: gang gi phyir len pa mtshungs pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:277a-13: gzugs mtshungs pa ma yin pa des na de dag gcig pa nyid du mi rigs te /
T11TD4221.1E:277a-14: 'gal ba'i chos gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:277a-15: ci ste rtogs so zhe na de la rnam par dpyad par bya ste /
T11TD4221.1E:277a-16: ci rnam pa gcig tu rtogs sam /
T11TD4221.1E:277a-17: 'on te rnam pa du mar rtogs /
T11TD4221.1E:277a-18: rnam pa du mar rtogs na ci ltar gcig yin /
T11TD4221.1E:277a-19: 'on te rnam pa gcig tu'o zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:277a-20: de ni mi bden te reg pa rtogs pa na ma rtogs pa'i gzugs rnam pa gcig go zhes ci ltar 'dzin /
T11TD4221.1E:277a-21: rtogs pa dang ma rtogs pa ni bzung ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:277a-22: ma rtogs pa nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:277a-23: de'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa tha dad pa na yan lag can zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig ni yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:277a-24: de'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa ni rang gi ngo bos rig par bya ba yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:277a-25: phan tshun gyi ngo bos ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:277a-26: de bzhin du gzugs ni rang gis rig par bya ba yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:277a-27: gzhan gyis rig par bya ba ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:277a-28: de nyid kyi phyir gzhan la sgras bstan par mi nus pa'i phyir dbang po'i shes pa'i spyod yul ni brjod du med pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:277a-29: gal te dbang po'i spyod yul sgras bstan par mi nus na /
T11TD4221.1E:277a-30: 'on ji ltar bdag gis gang thos pa de nyid mthong ngo zhes rtogs /
T11TD4221.1E:277a-31: bstan par bya ba ma yin pa ni de ltar rtogs par ji ltar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:277a-32: de'i phyir na bstan par bya ba yin no zhes rtogs so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:277b-1: ngo shes pa ni chad ma nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:277b-2: ma yin zhes ni bsgrubs zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:277b-3: des na shes pa de yis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:277b-5: re zhig sgra las rtogs pa'i dus su ni don de snang ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:277b-6: sgra las na don la the tshom za ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:277b-7: de lta ma yin na ni mngon sum gyis rtogs pa bzhin du the tshom dang 'brel par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:277b-8: ci ste sgra las don gyi dngos po dang dngos po med pa thun mong du snang ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:277b-9: des na the tshom za ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:277b-10: mngon sum la yang ci'i phyir de ltar mi 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:277b-11: de la rnam pa'i khyad par nye bar mtshon pa nyid kyis mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:277b-12: 'dir yang snang ba'i khyad par 'dzin pa gang gis bzlog ste khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:277b-13: de lta na ni sgra'i shes pa dngos po'i rang bzhin 'dzin par mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:277b-14: mngon sum dang mi mthun pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:277b-15: gal te rang gi ngo bor rtogs pa yin na ni de mthong ba tshad ma nyid ma yin par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:277b-16: bzung zin pa 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:277b-17: long ba med bar yang 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:277b-18: gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni sgra nyid las rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:277b-19: ci ste spyi'i rnam par rtogs so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:277b-21: mig ser gyis nyams pa'i mig gis kyang /
T11TD4221.1E:277b-22: dkar po ser po'i rnam par rtogs pa de yang thob par byed pa yin pa'i phyir tshad mar thal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:277b-23: de yang tshad mar 'gyur la rag go zhe na ma yin te gnod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:277b-24: ba lang khyer la shog ces bya ba'i shes pa ni gnod pa med pa'i phyir tshad ma nyid do zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:277b-25: de la yang gnod pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:277b-26: ba lang khyer la shog ces bya ba gal te yod pa nyid 'phen pa yin na ni res 'ga' med par yang 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:277b-28: des na khyer te 'ong ba mi srid pa'i phyir na tshad ma ma yin par shin tu gsal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:277b-29: 'on te gal te yod na khyer la shog cig ces bya ba smra ba po'i bsam pa yin na de'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:277b-30: the tshom du khyer te 'ong bar brjod pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:277b-31: the tshom nyid du bskul pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:277b-32: the tshom nyid du bzung ba'i phyir the tshom gyi shes pa thams cad tshad mar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:277b-33: tshad ma ma yin pas ni dngos po 'dzin pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:277b-34: 'o na ji ltar khyer nas 'ongs pa la sogs pa la mi 'khrul pa yod pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:277b-35: 'ga' yang ma byas pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:278a-1: bas ni gdon mi za bar byed pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:278a-2: gzhan yang bya ba la sgra ni byed pa po'am /
T11TD4221.1E:278a-4: byed po yin na mi slu ba //
T11TD4221.1E:278a-5: med phyir tshad ma nyid ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:278a-6: byed pa po mi slu ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha snyad ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:278a-7: thob pa ni byas pa na tshad ma gzhan gyis yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:278a-8: shes par byed pa nyid ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo yod pa ma yin pas ni mi srid do //
T11TD4221.1E:278a-9: med pa'i bya ba ni rang gi ngo bos 'dzin pa ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:278a-10: rang gi ngo bor yod na ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:278a-12: de lta na ni spyi de bya ba med kyang yod pa'i phyir ni spyi rtogs pa na bya ba la 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:278a-13: de'i phyir sgra ni dbang po'i don gyi shes par byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:278a-14: des na dbang po'i spyod yul ni bstan du med pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:278a-15: 'o na chos can gyi chos du ma nyid du rtogs she na /
T11TD4221.1E:278a-16: chos can thams cad las ldog ba //
T11TD4221.1E:278a-17: gang dang gang las log de las //
T11TD4221.1E:278a-18: tha dad btags pa'i tha dad can //
T11TD4221.1E:278a-19: de ni du ma'i ngo bo nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:278a-20: chos la sogs pa'i tha snyad ni ldog pa'i khyad par btags pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:278a-21: 'di ltar dang po nyid du gser gyi bum pa snang ba na kha dog dang dbyibs la sogs pa las tha dad par snang ba'am de dag las tha dad par snang ngam gcig /'on kyang kha dog la sogs pa'i bdag nyid gcig nyid dngos su snang ba'i spyod yul yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:278a-22: de la da ltar ni rnam pa du ma can gyi don tha dad pa gzhan dang /
T11TD4221.1E:278a-23: gzhan las log pa ma brten nas /
T11TD4221.1E:278a-24: tha snyad kyi lam la gnas pa 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor lhung ba dag dmigs kyis bsal te /
T11TD4221.1E:278a-25: brtags pas tha dad bar 'jog par byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:278a-26: gal te kha dog dang dbyibs kyi khyad par dag tha mi dad pa yin na bum pa sngon po ma yin pa las bum pa sngon po tha dad pa nyid du ci ltar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:278a-27: gal te kha dog dang dbyibs la sogs pa tha mi dad pa nyid yin na de'i tshe bum pa sngon po ma yin pa las sngon po ldog par mi 'gyur te ;
T11TD4221.1E:278a-28: de'i dbyibs kyi bdag nyid can sngon po ma yin pa la sngon por 'gyur dgos te /
T11TD4221.1E:278a-29: dbyibs ni kha dog sngon po las tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:278a-30: dbyibs la sogs pa sngon po ma yin pa yang yod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:278a-31: de'i phyir de dag tha dad do zhes 'jig rten na rtog pa tha dad par snang ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:278b-0: de ltar ni @278b ni tha dad pa don dam par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:278b-1: rtog pa tsam gyis nye bar bkod pa ni don dam par rigs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:278b-2: gal te dkar po nyid la sogs pa de nyid dbyibs kyi bdag nyid ma yin par snang ba yin na ni don dam par tha dad par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:278b-3: don gcig la 'du ba ni tha dad pa ma yin par snang ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:278b-4: tha dad kyang tha mi dad par snang ngo zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:278b-5: gzugs dang ro dag don gcig la 'du ba yin par yang tha dad par snang ba yod pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:278b-6: de la ni dbang po tha dad par gzung bar bya ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:278b-7: gal te 'du bas tha dad pa med par snang bar byed nus pa yin na dbang po tha dad pas gzung ba nyid 'thad par dka'o //
T11TD4221.1E:278b-8: yul gcig pa'i phyir tha dad pa med par snang ngo zhes bya ba ni gzugs dang ro la sogs pas ma nges so //
T11TD4221.1E:278b-9: de bzhin du ba lang nyid la sogs pa las khra bo la sogs pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:278b-10: khra bo nyid la sogs pa las ser skya dang /
T11TD4221.1E:278b-11: khu yul sogs pa tha dad pa ni rtogs pas tha dad par rnam par gzhag pa yin no zhes bya bar gnas so //
T11TD4221.1E:278b-12: de la kha cig tu ni chos can gzugs la sogs pa las tha dad par rtog ste /
T11TD4221.1E:278b-13: dper na bum ba bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:278b-14: gal te bum pa yan lag can gcig med na ni rim gyis gzugs dang /
T11TD4221.1E:278b-15: ro gzung ba na bum par rtogs par mi 'gyur ro zhes so //
T11TD4221.1E:278b-16: kha cig tu ni chos tha dad par rtogs te /
T11TD4221.1E:278b-17: gal te tha mi dad pa dang tha mi dad pa'i ba lang nyid med na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:278b-18: khra bo la sogs pa de dang tha mi dad pa rnams la tha dad par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:278b-19: de bzhin du gzhan la yang sbyar ro //
T11TD4221.1E:278b-20: de'i phyir ldog pa'i khyad par la brten nas tha dad par btags pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:278b-21: rjes su dpag pa dang ldan pa'i tha dad pa yang tha dad pa nyid ma yin nam zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:278b-22: gal te rjes su dpag pa de mngon sum sngon du 'gro ba can yin na ni bden te /
T11TD4221.1E:278b-23: dper na mngon sum la snang ba'i me rjes su dpag par rtogs pa ni de lta bu nyid du 'gyur ba bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:278b-24: chos dang chos can tha dad pa ni nam yang de ltar ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:278b-25: gal ta snang na rjes su dpag pas ci bya zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:278b-26: 'di ni me la yang mtshungs so //
T11TD4221.1E:278b-27: dus gzhan la sogs par rjes su dpog go zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:278b-29: 'on te 'dir rtag tu rjes su dpog par bya ba nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:279a-2: dpe de nyid du gang gis grub //
T11TD4221.1E:279a-3: rjes dpag gzhan gyis grub na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:279a-4: de ni long ba brgyud pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:279a-5: 'on te bum pa la sogs pa snam bu la sogs pa las tha dad pa ni dpe yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:279a-6: 'di ltar gang dang rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa de dag ni tha dad pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:279a-8: snam bu dang shing rta bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:279a-9: kha dog dang dbyibs dag kyang de bzhin no zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:279a-10: rjes su 'gro ba ni der yang mngon sum gyis 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:279a-11: der ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las tha dad pa yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:279a-12: 'o na ji ltar zhe na cig car tha dad par snang ba nyid kyis so //
T11TD4221.1E:279a-13: 'on te rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa med par ni sna tshogs snang ba nyid du 'gyur gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:279a-14: tha dad par ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:279a-15: de lta na ni 'o na gang las kyang tha dad par snang ba nyid kyis so //
T11TD4221.1E:279a-16: 'on te rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa med pa'i phyir gnyis med par thal bas tha dad pa'i grub par byed pa mi 'thad pa shin tu gsal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:279a-18: ma 'dres par ni snang bas na //
T11TD4221.1E:279a-19: bum sogs tha dad gnas pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:279a-20: dbyibs sogs la ni de med nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:279a-21: snam bu sogs dang mtshungs ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:279a-22: ba lang nyid la sogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba ni mngon sum gyis rtogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir de tha dad pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:279a-23: rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:279a-24: gcig tu rtogs pa dang ldan pas ni de dag nyid rjes su 'gro bar tha snyad byas pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:279a-25: de lta na ni 'o na gcig tu rtogs pa'i yul tha dad pa dag las gzhan pa'i spyi yin no zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:279a-26: gcig tu rtogs pa'i yul tha dad par snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:279a-27: tha dad pa dag la gcig tu rtogs pa nyid du ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:279a-29: mthong ba mi 'thad pa nyid min //
T11TD4221.1E:279a-30: ma mthong ba ni 'thad pa min //
T11TD4221.1E:279a-31: mthong dang ma mthong ba dag gis //
T11TD4221.1E:279a-32: yod dang med par rnam par gnas //
T11TD4221.1E:279a-33: gcig tu 'dzin pa ni mthong ba'i phyir na 'thad pa nyid do ;
T11TD4221.1E:279a-34: / de bzhin du ma mthong ba tha dad pa med pa yang 'thad par 'gyur dgos so zhes bya ba 'di ni gnas pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:279a-35: de ni tha dad pa dag la gcig tu 'dzin pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:279a-36: rang gi ngo bo tsam du gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:279a-37: gcig tu 'dzin pa'i 'di ni gang du yang gcig la mthong ba med do //
T11TD4221.1E:279b-0: dmigs @279b pa la 'gyur ba yin na de yang rim pa dang ldan pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:279b-1: skad cig re re ni 'dzin par nus pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:279b-2: so so so sor rig pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:279b-3: de'i phyir thams cad gcig tu 'dzin pa ni dngos po du ma nyid ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:279b-4: des na chos dang chos can mtha' dag ni rtogs pas byas pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:279b-5: de nyid mngon sum gyis gzung ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:279b-8: brtags pa'i rang bzhin tha dad pa //
T11TD4221.1E:279b-9: sna tshogs snang ba de dag ni //
T11TD4221.1E:279b-10: rtog pa med sems sna tshogs min //
T11TD4221.1E:279b-11: res 'ga' ba yi spyod yul min //
T11TD4221.1E:279b-12: mngon sum ni mngon du byed pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:279b-13: btags pa'i yul gyi rnam pa ni de'i yin par rigs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:279b-14: mngon sum gyi snang ba nyid ni don gyi dngos po la ltos pas res 'ga' ba yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:279b-15: rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin gyis snang ba ni res 'ga' ba ma yin pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:279b-16: mngon sum gyi rnam pa ni gcig yin la rnam par rtog pa'i rnam pa ni du ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:279b-17: des na rnam par rtog pa dang mngon sum dag ni rnam pa tha dad pa dang rgyu tha dad pas kyang tha dad pa yin no zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:279b-18: dkar po la sogs pa'i chos kyi khyad par dag rnam par mi rtog pa nyid na yang yod pa ma yin nam de dag ni dbang po'i spyod yul du 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:279b-19: 'di yang rtsod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:279b-21: gal te dkar sogs yod gyur kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:279b-22: dbang po'i spyod yul ci 'dra ba //
T11TD4221.1E:279b-23: de ni sgra yis spyod min te //
T11TD4221.1E:279b-24: shes pa'i rang bzhin tha dad phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:279b-25: dkar po ni dbang po las chos sam chos can nyid du 'ga' yang 'dzin pa med la /
T11TD4221.1E:279b-26: dbyibs la tha dad par yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:279b-27: sgras ni chos can la sogs pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:279b-28: mi gsal ba la sogs pa tha dad du 'dzin pa'i phyir dbang po'i blos ni bstan du med pa'i rang bzhin nyid rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:279b-29: des na shes pa'i rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyir sgra'i blo ni dbang po'i gzung ba la 'jug pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:279b-30: de'i phyir don gcig nyid yin na rang bzhin tha dad par 'thad pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:279b-31: 'on te rten tha dad pas rnam pa tha dad par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:279b-32: 'di ltar mig ser gyi stobs kyis mig gi nus pa dang bral ba dag rten gyi bye brag gis dkar po la yang ser por mthong la /
T11TD4221.1E:280a-0: rab rib can dag gsal ba las gzhan du mthong ba @280a * //
T11TD4221.1E:280a-1: de bzhin du 'dir yang yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:280a-2: don gcig yin yang rnam pa tha dad pas khas len pa la nyes pa med do zhe na de ni med de /
T11TD4221.1E:280a-3: blo rnams don gcig nyid yin yang //
T11TD4221.1E:280a-4: rten sna tshogs pas de 'gyur na //
T11TD4221.1E:280a-5: de ni rna ba la sogs sems //
T11TD4221.1E:280a-6: tha dad don can de gang las ;
T11TD4221.1E:280a-7: / gal te rten tha dad pas rnam pa tha dad par 'gyur srid na /
T11TD4221.1E:280a-8: 'o na ni tha dad pa'i rnam par gnas pa 'jig par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:280a-9: rnam pa tha dad pa ni don gcig na srid pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:280a-11: rna ba la sogs pa rten tha dad pa nyid kyis rnam pa tha dad pa yin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:280a-12: ser po la sogs par snang ba yang 'khrul pa nyid pas sgra la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang de thob par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:280a-13: nus pa'i khyad par yang 'di nyid kyi gsal ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:280a-14: gang gis tha dad par ram gzhan du don rnam pa gzhan du rtogs par 'gyur ba 'di ni sgra nyid kyi nus pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:280a-15: rnam pa gzhan du rtogs pa na 'khrul par ni dpyad par mi bya ste /
T11TD4221.1E:280a-16: de la sgras rnam pa gzhan du rtogs kyang don bya ba byed pa snang ba yin pas na 'di 'khrul par ci ltar rigs /
T11TD4221.1E:280a-17: 'di ltar kha chu la sogs pa'i sgras don de nyid bstan pa ni don bya ba de nyid byed do zhes gang brjod pa /
T11TD4221.1E:280a-18: don bya ba 'di ni don dang 'bral pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:280a-19: 'on kyang goms pa dang 'brel pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:280a-20: dper na du gzhi ba la sogs pa nam mkha' lding bsgom pa dang 'brel pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:280a-21: de'i phyir don gcig nyid dang rten tha dad kyang rnam pa tha dad pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:280a-23: sems kyi rten ni gzhan dang gzhan //
T11TD4221.1E:280a-24: skyes bu phyug kyang gcig nyid kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:280a-25: dngos de rang bzhin sna tshogs su //
T11TD4221.1E:280a-26: snang ba de ni gang las yin //
T11TD4221.1E:280a-27: rten tha dad pas ni shes pa tha dad pa skyed par byed kyi don ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:280a-28: don sngon po la sogs pa gcig nyid yin pas de ni shes pa de la rang bzhin gcig nyid du snang bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:280a-29: med pa ni snang ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:280a-31: 'o na ni de snang ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:280a-32: gzhan snang ba na gzhan snang ngo zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:280a-33: ci ste de'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir de snang ba yin no zhe na de lta na ni rgyu nyid kyi yul yin pa'i phyir mig la sogs pa yul nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:280a-34: 'gyur mod nyes pa ci yod ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:280b-0: gcig nyid 'gal bar @280b 'gyur te mig kyang yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:280b-2: blo rnams don gcig yin yang zhes bya ba'i dkyus ma nyid nyams par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:280b-3: yul nyid yin na ni rten gyi dngos po nyid ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:280b-4: des na ngag gi don 'dir 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:280b-5: blo rnams don gcig nyid yin yang //
T11TD4221.1E:280b-6: rten sna tshogs pas der 'gyur na zhes phan tshun 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:280b-7: de'i phyir rang gi ngo bos snang ba nyid yul yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:280b-8: rnam pa gzhan ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:280b-9: 'on te sgra rten pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lan yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:280b-10: rtogs pa'i sgra las rang gi ngo bos don rtogs so //
T11TD4221.1E:280b-11: 'di ni don rtogs pa'i yul yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:280b-12: rtogs zin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:280b-13: de lta na ni don kyang yul du mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:280b-14: rang gi ngo bos ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:280b-15: 'on te de las kyang thob pa'i phyir yul yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:280b-17: de de las thob po zhes bya ba 'brel pa ci zhig yod /
T11TD4221.1E:280b-18: de ni rang gi ngo bos thob par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ci ltar gzhan las thob par brjod /
T11TD4221.1E:280b-19: de la 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhe na ma rtogs pa la 'jug pa nyid ci ltar zhes bsam par bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:280b-20: rnam pa de las de thob par mthong ngo zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:280b-21: rnam pa de nyid las de rtogs pa des na der 'jug pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa dang ldan pa'i thob par 'gyur gyi sgra dang ldan pa ni ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:280b-22: des na de ni rjes su dpag pa nyid kyi yul yin gyi sgra'i ni ma yin no zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:280b-23: des na dbang po'i blo yul ni bstan du med pa'i rang bzhin nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:280b-24: 'o na rjes su dpag pa'i yul du 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:280b-26: rjes su dpag pa la yang de'i rang bzhin mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:280b-27: 'o na mi snang ba la ji ltar 'dug ce na thams cad du mi snang ba nyid la 'jug pa yin no zhes bstan zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:280b-28: de ngas rtogs pa yin no zhes 'jug pa ni yin nam zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:280b-29: bden na de lta na yang 'di'i don dam pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:280b-30: ma rtogs kyang rtogs par rlom nas thams cad 'jug pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di nyid don dam pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:280b-31: gang du mngon par rlom pa de nyid yul yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:280b-32: dbang po'i shes pa'i don sgra'i yul don dam pa nyid zlog par byed kyang kun rdzob ni ma yin pa'i phyir skyon med do //
T11TD4221.1E:280b-33: gal te gzhan gyi de nyid khas len na ni ded kyi 'dod pa grub po //
T11TD4221.1E:281a-0: gal te rang gi ngo bos de nyid rtogs na ni don dam pa'i yul nyid du rtogs par @281a * //
T11TD4221.1E:281a-2: / de'i phyir rten sna tshogs pa nyid yin yang rang gi ngo bos ma rtogs pa ni yul ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:281a-3: de'i rang bzhin 'ga' zhig de la rjes su zhugs pa'i phyir yul nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:281a-4: gal te don dam par de'i rang bzhin sgra'i shes pa'i rjes su zhugs na 'o na ni gsal ba'i rang bzhin du 'dzin pa gzhan gyis kyang rtogs par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:281a-5: rjes su zhugs pa ni rnam pa gzhan du rtogs pas nus pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:281a-6: rnam pa tha dad kyang ngo zhes pa las gcig nyid du mi 'gal lo zhe na de yang mi bden te 'di ltar /
T11TD4221.1E:281a-7: mthong ba rtogs pa med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:281a-8: brjod dang rnam rtog 'jug pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:281a-9: mthong las ba lang la sogs pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:281a-10: ngo shes pa ni bzlog pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:281a-11: brjod pa dang rtog pa dag gis mthong ba'i dngos po la mi rig go zhes da lta nyid bsgrubs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:281a-12: gzung ba ngo shes pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:281a-13: sgra dang rtogs pa dag gis ni 'dzin pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:281a-14: des na ngo shes par ga las 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:281a-15: 'o na ci ltar gang zhig bdag gi 'di las rtogs pa de ni 'di yin no zhes rtogs so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:281a-16: ma rtogs kyang rtogs pa mngon bar rlom par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:281a-17: 'o na ci ltar mig gnod ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:281a-18: brtags na gnod pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:281a-19: rtogs pa tha dad pa ni gnod par byed pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:281a-20: de yang sgra dang rtogs pa dag la yod pa nyid de ;
T11TD4221.1E:281a-21: dran par bya ba'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:281a-22: dran pa de ni sngar bzung ba yin zhing mthong ba ni da ltar ba la yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:281a-23: gal te sgra dang rtogs pa dag gis mngon par rtogs pa yin na mthong bas ci bya zhes bstan zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:281a-24: de'i phyir ro shes pa yang mngon pa'i da rgyal tsam du zad kyi don dam par rtogs pa ni ma yin no ;
T11TD4221.1E:281a-25: / mthong ba las ni sngon gyi rjes su 'brangs nas gcig nyid kyi tha snyad sgrub par byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa nyid 'ba' zhig yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:281a-26: don dam pa 'dzin pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:281a-27: ba lang la sogs mthong ba la //
T11TD4221.1E:281a-28: rigs sogs brjod dang rnam rtog dag / rjes su 'gro las rjes dpog dag / de yang 'di yis sun phyung ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:281a-29: rjod pa dang rtogs pa dag gis ni dngos po la reg pa ma yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:281a-30: rjes su 'gro ba ni don dam par 'ga' yang 'dzin pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:281a-31: 'di ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal tsam mo zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:281a-32: mthong ba'i ci lta ba bzhin dran pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:281b-0: mthong ba las ma reg na yang mthong ba dang 'brel pa'i @281b rjes su 'gro ba'i rang bzhin mi 'dzin to //
T11TD4221.1E:281b-1: des na mthong ba la spyi yod do zhes rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:281b-2: 'o na ba lang de nyid 'di yin no zhes gcig tu rtogs shen /
T11TD4221.1E:281b-4: mthong ba tha dad nyid yin yang //
T11TD4221.1E:281b-5: ngo shes pa zhes bya ba yis //
T11TD4221.1E:281b-6: rnam rtog gcig ni rang bzhin gyis //
T11TD4221.1E:281b-7: byed pa yin zhes brjod zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:281b-8: phan tshun tha dad pa'i don gzhan dang gzhan 'dzin pa la brten pa'i mthong ba skyes pa ni tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa'i rnam pa gcig 'dzin par nus pa'i lam na gnas pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:281b-9: 'on kyang rnam pa gzhan mi srid pa'i phyir na rang nyid goms pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:281b-10: rjes su mthun pa'i 'du byed kyi sa bon sad pas nus pa gsal bar brtas pa zhugs pa ni ngo shes pa'i rtogs pa skyed par byed la /
T11TD4221.1E:281b-11: rigs la sogs pa'i rtogs pa don med pa'i lam du zhugs pa ni de'i dbang gis yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:281b-12: de'i phyir mngon sum ni bstan du med pa'i yul can yin no zhes gnas so //
T11TD4221.1E:281b-13: yid kyang don dang chags la sogs //
T11TD4221.1E:281b-14: rang rig rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:281b-15: don dang 'dod chags la sogs pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:281b-16: rang gi ngo bo rig pa'i yid kyang rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir mngon sum yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:281b-17: nyams su myong ba'i rnam par 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:281b-18: mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa nyid nyams su myong ba'i rnam pas 'jug par dmigs pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:281b-19: mig la sogs pas bskyed pa yang dbang po'i shes pa nyid ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:281b-20: 'on te de las skyes pa yid yin na de'i tshe 'dis sngar myong ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:281b-22: sngar myong ba ni 'dzin pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:281b-23: yid ni tshad ma nyid ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:281b-24: sngar myong ba dran par bya ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa ni rtogs par nus pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:281b-25: dran par bya ba ma yin par mngon sum byed pa ni sngar nyams su myong ngo zhes bya bar ci ltar 'gyur dngos po la sngar myong ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:281b-26: ci ltar rtogs par bya ste /
T11TD4221.1E:281b-27: ngo shes pa ni bsal ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:281b-30: ma mthong 'dzin na long ba la //
T11TD4221.1E:281b-31: sogs pa yis kyang don mthong 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:281b-32: long ba la yang yid yod pa des na de dang gzhan gyis don thams cad 'dzin par thal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:281b-33: de'i phyir 'on pa dang long ba la sogs pa med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:281b-34: skad cig nyid phyir 'das pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:281b-35: don mthong yod pa ma yin zhing //
T11TD4221.1E:282a-0: @282a * // skad cig min na mtshan nyid ni //
T11TD4221.1E:282a-1: khyad par bcas pa brjod byar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:282a-2: dngos po thams cad ni skad cig gis 'jig pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:282a-3: des na gang gis gzung ba nyid 'dzin par byed pa ci ltar 'das pa 'dzin pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:282a-4: ci ste skad cig ma yin pa nyid du khas len na de'i tshe sngar mthong ba gzung ba'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:282a-5: dran pa bzhin du bzung zin pa 'dzin pa ni tshad ma ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:282a-6: yid ni bzung zin pa nyid yin yang tshad ma yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:282a-7: mtshan nyid khyad par bcas pa brjod par bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:282a-9: bya ba sgrub can las la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:282a-10: khyad par cung zad mi byed pa //
T11TD4221.1E:282a-11: dbang po can nam gzhan dag ni //
T11TD4221.1E:282a-12: sgrub par byed par ci ltar 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:282a-13: gang zhig dbang po'i shes bas rang bzhin yongs su bcad pa de la gzhan gyis bya ba ci yod /
T11TD4221.1E:282a-14: rang bzhin de nyid yongs su gcod do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:282a-15: yongs su bcad pa la yongs su gcod pa'i don ci yin /
T11TD4221.1E:282a-16: rang gi ngo bo snang ba nyid de gzhan la yang skyon ci yod ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:282a-17: de lta na rtag pa la yongs su bcad pa nyid rtag tu yod pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:282a-18: de la gzhan gyis bya ba ci zhig byed par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:282a-19: da ltar gzhan gyis bcad do zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:282a-20: rtag pa'i phyir da ltar yang de nyid yin pas gzhan la yang nus pa yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:282a-21: de'i yongs su gcod par byed pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni ma 'brel ba ste /
T11TD4221.1E:282a-22: yongs su gcod par byed pa med na rtag pa nyid du mi 'dzin ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:282a-23: gzhan gyis 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:282a-25: yid ches pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:282a-26: ci ltar gzhan rang gi dus nyid rtogs par byed pas rtag pa nyid rtogs ;
T11TD4221.1E:282a-27: de'i phyir yongs su gcod par byed pa nyid kyis gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'dzin par byed pa gzhan don med do //
T11TD4221.1E:282a-28: de'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:282a-29: dngos po de las skyes pa'i blo'ang //
T11TD4221.1E:282a-31: gzhan gyis khyad par bya min na //
T11TD4221.1E:282a-32: de las ltos pa 'gal phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:282a-33: de'i rnam pa 'dzin pa rtag pa la 'jug pa'i shes pa thams cad dus gcig tu 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:282a-34: dus tha dad pa na ni rtag pa gcig nyid kyi yul can du 'gal te /
T11TD4221.1E:282a-35: rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:282b-0: 'on te dus phyis rgyu gzhan las skyes pa de'i tshe yang de'i dus 'dzin par 'gyur dgos @282b so ;
T11TD4221.1E:282b-1: / de lta ma yin na 'dzin par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:282b-2: rmi lam bden pa mthong ba ste /
T11TD4221.1E:282b-3: rmi lam bden pa mthong ba ni de'i dus su rtogs pa nyid 'dzin par mthong ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:282b-4: dbang po'i shes pa las yid nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa gzhan du ni dmigs pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:282b-5: ma dmigs pa la ni dmigs so zhes 'thad pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:282b-6: tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:282b-7: gzhan dag ni gal te yid kyis mi dmigs na yid kyis dran par yang mi 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:282b-8: 'dir de las gzhan gang gis kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:282b-9: rang gis rig dran nam yang med //
T11TD4221.1E:282b-10: gal te tha dad pa'i phyir dbang po'i shes pas bzung ba yid kyis dran pa ma yin na ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pas kyang bzung ba dran par mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:282b-11: de dag kyang tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:282b-12: yid yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:282b-13: shes pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya bar yang 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:282b-14: de'i phyir dbang po'i rnam par shes //
T11TD4221.1E:282b-15: de ma thag rkyen las byung can //
T11TD4221.1E:282b-16: yid ni yul gzhan nyid 'dzin byed //
T11TD4221.1E:282b-17: de phyir long bas mthong ba min //
T11TD4221.1E:282b-18: rang gi yul gyi de ma thag pa'i yul lhan cig byed pa can dbang po'i shes pas bskyed pa'i yid kyang mngon sum mo //
T11TD4221.1E:282b-19: gal te de dbang po'i rnam par shes pa dang dus mnyam par 'byung ba yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:282b-20: de dbang po'i shes pa nyid kyis gzung ba'i phyir na yid don med do //
T11TD4221.1E:282b-21: dbang po'i shes pa rgyun 'chad na gzhan dmigs pa med pa'i phyir 'di gang gi mtshan nyid yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:282b-23: goms las mdun na gnas pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:282b-25: mngon du byed phyir de la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:282b-26: yid kyi mngon sum yin par 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:282b-27: 'di zhes mdun na gnas pa la mngon du byed pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa ni yid kyi mngon sum mo //
T11TD4221.1E:282b-28: 'on te mig gi byed pa nyid las skye ba ni mig gi shes pa nyid do zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:282b-29: mig gi shes pa ni gzugs snang ba tsam la nye bar mkho ba yin la sngar goms pa ni nges pa la yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:282b-30: 'di la mig gi byed pa med pas yid sngar goms pa'i mtshan nyid las skyes pa yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:282b-31: 'di ni yid kyi mngon sum yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:282b-32: ci ste rnam pa de ni mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyis gzung ba'i phyir yid don med do snyam na mos pa lhag pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:282b-33: 'di zhes bya bas 'jug par 'gyur ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:283a-0: @283a * // des na 'jug par byed pa yin pa'i phyir tshad ma nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:283a-1: 'o na dbang po'i rnam par shes pa 'jug par byed par mi 'gyur ro zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:283a-2: shin tu goms pa las gzhan rnam par rtog pa na yang 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:283a-3: des na 'di lta bu'i yid ni /
T11TD4221.1E:283a-4: sngar gzung ba rtogs pa ma yin te ;
T11TD4221.1E:283a-5: 'on kyang de'i dus phyis byung ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:283a-6: gzung ba la 'dzin pa yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:283a-7: gzung ba la 'dzin pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:283a-8: nye bar gnas pa la sngar gyi 'dzin pa mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:283a-9: 'o na dus gcig tu rnam pa gnyis thob par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:283a-10: 'di rnam pa gnyis nyid ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:283a-11: 'o na gcig tu zhen par ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:283a-12: rab rib can gnyis kyis zla ba gnyis mthong ba'i tshul du skyon med do //
T11TD4221.1E:283a-13: 'on goms pa las skyes pa mdun na gnas pa'i rnam par 'dzin pa'i bde ba la sogs pa yang yid kyi mngon sum gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:283a-14: des na dbang po las byung ba'i bde ba zhes bya ba de nyams par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:283a-16: de ni nyams pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:283a-17: 'di ma nyams pas ni cung zad kyang byar med do //
T11TD4221.1E:283a-18: dbang po las byung ba'i bde ba dang bde ba ma yin pa skye ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de 'gal lo zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:283a-19: 'dir yang rtsa ba'i slob dpon gyi tshig dang 'gal bar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:283a-24: sdug bsngal la sogs pa rang rig pa ni dbang po la mi ltos pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:283a-25: yid kyi mngon sum yin no zhes so //
T11TD4221.1E:283a-26: 'o na ni chos kyi grags pa'i dbang po las byung ba nyid kyi bde ba dang bde ba ma yin ba zhes bya ba 'di grags pa ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:283a-27: bde ba la sogs pa'i sgras ni bde ba'i rgyu ro la sogs pa brjod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:283a-28: rnam par mi rtog kyang dbang po'i shes pa tsha ba dang zhim pa la sogs par snang ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T11TD4221.1E:283a-29: yang na rtog pa med par chos mthun pa'i phyir yid nyid la de skad brjod pa'i phyir mi 'gal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:283a-30: gal te yid rnam pa gzhan du 'dzin cing dbang po'i shes pa yang gzhan du 'dzin na /
T11TD4221.1E:283a-31: 'o na rnam pa du mar 'gyur ro zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:283a-32: dbang po'i shes pa la yang thal ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:283a-33: dbang po'i shes pa yang goms pa ci lta ba bzhin du rnam pa du mar 'jug pa mi zlogs [*bzlogs] so //
T11TD4221.1E:283b-0: de lta bu 'o na 'di zhes bya ba'i shes pa yang goms pa las dbang pos bskyed @283b ba nyid yin gyi yid nyid ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:283b-1: byed pa gzhan yang rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:283b-2: 'di ni zhes bya ba 'di ni yid kyis byed pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:283b-3: de bzhin nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:283b-4: 'o na yid kyi shes pa 'di de zhes bya bar /
T11TD4221.1E:283b-5: lkog tu gyur ba la yang ci ltar mi 'jug ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:283b-6: 'di ni bzang po ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:283b-7: lkog tu gyur la 'jug pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:283b-8: mngon du byed pas 'jug min pa //
T11TD4221.1E:283b-9: de phyir de ni mngon sum nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:283b-10: yin zhes ji ltar nges pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:283b-11: mngon sum gyi don ni mngon du byed pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:283b-12: yid de nyid 'ga' zhig la ni mngon du byed pa'i rnam pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:283b-14: bya ba ga las she na /
T11TD4221.1E:283b-15: 'o na dbang po'i shes pa yang 'ga' zhig la 'khrul pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:283b-16: 'ga' zhig la ma yin no zhes bya ba ga las rab rib kyi tshogs pa gzhan yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:283b-17: 'di la yang tshogs pa gzhan yod pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:283b-19: rang don rjes 'gro'i don ltos can //
T11TD4221.1E:283b-20: dbang skyes blo ni rgyu yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:283b-23: dbang po'i rnam par shes pa'i rang gi don skad cig dang po'am /
T11TD4221.1E:283b-24: rgyun de'i rjes su 'gro ba'i don gyi skad cig gang yin pa de la ltos pa'i dbang po'i shes pa ni yid skyed bar byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:283b-25: gang zhig tshogs pa 'dis ma bskyed pa de ni mngon sum ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:283b-26: de nyid kyi phyir na yul nges pa nyid kyis yul gzhan rtogs pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:283b-27: gang gi phyir yul gzhan gyis bskyed pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:283b-28: de nyid kyis bskyed pa yin gyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las she na /
T11TD4221.1E:283b-29: mig gi rnam par shes pa yang ci'i phyir sgras bskyed pa ma yin zhes 'di ni dbang po'i shes pa la yang mtshungs so //
T11TD4221.1E:283b-30: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nges pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:283b-31: 'di la yang tshangs pas dmod pa ma 'dor ba'i phyir gzhan du yang mtshungs so //
T11TD4221.1E:283b-32: skad cig gnyis pa yang dbang po'i shes pa nyid kyis 'dzin pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:283b-33: de ltar yang mthong ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:283b-35: de la yid kyi rnam pa yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:283b-36: de ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:283b-37: mdun na gnas pa'i rnam pa'ang gsal ba tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:283b-38: gal te yid kyi shes pa'i mngon sum dbang po'i shes pa dang dus mnyam du 'byung ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:284a-0: 'o na ci ltar dbang po'i shes pa 'di mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i @284a * //
T11TD4221.1E:284a-2: rang gi shes pa'i dus na yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i don ni sngar gyi shes pa'i lhan cig byed pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:284a-3: dus tha dad pa dag lhan cig byed pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro zhen 'di la bshad pa /
T11TD4221.1E:284a-4: de dang byed dus mtshungs med can //
T11TD4221.1E:284a-5: rang shes dus can don dag ni //
T11TD4221.1E:284a-6: ci ltar dbang po'i shes pa yi ;
T11TD4221.1E:284a-7: / lhan cig byed pa yin zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:284a-10: med pa sngar nus med phyir dang //
T11TD4221.1E:284a-11: phyis kyang nye bar mi sbyor phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:284a-12: rgyu rnams thams cad sngar yod yin //
T11TD4221.1E:284a-13: de phyir rang blo bcas don min //
T11TD4221.1E:284a-14: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i don ni dbang po'i rnam par shes pa dang dus mi mtshungs pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:284a-15: de yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa las dus snga ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:284a-17: rgyu yang 'bras bu dang dus gcig pa nyid ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:284a-18: 'bras bu dang dus gcig na ni sngar med pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:284a-19: med pa yang sngar nus pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:284a-20: phyis 'bras bu'i dus na 'bras bu nyid yod pa'i phyir nus pa don med do //
T11TD4221.1E:284a-21: de ltar na gal te 'bras bu'i dus su yin na de'i tshe 'bras bu yod pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:284a-22: de'i phyir rgyu thams cad ni sngar yod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:284a-23: des na rgyu'i don ni 'bras bu ru 'gyur ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par shes pa dang dus mnyam du 'byung ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:284a-24: dus tha dad pa ji ltar 'dzin //
T11TD4221.1E:284a-25: ce na rig pa shes pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:284a-26: shes pa'i rnam pa 'jog nus pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:284a-27: rgyu nyid la ni gzung ba shes //
T11TD4221.1E:284a-28: rang gi ngo bos snang ba nyid gzung ba yin gyi de'i rnam par shes pa skye ba ni ma yin pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:284a-29: snang ba yang shes pa dang dus mnyam pa'i phyir ji ltar rgyu nyid gzung ba yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:284a-30: snang ba zhes bya 'di ci zhig //
T11TD4221.1E:284a-33: gal te don gyi ngo bo yin na ni sngon po la sogs pa ltar nam yang ngo bo de las nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir thams cad kyi tshe snang bar thal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:284a-34: shes pa med pa'i phyir snang ba ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:284a-35: shes pas kyang de nyid bya ba ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:284a-36: de ni sngar yang yod pa'i phyir ji ltar yang snang bar mi 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:284a-37: shes pa don med do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:284a-38: de bzhin du 'di ni skyon gzhan yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:284a-39: de'i ngo bo nyid ni sngar mi snang ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:284a-40: de nyid yod la de nyid med do zhes bya ba ni 'gal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:284a-41: 'on te shes pa yod na mthong gi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:284a-42: ci da ni shes pa snang ba la byed pa po yin nam byed pa po nyid kyang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:284b-0: med pa sngar nus @284b med phyir dang //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-1: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan zin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-2: dus mnyam pa nyid du mthong yang shes pa med par ma yin pa'i phyir 'di la ci zhig bya zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:284b-3: de lta na 'o na ni de nyid kyi tshe mig las skyes pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:284b-4: des na don gyi ngo bo ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-5: don sngar yod na da ltar skye ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-6: gang yod na ni gang skye zhing //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-8: de las de bzhin nyid 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-9: tha dad mtshan nyid yod phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-10: gang phyis bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan ni //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-11: bzhin yod na ni phyis 'byung ba'i //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-12: phyir na bzhin las tha dad pa //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-13: de bzhin kho bo'i snang ba'ang 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-14: gal te yul tha dad pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-15: gzugs brnyan tha dad nyid 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-16: gdong dang gzugs brnyan tha dad de //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-17: chad mas rtogs pa nyid kyang yin //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-18: don las snang ba tha dad pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-19: sgrub par byed pa mthong ba med //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-20: des na snang dang sngo sogs dag / don gcig par ni grub ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:284b-22: ji ltar mig la sogs pa las //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-24: de bzhin sngo sogs kyang 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-25: grub dang bde ba mtshungs phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-26: ji ltar mig la sogs pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-27: snga rol nyid du don yod pa //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-28: de bzhin du ni snang bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-29: de ltar de ni mthong ba med //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-30: de phyir sngo sogs snang ba las //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-31: tha dad par ni 'dod pa gang //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-32: de ni sngo sogs snang ba las ;
T11TD4221.1E:284b-33: / sngon yod par ni 'dod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-34: de yi de ma thag skyes pa //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-35: sngon po la sogs snang ba yis //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-36: rnam shes de ni 'dzin byed de //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-37: pha gzugs 'dzin pa ci bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-38: rgyu du ma nyid yod na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-39: 'bras bu rjes bde skye ba gang //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-40: de ni de yis ngo bo de //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-41: gzhan dang gzung zhes brjod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-42: dper na bu pa'i gzugs 'dzin no zhes brjod pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-43: bde ba la sogs pa rang rig pa'i yid kyang mngon sum mo //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-44: de lta na rnam par rtog pa rang gi ngo bo la mngon sum du mi 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:284b-45: de lta yin dang rnam par shes pa lkog tu gyur pa'i gzhung du thal lo zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:284b-46: sems dang sems las byung ba thams cad kyi rang rig pa la mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-47: bde ba la sogs pa smos pa ni nyams su myong ba gsal ba bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:284b-48: gal te rnam par rtog pa la rnam par mi rtog pa nyid med pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:284b-49: ji ltar mngon sum yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:284b-50: rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin ni rtog pa med pa nyid ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-0: @285a * // don la rtog pa med pa yin no zhe na de ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:285a-2: gal te don la rtog na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-3: ngo bo nyid la rtog par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-4: ngo bo nyid la de yi ni //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-5: rang bzhin gzhan par rig ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-7: bde sogs bdag nyid gzhan mi rten //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-8: brda byed par ni nus ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-9: de phyir de dag rang rig ni //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-10: brjod dang rjes 'brel can ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-11: skye ba thob pa nyid na bde ba la sogs pa bdag nyid rig pa'i yul gyi dngos po 'dzin pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:285a-12: de las ma gtogs pa de rig pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-13: de'i tshe yang snga ma dang phyi ma'i dngos po mngon par brjod pa'i sgo nas sbyor ba'i skabs ci zhig yod /
T11TD4221.1E:285a-14: phyis sbyor ro zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:285a-16: gzhan gyis snga ma'i rang bzhin du rig na ni de'i tshe rig pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-17: snga ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnam pa gzhan du rig pa ni bde ba la sogs pa rig par mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:285a-18: gzhan gyi bde ba rig pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-19: de'i phyir bde ba la sogs pa da ltar ba'am gsal ba nyid du 'dzin na rnam par rtog pa med par 'dzin pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-20: 'on te yid kyi bde ba ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzin pas gzung ba yin no zhes 'dod na /
T11TD4221.1E:285a-23: gang zhig dran pas rig pas na //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-24: gal te yid du brjod na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-25: snga ma'i rang bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-26: de ni bde bar rig ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-27: de'i tshe nyid na skyes pa de //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-28: mngon sum rig pas rtog pa min //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-29: gal te brjod dang 'brel pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-30: zhe na brjod pa nyid yod yin //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-31: bde ba de las tha dad na //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-33: dus gcig rig pa tsam gyis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-34: 'brel pa nyid du brjod ma yin ;
T11TD4221.1E:285a-35: / yid kyang gzugs sogs rnam pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-36: rang bdag nyid la gnas ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-37: skye ba de tshe nyid yod phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-38: ji ltar rnam rtog yul du 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-39: gal te 'di ni don la yang //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-41: de yis don bzung med pas na //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-42: ngo bo nyid la'ang mi rtog phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-43: khyed kyis de skad brjod pa de ni bden te /
T11TD4221.1E:285a-47: de 'dir ji ltar rnam rtog yin //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-49: de la rtog par brjod na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:285a-51: don gzhan der yang yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-1: gal te rtog par 'dod ce na //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-3: gnyis yod ces bya bden ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-4: de la phyogs gcig la gnas pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-5: skyon ni snga nyid brjod zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-6: 'on te de dag dbye ba ni //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-7: yod na gnyis su thal 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-8: rnam rtog bcas pa'i rig pa dang ;
T11TD4221.1E:285b-9: / de nyid tshe na rtog med pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-11: 'dzin pa med kyang gang zhig la //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-12: 'dzin pa'i nga rgyal yod de nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-13: brtags pas nged kyi phyogs 'di la //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-14: rnam par rtog pa yin par brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-16: gzhan pa'i nga rgyal yang gang zhig / ce na 'dzin pa med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-17: 'jug la byed pa gang yin pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-18: gal te ma bzung la 'jug byed //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-19: thams cad la de ji ltar min //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-20: gal te bzung la 'jug byed nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-21: ci yi phyir na 'jug par byed //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-22: 'o na da ni shes pa kun //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-23: rnam par rtog dang bcas 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-24: gang phyir shes pa thams cad kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-25: ma bzung ba la 'jug phyir ro ;
T11TD4221.1E:285b-27: mngon du byed pa ma yin par //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-28: gang la rnam rtog gzhan dag gis //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-29: tha snyad byed pa de nyid 'dir //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-31: gang la mthong bar mngon 'dod pa //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-32: shes te rtog pa med pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-33: mngon du byed par mos phyir yang //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-34: mngon sum zhes ni brjod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-35: don dam du ni rnam shes ni //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-36: thams cad rtog pa med pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-37: thams cad ma bzung yul la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-38: rtog pa med par 'jug phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-40: bag chags stobs las snga ma yi //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-41: myong ba'i khyad par rjes 'brangs te //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-42: gang la shes pa gang skyes kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-43: de ni rnam rtog bcas par brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-44: gang zhig gzhan gyi dbang nyid du //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-46: shes pa de ni tha snyad du //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-47: rnam rtog med ces brjod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-48: bde sogs rnams kyi rang bzhin la //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-49: rang rig pas ni rtog med phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-50: de la rtog pa med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-51: thams cad pa 'dod nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-52: de phyir de dag rang nyid ni //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-53: brjod dang rjes 'brel can ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-54: de la las dang byed pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-55: mngon par brjod pa 'brel ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:285b-56: rgyun snang ba'i bde ba la sogs pa la gang gi tshe 'di ni bde ba la sogs pa'o zhes mos pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes pa skye ba de'i tshe ci'i phyir rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid ma yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:286a-1: yid kyi mngon sum yin no zhes brjod zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:286a-3: don dang bde sogs rang bzhin la //
T11TD4221.1E:286a-5: rang bzhin dngos su 'dzin pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:286a-6: de kun yid du 'dod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:286a-7: de la yang rtog pa'i go skabs ni ji ltar yang yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:286a-8: des na rtog pa med pa'i phyir de ni mngon sum nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:286a-9: gang gi tshe rang rig pa dang yid kyi mngon sum gnyi ga yang rig pa 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
T11TD4221.1E:286a-10: phan tshun ma reg pa'i phyir ji ltar rnam pa gnyis su ma rtogs she na /
T11TD4221.1E:286a-12: rab rib can gnyis kyis zla ba gnyis dmigs pa'i tshul du rnam pa gcig yin par zhen pas na /
T11TD4221.1E:286a-13: de ltar tha snyad mi byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:286a-14: rang gis rig pa nyid yin na ji ltar de la yang de ltar tha snyad med par 'gyur ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:286a-15: de ltar rjes su dpag pa 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:286a-16: de la ni gzugs dang 'bras bu phyir mthong bas de gcig nyid du rjes su dpog go //
T11TD4221.1E:286a-17: gnyis pa mthong bas ni ma yin pa'i phyir de gcig nyid du tha snyad byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:286a-18: 'o na 'dir gnyi ga yang mthong ba'i phyir gcig nyid tha snyad du ji ltar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:286a-19: 'di la rjes su dpag pa yang med de /
T11TD4221.1E:286a-20: rang rig pa nyid la yang rjes su dpag pas ci zhig bya /
T11TD4221.1E:286a-21: gal te phan tshun rig pa med pa'i phyir ji ltar gnyis rig / skyes bu gcig yod pa des de gnyis rig go zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:286a-22: rang rig pa las tha dad pa'i skyes bu med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:286a-23: de dag gis kyang gnyis rig pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:286a-24: 'on te gzugs dang ro rig pa bzhin du gnyis rig go zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:286a-25: rang rig pa nyid na der yang ji ltar zhes bstan pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:286a-26: gzhan gyi myong ba la yang thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:286a-27: de'i phyir sna tshogs kyi rnam pa'i rang rig pa gcig nyid do zhes 'di ni bstan zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:286a-28: 'di ni phyi rol gyi don la brten te /
T11TD4221.1E:286a-29: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa yang khas blangs nas brjod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:286a-30: don dam par ni thams cad rig pa tsam yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:286a-31: dbang po la sogs pa'i shes pa'i khyad par ni yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:286a-32: dbang po'i byed pa yang dus mtshungs pa nyid du rig pa'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:286a-33: 'on te mig la sogs pa tha dad du rgyu ma yin nam zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:286a-34: de bzhin du yid dang rang rig pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:286a-35: yid dang dbang po'i shes pa dag tha dad do //
T11TD4221.1E:286a-36: 'di la tha snyad med pa yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:286a-37: tha dad pa'i tha snyad med kyang /
T11TD4221.1E:286a-38: rjes su dpag pa yang tha snyad nyid yin pas skyon med do //
T11TD4221.1E:286b-0: @286b 'o na bdag la sogs pa la yang rjes su dpag pa'i tha snyad yod pa nyid pas skyon med de /
T11TD4221.1E:286b-1: de ltar na bdag la sogs pa la yang rjes su dpag pa'i tha snyad yod pas bdag la sogs pa yang yod par thal ba'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:286b-2: de la gnod par byed pa'i tha snyad yod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:286b-3: de'i phyir bde ba la sogs pa'i bdag nyid khyad par gyi rang bzhin la ni brda nus pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di gnas so //
T11TD4221.1E:286b-4: gzhan yang rig byed min de dag / rang gi ngo bo ci ltar rig / don gzhan la brten rnam shes kyis //
T11TD4221.1E:286b-5: rig bya yin zhes 'ga' zhig zer //
T11TD4221.1E:286b-6: re zhig rnam par shes pa gzhan rig par byed pa gang yin pa de la yang rang rig pa yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:286b-7: ci shes ldan rig pa ma yin pa'i bde ba la sogs pa la yod dam /
T11TD4221.1E:286b-8: gal te rig par bya ba yin pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:286b-9: bde ba la sogs pa rang rig par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:286b-10: de lta ma yin na rig pa nyid med par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:286b-12: rang rig pa ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:286b-13: gzhan gyis rig pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:286b-14: bum pa la sogs pa ltar rang rig pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:286b-15: de lta na 'o na thun mong du rtogs par 'gyur ro zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:286b-16: don gcig la 'du ba'i shes pas rig pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:286b-17: bum pa la sogs pa ni don gcig la 'du ba'i shes pas ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:286b-18: nges na de dag gzung ba'i rang bzhin yin pas btang snyoms pa nyid du rig pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:286b-19: bde ba la sogs pa shes pa las tha mi dad pa nyid du rtogs pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin lta bur 'dzin pa'i rnam pa nyid ma gtogs par de la zhugs pas rig pa'i phyir bum pa la sogs pa bzhin du thal bar mi 'gyur ro zhes kha cig zer ba de dag gi ltar na /
T11TD4221.1E:286b-20: de dang de min rang bzhin dngos //
T11TD4221.1E:286b-21: de dang de min dngos rgyus bskyed //
T11TD4221.1E:286b-22: rnam shes rgyu las gzhan min skyes //
T11TD4221.1E:286b-23: bde sogs de ci shes ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:286b-24: re zhig khyed kyi 'di mngon sum gyis ni rtogs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:286b-25: rjes su dpag pas rtogs pa ni rtags med par mi 'dod do //
T11TD4221.1E:286b-26: bde ba la sogs pa ni shes pa las tha dad par rtogs pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:286b-27: don gcig la 'du ba'i 'gal ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:286b-28: rjes su dpag pa yang rtag med par 'jug pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:286b-29: gal te rgyu tha dad par bstan par nus na ni 'di la rtags su 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:287a-0: mngon sum ma yin pa'i rjes su dpag pa @287a * //
T11TD4221.1E:287a-1: med par rtogs par nus pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:287a-2: rgyu tha dad pas ni tha dad par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:287a-3: 'bras bu'i tha dad pa ni gnod mi za ba'i phyir tshogs pa tha dad las yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:287a-4: 'bras bu tha dad pa ni tha dad pa sgrub par byed pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:287a-5: thal ba dang du ba bzhin du rgyu gcig las kyang 'bras bu tha dad pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:287a-6: bde ba la sogs pa'i dang shes pa tha dad pa'i sgrub par byed pa'i 'bras bu tha dad pa yang de dmigs pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:287a-7: de'i phyir rgyu tha dad pa nyid bstan par bya ba yin na de yang med do //
T11TD4221.1E:287a-8: tha mi dad pa'i rgyu can dang tha mi dad pa'i rang bzhin dmigs pa na /
T11TD4221.1E:287a-9: ci'i phyir tha dad ces tha snyad byed de /
T11TD4221.1E:287a-10: 'di la tshad ma ci zhig yod ces bya ba'i tshig go //
T11TD4221.1E:287a-11: yang na gal te bde ba la sogs pa dag las shes pa gzhan yin na bde ba la sogs pa dang rnam par shes pa'i rgyu ci yin /
T11TD4221.1E:287a-12: mig dang gzugs dang yid la byed pa dag go //
T11TD4221.1E:287a-13: des na rnam par shes pa'i rgyu mig la sogs pa las bde ba la sogs pa skye ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:287a-14: de ltar yin dang de ci'i phyir shes pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:287a-15: ci'i phyir rnam par shes pas rig pa ma yin /
T11TD4221.1E:287a-16: med pa nyid do zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:287a-17: rnam par shes pa'i rgyu nyid las skye ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:287a-18: 'di ltar rig par mi 'gyur ba nyid yin /
T11TD4221.1E:287a-19: khyed kyi phyogs la yang ci'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:287a-20: de lta ma yin zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:287a-21: bag chags sad pa'i khyad par rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:287a-22: bag chags sad pa'i rnam par dbye ba'i stobs kyis rnam par shes pa res 'ga' bde ba'i rang bzhin dang sdug bsngal dang rnam pa gzhan du ma yin pa'i phyir mi 'thad pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:287a-23: rgyu mtshungs pa nyid ston pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:287a-24: don bcas dbang po rung ba dang //
T11TD4221.1E:287a-25: bdag nyid ci ltar sems yod na //
T11TD4221.1E:287a-26: bde ba la sogs skye bar mthong //
T11TD4221.1E:287a-27: yid kyang de dang mtshungs pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:287a-28: mig med par ni gzugs mthong ba'i bde ba yod pa ma yin la yid 'phrog pa'i gzugs med dam /
T11TD4221.1E:287a-29: mya ngan la sogs pa'i yid nyams na yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:287a-30: rnam par shes pa skye ba'i tshogs pa yang 'di nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:287a-31: de'i phyir tha dad pa rtogs par byed pa'i rgyu tha dad pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:287a-32: bdag dang yid phrad pa rgyu yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:287a-33: gzugs la sogs pa'i tshogs pa las skye ba'i bde ba ni mi shes par mi rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:287b-0: 'on te de'i tshe bde ba la sogs pa ma @287b skyes pa des na /
T11TD4221.1E:287b-1: gdon mi za bar med pa shes pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:287b-2: med pa ni gzung bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:287b-4: de dag yod dang med pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:287b-5: 'ga' la bde la sogs dang blo //
T11TD4221.1E:287b-6: skye dang mi skye mthong de'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:287b-7: de las de skye gzhan las min //
T11TD4221.1E:287b-8: gang gis bde ba la sogs pa rnam par shes pa las rgyu gzhan yin par rtogs pa /
T11TD4221.1E:287b-12: yid la byed pa med par bde ba la sogs pa skye ba la brten pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:287b-13: des na rnam par shes pa'i rgyu nyid bde ba la sogs pa'i rgyu yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:287b-14: 'on te chos la sogs pa dang de ma yin pa'am /
T11TD4221.1E:287b-15: chos la sogs pa de nyid bde ba la sogs pa'i rgyu yin no zhen de yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:287b-16: 'di ltar gang gi 'bras bu ldog pa las rgyu gzhan rtog pa'i go skabs su 'gyur ba /
T11TD4221.1E:287b-17: mig la sogs pa yod pa na mi skye bar ma mthong ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:287b-18: 'on te ldog pa med kyang chos la sogs pa rgyu nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:287b-19: bde ba ni 'dod pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:287b-20: sdug bsngal ni mi 'dod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:287b-21: de la chos dang chos ma yin pa dag ni gdon mi za bar rgyu yin no /
T11TD4221.1E:287b-22: 'di ni tshu rol mdzes pa ma gtogs pa'i rab tu smra ba thams cad la rab tu grub pa nyid do zhe na de yang mi bden te /
T11TD4221.1E:287b-23: ldog pa med phyir chos sogs kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:287b-24: nus pa grub pa med pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:287b-25: bde ba tsam la chos sogs ni //
T11TD4221.1E:287b-26: nus dang 'dod pa grub ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:287b-27: chos la sogs pa ni bde ba la sogs pa'i sgrub par byed pa'i tshogs par byed pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:287b-28: bde ba la sogs pa nyid kyis ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:287b-29: de lta ma yin na ni de'i sgrub par byed pa med kyang bde ba la sogs par thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:287b-30: ci ste yang bde ba sgrub par byed pa'i gzugs la sogs pa yod kyang /
T11TD4221.1E:287b-31: mya ngan la sogs pas nang gi byad pa'i nus pa nyams na bde ba mi skye ste /
T11TD4221.1E:287b-32: des na chos nyid rgyu yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:287b-33: gzugs la sogs pa ni ma yin par rtogs so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:287b-34: de ni rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin te 'di ltar /
T11TD4221.1E:287b-35: chos min nyid kyis mya ngan la sogs pa'i tshogs pa bsgrub pa na /
T11TD4221.1E:287b-36: de las sdug bsngal skye 'gyur gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:287b-37: chos min las ni sdug bsngal min //
T11TD4221.1E:287b-38: chos ma yin pas ni mya ngan la sogs pa'i tshogs pa nyid sgrub par byed kyi sdug bsngal ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:287b-39: de yod na sdug bsngal rang nyid skye bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:288a-1: na chos ni chos las bde ba nyid dang gzhan las sdug bsngal yin du chug mod /
T11TD4221.1E:288a-2: de lta na yang des rig pa las tha dad du bskyed par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba ga las yin /
T11TD4221.1E:288a-3: chos kyi rig pa las tha mi dad pa'i bde ba skyed kyang khyed la ni cung zad kyang gnod pa byas par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:288a-4: bde ba la sogs pas khyed la dgos pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:288a-5: de ni shes pa las tha dad pa ma yin yang khyed la tsha bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:288a-6: 'on te rgyu tha dad pa'i phyir tha dad do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:288a-9: rnam shes rkyang pa nyid las ni //
T11TD4221.1E:288a-10: bde ba'i rnam shes tha dad nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:288a-11: gcig tu nges par tha dad gang //
T11TD4221.1E:288a-12: de ni re zhig grub ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:288a-13: chos dang lhan cig pa'i tshogs pa ni de nyid kyi khyad par can gyi 'bras bu skyed par byed kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:288a-14: shin tu tha dad pa nyid ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:288a-15: phan 'dogs pa lhag pas ni de nyid khyad par du byed pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:288a-16: bud shing rlan dang bcas pa nyid na du ba thal ba las shin tu tha dad pa ni ma yin no ;
T11TD4221.1E:288a-17: / du ba ni thal ba las shin tu tha dad pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:288a-18: sngon po la sogs pa'i dri ma can du byed pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:288a-19: de la yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:288a-20: de'i phyir chos la sogs pa la shin tu tha dad par skyed pa'i nus pa ni yod pa ma yin pa'i nges par gzung ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:288a-21: de nyid kyi phyir bshad pa /
T11TD4221.1E:288a-22: de dag nyid kyi khyad par las //
T11TD4221.1E:288a-23: bde sdug la sogs tha dad yin //
T11TD4221.1E:288a-24: dper na blo de nyid kyi ni //
T11TD4221.1E:288a-25: gsal dang mi gsal the tshom bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:288a-26: gal te shas pa dang bde ba la sogs pa rgyu mtshungs pa nyid yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:288a-27: rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de tsam nyid du 'gyur gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:288a-28: bde ba la sogs pa tha dad par go ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:288a-29: tshogs pa de nyid kyi khyad par las te /
T11TD4221.1E:288a-30: 'o ma la sogs pas bcus pa'i skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu'i sa bon la sogs pa'i tshogs pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:288a-31: 'o mas bcu ba la sogs pa lhag pa yod kyang skyu ru ra'i sa bon skyu ru ra dang mi mthun pa'i 'bras bu skyed par ni mi byed kyi 'on kyang rang bzhin de las ma 'das pa'i khyad par gzhan gnas par byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:288a-32: 'on te tha dad pa yang ci'i phyir mi skyed ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:288a-33: tha dad pa nyid skyed par byed do zhes de skad ni brjod par bya ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:288a-34: gal te 'bras bu skyed par byed pa'i tshogs pa tha dad pa zhes bya bar grub na /
T11TD4221.1E:288a-35: de lta na rgyu tha dad par bstan par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:288b-0: gzhan yang @288b shes rab la sogs pa yang chos la sogs pa las skyes pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:288b-1: des na de dag kyang blo las tha dad par thal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:288b-2: 'on te shes rab la sogs pa ni goms pa la sogs pa las yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:288b-3: chos la sogs pa las ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:288b-4: de lta yin na bde ba la sogs pa yang 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa la sogs pa goms pa las yin pa'i phyir chos la sogs pa de dag gi rgyu nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:288b-5: 'dod pa la sogs pa nye ba nyid chos las yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:288b-6: de lta na ni bde ba la sogs pa chos las skyed par mi 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:288b-7: 'on kyang nus pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa la sogs pa nyid las yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:288b-8: nus pa ma nyams pa'i yid la byed pa de ni shes pa la yang rgyu yin pa'i phyir bde ba la sogs pa tshogs pa tha dad pas bskyed par bya ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:288b-9: ci ste yang shes rab la sogs pa bde ba la sogs pa'i rgyu chos la sogs pa'i rgyu can ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:288b-10: shes rab yod par gyur ba las bde ba gang yin pa de nyid chos la sogs pa'i rgyu can yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:288b-11: des na bde ba la sogs pa rgyu mtshungs pa can du ma grub bo zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:288b-12: de yang legs par brjod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:288b-14: shes rab la sogs chos sogs las //
T11TD4221.1E:288b-15: ma yin bde sogs de dag ces //
T11TD4221.1E:288b-16: tshad ma gang las khyed cag gi / de ni 'grub par 'gyur ba yin ;
T11TD4221.1E:288b-17: / tshad mas ma grub pa'i rang gi lugs kyi spros pa bstan pa tsam ni pha rol po dag dga' bar byed pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:288b-18: shes rab la sogs pa ni chos las gzhan las mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:288b-19: chos med kyang goms pa las mthong ngo zhe na ma yin te chos med na goms pa de nyid 'bras bu dang bcas par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:288b-20: blun pa'i phyir 'bras bu med do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:288b-21: 'o na ni bde ba la sogs pa yang rgyun gyi khyad par nyid las skyes pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:288b-23: ngo bo nyid kyis ma yin la //
T11TD4221.1E:288b-24: phongs rgyu thams cad yod na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:288b-25: sngon goms las zhugs rgyud kyi ni //
T11TD4221.1E:288b-26: khyad par nyid las bde ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:288b-27: bde ba ni ngo bo nyid kyi khyad par gyis goms pa las yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:288b-28: dam pa ma yin pa nyes par spyod pa rnams la yang mthong ba'i phyir dang chos yod kyang mnyam pa nyid mthong ba la med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:288b-29: mnyam pa nyid goms pa las phyin ci log dang lhan cig pa'i chos nyid las yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:289a-1: 'o na chos nus pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:289a-2: goms pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir dang shes rab la sogs pa bzhin du bde ba la sogs pa blo'i rang bzhin nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:289a-3: gal te bde ba la sogs pa ni yid la sogs pa las skye ba yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:289a-4: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rgyu can goms pa zhes bya ba'i 'du byed las skyes pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:289a-5: des rgyu tha dad do 'di ltar //
T11TD4221.1E:289a-6: bdag gis mthong ba gang yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:289a-7: 'di zhes rang bzhin rnam shes ni //
T11TD4221.1E:289a-8: sngon gyi 'du byed las byung phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:289a-9: bde sogs la 'di yod dam ci //
T11TD4221.1E:289a-11: bde ba la sogs pa la yang 'di rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:289a-12: 'di ltar bde ba la sogs pa la yang goms pa'i stobs nyid las skyes pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni bstan zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:289a-13: ci ste yang yid kyi bde ba la sogs pa nyid 'du byed las 'byung gi dbang po las skyes pa ni ma yin no snyam na /
T11TD4221.1E:289a-14: de lta na ni 'o na yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid 'du byed las yin pa'i phyir 'di mtshungs so //
T11TD4221.1E:289a-15: 'on te dbang po las skyes pa'i rnam par shes pa la yang gsal ba la sogs pa'i khyad par goms pa las yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:289a-16: 'o na ni bde ba la sogs pa dbang po las skyes pa rnams kyi gsal ba la sogs pa yang de nyid las yin pa'i phyir mtshungs so //
T11TD4221.1E:289a-17: gzhan yang bde ba la sogs pa ni thams cad yid nyid yin no zhes bstan zin to //
