T11TD4221.1E:289a-18: gal te dngos po 'ga' zhig gzung ba la yang de nyid la shes pa yang nas yang du skye ba'i mtshan nyid goms pa'i stobs las rnam par shes pa gsal bar rig pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:289a-19: gal te bde ba la sogs pa rnams kyang shes pa gzhan gyis 'dzin na de'i tshe /
T11TD4221.1E:289a-20: de 'dzin pa gsal bar 'gyur ba rig pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:289a-22: goms par byed pa ci 'dra ba zhig yin /
T11TD4221.1E:289a-24: gal te rig pa skye na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:289a-25: de la bsgom pa ci 'dra zhig / rig pa ma skyes she na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:289a-26: de la bsgom pa ci 'dra zhig / gzhan dang gzhan pa'i bde ba rig pa skye ba'i phyir goms par rig pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:289a-27: gal te yang dang yang du de nyid dmigs pa de'i tshe /
T11TD4221.1E:289a-28: goms par tha snyad byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:289b-0: don gcig nyid yin pas de la rnam par shes pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis myong ba na goms par rig pa @289b yin no zhe na gal te bde ba yang ci'i phyir gcig ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:289b-1: yang nas yang gi don ci yin //
T11TD4221.1E:289b-3: yang nas yang gi don nyams su myong ba 'jug pas byas pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:289b-5: gal te shes pa tha dad na //
T11TD4221.1E:289b-6: yul gcig yin pa ga la rtog / gal te ngo shes las shen //
T11TD4221.1E:289b-7: bde sogs la 'di med dam ci //
T11TD4221.1E:289b-8: gal te bde ba gcig ma yin pas de ltar ngo shes par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:289b-9: yul la ni shes pa tha dad kyang de gcig pa'i phyir rig pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:289b-10: ngo shes pa ni yul las byung ba can ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:289b-11: 'on kyang dmigs pa las byung ba can yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:289b-12: shes pa tha dad pa la ni gcig pa'i dmigs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:289b-13: shes pa la yang ngo shes par ci ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:289b-14: de la don dam par ni ngo shes pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:289b-15: don gcig pas na de gcig tu sgro btags nas shes pa gcig pa zhes tha snyad du byed do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:289b-17: ci 'di shes pa rang rig pa zhes bya ba'i phyogs brjod dam /
T11TD4221.1E:289b-18: 'on te shes pa gzhan gyis rig par bya ba'am /
T11TD4221.1E:289b-19: 'on te don gyis go bas rig par bya ba yin /
T11TD4221.1E:289b-21: gal te rang rig la brten nas //
T11TD4221.1E:289b-22: ci ltar ngo shes 'gyur ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:289b-23: tha dad mthong la de nyid kyi tshe na gcig tu 'khrul pa ma yin /
T11TD4221.1E:289b-24: rang rig pa'i phyogs yongs su gsal bar tha dad par rig pa la /
T11TD4221.1E:289b-25: ci ltar yul tha dad pa dag kyang de nyid kyi tshe /
T11TD4221.1E:289b-26: des byas pa'i rnam pa 'khrul par 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:289b-27: shes pa gzhan gyis rig pa la yang 'di mtshungs so //
T11TD4221.1E:289b-28: don gyis go bas rig pa la ni don dang rjes su mthun par shes pa rtog pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:289b-29: des na shes pa yang tha dad pa med pa nyid du brtag par bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:289b-30: de lta ma yin na mi 'thad pa'i phyir don gyis go ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:289b-31: don gyi rig pa tsam nyid ni //
T11TD4221.1E:289b-32: rig pa tsam du 'jog pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:289b-33: don gcig nyid ni du ma yis //
T11TD4221.1E:289b-34: gzung ba min phyir gcig tu brtag / dus gzhan dang gzhan du 'byung ba'i rnam par shes pa du ma rang gi dus kyi don yongs su gdod pas ni snga ma dang phyi mar 'byung ba'i don gcig yin no zhes rtogs par nus pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:289b-35: gcig gis byed pa med pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:289b-36: tshogs pa yang med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:289b-37: bdag gcig de ni mtshams sbyor can //
T11TD4221.1E:289b-38: de la dran pa yod phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:289b-39: 'di yi nus pa dran pa dang //
T11TD4221.1E:290a-0: @290a * // mtshams sbyor ba la'ang yod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:290a-1: de ni de lta ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:290a-2: bdag ni rtog pa'i rang bzhin la /
T11TD4221.1E:290a-3: 'di ni rigs ldan min par mthong //
T11TD4221.1E:290a-4: gcig bu yi ni rang bzhin 'di //
T11TD4221.1E:290a-5: zlog pa tshad ldan ci ltar yin //
T11TD4221.1E:290a-6: bdag tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa'i phyogs la skyon 'di med do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:290a-7: rang bzhin gang gis tha mi dad pa'i rang bzhin des ni ngo shes pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:290a-8: sna tshogs kyi dbye bas tha dad pa'i phyir shes pa tha dad pa ni de dang tha mi dad pa'i tha dad pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:290a-9: rang bzhin gang gis shes pa las tha dad pa'i rang bzhin des ni gcig nyid yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:290a-10: des na zlos pa yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:290a-11: 'on te bdag rtogs pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:290a-12: de'i tshe de shes pas rtogs par byed pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:290a-13: de'ang tha dad pa'i phyir ci ltar des tha mi dad pa 'dzin pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:290a-14: de'i phyir shes pa tha dad na gcig nyid 'dzin par mi 'thad pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:290a-15: don gyis go bas shes pa gcig nyid du brtag par bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:290a-16: 'o na don gyis go bas shes pa tha dad pa 'dzin pa de lta na yang shes pa gcig tu mi rtogs pa des na ci ltar ngo shes pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:290a-17: 'on te du ma 'phrigs pa ngo shes pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:290a-18: 'on te du ma 'phrigs pa ngo shes pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:290a-19: de lta yin na bde ba la sogs pa yang yin pas de'i phyir gcig nyid kun rdzob tu yod pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:290a-20: de nyid la yang nas yang du goms par byed pas bde ba la sogs pa'i gsal ba la sogs pa'i khyad par ni goms pa las 'gyur ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:290a-21: goms pa las skyes pa'i bde ba la sogs pa yang rtogs pa'i rang bzhin bdag nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:290a-22: goms pa las 'gro ba la sogs pa yang bsgyings pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:290a-23: de dag ni blo'i rang bzhin yang ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:290a-25: rtogs min rang bzhin goms pa las //
T11TD4221.1E:290a-27: de bzhin rtogs pa'i rang bzhin ni //
T11TD4221.1E:290a-28: goms pas ci'i phyir rtogs dngos min //
T11TD4221.1E:290a-29: shes rab la sogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:290a-30: ci ste yang rtogs pa'i rang bzhin goms pa zhes bya ba ci rang rig goms pa yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:290a-31: 'on te rtogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis bzung ba'i don goms pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:290a-32: gal te rang rig goms pa yin na rang rig de ni ma grub bo //
T11TD4221.1E:290a-33: 'on te phyogs gnyis pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:290a-34: de ma nges pa nyid srid pas mi 'thad pa nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:290b-0: rtogs @290b pa'i rang bzhin gyis bzung ba'i 'gro ba la sogs pa goms kyang 'gro ba la sogs pa rtogs pa'i rang bzhi nyid du dmigs pa med pa'i phyir ro zhen /
T11TD4221.1E:290b-3: de ni de bzhin nyid 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:290b-4: bde sogs nang gi myong ba ni //
T11TD4221.1E:290b-5: goms pa'i 'bras bu de bzhin nyid ;
T11TD4221.1E:290b-6: / bde ba la sogs pa ni nang gi myong ba'i rang bzhin du dmigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:290b-7: bems po'i rang bzhin yin yang don gcig la 'du bas de ltar dmigs so zhes bya ba 'di yang rigs pa la brten pa'i dga' ba thob pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:290b-8: des na rang rig pa nyid goms par byad pa de'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:290b-9: goms pa rab tu gyur ba ni de lta bur gyur pa nyid skye'o //
T11TD4221.1E:290b-10: 'o na dang po ni rang rig pa med par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:290b-11: rigs gang ga las zhes bya bas de yang de lta bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:290b-12: de'i bsgoms pa'i stobs las skyes pa ni shes rab la sogs pa bzhin du myong ba'i ngo bo nyid do zhes gnas so //
T11TD4221.1E:290b-14: de dang de min rang bzhin dngos //
T11TD4221.1E:290b-15: de dang de min dngos rgyus bskyed //
T11TD4221.1E:290b-16: rnam shes rgyu las gzhan min skyes //
T11TD4221.1E:290b-17: gzugs sogs de cis shes ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:290b-18: zhes bya ba de yang spangs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:290b-20: mig dang yid la byed pa dang //
T11TD4221.1E:290b-21: mdun na gnas pa'i shing rta la sogs pa'i tshogs pa mtshungs pa can dag phan tshun lhan cig byed pa nyid kyis skyed pa na thams cad rtogs pa'i rang bzhin nam rtog pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:290b-22: de la gtso bo dang cig shos kyi rnam par dbye ba ni 'ga' yang med do zhes bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:290b-23: rtogs pa dang rtogs pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'bras bu la nus pa mthong ba can gyi gzugs la sogs pa'i tshogs pa de ni gzhan du bsgrub par nus pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:290b-24: de nyid kyi phyir de nyid kyis ma nges so zhes na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:290b-25: gtan tshigs kyi don gzhan du brjod par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:290b-26: ci ltar bsgom pa 'phel ba las //
T11TD4221.1E:290b-27: skyes pa'i shes rab la sogs bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:290b-28: bde ba la sogs rgyu de las //
T11TD4221.1E:290b-29: de ltar rang rig cis ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:290b-30: gang ci ltar goms pa de lta bu nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba tshad ma'i don to //
T11TD4221.1E:290b-31: gzugs la sogs pa dag ni rang gi rang bzhin du goms par mi srid do //
T11TD4221.1E:291a-0: re zhig shes rab la sogs pa'i khyad par don gyis go @291a * //
T11TD4221.1E:291a-1: bas rtogs par bya ba yin pa des de bdag dang 'du ba yin no zhes ci ltar rtogs par bya /
T11TD4221.1E:291a-2: don gyis go bas ni gang med par gang mi 'thad pa de rtogs pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
T11TD4221.1E:291a-4: rtogs pa'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir mi 'thad pa cung zad kyang med do //
T11TD4221.1E:291a-5: 'on kyang gang gi phyir don lkog tu gyur pa ma yin par 'gyur ba gzhan 'ga' zhig kyang yod dgos so zhes bya ba tsam du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:291a-6: des na ci ltar bdag dang 'du ba can la sogs par rtogs /
T11TD4221.1E:291a-7: de'i phyir gang gis nang nyid du rtogs par 'gyur ba bdag gis 'di ltar rtogs so zhes skye bos rtogs pa nang nyid du goms par byas pa yin no zhes bya ba lan yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:291a-8: gang dag blo blo gzhan gyi mngon sum yin par smra ba de dag gi ltar na yang /
T11TD4221.1E:291a-9: de bdag dang 'du ba can dang rtogs pa'i rang bzhin du snang ngo zhes gdon mi za bar khas blangs te /
T11TD4221.1E:291a-10: de lta ma yin na don gzhan tsam kho nar 'gyur gyi 'dzin par byed pa nyid du ni mi 'grub pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:291a-11: de'i phyir 'di mngon sum gzhan la de la gnas pa 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin du snang ba'i yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:291a-12: de lta yin dang de la yang don de snang bar 'gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:291a-14: blo 'ba' zhig snang na 'dzin par byed pa por ci ltar snang /
T11TD4221.1E:291a-15: bdag la sogs pa yang de bzhin no zhes bshad ba na /
T11TD4221.1E:291a-17: de'i bdag nyid sgro 'dogs pa thog ma med pa'i dus can skye ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lan du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:291a-18: de lta yin dang dus de lta bu nyid du go mas pa'i stobs las skyes pa'i shes rab la sogs pa'am bde ba la sogs pa'i yang rtogs pa'i rang bzhin kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:291a-19: gal te de lta na'ang gzhan dag blo la sogs pa myong ba'i rang bzhin du khas mi len pa ma yin nam zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:291a-20: gal te myong ba ma yin na mngon sum nyid dang nang nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhes bstan zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:291a-21: rang rig pa yin na ni de lta bur gyur pa'i bdag nyid dang /
T11TD4221.1E:291a-22: don yang gsal bar byed pa'i gsal ba de yong pa yin pas 'di nyid rigs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:291a-23: ci ste bde ba la sogs pa goms pa'i stobs las skye ba can yin yang bdag dang 'du ba can kho na yin pas don gcig la 'du ba can gyi rnam par shes pas gzung ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:291b-0: des na @291b rtogs pa dang 'dres pa nyid kyis rtogs pa'i rang bzhin du snang gi rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas ni ma yin no zhes de ltar ci ste mi rtag ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:291b-2: thog med goms pa'i ngo bo las //
T11TD4221.1E:291b-3: 'di ni de ltar yin zhes gnas //
T11TD4221.1E:291b-4: de las tshul gzhan rnam rtog ni //
T11TD4221.1E:291b-5: 'jig rten gyis ni nges pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:291b-6: bsgoms pa'i stobs las de ltar skyes so zhes rtogs pa'i gang yin pa de la 'di ni 'di dang 'di lta bu yin no zhes lugs gzhan 'jig rten la skye ba 'di mi thob bo //
T11TD4221.1E:291b-7: 'on kyang 'di ci ltar bsgoms pa'i stobs las mthong ba de ni de kho na ltar yin no zhes tha snyad du byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:291b-8: don gcig la 'du bar brtags pa la dgos pa yang ci zhig yod /
T11TD4221.1E:291b-9: gal te bdag la 'du bar mi 'dod na /
T11TD4221.1E:291b-10: 'o na bde ba de su'i yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:291b-11: de lta na 'o na gal te de gzhan du 'du bar mi 'dod na bdag de su'i yin /
T11TD4221.1E:291b-12: bdag ni rang dbang rtag pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:291b-13: gzhan la ci ltar der rag las //
T11TD4221.1E:291b-14: bde sogs rnams ni mi rtag pas //
T11TD4221.1E:291b-15: gzhan la rag las yin par rtog / bdag ni rtag pas na rang dbang yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:291b-16: mi brten par 'thad pas de ltar 'thad kyi bde ba la sogs pa ni yon tan dang mi rtag pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:291b-18: gdon mi za bar brten pa nyid du 'gyur dgos so zhe na de ni mi bzang ste /
T11TD4221.1E:291b-20: rten yod na ni yon tan yin //
T11TD4221.1E:291b-21: yon tan yod na'ang rten gnas te //
T11TD4221.1E:291b-22: de ltar phan tshun brten pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:291b-23: gcig kyang rnam bar gnas mi 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:291b-24: gal te dang po yon tan nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:291b-25: grub na de'i tshe yon tan brten pa yin par 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba'i rtog pa 'jug pa zhig na /
T11TD4221.1E:291b-27: grub pa ni gzhan la brten pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:291b-28: rten dang brten pa'i dngos po ni 'ga' yang med do zhes 'di ni bstan zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:291b-29: gzhan yang bdag ni rang dbang yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:291b-31: bde ba la sogs pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:291b-32: bzlog pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa /
T11TD4221.1E:291b-33: mi rtag na yang rgyu las ni //
T11TD4221.1E:291b-34: skyes pa'i phyir na ltos pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:291b-35: de la bya rgyu med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:291b-36: gzhan la ji ltar rag las 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:291b-37: gal te ma skyes pa nyid yin na de ci ltar gzhan la rag las /
T11TD4221.1E:291b-38: 'on te rgyu 'ga' zhig las skyes na de lta na yang de gzhan la rag las pa ci yod /
T11TD4221.1E:292a-0: rang gi 'bras bu skyed pa la gzhan la rag las so zhe na de'i rang gi @292a * //
T11TD4221.1E:292a-1: 'bras bu bskyed pa ni rang gi rgyu nyid las yin pa'i phyir gzhan la rag las pa nyid du mi 'thad de /
T11TD4221.1E:292a-3: de'i phyir bde ba la sogs pa nyid rang dbang yin la rag mod /
T11TD4221.1E:292a-4: rten bdag brtags pas ci zhig bya /
T11TD4221.1E:292a-5: bde ba la sogs pa rang rig pa ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:292a-6: phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid du yang ci ltar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:292a-7: don gcig la 'du ba can gyi rnam par shes pas myong bar 'gyur ro zhe na 'dir smras pa /
T11TD4221.1E:292a-8: ci don gcig la 'du ba can gyi dbang po las skyes pa'i rnam par shes pa rig gam /
T11TD4221.1E:292a-10: re zhig dbang po'i rnam par shes pas ni ma yin te ;
T11TD4221.1E:292a-12: don gang nye bas blo dang ni //
T11TD4221.1E:292a-13: bde sogs de dag skyes gyur pa //
T11TD4221.1E:292a-14: de bor nas ni bde sogs nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:292a-15: des ni ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:292a-16: mig la sogs pas gzugs la sogs pa la sbyar ba /
T11TD4221.1E:292a-17: gzugs la sogs pa la mngon par phyogs pa dbang po'i blo gang yin pa de nyid ci ltar bde ba la sogs pa kho nar rtogs pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:292a-18: bdag gi mig bde ba la zhugs so snyam pa'i blo ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:292a-19: 'on te bde ba 'dzin pa'i rnam par shes pa gzugs nyid la zhugs pas 'jug par 'gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:292a-20: de lta yin na ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:292a-21: rjes su dpag pa yang mig la brten pa la sogs par thal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:292a-22: 'on te dbang po'i rnam par shes pa las 'dzin par byed pa'i rnam pa gzhan ma dmigs pa des na de nyid kyis yin par brjod do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:292a-23: 'o na rnam par brtag par bya ba yang dus mtshungs pa'i dbang po'i shes pas gzung ba yin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:292a-24: rjes su dpag par bya ba la yang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang brjod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:292a-25: der 'dzin pa'i rnam pa gzhan dmigs pa ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:292a-26: 'on te gzung ba'i rnam pa las de lta bu'i 'dzin pa rtog pa yin na rnam par brtag par bya ba'i sgra la yang 'di mtshungs so //
T11TD4221.1E:292a-27: bde ba la sogs pa la yang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa ci ste mi rtag ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:292a-28: gzung bar bya ba nyid du myong ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:292a-29: don gcig la 'du ba can yin yang 'dzin par byed pa gzhan gyis gzung ba'i phyir gzung ba nyid med pa yin no zhes brjod par ni mi nus so //
T11TD4221.1E:292a-30: gcig tu 'dres pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:292b-2: gcig gi yang rang gi ngo bo ma bzung ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:292b-3: bde ba'i rnam pa nyid 'ba' zhig myong ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:292b-4: myong ba ma yin pa'i bde ba gzhan yang yod do zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:292b-5: nye bar 'jog pa gzhan ma dmigs pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:292b-6: shing la gong bu'i rnam par rtog pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:292b-7: 'on te nye bar 'jog pa gzhan rjes su dpag pas bsgrub pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:292b-8: gang zhig rtogs pa de ni gzhan gyis nye bar gzhag pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:292b-9: gong bu bzhin no zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:292b-10: phyi rol gyi don med par thal pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:292b-11: nye bar 'jog pa bag chags srid ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:292b-12: de'i phyir gang zhig ci ltar rtogs pa de ni de kho na ltar khong du chud par bya ba yin gyi de rjes su dpag pas gzhan du gzhag par bya ba ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:292b-13: des na phyi rol gyi don rang gi ngo bos gzung bar bya ba nyid du rtogs pa ni de bzhin du rnam par gzhag pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:292b-14: rnam par 'jog pa ni rtogs pa tsam la rag las pa yin pa'i phyir ro ;
T11TD4221.1E:292b-15: / bde ba la sogs pa ni gzung bar bya ba nyid du ma dmigs te /
T11TD4221.1E:292b-16: des na rang rig pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:292b-17: 'on te bdag dang yid 'brel pa tsam las skyes pa'i shes pa bde ba la sogs pa'i 'dzin par byed pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:292b-18: dbang po las skyes pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:292b-19: de lta yin na shes pa dus gcig tu mi skye ba'i phyir rim gyis 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:292b-21: rim gyis 'dzin na de myong ba //
T11TD4221.1E:292b-22: rnam chad med par snang mi 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:292b-23: rim gyis 'dzin par khas len na bde ba la sogs pa'i blo rnam par chad pa med par snang bar mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:292b-24: rim pa ni 'di nyid de lhan cig 'byung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba gang yin pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:292b-25: bde ba la sogs pa 'dzin pa ni gzugs la sogs pa 'dzin pa dang lhan cig tu dmigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:292b-26: de la lhan cig tu 'dzin pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:292b-27: lhan cig tu mi 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni 'gal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:292b-28: 'gal ba dag ni gcig la srid pa yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:292b-29: mgyogs phyir zhe na de mtshungs phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:292b-30: myong ba med pa cis ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:292b-31: gal te bde ba 'dzin pa mgyogs par 'jug pa'i phyir rnam par ma chad par rtogs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:293a-0: rtogs pa kho na ste bar ma gtogs pa yin no zhe na myur ba de ni bde ba la sogs pa mi 'dzin pa la yang mtshungs pa'i phyir bde ba la sogs pa dang gzugs mi 'dzin pa nyid rnam par @293a * //
T11TD4221.1E:293a-2: 'on te mi 'dzin pa yang rnam par ma chad par snang ba nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:293a-3: 'di ltar bde ba mi 'dzin pa nyid ni /
T11TD4221.1E:293a-4: gzugs 'dzin pa las gzhan ma yin /
T11TD4221.1E:293a-5: gzugs mi 'dzin pa'ang bde ba 'dzin pa las gzhan yod pa ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:293a-6: des na bde ba mi 'dzin pa rnam par chad pa med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don 'dir 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:293a-7: gzugs la sogs pa 'dzin pa rnam par ma chad bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yin na de ni yin pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:293a-8: de bzhin du bzlog pa la yang brjod do //
T11TD4221.1E:293a-9: de'i phyir 'dzin pa med pa rnam par ma chad par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni grub pa la sgrub pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:293a-11: gcig gi dngos po gang yin ba //
T11TD4221.1E:293a-12: gzhan dag med pa yin par brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:293a-13: de ni de yis dben pas na //
T11TD4221.1E:293a-14: de med par ni rig phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:293a-15: 'di rang gi ngo bos ni gang yang med pa ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:293a-16: 'on kyang des dben pas yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:293a-17: des na gzugs 'dzin pa bde ba 'dzin pas dben par dmigs pa yin no zhes khas len pa na des dben par 'dzin pa de myur ba yin pa'i phyir de rnam par ma chad par yod pas ji ltar bde ba rig pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:293a-18: bde ba 'dzin pa la yang tshul 'di nyid yin pa'i phyir gnyi ga mi 'dzin pas na /
T11TD4221.1E:293a-19: 'dzin pa med pa nyid du ci ste ma yin zhes bya ba legs par brjod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:293a-20: gzhan du gzhan dmigs na yang de sa dben pa 'dzin pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:293a-21: de'i rang bzhin der zhugs pa'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:293a-22: phan tshun rang bzhin rjes su zhugs pa 'dzin na /
T11TD4221.1E:293a-23: rim gyis 'dzin pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:293a-24: dus gzhan mnyam par 'dzin pa la yang yod pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:293a-25: yan lag dang yan lag can dag dus mtshungs par 'dzin par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:293a-26: gal te thag ring po nas bar dang bcas pa'i sgra du ma 'dzin pa na bar 'dzin pa med kyang sgra'i rang bzhin gzung ba nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:293a-27: de la ci ltar sgra'i rang bzhin bar med par 'dzin pas de'i phyir mi 'dzin pa la gnod kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:293a-28: de bzhin du bar 'dzin pa med pas ni sgra 'dzin pa la mi gnod pa de bzhin du 'dir yang bar mi 'dzin pa'i gnod par byed pa ma yin no zhe na 'dir brjod pa /
T11TD4221.1E:293a-29: de la bar chad 'dzin pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:293a-30: yod min ci ltar gnod byed yin //
T11TD4221.1E:293a-31: med par gnod par bya min la //
T11TD4221.1E:293b-1: ci'i phyir bar chad 'dzin pa med ce na /
T11TD4221.1E:293b-2: 'di ni dngos po rnams kyi nus pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:293b-3: ci zhig brgal zhing brtag / des na bar chad 'dzin pa ma skyes pa ni gnod par byed pa ma yin zhing /
T11TD4221.1E:293b-4: gnod par bya ba yang ma yin gyi 'on kyang 'di ni rnam pa ci zhig ltar 'jig rten gyi grags pa las 'ongs pa'i tha snyad tsam du zad do //
T11TD4221.1E:293b-5: der ni bde ba dang gzugs la sogs pa 'dzin pa'i ma skyes ba ma yin pa'i phyir mi 'thad pa cung zad kyang med do //
T11TD4221.1E:293b-6: de lta yin na rim gyis 'dzin pa mi srid par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:293b-7: 'dzin pa ni yod pa kho na ste /
T11TD4221.1E:293b-8: de la 'dzin pa gzhan ma skyes pa yin no zhe na de ni med de /
T11TD4221.1E:293b-11: de ltar gzhan gyis kyang 'dod bya //
T11TD4221.1E:293b-12: de lta min na cal col nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:293b-13: 'dzin par byed pa ni rang gsal ba'i bdag nyid du 'gyur dgos la /
T11TD4221.1E:293b-14: 'dzin par byed pa po byed pa'i bdag nyid dam /
T11TD4221.1E:293b-15: byed pa po la ni 'dzin par byed pa gzhan 'dod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:293b-16: 'dzin par byed pa gsal ba ma yin pa ni don thams cad mi gsal bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:293b-17: gal te dbang po'am gzhan las 'dzin par byed pa rang gsal ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:293b-18: da ni 'dzin pa po gzhan gyis ci bya zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:293b-19: skyon gzhan 'di ni yod pa nyid na rang nyid gsal ba med par 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:293b-20: de gzhan gyis gsal bar yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:293b-21: gsal bar byed pa gzhan yang lkog tu gyur pa nyid pas de gzhan gyis yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:293b-22: 'gro ba mtha' dag long ba nyid du 'gyur ro zhes ston par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:293b-23: phan tshun dus tha dad par skyes pa snang bar 'gyur ba de dag ci ltar phan tshun gnod par byed pa ma yin te de'i phyir 'di ni gyi na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:293b-24: 'on te bde ba 'dzin pa la ni gnod par 'gyur ba nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:293b-25: res 'ga' gzugs la sogs pa 'ba' zhig 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:293b-26: 'di ltar res 'ga' yid 'phrog pa'i gzugs mthong yang bde ba myong ba med pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:293b-27: des na skra'i 'dzin pa ltar bde ba 'dzin pa yang ma skyes pa'i phyir gnod par rnam par gzhag go zhe na 'di yang bzang po ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:293b-29: ci ltar skra'i bar 'dzin pa ltar //
T11TD4221.1E:293b-30: kun tshe ci phyir gnod ma gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:293b-31: de tshe bde ba la sogs pa //
T11TD4221.1E:294a-2: / ci ltar skra 'dzin pas bar 'dzin par thams cad kyi tshe /
T11TD4221.1E:294a-3: gnod pa de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa 'dzin pas kyang bde ba la sogs pa 'dzin pa la 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:294a-4: don dam par na ni de skra 'dzin pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:294a-5: skra'i rang bzhin rtogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:294a-6: gang gi tshe bde ba ma rtogs par gzugs la sogs pa 'ba' zhig 'dzin pa de'i tshe ni bde ba ma skyes pa nyid yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:294a-7: skyes pa ma bzung bas 'ba' zhig ba zhes rnam par 'jog pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:294a-8: ma dmigs pa'i phyir ma skyes par tha snyad byed pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:294a-9: da ni skyes ba lam skyes bar tha snyad du 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:294a-10: des na ma dmigs pa yang ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:294a-11: des na gang gi tshe bde ba la sogs pa 'dzin pa'i skyes pa de nyid kyi tshe bde ba la sogs pa skyes pa yin pas de'i tshe ni gzugs la sogs pa 'dzin pas zil gyis non pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:294a-12: khyed kyi gzhung ltar na ni skra'i bar 'dzin pa ltar 'gyur ro ;
T11TD4221.1E:294a-13: /'on te dbang po'i blo gcig nyid don dang bde ba la sogs pa 'dzin pa la 'jug pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:294a-14: des na rim gyis 'dzin pa'i nyes pa ni mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:294a-15: de ni mi rung ngo zhes 'chad pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:294a-16: gcig gis gnyis shes ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:294a-17: dbang po'i sems ni des phyir dang //
T11TD4221.1E:294a-18: bde sogs med kyang don dag las //
T11TD4221.1E:294a-19: skyes phyir de nus grub min phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:294a-20: gal te dbang po'i blo gcig nyid kyis don dang bde ba la sogs pa 'dzin na rigs pa zhig na /
T11TD4221.1E:294a-21: de ltar yang ma yin no zhes bstan pa yin no /
T11TD4221.1E:294a-22: bde ba la sogs pa ni bdag dang yid 'brel pa tsam las skyes pa dbang po las skyes pa ma yin pa'i shes bas 'dzin par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:294a-23: 'on te 'ga' zhig de ltar khas mi len no zhe na de yang nus pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:294a-24: dbang po'i blo ni bde ba la sogs pa med kyang don 'ba' zhig nyid las skye ba'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:294a-25: bde ba la sogs pa'i rgyur nges par mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:294a-26: gang zhig nus pa gzhan yod kyang gang zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:294a-27: mi 'byung ba de ni de'i rgyu nyid du nges par 'dzin pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:294a-28: dbang po'i sems ni gzugs la sogs pa'i tshogs pa yod kyang bde ba la sogs pa med na mi skye ba nyid ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:294b-0: ci ste gang gi tshe sngon po ser po dang lhan cig dbang po'i rig pa las snang ba'i @294b tshe ;
T11TD4221.1E:294b-1: de'i tshe de la nus pa med par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:294b-2: sngon po med kyang de skye ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:294b-3: de lta mod kyi de ni de la nus pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:294b-4: 'on te sngon po dang ser por snang ba'i dbang po'i shes pa ser po 'ba' zhig las mi skye'o zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:294b-5: de lta na ni 'o na bde ba dang gzugs su snang ba yang gzugs 'ba' zhig las ma yin pas rigs pa mtshungs so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:294b-6: 'di la ni snying po med de /
T11TD4221.1E:294b-7: sngon po dbang po'i rnam shes la //
T11TD4221.1E:294b-8: nus pa so sor mthong ba'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:294b-9: tshogs la'ang nus grub de la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:294b-10: de ltar rtogs pa yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:294b-12: gnyis kyi so so so sor yang //
T11TD4221.1E:294b-13: nus pa yin na sngo sogs bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:294b-15: de rgyu'i don ni ma bzung bar//
T11TD4221.1E:294b-16: de myong bar ni mi rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:294b-17: bde ba la sogs pa dang bral ba'i gzugs la sogs pa 'ba' zhig las dbang po'i rnam par shes pa de skye ba mthong ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:294b-19: rnam par shes pa'i sngon rol du ni gzugs la sogs pa ltar bde ba la sogs pa yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:294b-20: de ni rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig nyid du gzugs la sogs pa de nyid las skye ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:294b-21: 'on te dus mtshungs par 'byung ba yin yang lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu yin pa nyid du 'dod do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:294b-22: de ni mi rung ste lhan cig 'byung ba'i 'bras bu ni phan tshun 'brel bar 'gyur gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:294b-23: rig bya rig byed kyi dngos por ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:294b-24: rig pa'i rang bzhin min pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:294b-25: phan tshun 'dzin par byed pa min //
T11TD4221.1E:294b-26: rang rig pa yi rang bzhin yang //
T11TD4221.1E:294b-27: phan tshun 'dzin par byed pa min //
T11TD4221.1E:294b-28: rang gi rgyu las mngon phyogs pas //
T11TD4221.1E:294b-29: dus mtshungs pa nyid yin na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:294b-30: gzhan shig pa yi bdag nyid kyis //
T11TD4221.1E:294b-32: bde ba la ni mngon phyogs de //
T11TD4221.1E:294b-33: ci ltar dbang po las skyes 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:294b-34: de la dbang po'i byed pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:294b-35: rig byed de ni sngar bshad zin //
T11TD4221.1E:294b-36: gzhan yang so sor nus pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:294b-37: bde ba la sogs pa 'ba' zhig 'dzin par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:294b-39: 'dzin pa yang kho na'o zhe na de ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:294b-40: gzugs la sogs pa bde ba'i rgyu ma bzung bar ni bde ba 'dzin par mi rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:294b-41: rig par bya ba nyid kyang 'thad pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:294b-42: na chung sgeg mo rtogs pa med pa'i bde ba ni 'ga' yang don du gnyer ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:295a-0: @295a * // 'dod pa can gyi skye bo mtha' dag ni de nyid kyis bde ba 'dod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:295a-1: de ltar yang ma dmigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:295a-2: 'on te lhan cig pa nyid nus pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:295a-3: de ltar na 'on kyang zla ba gnyis par yang 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:295a-4: de nyid kyi phyir bshad pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:295a-5: don dang lhan cig nyid 'dzin na //
T11TD4221.1E:295a-6: bde sogs kyi ni nus pa ci //
T11TD4221.1E:295a-7: gang phyir de phyir blo mi 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:295a-8: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa med par ni nus pa mi 'grub bo //
T11TD4221.1E:295a-10: mig la sogs pa'i blo ni de las skyes pa pha rol po dag mi 'dod do //
T11TD4221.1E:295a-12: don med par ni bde la sogs //
T11TD4221.1E:295a-13: mig sogs rnams kyis myong na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:295a-14: gzugs sogs bud med sogs khyad par //
T11TD4221.1E:295a-16: 'ba' zhig gis ni gzugs la sogs pa bde ba dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i rgyu nyid dang bud med la sogs pa'i mthun pa dang mi mthun pa nyid du 'dzin par mi 'gyur gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:295a-17: rgyu 'ga' zhig yod do zhes rtogs par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:295a-18: lhan cig bzung na rgyu nyid du rtogs so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:295a-19: 'o na ni sngon po la sogs pa yang phan tshun rgyu nyid du rtogs par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:295a-21: de'i phyir 'di ni 'thad pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:295a-22: gal te bde ba 'ba' zhig mig la sogs pas 'dzin par nus pa yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:295a-23: de'i tshe gzugs la sogs pa mthong ba mi skye ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:295a-25: nang gi yan lag nus pa'i don //
T11TD4221.1E:295a-26: yod na phyi rol mthong mi 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:295a-27: gal te phyi rol du bud med la sogs pa ma mthong bar bde ba myong ba nyid 'gyur ba yin na ni de'i tshe phyi rol mi mthong bar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:295a-28: bde ba myong ba bar du gcod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:295a-29: don 'dzin pa yang 'dod pa nyid do zhes khas len na de'i tshe nyes pa gzhan /
T11TD4221.1E:295a-30: don 'dzin na de de las skyes //
T11TD4221.1E:295a-31: bde ba la sogs myong mi 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:295a-32: 'di ltar don 'dzin pa'i dus na gal te bde ba skye ba yin pa de lta na yang de 'dzin ba'i tshogs pa med de /
T11TD4221.1E:295a-33: dbang po dang don dang yid phrad pa las byung ba'i yid kyis ni gzugs la sogs pa'i don 'dzin la yid gzhan yang yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:295a-34: shes pa dus gcig tu skye bar khas mi len pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:295a-35: des na de las skyes pa'i bde ba la sogs pa mi 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:295b-0: 'on te rnam par shes pa cig @295b car skye bar 'dod na de'i tshe yang nyes pa gzhan yod do zhes bshad pa ni /
T11TD4221.1E:295b-1: yul de dang ni de yod las //
T11TD4221.1E:295b-2: blo ni cig car skye pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:295b-3: cig car don ni yod pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:295b-4: bde sdug dag ni rig par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:295b-5: 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa'i don yod na /
T11TD4221.1E:295b-6: bde ba dang sdug bsngal rig pa dag cig car 'gyur ba bzlog par mi nus so //
T11TD4221.1E:295b-7: 'di ni mthong ba nyid ma yin nam 'di ltar grang ba'i dus na grang ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:295b-8: dro ba'i reg pa myong ba las skyes pa'i bde ba dang sdug bsngal rig pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:295b-10: 'di ltar rtag tu 'gyur ro snyam du bsams pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:295b-11: yul gyi ros yid 'phrogs pa rje bo'i gla'i yo byang byin pa'i gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa /
T11TD4221.1E:295b-12: bdag nyid 'bras bu dang bcas par 'dod pa ni mtshon gyis reg pa'i sdug bsngal reg pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:295b-13: sdug bsngal gyi rgyu nye ba na de gdon mi za bar skye ba yang yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:295b-14: des na bde ba dang sdug bsngal lhan cig rig par thal lo ;
T11TD4221.1E:295b-15: /'on te gzhan gyis zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir gzhan rig pa ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:295b-16: de ni mi 'thad de zil gyis non pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:295b-17: chen po nyid la sogs pa zil gyis gnon zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:295b-18: glang po dang sbrang bu dag gcig rtogs pa med par thal ba'i phyir ro ;
T11TD4221.1E:295b-19: /'dod pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba la yang dag pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:295b-20: gnyi ga yang lhan cig mthong ba'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:295b-21: bde ba dang sdug bsngal dag cig car myong bar bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:295b-22: 'du byed pa gsal ba las la lar yang 'gyur ro zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:295b-23: goms pa las ma gtogs pa'i 'du byed pa gzhan ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:295b-24: bsgoms pa'i stobs las bde ba la sogs pa skye ba yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:295b-25: de'i tshe rtogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid do zhes bstan zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:295b-26: 'on te yang shes pa ni bde ba la sogs pa la goms pa'i stobs kyis 'jug pa yin la bde ba la sogs pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i rgyu nyid las 'byung ba yin no zhe na 'di yang rung ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:295b-28: dngos po'i stobs las skye ba yi //
T11TD4221.1E:295b-29: shes pa gang yin de la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:295b-30: mkhas rnams goms pa khas len min //
T11TD4221.1E:296a-0: gal te bde ba la sogs pa dag nye bar gnas pa nyid yin na ni de goms pa @296a * //
T11TD4221.1E:296a-1: med par yang mthong ba kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:296a-3: ma myong ba gcig nyid kyi tshe /
T11TD4221.1E:296a-4: dmigs pa'i yul du mi 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:296a-5: de la yang bar du gcod pa'i goms pa yod pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:296a-7: gzhan yang don gyi rnam pa goms pa med par ni shes pa goms par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:296a-8: 'ba' zhig goms par bya ba mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:296a-9: gal te shes pa goms pa'i stobs kyis skye ba yin na don la sogs pa la ltos pa ni yod /
T11TD4221.1E:296a-10: 'on te don dang lhan cig pa'i goms pa las yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:296a-11: de lta yin na don gyi rnam pa yang goms pa'i stobs nyid las skyes par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:296a-12: de ltar gyur na rmi lam la sogs pa bzhin du shes pa don dang bral ba nyid du 'gyur bas bde ba la sogs pa rnam par shes pa las phyi rol par bsgrub tu chas pa don yang phyi rol gyi rang bzhin ma yin par bsgrub pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:296a-13: gzhan dag gzhan sun 'byin pa la cher gzo'o //
T11TD4221.1E:296a-14: bde ba dang sdug bsngal cig car 'byung ba ma yin par 'dod de /
T11TD4221.1E:296a-16: nang gi nyer len shes pa yang //
T11TD4221.1E:296a-17: yod na sdug bsngal la sogs 'byung //
T11TD4221.1E:296a-18: gcig po de ni 'gal ba yi //
T11TD4221.1E:296a-19: nyer len min par 'dod ce na //
T11TD4221.1E:296a-20: gang gis rnam par shes pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:296a-21: mi shes pa yi nyer lan rgyu //
T11TD4221.1E:296a-22: bdag po nyid du 'gyur yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:296a-24: dper na sna gcig mtshan rgyu dang //
T11TD4221.1E:296a-25: de las gzhan pa'i dbang po dag / gzugs mthong ba dang mi mthun dang //
T11TD4221.1E:296a-26: mthun pa cig car byed pa bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:296a-27: gal te bde ba la sogs pa shes pa snga ma'i nye bar len pa la ltos nas byung ba yin na de'i tshe /
T11TD4221.1E:296a-28: 'gal ba gnyis kyi nye bar len pa gcig yin par mi rigs pa zhig na //
T11TD4221.1E:296a-29: 'on kyang de nyid rigs pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:296a-30: bde ba la sogs pa 'gal ba la yang shes pa mthong ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:296a-31: 'on te 'gal ba'i nye bar len pa ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:296a-32: de ltar yin na rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa ma yin pa'i nye bar len par ci ltar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:296a-33: nye bar len pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:296a-34: rgyu rnams la 'bras bu'i bdag bo nyid yin pa 'ba' zhig tu zad la de ni 'gal ba la yang yod pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:296a-35: dper na snang bag chags gcig las 'ug pa dang gzhan dag gi mig la gnod pa dang /
T11TD4221.1E:296a-36: cig shos su 'gyur ba bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:296b-0: de'i phyir bde @296b sogs rang nyid la //
T11TD4221.1E:296b-1: 'phos pa'i don ni snang ba dang //
T11TD4221.1E:296b-2: rang bdag rig byed 'di dag gi / don las skyes pa tsam du zad //
T11TD4221.1E:296b-3: gal te bde ba la sogs pa'i rtogs pa'i bdag nyid ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:296b-4: gzugs la sogs pa las rnam par shes pa dang dus mtshungs par skye ba yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:296b-5: de'i tshe rtag tu 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa'i yul mngon du gyur pas bde ba dang sdug bsngal cig car rig par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:296b-6: khyed kyi ltar na yang ci ste de ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:296b-8: bag chags sad pa de dang 'dra ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:296b-9: gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa bzhin te /
T11TD4221.1E:296b-10: 'ga' zhig gi tshe nyid 'ga' zhig bag chags sad pa'i rgyu yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:296b-11: nged la yang de ltar yin no zhe na ma yin te 'di ltar /
T11TD4221.1E:296b-12: bag chags stobs las byung na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:296b-13: rtog pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:296b-14: bag chags dran dang ngo shes pa //
T11TD4221.1E:296b-15: nyid kyi rgyu ni yin par mthong //
T11TD4221.1E:296b-16: gal te dran pa la sogs pa yang rang gi ngo bos rig pa med pa nyid ma yin nam ;
T11TD4221.1E:296b-17: de la yang don nyid snang ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:296b-18: de la ni kha dog dang dbyibs kyi bdag nyid don gyi rang bzhin nyid snang gi / der yang shes pa'i rang bzhin gzhan ni rig pa'i yul du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:296b-19: de'i phyir blo mtha' dag ni lkog tu gyur pa 'ba' zhig go zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:296b-20: gal te der ni yod pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:296b-21: don nyid snang ba'i spyod yul na //
T11TD4221.1E:296b-22: don de mngon sum bzhin du ni //
T11TD4221.1E:296b-24: rang gi ngo bos snang ba'i don ni mngon sum ma yin par 'os pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:296b-25: rang gi ngo bos snang ba nyid mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:296b-26: mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:296b-27: de ltar gyur na mngon sum dang dran pa dag khyad par med par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:296b-28: 'on te snga ma nyid dang lkog tu gyur pa nyid du snang ba des na nyen pa 'di med do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:296b-29: lkog tu gyur pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig / de mngon sum gyis ni dmigs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:296b-30: mngon sum gyis ni dmigs 'gyur ba //
T11TD4221.1E:296b-31: dran pa nyid la 'jug pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:296b-32: gzhan pa sngar med rang bzhin ni //
T11TD4221.1E:296b-33: 'dzin na ji ltar dran pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:296b-34: dran pa ni mngon sum gyis dmigs pa la 'jug pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:296b-36: snga na med pa gzung ba yin na ci ltar dran pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:296b-37: sngon med pa'i yul can ni dran pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:297a-0: 'on te gzung ba'i don nyid la lkog tu gyur par 'dzin @297a * //
T11TD4221.1E:297a-1: ba'i phyir de dran pa yin par 'dod na de yang mi rung ste /
T11TD4221.1E:297a-2: lkog nyid don gyi ngo bo'am ci //
T11TD4221.1E:297a-3: ci ga shes pa'i ngo bo yin //
T11TD4221.1E:297a-4: don gyi rang bzhin nyid ce na //
T11TD4221.1E:297a-5: mngon sum la ni de snang 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:297a-6: don gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni mngon sum la snang bar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:297a-7: dper na sngon po nyid la sogs pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:297a-8: gal te nus pa nges pa'i phyir dran pa nyid la snang ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:297a-9: dper na dngos po yod pa dang med pa'i bdag nyid la yod pa'i rang bzhin ni mngon sum 'dzin cing dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni rang bzhin gzhan gyi dngos po med pa'i tshad ma'i spyod yul du 'gyur pa bzhin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:297a-10: de yang rang gi phyogs su ltung ba yin te 'di /
T11TD4221.1E:297a-11: dngos med dngos po yin na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:297a-12: ci ltar mngon sum gyis mi 'dzin //
T11TD4221.1E:297a-13: de las de ni tha dad na //
T11TD4221.1E:297a-14: dngos po gnyi gar ci ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:297a-15: dngos po tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam pa tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:297a-16: rnam pa tha dad kyang tha dad pa med pa yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:297a-17: ril rang bzhin gcig tu 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:297a-18: 'on te dngos po dag gi rnam pa tha dad pas du mar 'gyur gyi dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:297a-19: dngos po dag ni dngos po med pa las tha dad pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:297a-20: dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag la ni dngos po med pa gzhan med do //
T11TD4221.1E:297a-21: de lta ma yin na ni thug pa med par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:297a-22: gal te dngos med dngos po las //
T11TD4221.1E:297a-23: gzhan min gzhan 'dzin ci ltar yin //
T11TD4221.1E:297a-24: tshad ma tha dad phyir zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:297a-25: tha dad med par ga las 'dzin //
T11TD4221.1E:297a-26: gal te dngos po'i cha ni mngon sum gyis 'dzin la /
T11TD4221.1E:297a-27: dngos po med pa'i cha ni tshad ma gzhan gyis yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:297a-28: de lta yin na phan tshun ma 'dres par rtogs pa'i phyir ci ltar dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i bdag nyid gcig yin zhes bya bar rtogs /
T11TD4221.1E:297a-29: gal te mig gi rnam shes kyis gzugs rtogs la /
T11TD4221.1E:297a-30: gzhan gyis sgra la sogs pa yin na bdag nyid kyis gnyi ga rtogs so zhes byed pa po gcig nyid du ci ltar rtogs she na /
T11TD4221.1E:297a-31: 'di thog ma med pa'i bag chags las rtogs pa yin gyi de kho na nyid ma yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:297a-33: 'dir yang de bzhin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:297a-34: gal te de ltar thog ma med pa'i bag chags kyi stobs nyid las dngos po med pa'i tha dad par rtogs pa yang yin par 'gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:297b-0: don gzhan @297b brtags pas ci bya /
T11TD4221.1E:297b-1: dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ni tshad ma de yang bag chags kyi stobs las byung ba yin gyi don dam pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:297b-2: des na mi 'dra ba nyid kyis de las ldog pas na /
T11TD4221.1E:297b-3: dngos po med pas ci bya mi 'dra ba yang mngon sum nyid la snang ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:297b-4: des na 'di na med do zhes bya ba'i dus su phyis 'byung ba can de'i stobs las byung ba ni /
T11TD4221.1E:297b-5: gzung ba 'dzin pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:297b-6: dngos po med pa zhes bya ba'i tshad ma gzhan ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:297b-7: dngos po med pa'i tshad mas bdag gis dngos po med par rtogs so zhes bya ba 'di ni so so rang gi tha snyad yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:297b-8: 'jig rten ni gang gi phyir bltar rung ba bdag gis ma dmigs pa des na 'di ni med do zhe 'am /
T11TD4221.1E:297b-9: de 'dir dngos po yod pa ma yin no zhes mtshungs par don gyi tha snyad byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:297b-10: ma dmigs pa de yang mngon sum kho na yin no zhes bshad par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:297b-11: don dam par ni dngos po med pa zhes bya ba tshad ma ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:297b-12: gzhal bya yang ma yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:297b-13: de'i bdag nyid can yin yang nus pa nges pa'i dpe ma grub bo //
T11TD4221.1E:297b-15: ci ste dngos po med pa tshad ma gzhan yin no de bzhin du dran pa yang 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:297b-16: lkog tu gyur pa nyid la dran pa tshad ma kho na'o zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:297b-17: tshad ma'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:297b-18: lkog gyur nyid ni bzung na yang //
T11TD4221.1E:297b-20: rjes dpag chos can 'brel pa dag / gzung ba las ni 'jug pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:297b-21: 'di snyam du lkog tu gyur pa nyid shes par gyur na 'di la da ltar mngon sum du mi 'jug go zhes rtog pa dang ldan pa rjes su dpag pa 'jug par byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:297b-22: des na 'di lkog tu gyur pa nyid du rig pa'i dgos pa yin pas na /
T11TD4221.1E:297b-23: dran pa tshad ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:297b-24: de ltar ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:297b-25: 'di ltar 'brel pa bzung ba dang phyogs kyi chos la brten pa 'di las rjes su dpag pa 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:297b-26: du ba la sogs pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba'i de ma thag tu skye ba'i rjes su dpag pas me 'dzin pa na de'i sngar lkog tu gyur pa dag nyid nges par 'dzin par byed pa ni su yang med do //
T11TD4221.1E:297b-27: nges par 'dzin pa na yang dgos pa med do //
T11TD4221.1E:297b-28: 'o na res 'ga' zhig nges par 'dzin par byed pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:298a-0: sbyor bar byed pa'i cha 'ga' zhig / res 'ga' bar ni @298a * //
T11TD4221.1E:298a-2: cig sbyor bar byed pa'i don //
T11TD4221.1E:298a-3: rgyu nyid las ni ldog 'gyur ram //
T11TD4221.1E:298a-4: sbyor bar byed pa ni rgyu kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:298a-5: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa las 'das pa ni rgyu nyid ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:298a-6: rgyu nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni de tsam du zad pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:298a-8: dran pas lkog gyur nyid du ni //
T11TD4221.1E:298a-9: dngos po gang zhig shes par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:298a-10: rjes su dpag pas rtog pa gang //
T11TD4221.1E:298a-11: de ni dran pa'i spyod yul min //
T11TD4221.1E:298a-12: rjes su dpag pa'i yul du gyur pa'i don gang yin pa de ni dran pa'i yul ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:298a-13: de lta yin na shugs kyis rjes su dpag pa don med par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:298a-14: lkog tu gyur pa nyid ni dran pa nyid kyis bzung ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:298a-15: dran pas ni de lkog tu gyur pa nyid du rtogs kyi de'i tshe yod pa nyid du ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:298a-16: 'o na lkog tu gyur pa nyid du rtogs pa de gang zhig yin /
T11TD4221.1E:298a-17: sngon mthong ba'o zhen 'o na dus de'i mthar thug pa'i dngos po nyid dran pas lkog tu gyur pa nyid du rig pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:298a-18: gzhan ni ma yin pas na dran pa don med pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:298a-19: dran nas lkog tu gyur pa la 'jug pa des na dran pa tshad ma yin gyi rjes su dpag pa 'jug par byed pa'i phyir ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:298a-20: dran nas 'jug go zhes bya ba 'dis ni rnam par dpyad par bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:298a-21: ci de'i dus la 'jug par byed dam /
T11TD4221.1E:298a-23: gal te de yi dus la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:298a-24: 'jug na de'i thob mi nus so //
T11TD4221.1E:298a-25: rtog ldan thob bya'i don la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:298a-27: da ltar ba'i dus la ni dran par rtogs pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:298a-28: des na ci ltar tshad ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:298a-29: sngar ni dus kyi don la lkog tu gyur pa nyid du rtogs pa yin na de ni thob par mi nus so //
T11TD4221.1E:298a-30: yang na lkog tu gyur pa nyid ni mngon sum nyid kyis 'dzin pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:298a-31: mngon sum gyis de'i dus kyi mthar thug par gzung ba gang yin pa de nyid dus phyis la ltos te /
T11TD4221.1E:298a-32: lkog tu gyur pa nyid do /
T11TD4221.1E:298a-33: de'i rnam pa nyid ni bag chags kyi stobs las dran pa 'di'i bdag nyid du gyur pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:298a-34: de ni de lta bur gyur pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:298a-35: don nyid ce na don mos med //
T11TD4221.1E:298a-36: mos pa yi ni dbang nyid las //
T11TD4221.1E:298a-37: de nyid de nyid min par gnas //
T11TD4221.1E:298a-38: rang rig pas rtogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid ni don ce 'am /
T11TD4221.1E:298a-39: don ma yin no zhes rnam par gnas par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:298b-0: de'i 'og tu byung ba'i mos pas rnam par 'jog @298b pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-1: dran pa'i rnam pa la ni de yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:298b-2: 'di ltar rtogs pa dang ldan pa dag don gang yin pa de ni sngon mthong ba yin la rnam pa 'di ni de ltar goms pa'i stobs las skye ba can yin no zhes rtogs par byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-3: de'i phyir bde sog rang nyid la //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-4: 'phos pa'i don ni snang ba dang //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-5: rang bdag rig byed 'di dag ni //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-6: don las skye ba tsam du zad //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-7: ci ltar myong ba'i 'du byed las skyes pa'i dran pa rang la 'phos pa'i don gyi rnam pa rig par byed pa yin pa de bzhin du bde ba la sogs pa yang yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:298b-8: 'di ltar de dag kyang goms pa'i 'du byed las byung ba nang gi rig pa'i khyad par bdag nyid du gyur pa kho na'i rig par byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-9: 'o na ji ltar gzugs la sogs pa'i don la ltos she na /
T11TD4221.1E:298b-10: de'i sgo nas de dang rjes su mthun pa'i bag chags sang pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-11: reg pa 'brel pa las byung ba'i //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-12: bde ba'i rnam par myong ba las //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-13: skye bar gyur pa'i 'du byed de //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-14: de mthong ba las sad par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-15: 'khyud pa'i bde ba myong ba las shin tu brten par skyes pa'i bag chags ni phyis de 'dra ba'i gzugs mthong bas sad par gyur pa na de lta bur gyur pa nyid kyis nang gi rig pa'i bde ba skyed par byed do //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-16: 'di nyid ston par byed pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-17: don gyi bdag nyid de dag gi //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-18: rang gi bdag gyur des myong yin //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-19: des na don snang ba bshad de //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-20: dmigs pa nyid ni der snang ba'o //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-21: nang gi rig pa'i khyad par rung gi bdag nyid du gyur pa nyid bde ba la sogs pas myong ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-22: de nyid kyi phyir don myong bar brjod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:298b-23: de lta ma yin te gzhan du gyur pa myong ba yin na nges zhes 'brel par mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-25: gang phyir ngo bo'i rgyu las ni //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-26: rang gi ngo bo myong bar rigs //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-27: gzhan gyi ngo bo myong ba ni //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-28: ci ltar de yi tha dad phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-29: gzhan ni gzhan gyi ngo bo min //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-30: ci ltar de las gzhan gsal bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-31: sgron ma las ni bum pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-32: de 'dra'i gsal ba skye ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-33: gsal ba'i rnam par shes pa las //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-34: don gsal ba ni skye min gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-35: 'bras nyid yin na shes pa des //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-36: de ni ci ltar rtog par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:298b-37: gang zhig gi 'bras bu gang yin pa'i rgyu des ni rtogs pa ma yin no zhes 'thad do //
T11TD4221.1E:299a-0: de lta ma yin na blo las skyes pa'i lus kyi bya ba des rig @299a * //
T11TD4221.1E:299a-2: de'i phyir rang gi ngo bo nyid rig par 'thad pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:299a-3: 'on te mngon du phyogs par 'gyur bas rig pa yin gyi rang rig pas ni ma yin no zhe na de ni mi rigs te /
T11TD4221.1E:299a-4: rang bzhin mngon du phyogs gyur pas //
T11TD4221.1E:299a-5: gal te rang rgyu las skye na //
T11TD4221.1E:299a-6: gang gis de ni rig 'gyur ba //
T11TD4221.1E:299a-7: 'dir ni don la ci zhig yod //
T11TD4221.1E:299a-8: 'on te de ni don las kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:299a-9: mngon phyogs yin pas de skad brjod //
T11TD4221.1E:299a-10: mig las kyang ni mngon phyogs 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:299a-11: de ni ci ltar de rig min //
T11TD4221.1E:299a-12: dbang po don la phyogs she na //
T11TD4221.1E:299a-13: don la zhes byar ci ltar 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:299a-14: gal te don ni rig na 'di //
T11TD4221.1E:299a-15: don la phyogs par rig par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:299a-16: don rang gi ngo bos ma rtogs par ni de la mngon du phyogs pa nyid rtogs pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:299a-17: gal te don rang nyid rig go zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:299a-18: da ni rig pa mngon sum du phyogs pas ci zhig bya /
T11TD4221.1E:299a-19: grub par nye bar gnas pa la ni de nye par mkho ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:299a-20: de med par don snang bar mi rtogs so zhe na 'o na de dang lhan cig pa nyid du rig par 'gyur ba 'ba' zhig tu zad de de las gzhan ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:299a-21: des na de 'dzin to zhes bya ba 'di ni g-yar po'i rgyan no //
T11TD4221.1E:299a-23: 'ga' zhig bde sogs phyi rol na //
T11TD4221.1E:299a-24: gnas nyid dang ni sems med dang //
T11TD4221.1E:299a-25: gzung bar smra ste de yi yang //
T11TD4221.1E:299a-26: cig car gnyis 'dzin mi rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:299a-27: nges par 'dzin zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T11TD4221.1E:299a-28: sngon po la sogs pa bzhin du rang dbang du dmigs pa yin na nges par sngon po la sogs pa gzhan dang lhan cig 'dzin te zhes bya ba'i rgyu ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:299a-29: 'on te bde ba dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa 'di dag ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can gtso bo'i yongs su gyur pa yin te 'di ltar /
T11TD4221.1E:299a-30: gzhung lugs ni gtso bo las ni chen po /
T11TD4221.1E:299a-32: nga rgyal las de tsam lnga dang /
T11TD4221.1E:299a-34: las kyi dbang po lnga dang /
T11TD4221.1E:299a-36: de tsam lnga las ni 'byung ba chen po lnga ste /
T11TD4221.1E:299a-37: de ltar rnam par 'gyur ba'i rigs mtha' dag ni 'di tsam du zad do //
T11TD4221.1E:299a-38: rnam par 'gyur ba yang rang bzhin gyi rjes su 'gro ba can yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:299a-39: dper na 'jim pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba bum pa la sogs pa bzhin no zhes bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:299a-41: sngo sogs rang bzhin bde sogs dang //
T11TD4221.1E:299b-0: gcig phyir @299b cig car 'dzin ce na //
T11TD4221.1E:299b-1: tha dad snang can sems kyis ni //
T11TD4221.1E:299b-2: gzung de ji ltar tha mi dad //
T11TD4221.1E:299b-3: bde ba la sogs pa ni bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can gtso bo'i yongs su gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las yin /
T11TD4221.1E:299b-4: de'i rang bzhin rjes su 'gro bar mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:299b-5: 'di ltar 'dzin pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba ni de'i rjes su 'gro ba can du mthong ngo zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:299b-6: 'di ltar ma nges ba nyid ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:299b-7: sgra rnga bo che dang dbyig pa'i sbyor ba las skyes pa yin yang rnga bo che dang dbyig pa'i rjes su 'gro ba can ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:299b-8: gal te yang rlung ngam sgra'i rdul phra rab sgra nyid du gyur par 'dod pa /
T11TD4221.1E:299b-9: de lta na yang de grub pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:299b-10: 'on te 'jim pa'i 'gyur ba bzhin du 'dir yang rigs mtshungs pa'i rgyu brtag pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:299b-11: de lta na ni 'o na de'i rang bzhin can gyi 'bras bu gang ci snyed pa de thams cad rigs mi mthun pa las yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:299b-12: dper na sgra la sogs pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:299b-13: bum pa la sogs pa yang 'bras bu yin pas /
T11TD4221.1E:299b-14: de yang rigs mi mthun pa nyid las yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:299b-15: rdza mkhan la sogs pa ni rigs mi mthun pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:299b-16: des na thams cad mthun pa las skye ba yin no zhes bya ba'i khyab pa med pa'am /
T11TD4221.1E:299b-17: rigs mi mthun pa las skye ba yin pa'i phyir bzlog pa grub bo /
T11TD4221.1E:299b-18: lhan cig pa ma yin pa'i rigs mthun pa'i rgyu ni 'gar yang mthong ba med do //
T11TD4221.1E:299b-19: 'on te thams cad bde ba la sogs pa rjes su 'gro ba can du mthong ba nges na bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid rgyu yin par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:299b-20: 'ji ba'i rnam par 'gyur ba rnams kyi sa 'jim gong bzhin no zhen 'di la bshad zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:299b-21: lhan cig pa gzhan yang rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro /
T11TD4221.1E:299b-22: des na rigs mthun pa dang mi mthun pa rgyu yin par thal bas gtso bo mi 'grub bo //
T11TD4221.1E:299b-23: gzhan yang bde ba la sogs pa yang gzung ba nyid la sogs pa rjes su 'gro bas bzung ba'i gtso bo gzhan 'grub bo //
T11TD4221.1E:299b-24: des na mthar bzung ba nyid dang dngos po nyid la sogs pa rgyu yin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:299b-25: 'on te de yang bde ba la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:299b-26: dngos po nyid la sogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba can ni bde ba la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:299b-27: de lta na ni 'o na bde ba las sogs pa bum pa la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir na /
T11TD4221.1E:300a-0: gtso bo bum pa la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can @300a * //
T11TD4221.1E:300a-2: 'on te de ni thams cad kyi bdag nyid can du 'dod pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:300a-3: gal te rnam par 'gyur ba'i tshogs mtha' dag gtso bo'i bdag nyid la rang bzhin de nyid kyis phan tshun ldog par yod pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:300a-4: 'di la rang bzhin dang rnam par 'gyur ba'i dngos bo ci zhig yod /
T11TD4221.1E:300a-5: mngon par gsal ba dang mi gsal ba tsam ste /
T11TD4221.1E:300a-6: mngon par gsal ba'i rnam par 'gyur ba yin la mi gsal ba'i ni rang bzhin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:300a-7: mngon par gsal ba zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig yin la mi gsal ba yang ci zhig yin /
T11TD4221.1E:300a-8: gsal ba ni mngon par gsal ba yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:300a-9: de med pa ni mi gsal ba yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:300a-10: gsal ba 'di ci zhig mthong ba'i bdag nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:300a-11: de med pa'i mi dmigs pa ni mi gsal ba'o //
T11TD4221.1E:300a-12: tshad mas rang gi ngo bo grub pa na /
T11TD4221.1E:300a-13: de dmigs zhes bya bar nus pa yin gyi grub na ni med pa nyid ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:300a-14: des na snga na med pa yin pa'i phyir gtso bo mi 'grub bo//
T11TD4221.1E:300a-15: gal te bum pa la sogs pa sngar de ltar yod pa nyid ma dmigs pa yin na yang na gtso bo rgyur brtag pas ci bya /
T11TD4221.1E:300a-16: de dag gi bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid gtso bo yin no zhe na ma yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:300a-17: bde sog pa'i rang bzhin las tha dad par gzung ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:300a-18: tha dad par snang ba can gyi gzung ba tha dad pa ma yin par yang ci ltar 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:300a-20: phyi de khyad par yod na ni yang //
T11TD4221.1E:300a-21: goms pa yi ni khyad par las //
T11TD4221.1E:300a-22: blo la dga' yang yongs su gdung //
T11TD4221.1E:300a-23: khyad par du ni mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:300a-24: gal te bde ba la sogs pa sngon po la sogs pa phyi rol gyi rang bzhin nyid yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:300a-25: 'o na ni sngon po la sogs pa nyid bzhin du bsgoms pa'i khyad par las dga' ba dang gdung ba la sogs pa khyad par du mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:300a-26: sngon po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du snang ba ni /
T11TD4221.1E:300a-27: bsgoms pa'i khyad par gyis khyad par du 'gyur bar ma dmigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:300a-28: de lta yin no zhe na ni nang dang phyi rol mtha' dag goms pa'i rjes su 'gro ba can yin pa de'i phyir 'gro ba mtha' dag ni goms pa'i stobs las skyes pas de kho na ma yin par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:300a-29: gal te bde ba la sogs pa phyi rol yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:300a-30: phyi rol gyi rang bzhin du snang bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:300a-31: de ni 'khrul pa yin no zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:300a-32: 'khrul pa'i rgyu ma mthong ba'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:300b-0: gnod pa med @300b pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:300b-1: gal te blo yang bde sogs kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:300b-2: bdag nyid yin pas mi 'gal na //
T11TD4221.1E:300b-3: de ni phyi de bde sogs kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:300b-4: bdag nyid yin zhes ci ltar rtogs //
T11TD4221.1E:300b-5: bsam pa 'di yin par 'gyur te ci ltar sgra la sogs pa gtso bo yongs su gyur pa'i rang bzhin yin pa de bzhin du blo yang yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:300b-6: des na bdag gi blo'i rang bzhin gyi bde ba la sogs pa rig pa nges pa kho nar phyi rol ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du rig pa yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:300b-7: bsgoms pa'i khyad par gyis blo khyad par du gyur pa na /
T11TD4221.1E:300b-8: de'i bdag nyid can gyi bde ba la sogs pa yang khyad par du 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:300b-9: bsgoms pa zhes bya ba ni nga rgyal dang yid kyi 'jug pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:300b-10: nga rgyal de yang blo la nga'o snyam pa yin zhing yid kyang kun du rtog pa'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:300b-11: yid kyi kun du rtog pa yang nas yang du gyur pa nyid bsgoms pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:300b-12: des na snying stobs las byung ba'i bdag nyid nga rgyal la rag las pa'i blo bde ba'i bdag nyid rtogs pa ni de ltar gsal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:300b-13: gal te de lta na bde ba la sogs pa'i phyi rol gyi ngo bo yin no zhes ji ltar rtogs pa'i phyi rol sgra la sogs pa yang gtso bo yongs su gyur pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yang lan du 'brel pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:300b-14: sgra sogs gtso ba'i yongs gyur las //
T11TD4221.1E:300b-15: byung ba de nyid ga las shes //
T11TD4221.1E:300b-16: 'di dag de yi rang bzhin gyi //
T11TD4221.1E:300b-17: rjes su 'gro bar rtogs ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:300b-18: gal te blo bzhin du dgra la sogs pa la yang bde ba la sogs pa'i rjes su 'gro bar tshad mas nges pa yin na de'i tshe 'bras bu rgyu'i rjes su 'gro ba can yin pas na 'gro ba la gnas pa'i skye bos de lta bu'i rgyus bskyed pa yin par shes par 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:300b-19: bde ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can gyi gtso bo'i yongs su gyur pa yin pa nyid kyis de ltar nges so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:300b-20: 'di ni phan tshun brten pa nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:300b-22: 'di ni gtso bo'i yongs gyur nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:300b-23: yin par shes na bde sogs nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:300b-24: bde sogs nyid du shes pas kyang //
T11TD4221.1E:300b-25: sgra sogs de nyid yin par nges //
T11TD4221.1E:300b-26: sgra la sogs pa gtso bo'i yongs su gyur pa yin na bde ba la sogs pa rjes su 'gro ba yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:300b-27: bde ba la sogs pa rjes su 'gro bar nges pa yang gtso bo yongs su gyur pa'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur bas /
T11TD4221.1E:301a-0: gcig ma grub na gnyi ga @301a * //
T11TD4221.1E:301a-3: gal te du ba me yongs su gyur pa'i rang bzhin yin pa de lta mod kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:301a-4: de 'bar ba nyid yin par 'grub bam //
T11TD4221.1E:301a-5: cig mngon sum gyis gnod pa'i phyir de lta ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:301a-6: sgra la sogs pa la yang mtshungs so //
T11TD4221.1E:301a-7: 'di snyam du gal te sgra la sogs pa bde ba'i rang bzhin ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:301a-8: blo de dag gis 'dzin par byed pa ma yin par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:301a-9: rigs tha dad pa gzung ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:301a-10: 'dzin pa nyid du mi rung ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:301a-12: gal te rigs ni tha dad ngag / gzung 'dzin min na skyes bu ni //
T11TD4221.1E:301a-14: des na za ba po nyid nyams //
T11TD4221.1E:301a-15: skyes bu ni sgra la sogs pa dang rigs mthun pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:301a-16: de gtso bo'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:301a-17: bde ba la sogs pa ni bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:301a-18: de 'dzin par byed pa ma yin du zad mod ce na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:301a-19: za ba po nyid ma yin par thal ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:301a-20: skyes bu ni za ba por 'dod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:301a-21: nyams su myong bar byed pa las gzhan pa'i za ba po nyid ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:301a-24: blo dang sgra la sogs pa'i bde ba dag ni rgyu dang 'bras bu gzung ba dang 'dzin pa nyid kyi dngos po kho na las yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:301a-25: gang gi phyir sngon po la sogs pa rang gi rnam par gtod pas blo skye bar byed pa nyid kyis gzung ba yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:301a-26: gzung ba nyid ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid las yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:301a-27: des na gzung pa nyid kyis rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du 'grub bo //
T11TD4221.1E:301a-28: gzung ba nyid de yang rnam par 'jog par byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:301a-29: skyes bu yang sgra la sogs pa 'dzin par byed pa yin pas de yang de dag gi 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:301a-30: de lta na yang ma yin pa de'i phyir ma nges so //
T11TD4221.1E:301a-33: ma grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:301a-35: blo dang bde ba rgyu dang 'bras bu gzung ba dang 'dzin pa nyid kyi dngos po las min //
T11TD4221.1E:301a-36: gang la gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po yod ba der rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bor 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:301a-37: skyes bu dang sgra la sogs pa'i bde ba bzhin no /
T11TD4221.1E:301a-38: 'on te blo dang skyes bu la sogs pa gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po nyid las rgyu dang 'bras bu ngo bor 'gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:301b-0: 'o na ni de nyid @301b las de rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:301b-2: skyes bu yang 'bras bu nyid du thal bar mi 'dod par 'gyur ba'am /
T11TD4221.1E:301b-3: de nyid kyis ma nges par 'gyur ro /
T11TD4221.1E:301b-4: yang na blo dang bde ba rgyu dang 'bras bu ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:301b-5: gzung dang 'dzin pa nyid med phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:301b-6: yod na'ang de ni gzhan la'ang 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:301b-7: de phyir de ni nang nyid dang //
T11TD4221.1E:301b-8: myong bya nyid phyir sems yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:301b-10: rang rig rang bzhin myong ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:301b-11: de ni de yi myong ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:301b-12: phyi rol nyid la tshad ma med pa'i phyir dang /
T11TD4221.1E:301b-13: nang nyid du myong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:301b-14: dngos gang ci ltar rig gyur pa //
T11TD4221.1E:301b-15: de ni de bzhin nyid yin rtogs //
T11TD4221.1E:301b-16: myong ba med par dngos po rnams //
T11TD4221.1E:301b-17: yod par gtan la phebs ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:301b-18: gang gi phyir rig par byed pa ma yin pa de ni de'i rig par byed pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:301b-19: bde ba la sogs pa yang phyi rol gyi rang bzhin dang rjes su mthun par rig pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:301b-20: myong ba yang gzhan la dngos po yang gzhan no zhes bya bar ni mi 'thad do //
T11TD4221.1E:301b-21: sngon po rig par byed pa ni ser po yin no zhes bya bar mi rung ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:301b-22: de ltar rig pa rang rig pa'i rang bzhin du 'jug pa ni rang rig pa'i rang bzhin nyid gsal bar byed kyi /
T11TD4221.1E:301b-23: bde ba la sogs pa gzhan gyis rtogs par bya par rig pa ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:301b-24: gzugs la sogs pa ni mig la sogs pas 'jug pa rig pa yin pa'i phyir rang rig pa'i rang bzhin ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:301b-25: yang na bde ba la sogs pa rnam pa med pas 'dzin pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:301b-26: des na bde ba'i rnam pa nyid kyis rig par bya ba yin pa'i phyir na /
T11TD4221.1E:301b-27: rnam par shes pa yang bde ba'i rnam pa nyid du grub pas de'i nang du chud pa'i bde ba rtogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid do zhes bya bar grub bo //
T11TD4221.1E:301b-28: 'o na bum pa la sogs pa bzhin du bde ba la sogs pa yang phyi rol du 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:301b-30: bum pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa ni rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba yin yang gzhan nye bar gnas pas skye ba yin pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:301b-31: de la sogs pa'i byed pa rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:301b-32: bde ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa ni goms pa'i stobs kyis khyad par du 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:301b-33: gzhan nye bar gnas pa la rag las pa nyid du ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:302a-0: gal te goms pa la rag las pa nyid yin yang bde ba la @302a * //
T11TD4221.1E:302a-1: sogs pa myong ba'i rang bzhin ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:302a-2: de'i phyir rang bzhin du gyur pa ma yin pa'i myong bas rig pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:302a-3: bde ba la sogs pa ni goms pa la 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin yang myong ba'i rang bzhin ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:302a-5: gal te de rang bzhin min ba //
T11TD4221.1E:302a-6: myong bas blo gnas de rig na //
T11TD4221.1E:302a-7: bde ba la sogs pa rang rig pa yin na rtogs pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:302a-8: de'i rnam pa can ma yin pa bdag gzhan du gyur pa rig pas ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:302a-9: des na skyes bu 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur ba yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:302a-10: de'i rnam par skye ba nyid kyis na de 'bras bur gyur pa yin na de ni yod pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:302a-11: de de'i rnam pa can ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:302a-12: de'i rang bzhin du gyur pa ma yin pa nyid kyi myong bas blo'i nang du zhugs pa'i bde ba la sogs pa rig par byed pa'am /
T11TD4221.1E:302a-14: des na 'du bas 'brel pa'i phyir myong ba dang blo gcig tu mngon par rlom pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:302a-15: mngon sum dran pa'i rnam pa can //
T11TD4221.1E:302a-16: myong ba ma gtogs 'di blo gang //
T11TD4221.1E:302a-17: blo zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig lhag par zhen pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:302a-18: rig pa de gang yin na gnyis su myong ba'o //
T11TD4221.1E:302a-19: tha dad pa la tshad ma yod na de skad brjod par bya ba ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:302a-20: lhag par zhen pa dang nyams su myong ba zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs tsam du zad do //
T11TD4221.1E:302a-21: yul gyi rnam pa myong ba ma yin pa'i bdag nyid ni blo yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:302a-22: rnam pa med pa'i myong ba ni rtogs pa'i rang bzhin yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:302a-23: rnam pa med pa'i myong ba zhes bya ba 'di la tshad ma med do //
T11TD4221.1E:302a-24: mngon sum gyis rig pa ma yin pa des na tshad ma med do zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:302a-25: khas len pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:302a-26: mngon sum med pa la ni rjes su dpag pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:302a-27: des na khas blang ba nyid du mi rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:302a-28: 'on te myong ba gzhan med na bde ba la sogs pa myong ba med par thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:302a-29: rang rig pa nyid kyis myong na ci 'gal tha snyad ni de tsam gyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir na gzhan ni don med do //
T11TD4221.1E:302a-31: gal te myong gzhan mi 'dod na //
T11TD4221.1E:302a-32: de'i tshe thar pa'i gnas skabs na //
T11TD4221.1E:302a-33: bde dang sdug bsngal des grol ba //
T11TD4221.1E:302a-34: med pa ci ltar thar bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:302a-35: rang bzhin yongs su 'dor na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:302b-0: chos can med par thal bar @302b 'gyur ;
T11TD4221.1E:302b-1: / rang gi bdag nyid ni spang par nus pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:302b-2: bde ba la sogs pa tha dad par ni /
T11TD4221.1E:302b-3: gal te da lta'i gnas skabs na tha dad pa med pa rtogs pa de lta na yang tha dad par lhag par nges pa'i spyod yul du byas pas spang bar nus pa nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:302b-4: gal te 'di 'dod pa de lta na yang tshad mas ma grub pa ni mi 'grub po /
T11TD4221.1E:302b-5: bdag gi 'dod pa mi 'grub pa'i don yod do zhes bya bas ni tshad ma med pa'i don grub pa'i yul du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:302b-6: rgyu rnams ni rgyu med pa'i ni 'dod pa rjes su 'jug pa ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:302b-7: don la rgyu yod do zhes bya ba 'di la tshad ma yang cung zad med de sgom pa da ltar nyid bsgom pa la gnas pa na cha yod par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:302b-8: rdzogs pa de nyid kyi tshe nyon mongs pa spong bar mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:302b-9: da ltar ni de lta bur gyur pa'i myong ba gzhan nyid skye ba yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:302b-10: bde ba la sogs pa myong ba las tha dad par rtogs pa ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:302b-11: thar pa'i gnas skabs su yang de bzhin du yin pa'i phyir 'gal ba med do //
T11TD4221.1E:302b-13: de dang de don la brten nas //
T11TD4221.1E:302b-14: bde dang sdug bsngal sogs myong ba //
T11TD4221.1E:302b-15: gcig nyid 'byung bar 'gyur mthong gi / bar du gzhan ni ma mthong ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:302b-16: gal te blo dang bde ba la sogs pa zhes tha dad pas tha dad pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:302b-17: de lta ma yin na don tha dad pa med par brjod pa tha dad par ci ltar 'gyur zhen /
T11TD4221.1E:302b-19: 'di ni dga' ba dang zhum ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa du ma can gcig nyid 'byung bar mthong ste /
T11TD4221.1E:302b-20: de la ming ci ltar 'dod par gdags la rag go //
T11TD4221.1E:302b-21: brjod pa tha dad par ni gnas skabs kyi khyad par bstan pa'i don du yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:302b-22: dper na sa bon dang myu gu dang /
T11TD4221.1E:302b-23: 'dod pa ma dang chu'i brjod pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:302b-24: lcags gong dang ni me bzhin du //
T11TD4221.1E:302b-25: 'dres pa rnam dbyer med ce na //
T11TD4221.1E:302b-26: de lta yin na dngos kun la //
T11TD4221.1E:302b-27: tha dad tha dad min bzhag nyams //
T11TD4221.1E:302b-28: gal te dpe yod pa tsam gyis tshad ma med par 'di ni gnyis 'dres pa yin no zhes brtags pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:302b-29: de lta yin na ni ka ba la sogs pa rnam pa gcig tu rtogs pa thams cad la gcig ba nyid du mi 'grub po //
T11TD4221.1E:302b-30: gcig ma grub na ni de 'dus pa'i rang bzhin du yang mi 'grub pas na dngos po'i rnam par gzhag pa mtha' dag 'jig par 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:303a-1: dang du ma las ma gtogs pa'i dngos po mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:303a-3: tha dad med myong gcig yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:303a-4: de ltar gang yin de tha dad //
T11TD4221.1E:303a-6: tha dad grub byed 'grub ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:303a-7: de'i phyir gcig ma grub na gnyi ga yang mi grub bo //
T11TD4221.1E:303a-8: de bas na tha dad pa med par rig pa ni gcig yin la de las bzlog pas ni du ma yin no zhes rigs so //
T11TD4221.1E:303a-9: grangs can gyi ltar na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:303a-10: sdug bsngal dkar sogs tha dad snang //
T11TD4221.1E:303a-11: tha dad snang yin blo myong ni //
T11TD4221.1E:303a-12: tha dad med snang tha dad na //
T11TD4221.1E:303a-13: tha dad tha dad med rten ci //
T11TD4221.1E:303a-14: zhes bya ba ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad ba'o //
T11TD4221.1E:303a-15: 'on te yang ci ltar tshor ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:303a-16: sems pa la sogs pa sems las byung bas chen po la sogs pa rnams phan tshun tha dad par mi rtog la /
T11TD4221.1E:303a-17: mi rtog pa de lta na yang tha dad par 'dod pa de bzhin du blo dang myong ba yang ci ste mi 'dod tha dad pa med par rig pa gcig nyid do zhes bya ba ni sems kyi 'khor du gyur pa sems las byung ba dag gis ma nges so zhe na 'dir 'di skad brjod do //
T11TD4221.1E:303a-18: gcig tshe bsal bas bsgribs na yang /
T11TD4221.1E:303a-19: sems kyi khyad par rgyun dgal /
T11TD4221.1E:303a-20: tha dad par ni mthong ba'i phyir /
T11TD4221.1E:303a-21: tha dad rnam gzhan grub pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:303a-22: sems dang sems las byung ba dag tha dad pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa'i phyir de ltar khas len pa ni ma yin mod kyi khas blangs nas kyang lan 'debs pa ni gal te tshor ba la sogs pa shin tu gsal bar 'jug pa gcig gis sems pa la sogs pa bsgribs pas shin tu gsal ba'i yul du gyur pa ma yin pa de lta na yang gzhan gyi tshe dmigs pa'i yul du 'gyur bas na tshor ba dang sems pa la sogs pa ni tha dad pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:303a-23: dus gzhan du rang gi ngo bos dmigs pa'i phyir te /
T11TD4221.1E:303a-24: nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis rang nyid gsal ba'i nus pa bzlog pa'i skar ma'i tshogs de'i tshe med pa'i ma yin pa bzhin no //
T11TD4221.1E:303a-25: blo dang myong ba dag ni de lta ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:303a-26: nam gyi tshe yang tha dad par gsal bar mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:303a-27: sems las byung ba dag ni res 'ga' zhig gsal bar gyur pa 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:303a-28: gal te mtshan mar 'dzin pa la sogs pa rnam par rtog pa nyid yin par rtogs pa ma yin nam rnam par mi rtog pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:303b-1: de la yang sems las byung ba yod pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:303b-2: 'di ltar res 'ga' ni nyams su myong ba'i de ma thag tu mtshan ma'i rnam par rtogs pa'i yid la res 'ga' ni 'di bya'i snyam pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:303b-3: des na nyams su myong ba dag rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par rtog pa las rnam par rtog pa med pa la yang sems las byung ba yod do zhes nges pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:303b-4: des na de dag gi tha dad pa la ni rig pa'i cha yang yod pa yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:303b-5: blo dang myong ba dag ni 'di yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:303b-6: rnal 'byor shes pa sngar bshad pa //
T11TD4221.1E:303b-7: de dag gal te bsgoms byung yin //
T11TD4221.1E:303b-8: rtog pa'i dra ba rnam bsal nas //
T11TD4221.1E:303b-9: gsal ba nyid du snang ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:303b-10: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i yul can rnal 'byor ba rnams kyi shes pa ni bshad zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:303b-11: de rgyu gang las 'byung zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:303b-13: bsgoms byung yin te bsgoms pa'i rgyu can no //
T11TD4221.1E:303b-14: bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis kyang gsal bar snang ba yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:303b-15: gsal bar snang ba nyid kyis rtog pa med pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:303b-16: des na mngon sum yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:303b-17: gal te don gyi mthu las byung ba'i phyir da ltar gyi don gyi yul can gyi shes pa ni rtog pa med par 'thad pa yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:303b-19: med pa'i yul can go ci ltar goms pa tsam las rtog pa med pa nyid yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:303b-20: med pa'i yul can yin yang bsgoms pa yang de lta bu'i 'bras bu la nus pa nyid do zhes ston te /
T11TD4221.1E:303b-23: rkun po'i rmi sogs kyis bslad pas //
T11TD4221.1E:303b-24: mdun na gnas pa bzhin du ni //
T11TD4221.1E:303b-25: yang dag min ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:303b-26: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i yul can gyi shes pa ni don gyi nus pa las skyes pa ma yin la /
T11TD4221.1E:303b-27: de ni rtog pa dang bcas pa yang ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:303b-28: mdun na gnas pa nyid du mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:303b-29: de lta yin dang mdun na gnas pa'i rnam pa can nyid kyis rtog pa med pa mngon sum yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:303b-30: 'on kyang rtog pa dang bcas pa yin yang gsal bar snang ba yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:303b-31: rtog pa med pa'i phyir ni ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:303b-33: rnam par rtog dang rjes 'brel ni //
T11TD4221.1E:303b-34: don gsal snang ba can ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:304a-0: rmi lam na yang dran pa @304a * //
T11TD4221.1E:304a-2: / de 'dra'i don ldan min par dran //
T11TD4221.1E:304a-3: rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin ni lkog tu gyur pa'i yul can kho na'o zhes bstan zin to //
T11TD4221.1E:304a-4: gal te de ltar ma grub na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:304a-5: rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:304a-6: rnam par rtog par ni rmi lam na yang lkog tu gyur pa'i yul can du myong ste /
T11TD4221.1E:304a-7: de dag gsal bar snang ba ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:304a-8: bslad pa'i stobs kyis gsal ba yin na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:304a-9: 'gal ba yang rmi lam la sogs par mi gsal bar mi 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:304a-10: nyams su myong ba dran pa'i rnam pa ni rmi lam du yang mthong ste /
T11TD4221.1E:304a-11: de'i phyir bslad pa las rtog pa yang gsal ba nyid ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:304a-12: des na gsal ba'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa ni rtog pa med pa kho na'o //
T11TD4221.1E:304a-13: 'di la bye brag tu smra bdag na re /
T11TD4221.1E:304a-14: tshad mas grub pa'i dngos po la bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis gsal bar snang ba nyid do zhes bya bar rig ste /
T11TD4221.1E:304a-15: bsgoms pas ma rig pa'i dri ma dang bral ba na don rang gi ngo bor snang ba'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:304a-16: med pa la ni rang gi ngo bo med pas ci zhig snang / rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i yul can yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:304a-17: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa ni yod pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
T11TD4221.1E:304a-19: mi gtsang zad par sa la sogs//
T11TD4221.1E:304a-20: yang dag min pa'ang bsgoms pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:304a-21: stobs kyis sprul pa rtog med dang //
T11TD4221.1E:304a-22: gsal bar snang ba can du mthong //
T11TD4221.1E:304a-23: mi gtsang ba la sogs pa ni de kho na nyid ma yin pa yid la byed pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:304a-24: nam mkha' sal sogs pa ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:304a-25: 'on te sa la sogs pa yang yod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:304a-26: rnal 'byor pa'i mngon sum gyis mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni /
T11TD4221.1E:304a-27: rnal 'byor par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:304a-28: 'on kyang thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas don bzung nas /
T11TD4221.1E:304a-29: rig pa sems pa las byung bas rnam par gzhag ste /
T11TD4221.1E:304a-30: sgom pa rnams kyi don yongs su rdzogs pa na phyin ci ma log pa'i yul can gang yin pa de nyid tshad ma yin la de dang ldan pa ni rnal 'byor pa yin no /
T11TD4221.1E:304a-31: de ltar yin na yang zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'jug pa'i lam ni rnal 'byor yin no zhes bshad do //
T11TD4221.1E:304b-0: de la gsal te 'di dag rnal 'byor pa la snang ba yin ba de lta na yang 'di ni 'bras @304b bu'i don du de kho na nyid ma yin pa snang ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:304b-1: des na de dag gi de ni de kho na ma yin par snang ba yin na //
