T11TD4221.1E:304b-2: des na gal te rnal 'byor pa la de kho na nyid ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du snang ba de tsam gyi yod par ci ltar gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:304b-3: de'i phyir rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa la yang de dag ni de kho na nyid kyi rnag bzhin ma yin pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:304b-4: snang ba tsam gyis ni de kho nar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:304b-5: 'on kyang brtags pa las yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:304b-6: rtogs pa tsam las skye ba bsgoms pa ni de kho na rtogs pa'i rgyu ma yin gyi /
T11TD4221.1E:304b-7: tshad ma'i stobs kyis 'ongs na ni de ltar yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni gcig tu nges pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:304b-9: bsgoms pa tsam las byung ba'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:304b-10: de nyid min par brjod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:304b-11: dngos po'i sgo nas rtogs pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:304b-12: dngos po nges par 'dod pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:304b-14: de phyir yang dag yang dag min //
T11TD4221.1E:304b-15: gang gang shin tu bsgoms gyur pa //
T11TD4221.1E:304b-16: bsgoms pa yongs su rdzogs ba na //
T11TD4221.1E:304b-17: de gsal mi rtog blo 'bras can //
T11TD4221.1E:304b-18: yod pa 'ba' zhig bsgoms pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:304b-19: gzhan yang bsgoms pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:304b-20: des na gang dang gang bsgoms pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa na /
T11TD4221.1E:304b-21: de gsal ba mi rtog pa'i blo ni shin tu bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:304b-22: bsgoms pa ni gzhan du 'gyur bar ma mthong ngo //
T11TD4221.1E:304b-23: de la sngar dpyad dngos po bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:304b-24: slu ba med can gang yin de //
T11TD4221.1E:304b-25: bsgoms byung mngon sum tshang mar 'dod //
T11TD4221.1E:304b-26: lhag ma nye bar bslad ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:304b-27: zhes bya ba ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o //
T11TD4221.1E:304b-28: bsgoms pa'i sto bas las byung yang sngar dpyad pa'i dngos po 'jig rten pha rol du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la sogs pa mi slu ba can mi srid pa gang yin pa de'i yul can kho na mngon sum yin gyi 'dod pa la sogs pa'i yul can ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:304b-29: de ni gsal bar snang bas rtog pa med pa yin yang bslad pa nyid yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:304b-30: des na rmi lam gyi shes pa la sogs pa mi slu ba ni mngon sum ma yin pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:304b-31: gal te bsgoms pa'i stobs las shes pa mngon sum ma yin na /
T11TD4221.1E:305a-0: mu stegs pa dang 'brel pa'i shes pa @305a * //
T11TD4221.1E:305a-1: thams cad mngon sum du thal bar 'gyur te /
T11TD4221.1E:305a-2: de dag la yang bsgom pa med do zhes bya ba de ltar ni mi nus so //
T11TD4221.1E:305a-4: do na gan 'jig rten thun mong ba //
T11TD4221.1E:305a-5: de 'ga' zhig la yod do zhes //
T11TD4221.1E:305a-6: nges par rig pa las 'das par //
T11TD4221.1E:305a-7: gnas pa min par ci ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:305a-8: des na mu stegs byed gzhan de dag gis bsgoms pa las byung ba'i mngon sum gyis grub pa'i rang gi lugs kyi tshogs kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i don gyi tshogs med do zhes bya ba de ltar ga la 'gyur /
T11TD4221.1E:305a-9: des na de dag gis nye bar bstan pa las kyang 'jug par bya bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:305a-10: rjes su dpag pa la sogs pas gnod pa'i phyir de lta ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:305a-12: dbang po las 'das rig bya min //
T11TD4221.1E:305a-13: drang srong mig gis mthong gyur pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:305a-14: dngos la de dag rnams kyi tshig / rjes su dpag pas gnod mi 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:305a-15: ci ste de dag gi mthong ba yin no zhes bya ba de nyid mi shes so //
T11TD4221.1E:305a-16: gal te mthong na ni de'i tshig la gnod par mi 'gyur ba nyid do zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:305a-17: gal te de lta na ni de bzhin gshegs pas kyang bden pa la sogs pa mkhyen to zhes bya ba 'di ga las yin zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:305a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la yang //
T11TD4221.1E:305a-20: slu ba med can tshad mthong la //
T11TD4221.1E:305a-21: gzhan gyi tshad mas gnod 'gyur ba //
T11TD4221.1E:305a-22: des na de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs //
T11TD4221.1E:305a-23: gal te skyes bu 'i tshad mas dbang po las 'das pa'i don la tshad ma ma yin pa nyid ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:305a-24: de ci ltar dbang po las 'das pa'i don gyi gnod par byed pa 'am /
T11TD4221.1E:305a-26: gang phyir gnod bya gnod byed ni //
T11TD4221.1E:305a-27: yul mtshungs pa la rnam par gnas //
T11TD4221.1E:305a-29: tshad ma rab tu 'jug pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:305a-30: rnal 'byor pa'i shes pas kyang de dag gi de la gnod pa nyid do //
T11TD4221.1E:305a-32: de bzhin gshegs gsungs de dag gang //
T11TD4221.1E:305a-33: 'gal bar rnam par gnas pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:305a-34: de yi tshig rgyu shes pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:305a-35: gnod par rab tu ston pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-0: @305b 'di ni bzlog pa la yang mtshungs so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:305b-3: gal te dbang po las 'das pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-4: don brjod 'ba' zhig rig byed na //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-5: de yi tshig las mkhas pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-7: dbang po las 'das pa'i tshig ni thams cad la yod la /
T11TD4221.1E:305b-8: des na gzhan la ston par byed pas /
T11TD4221.1E:305b-9: cig shos kyi gcad par nus pa nyid bstan par bya ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-10: mi srid pa'i phyir de ltar ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:305b-11: rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa yang de gang las srid pa yin zhes bya ba 'di bsam par bya'o //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-12: rang bzhin gyis grub rnal 'byor pa'am //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-13: rig byed de ston byed yin na //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-14: gtan la phebs pa yod min na //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-15: dngos 'dir tshad ma ga las zhig /'on te de don gnyer rnams kyis //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-16: blang bya gcad nus min zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-17: mi rigs sdug bsngal chad pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-18: gtso po min pa nyid ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-19: sdug bsngal mtha' dag nye bar zhi ba ni blang bar bya ba ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:305b-21: bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin ldan pas //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-22: skye bo sdug bsngal dang 'brel cing //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-23: de bzhin de ni sdug bsngal rnams //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-24: thams cad zad par 'gyur ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-25: bde ba'ang de ltar 'gyur zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-26: sdug bsngal med pa bde ba'i mchog //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-27: gal te rtag tu sdug bsngal las //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-28: bzlog pa rig par yod gyur na //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-29: de las mchog gyur blang bya gzhan //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-30: rig pa dang 'brel gang zhig yin //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-31: mar mi zhi bar gyur pa bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-32: zhe na 'di ni tshad can min//'di ltar /
T11TD4221.1E:305b-33: bsreg dang bcad la sogs pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-34: shes pa rgyun chad nus ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-35: des na rgyun chad med pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-36: / ma 'khrugs pa ni gnas pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-37: de yi gnas skabs rtogs pa de //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-39: gal te skyo bas la rgyab phyogs //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-41: mnyam pa nyid ni mthong ba de'i rgyab kyis phyogs pa'ang gang gis byas //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-43: de la gnod byed 'ga' yod min //
T11TD4221.1E:305b-44: ting de 'dzin gyis bkres sogs kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-2: de las mtshon sogs gnod pa yang //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-3: de la med par 'gyur ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-4: bsgoms pa'i stobs las thams cad la //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-5: dpa' dang brtan pa la sogs 'byung //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-6: brtan pa med pa 'ga' la yang //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-7: kha zas rgyas par byed ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-8: brtan dang ldan pas gyi na yi //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-9: kha zas yongs su rgyas par byed //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-10: de lta'i kha zas med par yang //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-11: de yi don ni yod pa srid //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-12: skye ba gzhan sogs rig pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-13: goms pa nyid las skye bar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-14: des na las dang 'bras shes shing ;
T11TD4221.1E:306a-15: / rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ni //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-16: bye brag tu ni nges pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-17: de las thams cad rig par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-19: shes pa gsal bar 'gyur ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-20: bsgoms pa'i stobs las shes pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-21: phyi rol rnams la'ang 'gyur zhe na ;
T11TD4221.1E:306a-22: / de ni ded cag 'dod pa ste //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-23: rnam pa kun ni skyob pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-24: dngos po'i bdag med rtogs pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-25: brtan zhing 'khrugs pa med pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-26: chags la sogs pas dkrugs pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-27: mu stegs shes pa de lta min //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-28: de ltar gyur pa'i tshig las ni //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-29: de byed mkhyen par ldan par shes //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-30: shes pa yongs su ma dag par //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-31: brjod pa yongs su dag pa med //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-32: gal te rang rtogs rjes 'brangs pas //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-34: yod pa'i don la bsgom pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-35: shes pa'ang yod yin ma gus min ;
T11TD4221.1E:306a-36: / des na 'di ni chags bral na //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-37: don kun shes pa srid pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-38: mnyam par gzhag la mtha' dag ni //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-39: gsal ba yong par rnam par nges //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-40: chags dang bral ba thams cad la //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-41: de ni ci phyir yod ma gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-42: de dag 'bad pa chags sogs dang ;
T11TD4221.1E:306a-43: / bral ba tsam la zhugs pa'i phyir //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-44: de las de log gyur pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-45: bdag don byas par rlom de dag / gang du 'bad pa med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-46: bde thob 'dod pas re zhig gnas //
T11TD4221.1E:306a-47: kun mkhyen yon tan la chags pa //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-0: de dag slar yang dus gzhan @306b du ;
T11TD4221.1E:306b-1: /'bad pa chung dus kun mkhyen nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-2: 'grub pa bkag pa yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-3: mar me zhi bar 'gyur ba bzhin //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-4: zhe na de ni srid ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-5: de ni nyon mongs med pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-6: bdag la chags bral gal srid //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-7: gal te rtog pa sngon byas te //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-8: de las lhag par 'dod ce na //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-9: 'di ni de la'ang gus med par //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-10: bral bar 'dod pa ci phyir yin //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-11: 'dod chags bral la bud med dang //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-12: sogs las skyes 'byung bde ba med //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-13: sdang dang bral ba dbang po'i ste //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-14: bcom skyes bde ba ga las yod //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-15: rmongs dang bral la bdag dang ni //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-16: bdag gir zhen skyes bde ba med //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-17: des na de 'dra'i thar pa des //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-18: skye bo rnams la ci zhig bya //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-19: de ni de ltar mi bden te //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-20: chang 'thung sogs la'ang bsam par bya //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-21: chad 'thung las kyang bram ze la //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-22: rtag tu bde ba yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-23: bshad ba za ba'i bde ba ni //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-24: grong gi phag pa min la med //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-25: mi sha rlon pas srin po ni //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-26: ma yin pa dag bde ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-27: rje bo'i drin sogs bde ba ni //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-28: dran ma yin la yod dam ci //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-29: mgor brdegs pa yi bde ba ni //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-30: khol po ma yin rgyal ldan min //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-31: de ltar thar pa med pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-33: sog po par sig min pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-35: mnar med par ni ma phyin la //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-36: de bral bde ba gang na 'ang med //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-37: des na skye bo dmyal bar ni //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-39: 'on te bde ba khyad par can 'dod pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:306b-40: de lta yin na kho bo cag gi 'dod pa de nyid 'ongs pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-41: 'on te ci ltar thams cad rig pa yin /
T11TD4221.1E:306b-42: de shes pa yang ci lta bu yin //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-43: thams cad rig na 'dod chags la sogs ba gzhan gyi sems mtha' dag mngon du byas pa na 'dod chags dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i skyon du yang ji ltar mi 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:306b-45: thabs ni rnam pa du ma dag / yun ring dus su goms pa las //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-46: de yis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:306b-47: thob ba zhes byar rig pa yin //
T11TD4221.1E:307a-1: med pa gsum du goms pas mi thob pa gang yin pa de yod dam tshig / thams cad rig pa shes pa ni kho bo cag med par 'dod pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:307a-3: kun mkhyen min pas kun mkhyen ni //
T11TD4221.1E:307a-4: gang la ci ltar shes par 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:307a-5: bdag rigs bdag nyid chen po ni //
T11TD4221.1E:307a-6: rgya chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T11TD4221.1E:307a-8: thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pas ni thams cad mkhyen pa shes pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:307a-9: de bzhin du dge slong dag gang zag gis gang zag gi tshod ma 'dzin cing /
T11TD4221.1E:307a-10: gang zag gi tshod ni nga'am nga dang 'dra ba dag gis bzung zhes so //
T11TD4221.1E:307a-11: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin na bdag nyid thams cad 'dod chags la sogs pa gzhan gyi rgyud rig pa na /
T11TD4221.1E:307a-12: 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni med de /
T11TD4221.1E:307a-14: gzhan gyi rgyud ni rig pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:307a-15: 'dod chags bral ba'i rig pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:307a-16: de yis chags can nyid yod ces //
T11TD4221.1E:307a-17: bya ba shin tu 'thad par dka' //
T11TD4221.1E:307a-18: gal te 'di gzhan gyi chags pa dang bcas par 'gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:307a-19: de bzhin du gzhan chags pa dang bral ba la sogs pa rig pa na chags pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
T11TD4221.1E:307a-20: gnyi ga yang de nyid yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:307a-21: gcig kyang myong ba med par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:307a-23: btang snyoms par ni rig pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:307a-24: chags can la sogs srid pa min //
T11TD4221.1E:307a-25: 'di ltar bum pa rig pa na //
T11TD4221.1E:307a-26: bum pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du 'dod chags la sogs pa yang gzhan gyi rgyud du rtogs pa'i btang snyoms par rtogs par gyur pa ni 'dod chags dang ldan par bsgrub pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:307a-27: 'on te bdag nyid thams cad rig na de ci ltar bdag nyid rig pa de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa yang yin pas 'dod chags dang bcas pa nyid mi nyams so zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:307a-29: de yi ngo bor rig bya na //
T11TD4221.1E:307a-30: de nyid du ni rig 'gyur te //
T11TD4221.1E:307a-31: de ni gzhan gyi 'dod chags sogs //
T11TD4221.1E:307a-32: rig pa yin par ci ltar gzhag / de'i bdag nyid du rjes su zhugs na ni /
T11TD4221.1E:307a-33: gzhan gyi chags pa rig pa ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:307a-34: de nyid bdag nyid kyi chags pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:307a-35: 'di ni nyes pa gzhan yin te //
T11TD4221.1E:307a-36: de yi ngo bo rig bya na //
T11TD4221.1E:307a-37: de nyid du ni rig mi 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:307b-0: de yi bdag tu rig @307b na ni //
T11TD4221.1E:307b-1: chags dang bcas par thal bar 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:307b-4: gzhan la gnas pa'i chags sogs kyis //
T11TD4221.1E:307b-5: de yi lus ngag rnam 'gyur bar //
T11TD4221.1E:307b-6: mi 'gyur de la chags sogs kyi //
T11TD4221.1E:307b-7: sa bon rgyud rings gnas pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:307b-8: bag chags mthu las byung ba yis //
T11TD4221.1E:307b-9: 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags dang ldan par byed kyi gzhan gyi bag chags las byung ba grub pa nye bar gnas par myong bas ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:307b-10: gal te rang gi ngo bo nyams su myong na de'i ba spu ldang ba la sogs pa lus rnam par 'gyur ba dang /
T11TD4221.1E:307b-11: dag rnam par 'gyur bar ci ste mi 'gyur zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:307b-13: lus dang dag gi 'gyur ba de //
T11TD4221.1E:307b-14: bag chags stobs las 'gyur ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:307b-15: bag chags med pa de la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:307b-16: gnyi ga yang ni srid ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:307b-17: gal te gzhan gyi sems bsgoms pa'i stobs nyid kyis rig pa ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:307b-18: goms pa'i 'du byed kyang bag chags yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:307b-19: de la goms pa'i 'du byed yod na ;
T11TD4221.1E:307b-20: bag chags med par ci ltar 'gyur //
T11TD4221.1E:307b-21: goms pa dang bag chags dag ni khyad par cung zad yod pa yin no zhe na //
T11TD4221.1E:307b-22: de ni mi rigs te 'di ltar /
T11TD4221.1E:307b-23: go bar byed pa'i khyad par ni //
T11TD4221.1E:307b-24: shin tu mthar phyin rtogs gyur na //
T11TD4221.1E:307b-25: gzhan gyi sems ni rig pa la //
T11TD4221.1E:307b-26: khyad par snang bar 'gyur ba yin //
T11TD4221.1E:307b-27: de la ni rtags kyi khyad par nye bar mtshon pa la bsgoms pa'i khyad par yod kyi de la go bar byed pa'i don bsgoms pa de ni med do //
T11TD4221.1E:307b-28: yod kyang bdag nyid dang 'brel pa ni ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:307b-29: des na de la bag chags med pa'i phyir snang yang chags pa dang bcas pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:307b-30: 'dis ni mi gtsang ba'i ro la sogs pa myong ba'i skyon yang spangs pa yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:307b-31: 'di ni las las skyes pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:307b-32: dbang pos rig na mi gtsang sogs //
T11TD4221.1E:307b-33: bcas 'gyur goms pa'i stobs la ni //
T11TD4221.1E:307b-34: 'byung ba gzhan dag gis ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:307b-35: gal te bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis lce bskyed de myong na ni de'i tshe skyon med pa nyid de /
T11TD4221.1E:307b-36: rmi lam du ni bgrod par mi bya ba la bgrod pa'i nyes pa yod pa ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:307b-37: de ni mi bden pa des na skyon med pa yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:307b-38: mi slu ba yin na ci ltar mi bden /
T11TD4221.1E:307b-39: gang gi tshe yang rmi lam rmi ba de'i tshe 'gyur na /
T11TD4221.1E:307b-40: de'i tshe khyod la bgrod par bya ba ma yin pa /
T11TD4221.1E:307b-41: bgrod pa'i nyes pa ci ltar yin //
T11TD4221.1E:308a-0: @308a * // de'i phyir gzhan gyi lugs ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:308a-1: rim gyis rig na thog med pa'i //
T11TD4221.1E:308a-2: dngos po ci ltar rig ce na //
T11TD4221.1E:308a-3: ma yin don rnams thams cad ni //
T11TD4221.1E:308a-4: rim ma yin par rig phyir ro //
T11TD4221.1E:308a-5: dper na shin tu goms pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:308a-6: bstan bcos kyi ni don rnams su na //
T11TD4221.1E:308a-7: yid la skad cig gcig la snang ;
T11TD4221.1E:308a-8: / de bzhin mtha' med rig pa nyid //
T11TD4221.1E:308a-9: dper na shin tu goms pa yi //
T11TD4221.1E:308a-10: bstan bcos kyi don skad cig gcig nyid la snang ba de bzhin du thog ma dang tha ma med pa rig pa yang yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:308a-11: bstan bcos ni tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:308a-12: tshad dang ldan pa phyir snang ba ni ma yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:308a-13: 'on kyang goms pa las yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:308a-14: bstan bcos kyi brjod bya de ni thams cad snang ba des na /
T11TD4221.1E:308a-15: des dran pa la snang ba yin no zhe na ma yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:308a-16: snga na med pa'i bstan bcos kyi don ni phan tshun 'brel ba yin pas de la nye ba rgyu 'ga' zhig gis gzhan la snang ba ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:308a-17: gal te de la phan tshun 'brel pa'i bstan bcos kyi don 'ga' zhig snang ba'i rgyus gzhan yang ma yin nam /
T11TD4221.1E:308a-18: thog ma dang tha ma med ba snang ba ni de lta ma yin no zhe na /
T11TD4221.1E:308a-19: ci ltar snga na med pa snang ba yin zhes thams cad mtshungs so //
T11TD4221.1E:308a-22: ma gtogs par ni don rnams la //
T11TD4221.1E:308a-23: nye ba yod min tha snyad la'ang //
T11TD4221.1E:308a-24: de ni ci ltar yod ma yin //
T11TD4221.1E:308a-25: bstan bcos su don rnams kyi nye ba ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:308a-26: des na thams cad snang ba yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:308a-27: 'di ni tha snyad la yang mtshungs te /
T11TD4221.1E:308a-28: 'di ltar 'di'i rnam par 'gyur ba ni 'di yin te /
T11TD4221.1E:308a-29: 'di'i rgyu ni 'di lta bu zhig yin dgos so //
T11TD4221.1E:308a-30: rgyu de yang brgyud nas 'bras bu 'di snyed kyi skyed par byed pa yin no //
T11TD4221.1E:308a-31: gang gis 'di la lhan cig byed pa yod pa 'am /
T11TD4221.1E:308a-32: med par 'gyur ba 'di'i bsod nams ni 'di 'dra ba zhig yin no zhes de ltar gzhan gyis sems rtogs so //
T11TD4221.1E:308a-33: skye ba sngon ma la sogs pa rig pa na yang brgyud nas phan tshun bral ba thams cad du rigs te /
T11TD4221.1E:308a-34: des na bskal ba gzhan yang na rig go //
T11TD4221.1E:308a-35: bskal pas bskal can skye ba la //
T11TD4221.1E:308a-36: rgyu 'bras nyid ni rig pa yis //
T11TD4221.1E:308a-37: 'gro ba kun gyi de nyid dang //
T11TD4221.1E:308a-38: de yis nang byad rnam gnas rig / de ltar don kun rig pa ni //
T11TD4221.1E:308a-39: lugs kun spangs nas 'dir bstan to //
T11TD4221.1E:308a-40: gzhan gang de yang gzhan dag gis //
T11TD4221.1E:308a-41: gzhung rjes 'brangs nas gsal bar bstan /
